acct_label: Accounts Payable, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

acct_label: Accrued Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Accrued Liabilities
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities.

acct_label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
acct_description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
acct_description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

acct_label: Additional Paid in Capital, Common Stock
acct_description: Value received from shareholders in common stock-related transactions that are in excess of par value or stated value and amounts received from other stock-related transactions. Includes only common stock transactions (excludes preferred stock transactions). May be called contributed capital, capital in excess of par, capital surplus, or paid-in capital.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Expenditures for Additions to Long-Lived Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Total expenditures for additions to long-lived assets other than financial instruments, long-term customer relationships of a financial institution, mortgage and other servicing rights, deferred policy acquisition costs, and deferred tax assets of the reportable segment; if the amount: (a) is included in the determination of segment assets reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) is otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in the determination of segment assets.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Equity Component of Convertible Debt
acct_description: Adjustment to additional paid in capital resulting from the recognition of convertible debt instruments as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This bifurcation may result in a basis difference associated with the liability component that represents a temporary difference for purposes of applying accounting for income taxes. The initial recognition of deferred taxes for the tax effect of that temporary difference is as an adjustment to additional paid in capital.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Income Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation
acct_description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit associated with share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes, but is not limited to, excess tax benefit.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as current.

acct_label: Amortization of Debt Discount (Premium)
acct_description: Amount of noncash expense included in interest expense to amortize debt discount and premium associated with the related debt instruments. Excludes amortization of financing costs. Alternate captions include noncash interest expense.

acct_label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
acct_description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

acct_label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share, Amount
acct_description: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic earnings per share (EPS) or earnings per unit (EPU) in the future that were not included in the computation of diluted EPS or EPU because to do so would increase EPS or EPU amounts or decrease loss per share or unit amounts for the period presented.

acct_label: Asset Impairment Charges
acct_description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

acct_label: Assets
acct_description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

acct_label: Assets, Current
acct_description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Long Lived, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of assets classified as held for sale.

acct_label: Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold or consumed after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets
acct_description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Buildings and Improvements, Gross
acct_description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of building structures held for productive use including addition, improvement, or renovation to the structure, including, but not limited to, interior masonry, interior flooring, electrical, and plumbing.

acct_label: Business Exit Costs
acct_description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Includes, but is not limited to, one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, and relocating employees, and termination benefits associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement. Excludes expenses associated with special or contractual termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

acct_label: Capital Lease Obligations, Current
acct_description: Amount of capital lease obligation due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Capital Lease Obligations, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount equal to the present value (the principal) at the beginning of the lease term of minimum lease payments during the lease term (excluding that portion of the payments representing executory costs such as insurance, maintenance, and taxes to be paid by the lessor, together with any profit thereon) net of payments or other amounts applied to the principal, through the balance sheet date and due to be paid more than one year (or one operating cycle, if longer) after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
acct_description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

acct_label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

acct_label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
acct_description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Discontinued Operations
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities of discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

acct_label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Discontinued Operations
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities of discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

acct_label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Discontinued Operations
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of operating activities of discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

acct_label: Cash Surrender Value of Life Insurance
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts which could be received based on the terms of the insurance contract upon surrendering life policies owned by the entity.

acct_label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
acct_description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

acct_label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
acct_description: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

acct_label: Common Stock, Shares Authorized
acct_description: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

acct_label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
acct_description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

acct_label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
acct_description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

acct_label: Common Stock, Value, Outstanding
acct_description: Value of all classes of common stock held by shareholders. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized. These shares exclude common shares repurchased by the entity and held as treasury shares.

acct_label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

acct_label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

acct_label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Cumulative Catch-up Adjustment to Revenue, Change in Measure of Progress
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from change in measure of progress which increases (decreases) right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Liability
acct_description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Cumulative Catch-up Adjustment to Revenue, Change in Measure of Progress
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from change in measure of progress which (increases) decreases obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
acct_description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
acct_description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

acct_label: Cost of Goods and Services Sold
acct_description: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Total costs related to goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Cost of Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Total costs related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period.

acct_label: Costs and Expenses
acct_description: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

acct_label: Costs in Excess of Billings, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of receivable reflecting the cost incurred on uncompleted contracts in excess of related billings which is expected to be collected after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Cumulative Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in cumulative translation adjustment before transfers included in determining net income.

acct_label: Current Federal Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Current Foreign Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of current foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Debt, Current
acct_description: Amount of short-term debt and current maturity of long-term debt and capital lease obligations due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Decrease, Repayments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Decrease for amounts repaid on the debt instrument for the period.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Repurchase Amount
acct_description: Fair value amount of debt instrument that was repurchased.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Repurchased Face Amount
acct_description: Face (par) amount of the original debt instrument that was repurchased.

acct_label: Debt, Long-term and Short-term, Combined Amount
acct_description: Represents the aggregate of total long-term debt, including current maturities and short-term debt.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Plan Assets
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of assets held under deferred compensation agreements.

acct_label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

acct_label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

acct_label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
acct_description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

acct_label: Deferred Rent Credit
acct_description: The cumulative difference between the rental payments required by a lease agreement and the rental income or expense recognized on a straight-line basis, or other systematic and rational basis more representative of the time pattern in which use or benefit is granted or derived from the leased property, expected to be recognized in income or expense over the term of the leased property by the lessor or lessee, respectively.

acct_label: Deferred Revenue, Current
acct_description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

acct_label: Deferred Revenue, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Deferred Income
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from deferred income.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Hedging Transactions
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from hedging transactions.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Inventory
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from inventory.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
acct_description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
acct_description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance, Current
acct_description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as current.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, State and Local
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible state and local operating loss carryforwards.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
acct_description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Employee Benefits
acct_description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from employee benefits, classified as other.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Postretirement Benefits
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from postretirement benefits.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the allowance for doubtful accounts.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Impairment Losses
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from estimated impairment losses.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
acct_description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense, Capitalized Research and Development Costs
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from research and development costs.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Financing Arrangements
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from financing arrangements.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Intangible Assets
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets other than goodwill.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as other.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Property, Plant and Equipment
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Amortization of Gain (Loss), Next Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount included in accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for gain (loss) of defined benefit plan expected to be recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit for fiscal year following most recent annual statement of financial position.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Actual Allocation, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of actual investment allocation to total plan assets. Includes, but is not limited to, percentage on weighted-average basis if more than one plan.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Cost
acct_description: Amount of cost for defined contribution plan.

acct_label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
acct_description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments, Loss Reclassified from Accumulated OCI into Income, Effective Portion
acct_description: The effective portion of loss reclassified from accumulated other comprehensive income into income on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Derivative, Number of Instruments Held
acct_description: The number of derivative instruments of a particular group held by the entity.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) from Disposal of Discontinued Operation, before Income Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount after tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation, before Income Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation During Phase-out Period, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until disposal.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share
acct_description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share
acct_description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Tax Effect of Discontinued Operation
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) related to a discontinued operation. Includes, but is not limited to, tax expense (benefit) related to income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, tax expense (benefit) related to gain (loss) on disposal, tax expense (benefit) related to gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and tax expense (benefit) related to adjustments of a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Accounts, Notes and Loans Receivable, Net
acct_description: Amount classified as accounts, notes and loans receivable attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as accounts payable and accrued liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Costs of Goods Sold
acct_description: Amount of costs of goods sold attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, General and Administrative Expense
acct_description: Amount of general and administrative expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Goodwill, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as goodwill attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Inventory, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as inventory attributable to disposal group, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Income (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of operating income (loss) attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Assets, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as other assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Revenue
acct_description: Amount of revenue attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Not Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal
acct_description: Amount before tax of gain (loss) recognized on the sale or disposal of a disposal group. Excludes discontinued operations.

acct_label: Dividends, Common Stock, Cash
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.

acct_label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
acct_description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Earnings Per Share, Basic and Diluted
acct_description: The amount of net income or loss for the period per each share in instances when basic and diluted earnings per share are the same amount and reported as a single line item on the face of the financial statements. Basic earnings per share is the amount of net income or loss for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period. Diluted earnings per share includes the amount of net income or loss for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
acct_description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

acct_label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash and Cash Equivalents
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) from the effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalent balances held in foreign currencies.

acct_label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash and Cash Equivalents, Continuing Operations
acct_description: The effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances in continuing operations held in foreign currencies.

acct_label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: Equity Method Investment, Ownership Percentage
acct_description: The percentage of ownership of common stock or equity participation in the investee accounted for under the equity method of accounting.

acct_label: Equity Method Investments
acct_description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

acct_label: Excess Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation, Financing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from realized tax benefit related to deductible compensation cost reported on the entity's tax return for equity instruments in excess of the compensation cost for those instruments recognized for financial reporting purposes.

acct_label: Excess Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation, Operating Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for realized tax benefit related to deductible compensation cost reported on the entity's tax return for equity instruments in excess of the compensation cost for those instruments recognized for financial reporting purposes.

acct_label: Extinguishment of Debt, Amount
acct_description: Gross amount of debt extinguished.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Past Due
acct_description: Amount of financing receivable past due.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate amount of intangible asset amortization recognized as expense during the period.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
acct_description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
acct_description: Amount before amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
acct_description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

acct_label: Finite-Lived License Agreements, Gross
acct_description: Gross carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of certain rights acquired to exercise a certain privilege or pursue a particular business or occupation and which is deemed to have a finite economic life.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Five (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year five of the five succeeding fiscal years.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Four (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year four of the five succeeding fiscal years.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, Year One (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year one of the five succeeding fiscal years.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Three (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year three of the five succeeding fiscal years.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Two (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year two of the five succeeding fiscal years.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
acct_description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Business
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from sale and disposal of integrated set of activities and assets capable of being conducted and managed for purpose of providing return in form of dividend, lower cost, or other economic benefit to investor, owner, member and participant.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Investments
acct_description: The net realized gain (loss) on investments sold during the period, not including gains (losses) on securities separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, which, for cash flow reporting, is a component of proceeds from investing activities.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
acct_description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

acct_label: Goodwill
acct_description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
acct_description: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.

acct_label: Goodwill, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) an asset representing future economic benefits from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
acct_description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Purchase Accounting Adjustments
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) from adjustments after acquisition date under purchase accounting of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Subsequent Recognition of Deferred Tax Asset
acct_description: Amount of (increase) decrease to an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from the subsequent recognition of deferred tax assets.

acct_label: Goodwill, Translation Adjustments (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) from foreign currency translation adjustments of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Written off Related to Sale of Business Unit
acct_description: Amount of divestiture of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Gross Profit
acct_description: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations including portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Basic and Diluted Share
acct_description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each basic and diluted share of common stock or unit when the per share amount is the same for both basic and diluted shares.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Basic Share
acct_description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Diluted Share
acct_description: The amount of net income (loss) derived from continuing operations during the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic and Diluted Share
acct_description: Per basic and diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation, when the per share amount is the same.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share
acct_description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share
acct_description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
acct_description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

acct_label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

acct_label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Intraperiod Tax Allocation
acct_description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for continuing operations, discontinued operations, other comprehensive income, and items charged (credited) directly to shareholders' equity.

acct_label: Income Taxes Paid
acct_description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

acct_label: Income Taxes Receivable
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of income taxes previously overpaid to tax authorities (such as U.S. Federal, state and local tax authorities) representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes. Also called income tax refund receivable.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Qualified Production Activity, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and the expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for qualified production activity.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
acct_description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Noncontrolling Interest Income (Loss), Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to noncontrolling interest income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Leases, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible lease expense.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Prior Year Income Taxes, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to revisions of previously reported income tax expense (benefit).

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax expense (benefit).

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Research, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to research tax credit.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income tax settlements. Including, but not limited to, domestic tax settlement, foreign tax settlement, state and local tax settlement, and other tax settlements.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts and Notes Receivable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of the sum of amounts due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services; and from note holders for outstanding loans.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Asset
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Revenue
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of all inventory held by the reporting entity, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accrued Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other expenses incurred but not yet paid.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets and Liabilities, Net
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets after deduction of operating liabilities classified as other.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating liabilities classified as other.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expenses, Other
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for other costs that provide economic benefits in future periods.

acct_label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Conversion of Debt Securities
acct_description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of convertible debt securities using the if-converted method.

acct_label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-based Payment Arrangements
acct_description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

acct_label: Indefinite-Lived Trademarks
acct_description: Carrying amount (original costs adjusted for previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date for the rights acquired through registration of a trademark to gain or protect exclusive use of a business name, symbol or other device or style for a projected indefinite period of benefit.

acct_label: Intangible Assets, Gross (Excluding Goodwill)
acct_description: Amount before accumulated amortization of intangible assets, excluding goodwill.

acct_label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
acct_description: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

acct_label: Intangible Assets, Net (Including Goodwill)
acct_description: Carrying amount of finite-lived intangible assets, indefinite-lived intangible assets and goodwill. Goodwill is an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized. Intangible assets are assets, not including financial assets, lacking physical substance.

acct_label: Interest Expense
acct_description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

acct_label: Interest on Convertible Debt, Net of Tax
acct_description: The after-tax amount of interest recognized in the period associated with any convertible debt.

acct_label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

acct_label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

acct_label: Inventory, Finished Goods, Net of Reserves
acct_description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or goods held by the company that are readily available for sale.

acct_label: Inventory, Net
acct_description: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Inventory, Parts and Components, Net of Reserves
acct_description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date for elements of machinery or equipment held for the purpose of replacing similar parts in the course of repair or maintenance.

acct_label: Inventory, Raw Materials and Purchased Parts, Net of Reserves
acct_description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of items purchased for use as components of a finished product or pieces of machinery and equipment plus any items in their natural and unrefined state. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines raw materials and purchased parts into an aggregate amount.

acct_label: Inventory, Work in Process, Net of Reserves
acct_description: Carrying amount, net of reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or goods which are partially completed. This inventory is generally comprised of raw materials, labor and factory overhead costs, which require further materials, labor and overhead to be converted into finished goods, and which generally require the use of estimates to determine percentage complete and pricing.

acct_label: Inventory Write-down
acct_description: Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.

acct_label: Investment Income, Interest
acct_description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

acct_label: Investments in and Advance to Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures
acct_description: Amount of investment in equity method investee and investment in and advance to affiliate.

acct_label: Land
acct_description: Amount before accumulated depletion of real estate held for productive use, excluding land held for sale.

acct_label: Lease, Cost
acct_description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

acct_label: Legal Fees
acct_description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year One
acct_description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Letters of Credit Outstanding, Amount
acct_description: The total amount of the contingent obligation under letters of credit outstanding as of the reporting date.

acct_label: Liabilities and Equity
acct_description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

acct_label: Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of obligation due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities
acct_description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Estimated Litigation Liability
acct_description: Aggregate carrying amount of the estimated litigation liability for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs.

acct_label: Litigation Settlement, Amount Awarded to Other Party
acct_description: Amount awarded to other party in judgment or settlement of litigation.

acct_label: Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

acct_label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation, Current
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as current.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Current Maturities
acct_description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt, classified as current. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.

acct_label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
acct_description: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual
acct_description: Amount of loss contingency liability.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Loss in Period
acct_description: The amount of loss pertaining to the specified contingency that was charged against earnings in the period, including the effects of revisions in previously reported estimates.

acct_label: Loss on Contract Termination
acct_description: The loss recognized on termination of a contract.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (that is, noncontrolling interest, previously referred to as minority interest).

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Equity Issuance or Sale of Parent Equity Interest (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Represents an increase in noncontrolling interest from issuance of additional equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders or the sale of a portion of the parent's controlling interest.

acct_label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Continuing Operations
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in cash associated with the entity's continuing operating, investing, and financing activities. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a debit balance consistent with its label.

acct_label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

acct_label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

acct_label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
