acct_description: Noninterest expense related to directors' fees which are fees paid by an Entity to its directors. Directors' fees may be paid in addition to salary and other benefits.

acct_label: Notes and Loans Payable
acct_description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of all notes and loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Notes and Loans Payable, Current
acct_description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of all long-term notes and loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Notes Payable
acct_description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Notes Payable, Current
acct_description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of long-term notes payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Current
acct_description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Current (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Notes Payable, Related Parties
acct_description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties.

acct_label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Noncurrent
acct_description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), payable to related parties, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).

acct_label: Notes Receivable, Related Parties
acct_description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from parties associated with the reporting entity as evidenced by a written promise to pay.

acct_label: Notes Receivable, Related Parties, Current
acct_description: Amounts due from parties associated with the reporting entity as evidenced by a written promise to pay, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

acct_label: Notes Receivable, Related Parties, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amounts due from parties associated with the reporting entity as evidenced by a written promise to pay, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

acct_label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
acct_description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

acct_label: Option Indexed to Issuer's Equity, Settlement Alternatives, Cash, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of each cash settlement alternative for each freestanding option contract.

acct_label: Option Indexed to Issuer's Equity, Shares
acct_description: The maximum number of shares that could be issued to net share settle a contract, if applicable. If a contract does not have a fixed or determinable maximum number of shares that may be required to be issued, disclose the fact that a potentially infinite number of shares could be issued to settle the contract.

acct_label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Amortization of Other Deferred Charges
acct_description: Amount of amortization of other deferred costs recognized in the income statement.

acct_label: Other Assets
acct_description: Amount of assets classified as other.

acct_label: Other Notes Payable
acct_description: Amount of long-term notes payable classified as other.

acct_label: Other Prepaid Expense, Current
acct_description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for other costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
acct_description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

acct_label: Prepaid Expense (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount for a unclassified balance sheet date of expenditures made in advance of when the economic benefit of the cost will be realized, and which will be expensed in future periods with the passage of time or when a triggering event occurs. For a classified balance sheet, represents the noncurrent portion of prepaid expenses (the current portion has a separate concept).

acct_label: Proceeds from Convertible Debt
acct_description: The cash inflow from the issuance of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
acct_description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

acct_label: Proceeds, Issuance of Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Including Option Exercised
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of shares under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, option exercised.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Warrants
acct_description: The cash inflow from issuance of rights to purchase common shares at predetermined price (usually issued together with corporate debt).

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
acct_description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

acct_label: Proceeds from Legal Settlements
acct_description: Cash received for the settlement of litigation during the current period.

acct_label: Proceeds from Loans
acct_description: Cash received from principal payments made on loans related to operating activities.

acct_label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
acct_description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

acct_label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
acct_description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Bank Overdrafts
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the excess drawing from an existing cash balance, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the drawer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Warrant Exercises
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from holders exercising their stock warrants.

acct_label: Realized Gain (Loss) on Marketable Securities, Cost Method Investments, and Other Investments
acct_description: This item represents the total realized gain (loss) included in earnings for the period as a result of selling marketable securities categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity and any gains or losses realized during the period from the sale of investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting and/or investments that are separately or otherwise not categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity. Additionally, this item would include any losses recognized for other than temporary impairments (OTTI) of the subject investments in debt and equity securities.

acct_label: Reclassification to Unappropriated Retained Earnings (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount reclassified to unappropriated retained earnings from accumulated increase (decrease) in the fair value of the financial assets (liabilities) of the collateralized financing entity.

acct_label: Repayment of Notes Receivable from Related Parties
acct_description: The cash inflow from a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

acct_label: Repayments of Notes Payable
acct_description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

acct_label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

acct_label: Revenues
acct_description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

acct_label: Salary and Wage, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
acct_description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer and officer employees. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

acct_label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
acct_description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

acct_label: Sale of Stock, Price Per Share
acct_description: Per share amount received by subsidiary or equity investee for each share of common stock issued or sold in the stock transaction.

acct_label: Security Owned Not Readily Marketable, Fair Value
acct_description: Value of the not readily marketable security or category which has been determined by management based upon fair value methods, including pricing of similar securities and valuation techniques and is included in the schedule of financial condition or the balance sheet.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
acct_description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
acct_description: Per share or unit weighted-average fair value of nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
acct_description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate, Maximum
acct_description: The estimated measure of the maximum percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate, Minimum
acct_description: The estimated measure of the minimum percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Exercised
acct_description: Number of non-option equity instruments exercised by participants.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Net of Forfeitures
acct_description: Net number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
acct_description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Shares to be Repurchased Next Year
acct_description: An entity expecting to repurchase shares in the following period, generally discloses an estimate of the amount or range of shares to be repurchased.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation, Shares Authorized under Stock Option Plans, Exercise Price Range, Outstanding Options, Weighted Average Exercise Price, Beginning Balance (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees could acquire the underlying shares with respect to all outstanding stock options which are in the customized range of exercise prices.

acct_label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Quantity of Securities Issued
acct_description: The number of shares or units of entity securities issued in the transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

acct_label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Stockholders' Equity
acct_description: The amount by which stockholders' equity was increased by the transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Intrinsic Value
acct_description: Amount of difference between fair value of the underlying shares reserved for issuance and exercise price of vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested in Period, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of options vested. Excludes equity instruments other than options, for example, but not limited to, share units, stock appreciation rights, restricted stock.

acct_label: Share Price
acct_description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

acct_label: Shares, Issued
acct_description: Number of shares of stock issued as of the balance sheet date, including shares that had been issued and were previously outstanding but which are now held in the treasury.

acct_label: Short-term Non-bank Loans and Notes Payable
acct_description: Amount of borrowings from a creditor other than a bank with a maturity within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Subscriptions Receivable
acct_description: Note received instead of cash as contribution to equity. The transaction may be a sale of capital stock or a contribution to paid-in capital.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity, Other Shares
acct_description: Number of increase (decrease) in shares of stock classified as other.

acct_label: Stock Issued (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

acct_label: Stock Issued
acct_description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Conversion of Convertible Securities
acct_description: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of the conversion of convertible securities.

acct_label: Development Stage Entities, Stock Issued, Shares, Issued for Cash (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Number of shares issued as consideration for cash for development stage entities.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Issued for Services
acct_description: Number of shares issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Number of shares includes, but is not limited to, shares issued for services contributed by vendors and founders.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
acct_description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Other
acct_description: Number of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the number of shares issued.

acct_label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
acct_description: Number, after forfeiture, of shares or units issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes shares or units issued under employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
acct_description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
acct_description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
acct_description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
acct_description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
acct_description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

acct_label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
acct_description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Stock Option, Down Round Feature, (Increase) Decrease in Equity, Amount
acct_description: Amount of (increase) decrease in equity for down round feature triggered for stock option classified as equity. Excludes stock option granted for share-based compensation.

acct_label: Stock or Unit Option Plan Expense
acct_description: Amount of noncash expense for option under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Valuation Allowance, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded as of the balance sheet date pertaining to the specified deferred tax asset for which an assessment was made that it is more likely than not that all or a portion of such deferred tax asset will not be realized through related deductions on future tax returns.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

acct_label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
acct_description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

acct_label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
acct_description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

acct_label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
acct_description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

acct_label: Class of Warrant or Right, Number of Securities Called by Warrants or Rights
acct_description: Number of securities into which the class of warrant or right may be converted. For example, but not limited to, 500,000 warrants may be converted into 1,000,000 shares.

acct_label: Common Stock, Convertible, Conversion Price, Decrease
acct_description: Per share decrease in conversion price of convertible common stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend deduction, deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan (ESOP), Medicare prescription drug benefit subsidy deduction, and other deductions.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income tax settlements. Including, but not limited to, domestic tax settlement, foreign tax settlement, state and local tax settlement, and other tax settlements.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Current Assets
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current assets classified as other.

acct_label: Interest Receivable, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of noncurrent interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

acct_label: Investment Interest Rate
acct_description: Rate of interest on investment.

acct_label: Estimated Litigation Liability, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount of estimated litigation liability for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs, which is expected to be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest, Ownership Percentage by Noncontrolling Owners
acct_description: The equity interest of noncontrolling shareholders, partners or other equity holders in consolidated entity.

acct_label: Nondebtor Reorganization Items, Legal and Advisory Professional Fees
acct_description: Amount of reorganization items related to legal and advisory professional fees related to entities not in bankruptcy.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Exercise Price
acct_description: Agreed-upon price for the exchange of the underlying asset relating to the share-based payment award.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Maximum Number of Shares Per Employee
acct_description: The highest quantity of shares an employee can purchase under the plan per period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Other Increases (Decreases) in Period
acct_description: The addition or reduction in the number of reserved shares that could potentially be issued under the option plan attributable to reasons other than grants, exercises, forfeitures, and expirations during the reporting period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Exercisable, Number
acct_description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest exercisable options that may be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Per Share Weighted Average Price of Shares Purchased
acct_description: Per share weighted-average price paid for shares purchased on open market for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
acct_description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Stock Split, Conversion Ratio
acct_description: Ratio applied to the conversion of stock split, for example but not limited to, one share converted to two or two shares converted to one.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Stock Splits
acct_description: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of a stock split.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Imputed Interest
acct_description: If disclosed, the amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce an unconditional purchase obligation to present value on an unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation.

acct_label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: The net increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for servicing assets subsequently measured using the amortization method.

acct_label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; excluding effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Face Amount
acct_description: The principal amount of the receivable or note before consideration of the discount or premium.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested, Number of Shares
acct_description: Number of non-vested options outstanding.

acct_label: Short-term Debt, Fair Value
acct_description: This element represents the portion of the balance sheet assertion valued at fair value by the entity whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission. This item represents the amount of short-term debt existing as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Other-than-Temporary Impairment Charges, Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of expense to write-down the amortized cost basis of loans, after acquisition, to fair value when the decline in the fair value is determined to be other than temporary (OTTI) for loans accounted for as debt securities.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Increase, Accrued Interest
acct_description: Increase for accrued, but unpaid interest on the debt instrument for the period.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities, Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to noncontrolling interest. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

acct_label: Stock Issued, Value, Stock Options Exercised, Net of Tax Benefit (Expense)
acct_description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options, after deduction of related income tax (expense) benefit.

acct_label: Loans Payable, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of portion of long-term loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Operating Expenses
acct_description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

acct_label: Origination of Notes Receivable from Related Parties
acct_description: The cash outflow for a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

acct_label: Related Party Tax Expense, Due to Affiliates, Current
acct_description: The amount of any current tax-related balances due to affiliates as of the date of each statement of financial position presented.

acct_label: Accrued Professional Fees, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for professional fees, such as for legal and accounting services received. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Accrued Salaries, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the obligations incurred through that date and payable for employees' services provided. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Advertising Costs, Capitalized Direct Response Advertising, Write-down
acct_description: The amount of any write-down of capitalized direct response advertising costs to net realizable value which is charged against earnings in the period.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Intangible Assets
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of intangible assets.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other obligations or expenses incurred but not yet paid.

acct_label: Prepaid Expense, Current
acct_description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Collection of (Payments to Fund) Long-term Loans to Related Parties
acct_description: The cash inflow or outflow associated with long-term loans for related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party, including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from (Payments for) Advances to Affiliates.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Intangible Assets
acct_description: The cash inflow from disposal of asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

acct_label: Accrued Environmental Loss Contingencies, Current
acct_description: Carrying value of the obligation (known or estimated) arising from requirements to perform activities to remediate one or more sites, payable in twelve months or in the next operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Accrued Environmental Loss Contingencies, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying value of the obligation (known or estimated) arising from requirements to perform activities to remediate one or more sites, payable after twelve months or beyond the next operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Accrued Income Taxes
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all domestic and foreign income tax obligations due. This amount is the total of current and noncurrent accrued income taxes.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Equity Component of Convertible Debt, Subsequent Adjustments
acct_description: The amount of subsequent adjustments to additional paid in capital for convertible financial instruments where a component of equity and a component of debt are recognized.

acct_label: Amortization of Deferred Charges
acct_description: The amount of amortization of deferred charges applied against earnings during the period.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Contingent Consideration, at Fair Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value, as of the acquisition date, of potential payments under the contingent consideration arrangement including cash and shares.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Equity Interest Issued or Issuable, Value Assigned
acct_description: Value of equity interests (such as common shares, preferred shares, or partnership interest) issued or issuable to acquire the entity.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Equity Interest Issued or Issuable, Number of Shares
acct_description: Number of shares of equity interests issued or issuable to acquire entity.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Earnings Per Share, Basic
acct_description: The pro forma basic net income per share for a period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of a period.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Earnings Per Share, Diluted
acct_description: The pro forma diluted net income per share for a period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of a period.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Assets Acquired (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to assets acquired.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Assets Acquired (Liabilities Assumed), Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The total purchase price of the acquired entity. This includes cash paid to equity interest holders of the acquired entity, fair value of debt and equity securities issued to equity holders of the acquired entity, and transaction costs paid to third parties to consummate the acquisition.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Assets, Cash and Cash Equivalents (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of cash and cash equivalents acquired in a business combination.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Assets, Inventory (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to inventory, including finished goods, work-in-process, and raw materials.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Assets, Prepaid Expense and Other Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to prepaid expenses and other current assets. Does not include amounts allocated to cash and cash equivalents, marketable securities, receivables, inventory, and assets not to be used.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Assets, Receivables (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to receivables.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Liabilities, Accounts Payable (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to accounts payable of the acquired entity.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Liabilities, Accrued Liabilities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to accrued expenses of the acquired entity.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Goodwill Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of goodwill arising from a business combination, which is the excess of the cost of the acquired entity over the amounts assigned to assets acquired and liabilities assumed.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Intangible Assets Other than Goodwill (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Noncurrent Liabilities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to noncurrent liabilities of the acquired entity.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Other Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to other assets not separately disclosed in the balance sheet.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Property, Plant and Equipment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to property, plant and equipment to be used in ongoing operations.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Net Income (Loss)
acct_description: The pro forma net Income or Loss for the period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of a period.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Revenue
acct_description: The pro forma revenue for a period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of the period.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration Arrangements, Change in Amount of Contingent Consideration, Liability
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the value of a contingent consideration liability, including, but not limited to, differences arising upon settlement.

acct_label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Cash Paid
acct_description: Aggregate dividends paid during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

acct_label: Customer Advances, Current
acct_description: The current portion of prepayments received from customers for goods or services to be provided in the future.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Conversion Price
acct_description: The price per share of the conversion feature embedded in the debt instrument.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Liability, Classified, Noncurrent
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for all deferred compensation arrangements payable beyond one year (or the operating cycle, if longer).

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Liability, Current and Noncurrent
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for all deferred compensation arrangements. Represents currently earned compensation under compensation arrangements that is not actually paid until a later date.

acct_label: Deferred State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Goodwill and Intangible Assets
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from intangible assets including goodwill.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Domestic
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible domestic operating loss carryforwards. Excludes state and local operating loss carryforwards.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Foreign
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible foreign operating loss carryforwards.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Property, Plant and Equipment
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards, Foreign
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible foreign tax credit carryforwards.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Accrued Liabilities
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from accrued liabilities.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Contingencies
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from contingent liabilities.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Deferred Rent
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from deferred rent.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Returns and Allowances
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from estimated returns and sales allowances.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net, Current
acct_description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as current.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Goodwill
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from goodwill.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Investments
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from investments (excludes investments in subsidiaries and equity method investments).

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other Finite-Lived Assets
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from long-lived assets other than property, plant, and equipment.

acct_label: Liability, Defined Benefit Pension Plan, Current
acct_description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension plan, classified as current. Excludes other postretirement benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Benefit Obligation, Discount Rate
acct_description: Weighted average rate for present value of future retirement benefits cash flows, used to determine benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Discretionary Contribution Amount
acct_description: Amount of discretionary contributions made by an employer to a defined contribution plan.

acct_label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
acct_description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

acct_label: Dividend Income, Operating
acct_description: Amount of operating dividend income on securities.

acct_label: Dividends, Common Stock
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

acct_label: Dividends, Common Stock, Stock
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in stock.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the income tax rates.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Repatriation of Foreign Earnings, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the repatriation of foreign earnings.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Foreign, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign income tax settlement.

acct_label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Option, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
acct_description: Amount of cost to be recognized for option under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Environmental Remediation Expense
acct_description: The charge against earnings in the period for known or estimated future costs arising from requirements to perform environmental remediation activities.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of amortization for asset, excluding financial asset and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Foreign Currency Contract, Asset, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of asset contracts related to the exchange of different currencies, including, but not limited to, foreign currency options, forward contracts, and swaps.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Contracts, Liability, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of liability contracts related to the exchange of different currencies, including, but not limited to, foreign currency options, forward (delivery or nondelivery) contracts, and swaps entered into.

acct_label: Foreign Earnings Repatriated
acct_description: Amount of foreign earnings repatriated from subsidiaries outside the country of domicile.

acct_label: Foreign Earnings Repatriated under American Jobs Creation Act of 2004, Repatriated Earnings (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of foreign earnings repatriated under the special one-time dividends received deduction provided to a US taxpayer by the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004.

acct_label: Furniture and Fixtures, Gross
acct_description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of equipment commonly used in offices and stores that have no permanent connection to the structure of a building or utilities. Examples include, but are not limited to, desks, chairs, tables, and bookcases.

acct_label: Goodwill and Intangible Asset Impairment
acct_description: Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Current
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as current.

acct_label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Finite-lived
acct_description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of a finite-lived intangible asset to fair value.

acct_label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The sum of the current income tax expense or benefit and the deferred income tax expense or benefit pertaining to pretax Income or Loss from continuing operations; income tax expense or benefit may include interest and penalties on tax uncertainties based on the entity's accounting policy.

acct_label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations, Adjustment of Deferred Tax (Asset) Liability
acct_description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from continuing operations attributable to an adjustment of a deferred tax liability or asset for enacted changes in tax laws or rates or a change in the tax status of the entity.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Repatriation of Foreign Earnings, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to repatriation of foreign earnings.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities and Other Operating Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accrued expenses, and obligations classified as other.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Receivables
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in receivables classified as other.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of investment in debt and equity securities, measured at fair value with changes in fair value recognized in net income.

acct_label: Interest and Other Income
acct_description: The amount of interest income and other income recognized during the period. Included in this element is interest derived from investments in debt securities, cash and cash equivalents, and other investments which reflect the time value of money or transactions in which the payments are for the use or forbearance of money and other income from ancillary business-related activities (that is, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

acct_label: Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Liability at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all interest rate derivative liabilities designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

acct_label: Interest Rate Derivative Assets, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of interest rate derivative assets, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as assets.

acct_label: Interest Rate Derivative Liabilities, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of interest rate derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as liabilities.

acct_label: Investment Income, Dividend
acct_description: Amount of dividend income on nonoperating securities.

acct_label: Leasehold Improvements, Gross
acct_description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of additions or improvements to assets held under a lease arrangement.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Current Borrowing Capacity
acct_description: Amount of current borrowing capacity under the credit facility considering any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed (for example, borrowings may be limited by the amount of current assets), but without considering any amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

acct_label: Loans Payable to Bank
acct_description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans from a bank with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Loans Payable to Bank, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of current portion of long-term loans payable to bank due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Loans Payable to Bank, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans from a bank with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer, excluding current portion.

acct_label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
acct_description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

acct_label: Notes Payable, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of notes payable.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Foreign Currency Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives. Notional amount refers to the number of currency units specified in the foreign currency derivative contract.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of all interest rate derivatives designated as hedging instruments in cash flow hedges. Notional amount refers to the monetary amount specified in the interest rate derivative contract.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Net
acct_description: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Settlement and Curtailment Gain (Loss), after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of increase (decrease) to other comprehensive income from settlement and curtailment gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI on Derivatives, before Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI on Derivatives, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

acct_label: Other Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other.

acct_label: Other Receivables, Net, Current
acct_description: Amount, after allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Payment for Contingent Consideration Liability, Financing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow, not made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability up to amount recognized at acquisition date, including, but not limited to, measurement period adjustment and less amount paid soon after acquisition date.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Additional Interest in Subsidiaries
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of noncontrolling interest during the period.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Held-to-maturity Securities
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow through purchase of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Intangible Assets
acct_description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
acct_description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

acct_label: Proceeds from Bank Debt
acct_description: The cash inflow from bank borrowing during the year.

acct_label: Proceeds from Collection of Notes Receivable
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of First Mortgage Bond
acct_description: The cash inflow from amounts received from a long-term debt instrument secured by a first mortgage deed of trust, containing a pledge of real property. The lender has the highest claim on the property in case of default.

acct_label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Short-term Investments
acct_description: The cash inflow from maturities, prepayments, calls and collections of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Notes Receivable
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the proceeds from sale of notes receivable, as well as principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation (note receivable).

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale, Maturity and Collection of Investments
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the sale, maturity and collection of all investments such as debt, security and so forth during the period.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Held-to-maturity Securities
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities that had been designated as held-to-maturity. Excludes proceeds from maturities, prepayments and calls by the issuer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Short-term Investments
acct_description: The cash inflow from sales of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

acct_label: Purchase Obligation
acct_description: Minimum amount of purchase arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier.

acct_label: Rental Income, Nonoperating
acct_description: Income earned by providing the use of assets to an outside party in exchange for a payment or series of payments that is nonoperating in nature.

acct_label: Repayments of Bank Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow to settle a bank borrowing during the year.

acct_label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
acct_description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: Restricted Stock or Unit Expense
acct_description: Amount of noncash expense for award of restricted stock or unit under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Secured Debt
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Intrinsic Value
acct_description: Amount of accumulated difference between fair value of underlying shares on dates of exercise and exercise price on options exercised (or share units converted) into shares.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
acct_description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
acct_description: The weighted average grant-date fair value of options granted during the reporting period as calculated by applying the disclosed option pricing methodology.

acct_label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Plan Modification, Incremental Cost
acct_description: An excess of the fair value of the modified award over the fair value of the award immediately before the modification.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
acct_description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
acct_description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested Options Forfeited, Number of Shares
acct_description: Number of non-vested options forfeited.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested Options Forfeited, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
acct_description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of non-vested options forfeited.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Option, Nonvested, Weighted Average Exercise Price
acct_description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of non-vested options outstanding.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested, Number of Shares
acct_description: Number of options vested.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
acct_description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of options vested.

acct_label: Short-term Bank Loans and Notes Payable
acct_description: Amount of borrowings from a bank classified as other, maturing within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Short-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest Rate
acct_description: The portion of the carrying amount of short-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
acct_description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

acct_label: Stock Repurchase Program, Number of Shares Authorized to be Repurchased
acct_description: The number of shares authorized to be repurchased by an entity's Board of Directors under a stock repurchase plan.

acct_label: Trading Securities, Current (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of investments in debt and equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading, expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Trading Securities, Fair Value Disclosure (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the portion of the balance sheet assertion valued at fair value by the entity whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission. This item represents Trading Securities which consist of all investments in certain debt and equity securities that are bought and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time) or for which an entity has elected the fair value option. Trading generally reflects active and frequent buying and selling, and trading securities are generally used with the objective of generating profits on short-term differences in price, but this category of investments may also include items which are not intended to be sold in the near term or for which the fair value option has been elected.

acct_label: Trading Securities, Change in Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized holding gain (loss) recognized in the income statement for investments in debt and equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
acct_description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedges, Pretax, Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) related to the increase or decrease in fair value of interest rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments, which was recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge was determined to be effective.

acct_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
acct_description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

acct_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Other Account
acct_description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to accounts other than cost and expense.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies
acct_description: Total costs accrued as of the balance sheet date for environmental loss contingencies.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Increase (Decrease) for Acquisitions and Divestitures
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the obligation for environmental loss contingencies from business acquisitions (divestitures).

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Payments (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount disbursed during the reporting period to settle environmental loss contingencies.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Payments
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow to settle environmental loss contingencies.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Provision for New Losses (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The amount added to the accrual for newly incurred environmental loss contingencies. These additions include remediation expense and interest accretion. These additions do not relate to changes in the environmental accrual related to a business acquisition or divestiture, to currency movements, or revisions in previously existing estimates.

acct_label: Amortization
acct_description: The aggregate amount of recurring noncash expense charged against earnings in the period to allocate the cost of assets over their estimated remaining economic lives.

acct_label: Adjustment to Additional Paid in Capital, Income Tax Effect from Share-based Compensation, Net
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit (deficiency) associated with an share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Advertising Expense
acct_description: Amount charged to advertising expense for the period, which are expenses incurred with the objective of increasing revenue for a specified brand, product or product line.

acct_label: Certificates of Deposit, at Carrying Value
acct_description: A savings certificate entitling the Entity (that is, bearer) to receive interest at an established maturity date, based upon a fixed interest rate. A certificate of deposit may be issued in any denomination. Certificates of deposit are generally issued by commercial banks and, therefore, insured by the FDIC (up to the prescribed limit). Certificates of deposit generally restrict holders from withdrawing funds on demand without the incurrence of penalties. Generally, only certificates of deposit with original maturities of three months or less qualify as cash equivalents. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. As a related example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Basis Spread on Variable Rate (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
acct_description: Percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.

acct_label: Deferred Income Taxes and Tax Credits
acct_description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) and income tax credits.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Charitable Contribution Carryforwards
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible charitable contribution carryforwards.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Pensions
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from pension benefits.

acct_label: Liability, Defined Benefit Pension Plan
acct_description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension plan. Excludes other postretirement benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), after Tax (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: After tax total of net gain (loss), prior service cost (credit), and transition assets (obligations), as well as minimum pension liability if still remaining, included in accumulated other comprehensive income associated with a defined benefit pension or other postretirement plan(s).

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Gain (Loss), after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for gain (loss) of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, Prior Service Cost (Credit), after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for cost (credit) of benefit change attributable to participants' prior service from plan amendment or plan initiation of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Increase (Decrease) for Actual Return (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan from actual return (loss) determined by change in fair value of plan assets adjusted for contributions, benefit payments, and other expenses.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Actuarial Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from change in actuarial assumptions which (increases) decreases benefit obligation of defined benefit plan. Assumptions include, but are not limited to, interest, mortality, employee turnover, salary, and temporary deviation from substantive plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Actuarial Net (Gains) Losses (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The net increase or decrease of changes in the value of either the benefit obligation or the plan assets resulting from experience different from that assumed or from a change in an actuarial assumption, or the consequence of a decision to temporarily deviate from the substantive plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Amortization of Net Gains (Losses) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amounts in accumulated other comprehensive income related to gains and losses that are not recognized immediately and are expected to be recognized as components of net periodic benefit cost over the next fiscal year that follows the most recent annual statement of financial position presented.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Amortization of Net Prior Service Cost (Credit) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amounts in accumulated other comprehensive income related to prior service cost or credit expected to be recognized as components of net periodic benefit cost over the next fiscal year that follows the most recent annual statement of financial position presented.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Amortization of Prior Service Cost (Credit)
acct_description: Amount of prior service cost (credit) recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Employer, Related Party, Amount
acct_description: Amount of employer security in which defined benefit plan asset is invested. Includes, but is not limited to, security issued or managed by related party of employer.
