acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification Adjustment, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of increase (decrease) in accumulated other comprehensive income from gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, Prior Service Cost (Credit), after Reclassification Adjustment, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income from prior service cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Amounts that Will be Amortized from Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) in Next Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount in accumulated other comprehensive income expected to be recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost over the fiscal year that follows the most recent annual statement of financial position presented, including the net gain (loss), net prior service cost or credit, and net transition asset or obligation.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Amount to be Amortized from Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) Next Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount included in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) expected to be recognized as components of net periodic benefit cost for the fiscal year that follows the most recent annual statement of financial position, including gain (loss), prior service cost (credit), and transition asset (obligation).

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Discount Rate
acct_description: Weighted average rate for present value of future retirement benefits cash flows, used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Expected Long-term Rate of Return on Plan Assets
acct_description: Weighted average rate of return on plan assets, reflecting average rate of earnings expected on existing plan assets and expected contributions, used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation
acct_description: Amount of actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Benefits Paid
acct_description: Amount of payment to participant of defined benefit plan which decreases benefit obligation. For pension plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, pension benefits and death benefits. For other postretirement plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, prescription drug benefits, health care benefits, life insurance benefits, and legal, educational and advisory services.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefits Paid (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of payments made for which participants are entitled under a pension plan, including pension benefits, death benefits, and benefits due on termination of employment. Also includes payments made under a postretirement benefit plan, including prescription drug benefits, health care benefits, life insurance benefits, and legal, educational and advisory services. This item represents a periodic decrease to the plan obligations and a decrease to plan assets.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Contributions by Employer
acct_description: Amount of contribution received by defined benefit plan from employer which increases plan assets.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Estimated Future Employer Contributions in Current Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The employer's best estimate, as soon as it can be reasonably determined, of contributions expected to be paid to the plan in the current remaining fiscal period. Estimated contributions may be presented in the aggregate combining (1) contributions required by funding regulations or laws, (2) discretionary contributions, and (3) noncash contributions.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Estimated Future Employer Contributions in Next Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The employer's best estimate, as soon as it can be reasonably determined, of contributions expected to be paid to the plan during the next fiscal year beginning after the date of the latest statement of financial position. Estimated contributions may be presented in the aggregate combining (1) contributions required by funding regulations or laws, (2) discretionary contributions, and (3) noncash contributions.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Contributions in Current Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the employer's best estimate of contributions expected to be paid to the plan in the current fiscal period.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, after Year Five for Next Five Years
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in five fiscal years after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year One
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Employer Contributions, Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of contributions received and expected to be received by defined benefit plan from employer in current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Funded (Unfunded) Status of Plan
acct_description: Amount of funded (unfunded) status of defined benefit plan, measured as difference between fair value of plan assets and benefit obligation. Includes, but is not limited to, overfunded (underfunded) status.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Future Amortization of Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount included in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) related to gain (loss) expected to be recognized as components of net periodic benefit cost for the fiscal year that follows the most recent annual statement of financial position.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Future Amortization of Prior Service Cost (Credit) (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount included in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) related to prior service cost (credit) expected to be recognized as components of net periodic benefit cost for the fiscal year that follows the most recent annual statement of financial position.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Interest Cost
acct_description: Amount of cost recognized for passage of time related to defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Employer, Related Party, Number of Shares
acct_description: Number of shares of employer stock in which defined benefit plan asset is invested. Includes, but is not limited to, stock issued or managed by related party of employer.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Other Cost (Credit)
acct_description: Amount of defined benefit plan cost (credit), classified as other.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Credit), Gain (Loss) Due to Settlement
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit from irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk related to obligation and assets used to effect settlement.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Service Cost
acct_description: Amount of cost for actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Payment for Settlement
acct_description: Amount of payment, which decreases plan assets of defined benefit plan, for irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk for obligation and assets used to effect settlement. Transaction constituting settlement includes, but is not limited to, making lump-sum cash payment to participant in exchange for their rights to receive specified benefits and purchasing nonparticipating annuity contract.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Special and Contractual Termination Benefits
acct_description: Amount of increase in benefit obligation for benefits provided to employees payable from defined benefit plan or payable upon retirement.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plans, Estimated Future Employer Contributions in Next Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of employer's best estimate of contributions expected to be paid to the plan during the next fiscal year beginning after the date of the latest statement of financial position.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Matching Contribution, Percent of Employees' Gross Pay
acct_description: Percentage of employees' gross pay for which the employer contributes a matching contribution to a defined contribution plan.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Maximum Annual Contribution Per Employee, Percent (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Maximum percentage of employee gross pay, by the terms of the plan, that the employer may contribute to a defined contribution plan.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Maximum Annual Contributions Per Employee, Percent
acct_description: Maximum percentage of employee gross pay the employee may contribute to a defined contribution plan.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Other, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other deductions.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax credits. Including, but not limited to, research credit, foreign tax credit, investment tax credit, and other tax credits.

acct_label: Employee-related Liabilities
acct_description: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits.

acct_label: Employee Service Share-based Compensation, Cash Received from Exercise of Stock Options (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate proceeds received by the entity during the annual period from exercises of stock or unit options and conversion of similar instruments granted under equity-based payment arrangements.

acct_label: Disclosure on Geographic Areas, Revenue from External Customers Attributed to Entity's Country of Domicile (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Revenues from external customers attributed to the entity's country of domicile.

acct_label: Disclosure on Geographic Areas, Revenue from External Customers Attributed to Foreign Countries (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Revenues from external customers attributed to all foreign countries in total from which the entity derives revenues.

acct_label: Environmental Exit Costs, Assets Previously Disposed, Liability for Remediation
acct_description: Carrying amount of the liability for remediation of environmental damage pertaining to assets or businesses previously disposed.

acct_label: Environmental Expense and Liabilities
acct_description: The adjustment to exclude the noncash portion of, and include cash payments for environmental costs when calculating operating cash flows under the indirect method. The adjustment can include the increase (decrease) during an accounting period in total estimated obligations recorded for probable future loss attributable to environmental contamination issues.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Customer Lists, Gross
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of an asset comprised of customer information, acquired in a business combination or other transaction, having a finite beneficial life.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Patents, Gross
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of the costs pertaining to the exclusive legal rights granted to the owner of the patent to exploit an invention or a process for a period of time specified by law. Such costs may have been expended to directly apply and receive patent rights, or to acquire such rights.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Trademarks, Gross
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date for the rights acquired through registration of a trademark to gain or protect exclusive use of a business name, symbol or other device or style for a specified period of time.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign income tax expense (benefit).

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Receivables
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due within one year (or one operating cycle) from all parties, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

acct_label: Inventory Adjustments
acct_description: Amount of inventory reserves for last-in first-out (LIFO) and other inventory valuation methods.

acct_label: Inventory, Raw Materials and Supplies, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount of unprocessed materials to be used in manufacturing or production process and supplies that will be consumed.

acct_label: Inventory, Raw Materials and Supplies, Net of Reserves
acct_description: Aggregated amount of unprocessed materials to be used in manufacturing or production process and supplies that will be consumed. This amount is net of valuation reserves and adjustments.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense
acct_description: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

acct_label: Long-term Line of Credit
acct_description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Amount Outstanding (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount borrowed under the credit facility as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Borrowing Capacity
acct_description: Maximum borrowing capacity under the credit facility without consideration of any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed or the amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Commercial, Mortgage (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of mortgage loans on existing land or building. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Operating Lease, Expense
acct_description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of gain (loss) for (increase) decrease in value of benefit obligation for change in actuarial assumptions and increase (decrease) in value of plan assets from experience different from that assumed of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Settlement and Curtailment Gain (Loss), before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of increase (decrease) to other comprehensive income from settlement and curtailment gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Gain (Loss) Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Net of tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for actuarial (gains) losses recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost.

acct_label: Other Nonoperating Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

acct_label: Other Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of other income tax expense (benefit).

acct_label: Payments for Repurchase of Equity
acct_description: The cash outflow to reacquire common and preferred stock.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Buildings
acct_description: The cash outflow for acquisition of buildings (properties) whether for investment or use.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Businesses and Interest in Affiliates
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a controlling interest in another entity or an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, joint venture or equity method investment).

acct_label: Payment for Pension and Other Postretirement Benefits
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for pension and other postretirement benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree.

acct_label: Payment for Pension Benefits
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for pension benefit. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree. Excludes other postretirement benefit.

acct_label: Pension Cost (Reversal of Cost)
acct_description: Amount of cost (reversal of cost) for pension benefits. Excludes other postretirement benefits.

acct_label: Proceeds from Collection of Loans Receivable
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the collection, including prepayments, of loans receivable issued for financing of goods and services.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Secured Debt
acct_description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Long-term Debt and Capital Securities
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt, including capital lease obligations and mandatory redeemable capital securities.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Buildings
acct_description: The cash inflow from sale of buildings.

acct_label: Repayments of First Mortgage Bond
acct_description: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument issued, secured by a first mortgage deed of trust, containing a pledge of real property. The lender has the highest claim on the property in case of default.

acct_label: Repayment of Long-term Debt, Long-term Lease Obligation, and Capital Security
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for debt, mandatory redeemable security, and principal payment for finance lease obligation.

acct_label: Repayments of Secured Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

acct_label: Secured Debt, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term, collateralized debt obligations due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer. Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

acct_label: Secured Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount of collateralized debt obligations with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer, excluding the current portion. Obligations include, but not limited to, mortgage loans, chattel loans, and other borrowings secured by assets.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate, Maximum
acct_description: The maximum risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate, Minimum
acct_description: The minimum risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

acct_label: Shipping, Handling and Transportation Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred during the reporting period in transporting goods and services to customers. Includes freight-out costs.

acct_label: Significant Acquisitions and Disposals, Acquisition Costs or Sale Proceeds (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The value of all consideration given or received by the Entity in the significant acquisition or disposal.

acct_label: Stock Repurchase Program, Remaining Authorized Repurchase Amount
acct_description: Amount remaining of a stock repurchase plan authorized.

acct_label: Stock Repurchase Program, Remaining Number of Shares Authorized to be Repurchased
acct_description: The remaining number of shares authorized to be repurchased by an entity's Board of Directors under a stock repurchase plan.

acct_label: Taxes Payable
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Noncompete Agreements, Gross
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of payments made to third parties in exchange for their agreement not to engage in specified competitive practices in specified geographic territories for a specified period of time.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Trade Names, Gross
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of the rights acquired through registration of a trade name to gain or protect exclusive use thereof for a reasonably expected period of economic benefit.

acct_label: Liabilities, Fair Value Adjustment
acct_description: Amount of addition (reduction) to the amount at which a liability could be incurred (settled) in a current transaction between willing parties.

acct_label: Other Restricted Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent assets that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions, classified as other.

acct_label: Restricted Cash
acct_description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

acct_label: Other Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Restricted Cash, Current
acct_description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

acct_label: Restricted Cash, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as noncurrent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Expense (Benefit), Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
acct_description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Share-based Compensation Cost
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from share-based compensation.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Related Parties, Current
acct_description: Amount for accounts payable to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Related Parties, Current
acct_description: Amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Accretion of Discount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of passage of time.

acct_label: Accrued Insurance
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable to insurance entities to mitigate potential loss from various risks or to satisfy a promise to provide certain coverage's to employees.

acct_label: Accrued Professional Fees
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for professional fees, such as for legal and accounting services received.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
acct_description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, from recovery.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligation
acct_description: The carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Accretion Expense
acct_description: Amount of accretion expense recognized during the period that is associated with an asset retirement obligation. Accretion expense measures and incorporates changes due to the passage of time into the carrying amount of the liability.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Legally Restricted Assets, Fair Value
acct_description: Carrying amount of an asset that is legally restricted for purposes of settling an asset retirement obligation.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Liabilities Incurred
acct_description: Amount of asset retirement obligations incurred during the period.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Liabilities Settled
acct_description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled, or otherwise disposed of, during the period. This may include asset retirement obligations transferred to third parties associated with the sale of a long-lived asset.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Revision of Estimate
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset retirement obligation from changes in the amount or timing of the estimated cash flows associated with the settlement of the obligation.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligations, Noncurrent
acct_description: Noncurrent portion of the carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Property, Plant and Equipment (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Property, plant and equipment that is held for sale apart from normal operations and anticipated to be sold in less than one year.

acct_label: Assets of Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate value (measured at the lower of net carrying value or fair value less cost of disposal) for noncurrent assets (assets with expected useful life longer than one year or one operating cycle, whichever is longer) of a disposal group, including a component of the entity (discontinued operation), to be sold or that has subsequently been disposed of through sale, as of the financial statement date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Acquisition Related Costs
acct_description: This element represents acquisition-related costs incurred to effect a business combination which costs have been expensed during the period. Such costs include finder's fees; advisory, legal, accounting, valuation, and other professional or consulting fees; general administrative costs, including the costs of maintaining an internal acquisitions department; and may include costs of registering and issuing debt and equity securities.

acct_label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred
acct_description: Amount of consideration transferred, consisting of acquisition-date fair value of assets transferred by the acquirer, liabilities incurred by the acquirer, and equity interest issued by the acquirer.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Assets
acct_description: Amount of assets acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Capital Expenditures Incurred but Not yet Paid
acct_description: Future cash outflow to pay for purchases of fixed assets that have occurred.

acct_label: Capitalized Costs, Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion, Amortization and Valuation Allowance Relating to Oil and Gas Producing Activities
acct_description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization and valuation allowance relating to oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Capitalized Costs, Oil and Gas Producing Activities, Gross
acct_description: The sum of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities before accounting for accumulated depreciation.

acct_label: Capitalized Costs, Oil and Gas Producing Activities, Net
acct_description: Net amount of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Capitalized Costs, Proved Properties
acct_description: Capitalized costs of proved properties incurred for any combination mineral interests acquisitions; wells and related equipment; support equipment and facilities; and uncompleted wells and equipment and other costs not previously disclosed within this table.

acct_label: Capitalized Costs, Unproved Properties
acct_description: Capitalized costs of unproved properties incurred for any combination mineral interests acquisitions and other costs not previously disclosed within this table.

acct_label: Capitalized Exploratory Well Costs
acct_description: The amount of capitalized exploratory well costs that is pending the determination of proved reserves. This does not include amounts that were capitalized and subsequently expensed in the same annual period.

acct_label: Lease Obligation Incurred
acct_description: Amount of increase in lease obligation from new lease.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Five Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Four Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Three Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Two Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due Thereafter
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Interest Included in Payments
acct_description: Amount necessary to reduce net minimum lease payments to present value for capital leases.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Present Value of Net Minimum Payments
acct_description: Present value of minimum lease payments for capital leases net of executory costs, including amounts paid by the lessee to the lessor for insurance, maintenance and taxes.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Commodity Contract Asset, Current
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from commodity contracts such as futures contracts tied to the movement of a particular commodity, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Contractual Obligation
acct_description: Amount of contractual obligation, including but not limited to, long-term debt, capital lease obligations, operating lease obligations, purchase obligations, and other commitments.

acct_label: Costs Incurred, Acquisition of Oil and Gas Properties with Proved Reserves
acct_description: Costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, associated with the acquisition of oil and gas properties that have proved reserves.

acct_label: Costs Incurred, Acquisition of Unproved Oil and Gas Properties
acct_description: Costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, associated with the acquisition of oil and gas properties that have unproved reserves.

acct_label: Costs Incurred, Development Costs
acct_description: Development costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in oil and gas activities.

acct_label: Costs Incurred, Exploration Costs
acct_description: Exploration costs incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, in oil and gas activities.

acct_label: Costs Incurred, Oil and Gas Property Acquisition, Exploration, and Development Activities
acct_description: Amount of costs incurred related to oil and gas property acquisition, exploration and development activities, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense.

acct_label: Deconsolidation, Gain (Loss), Amount
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from deconsolidation of subsidiary and derecognition of group of assets constituting transfer of business or nonprofit activity, excluding conveyance of oil and gas mineral rights and transfer of good or service in contract with customer.

acct_label: Deferred Income Taxes and Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences, after deferred tax asset, and other liabilities expected to be paid after one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Equity Method Investments
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from equity method investments.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Derivatives
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from derivatives.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Prepaid Expenses
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax consequences attributable to taxable temporary differences derived from prepaid expenses.

acct_label: Deposit Contracts, Assets
acct_description: Carrying amount of assets as of the balance sheet date pertaining to amounts paid by the insured (including a ceding company) under insurance or reinsurance contracts for which insurance risk is not transferred.

acct_label: Derivative Asset, Current
acct_description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

acct_label: Derivative Assets (Liabilities), at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Fair values as of the balance sheet date of the net amount of all assets and liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation During Phase-out Period, before Income Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until its disposal.

acct_label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, 10 Percent Annual Discount for Estimated Timing of Cash Flows (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: This is the amount that is derived from using a discount rate of ten percent a year to reflect the timing of the future net cash flows relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Future Cash Inflows (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of estimated future cash inflows from sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Future Development Costs (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The future cost of developing oil and gas from proved reserves located in this geographic region.

acct_label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Future Income Tax Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The estimated future income tax expenses that will be incurred based on the future income less future expenses derived from production and sale of proved oil and gas reserves in this geographic region.

acct_label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Future Net Cash Flows (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of estimated net future cash inflows, after subtracting future development and production costs and future income tax expenses, from sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Standardized Measure (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: This amount is the future net cash flows less the computed discount.

acct_label: Effect of LIFO Inventory Liquidation on Income
acct_description: The effect of liquidating LIFO (last in first out) inventory layers on income.

acct_label: Energy Marketing Contract Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Current liabilities attributable to energy marketing activities (trading activities). Current energy marketing (trading activities) are when entities engage in both financial and physical trading to increase profits, manage their commodity price risk and enhance system reliability. They may trade electricity, coal, natural gas and oil. These entities typically use a variety of financial instruments, including forward contracts, options and swaps.

acct_label: Energy Marketing Contracts Assets, Current
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from energy trading activities that involves the purchase and sale of energy under forward contracts at fixed and variable prices and the buying and selling of financial energy contracts that include exchange futures and options and over the counter options and swaps, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Energy Related Inventory
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies relating to a source of usable power held for future sale or future use in manufacturing or production process.

acct_label: Exploration and Production Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred related to the upstream oil and gas activities, such as the exploration, development, and production of crude petroleum and natural gas.

acct_label: Extensions, Discoveries, Additions and Improved Recovery, Less Related Costs
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of extensions, discoveries and improved recovery of proved oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
acct_description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability
acct_description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, Current
acct_description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as current.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
acct_description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
acct_description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

acct_label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Cash Inflows
acct_description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Development Costs
acct_description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for costs to be incurred in developing proved oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Income Tax Expense
acct_description: Amount of estimated future accumulated cash outflow for income tax, based on the future income less future expense derived from production and sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Net Cash Flows
acct_description: Amount, after future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, of estimated future accumulated cash inflow from the sale of proved oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Ten Percent Annual Discount for Estimated Timing of Cash Flows
acct_description: Amount of discount on future accumulated cash inflow, after deducting future accumulated cash outflow for development and production costs and future income tax, from sale of proved oil and gas reserves, using a discount rate of ten percent a year.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment, Excluding Oil and Gas Property and Timber Property
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, excluding oil and gas property and timber property.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Derivatives
acct_description: The difference between the book value and the sale price of options, swaps, futures, forward contracts, and other derivative instruments. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Oil and Gas Property
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of proven and unproven oil and gas properties.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Oil and Gas and Timber Property
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of oil and gas property or timber property.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets for Financial Service Operations
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets utilized in financial service operations.

acct_label: Gas Gathering, Transportation, Marketing and Processing Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue related to midstream and downstream gas activities. May include the following: gathering from wells, processing to remove impurities, storage, transmission, and the sale of natural gas and related products.

acct_label: Gas Balancing Asset (Liability)
acct_description: The value of gas balancing asset or liability as of the end of the period.

acct_label: General and Administrative Expense
acct_description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

acct_label: Impairment of Oil and Gas Properties
acct_description: The expense recorded to reduce the value of oil and gas assets consisting of proved properties and unproved properties as the estimate of future successful production from these properties is reduced.

acct_label: Incentive Distribution, Distribution Per Unit
acct_description: Per-share or per-unit amount of incentive dividend declared and paid to managing member or general partner.

acct_label: Incentive Distribution, Distribution
acct_description: Amount of incentive obligation paid in cash or stock during the period to a limited liability corporation managing member or limited partnership general partner.

acct_label: Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

acct_label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations, Discontinued Operations
acct_description: Amount of current tax expense (benefit) and deferred tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations and income (loss) from discontinued operations.

acct_label: Income Taxes Receivable, Current
acct_description: Carrying amount due within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Depletion, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible depletion.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Reconciling Items, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax exempt income, equity in earnings (loss) of an unconsolidated subsidiary, minority noncontrolling interest income (loss), tax holiday, disposition of a business, disposition of an asset, repatriation of foreign earnings, repatriation of foreign earnings jobs creation act of 2004, increase (decrease) in enacted tax rate, prior year income taxes, increase (decrease) in deferred tax asset valuation allowance, and other adjustments.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) Due from Affiliates
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Income Taxes
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the account that represents the temporary difference that results from Income or Loss that is recognized for accounting purposes but not for tax purposes and vice versa.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deposit Assets
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in moneys or securities given as security including, but not limited to, contract, escrow, or earnest money deposits, retainage (if applicable), deposits with clearing organizations and others, collateral, or margin deposits.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes Receivable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in income taxes receivable, which represents the amount due from tax authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes paid.

acct_label: Long Lived Assets Held-for-sale, Gain (Loss) on Sale (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The difference between the proceeds received and the carrying value of the long-lived asset. If the proceeds received exceeds the carrying value of the long-lived asset, then there is a gain. If the proceeds received is less than the carrying value of the long-lived asset, then there is a loss.

acct_label: Long-term Line of Credit, Noncurrent
acct_description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the noncurrent portion of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loss contingency liability.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Carrying Value, Provision (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The charge against earnings in the period to increase loss contingency liabilities, net of any adjustments to reduce previously estimated charges.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Provision
acct_description: Amount charged against operating income increasing loss contingency liability, after adjustments to reduce previously estimated charges.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, New Claims Filed, Number
acct_description: The total number of new claims filed pertaining to a loss contingency during the period.

acct_label: Marketable Securities
acct_description: Amount of investment in marketable security.

acct_label: Marketing Expense
acct_description: Expenditures for planning and executing the conception, pricing, promotion, and distribution of ideas, goods, and services. Costs of public relations and corporate promotions are typically considered to be marketing costs.

acct_label: Materials, Supplies, and Other
acct_description: The carrying amount of capitalized costs of materials, supplies, and other assets, which are not included in inventory but used in production.

acct_label: Net Increase (Decrease) in Sales and Transfer Prices and Production Costs
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in sales and transfer prices and in production (lifting) costs related to future production.

acct_label: Number of States in which Entity Operates
acct_description: The number of states the entity operates in as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Production Expense (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred to operate and maintain an entities' wells and related equipment and facilities, including depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of operating and maintaining those wells and related equipment and facilities.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method, Gross
acct_description: Oil and Gas properties, gross, carried under the successful effort method.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate revenue during the period related to oil and gas business activities.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Other Investments
acct_description: Amount of investments classified as other.

acct_label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
acct_description: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Interest in Subsidiaries and Affiliates
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of or advances to an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, and joint venture or equity method investment) or the acquisition of an additional interest in a subsidiary (controlled entity).

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Short-term Investments
acct_description: The cash outflow for securities or other assets acquired, which qualify for treatment as an investing activity and are to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

acct_label: Prepaid Insurance
acct_description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for insurance that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Prepaid Rent
acct_description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for rent that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
acct_description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
acct_description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate
acct_description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.

acct_label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
acct_description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

acct_label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

acct_label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, before Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
acct_description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

acct_label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Gross
acct_description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

acct_label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Transfers and Changes
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale, from reclassification, impairment, donation, or changes classified as other. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

acct_label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year One
acct_description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Refining and Marketing Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred related to the downstream oil and gas activities, including refining of crude oil and marketing and distribution of crude oil, refined petroleum products, and natural gas.

acct_label: Refining and Marketing Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue related to the downstream oil and gas activities, including the refining of crude oil, as well as the marketing and distribution of crude oil, refined petroleum products, and natural gas.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, and Valuation Provisions
acct_description: Depreciation, depletion and amortization, and valuation provisions (impairments) related to oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Dry Hole Costs
acct_description: Dry hole costs from oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Exploration Expense
acct_description: Exploration costs from oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Impairment of Oil and Gas Properties
acct_description: Costs related to the impairment of oil and gas properties

acct_label: Results of Operations, Income before Income Taxes
acct_description: Income before income taxes for oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Income Tax Expense
acct_description: Income tax expense for oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Oil and Gas Producing Activities Net Income (Excluding Corporate Overhead and Interest Costs)
acct_description: The results of operations for oil and gas producing activities, excluding corporate overhead and interest costs.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Production or Lifting Costs
acct_description: Production (lifting) costs from oil and gas producing activities, including but not limited to lease operating expense, production and ad valorem taxes, and transportation expense.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Revenue from Oil and Gas Producing Activities
acct_description: Total revenues from oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Revenue Not from Contract with Customer
acct_description: Amount of revenue that is not accounted for under Topic 606.

acct_label: Revisions of Previous Quantity Estimates
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of revisions of estimated quantity of oil and gas in proved reserves.

acct_label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Finance Lease Liability
acct_description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability.

acct_label: Sales and Transfers of Oil and Gas Produced, Net of Production Costs
acct_description: Amount of (increase) decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales and transfers of oil and gas produced.

acct_label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expensed and Capitalized, Amount
acct_description: Amount of cost expensed and capitalized for award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Shares Withheld for Tax Withholding Obligation
acct_description: Number of shares used to settle grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Significant Costs Incurred to Acquire Mineral Interest of Proved Reserves
acct_description: Significant costs that have been incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, to acquire mineral interests that have proved reserves.

acct_label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow of Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Other
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of changes from other sources.

acct_label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Accretion of Discount
acct_description: Amount of accretion of discount for the standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow related to proved oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
acct_description: Amount of discounted future accumulated cash inflow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
acct_description: Value of forfeited shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Acquisitions
acct_description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period pursuant to acquisitions.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
acct_description: Number of shares issued during the period related to Restricted Stock Awards, net of any shares forfeited.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Forfeitures
acct_description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards forfeited during the period.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Change in Tax Rate, Deferred Tax Liability, Income Tax Benefit
acct_description: Amount of income tax benefit for remeasurement of deferred tax liability from change in tax rate pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

acct_label: Taxes Payable, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives and Commodity Contracts
acct_description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open derivatives, commodity, or energy contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

acct_label: Workers' Compensation Liability
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations and payables pertaining to claims incurred of a workers compensation nature.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration, Liability, Current
acct_description: Amount of liability recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination, expected to be settled within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year.

acct_label: Business Combination, Provisional Information, Initial Accounting Incomplete, Adjustment, Property, Plant, and Equipment
acct_description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to property, plant, and equipment acquired in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Cash and Equivalents
acct_description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, acquired at the acquisition date. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Assets, Other
acct_description: Amount of other assets expected to be realized or consumed before one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Liabilities, Accounts Payable
acct_description: Amount of liabilities incurred for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business and related party payables, assumed at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Inventory
acct_description: The amount of inventory recognized as of the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of liabilities assumed at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Other Noncurrent Assets
acct_description: Amount of other assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Property, Plant, and Equipment
acct_description: The amount of property, plant, and equipment recognized as of the acquisition date.

acct_label: Accounts and Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accounts and financing receivable. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Change in Net Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), Net of Tax (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
