acct_description: The charge against earnings in the period for known and estimated costs of termination benefits provided to current employees that are involuntarily terminated under a benefit arrangement associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructurings pursuant to a duly authorized plan, excluding costs or losses pertaining to an entity newly acquired in a business combination or a discontinued operation as defined by generally accepted accounting principles and costs associated with one-time termination benefits.

acct_label: Severance Costs
acct_description: Amount of expenses for special or contractual termination benefits provided to current employees involuntarily terminated under a benefit arrangement associated exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to one-time termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeited in Period
acct_description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that were forfeited during the reporting period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeited in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average fair value as of the grant date of equity-based award plans other than stock (unit) option plans that were not exercised or put into effect during the reporting period as a result of the occurrence of a terminating event specified in the contractual agreement of the plan.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of share-based awards for which the grantee gained the right by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
acct_description: The weighted average fair value as of grant date pertaining to an equity-based award plan other than a stock (or unit) option plan for which the grantee gained the right during the reporting period, by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash in accordance with the terms of the arrangement.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The period of time an equity-based award is expected to be outstanding. An equity-based award's expected term is generally determined based on, among other factors, the instrument's contractual term and the effects of employees' expected exercise and post-vesting employment termination behavior.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares under the plan during the reporting period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated during the reporting period due to noncompliance with plan terms during the reporting period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on stock options awarded under the plan during the reporting period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average period between the balance sheet date and expiration for all awards outstanding under the plan, which may be expressed in a decimal value for number of years.

acct_label: Shares, Outstanding
acct_description: Number of shares issued which are neither cancelled nor held in the treasury.

acct_label: Purchase Commitment, Remaining Minimum Amount Committed (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The floor amount as of the balance sheet date that the entity must expend to satisfy the terms of disclosed arrangements (excluding long-term commitments) in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from one or more suppliers, other than under a long-term purchase commitment or an unconditional purchase obligation.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Gross
acct_description: Total number of shares issued during the period, including shares forfeited, as a result of Restricted Stock Awards.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities, Net of Adjustments
acct_description: The net amount of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities, net of adjustments (for example, to additional paid in capital) including the write-off of an equity component recognized to record the convertible debt instrument as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This item is meant to disclose the value of shares issued on conversion of convertible securities that were recorded as two separate (debt and equity) components.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Purchase Plan
acct_description: Aggregate change in value for stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock purchase plan.

acct_label: Stock Repurchase Program, Authorized Amount
acct_description: Amount of stock repurchase plan authorized.

acct_label: Subsidiary or Equity Method Investee, Cumulative Proceeds Received on All Transactions
acct_description: Cumulative amount of cash and other consideration received by subsidiary or equity method investee in exchange for shares or stock issued or sold. Include amounts of cash received, fair value of non-cash assets received, fair value of liabilities assumed, and fair value of any other forms of consideration.

acct_label: Prepaid Supplies
acct_description: Amount of consideration paid in advance for supplies that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Provisional Undistributed Accumulated Earnings of Foreign Subsidiary (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reasonable estimate for undistributed accumulated earnings of foreign subsidiary subject to transition tax for which accounting is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Liability
acct_description: Amount of tax liability from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

acct_label: Unbilled Receivables, Current
acct_description: Amount received for services rendered and products shipped, but not yet billed, for non-contractual agreements due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Unbilled Receivables, Not Billable, Amount Expected to be Collected in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of receivables under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable that are expected to be collected in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Unbilled Receivables, Not Billable, Amount Expected to be Collected in Next Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of receivables under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable that are expected to be collected in the next fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties Accrued
acct_description: Amount of statutory penalties accrued for a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed by the entity, in its tax return.

acct_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

acct_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
acct_description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

acct_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Expense
acct_description: Amount of interest expense for an underpayment of income taxes.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year One
acct_description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation
acct_description: Amount of the unrecorded obligation to transfer funds in the future for fixed or minimum amounts or quantities of goods or services at fixed or minimum prices (for example, as in take-or-pay contracts or throughput contracts).

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Qualitative or Quantitative Information, Ownership Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of the Variable Interest Entity's (VIE) voting interest owned by (or beneficial interest in) the reporting entity (directly or indirectly).

acct_label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Contingently Issuable
acct_description: Shares issuable for little or no cash consideration upon the satisfaction of certain conditions (contingently issuable shares) are considered outstanding common shares and included in the computation of basic Earnings Per Share as of the date that all necessary conditions have been satisfied (in essence, when issuance of the shares is no longer contingent). Outstanding common shares that are contingently returnable (that is, subject to recall) are treated in the same manner as contingently issuable shares. Contingently issuable shares include shares that (a) will be issued in the future upon the satisfaction of specified conditions, (b) have been placed in escrow and all or part must be returned if specified conditions are not met, or (c) have been issued but the holder must return all or part if specified conditions are not met. The number of contingently issuable shares is determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that these shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Equity Securities, FV-NI
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise
acct_description: Total amount of liabilities subject to compromise.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Early Contract Termination Fees
acct_description: The amount of early contract termination fees included in liabilities subject to compromise.

acct_label: Prepaid Expense, Noncurrent
acct_description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of amounts paid in advance for expenses which will be charged against earnings in periods after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Principal Amount Outstanding of Loans Held-in-portfolio
acct_description: This is the result of the principal amount outstanding of total loans managed or securitized less securitized loans and loans that are in the process of being securitized.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year One Through Five
acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year One Through Five
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling within One Year, Amortized Cost
acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling within One Year, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Business Combination, Pro Forma Information, Earnings or Loss of Acquiree since Acquisition Date, Actual
acct_description: This element represents the amount of earnings or loss of the acquiree since the acquisition date included in the consolidated income statement for the reporting period.

acct_label: Business Combination, Pro Forma Information, Revenue of Acquiree since Acquisition Date, Actual
acct_description: This element represents the amount of revenue of the acquiree since the acquisition date included in the consolidated income statement for the reporting period.

acct_label: Business Combination, Provisional Information, Initial Accounting Incomplete, Adjustment, Inventory
acct_description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to inventory acquired in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Asset Acquired and Liability Assumed, Lease Obligation
acct_description: Amount of lease obligation assumed in business combination.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Assets, Marketable Securities
acct_description: Amount of investments in debt and equity securities, including, but not limited to, held-to-maturity, trading and available-for-sale expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Assets, Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
acct_description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Liabilities, Other
acct_description: Amount of other liabilities due within one year or within the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Deferred Tax Assets
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Finite-Lived Intangibles
acct_description: The amount of identifiable intangible assets recognized as of the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Noncurrent Liabilities, Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Noncurrent Liabilities, Other
acct_description: Amount of other liabilities due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Cost of Goods and Service, Excluding Depreciation, Depletion, and Amortization
acct_description: Cost of product sold and service rendered, excluding depreciation, depletion, and amortization.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Liability, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of tax liability from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling after One Through Five Years, Amortized Cost
acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next rolling fiscal year through fifth year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling after One Through Five Years, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security, measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next rolling fiscal year through fifth year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Accrued Income Taxes, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all domestic and foreign income tax obligations due beyond one year or the operating cycle, whichever is longer. Alternate captions include income taxes payable, noncurrent.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Premium, Current
acct_description: Amount of debt premium to be amortized within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Unsecured Debt
acct_description: The cash inflow from the issuance of long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt unsecured debt.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Other
acct_description: Amount of obligations incurred and payable classified as other.

acct_label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred, Equity Interests Issued and Issuable
acct_description: Amount of equity interests of the acquirer, including instruments or interests issued or issuable in consideration for the business combination.

acct_label: Other Receivables
acct_description: Amount due from parties in nontrade transactions, classified as other.

acct_label: Accounts and Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accounts and financing receivables, classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

acct_label: Accrued Royalties, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for royalties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Borrowed Funds (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of all debt, including all short-term borrowings, long-term debt, collateralized financings, and capital lease obligations.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Restructuring Liabilities
acct_description: This item represents liabilities associated with restructuring or exit activities of the acquiree, existing at the acquisition date (present liabilities of the acquiree).

acct_label: Class of Warrant or Right, Exercise Price of Warrants or Rights (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Exercise price per share or per unit of warrants or rights outstanding.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate depreciation, depletion and amortization expense in the current period for the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets directly related to goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Deferred Costs, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of deferred cost, excluding capitalized cost related to contract with customer; classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Deferred Costs, Current
acct_description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period that are expected to be charged against earnings within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards, Other
acct_description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible tax credit carryforwards, classified as other.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from reserves and accruals.

acct_label: Deposits Assets, Current
acct_description: Carrying value of amounts transferred to third parties for security purposes that are expected to be returned or applied towards payment within one year or during the operating cycle, if shorter.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Amount of Adjustment to Prior Period Gain (Loss) on Disposal, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount after tax of an increase (decrease) to a gain (loss) previously reported in discontinued operations in a prior period.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share
acct_description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of the gain (loss) on the disposal of discontinued operations.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share
acct_description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of the gain (loss) on the disposal of discontinued operations.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Qualified Production Activity, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for qualified production activity.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income tax contingencies. Includes, but not limited to, domestic tax contingency, foreign tax contingency, state and local tax contingency, and other contingencies.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Foreign, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in foreign income tax contingency.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Future Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate estimated amortization expense for succeeding fiscal years for intangible assets subject to amortization.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Derivative Liabilities at Fair Value (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of interest rate derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as liabilities on the balance sheet.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, after Year Five (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized for the remainder of the finite-lived intangible asset useful life after the fifth succeeding fiscal year.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, Remainder of Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during the remainder of the current fiscal year.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Ineffectiveness
acct_description: The net gain (loss) during the reporting period due to ineffectiveness in interest rate cash flow hedges. Recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Average Recorded Investment
acct_description: Average amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment
acct_description: Amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Related Allowance
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit losses related to recorded investment.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Unpaid Principal Balance
acct_description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without related allowance for credit losses.

acct_label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
acct_description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

acct_label: Income Taxes Receivable, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount due after one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.

acct_label: Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Earnings, Net
acct_description: The amount of net gains or losses on interest rate cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income upon the hedged transaction affecting earnings.

acct_label: Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) to be Reclassified During Next 12 Months, Net
acct_description: The estimated net amount of unrealized gains or losses on interest rate cash flow hedges as of the balance sheet date expected to be reclassified to earnings within the next twelve months.

acct_label: Accounts and Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accounts and financing receivables, classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

acct_label: Marketable Securities, Restricted, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Total debt and equity financial instruments including: (1) securities held-to-maturity, (2) trading securities, and (3) securities available-for-sale which are intended to be held for greater than one year or the normal operating cycle, whichever is longer and that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Distributions to Noncontrolling Interest Holders
acct_description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.

acct_label: New Accounting Pronouncement or Change in Accounting Principle, Cumulative Effect of Change on Equity or Net Assets (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the cumulative effect of the change in accounting principle or new accounting pronouncement on retained earnings or other components of equity or net assets in the statement of financial position as of the beginning of the earliest period presented.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Intangible Assets Acquired (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of intangibles that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Intangible Assets Acquired
acct_description: "The amount of intangibles that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Value of Liabilities Assumed
acct_description: "The total amount of [all] liabilities that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Notional Amount of Foreign Currency Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of all foreign currency derivatives not designated as hedging instruments. Notional amount refers to the number of currency units specified in the foreign currency derivative contract.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Minimum Rentals
acct_description: This element represents the payments that the lessee is obligated to make or can be required to make in connection with a property under the terms of an agreement classified as an operating lease, excluding contingent rentals and a guarantee by the lessee of the lessor's debt and the lessee's obligation to pay (apart from the rental payments) executory costs such as insurance, maintenance, and taxes.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Sublease Rentals
acct_description: The total amount of sublease rental income recognized during the period that reduces the entity's rent expense incurred under operating leases.

acct_label: Operating Loss Carryforwards, Valuation Allowance
acct_description: The portion of the valuation allowance pertaining to the deferred tax asset representing potential future taxable deductions from net operating loss carryforwards for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

acct_label: Other Assets, Miscellaneous, Current
acct_description: Amount of other miscellaneous assets expected to be realized or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Pre tax adjustment that results from the process of translating subsidiary financial statements and foreign equity investments into functional currency of the reporting entity, net of reclassification of realized foreign currency translation gains (losses). Includes gain (loss) on foreign currency forward exchange contracts. Includes foreign currency transactions designated as hedges of net investment in a foreign entity and intercompany foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term nature, when the entities to the transaction are consolidated, combined, or accounted for by the equity method in the reporting enterprise's financial statements. Includes the gain (loss) on a derivative instrument or nonderivative financial instrument that may give rise to a foreign currency transaction gain (loss) that has been designated and qualified as a hedging instrument for hedging of the foreign currency exposure of a net investment in a foreign operation.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, before Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

acct_label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Notes Receivable
acct_description: The cash outflow to acquire an agreement for an unconditional promise by the maker to pay the entity (holder) a definite sum of money at a future date. Such amount may include accrued interest receivable in accordance with the terms of the note. The note also may contain provisions including a discount or premium, payable on demand, secured, or unsecured, interest bearing or noninterest bearing, among myriad other features and characteristics.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Other Productive Assets
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for the purchase of or improvements to tangible or intangible assets, used to produce goods or deliver services, classified as other.

acct_label: Prepaid Taxes
acct_description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for income and other taxes that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Insurance Settlement, Operating Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of insurance claim, classified as operating activities. Excludes insurance settlement classified as investing activities.

acct_label: Proceeds from Long-term Lines of Credit
acct_description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Regulatory Liability, Current
acct_description: The amount for the individual regulatory current liability as itemized in a table of regulatory current liabilities as of the end of the period.

acct_label: Repayments of Long-term Lines of Credit
acct_description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Repayments of Long-term Loans from Vendors
acct_description: Cash outflows under financing arrangements with vendors (seller-financed debt), which had a maturity date at inception of more than one year (or more than one operating cycle, if longer); such debt may have arisen from purchases of property, plant and equipment or other productive assets.

acct_label: Restricted Cash and Investments, Noncurrent
acct_description: The noncurrent cash, cash equivalents and investments that is restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Restrictions may include legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or entity statements of intention with regard to particular deposits classified as long-term; that is not expected to be released from such existing restrictions within one year of the balance sheet date or operating cycle, whichever is longer. Excludes compensating balance arrangements that are not agreements which legally restrict the use of cash amounts shown on the balance sheet. Includes noncurrent cash equivalents and investments that are similarly restricted as to withdrawal, usage or disposal.

acct_label: Restricted Investments, Noncurrent
acct_description: This element represents the noncurrent portion of investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Outstanding, Number
acct_description: Number of equity instruments other than options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested instruments.

acct_label: Stock Repurchase Program, Authorized Amount (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of a stock repurchase plan authorized by an entity's Board of Directors.

acct_label: Stock Repurchase Program, Remaining Authorized Repurchase Amount (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount remaining of a stock repurchase plan authorized by an entity's Board of Directors.

acct_label: Subordinated Debt, Current
acct_description: The portion of the carrying value of subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle, if longer. Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

acct_label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
acct_description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

acct_label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
acct_description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Revision in Estimates
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) which increases (decreases) the accrual for environmental loss contingencies from revisions in estimates to existing obligations. Excludes changes related to business acquisitions, divestitures, or currency movement.

acct_label: Accrued Reclamation Costs, Current
acct_description: Current portion of reclamation reserve to restore a mining or drilling site to the condition agreed upon within the mining or drilling contract.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Current
acct_description: Current portion of the carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Foreign Currency Translation (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the Increase or Decrease in the amount of asset retirement obligations for the period associated with foreign currency translation (to the extent that the entity accounts for the foreign currency effects as a separate component of the change in the liability).

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Change in Net Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss) before Taxes (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the pretax change in net unrealized holding gain (loss) on available-for-sale securities that has been included in accumulated other comprehensive income, a separate component of shareholders' equity, during the period.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Equity Securities, Current
acct_description: Amount of investments in equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as available-for-sale, expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Realized Gains (Losses), Sale Proceeds (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The total amount of proceeds received for the sale of securities, categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities, during the reporting period.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Realized Losses
acct_description: This item represents the gross loss realized on the sale of debt or equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Realized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other than Temporary Impairments
acct_description: This item represents the difference between the gross realized gains and losses realized on the sale of debt or equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Net Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The pro forma net Income or Loss for the period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of a period.

acct_label: Business Combination, Step Acquisition, Equity Interest in Acquiree, Remeasurement Gain
acct_description: In a business combination achieved in stages, this element represents the amount of gain recognized by the entity as a result of remeasuring to fair value the equity interest in the acquiree it held before the business combination.

acct_label: Common Stock Issued, Employee Stock Trust
acct_description: Value of common stock issued to a trust (for example, a 'rabbi trust') set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees. This trust does not allow employees to immediately or after a holding period diversify into nonemployer securities. The deferred compensation plan for which this trust is set up must be settled by the delivery of a fixed number of shares of employer stock.

acct_label: Common Stock, Shares Held in Employee Trust, Shares
acct_description: Number of common stock held in a trust that has been set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees but not yet earned.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate During Period
acct_description: The average effective interest rate during the reporting period.

acct_label: Debt Issuance Costs, Noncurrent, Net
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Amounts Recognized in Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net Gain (Loss), before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate net gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income, including amounts arising during the period and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income as a result of being recognized as components of net periodic benefit cost for the period.

acct_label: Derivative, Cap Price
acct_description: The cap rate on a price risk derivative such as a cap or collar. A payment or receipt is triggered if the market rate exceeds the cap rate on the contract.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments and Hedges, Assets
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from derivative instruments and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments and Hedges, Liabilities
acct_description: Sum as of the balance sheet date of the (a) fair values of all liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments, and (b) the carrying amounts of the liabilities arising from financial instruments or contracts used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), and which are expected to be extinguished or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, net of the effects of master netting arrangements.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments, Loss Recognized in Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of loss recognized in income during the period on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments in fair value hedges and related hedged items designated and qualifying in fair value hedges, on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments in cash flow hedges, and on derivative instruments not designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Due from Employees, Current
acct_description: Amounts due from an Entity employee, not to include stockholders or officers, which are usually due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

acct_label: Fair Value, Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Accounts Receivable (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position asset caption which represents a class of assets, or which may include an individual asset, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Fair Value, Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Derivative Financial Instruments, Assets (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position asset caption which represents a class of assets, or which may include an individual asset, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Derivative Financial Instruments, Liabilities (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position liability caption which represents a class of liabilities, or which may include an individual liability, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Gain on Purchase of Business (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the excess of the fair value of acquired net assets over the cost of an acquired business after pro rata reduction of the amounts that otherwise would have been assigned to acquired assets except financial assets other than investments accounted for by the equity method, assets to be disposed of by sale, deferred tax assets, prepaid assets relating to pension and postretirement benefit plans, and other current assets. This amount is considered an extraordinary item and often referred to as negative goodwill. This element is gross of the related tax effect.

acct_label: Gold Products and Services Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue derived from sale of gold and related products. Also includes rendering of services and selling of products for exploration, development, mining, and processing, as well as supporting activities.

acct_label: Guarantor Obligations, Maximum Exposure, Undiscounted
acct_description: Maximum potential amount of future payments (undiscounted) the guarantor could be required to make under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees before reduction for potential recoveries under recourse or collateralization provisions.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Interest Payable, Net
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in interest payable, which represents the amount owed to note holders, bond holders, and other parties for interest earned on loans or credit extended to the reporting entity.

acct_label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Nonvested Shares with Forfeitable Dividends
acct_description: Number of additional shares included in diluted EPS for potentially dilutive effect of nonvested equity-based payment award containing forfeitable rights to dividends or dividend equivalents, whether paid or unpaid.

acct_label: Insurance Settlements Receivable
acct_description: Amount due in settlement of a claim for reimbursement from an insurance company when the Company has suffered a loss covered under an insurance policy.

acct_label: Interest Costs Capitalized
acct_description: Amount of interest capitalized during the period.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Long-term Debt
acct_description: Aggregate amount of interest paid or due on all long-term debt.

acct_label: Interest Payable, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of [accrued] interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred and is unpaid. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Inventory, Supplies, Net of Reserves
acct_description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of products used directly or indirectly in the manufacturing or production process, which may or may not become part of the final product. May also include items used in the storage, presentation or transportation of physical goods.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate, at Point in Time
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate of long-term debt outstanding calculated at point in time.

acct_label: Mineral Extraction Processing and Marketing Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred related to mineral extraction, processing and marketing.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Noncash Financial or Equity Instrument Consideration, Shares Issued
acct_description: "The number of shares issued as [noncash or part noncash] consideration for a business or asset acquired. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Other Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received classified as other, and expenses incurred but not yet paid, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of gain (loss) for (increase) decrease in value of benefit obligation for change in actuarial assumptions and increase (decrease) in value of plan assets from experience different from that assumed of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Write-down of Securities, before Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized loss realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, before Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss related to net period benefit cost (credit) for pension and other postretirement defined benefit plans.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Tax effect of the change in accumulated other comprehensive income, that is, the tax effect on items included in other comprehensive income during the period that is attributable to the parent entity. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Reclassification adjustment for unrealized gains or losses realized upon the sale of securities, after tax.

acct_label: Other Income
acct_description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

acct_label: Other Increase (Decrease) in Environmental Liabilities
acct_description: Other increase (decrease) not attributable to current expense nor cash payments during an accounting period in estimated obligations recorded for probable future costs attributable to environmental contamination issues.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Short-term Investments
acct_description: The net amount paid (received) by the reporting entity through acquisition or sale and maturities of short-term investments with an original maturity that is three months or less which qualify for treatment as an investing activity based on management's intention and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Business Two, Net of Cash Acquired
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with a second acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

acct_label: Prepaid Mineral Royalties, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized amounts paid for mineral royalties which will be charged against earnings after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Prepaid Royalties
acct_description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for royalties that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Private Placement
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

acct_label: Revenue Mineral Sales (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate revenue from the sale of minerals and related products, and from rendering services such as exploration, development, mining, processing and providing mining support activities.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Historical Cost
acct_description: The historical cost of the asset(s) sold in connection with the sale of the property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Operating Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of income or loss for the reportable segment before unusual Items, equity method income or loss, income taxes, and extraordinary items.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The decrease in the number of reserved shares that could potentially be issued attributable to the exercise or conversion during the reporting period of previously issued stock options under the option plan.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options of the plan that lapsed during the reporting period.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
acct_description: Number of shares issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the shareholders to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
acct_description: Number of shares of capital stock issued (purchased by employees) in connection with an employee stock ownership plan.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Employee Stock Purchase Plans
acct_description: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of an employee stock purchase plan.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
acct_description: Value of stock issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the holder of the stock to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
acct_description: Aggregate value of stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Translation Adjustment Functional to Reporting Currency, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount of cumulative translation gain (loss), after tax, from translating foreign currency financial statements into the reporting currency.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Derivatives, Net, before Tax
acct_description: Amount of net unrealized gain (loss) related to the change in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
acct_description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date, including liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, compensation costs, payroll taxes and fringe benefits (other than pension and postretirement obligations), contractual rights and obligations, and statutory obligations.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Trade
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Change in Method, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable from change in methodology.

acct_label: Accrued Employee Benefits
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations, excluding pension and other postretirement benefits, incurred through that date and payable for perquisites provided to employees pertaining to services received from them.

acct_label: Accumulated Capitalized Interest Costs
acct_description: Amount of accumulated interest costs capitalized as part of property, plant and equipment cost basis.

acct_label: Acquired Finite-lived Intangible Asset, Residual Value
acct_description: The aggregate expected value at the end of their useful life of a major finite-lived intangible asset class acquired during the period either individually or as part of a group of assets (in either an asset acquisition or business combination). A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar, either by their nature or by their use in the operations of a company.

acct_label: Acquired Indefinite-lived Intangible Asset, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate cost of a major indefinite-lived intangible asset class acquired, during the period, either individually or as part of a group of assets (in either an asset acquisition or business combination).

acct_label: Additional Collateral, Aggregate Fair Value
acct_description: The aggregate fair value of additional assets that would be required to be posted as collateral for derivative instruments with credit-risk-related contingent features if the credit-risk-related contingent features were triggered at the end of the reporting period.

acct_label: Advances on Inventory Purchases
acct_description: Carrying value of capitalized payments made in advance for inventory that is expected to be received within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Cash Paid to Settle
acct_description: Amount of cash paid during the period to settle an asset retirement obligation. Amounts paid to settle an asset retirement obligation are generally included in the operating section of the Statement of Cash Flows.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) asset retirement obligations.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, at Carrying Value (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Represents the sum of the carrying value of all the Assets Held-for-Sale at the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Bank Loans
acct_description: Amounts due on short-term bank loans secured by customers' securities on the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Bank Overdrafts
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of payments made in excess of existing cash balances, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the entity. Overdrafts generally have a very short time frame for correction or repayment and are therefore more similar to short-term bank financing than trade financing.

acct_label: Bankruptcy Claims, Amount of Claims Settled
acct_description: Amount of bankruptcy claim settled.

acct_label: Bridge Loan
acct_description: Short-Term financing which is expected to be paid back relatively quickly, such as by a subsequent longer-term loan. Also called swing loan or bridge financing.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Percentage of Voting Interests Acquired
acct_description: Percentage of voting equity interests acquired at the acquisition date in the business combination.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Deferred Taxes Asset (Liability), Net, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to noncurrent deferred tax assets net of valuation allowance and noncurrent deferred tax liabilities.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Goodwill, Expected Tax Deductible Amount
acct_description: The amount of goodwill arising from a business combination that is expected to be deductible for tax purposes.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Revenue Reported by Acquired Entity for Last Annual Period
acct_description: Total revenue reported by the acquired entity for its previous full fiscal year before the business acquisition.

acct_label: Business Combination, Step Acquisition, Equity Interest in Acquiree, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of equity in the acquiree held by the acquirer immediately before the acquisition date in a business combination.

acct_label: Business Exit Costs (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The charge against earnings in the period, comprised of costs incurred associated with an exit or disposal activity other than for a discontinued operations as defined under generally accepted accounting principles. Costs of such activities include those for one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, and relocating employees, and costs associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement, but excludes costs associated with the retirement of a long-lived asset.

acct_label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Net, Current
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer; classified as current.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Next Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Receivable Thereafter
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Receivable in Five Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Receivable in Four Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Receivable in Three Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Receivable in Two Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessor Balance Sheet, Net Investment in Direct Financing and Sales Type Leases, Current
acct_description: The net amount due within one year of the balance sheet date or the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing and sales-type leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessor Balance Sheet, Net Investment in Direct Financing and Sales Type Leases, Noncurrent
acct_description: The net amount due after one year of the balance sheet date or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing and sales-type leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Sales Type Leases
acct_description: The net investment in sales type leases as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments on sales type leases and (b) unguaranteed residual value; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Sales Type Leases, Deferred Income
acct_description: The remaining (unamortized) difference between the gross investment in a sales-type lease and the cost or carrying amount of the leased property as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Sales Type Leases, Minimum Payments to be Received
acct_description: Amount of remaining payments as of the balance sheet date that lessees are obligated to make or can be required to make under sales-type leases, including any guarantee of residual value and executory costs. The amount also includes any guaranteed rental payments by an unrelated third-party provided that are financially capable of making such payments.

acct_label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value, Including Discontinued Operations
acct_description: For the entity and the disposal group, cash includes currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. It also includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits in that the Entity may deposit additional funds at any time and also effectively may withdraw funds at any time without prior notice or penalty. Cash equivalents, excluding items classified as marketable securities, include short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash, and so near their maturity that they present minimal risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months. Compensating balance arrangements that do not legally restrict the withdrawal or usage of cash amounts may be reported as Cash and Cash Equivalents, while legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or company statements of intention with regard to particular deposits are not generally reported as cash and cash equivalents.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Other Expense, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net gains or losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to other expense from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) to be Reclassified within Twelve Months
acct_description: The estimated net amount of existing gains or losses on cash flow hedges at the reporting date expected to be reclassified to earnings within the next 12 months.

acct_label: Collateral Already Posted, Aggregate Fair Value
acct_description: The aggregate fair value of assets that are already posted, at the end of the reporting period, as collateral for derivative instruments with credit-risk-related contingent features.

acct_label: Commercial Paper
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of short-term borrowings using unsecured obligations issued by banks, corporations and other borrowers to investors. The maturities of these money market securities generally do not exceed 270 days.

acct_label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Year One
acct_description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Costs in Excess of Billings, Current
acct_description: Amount of receivable reflecting the cost incurred on uncompleted contracts in excess of related billings which is expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Customer Advances, Noncurrent
acct_description: The noncurrent portion of prepayments received from customers for goods or services to be provided in the future.

acct_label: Debt and Lease Obligation
acct_description: Amount of short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net, Current
acct_description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, netted by jurisdiction and classified as current.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Unrealized Currency Losses
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses on foreign currency transactions.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Investment in Noncontrolled Affiliates
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from investments in unconsolidated subsidiaries and investments in other affiliates which are not controlled nor consolidated.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Unrealized Currency Transaction Gains
