Allowances are a deduction from gross revenue in arriving at net revenue.

acct_label: Sales Discounts, Goods (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate cash discounts given by the entity for goods sold to customers including, but not limited to, early payments of accounts due. For example, selling terms of "2/10, net 30" entitle a customer to a 2% discount for prompt payment within 10 days, otherwise full payment is expected in 30 days. Discounts are a deduction from gross revenue in arriving at net revenue.

acct_label: Sales Discounts, Returns and Allowances, Goods (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate of: (i) sales discounts given by the entity, including, but not limited to, early payments of accounts due, (ii) the total deduction from sales during the period arising from goods returned by customers (other than under warranty provisions), and (iii) price reductions (allowance, price protection agreements) given by the entity. Discounts, returns and allowances are a deduction from gross revenue in arriving at net revenue.

acct_label: Sales Returns, Goods (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate refunds recognized during an accounting period due to goods returned by customers (other than under warranty provisions). Returns are a deduction from gross revenue in arriving at net revenue.

acct_label: Sales Revenue, Goods, Gross (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate revenue during the period from sale of goods in the normal course of business, before deducting returns, allowances and discounts.

acct_label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Accelerated Cost
acct_description: Amount of additional cost recognized for award under share-based payment arrangement from occurrence of event accelerating recognition of cost.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Discount from Market Price, Offering Date
acct_description: Discount rate from fair value on offering date that participants pay for shares.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Authorized
acct_description: Number of shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
acct_description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

acct_label: Sublease Income
acct_description: Amount of sublease income excluding finance and operating lease expense.

acct_label: Supplemental Unemployment Benefits, Severance Benefits
acct_description: Liability for amount due employees, in addition to wages and any other money that employers owe employees, when their employment ends through a layoff or other termination. For example, a company may provide involuntarily terminated employees with a lump sum payment equal to one week's salary for every year of employment.

acct_label: Tangible Asset Impairment Charges
acct_description: The charge against earnings resulting from the aggregate write down of tangible assets from their carrying value to their fair value.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Securities
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement on unsold other securities.

acct_label: Unrealized Loss on Securities
acct_description: The increase (decrease), resulting in a loss, in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of securities held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Increase (Decrease) Adjustment
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from adjustment.

acct_label: Capitalization, Long-term Debt and Equity
acct_description: This element represents the total consolidated (as applicable) capitalization of the entity which is comprised of its long-term debt and equity instruments. The table may be detailed by subsidiary (legal entity) and include information by type of debt or equity detailed by instrument.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-04, Cash Dividends Paid to Registrant, Subsidiaries and Equity Method Investees
acct_description: This element represents disclosure of the total aggregate cash dividends paid to the entity by consolidated subsidiaries, by unconsolidated subsidiaries, and by 50% or less owned persons accounted for using the equity method.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of Prospective Application of New Accounting Principle (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) to equity or (increase) decrease to net assets as a result of a cumulative effect adjustment for prospective application of a new accounting principle.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross, Current
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as current.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross, Current
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as current.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets Level 3 Reconciliation, Increase (Decrease) for Assets Transferred into (out of) Level 3
acct_description: Amount, measured using unobservable inputs, of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan, for assets transferred into (out of) Level 3 of fair value hierarchy. Includes, but is not limited to, transfer due to change in observability of significant inputs.

acct_label: Depreciation, Amortization and Accretion, Net
acct_description: The aggregate net amount of depreciation, amortization, and accretion recognized during an accounting period. As a noncash item, the net amount is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

acct_label: Due from Affiliate, Current
acct_description: Amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

acct_label: Due from Affiliates
acct_description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

acct_label: Due to Related Parties
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.

acct_label: Energy Related Inventory, Gas Stored Underground
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of natural gas stored underground in depleted gas reservoirs, aquifers, or salt caverns to meet seasonal and peak load demands, and also as insurance against unforeseen supply disruptions, and deemed to be a current asset because it is expected to be used within twelve months or in the normal operating cycle.

acct_label: Energy Related Inventory, Propane Gas
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of product derived from petroleum during the processing of oil or natural gas which is then used as a heat source or fuel.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
acct_description: Amount of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, Equal to Greater than 90 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Financing receivables that are equal to or greater than 90 days past due.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Taxes Payable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all taxes owed but not paid, including income, property and other taxes.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Customer Advances
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of prepayments by customers for goods or services to be provided at a later date.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Obligation, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefits
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for pension and other postretirement benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit and defined contribution plans.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Average Outstanding Amount
acct_description: Average amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

acct_label: Other Inventory, Purchased Goods, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount of components used by the entity which are bought from another entity rather than produced by the entity.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt, Maturing in Three Months or Less
acct_description: The cash inflow from a borrowing net of the cash outflow from repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment within three months.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Accumulated Depreciation
acct_description: Period end book value of accumulated depreciation on property, plant and equipment (PPE) that is owned by the regulated operations of the public utility.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Disclosure of Composite Depreciation Rate for Plants in Service
acct_description: Composite depreciation rate for public utility plants in service.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
acct_description: Period end amount of total net PPE.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Transmission and Distribution
acct_description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to transmission and distribution owned by public utility.

acct_label: Refundable Gas Costs
acct_description: Gas costs of a regulated entity that are refundable through future rate adjustments. Such costs are a form of a regulatory liabilities and are expected to be refunded in less than one year through rate adjustments.

acct_label: Regulated and Unregulated Operating Revenue
acct_description: The total amount of operating revenues recognized during the period.

acct_label: Regulated Operating Revenue, Gas
acct_description: The amount of regulated gas operating revenues recognized during the period.

acct_label: Regulatory Assets
acct_description: The amount for the individual regulatory asset as itemized in a table of regulatory assets as of the end of the period.

acct_label: Regulatory Assets, Current
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of regulated entities that are expected to be recovered through revenue sources within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Such costs are capitalized if they meet both of the following criteria: a. It is probable that future revenue in an amount at least equal to the capitalized cost will result from inclusion of that cost in allowable costs for rate-making purposes. b. Based on available evidence, the future revenue will be provided to permit recovery of the previously incurred cost rather than to provide for expected levels of similar future costs. If the revenue will be provided through an automatic rate-adjustment clause, this criterion requires that the regulator's intent clearly be to permit recovery of the previously incurred cost.

acct_label: Regulatory Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of regulated entities that are not expected to be recovered through revenue sources within one year or the normal operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Regulatory Liabilities
acct_description: The amount for the individual regulatory liability as itemized in a table of regulatory liabilities as of the end of the period.

acct_label: Regulatory Liability, Noncurrent
acct_description: The amount for the individual regulatory noncurrent liability as itemized in a table of regulatory noncurrent liabilities as of the end of the period.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Current Period Gain Recognized
acct_description: The portion of the deferred gain that was recognized in the current period.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Gross Proceeds (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The gross proceeds received from the asset(s) sold in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease back to the seller.

acct_label: Short-term Debt, Maximum Amount Outstanding During Period
acct_description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, the maximum amount borrowed at any time during the period.

acct_label: Utilities Operating Expense
acct_description: Amount of operating expense of regulated operation.

acct_label: Utilities Operating Expense, Depreciation and Amortization
acct_description: Amount of operating expense for depreciation and amortization of regulated operation.

acct_label: Utilities Operating Expense, Gas and Petroleum Purchased
acct_description: Amount of operating expense for purchased gas and petroleum of regulated operation.

acct_label: Utilities Operating Expense, Other
acct_description: Amount of other operating expense of regulated operation.

acct_label: Utilities Operating Expense, Taxes
acct_description: Amount of operating expense for taxes other than income taxes of regulated operation.

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Excluding Contract Retainage
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs but not paid. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract.

acct_label: Acquired Finite-lived Intangible Asset, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount assigned to a major class of finite-lived intangible assets acquired either individually or as part of a group of assets (in either an asset acquisition or business combination). A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar, either by their nature or by their use in the operations of a company.

acct_label: Amortization of Acquisition Costs
acct_description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of capitalized costs associated with acquisition of business. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

acct_label: Amortization of Capitalized Value of Business Acquired Asset (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Represents total amortization expense with respect to capitalized value of business asset acquired (present value of future profits) reflected in the income statement for the period, generally on the same basis for amortization of deferred policy acquisition costs.

acct_label: Dilutive Securities, Effect on Basic Earnings Per Share, Options and Restrictive Stock Units
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of stock options or restrictive stock units (RSUs).

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Amount Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Credit) and Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, before Tax
acct_description: Amount recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) and other comprehensive (income) loss.

acct_label: Assets, Fair Value Adjustment
acct_description: Amount of addition (reduction) to the amount at which an asset could be incurred (settled) in a current transaction between willing parties.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Current (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Current assets (normally turning over within one year or one business cycle if longer) that are held for sale apart from normal operations and anticipated to be sold within one year.

acct_label: Billings in Excess of Cost, Current
acct_description: Liability attributable to (i) billings in excess of costs under the percentage of completion contract accounting method representing the difference between contractually invoiced amounts (billings) and revenue recognized based, for example, on costs incurred to estimated total costs at period end or (ii) contractually invoiced amounts (billings) in excess of costs incurred and accumulated under the completed contract accounting method that are expected to be realized within one year or one operating cycle, whichever is longer, from the reporting date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Integration Related Costs
acct_description: Costs incurred to effect a business combination which have been expensed during the period. Such costs could include business integration costs, systems integration and conversion costs, and severance and other employee-related costs.

acct_label: Contract Receivable Retainage
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract.

acct_label: Contracts Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenue earned from products sold or services provided under the terms of a contract, including, but not limited to, government contracts and construction contracts, classified as other.

acct_label: Convertible Subordinated Debt, Noncurrent
acct_description: The portion of the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

acct_label: Debt Default, Short-term Debt, Amount
acct_description: Amount of outstanding short-term debt or borrowing associated with any securities or credit agreement for which there has been a default in principal, interest, sinking fund, or redemption provisions, or any breach of covenant that existed at the end of the period and subsequently has not been cured.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate Increase (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Increase in basis points of the stated interest rate on the debt instrument.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage Rate Range, Maximum (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Maximum contractual interest rate for funds borrowed, under the debt agreement.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage Rate Range, Minimum (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Minimum contractual interest rate for funds borrowed, under the debt agreement.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Periodic Payment
acct_description: Amount of the required periodic payments including both interest and principal payments.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Periodic Payment, Principal
acct_description: Amount of the required periodic payments applied to principal.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Periodic Payment Terms, Balloon Payment to be Paid
acct_description: Amount of payment greater than the preceding installment payments to be paid at final maturity date of debt.

acct_label: Debt Issuance Cost (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of debt issuance costs (for example, but not limited to, legal, accounting, broker, and regulatory fees).

acct_label: Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate of debt outstanding.

acct_label: Deferred Costs and Other Assets
acct_description: Amount of deferred cost assets and assets classified as other.

acct_label: Deferred Revenue, Revenue Recognized
acct_description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously reported as deferred or unearned revenue.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Deferred Gain on Sale Leaseback Transaction
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from a gain reported for tax purposes on sale and leaseback transactions in accordance with enacted tax laws.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Investment in Subsidiaries
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the entity's investment in its wholly-owned subsidiaries.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense
acct_description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowances, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences from reserves and accruals, compensation and benefit costs, and other provisions, reserves, and allowances.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Reserves
acct_description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from reserves, classified as other.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from capitalized costs.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Inventory
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax consequences attributable to taxable temporary differences derived from inventory.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Goodwill and Intangible Assets
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets including goodwill.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Regulatory Assets
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from regulatory assets.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Tax Deferred Income
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from tax deferred revenue or income classified as other.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Target Allocation, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of target investment allocation to total plan assets. Includes, but is not limited to, percentage on weighted-average basis if more than one plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Plan Asset Allocations (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation of investments of this type to total plan assets presented on a weighted average basis.

acct_label: Dividends Payable, Amount Per Share
acct_description: The per share amount of a dividend declared, but not paid, as of the financial reporting date.

acct_label: Early Repayment of Senior Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow for the extinguishment of long-term borrowing, with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, before its maturity.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Cash Contributions to ESOP
acct_description: This item represents the amount of cash contributions during the period made by the entity to the Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Shares Contributed to ESOP
acct_description: This item represents the number of shares provided to the Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP) during the period.

acct_label: Disclosure on Geographic Areas, Long-Lived Assets in Foreign Countries (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of long-lived assets other than financial instruments, long-term customer relationships of a financial institution, mortgage and other servicing rights, deferred policy acquisition costs, and deferred tax assets, located in foreign countries in total in which the entity holds assets.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Translation Adjustments (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) to assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life for foreign currency translation adjustments.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), Realized
acct_description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), Unrealized
acct_description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

acct_label: Forward Contract Indexed to Issuer's Equity, Settlement Alternatives, Cash, at Fair Value
acct_description: Current fair value of each cash settlement alternative for each freestanding forward contract.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenues recognized by the entity from providing services to in-patients, outpatients, residents in facilities owned or operated by the entity, from insurance premiums, or from goods provided or services performed.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible expenses.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Impairment Losses, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible impairment loss.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Other, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Research and Development, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible research and development expense.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in income tax contingencies. Including, but not limited to, domestic tax contingency, foreign tax contingency, state and local tax contingency, and other contingencies.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Billing in Excess of Cost of Earnings
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability reflecting cash payments received before the related costs have been incurred.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Charges
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of expenditures made during the current reporting period for benefits that will be received over a period of years. Deferred charges differ from prepaid expenses in that they usually extend over a long period of time and may or may not be regularly recurring costs of operation.

acct_label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets, Acquired During Period (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount of indefinite-lived intangible assets acquired in the period and allocated to the reportable segment. The value is stated at fair value based on the purchase price allocation.

acct_label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets, Written off Related to Sale of Business Unit
acct_description: Amount of divestiture of an asset lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value. Excludes financial assets and goodwill.

acct_label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets Acquired
acct_description: Amount of increase in assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with an indefinite life, from an acquisition.

acct_label: Interest Portion of Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions
acct_description: Amount necessary to reduce minimum lease payments to present value for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing.

acct_label: Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Asset at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all interest rate derivative assets designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

acct_label: Interest Revenue (Expense), Net
acct_description: Amount of interest revenue (income derived from investments in debt securities and on cash and cash equivalents) net of interest expense (cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest).

acct_label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Net, Claims Paid (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of asbestos claims paid in the current period, net of reinsurance recoveries.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Commitment Fee Amount
acct_description: Amount of the fee for available but unused credit capacity under the credit facility.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Amount Outstanding During Period
acct_description: Maximum amount borrowed under the credit facility at any time during the period.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Periodic Payment
acct_description: Amount of the required periodic payments of both interest and principal.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest, Percentage Rate
acct_description: The interest rate applicable to the portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Claims Dismissed, Number
acct_description: Number of claims dismissed.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Claims Settled, Number
acct_description: Number of claims settled.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Damages Awarded, Value
acct_description: Amount of damages awarded to the plaintiff in the legal matter.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Pending Claims, Number
acct_description: Number of pending claims pertaining to a loss contingency.

acct_label: Loss on Contracts
acct_description: Losses recognized in the current period on contracts which are expected to generate losses, which are probable and can be reasonably estimated, in a future period.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Thereafter
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, within Five Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, within Four Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Next Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, within Three Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, within Two Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Net Worth Required for Compliance
acct_description: The lowest amount of net worth (total assets minus total liabilities) required by secondary market investors or state-imposed regulatory mandates.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Significant, Accumulated Benefit Obligation
acct_description: Amount of accumulated benefit obligation for multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Significant, Plan Contribution
acct_description: Amount of contribution received by multiemployer pension plan from all employers participating in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plans, Accumulated Benefit Obligation (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of accumulated benefit obligation attributable to the pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plans, Plan Contributions (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of contributions made to the multiemployer plan by all employers who participate in the plan. A multiemployer plan is a pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plans, Plan Contributions (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of contributions made to multiemployer plan by all employers who participate in plan.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Divestiture, Amount of Consideration Received
acct_description: Amount of noncash consideration received for selling an asset or business through a noncash (or part noncash) transaction.

acct_label: Notes Payable to Bank
acct_description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, the carrying value as of the balance sheet date of notes payable to banks, excluding mortgage notes, initially due beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss), attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Minimum Pension Liability Net Adjustment, Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The tax effect of the amount of the change in the additional minimum pension liability not yet recognized pursuant to FAS 87 as a net periodic pension cost. If the additional pension liability required to be recognized exceeds the unrecognized prior service costs, then the excess (which is the net loss not yet recognized as net periodic pension cost) is to be recorded as a separate component in other comprehensive income, before adjusting for tax effects. In a subsequent measurement, the elimination or adjustment to the amount of the minimum pension liability recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income is included in this line. Eliminated upon adoption of FAS 158.

acct_label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
acct_description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

acct_label: Other Inventories, Spare Parts, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount of components of assembled products that can be sold directly or indirectly through sales of assembled products.

acct_label: Other Nonrecurring Expense
acct_description: Amount of other expense that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

acct_label: Paid-in-Kind Interest
acct_description: Interest paid other than in cash for example by issuing additional debt securities. As a noncash item, it is added to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

acct_label: Payments for Legal Settlements
acct_description: The amount of cash paid for the settlement of litigation or for other legal issues during the period.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions
acct_description: Present value of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing.

acct_label: Prior Period Reclassification Adjustment
acct_description: The amount of a reclassification adjustment made to prior period financial statement amounts.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Restricted Cash, Financing Activities
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow from cash and cash items that are not available for withdrawal or usage.

acct_label: Proceeds from Stock Plans
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the stock plan during the period.

acct_label: Standard and Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Additions from Business Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of increase in the standard and extended product warranty accrual from a business acquisition.

acct_label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
acct_description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

acct_label: Receivables, Long-term Contracts or Programs
acct_description: Amount to be collected within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from customers in accordance with the contractual provisions of long-term contracts or programs including amounts billed and unbilled as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Related Party Transaction, Selling, General and Administrative Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
acct_description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expenses resulting from transactions, excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements, with related party.

acct_label: Repayments of Annuities and Investment Certificates
acct_description: The cash outflow for an insurance contract under which the policy holder make a lump sum payment or a series of payments in exchange for periodic payments to the policyholder beginning immediately or at some future date.

acct_label: Retained Earnings, Appropriated
acct_description: A segregation of retained earnings which is unavailable for dividend distribution. Includes also retained earnings appropriated for loss contingencies.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Deferred Gain, Gross
acct_description: The amount of the gain recorded in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller to be recognized in future periods.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Gross Proceeds, Financing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow before closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Net Book Value
acct_description: The net book value of the asset(s) sold in connection with the sale of the property to another party and lease back to the seller.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Net Proceeds, Financing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow after closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Dividend Payments
acct_description: The estimated amount of dividends to be paid to holders of the underlying shares (expected dividends) over the option's term. Dividends are taken into account because payment of dividends to shareholders reduces the fair value of the underlying shares, and option holders generally do not receive dividends.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Forfeitures
acct_description: Number of shares under non-option equity instrument agreements that were cancelled as a result of occurrence of a terminating event.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity before Treasury Stock
acct_description: Total amount of stockholders' equity (deficit) items including stock value, paid in capital, retained earnings and including equity attributable to noncontrolling interests and before deducting the carrying value of treasury stock.

acct_label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Shares
acct_description: Number of shares that have been repurchased and retired during the period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeitures, Intrinsic Value, Amount Per Share
acct_description: Per share or unit weighted-average intrinsic value of award forfeited under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

acct_label: Equity, Fair Value Adjustment
acct_description: Amount of addition (reduction) to the amount at which an instrument classified in shareholders' equity could be incurred (settled) in a current transaction between willing parties.

acct_label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets, Purchase Accounting Adjustments
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit, from purchase accounting adjustments.

acct_label: Provision for Other Credit Losses
acct_description: Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.

acct_label: Accrued Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of accrued expenses.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Cash-based Arrangements, Liability, Current
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements payable within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Represents currently earned compensation under cash arrangements (such as a profit-sharing plan, rabbi trust, and employee contract--excluding equity-based arrangements) that is not actually paid until a later date.

acct_label: Employee Benefits and Share-based Compensation
acct_description: Amount of expense for employee benefit and equity-based compensation.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Compensation
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligation created by employee agreements whereby earned compensation will be paid in the future.

acct_label: Allowance for Doubtful Accounts Receivable, Charge-offs (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of direct write-downs of receivables charged against the allowance for doubtful accounts.

acct_label: Amount of Restricted Net Assets for Consolidated and Unconsolidated Subsidiaries
acct_description: Amount of restricted net assets of consolidated and unconsolidated subsidiaries as of the end of the most recently completed fiscal year.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount after tax of pro forma income from continuing operations as if the business combination had been completed at the beginning of a period.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Financial Assets
acct_description: The amount of financial assets (as defined) recognized as of the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Financial Liabilities
acct_description: The amount of financial liabilities assumed (as defined) which have been recognized as of the acquisition date.

acct_label: Capitalized Computer Software, Gross
acct_description: Amount before accumulated amortization of capitalized costs for computer software, including but not limited to, acquired and internally developed computer software.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Income Statement, Amortization Expense
acct_description: The charge for the use of long-lived depreciable capital leased assets for the period.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Flight Equipment, Accumulated Depreciation
acct_description: The cumulative amount of depreciation that has been recognized in the income statement related to long-lived, depreciable flight assets used in the entity's principle business operations, subject to a lease and meeting the criteria for capitalization.

acct_label: Cost of Real Estate Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the total of the costs related to real estate revenues, including management, leasing, and development services.

acct_label: Cost of Real Estate Sales (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects for the period the total of the carrying amount of the commercial, industrial and residential land and buildings sold plus certain overhead and other costs incurred to place the real estate in saleable condition, capitalized interest costs in the properties sold, and inventory impairment losses recognized. This element would most likely be used by an entity whose principal activities involve real estate or which has significant real estate operations.

acct_label: Debt Issuance Costs, Line of Credit Arrangements, Net
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

acct_label: Decrease in Restricted Cash
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

acct_label: Deferred Other Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of other deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations. For example, but not limited to, acquisition-date income tax benefits or expenses recognized from changes in the acquirer's valuation allowance for its previously existing deferred tax assets resulting from a business combination and adjustments to beginning-of-year balance of a valuation allowance because of a change in circumstance causing a change in judgment about the realizability of the related deferred tax asset in future periods.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards, Alternative Minimum Tax
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible alternative minimum tax credit carryforwards.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense, Other Capitalized Costs
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from capitalized costs classified as other.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from reserves and accruals.

acct_label: Dividends Payable, Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount of dividends declared, but not paid, as of the financial reporting date.

acct_label: Due to Affiliate, Current
acct_description: Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Due to Affiliate, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of receivables owed to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, which are usually due after one year (or one business cycle, if longer).

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Business, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to disposition of a business not qualifying as a discontinued operation.

acct_label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

acct_label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Cost of Sales (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the cost of sales reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

acct_label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

acct_label: Escrow Deposit Disbursements Related to Property Acquisition (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Escrow deposit disbursements related to property acquisition in noncash investing or financing transactions.

acct_label: Escrow Deposits Related to Property Sales
acct_description: Escrow deposits related to property sales in noncash investing and financing activities.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Provisions (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Charge to expense for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The gains (losses) included in results of operations resulting from the sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment, which do not qualify for treatment as discontinued operations. This item does not include any gain (loss) recognized on the sale of oil and gas property or timber property.

acct_label: Gain on Sale of Investments
acct_description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A gain would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is greater than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Gain included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

acct_label: Impact of Restatement on Earnings Per Share, Basic (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Per share amount effect of a restatement of results of operations on basic earnings per share.

acct_label: Impairment Losses Related to Real Estate Partnerships
acct_description: Impairment losses measured as the amount by which the carrying amount of the business or real estate partnerships exceeds the fair value of the business or partnership.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to taxing authorities for taxes that are based on the reporting entity's earnings, net of amounts receivable from taxing authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes, and in deferred and other tax liabilities and assets.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Noncurrent Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent operating liabilities classified as other.

acct_label: Increase in Restricted Cash
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

acct_label: Inventory, Real Estate
acct_description: Total of (1) improvements, (2) held-for-sale, (3) land and land under development, (4) construction-in-process, (5) mortgage loans held-in-inventory, and (6) other real estate investments which are considered inventory due to being held for sale or disposition.

acct_label: Inventory, Real Estate, Land and Land Development Costs
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date, net of valuation allowances and impairment losses, of costs of land expected to be developed in the near term plus capitalized costs of development, for purposes of selling completed units to home buyers or commercial or industrial entities..

acct_label: Investment Income, Net
acct_description: Amount after accretion (amortization) of discount (premium), and investment expense, of interest income and dividend income on nonoperating securities.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Accrual, Current
acct_description: Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Insignificant, Accumulated Benefit Obligation
acct_description: Amount of accumulated benefit obligation for multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Period Contributions (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of contributions made to multiemployer plans by the employer. A multiemployer plan is a pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plans, Withdrawal Obligation
acct_description: Amount of the obligation recognized by withdrawing from a pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Withdrawal Obligation (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of a recognized obligation to a multiemployer plan in the event that the employer withdraws from the plan. In some situations, withdrawal from a multiemployer plan may result in an employer having an obligation to the plan for a portion of the unfunded benefit obligation of the pension plans and other postretirement benefit plans.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Fixed Assets Acquired (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of fixed assets that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Notes Assumed (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The fair value of notes assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

acct_label: Notes Assumed
acct_description: The fair value of notes assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

acct_label: Operating Costs and Expenses
acct_description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Excludes Selling, General and Administrative Expense.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four and Five Years
acct_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth and fifth fiscal years following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Contingent Revenue
acct_description: Amount of contingent rental revenue recognized for the period under lease, based on the occurrences of an event or condition.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Lease Revenue
acct_description: The total amount of revenue recognized for the period from operating leases, including minimum lease revenue, contingent revenue, percentage revenue and sublease revenue.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Minimum Lease Revenue
acct_description: The total amount of lease revenue recognized for the period for which the lessee was obligated under leasing arrangements regardless of any other events or conditions. This amount excludes contingent revenue and sublease revenue.

acct_label: Other Assets, Miscellaneous
acct_description: Amount of other miscellaneous assets.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Amortization, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Prior Service Cost Recognized in Net Periodic Pension Cost, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The adjustment out of other comprehensive income for prior service costs recognized as a component of net period benefit cost during the period, after tax.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Tax and Reclassification Adjustment, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, Prior Service Cost (Credit), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for prior service cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Amortization, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Prior Service Cost Recognized in Net Periodic Pension Cost, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Net of tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for prior service costs recognized as a component of net period benefit cost.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Gain (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income, Other, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in other comprehensive income, after tax, from changes classified as other.

acct_label: Other Noncash Income
acct_description: Amount of income or gain included in net income that result in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

acct_label: Other Nonrecurring Income
acct_description: Amount of other income that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Loss, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent, Available-for-sale Securities
acct_description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Payments for Construction in Process
acct_description: The cash outflow from construction costs to date on capital projects that have not been completed and assets being constructed that are not ready to be placed into service.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire and Develop Real Estate
acct_description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land and anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth, and payments to develop real estate assets by adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements. Including real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excluding real estate acquired for use by the owner.

acct_label: Pension and Other Postretirement Benefits Cost (Reversal of Cost)
acct_description: Amount of cost (reversal of cost) for pension and other postretirement benefits.

acct_label: Prepaid Expense
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of expenditures made in advance of when the economic benefit of the cost will be realized, and which will be expensed in future periods with the passage of time or when a triggering event occurs.

acct_label: Proceeds from Contributions from Affiliates
acct_description: The cash inflow from an entity that is affiliated with the entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

acct_label: Real Estate Held-for-sale
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in land and buildings held for sale, excluding real estate considered to be inventory of the entity.

acct_label: Real Estate Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate revenue from real estate operations during the reporting period.

acct_label: Receivables, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of receivables, including, but not limited to, trade account receivables, note receivables, and loan receivables.

acct_label: Related Party Transaction, Revenues from Transactions with Related Party (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Revenues, net of returns and allowances, realized from sales and other transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party during the period.

acct_label: Repayments of Assumed Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow from the repayments of a long-term debt originally issued by another party but is assumed by the entity.

acct_label: Retained Earnings, Undistributed Earnings from Equity Method Investees
acct_description: Amount of consolidated retained earnings that represent undistributed (not yet received) earnings from 50% or less owned persons accounted for by the equity method (equity method investees).

acct_label: Sale and Leaseback Transaction, Gain (Loss), Net
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale and leaseback transaction from transfer of asset accounted for as sale.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Quarterly Rental Payments
acct_description: The amount of the quarterly rental payments due under the lease entered into in connection with the transactions involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

acct_label: Sales of Real Estate (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from the sale of commercial, industrial, or residential property during the period. This element is more likely than not relevant to an entity for which real estate operations are a principal activity. If real estate operations are not a principal activity, the reporting entity would likely use a gain (loss) on sale of property, plant, or equipment type element.

acct_label: Self Insurance Reserve, Current
acct_description: Carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property that are expected to be paid within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

acct_label: Self Insurance Reserve, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property that are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Change in Tax Rate, Provisional Income Tax Expense (Benefit) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax expense (benefit) for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Minimum Quantity Required
acct_description: The minimum number of units that must be purchased, in connection with an unconditional purchase obligation that has not been recognized for financial reporting purposes.

acct_label: Weighted Average Basic Shares Outstanding, Pro Forma
acct_description: The weighted average number of shares (units) outstanding in the calculation of pro forma basic earnings per share (earnings per unit), which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Value of Assets Acquired
acct_description: "The value of an asset or business acquired in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs
acct_description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

acct_label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Restricted Stock Unit, Increase for Cost Recognition
acct_description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for restricted stock unit under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Amortized Cost Basis
acct_description: This item represents the cost of debt and equity securities, which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading, net of adjustments including accretion, amortization, collection of cash, previous other-than-temporary impairments recognized in earnings (less any cumulative-effect adjustments recognized, as defined), and fair value hedge accounting adjustments, if any.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Fair Value Disclosure (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the portion of the balance sheet assertion valued at fair value by the entity whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission. This item represents Available-for-sale Securities which consist of all investments in certain debt and equity securities neither classified as trading or held-to-maturity securities. A debt security represents a creditor relationship with an enterprise. Debt securities include, among other items, US Treasury securities, US government securities, municipal securities, corporate bonds, convertible debt, commercial paper, and all securitized debt instruments. An equity security represents an ownership interest in an enterprise or the right to acquire or dispose of an ownership interest in an enterprise at fixed or determinable prices. Equity securities include, among other things, common stock, certain preferred stock, warrant rights, call options, and put options, but do not include convertible debt. An entity may opt to provide the reader with additional narrative text to better understand the nature of investments in debt and equity securities which are categorized as Available-for-sale.

acct_label: Consolidation, Less than Wholly Owned Subsidiary, Parent Ownership Interest, Changes, Purchase of Interest by Parent
acct_description: Represents the purchase by the parent of an additional equity interest in a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The purchase of the additional equity interest represented by this element increases the parent's controlling interest in the subsidiary.

acct_label: Costs and Expenses, Related Party
acct_description: Costs of sales and operating expenses for the period incurred from transactions with related parties.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of New Accounting Principle in Period of Adoption (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) to equity or (increase) decrease to net assets, resulting from the cumulative effect adjustment of a new accounting principle applied in the period of adoption.

acct_label: Deferred Costs, Leasing, Net
acct_description: This element represents costs incurred by the lessor that are (a) costs to originate a lease incurred in transactions with independent third parties that (i) result directly from and are essential to acquire that lease and (ii) would not have been incurred had that leasing transaction not occurred and (b) certain costs directly related to specified activities performed by the lessor for that lease. Those activities are: evaluating the prospective lessee's financial condition; evaluating and recording guarantees, collateral, and other security arrangements; negotiating lease terms; preparing and processing lease documents; and closing the transaction. This element is net of accumulated amortization.

acct_label: Deferred Rent Receivables, Net
acct_description: The cumulative difference between the rental payments required by a lease agreement and the rental income or expense recognized on a straight-line basis, or other systematic and rational basis more representative of the time pattern in which use or benefit is granted or derived from the leased property, expected to be recognized in income or expense over the term of the leased property, by the lessor or lessee, respectively. Such receivable is reduced by allowances attributable to, for instance, credit risk associated with a lessee.

acct_label: Development in Process
acct_description: The current amount of expenditures for a real estate project that has not yet been completed.

acct_label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Cash Used to Settle Award
acct_description: Aggregate cash paid by the entity during the period to settle equity instruments granted under equity-based payment arrangements.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Real Estate, Discontinued Operations
acct_description: Amount of difference between the carrying amount and the sales price of real estate properties sold as part of discontinued operations.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties
acct_description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of real estate or properties that were intended to be sold or held for capital appreciation or rental income. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

acct_label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Investment Real Estate
acct_description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of real estate owned for investment purposes.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Depreciation and Amortization, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible depreciation and amortization.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Rent Receivables (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due that is the result of the cumulative difference between actual rent due and rental income recognized on a straight-line basis.

acct_label: Interest and Debt Expense
acct_description: Interest and debt related expenses associated with nonoperating financing activities of the entity.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Balance, Shares
acct_description: Balance held at close of period in number of shares.

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Liabilities of Assets Held-for-sale (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Liability (such as a mortgage) related to a disposal group that is held for sale and anticipated to be sold in less than one year. The liability is expected to be discharged as part of the plan of sale for the asset.

acct_label: Marketable Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security.

acct_label: Number of Real Estate Properties
acct_description: The number of real estate properties owned as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Operating Lease, Lease Income
acct_description: Amount of operating lease income from lease payments and variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor. Includes, but is not limited to, variable lease payments not included in measurement of lease receivable.

acct_label: Operating Lease, Lease Income, Lease Payments
acct_description: Amount of operating lease income from lease payments paid and payable to lessor. Excludes variable lease payments not included in measurement of lease receivable.

acct_label: Operating Lease, Variable Lease Income
acct_description: Amount of operating lease income from variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor, excluding amount included in measurement of lease receivable.

acct_label: Other Short-term Investments
acct_description: Amount of short-term investments classified as other.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Loans Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing loans held for investment purposes during the period.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Percentage Revenue
acct_description: This element represents the rental revenue earned during the period from lessee-operators based on revenues generated in their operations, generally in excess of a base amount. Such rental revenue is generally stipulated in the lease agreement, usually will provide for a fixed percentage of revenue to be paid as additional (or possibly only) rent due the lessor, and may be based on gross revenues, net revenues, or multiple variations thereof. Percentage rent is often required under leases with retail outlets located on premises owned by hoteliers, cruise lines, others in the hospitality industry, and shopping mall operators, among others.

acct_label: Proceeds from Principal Repayments on Loans and Leases Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash inflow from repayments of the balance excluding interest (principal) on loans receivable and leases held for investment purposes.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Land Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash inflow from the sale of land held for investment; excludes sales of land held as inventory or productive use.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate Held-for-investment
acct_description: Cash received from the sale of real estate that is held for investment, that is, it is part of an investing activity during the period.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation
acct_description: Amount of accumulated depreciation pertaining to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: Real Estate Accumulated Depreciation, Depreciation Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of depreciation expense for the period.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Other Addition
acct_description: Amount of other additions to accumulated depreciation other than depreciation expense for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.
