acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Other Deduction
acct_description: Amount of other deductions to accumulated depreciation, excluding sales, for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Investment in Real Estate Sold
acct_description: Amount of decrease to accumulated depreciation for real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Accumulated Depreciation (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of accumulated depreciation for the property as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Amount of Encumbrances
acct_description: Amount of lien or mortgage outstanding on real estate investment properties for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Building and Improvements, Amount
acct_description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Land, Amount
acct_description: Amount of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Cost Capitalized Subsequent to Acquisition, Improvements
acct_description: Amount of land and buildings and improvements made to real estate investments and capitalized after acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Building and Improvements
acct_description: Initial cost of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Land
acct_description: Initial cost of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of real estate investment by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes real estate not held as investment or interest.

acct_label: Real Estate Investment Property, Accumulated Depreciation
acct_description: The cumulative amount of depreciation for real estate property held for investment purposes.

acct_label: Real Estate Investment Property, at Cost
acct_description: Amount of real estate investment property which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

acct_label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
acct_description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

acct_label: Real Estate Investments, Unconsolidated Real Estate and Other Joint Ventures
acct_description: The carrying amount of investments in unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented. This includes direct and indirect investments.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Other Deduction
acct_description: Amount of other deductions to real estate investments, excluding sales, for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: Real Estate Tax Expense
acct_description: A tax based on the assessed value of real estate by the local government. The tax is usually based on the value of property (including the land).

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Depreciation Expense
acct_description: Amount of depreciation expense of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: Straight Line Rent
acct_description: Difference between actual rental income due and rental income recognized on a straight-line basis.

acct_label: Straight Line Rent Adjustments
acct_description: Amount of the adjustment to rental revenues to measure escalating leasing revenues on a straight line basis.

acct_label: Tenant Reimbursements (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: In accordance with the provisions of their lease agreement, this element represents allowable charges due a landlord from its tenant. In retail store and office building leases, for example, tenant reimbursements may cover items such as taxes, utilities, and common area expenses.

acct_label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer from Real Estate Owned
acct_description: Value transferred out of real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated depreciation on real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group
acct_description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group.

acct_label: Other Sundry Liabilities
acct_description: The aggregate carrying amount, as of the balance sheets date, of obligations not otherwise itemized or categorized in the footnotes to the financial statements.

acct_label: Payments for Derivative Instrument, Investing Activities
acct_description: The cash outflow for derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Proceeds from Derivative Instrument, Investing Activities
acct_description: The cash inflow provided by derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Cost of Investment in Real Estate Sold
acct_description: Amount of real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Write-down or Reserve, Amount
acct_description: Amount of write-down or reserve recognized in the income statement on real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: Accounts Payable
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

acct_label: Accrual for Taxes Other than Income Taxes, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Accrued Insurance, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable to insurance entities to mitigate potential loss from various risks or to satisfy a promise to provide certain coverage's to employees. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Agricultural Related Inventory, Growing Crops
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of agricultural goods that are not yet mature and thus have not yet been harvested.

acct_label: Area of Real Estate Property
acct_description: Area of a real estate property.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current
acct_description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Agricultural Cooperative Inventory, Amount
acct_description: The carrying amount of members' products at the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Cost of Reimbursable Expense (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost associated with reimbursable income. This occurs when a services entity incurs expenses on behalf of the client and passes through the cost of reimbursable expenses to a client.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Incremental percentage increase (decrease) in the stated rate on a debt instrument.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Contributions by Employer
acct_description: Amount of contributions made by employer into fund established for purposes of making future disbursement to individual in accordance with deferred compensation arrangement.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Employer Contribution (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of payment into the fund established for purposes of making future disbursements to the individual in accordance with the terms and understanding of the deferred compensation arrangement.

acct_label: Debt Issuance Costs, Current, Net
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

acct_label: Deferred Gain on Sale of Property
acct_description: Amount of gain on the sale of property that does not qualify for gain recognition as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Employee Bonuses
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from employee bonuses.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Increase (Decrease) for Plan Amendment
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from change in terms of existing plan or initiation of new plan.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employers Matching Contribution, Annual Vesting Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of employer's matching contributions to a defined contribution plan that vests in a given year.

acct_label: Deposit Assets
acct_description: The carrying amount of the asset transferred to a third party to serve as a deposit, which typically serves as security against failure by the transferor to perform under terms of an agreement.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Long Lived Assets (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount classified as long lived assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

acct_label: Escrow Deposit Disbursements Related to Property Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of escrow deposit disbursements related to property acquisition in noncash investing or financing transactions.

acct_label: Long-term Debt of Registrant, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Year Three (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt of the registrant maturing in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year.

acct_label: Long-term Debt of Registrant, Maturities, Repayments of Principal after Year Five (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt of the registrant maturing after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year.

acct_label: Long-term Debt of Registrant, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Year Five (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt of the registrant maturing in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year.

acct_label: Long-term Debt of Registrant, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Year Four (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt of the registrant maturing in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year.

acct_label: Long-term Debt of Registrant, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Year Two (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt of the registrant maturing in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year.

acct_label: Long-term Debt of Registrant, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Next Twelve Months (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt of the registrant maturing in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Interest in Projects
acct_description: Gain (loss) included in earnings resulting from the sale of interest in projects.

acct_label: Gain on Business Interruption Insurance Recovery
acct_description: The net amount (to the extent disclosed within this portion of the income statement) by which an insurance settlement exceeds incremental costs incurred from the event causing an interruption of business, plus the insurance award for earnings lost from the event, such as a natural catastrophe, explosion or fire.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt, before Write off of Debt Issuance Cost
acct_description: Reflects the difference between the fair value of payments made to legally extinguish a debt and its carrying value at that time. This item excludes the write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance costs.

acct_label: Income Tax Effects Allocated Directly to Equity, Employee Stock Options
acct_description: The tax effects of employee stock option transactions that are recognized differently for financial reporting and tax purposes, occurring during the period and charged or credited directly to shareholders' equity.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Exempt Income, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Domestic, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to domestic income tax settlement.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Pension Costs (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in obligations for pension benefits attributed to past service that have not yet been expensed.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes Payable, Net of Income Taxes Receivable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to taxing authorities for taxes that are based on the reporting entity's earnings, net of amounts receivable from taxing authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Operating Capital
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all assets and liabilities used in operating activities.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Obligation, Other Postretirement Benefits
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for other postretirement benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit and defined contribution plans. Excludes pension benefits.

acct_label: Investment Income, Nonoperating
acct_description: The aggregate amount of income from investments (for example, dividends) not considered a component of the entity's core operations.

acct_label: Members' Equity
acct_description: Amount of ownership interest in limited liability company (LLC), attributable to the parent entity.

acct_label: Operating Lease, Impairment Loss
acct_description: Amount of loss from impairment of right-of-use asset from operating lease.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Initial Direct Costs
acct_description: Costs that are essential to acquiring the lease and would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement, including evaluating the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and costs incurred negotiating, processing, and closing the lease agreement.

acct_label: Other Cost of Operating Revenue
acct_description: Other costs incurred during the reporting period related to other revenue generating activities.

acct_label: Other General Expense
acct_description: Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

acct_label: Other Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Liability, Other Retirement Benefits
acct_description: Amount of liability for retirement benefits, classified as other.

acct_label: Liability, Other Retirement Benefits, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of liability, classified as noncurrent, for retirement benefits, classified as other.

acct_label: Other Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount, after sales adjustments, returns, allowances, and discounts, of revenue classified as other.

acct_label: Payments for Loans
acct_description: Cash payments for and related to principal collection on loans related to operating activities.

acct_label: Payments of Capital Distribution
acct_description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

acct_label: Payments of Loan Costs
acct_description: The cash outflow for loan origination associated cost which is usually collected through escrow.

acct_label: Payments of Merger Related Costs, Financing Activities
acct_description: The cash outflow for financing costs associated with business combinations.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Mineral Rights
acct_description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a mineral right which is the right to extract a mineral from the earth or to receive payment, in the form of royalty, for the extraction of minerals.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

acct_label: Proceeds from Contributions from Parent
acct_description: The cash inflow from parent as a source of financing that is recorded as additional paid in capital.

acct_label: Proceeds from Deposits on Real Estate Sales
acct_description: Cash inflow related to amounts received in advance from a potential buyer showing or confirming an intention to complete an acquisition of land, buildings, other structures, or any item classified as real estate.

acct_label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution, Return of Capital
acct_description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.

acct_label: Proceeds from Rents Received
acct_description: Cash received for rents during the current period.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Land Held-for-use
acct_description: The cash inflow from the sale of land held for use; excludes sales of land held as inventory or investments.

acct_label: Ratio of Indebtedness to Net Capital
acct_description: Indebtedness divided by net capital.

acct_label: Repayments of Medium-term Notes
acct_description: The cash outflow to pay off borrowing used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

acct_label: Retail Land Sales, Deposit Method, Deposit Received
acct_description: This element represents the amount of deposit received in a retail land sale transaction accounted for under the deposit method.

acct_label: Retained Patronage Allocations
acct_description: Amount of patronage earnings retained within the agricultural cooperative.

acct_label: Sales and Excise Tax Payable
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Additional Shares Authorized
acct_description: Number of additional shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Other Share Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Other than shares newly issued, the number of additional shares issued (for example, a stock split) or canceled (for example, to correct a share issuance), during the period under the plan.

acct_label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
acct_description: Value of forfeited shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Trading Securities, Realized Gain
acct_description: This item represents the gain realized during the period from the sale of trading securities.

acct_label: Trading Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) realized from securities classified as trading.

acct_label: Trading Securities, Realized Loss
acct_description: This item represents the loss realized during the period from the sale of trading securities.

acct_label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Retired
acct_description: Number of shares of common and preferred stock retired from treasury during the period.

acct_label: Undistributed Earnings, Basic
acct_description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Asset, Amount
acct_description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to disposition of asset. Includes, but is not limited to, intra-entity transfer of asset other than inventory.

acct_label: Inventory, Firm Purchase Commitment, Loss
acct_description: Amount of loss recognized on firm purchase commitment for inventory.

acct_label: Payments for Rent
acct_description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Award Vesting Rights, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of vesting of award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Asset, Interest Carryforward
acct_description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible interest carryforward.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Asset, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to disposition of asset. Includes, but is not limited to, intra-entity transfer of asset other than inventory.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation,Other Reconciling Items, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference, between reported income tax expense (benefit) and the expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, that is attributable to tax exempt income, equity in earnings (loss) of an unconsolidated subsidiary, minority interest income (expense), tax holiday, disposition of a business, disposition of an asset, repatriation of foreign earnings, repatriation of foreign earnings jobs creation act of 2004, change in enacted tax rate, prior year income taxes, change in deferred tax asset valuation allowance, and other adjustments.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Aggregate Intrinsic Value, Vested
acct_description: Intrinsic value of vested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Income Tax Deficiency from Share-based Compensation
acct_description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax deficiency associated with a share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Capital Leases, Income Statement, Interest Expense
acct_description: The financing charge for leasing arrangements meeting the criteria for capitalization.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedges Derivative Instruments at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Net fair value of all derivative instruments designated as cash flow hedging instruments, which is ordinarily reflected within other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Consolidation, Less than Wholly Owned Subsidiary, Parent Ownership Interest, Changes, Additional Interest Issued to Parent
acct_description: Represents a (noncash) issuance of additional equity interests to the parent by a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The additional equity interest represented by this element increases the parent's controlling interest in the subsidiary.

acct_label: Construction in Progress Expenditures Incurred but Not yet Paid
acct_description: Future cash outflow to pay for construction in progress expenditures that have occurred.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, before Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer, when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

acct_label: Contribution of Property
acct_description: Value of property contributed in noncash investing and financing activities.

acct_label: Cost Method Investments, Original Cost
acct_description: Original amount of cost-method investments at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Premium
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt premium.

acct_label: Debt Issuance Costs, Line of Credit Arrangements, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Derivative Instruments
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from derivative instruments.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Subject to Expiration
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards that are subject to expiration dates.

acct_label: Derivative Asset
acct_description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

acct_label: Derivative, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
acct_description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Gain (Loss), Net
acct_description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) of derivative instruments not designated or qualifying as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Distribution Made to Member or Limited Partner, Cash Distributions Paid (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of cash distributions paid to a common shareholder or unit-holder by a LLC or LP.

acct_label: Due to Related Parties, Noncurrent
acct_description: Portion of the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties that is payable after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Noncontrolling Interest Income (Loss), Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to noncontrolling interest income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Other, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

acct_label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount Capitalized
acct_description: Amount of cost capitalized for award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset Transfers Into Level 3
acct_description: Amount of transfer of financial instrument classified as an asset into level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Transfers out of Level 3
acct_description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as an asset out of level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Discontinuation of Cash Flow Hedge Due to Forecasted Transaction Probable of Not Occurring, Net
acct_description: The amount of net gain (loss) reclassified into earnings in the period when cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable, Related Parties
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due to the reporting entity for good and services provided to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management, an entity and its principal owners, management, member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Margin Deposits Outstanding
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in money or securities placed with a broker or counterparty as security for a trading or derivative position.

acct_label: Lease Income
acct_description: Amount of lease income from operating, direct financing, and sales-type leases. Includes, but is not limited to, variable lease payments, interest income, profit (loss) recognized at commencement, and lease payments paid and payable to lessor.

acct_label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four and Five
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth and fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two and Three
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second and third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Loss on Discontinuation of Cash Flow Hedge Due to Forecasted Transaction Probable of Not Occurring
acct_description: The amount of loss reclassified into earnings in the period when cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

acct_label: Margin Deposit Assets
acct_description: The amount of cash or securities placed with a broker or counterparty as security for a trading or derivatives securities position which was partially obtained with funds provided by the broker dealer.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Interest Rate Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of interest rate derivatives, which relates to the currency amount specified in the interest rate derivative instruments.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Sales Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from the sale of oil and gas during the period.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Future Minimum Sublease Rentals
acct_description: Contractually required future rental payments receivable on noncancelable subleasing arrangements.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Sublease Revenue
acct_description: The amount of revenue recognized for the period under subleasing arrangements.

acct_label: Other Receivables, Gross, Current
acct_description: Amount, before allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Payments for Commissions
acct_description: The amount of cash paid for commissions during the current period.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Oil and Gas Equipment
acct_description: The cash outflow to purchase long lived physical asset use for the normal oil and gas operations and not intended for resale.

acct_label: Percentage of Debt Hedged by Interest Rate Derivatives
acct_description: Percentage of an entity's outstanding debt that is designated as a hedged item in cash flow, fair value, or net investment hedge.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance Initial Public Offering
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Limited Partners Units
acct_description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common limited partners units during the period.

acct_label: Proceeds from Limited Partnership Investments
acct_description: Cash inflow received as distributions, returns of capital, or sale proceeds from partnership interests held for investment purposes.

acct_label: Proceeds from Secured Notes Payable
acct_description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

acct_label: Related Party Costs
acct_description: Direct costs arising from transactions with related parties who are not affiliates or joint Ventures. These costs are categorized as cost of goods sold.

acct_label: Revenue Not from Contract with Customer, Other
acct_description: Amount of revenue that is not accounted for under Topic 606, classified as other.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Intersegment Revenue (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenue from transactions with other operating segments of the same entity.

acct_label: Sales Revenue from Energy Commodities and Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue derived from energy-related services such supplying various forms of energy (such as steam, electricity and chilled water from the operation of on-site facilities or cogeneration plants), procurement services provided to energy purchasers, and the marketing and trading of energy commodities and derivatives.

acct_label: Selling and Marketing Expense
acct_description: The aggregate total amount of expenses directly related to the marketing or selling of products or services.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Compensation Cost (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Equity-based compensation cost during the period with respect to the award, which will be recognized in income (as well as the total recognized tax benefit) or capitalized as part of the cost of an asset.

acct_label: Variable Lease, Income
acct_description: Amount of variable lease payments from operating, direct financing, and sales-type leases, excluding amount included in measurement of lease receivable.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Not Subject to Expiration
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards that are not subject to expiration dates.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Share-based Arrangements, Liability, Current and Noncurrent
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements.

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payments to be Received
acct_description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor for operating lease.

acct_label: Derivative, Collateral, Obligation to Return Cash
acct_description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets.

acct_label: Accounts and Other Receivables, Net, Current
acct_description: Amount, after allowance, receivable from customers, clients, or other third-parties, and receivables classified as other due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Accounts Payable (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Other (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, which are not elsewhere specified in the taxonomy. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Other, Current
acct_description: Amount of obligations incurred classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Accumulated Deferred Investment Tax Credit
acct_description: The noncurrent portion of the reserve for accumulated deferred investment tax credits as of the balance sheet date. This is the remaining investment credit, which will reduce the cost of services collected from ratepayers by a ratable portion over the investment's regulatory life.

acct_label: Amortization of Regulatory Asset
acct_description: The expense charged against earnings during the period to allocate the capitalized costs of regulatory assets over the periods expected to benefit from such costs.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Long Lived (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Long-lived assets that are held for sale apart from normal operations and anticipated to be sold in less than one year.

acct_label: Cash Dividends (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Cash dividend declared by an entity to shareholders during the period. This element includes paid and unpaid dividends declared during the period.

acct_label: Cost of Purchased Power (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost of electricity purchased as well as fuel used to generate electricity used in operations and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of Initial Adoption of FIN 48 (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative net-of-tax effect of initial adoption of FIN 48 - Accounting for Uncertainty in Income Taxes on the opening balance of retained earnings. The cumulative-effect adjustment does not include items that would not be recognized in earnings, such as the effect of adopting this Interpretation on tax positions related to business combinations. The amount of that cumulative-effect adjustment is the difference between the net amount of assets and liabilities recognized in the statement of financial position prior to the application of this Interpretation and the net amount of assets and liabilities recognized as a result of applying the provisions of this Interpretation.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Dividends, Cash
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash dividends declared for classes of stock, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred.

acct_label: Dividends, Preferred Stock
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

acct_label: Fuel Costs
acct_description: Fuel costs incurred that are directly related to goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deposits Outstanding
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in monies given as security or collateral for items acquired or borrowed on a temporary basis. Deposits may also be paid as initial payment of the cost of acquisition or for the right to enter into a contract or agreement.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Regulatory Assets
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of other assets that are created when regulatory agencies permits public utilities to defer costs to the balance sheet.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Regulatory Assets and Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of assets that are created when regulatory agencies permits public utilities to defer costs (revenues) to the balance sheet. This element is a the increase (decrease) of regulatory assets and liabilities combined.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Regulatory Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in regulated liabilities. Regulated liabilities are created when regulatory agency permits an entity to defer revenues to the balance sheet.

acct_label: Interest Payable (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of [accrued] interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred and is unpaid. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Liability Above Market for Nonutility Generator Contracts, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Electric utility liability attributable to above market contracts with NUGs (nonutility generators), which are due to deregulation of the utility's generation business.

acct_label: Long-term Pollution Control Bond, Noncurrent
acct_description: Noncurrent portion of a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

acct_label: Other Adjustments for Noncash Items Included in Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Transactions that result in no cash inflows or outflows in the period in which they occur, but affect net income and thus are removed when calculating net cash flow from operating activities using the indirect method. This element is used when there is not a more specific and appropriate element.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Amortization, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Prior Service Cost Recognized in Net Periodic Pension Cost, Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Tax effect of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for prior service costs recognized as a component of net period benefit cost.

acct_label: Payments of Debt Restructuring Costs
acct_description: The cash outflow for cost incurred in the modification of term of existing debt agreement in order for the entity to achieve some advantage.

acct_label: Pension and Other Postretirement Defined Benefit Plans, Noncurrent Liabilities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: For classified balance sheets this represents the noncurrent liability for underfunded plans recognized in the balance sheet that is associated with the defined benefit pension plans and other postretirement defined benefit plans. For unclassified balance sheets, this represents the entire liability recognized in the balance sheet that is associated with the defined benefit plans.

acct_label: Preferred Stock Redemption Premium
acct_description: The excess of (1) fair value of the consideration transferred to the holders of the preferred stock over (2) the carrying amount of the preferred stock in the registrant's balance sheet, during the accounting period.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Notes Payable
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Distribution
acct_description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to utility distribution.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Transmission
acct_description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to utility transmission owned by public utility.

acct_label: Recognition of Deferred Revenue
acct_description: The amount of previously reported deferred or unearned revenue that was recognized as revenue during the period. For cash flows, this element primarily pertains to amortization of deferred credits on long-term arrangements. As a noncash item, it is deducted from net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

acct_label: Taxes, Miscellaneous
acct_description: All taxes not related to income of the entity or excise or sales taxes levied on the revenue of the entity that are not reported elsewhere. These taxes could include production, real estate, personal property, and pump tax.

acct_label: Taxes Other than Income, Excise, Production and Property Taxes (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Taxes other than income taxes, if not included elsewhere, that could include, property tax or other selling and distribution-related taxes.

acct_label: Taxes Payable (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Utilities Operating Expense, Maintenance and Operations
acct_description: Amount of operating expense for routine plant maintenance, repairs and operations of regulated operation.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Convertible Debt with Conversion Feature
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from recognition of deferred taxes for convertible debt with a beneficial conversion feature.

acct_label: Assets, Fair Value Disclosure, Recurring (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the aggregate of the assets reported on the balance sheet at period end measured at fair value on a recurring basis by the entity. This element is intended to be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investments in debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the acquisition-date fair value of the total consideration transferred which consists of the sum of the acquisition-date fair values of the assets transferred by the acquirer, the liabilities incurred by the acquirer to former owners of the acquiree, and the equity interests issued by the acquirer.

acct_label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred, Liabilities Incurred
acct_description: Amount of liabilities incurred by the acquirer as part of consideration transferred in a business combination.

acct_label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred, Other
acct_description: Amount of tangible or intangible assets, including a business or subsidiary of the acquirer transferred by the entity to the former owners of the acquiree. Excludes cash.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration Arrangements, Range of Outcomes, Value, High
acct_description: For contingent consideration arrangements recognized in connection with a business combination, this element represents an estimate of the high-end of the potential range (undiscounted) of the consideration which may be paid.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration Arrangements, Range of Outcomes, Value, Low
acct_description: For contingent consideration arrangements and indemnification assets recognized in connection with a business combination, this element represents an estimate of the low-end of the potential range (undiscounted) of the consideration which may be paid.

acct_label: Business Combination, Provisional Information, Initial Accounting Incomplete, Adjustment, Consideration Transferred
acct_description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to items of consideration transferred in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Indefinite-Lived Intangible Assets
acct_description: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, that lack physical substance, having a projected indefinite period of benefit, acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Noncurrent Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of liabilities due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired, Goodwill, and Liabilities Assumed, Less Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount recognized as of the acquisition date for the assets, including goodwill, in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed, less the noncontrolling interest in the acquiree.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Refund Liability
acct_description: Amount of liability for consideration received or receivable from customer which is not included in transaction price, when consideration is expected to be refunded to customer.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Carrying Amount of Equity Component
acct_description: The carrying amount of the equity component of convertible debt which may be settled in cash upon conversion.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Conversion Price (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The price per share of the conversion feature embedded in the debt instrument.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Effective Interest Rate (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The effective interest rate on the liability component of convertible debt instrument which may be settled in cash upon conversion, including partial cash settlement.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Remaining Discount Amortization Period (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Remaining amortization period for any discount on the liability component of convertible debt which may be settled in cash upon conversion.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Principal Outstanding (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of outstanding principal due under the debt instrument at the end of the reporting period, before deducting unamortized discount or premium, if any.

acct_label: Deferred Tax and Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting, and liabilities classified as noncurrent and other.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance, Current
acct_description: Amount of valuation allowance of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards, classified as current.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of valuation allowance of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Deferred Taxes, Business Combination, Valuation Allowance, Available to Reduce Goodwill
acct_description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded in a business combination against deductible temporary differences for which related tax benefits will be recorded as a reduction of the acquired entity's goodwill if those tax benefits become realizable.

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities, Level 1 to Level 2 Transfers, Amount
acct_description: Amount of transfers of liabilities measured on a recurring basis out of Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 2.

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities, Level 2 to Level 1 Transfers, Amount
acct_description: Amount of transfers of liabilities measured on a recurring basis out of Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 1.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Liability, Transfers Into Level 3
acct_description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a liability into level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Liability, Transfers out of Level 3
acct_description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a liability out of level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Other Investments
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) included in earnings for investments classified as other.

acct_label: Goodwill, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Other Changes (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of other (increase) decrease of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Income Tax Credits and Adjustments
acct_description: A credit or adjustment for government or taxing authority authorized decrease in taxes owed as a result of meeting certain tax policy conditions.

acct_label: Income Tax Examination, Increase (Decrease) in Liability from Prior Year
acct_description: The amount the liability recorded for the income tax examination increased or decreased in the current year/accounting period.

acct_label: Income Tax Examination, Penalties and Interest Accrued
acct_description: The amount of estimated penalties and interest accrued as of the balance sheet date arising from income tax examinations.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Dividends, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Restructuring Charges, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible restructuring charges.

acct_label: Long-term Purchase Commitment, Amount
acct_description: The minimum amount the entity agreed to spend under the long-term purchase commitment.

acct_label: Marketable Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Other Commitment
acct_description: Minimum amount of other commitment not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Excludes commitments explicitly modeled in the taxonomy, including but not limited to, long-term and short-term purchase commitments, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, supply commitments, registration payment arrangements, leases, debt, product warranties, guarantees, environmental remediation obligations, and pensions.

acct_label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Gain (Loss) Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for actuarial gain (loss) recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost.

acct_label: Other Inventory, Materials, Supplies and Merchandise under Consignment, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount of inventory owned by the entity but in the hands of a customer, typically a reseller.

acct_label: Other Tax Carryforward, Gross Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

acct_label: Payments for Software
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with the development, modification or acquisition of software programs or applications for internal use (that is, not to be sold, leased or otherwise marketed to others) that qualify for capitalization.

acct_label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends
acct_description: Cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests, generally out of earnings.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, No Par Value
acct_description: Face amount per share of no-par value preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Purchase Commitment, Remaining Minimum Amount Committed
acct_description: Minimum amount to be expended to satisfy the terms of arrangements in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services, excluding long-term purchase commitments or unconditional purchase obligations.

acct_label: Repayments of Subordinated Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow from the repayment of long-term borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in case of liquidation of the entity's assets or underlying collateral.

acct_label: Restructuring Costs
acct_description: Amount, after cash payment, of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

acct_label: Restructuring Reserve, Settled without Cash
acct_description: Amount of decrease in the reserve for full or partial settlement through consideration other than cash.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested in Period, Fair Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value of options vested. Excludes equity instruments other than options, for example, but not limited to, share units, stock appreciation rights, restricted stock.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Percentage of Outstanding Stock Maximum
acct_description: Maximum number of shares that may be issued in accordance with the plan as a proportion of outstanding capital stock.

acct_label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Amount
acct_description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

acct_label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Deferred Tax Asset (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax asset, before valuation allowance, attributable to deductible other tax carryforwards.

acct_label: Treasury Stock, Retired, Cost Method, Amount
acct_description: Amount of decrease of par value, additional paid in capital (APIC) and retained earnings of common and preferred stock retired from treasury when treasury stock is accounted for under the cost method.

acct_label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Par Value Method
acct_description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the par value method.

acct_label: Senior Notes
acct_description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of Notes with the highest claim on the assets of the issuer in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Senior note holders are paid off in full before any payments are made to junior note holders.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Liability, Current
acct_description: Amount of tax liability from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as current.

acct_label: Accrued Bonuses, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for incentive compensation awarded to employees and directors or earned by them based on the terms of one or more relevant arrangements. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessor Balance Sheet, Net Investment in Sales Type Leases, Current
acct_description: The net amount due within one year of the balance sheet date or the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments on sales type leases and (b) unguaranteed residual value; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessor Balance Sheet, Net Investment in Sales Type Leases, Noncurrent
acct_description: The net amount due after one year of the balance sheet date or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments on sales type leases, and (b) unguaranteed residual value; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Loss Reserves
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from loss reserves other than estimated credit losses.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Maximum Annual Contributions Per Employee, Amount
acct_description: Maximum amount the employee may contribute to a defined contribution plan.

acct_label: Environmental Costs Recognized, Capitalized in Period
acct_description: Amount of environmental remediation costs capitalized. These expenditures may relate to long-lived improvements in operating facilities.

acct_label: Hedging Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the liability arising from a financial instrument or a contract used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), and which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Lessee, Assets under Capital Lease
acct_description: The amount, during the lease term, of each minimum [capital] lease payment allocated to interest expense so as to produce a constant periodic rate of interest on the remaining balance of the capital lease obligation.

acct_label: Interest Income (Expense), after Provision for Loan Loss
acct_description: Amount of interest income or expense, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, including consideration of the provisions for loan, lease, credit, and other related losses.

acct_label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Incurred Claims (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Total provision in the period for claims incurred and costs incurred in the claim settlement process.

acct_label: Payments for Other Deposits
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for deposits classified as other.

acct_label: Postemployment Benefits, Period Expense
acct_description: Period expense related to postemployment benefits.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Other Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of long-term debt classified as other.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Treasury Stock
acct_description: The cash inflow from the issuance of an equity stock that has been previously reacquired by the entity.

acct_label: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
acct_description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

acct_label: Recycling Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from collecting, reselling and reprocessing used or waste materials into new products or materials.

acct_label: Related Party Deposit Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of deposits held by the entity for a related party (entity, shareholder, employee).

acct_label: Repayments of Other Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Sales Revenue, Services, Other (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowances and discounts of service revenue classified as other.

acct_label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Option, Exercise Price Range, Upper Range Limit
acct_description: The ceiling of a customized range of exercise prices for purposes of disclosing shares potentially issuable under outstanding stock option awards on all stock option plans and other required information pertaining to awards in the customized range.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Stock Split, Conversion Ratio (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the conversion ratio used in the calculation of a stock split.

acct_label: Unusual or Infrequent Item, or Both, Insurance Proceeds
acct_description: Amount of insurance proceeds for an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable from Securitization
acct_description: The amount owed to the reporting entity by counterparties in securitized loan transactions.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Increase (decrease) in the accrual for environmental loss contingencies during the reporting period.

acct_label: Accrued Capping, Closure, Post-closure and Environmental Costs, Noncurrent
acct_description: The estimated amount of costs required as of the balance sheet date to comply with regulatory requirements pertaining to the retirement of a waste management facility, which will be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant and Equipment, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of property, plant and equipment.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Preexisting Relationship, Gain (Loss) Recognized (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Income (expense) and gain (loss) recognized from the settlement of a preexisting relationship between the acquirer and the acquiree.

acct_label: Business Combination, Acquisition of Less than 100 Percent, Noncontrolling Interest, Fair Value
acct_description: This element represents the fair value of the noncontrolling interest in the acquiree at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net gains or losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified to revenues from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Commercial Paper, Current (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of unsecured obligations issued by the entity to investors. The maturities of these money market securities generally do not exceed 270 days.

acct_label: Common Stock, Shares Held in Employee Trust
acct_description: Value of common stock issued to a trust (for example, but not limited to, rabbi trust) set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees.

acct_label: Contributions from Noncontrolling Interests (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from contributions from noncontrolling interests in an investment.

acct_label: Convertible Preferred Dividends, Net of Tax
acct_description: The after-tax amount of any dividends on convertible preferred stock.

acct_label: Cost-method Investments, Realized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: This item represents the gain (loss) realized during the period from the sale of investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting and any losses recognized thereon for impairments of other than a temporary nature.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Depreciation and Amortization (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Depreciation of property, plant and equipment directly related to goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Excluding Depreciation, Depletion, and Amortization (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold during the reporting period, excluding depreciation, depletion, and amortization.

acct_label: Credit Derivative, Current Fair Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Discloses the fair value of the credit derivative (or each group of similar credit derivatives) as of the date of the statement of financial position.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle Presented on Income Statement, before Tax (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The pretax effect on net income of a change in accounting principle reported on the income statement in the period, which occurred before retrospective adjustments were required.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of Initial Adoption of FAS 158 (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative effect of initial adoption of Statement of Financial Accounting Standard 158 (FAS No. 158), Employers' Accounting for Defined Benefit Pension and Other Postretirement Plans on beginning retained earnings, net of tax.

acct_label: Debt Conversion, Converted Instrument, Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The value of the financial instrument(s) that the original debt is being converted into in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Debt Conversion, Converted Instrument, Shares Issued (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The number of shares issued in exchange for the original debt being converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Increase, Additional Borrowings (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Increase of additional borrowings on existing and new debt instruments.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Redemption Price, Percentage
