acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Year One
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, without Single Maturity Date, Amortized Cost
acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, without Single Maturity Date, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Equity Securities
acct_description: Amount of equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor as trading.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Unrealized Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The net amount of gross unrealized gains (losses) for securities, at a point in time, which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

acct_label: Cash, FDIC Insured Amount
acct_description: The amount of cash deposited in financial institutions as of the balance sheet date that is insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

acct_label: Ceded Premiums Earned
acct_description: Amount of earned premiums ceded to other entities.

acct_label: Ceded Premiums, Life Insurance in Force (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of life insurance in force premiums ceded to other entities.

acct_label: Contracts in Force Subject to Participation through Reinsurance, Ratio
acct_description: Ratio of insurance contracts that are subject to reinsurance participation to all contracts in force.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

acct_label: Debt Issuance Cost, Gross, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs, Amortization Expense
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for deferred policy acquisition costs.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs and Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Net
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Deferred Sales Inducement Cost, Amortization Expense
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for deferred sales inducement cost.

acct_label: Deferred Sale Inducement Cost
acct_description: Amount of deferred sale inducement cost capitalized on contract remaining in force.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Policyholder Liabilities
acct_description: The tax effect as of the balance sheet date of the amount of the estimated future tax deductions arising from estimated policyholder reserves, which will be deductible from future taxable income when actual costs are incurred, and which can only be realized if sufficient tax-basis income is generated in future periods to enable the tax deduction to be taken.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense, Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
acct_description: The amount as of the balance sheet date of the estimated future tax effects attributable to policy acquisition costs being expensed for tax purposes but capitalized in conformity with generally accepted accounting principles, which will reverse in future periods when amortization of such capitalized costs cannot be deducted for tax purposes.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Effect of Plan Amendment on Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of increase or decrease in net periodic benefit cost related to the effects of a change in the substantive terms of an existing defined benefit plan or the initiation of a new plan. A plan amendment may increase or decrease benefits, including those attributed to years of service already rendered.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Credit), Increase (Decrease) for Plan Amendment
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in net periodic benefit cost from effect of change in substantive term of existing defined benefit plan or initiation of new defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Deposits Assets
acct_description: Carrying value of amounts transferred to third parties for security purposes that are expected to be returned or applied towards payment in the future.

acct_label: Derivative Asset, Notional Amount
acct_description: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payments on the derivative asset.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments, Gain (Loss) Reclassification from Accumulated OCI to Income, Estimated Net Amount to be Transferred
acct_description: The estimated value of gains (losses), net anticipated to be transferred in the future from accumulated other comprehensive income into earnings.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments, Gain Reclassified from Accumulated OCI into Income, Effective Portion
acct_description: The effective portion of gain reclassified from accumulated other comprehensive income into income on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Derivative Liability, Notional Amount
acct_description: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payments on the derivative liability.

acct_label: Derivative, Notional Amount
acct_description: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payment on derivative.

acct_label: Direct Operating Costs
acct_description: The aggregate direct operating costs incurred during the reporting period.

acct_label: Direct Premiums Earned
acct_description: Amount, before premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

acct_label: Direct Premiums, Life Insurance in Force (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount, before premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of life insurance in force premiums.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Other, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other tax credits.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Debt Structure, Direct Loan, Employer Cash Payments Used for Debt Service
acct_description: The amount of cash provided by the employer through contributions or dividends that the ESOP used in the period to repay debt and interest on a third-party loan made directly to the ESOP.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Deferred Shares, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of unearned shares held by the employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Gain (Loss) on Transactions in Deferred Shares
acct_description: The difference between cost and fair value added or subtracted from paid-in capital, arising from contribution of shares to an ESOP or commitments-to-release ESOP shares.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Number of Allocated Shares
acct_description: The shares or units in an ESOP trust that have been assigned to individual participant accounts based on a known formula. IRS rules require allocations to be nondiscriminatory generally based on compensation, length of service, or a combination of both. For any particular participant such shares or units may be vested, unvested, or partially vested.

acct_label: Estimated Insurance Recoveries
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts expected to be recovered under the terms of insurance contracts.

acct_label: Fair Value, Level 1 to level 2 Transfers, Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the transfers of assets or liabilities measured on a recurring basis out of Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 2.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Net Derivative Asset (Liability) Measured on Recurring Basis with Unobservable Inputs
acct_description: Fair value of financial instrument classified as derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
acct_description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

acct_label: Gain Contingency, Unrecorded Amount
acct_description: The amount or range of possible amounts of gain that could be realized upon the resolution of a contingency.

acct_label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Credit Card Portfolio
acct_description: The gain (loss) resulting from the sale of credit card receivables (portfolios).

acct_label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Other Real Estate
acct_description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of other real estate owned, increases (decreases) in the valuation allowance for foreclosed real estate, and write-downs of other real estate owned after acquisition or physical possession.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the balance sheet value of capitalized sales costs that are associated with acquiring a new insurance customers.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Insurance Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in insurance liabilities classified as other.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Policyholder Funds
acct_description: The change in other policyholder funds recorded on the balance sheet, which is needed to adjust net income to arrive at net cash flows provided by or used in operations.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Self Insurance Reserve
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's' compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property.

acct_label: Insurance Settlements Receivable, Current
acct_description: Amount due in settlement of a claim for reimbursement from an insurance company when the Company has suffered a loss covered under an insurance policy. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Interest Credited to Policy Owner Account
acct_description: Amount of expense for unpaid portion of interest credited to policy owner account.

acct_label: Interest Credited to Policy Owner Accounts (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The adjustment required to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operations related to the unpaid portion of interest credited to policy owner accounts.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Borrowings
acct_description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all borrowings.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Debt, Excluding Amortization
acct_description: Represents the portion of interest incurred in the period on debt arrangements that was charged against earnings, excluding amortization of debt discount (premium) and financing costs.

acct_label: Interest Rate Fair Value Hedge Asset at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative assets designated as interest rate fair value hedging instruments.

acct_label: Interest Rate Fair Value Hedge Liability at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative liabilities designated as interest rate fair value hedging instruments.

acct_label: Inventory, LIFO Reserve, Effect on Income, Net
acct_description: The difference between the change in the inventory reserve representing the cumulative difference in cost between the first in, first out and the last in, first out inventory valuation methods and any LIFO decrement which have been reflected in the statement of income during the period.

acct_label: Inventory, LIFO Reserve, Period Charge
acct_description: The change in the inventory reserve representing the cumulative difference in cost between the first in, first out and the last in, first out inventory valuation methods, which change has been reflected in the statement of income during the period.

acct_label: Inventory, Real Estate, Other
acct_description: Amount of investment in certain other real estate investments not specifically identified elsewhere in the existing taxonomy.

acct_label: Investment Income, Investment Expense
acct_description: Amount of expenses related to the generation of investment income.

acct_label: Leveraged Leases, Net Investment in Leveraged Leases Disclosure, Residual Value of Leased Assets
acct_description: The estimate of the value of the leased asset at the end of the lease term.

acct_label: Liability for Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
acct_description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date, whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits and Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
acct_description: The aggregate amount of policy reserves (provided for future obligations including unpaid claims and claims adjustment expenses) and policy benefits (liability for future policy benefits) as of the balance sheet date; grouped amount of all the liabilities associated with the company's insurance policies.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Individual and Group Annuities and Supplementary Contracts
acct_description: Amount of accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events under individual and group annuities and supplementary insurance contracts.

acct_label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Net
acct_description: Liability as of the balance sheet date for amounts representing estimated cost of settling unpaid claims under the terms of the underlying insurance policies, less estimated reinsurance recoveries on such claims. This includes an estimate for claims which have been incurred but not reported. Claim adjustment expenses represent the costs estimated to be incurred in the settlement of unpaid claims.

acct_label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of increase (decrease) in the liability for unpaid claims and claims adjustment expense.

acct_label: Life Insurance in Force, Assumed
acct_description: Amount of life insurance issued and outstanding assumed from other entities. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

acct_label: Life Insurance in Force, Ceded
acct_description: Amount of life insurance issued and outstanding ceded to other entities. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

acct_label: Life Insurance in Force, Gross
acct_description: Amount before contracts ceded to other entities and contracts assumed by the entity of life insurance issued and outstanding. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

acct_label: Life Insurance in Force, Net
acct_description: Amount after contracts ceded to other entities and contracts assumed by the entity of life insurance issued and outstanding. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

acct_label: Life Insurance in Force, Percentage Assumed to Net
acct_description: Percentage of assumed life insurance issued and outstanding contracts to life insurance issued and outstanding after contracts ceded to other entities and contracts assumed by the entity. Includes, but not limited to, dividends and adjustments to face value.

acct_label: Life Insurance in Force Premiums, Percentage Assumed to Net (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage of assumed life insurance in force premiums to net premiums.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Collateral Fees, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the fees associated with providing collateral for the credit facility.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Interest Rate During Period
acct_description: The effective interest rate during the reporting period.

acct_label: Loans, Gross, Insurance Policy
acct_description: Amount before allowance of loans made to policy and contract holders using their life insurance contracts' cash value or separate accounts as collateral. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums over and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Net (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes loans held for sale. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Management Fees Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue, comprised of base and incentive revenue derived from the management of joint ventures, managing third-party properties, or another entity's operations.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate
acct_description: Amount of investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

acct_label: Net Investment Income
acct_description: Amount, after investment expense, of income earned from investments in securities and real estate. Includes, but is not limited to, real estate investment, policy loans, dividends, and interest. Excludes realized gain (loss) on investments.

acct_label: Net Investment Income, Insurance Entity, Fixed Maturities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of investment earnings, excluding realized and unrealized gain (loss), recognized in the period on holdings of debt securities having stated maturity dates, net of related investment expenses.

acct_label: Net Investment Income, Insurance Entity, Investment Real Estate (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of investment earnings, excluding realized and unrealized gain (loss), recognized in the period on real estate held for investment purposes, net of related investment expenses.

acct_label: Net Investment Income, Insurance Entity, Mortgage Loans on Real Estate (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of investment earnings, excluding realized and unrealized gain (loss), recognized in the period on holdings of mortgage notes secured by real estate, net of related investment expenses.

acct_label: Net Investment Income, Insurance Entity, Policy Loans (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of investment earnings, excluding realized and unrealized gain (loss), recognized in the period on loans secured by benefits in borrowers' insurance contracts, net of related investment expenses.

acct_label: Net Investment Income, Insurance Entity, Short-term Investments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of investment earnings, excluding realized and unrealized gain (loss), recognized in the period on investments that the entity intends to hold for at less than a year which are not otherwise specified in the disclosed schedule of investments, net of related investment expenses.

acct_label: Nontrade Receivables
acct_description: Carrying amounts due as of the balance sheet date of the sum of amounts receivable other than from customers.

acct_label: Origination of Loans to Employee Stock Ownership Plans
acct_description: The cash outflow to finance the entity's defined contribution plan to acquire shares of the entity. The plan initially holds the shares in a suspense account, which is collateral for the loan. As the plan makes payment on the debt, the shares are released from the suspense account and become available to be allocated to participant accounts.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Pre tax change in accumulated gains and losses from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges, net of reclassifications into earnings during the period. A cash flow hedge is a hedge of the exposure to variability in the cash flows of a recognized asset or liability or a forecasted transaction that is attributable to a particular risk. Includes an entity's share of an equity investee's increase or decrease in deferred hedging gains or losses. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Finalization of Pension and Non-Pension Postretirement Plan Valuation, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Pre-tax gain (loss) adjustment to other comprehensive income resulting from the settlement or curtailment of the entity's defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans. A settlement is defined as a transaction that (a) is an irrevocable action, (b) relieves the employer or plan of a primary responsibility for a pension benefit obligation, and (c) eliminates significant risks related to the obligations and the assets used to effect the settlement. A curtailment is an event that significantly reduces the expected years of future service of present employees or eliminates for a significant number of employees the accrual of defined benefits for some or all of their future services.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Finalization of Pension and Non-Pension Postretirement Plan Valuation, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: After tax gain (loss) adjustment to other comprehensive income resulting from the settlement or curtailment of the entity's defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans. A settlement is defined as a transaction that (a) is an irrevocable action, (b) relieves the employer or plan of a primary responsibility for a pension benefit obligation, and (c) eliminates significant risks related to the obligations and the assets used to effect the settlement. A curtailment is an event that significantly reduces the expected years of future service of present employees or eliminates for a significant number of employees the accrual of defined benefits for some or all of their future services.

acct_label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents Other Comprehensive Income or Loss, Before Tax, for the period. The pretax revenues, expenses, gains, and losses that under generally accepted accounting principles are included in comprehensive income, but excluded from net income. Includes the entity's proportionate share of an investee's equity adjustments for other comprehensive income. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Other General and Administrative Expense
acct_description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

acct_label: Other Inventory, Supplies, Gross
acct_description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of other supplies used within the manufacturing or production process expected to be consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Credit Losses on Debt Securities Held
acct_description: The cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity).

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (loss).

acct_label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

acct_label: Payments for Repurchase of Redeemable Preferred Stock
acct_description: The cash outflow for reacquisition of callable preferred stock.

acct_label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held for investment purposes.

acct_label: Liability, Defined Benefit Plan
acct_description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans.

acct_label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net
acct_description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

acct_label: Policyholder Account Balance
acct_description: Amount due to policyholder. Includes, but is not limited to, unpaid policy dividend, retrospective refund, and undistributed earnings on participating business. Excludes future policy benefit and claim expense.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Redemption Price Per Share
acct_description: The price per share at which the preferred stock of an entity that has priority over common stock in the distribution of dividends and in the event of liquidation of the entity is redeemed or may be called at. The redemption features of this preferred stock are solely within the control of the issuer.

acct_label: Premiums Earned, Net
acct_description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

acct_label: Premiums Earned, Net, Life
acct_description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of life premiums earned.

acct_label: Premiums Earned, Net, Property and Casualty
acct_description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of property and casualty premiums earned.

acct_label: Premiums, Net, Life Insurance in Force (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of life insurance in force premiums.

acct_label: Premiums Receivable, Net
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date due the entity from (a) agents and insureds, (b) uncollected premiums and (c) others, net of the allowance for doubtful accounts.

acct_label: Premiums Receivable, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, due the entity from (a) agents and insureds, (b) uncollected premiums and (c) others, before deducting the allowance for doubtful accounts.

acct_label: Proceeds from Annuities and Investment Certificates
acct_description: The cash inflow from an insurance contract under which the policy holder make a lump sum payment or a series of payments in exchange for periodic payments to the policyholder beginning immediately or at some future date.

acct_label: Proceeds from Delayed Tax Exempt Exchange
acct_description: Cash inflow related to a property which is traded for the promise to provide a replacement like-kind property in the near future also known as a tax deferred exempt exchange.

acct_label: Proceeds from Repayment of Loans by Employee Stock Ownership Plans
acct_description: The cash inflow from the financed defined contribution plan to acquire shares of the entity. The plan initially holds the shares in a suspense account, which is collateral for the loan. As the plan makes payment on the debt, the shares are released from the suspense account and become available to be allocated to participant accounts.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repurchase of) Redeemable Preferred Stock
acct_description: Cash inflows (outflows) from issuing and redeeming redeemable preferred stock; includes convertible and nonconvertible redeemable preferred stock.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The cash inflow from sales of loans that are secured with real estate mortgages and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Real Estate
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other real estate not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

acct_label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Salvage Value, Percentage
acct_description: Stated as a percentage, the estimated or actual value of the asset at the end of its useful life or when it is no longer serviceable (cannot be used for its original purpose) divided by its [historical] capitalized cost.

acct_label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Accumulated Depreciation
acct_description: The amount of accumulated depreciation, by major property class, recorded on property subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Acquisition Through Foreclosure
acct_description: Amount of real estate investments acquired through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Assumed
acct_description: Amount of policy benefits and costs incurred for policies assumed.

acct_label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Ceded
acct_description: Amount of reduction of provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies ceded.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Incurred but Not Reported Claims
acct_description: Estimated amount after valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables, due from reinsurers for incurred claims not yet reported, and claims settlement expenses.

acct_label: Reinsurance Receivables (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount after valuation allowance currently billed or billable under reinsurance contracts.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Including Reinsurance Premium Paid
acct_description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Gross
acct_description: Amount before valuation allowance recoverable under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

acct_label: Retail Related Inventory, Merchandise
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of merchandise inventory purchased by a retailer, wholesaler or distributor and held for future sale.

acct_label: Sales Commissions and Fees
acct_description: Primarily represents commissions incurred in the period based upon the sale by commissioned employees or third parties of the entity's goods or services, and fees for sales assistance or product enhancements performed by third parties (such as a distributor or value added reseller).

acct_label: Self Insurance Reserve
acct_description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions) of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Cumulative Paid Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net
acct_description: Amount, after reinsurance, of paid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense used in claims development for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Incurred but Not Reported (IBNR) Claims Liability, Net
acct_description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of incurred-but-not-reported (IBNR) liabilities plus expected development on reported claims, for claims and allocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Liability for Unpaid Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net
acct_description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of the liability for unpaid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Liability for Unpaid Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net, Not Separately Presented
acct_description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of the liability for unpaid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts for accident years not separately presented in claim development information. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contract, Cumulative Number of Reported Claims
acct_description: Cumulative number of reported claims for short-duration insurance contracts.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in stockholders' equity during the period.

acct_label: Stock Redeemed or Called During Period, Shares
acct_description: Number of stock bought back by the entity at the exercise price or redemption price.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Interest in Subsidiary Earnings
acct_description: Subsidiary earnings portion attributable to temporary equity.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Held-for-sale
acct_description: Amount, before valuation allowance, of accounts receivable held for sale.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

acct_label: Unamortized Loan Commitment and Origination Fees and Unamortized Discounts or Premiums
acct_description: Amount of deferred fees paid by borrowers and unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of loans that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield. Excludes amounts for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Unearned ESOP Shares
acct_description: Fair value of unearned shares for all classes of common stock and nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes the sale of shares or the issuance treasury shares to an ESOP.

acct_label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Employee Stock Ownership Plan Shares Not Committed to be Released
acct_description: Number of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP) shares that have not been committed to be released determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that these shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

acct_label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operations
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies; attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of loan receivable, including, but not limited to, mortgage loans held for investment, finance receivables held for investment, policy loans on insurance contracts.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain
acct_description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Loss
acct_description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Equity Securities, FV-NI
acct_description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

acct_label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Cost
acct_description: Cost of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI). Excludes equity method investment and investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax and after reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification, before Tax, Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, before tax and after reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification, before Tax, Parent
acct_description: Amount, before tax and after reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.

acct_label: Payments for Capital Improvements
acct_description: The cash outflow for acquisition of or capital improvements to properties held for investment (operating, managed, leased) or for use.

acct_label: Property Management Fee Revenue
acct_description: The amount of revenue derived from managing real estate properties.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) deferred policy acquisition costs.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
acct_description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized on contract remaining in force.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost, Capitalization
acct_description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs, Amortization Expense, Accrued Interest
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for deferred policy acquisition costs from accrued interest on unamortized balance.

acct_label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Incurred but Not Reported (IBNR) Claims, Amount
acct_description: Estimated costs as of the balance sheet date of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process for claims that have not yet been submitted to the insurance company for reimbursement.

acct_label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Reported Claims, Amount
acct_description: Costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process for the specified year specifically for claims that have already been submitted to the insurance company for reimbursement.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Branch of FHLB Bank, Amount of Advances
acct_description: Amount of advances from the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Net Premium, Cumulative Increase (Decrease) of Actual Variance from Expected Experience
acct_description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in expected net premium component for liability of future policy benefit from effect of variance from cash flow assumption change for actual experience.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverables on Paid Losses, Gross
acct_description: Amount before valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables on paid losses.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverables on Unpaid Losses, Gross
acct_description: Amount before valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid, and for amounts expected based upon statistical projections and other measures of incurred losses and loss settlement expenses which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Amortized Cost, Current
acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Insurance Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in insurance liability balances during the period.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Derivative Instrument, Financing Activities
acct_description: The net cash outflow or inflow from derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as financing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Proceeds from Fees Received
acct_description: Cash received for fees during the current period. This element excludes cash proceeds from license fees.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Accounts Receivable Securitization
acct_description: Proceeds from (repayments of) securitizations of receivables treated as collateralized borrowings, which are classified as financing transactions.

acct_label: Aggregate Indebtedness (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Total current liabilities of the broker-dealer, less certain exceptions as defined.

acct_label: Aircraft Maintenance, Materials, and Repairs
acct_description: Maintenance costs incurred and directly related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. Includes the cost of inspections and repairs, materials and routine maintenance costs for all aircraft and engines.

acct_label: Aircraft Rental
acct_description: Expenses incurred related to the lease of aircraft from outside third parties that are used in the entity's business operations.

acct_label: Airline, Capacity Purchase Arrangements
acct_description: Costs incurred related to air services provided by third-party transportation companies, including regional affiliates.

acct_label: Airline Related Inventory, Net
acct_description: Net carrying amount, as of the balance sheet date, of expendable merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies to be used primarily in air transport of passengers and freight.

acct_label: Bankruptcy Claims, Amount of Claims Expunged by Bankruptcy Court
acct_description: Amount of bankruptcy claim filed that bankruptcy court has expunged.

acct_label: Bankruptcy Claims, Amount of Claims Filed
acct_description: Amount of bankruptcy claim filed with bankruptcy court.

acct_label: Bankruptcy Claims, Amount of Claims under Review by Management
acct_description: Amount of bankruptcy claim under review by management.

acct_label: Bankruptcy Claims, Number Claims Filed
acct_description: The aggregate number of claims filed with the bankruptcy court.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Sublease Rentals
acct_description: Minimum payments receivable in the future under noncancelable subleases.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Flight Equipment, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets used in the entity's principle business operations, subject to a lease and meeting the criteria for capitalization.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Flight Equipment, Net
acct_description: The net amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets used in the entity's principle business operations, subject to a lease and meeting the criteria for capitalization.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Other Property, Plant, and Equipment, Gross
acct_description: Amount before depreciation of leased long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale meeting the criteria for capitalization, classified as other.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Other Property, Plant, and Equipment, Net
acct_description: Amount after depreciation of leased long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale meeting the criteria for capitalization, classified as other.

acct_label: Cargo and Freight Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from transporting cargo and freight between locations.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Derivative Instrument Assets at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of all asset derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Derivative Instrument Liabilities at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of all liability derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

acct_label: Contractual Interest Expense on Prepetition Liabilities Not Recognized in Statement of Operations
acct_description: The amount of contractual interest expense on prepetition liabilities not included in the statement of operations.

acct_label: Cost of Services, Catering
acct_description: Cost of food and beverage catering for passengers.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Other Expense (Income)
acct_description: Amount of expense (income) related to reorganization items classified as other.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Pension and Other Postretirement Related Charges
acct_description: Amount of reorganization items related to pension and other postretirement related charges.

acct_label: Deferred Air Traffic Revenue, Current
acct_description: Value of revenue deferred or cost to provide future services associated with points or miles outstanding and awards that expect to be redeemed through customer loyalty programs and the value of transportation services sold but as yet used by the passenger. Used to reflect the current portion of the liability (within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Deferred Credits and Other Liabilities
acct_description: Total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unearned revenue or income, not otherwise specified in the taxonomy, which is expected to be taken into income in future periods and obligations not separately disclosed in the balance sheet (other liabilities).

acct_label: Deferred Lease Income, Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: Amount of accumulated amortization of deferred lease income.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Frequent Flier Liability
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from frequent flier obligations.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Recognized Net Gain (Loss) Due to Settlements and Curtailments (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount of net gain (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit cost due to settlements and curtailments. Curtailments result from an event that significantly reduces the expected years of future service of present employees or eliminates for a significant number of employees the accrual of defined benefits for some or all of their future services. Settlements result from an irrevocable action that relieves the employer (or the plan) of primary responsibility for a benefit obligation and eliminates significant risks related to the obligation and the assets used to effect the settlement. Examples of transactions that constitute a settlement include (a) making lump-sum cash payments to plan participants in exchange for their rights to receive specified benefits and (b) purchasing nonparticipating annuity contracts to cover vested benefits.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Equity Securities, Range Maximum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation maximum percentage of investments in equity securities to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Equity Securities, Range Minimum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation minimum percentage of investments in equity securities to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

acct_label: Deposits on Flight Equipment
acct_description: Carrying amount, at the balance sheet date, of deposits made to the manufacturer for new flight equipment still under construction. May include capitalized interest.

acct_label: Derivative, Higher Fixed Interest Rate Range (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: High end of the range of fixed interest rates when a range is presented for a group of interest rate derivatives.

acct_label: Derivative, Higher Variable Interest Rate Range (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: High end of the range of variable interest rates when a range is presented for a group of interest rate derivatives.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments, Loss Recognized in Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Effective Portion (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The effective portion of losses on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments that was recognized in other comprehensive income during the current period.

acct_label: Derivative, Lower Fixed Interest Rate Range (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Low end of the range of fixed interest rates when a range is presented for a group of interest rate derivatives.

acct_label: Derivative, Lower Variable Interest Rate Range (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Low end of the range of variable interest rates when a range is presented for a group of interest rate derivatives.

acct_label: Fair Value, Equity, Level 1 to Level 2 Transfers, Amount
acct_description: Amount of transfers of financial instruments classified in shareholders' equity measured on a recurring basis out of level 1 of the fair value hierarchy into level 2.

acct_label: Flight Equipment, Gross
acct_description: The gross amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets used in the entity's principle business operations, including owned aircraft and on capital lease, as well as capitalized improvements.

acct_label: Flight Equipment, Net
acct_description: The net amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets used in the entity's principle business operations, including owned aircraft and on capital lease, as well as capitalized improvements.

acct_label: Flight Equipment Owned, Accumulated Depreciation (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The cumulative amount of depreciation (related to long-lived flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations, including owned aircraft, as well as capitalized improvements) that has been recognized in the income statement.

acct_label: Flight Equipment Owned, Gross (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The gross amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations, including owned aircraft as well as capitalized improvements.

acct_label: Flight Equipment Owned, Net (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The net amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations, including owned aircraft as well as capitalized improvements.

acct_label: Frequent Flier Liability, Current
acct_description: Value of revenue deferred or cost to provide future products or services, primarily air transportation, associated with programs used by airlines to encourage passenger loyalty by providing rewards geared to the frequency of travel on the sponsoring airline, typically in the form of frequent flyer miles, points, or segments that can be accumulated and converted into free or discounted travel or other redemption options. Used to reflect the current portion of the liability (within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: General Fair Value Hedge Information, Dollar Offset Threshold, Maximum (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The upper end of the range of quotients represented as a percentage derived by dividing the change in value of a hedging instrument by the change in the value of the hedged item over the assessment period.

acct_label: General Fair Value Hedge Information, Dollar Offset Threshold, Minimum (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The lower end of the range of quotients represented as a percentage derived by dividing the change in value of a hedging instrument by the change in the value of the hedged item over the assessment period.

acct_label: General Fair Value Hedge Information, Minimum R Square, Percentage
acct_description: The correlation coefficient between the hypothetical instrument and the hedged item used in determination of the effectiveness of a hedging relationship.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Meals and Entertainment, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible meals and entertainment expense.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Air Traffic Liability (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The net change during the reporting period in the amount of unearned revenue by an airline industry company. This unearned revenue includes tickets sold but not yet recognized as revenue (which occurs when transportation is provided or the ticket expires) and the estimated incremental cost for points or miles outstanding and awards that expect to be redeemed through customer loyalty programs.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Air Traffic Liability
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of unearned revenue related to tickets sold but not yet recognized as revenue.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Commodity Contract Assets and Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the assets (liabilities) created through trading commodity-based derivative instruments.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Risk Management Assets and Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value of financial instruments other than those that are purchased and held principally for the purpose of hedging or mitigating market risk, credit risk, legal risk, operational risk and other types of risk.

acct_label: Indefinite-Lived Domestic Slots and Routes
acct_description: Carrying amount, (original cost adjusted for any previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date, of domestic slots, route authorities, airport operating and gate lease rights and related intangibles.

acct_label: Indefinite-Lived International Slots and Routes
acct_description: Carrying amount, (original cost adjusted for any previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date, of international slots, route authorities, airport operating and gate lease rights and related intangibles.

acct_label: Labor and Related Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit.

acct_label: Landing Fees and Other Rentals
acct_description: Direct costs incurred at airports in which the entity conducts flight operations. The costs primarily consist of fees paid to the airport authority for takeoff and landing, gate space and facilities, allocations of common space such as security and other terminal costs and fuel storage facilities.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Debt and Accrued Interest
acct_description: The amount of debt and related accrued interest included in liabilities subject to compromise.

acct_label: Liability Subject to Compromise, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation
acct_description: Amount classified as pension and other postretirement obligations included in liability subject to compromise.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Related Receivable Carrying Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of a recorded receivable related to a loss contingency accrual. For example, an insurance recovery receivable to the extent that the insurance recovery is probable and does not exceed the amount of the loss previously recognized in the financial statements.

acct_label: Number of Countries in which Entity Operates
acct_description: The number of countries in which the entity operates as of balance sheet date.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Amortization, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Prior Service Cost (Credit) Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The change in other comprehensive income due to the amortization of the net prior service costs (credit) into net periodic pension costs.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, Prior Service Cost (Credit), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for prior service cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Amortization, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Prior Service Cost Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for prior service costs recognized as a component of net period benefit cost.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment on Derivatives Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Pre tax reclassification adjustment for accumulated gains and losses from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges included in accumulated comprehensive income that was realized in net income during the period. A cash flow hedge is a hedge of the exposure to variability in the cash flows of a recognized asset or liability or a forecasted transaction that is attributable to a particular risk.

acct_label: Passenger Revenue, Mainline (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of a transportation carrier's mainline fare revenue recognized in the period from carrying passengers between destinations.

acct_label: Passenger Revenue, Regional (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of a transportation carrier's regional affiliates' fare revenue recognized in the period from carrying passengers between destinations.

acct_label: Price Risk Cash Flow Hedge Derivative, at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

acct_label: Price Risk Fair Value Hedge Derivative, at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivatives designated as fair value hedging instruments.

acct_label: Professional Fees
acct_description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

acct_label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Accumulated Depreciation
acct_description: Amount of accumulated depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

acct_label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Owned, Accumulated Depreciation
acct_description: The cumulative amount of depreciation (related to long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations and capitalized assets classified as property, plant and equipment that are owned by the entity) that has been recognized in the income statement.

acct_label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Salvage Value
acct_description: The estimated or actual value of the asset at the end of its useful life or when it is no longer serviceable (cannot be used for its original purpose).

acct_label: Selling Expense
acct_description: Expenses recognized in the period that are directly related to the selling and distribution of products or services.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Aggregate Intrinsic Value
acct_description: Amount by which current fair value of underlying stock exceeds exercise price of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

acct_label: Special Assessment Bond, Noncurrent
acct_description: The noncurrent portion of the carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a type of municipal bond typically used to fund a development project. Also called special assessment limited liability bond, special district bond, special purpose bond, special tax bond and community development obligation. Interest owed to lenders is paid by taxes levied on the community benefiting from the particular bond-funded project. For example, if a bond of this sort was issued to pay for sidewalks to be repaved in a certain community, an additional tax would be levied on homeowners in the area benefiting from this project.

acct_label: Allowance for Doubtful Accounts, Premiums and Other Receivables
acct_description: The valuation allowance as of the balance sheet date to reduce the gross amount of receivables to estimated net realizable value, which would be presented in parentheses on the face of the balance sheet.

acct_label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Discontinued Operations, Financing Activities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Cash provided by or used in the financing activities of the entity's discontinued operations during the period. The reporting entity may disclose the net cash flows from discontinued operations below the net cash flows from financing activities or include cash flows from discontinued operations, by category (operating, investing, or financing), in the body of the cash flow statement. This element is used to disclose cash flows from the financing activities of discontinued operations as a component of net cash flows from discontinued operations, which is reported below net cash flows from financing activities of continuing operations.

acct_label: Common Stockholders' Equity (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Items including common stock value, paid in capital, retained earnings, common stock purchased for the treasury and excluding noncontrolling interests (minority interests) and preferred stockholder interests.

acct_label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Gross
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of reserves for the costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims, before estimated recoveries from reinsurers.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Depreciation Expense on Property Subject to or Held-for-lease
acct_description: The total depreciation charge recorded for property subject to or held for lease.

acct_label: Proceeds from Dividends Received
acct_description: Dividends received on equity and other investments during the current period.

acct_label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Net
acct_description: The amount of property, by major property class, net of accumulated depreciation, subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Short-term Debt, Average Outstanding Amount
acct_description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, average borrowings during the period.

acct_label: Amortization of Deferred Property Taxes
acct_description: The amount of amortization charged against earnings during the period for deferred property taxes.

acct_label: Amortization of Nuclear Fuel Lease
acct_description: The expense charged against earnings for the periodic recognition of capitalized nuclear fuel leases.

acct_label: Antidilutive Shares Outstanding (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: An antidilutive element, in the calculation of fully diluted EPS, is a security or option that would have the effect of increasing positive earnings per share or decreasing loss per share if converted; such instruments are excluded from the calculation of fully diluted EPS.

acct_label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in asset retirement obligations.

acct_label: Assets Needed for Immediate Settlement, Aggregate Fair Value
acct_description: The aggregate fair value of assets needed to immediately settle the derivative instruments with credit-risk-related contingent features if the credit-risk-related contingent features were triggered at the end of the reporting period.

acct_label: Decommissioning Liability, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of a decommissioning liability associated with a legal obligation that a firm incurs when it constructs or operates an asset that must eventually be withdrawn from active service. This may include operating assets such as nuclear power plants or shipping vessels.

acct_label: Decommissioning Fund Investments, Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value of investments held in a trust fund to pay for the costs of decontaminating and decommissioning facilities, whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure on the balance sheet. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Shares Authorized for Issuance
acct_description: The maximum number of shares authorized for issuance under the deferred compensation arrangement as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other Comprehensive Income
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from unrealized gains in other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Amounts for Asset (Liability) Recognized in Statement of Financial Position
acct_description: Amount of asset (liability), recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans.

acct_label: Delinquent Amount at End of Period on Loans Managed and Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement
acct_description: This is the principal amount of loans (across all types of loans) that are overdue in payment by a set number of days.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments and Hedges, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the assets arising from derivative contracts and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of after a year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Capital Leased Assets
acct_description: Amount classified as capital leased assets attributable to disposal group.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Depreciation and Amortization
acct_description: Amount of depreciation and amortization expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Expense
acct_description: Amount of other expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Liabilities
acct_description: Amount classified as other liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

acct_label: Dividends, Preferred Stock, Stock
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in stock.

acct_label: Electrical Generation Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from generation of electricity, a process of producing electric energy by transforming other forms of energy such as nuclear, fossil fuel, solar, geothermal, hydro, and wind.

acct_label: Electrical Transmission and Distribution Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from (1) electrical transmission, which is the bulk transport of high voltage power, typically over longer distances, between generating plants and distribution systems, and (2) electrical distribution, which is the delivery of electricity to a retail customer's home or business through distribution wires or facilities of regulated public utilities.

acct_label: Electric Production Expense (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred directly related to electricity produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Extraordinary Item, Gain (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Net of tax amount of gain (loss) classified as extraordinary item, attributable to the parent.

acct_label: Extraordinary Item, Gain (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Net of tax amount of gain (loss) classified as extraordinary item, including amount attributable to noncontrolling interests.

acct_label: Extraordinary Item, Gain (Loss), Gross (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the gains or losses whether arising from extinguishment of debt, prior period adjustments, or from other events or transactions, that are both unusual in nature and infrequent in occurrence thereby meeting the criteria for an event or transaction to be classified as an extraordinary item. This element is gross of the related tax effect.

acct_label: Fair Value, Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Cash and Cash Equivalents (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position asset caption which represents a class of assets, or which may include an individual asset, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Fair Value, Asset, Recurring Basis, Still Held, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in income from asset measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Counterparty Credit Risk (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Risk that one party to the contract will default expressed as a percentage, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Transfers, Net
acct_description: Amount of transfer of financial instrument classified as an asset into (out of) level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Gain (Loss) Included in Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income, arising from assets, liabilities and financial instruments classified in shareholders' equity measured at fair value on a recurring basis using unobservable inputs (level 3).

acct_label: Fair Value, Net Derivative Asset (Liability) Measured on Recurring Basis, Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Gain (Loss) Included in Earnings
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in income from derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

acct_label: Fair Value, Net Derivative Asset (Liability) Measured on Recurring Basis, Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Gain (Loss) Included in Other Comprehensive Income (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income from derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

acct_label: Fair Value, Net Derivative Asset (Liability) Measured on Recurring Basis, Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Purchases, Sales, Issues, Settlements
acct_description: Amount of purchases, (sales), issuances and (settlements) of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.
