acct_label: Fair Value, Net Derivative Asset (Liability) Measured on Recurring Basis, Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Transfers into Level 3
acct_description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset) into level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

acct_label: Fair Value, Net Derivative Asset (Liability) Measured on Recurring Basis, Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Transfers out of Level 3
acct_description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset) out of level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due after fifth fiscal year following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due after fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in fourth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in third rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in second rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Future Minimum Sublease Rentals, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Next Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Accounts Receivable
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of accounts receivable.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Stock in Subsidiary or Equity Method Investee
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

acct_label: Hedged Liability, Discontinued Fair Value Hedge, Cumulative Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged liability in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk, remaining after discontinued hedge.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Income or Loss from continuing operations, net of taxes, including net Income or Loss from discontinued operations but before extraordinary items.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items, Per Basic Share (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net Income or Loss before extraordinary items per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items, Per Diluted Share (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net income or loss for the period before extraordinary items available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Extraordinary Items, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net income (loss) from extraordinary items, net of related tax effect, per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Extraordinary Items, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period attributable to extraordinary items that is available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Income Tax Examination, Interest Expense
acct_description: The amount of estimated interest recognized in the period arising from income tax examinations.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Medicare Prescription Drug Benefit, Amount
acct_description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for Medicare prescription drug benefit subsidy.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, State and Local, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax settlement.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Current Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current liabilities classified as other.

acct_label: Interest Rate Derivatives, at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of interest rate derivative assets, net of interest rate derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized on the balance sheet.

acct_label: Investment Owned, at Cost
acct_description: Cost of the investment.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Unrecognized Unrealized Appreciation
acct_description: This element represents the excess of the cost (face amount, notional amount) of an investment (security, contract) over its fair value which deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Unrecognized Unrealized Depreciation
acct_description: This element represents the excess of the cost (face amount, notional amount) of an investment (security, contract) over its fair value which deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

acct_label: Investment Tax Credit
acct_description: The amount deducted from an entities' taxes, reflecting a percentage of an amount invested in certain assets spread over the useful life of those assets; includes deferred investment tax credits.

acct_label: Jointly Owned Utility Plant, Gross Ownership Amount of Plant in Service
acct_description: The period end amount owned by the reporting utility of a jointly owned utility plant in service.

acct_label: Jointly Owned Utility Plant, Ownership Amount of Construction Work in Progress
acct_description: The period end amount of construction work in progress at a jointly owned electricity generation plant.

acct_label: Jointly Owned Utility Plant, Ownership Amount of Plant Accumulated Depreciation
acct_description: The period end amount of accumulated depreciation in a jointly owned electricity generation plant.

acct_label: Junior Subordinated Notes
acct_description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term debt (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer) identified as Junior Subordinated Notes, which have a lower priority than senior instruments.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Investments Acquired
acct_description: "The amount of investments that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Value of Assets Acquired (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The value of an asset or business acquired in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Obligation to Return Securities Received as Collateral
acct_description: The fair value of collateral received by the entity associated with securities borrowed that must be returned if the counterparty fulfills its obligations. It appears on the balance sheet as a liability and has a corresponding asset that appears on the balance sheet called Securities Received as Collateral.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Amortization, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Prior Service Cost Recognized in Net Periodic Pension Cost, Tax Effect (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Tax effect on adjustment out of other comprehensive income for prior service costs recognized as a component of net period benefit cost during the period.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Treasury Units Reissued
acct_description: Units that were previously issued and then were repurchased and classified as treasury units. This element represents the number of these units which were reissued during the period.

acct_label: Payments for Environmental Liabilities
acct_description: Cash outflows made during the period for environmental remediation activities.

acct_label: Payments for Nuclear Fuel
acct_description: Cash outflow associated with the purchase of any material that is commonly used in the generation of nuclear energy.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Nuclear Fuel
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow from any material that is commonly used in the generation of nuclear energy.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Oil and Gas Property
acct_description: The cash outflow to purchase of mineral interests in oil and gas properties for use in the normal oil and gas operations and not intended for resale.

acct_label: Principal Amount Outstanding on Loans Held-for-sale or Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement
acct_description: This is the principal amount outstanding for loans which are in the process of being securitized as of the date of the statement of financial position (across all types of loans).

acct_label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
acct_description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months but less than one year or one operating cycle (if the normal cycle is more than one year).

acct_label: Public Utilities, Allowance for Funds Used During Construction, Capitalized Cost of Equity
acct_description: The component of the allowance for funds used during construction during the period based on an assumed rate of return on equity funds used in financing the construction of regulated assets.

acct_label: Allowance for Funds Used During Construction, Capitalized Interest
acct_description: Amount capitalized of allowance for funds used during construction.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Generation or Processing
acct_description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to generation or processing owned by public utility.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Other Property, Plant and Equipment
acct_description: Period end book value of other property, plant and equipment (PPE) owned (but not classified elsewhere) by the public utility.

acct_label: Repayments of Short-term Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
acct_description: The cash outflow from a repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months but less than one year or one operating cycle (if the normal cycle is more than one year).

acct_label: Retained Earnings, Unappropriated
acct_description: A segregation of retained earnings which is available for dividend distribution. Earnings not paid out as dividends but instead reinvested in the core business or used to pay off debt. Unappropriated profit is part of shareholder equity. Also called cumulative distributions or earned surplus or accumulated earnings or unappropriated profit.

acct_label: Securities Received as Collateral
acct_description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the assets received as collateral against securities loaned to other broker-dealers. Borrowers of securities generally are required to provide collateral to the lenders of securities, commonly cash but sometimes other securities or standby letters of credit, with a value slightly higher than that of the securities borrowed. In instances where the entity is permitted to sell or re-pledge these securities, the entity reports the fair value of the collateral received and the related obligation to return the collateral as a liability.

acct_label: Securitized Regulatory Transition Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying value of the regulatory asset that represents capitalized stranded costs that have been securitized (financed with debt) and are expected to be recoverable through a transition charge after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer). A transition charge is a charge approved by a regulator that allows deregulated utilities to recover investments in certain assets, such as power plants, over a transition period leading into a deregulated market.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Extraordinary Items (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of income or loss from extraordinary items recognized by the reportable segment. Such disclosure is presented if the amount is: (a) included in the measure of segment profit or loss reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in that measure of segment profit or loss.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Profit (Loss) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of profit or loss recognized by the reportable segment.

acct_label: Spent Nuclear Fuel Obligation, Noncurrent
acct_description: Provision for the disposal costs of spent nuclear fuel from generating stations.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Change in Tax Rate, Deferred Tax Asset, Income Tax Expense
acct_description: Amount of income tax expense for remeasurement of deferred tax asset from change in tax rate pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

acct_label: Tax Effect of Extraordinary Item, Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The tax effect of gains and losses from events or transactions meeting the criteria of unusual in nature and infrequent in occurrence, thereby meeting the criteria to be classified as an extraordinary item.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Carrying amount, attributable to parent, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

acct_label: Transfers Accounted for as Secured Borrowings, Assets, Carrying Amount
acct_description: Carrying amount of financial assets accounted for as secured borrowings recognized in the transferor's statement of financial position at the end of each period presented.

acct_label: Transfers Accounted for as Secured Borrowings, Associated Liabilities, Carrying Amount
acct_description: Carrying amount of liabilities associated with financial assets accounted for as secured borrowings recognized in the transferor's statement of financial position at the end of each period presented.

acct_label: Utilities Operating Expense, Maintenance
acct_description: Amount of operating expense for routine plant maintenance and repairs of regulated operation.

acct_label: Utilities Operating Expense, Operations
acct_description: Amount of operating expense for routine operations of regulated operation.

acct_label: Liability, Retirement and Postemployment Benefits
acct_description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for pension, other postretirement and postemployment benefits.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Employer Contribution, Cost
acct_description: Amount of cost for employer contribution to multiemployer plan. Multiemployer plan includes, but is not limited to, pension plan determined to be individually significant and insignificant and other postretirement benefit plan.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Amount of Indirect Disallowance of Costs of Recently Completed Plants
acct_description: The amount of indirect disallowance of costs of a recently completed plant. When it becomes probable that part of the cost of a recently completed plant will be disallowed for rate-making purposes and a reasonable estimate of the amount of the disallowance can be made, the estimated amount of the probable disallowance is deducted from the reported cost of the plant and recognized as a loss. If part of the cost is explicitly, but indirectly, disallowed (for example, by an explicit disallowance of return on investment on a portion of the plant), an equivalent amount of cost is deducted from the reported cost of the plant and recognized as a loss.

acct_label: Acquired Finite-lived Intangible Asset, Weighted Average Useful Life (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The calculated weighted-average amortization period of a major class of finite-lived intangible assets acquired during the current period either individually or as part of a group of assets (in either an asset acquisition or business combination). A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar, either by their nature or by their use in the operations of a company.

acct_label: Affordable Housing Program Obligation
acct_description: Amount of obligation related to Affordable Housing Program (AHP) assessments required by the Federal Home Loan Bank Act of 1932.

acct_label: Affordable Housing Tax Credits and Other Tax Benefits, Amount
acct_description: Amount of affordable housing tax credits and other tax benefits recognized.

acct_label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Adjustments, Other
acct_description: Amount of other addition (reduction) in allowance reserve for credit loss.

acct_label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Recoveries of Bad Debts (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects a reduction in bad debt expense attributable to collections of loans and lease receivables which had previously been fully or partially charged off as bad debts.

acct_label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses Write-offs, Net
acct_description: Amount, after recoveries, of loans and leases that have been written-off.

acct_label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Loss, Recovery of Bad Debts
acct_description: Amount of recovery of loans and lease receivables which had previously been fully or partially written-off as bad debts.

acct_label: Amortization Method Qualified Affordable Housing Project Investments
acct_description: Amount of investment in qualified affordable housing projects.

acct_label: Amount Available for Dividend Distribution without Affecting Capital Adequacy Requirements
acct_description: The amount of dividends that can be declared or paid without affecting the banking or savings institution's regulatory capital position.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Aggregate Loss (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss on securities classified as available-for-sale that have been in a loss position for twelve months or longer.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Aggregate Loss (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss on securities classified as available-for-sale.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Aggregate Loss (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss on investments in available-for-sale securities that have been in a loss position for less than twelve months.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Debt Maturities, Amortized Cost Basis (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of available-for-sale debt securities at cost, net of adjustments, which include, but are not limited to, accretion, amortization, collection of cash, previous other-than-temporary impairments (OTTI) recognized in earnings (less any cumulative-effect adjustments, as defined) and fair value hedge accounting adjustments.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Debt Maturities, Fair Value (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the total of all debt securities grouped by maturity dates, at fair value, which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

acct_label: Available-for-sale, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Number of Positions, Less than One Year
acct_description: Number of investment positions in available-for-sale investments in a continuous unrealized loss position for less than one year or normal operating cycle, if longer, for which an other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) has not been recognized in the income statement.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Aggregate Losses (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the excess of amortized cost basis over fair value of securities that have been in a loss position for twelve months or longer for those securities which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Aggregate Losses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the excess of amortized cost basis over fair value of securities that have been in a loss position for twelve months or longer for securities which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Aggregate Losses (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the excess of amortized cost basis over fair value of securities in a loss position and which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Aggregate Losses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the excess of amortized cost basis over fair value of securities in a loss position and categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Aggregate Losses (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the excess of amortized cost basis over fair value of securities that have been in a loss position for less than twelve months for those securities which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Aggregate Losses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the excess of amortized cost basis over fair value of securities that have been in a loss position for less than twelve months for securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

acct_label: Available-for-sale, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Number of Positions
acct_description: Number of investment positions in available-for-sale investments in a continuous unrealized loss position for which an other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) has not been recognized in the income statement.

acct_label: Available-for-sale, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Number of Positions, Greater than or Equal to One Year
acct_description: Number of investment positions in available-for-sale investments that have been in a continuous unrealized loss position for greater than or equal to a year for which an other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) has not been recognized in the income statement.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Amortizable Intangible Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to an identifiable intangible asset that will be amortized.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
acct_description: Ratio of minimum total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
acct_description: Ratio of minimum total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

acct_label: Cash and Due from Banks
acct_description: For banks and other depository institutions: Includes cash on hand (currency and coin), cash items in process of collection, noninterest bearing deposits due from other financial institutions (including corporate credit unions), and noninterest bearing balances with the Federal Reserve Banks, Federal Home Loan Banks and central banks.

acct_label: Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
acct_description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

acct_label: Communications and Information Technology
acct_description: The amount of expense in the period for communications and data processing expense.

acct_label: Concentration Risk, Credit Risk, Financial Instrument, Maximum Exposure
acct_description: Maximum amount of loss due to credit risk that, based on the gross fair value of the financial instrument, the entity would incur if parties to the financial instruments that make up the concentration failed completely to perform according to the terms of the contracts and the collateral or other security, if any, for the amount due proved to be of no value to the entity.

acct_label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for more than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Accumulated Loss
acct_description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Number of Positions
acct_description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer, without an allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Accumulated Loss
acct_description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Number of Positions
acct_description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without an allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position without allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position, Accumulated Loss
acct_description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position, Number of Positions
acct_description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

acct_label: Deferred Costs, Credit Card Origination Costs, Amount
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and related credit card fees, of credit card origination costs not related to private label credit cards.

acct_label: Deferred Income Taxes and Other Tax Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences, after deferred tax asset, and other tax liabilities expected to be paid after one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Interests in Financial Assets Continued to be Held
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from interests in financial instruments continued to be held after sale or transfer of related financial instruments.

acct_label: Deposits
acct_description: The aggregate of all deposit liabilities held by the entity, including foreign and domestic, interest and noninterest bearing; may include demand deposits, saving deposits, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW) and time deposits among others.

acct_label: Deposits, Foreign
acct_description: The aggregate of all foreign interest-bearing and noninterest-bearing deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Deposits, Savings Deposits
acct_description: Amount of interest bearing deposits with no stated maturity, which may include passbook and statement savings accounts and money-market deposit accounts (MMDAs).

acct_label: Derivative, Amount of Hedged Item
acct_description: Amount of hedged item in hedging relationship. Excludes hedged asset or liability.

acct_label: Derivative Financial Instruments, Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Derivative instrument obligations meeting the definition of a liability which the Company is a party to as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Derivatives used in Net Investment Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassified to Earnings, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification from other comprehensive income (loss) to earnings from the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Exempt Income, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

acct_label: Equity Method Investment, Amount Sold
acct_description: Amount of the entity's equity method investment which has been sold.

acct_label: Equity Method Investments, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of investments accounted under the equity method.

acct_label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Unrealized Gain
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

acct_label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Unrealized Loss
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

acct_label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Upward Price Adjustment, Annual Amount
acct_description: Amount of gain from upward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

acct_label: Federal Funds Sold and Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
acct_description: Includes: (1) the amount outstanding of funds lent to other depository institutions, securities brokers, or securities dealers in the form of Federal Funds sold; for example, immediately available funds lent under agreements or contracts that mature in one business day or roll over under a continuing contract, regardless of the nature of the transaction or the collateral involved, excluding overnight lending for commercial and industrial purposes. Also include Federal Funds sold under agreements to resell on a gross basis, excluding (1) sales of term Federal Funds, (2) due bills representing purchases of securities or other assets by the reporting bank that have not yet been delivered and similar instruments, (3) resale agreements that mature in more than one business day involving assets other than securities, and (4) yield maintenance dollar repurchase agreements (Federal Funds Sold) and (2) the dollar amount outstanding of funds lent in the form of security resale agreements regardless of maturity, if the agreement requires the bank to resell the identical security purchased or a security that meets the definition of substantially the same in the case of a dollar roll. Also include purchases of participations in pools of securities, regardless of maturity (Securities Purchased Under Agreements to Re-sell).

acct_label: Fees and Commissions, Credit Cards (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Income earned from credit card services including late, over limit, and annual fees. This item excludes interest income earned on credit card balances and transactions.

acct_label: Fees and Commissions, Other (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of fee and commission revenue classified as other.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Collectively Evaluated for Impairment
acct_description: The valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Individually Evaluated for Impairment
acct_description: Amount of valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were individually evaluated for impairment.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Collectively Evaluated for Impairment
acct_description: The balance of financing receivables that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Individually Evaluated for Impairment
acct_description: The balance of financing receivables that were individually evaluated for impairment.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Number of Contracts
acct_description: Number of financing receivables that have been modified by troubled debt restructurings.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Postmodification
acct_description: Amount, after troubled debt restructuring, of modified financing receivable.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Pre-Modification Recorded Investment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of investment in financing receivables (before modification) modified by troubled debt restructurings.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Premodification
acct_description: Amount, before troubled debt restructuring, of financing receivable to be modified.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring
acct_description: Amount of financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Subsequent Default, Number of Contracts
acct_description: Number of financing receivable contracts modified as troubled debt restructuring within previous 12 months, with subsequent payment default.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Subsequent Default
acct_description: Amount of financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring within previous 12 months, with subsequent payment default.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
acct_description: Amount of financing receivable 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual
acct_description: Amount of financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Other Assets
acct_description: Total fresh-start adjustment to other assets.

acct_label: Hedged Liability, Fair Value Hedge
acct_description: Amount of liability hedged in fair value hedging relationship.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Interest Income, Accrual Method
acct_description: Amount of interest income recognized that the financing receivables (with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses) were impaired.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Affordable Housing Projects, Equity Method Investments
acct_description: Amount of investment income (loss) of qualified affordable housing project investments accounted for using the equity method.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Other, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other deductions.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Other Operating Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations incurred but not paid, and operating obligations classified as other.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deposits
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period deposits balances.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Operating Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities that result from activities that generate operating income.

acct_label: Increase in Carrying Amount of Redeemable Preferred Stock
acct_description: Adjustment to retained earnings for the increase in carrying amount of redeemable preferred stock that is classified as temporary equity.

acct_label: Interest and Dividend Income, Operating
acct_description: Represents the total of interest and dividend income, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, earned from (1) loans and leases whether held-for-sale or held-in-portfolio; (2) investment securities; (3) federal funds sold; (4) securities purchased under agreements to resell; (5) investments in banker's acceptances, commercial paper, or certificates of deposit; (6) dividend income; or (7) other investments not otherwise specified herein.

acct_label: Interest and Dividend Income, Securities, Operating
acct_description: Amount of operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases
acct_description: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other revolving-type loans and (2) loans and leases held-for-sale which may include mortgage loans, direct financing, and sales-type leases.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Deposit Liabilities, Domestic
acct_description: Total amount of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities, which may include brokered, retail, demand, checking, notice of withdrawal, money market and other interest-bearing deposits.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Deposit Liabilities, Foreign
acct_description: Amount of foreign interest-bearing deposits held by the entity.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Deposits in Banks and Other Financial Institutions
acct_description: For banks and other depository institutions (including Federal Reserve Banks, if applicable): Interest-bearing deposits in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits, which are presented separately from cash on the balance sheet.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Certificates of Deposits
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic certificate of deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Other Time Deposit
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities classified as other. Excludes certificates of deposit.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Savings
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic savings deposit liabilities. Saving deposits bear interest and have no stated maturity.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Deposits
acct_description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all deposits.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Short-term Borrowings
acct_description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on short-term borrowings including commercial paper and Federal funds purchased and securities sold under agreements to repurchase.

acct_label: Interest Income, Deposits with Financial Institutions
acct_description: Interest income derived from funds deposited with both domestic and foreign financial institutions including funds in money market and other accounts.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance
acct_description: Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Revolving, Credit Card (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of credit card loans issued to individuals. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, Allowance for Loan Losses (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects amount of allowance for credit losses pertaining to impaired loans.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, at Carrying Value (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the adjusted carrying amount of loans for which it is probable, based on current facts and circumstances, that a creditor will not initially be able to collect all amounts due according to the contractual terms of the loan agreement, or will not recover the previously reported carrying amount of the loan.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, Average Investment (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the average recorded investment in impaired loans during each period.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, Interest Income Recognized (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the amount of interest income on impaired and nonperforming loans that was recognized as income during the reporting period.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Nonperforming, Nonaccrual of Interest
acct_description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans deemed to be questionable as to collection on which no interest is continuing to be recognized.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, Nonperforming, over 90 Days, Accrual of Interest (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans past due ninety days or more on which interest is continuing to be earned or accrued.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans with terms that have been modified because of the inability of the borrower, for financial reasons, to comply with the terms of the original loan agreement.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net of Deferred Income
acct_description: Amount before allowance and after deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
acct_description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount, Other (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of other loans and leases not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Other (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of other loans and leases not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Other, Allowance (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The allowance for other loan and lease losses represents the reserve to cover probable credit losses related to specifically identified other loans and leases, as well as probable credit losses inherent in the remainder of the other loan portfolio as of the balance sheet date. For banks, include currently required allocated transfer risk reserves. Include carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for other loan losses in connection with business combinations determined to be appropriate.

acct_label: Loans Pledged as Collateral
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loans that have been pledged as collateral for borrowings. If the secured party has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge the collateral, then the debtor reclassifies that asset and report that asset in its statement of financial position separately from other assets not so encumbered.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Held-for-Sale
acct_description: Amount, before valuation allowance, of financing receivable classified as held-for-sale.

acct_label: Merchant Discount Fees (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of earnings on fees charged to merchants for the cardholder's use of a credit card. Excludes interest income earned on credit card balances, transactions and credit card services including late, over limit, and annual fees.

acct_label: Noninterest-bearing Deposit Liabilities, Domestic
acct_description: Amount of domestic noninterest-bearing deposits held by the entity, which may include demand deposits, checking, brokered and retail deposits.

acct_label: Noninterest-bearing Deposit Liabilities, Foreign
acct_description: Amount of foreign noninterest-bearing deposits held by the entity which may include demand deposits, checking, brokered and retail deposits.

acct_label: Noninterest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Other
acct_description: Amount of other noninterest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Noninterest Expense
acct_description: Total aggregate amount of all noninterest expense.

acct_label: Noninterest Income
acct_description: The total amount of noninterest income which may be derived from: (1) fees and commissions; (2) premiums earned; (3) insurance policy charges; (4) the sale or disposal of assets; and (5) other sources not otherwise specified.

acct_label: Noninterest Income, Other Operating Income
acct_description: Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Interest Rate Fair Value Hedge Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of all interest rate derivatives designated as hedging instruments in fair value hedges. Notional amount refers to the monetary amount specified in the interest rate derivative contract.

acct_label: Occupancy, Net
acct_description: Amount of net occupancy expense that may include items, such as depreciation of facilities and equipment, lease expenses, property taxes and property and casualty insurance expense.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Sublease Rentals (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The total amount of rentals incurred in the period on property subject to subleasing arrangements.

acct_label: Other Noninterest Expense
acct_description: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Businesses and Interest in Affiliates
acct_description: The net cash outflow or inflow associated with the acquisition or sale of a business segment during the period.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans and Leases
acct_description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period of loan and lease balances which are not originated or purchased specifically for resale. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

acct_label: Payments for Repurchase of Warrants
acct_description: The aggregate amount paid by the entity to reacquire the right to purchase equity shares at a predetermined price, usually issued together with corporate debt.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Liquidation Preference, Value
acct_description: Value of the difference between preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the preferred shares.

acct_label: Preferred Units, Issued
acct_description: The number of preferred units issued.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The cash inflow resulting from the sale of loans classified as held-for-sale, including proceeds from loans sold through mortgage securitization.

acct_label: Proceeds from Securitizations of Credit Cards
acct_description: The cash inflow from the securitization of credit card receivables. Securitization is the structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

acct_label: Provision for Other Losses
acct_description: Amount of expense related to other loss.

acct_label: Qualified Affordable Housing Project Investments, Commitment
acct_description: Amount of commitment or contingent commitments to qualified affordable housing project investments.

acct_label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Cost Incurred to Date
acct_description: Amount of costs incurred to date for the specified restructuring cost.

acct_label: Revenues, Net of Interest Expense
acct_description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income after deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

acct_label: Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
acct_description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes purchases of participations in pools of securities that are subject to a resale agreement, assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

acct_label: Significant Change in Unrecognized Tax Benefits is Reasonably Possible, Estimated Range of Change (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: For a tax position taken for which it is reasonably possible that the total amount of unrecognized tax benefit will significantly increase or decrease within twelve months of the balance sheet date, provide an estimate of the range of the reasonably possible change.

acct_label: Stock Redeemed or Called During Period, Value
acct_description: Equity impact of the value of stock bought back by the entity at the exercise price or redemption price.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
acct_description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
acct_description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
acct_description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
acct_description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

acct_label: Time Deposit Maturities, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of time deposit maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year One
acct_description: Amount of time deposit maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of time deposit maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of time deposit maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Time Deposits
acct_description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

acct_label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More
acct_description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

acct_label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Domestic (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount of domestic time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more.

acct_label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Foreign (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount of foreign time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more.

acct_label: Time Deposits, at or Above FDIC Insurance Limit
acct_description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations that meet or exceed the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit.

acct_label: Transfer of Portfolio Loans and Leases to Held-for-sale
acct_description: Value of loans and leases held in the entity's portfolio transferred to loans and leases held-for-sale in noncash transactions.

acct_label: Treasury Stock, Carrying Basis
acct_description: Cost basis for treasury stock acquired for purposes other than retirement.

acct_label: Treasury Stock, Number of Shares Held (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Number of shares held for each class of treasury stock.

acct_label: Weighted Average Rate Domestic Deposit, Certificates of Deposit
acct_description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic certificates of deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Business Development
acct_description: Business development involves the development of products and services, their delivery, design and their implementation. Business development includes a number of techniques designed to grow an economic enterprise. Such techniques include, but are not limited to, assessments of marketing opportunities and target markets, intelligence gathering on customers and competitors, generating leads for possible sales, follow-up sales activity, formal proposal writing and business model design. Business development involves evaluating a business and then realizing its full potential, using such tools as marketing, sales, information management and customer service.

acct_label: Payments to Purchase Other Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The cash outflow used to purchase loans (other than mortgage loans) that are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The cash inflow resulting from the sale of loans (other than mortgage loans) that are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

acct_label: Participating Securities, Distributed and Undistributed Earnings (Loss), Basic
acct_description: Amount of earnings (loss) distributed and earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Commitment to Lend
acct_description: Amount of unfunded portion of contractual agreement to lend funds to borrower for financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans Receivable
acct_description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with purchase (sale or collection) of loans receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

acct_label: Amortization Method Qualified Affordable Housing Project Investments, Amortization
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense of investment in qualified affordable housing projects.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Common Equity Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
acct_description: Ratio of minimum Common Equity Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year 10
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year 5 Through 10
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year One Through Five
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, Year One
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Interest-bearing Foreign Deposit, Certificates of Deposits
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing certificates of deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

acct_label: Unused Commitments to Extend Credit
acct_description: Unused amount of commitments to extend credit to customers.

acct_label: Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Hedged Item in Fair Value Hedge
acct_description: Amount of the increase (decrease) in fair value of the hedged item in a fair value hedge recognized in the income statement.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Sale
acct_description: Amount of decrease from sale and reclassification to held-for-sale of financing receivable.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Notes Receivable, Related Parties, Current
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount owed to the reporting entry (during the current year or operating cycle) in the form of loans and obligations (generally evidenced by promissory notes) made to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families; affiliates; or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Deferred Income
acct_description: Amount of deferred interest and fee income, unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of acquired loans. Excludes amounts for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties
acct_description: For an unclassified balance sheet, reflects the carrying amount of unpaid loan amounts due from related parties at the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loans and leases receivable due from related parties.

acct_label: Minimum Net Capital Required
acct_description: Amount of minimum net capital required to be maintained to engage in securities transactions.

acct_label: Derivatives used in Net Investment Hedge, Loss (Gain), Reclassified to Earnings, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amounts reclassified from other comprehensive income to earnings during the period as a result of the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity. Net of tax effect.

acct_label: Derivatives used in Net Investment Hedge, Net of Tax, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the cumulative translation adjustment from gain (loss), after tax, on foreign currency derivatives, that are designated as, and are effective as, economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity.

acct_label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of allowance reserve for credit loss.

acct_label: Amount of Ineffectiveness on Net Investment Hedges
acct_description: Gain (loss) on hedging derivative instrument or the foreign currency transaction gain (loss) on the nonderivative hedging instrument designated as a hedge of a net investment in foreign operations related to hedge ineffectiveness, which is included in earnings in the period.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Unrealized Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investments in debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Benefits, Losses and Expenses
acct_description: The total amount of expense recognized during the period for future policy benefits, claims and claims adjustment costs, and for selling, general and administrative costs.

acct_label: Ceded Premiums Payable
acct_description: The consideration due to the assuming enterprise as of the balance sheet date under the terms of the reinsurance contract in exchange for the right to receive reimbursement from such entity for covered claims and expenses.

acct_label: Debt and Equity Securities, Realized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
acct_description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities. Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Transfer, Amount
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security, measured at amortized cost, transferred to investment in debt security, measured at fair value, with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and net income (trading).

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other Comprehensive Loss
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses in other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Employee Compensation
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from employee compensation.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Other
acct_description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from compensation and benefits, classified as other.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Transition Asset (Obligation), before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

acct_label: Depreciation, Nonproduction
acct_description: The expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of nonproduction tangible assets over their useful lives.

acct_label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value of Collateral
acct_description: Fair value of securities received as collateral against derivative assets.

acct_label: Derivative Asset, Not Offset, Policy Election Deduction
acct_description: Fair value of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, elected not to be offset, deducted from derivative assets.

acct_label: Derivative, Collateral, Obligation to Return Securities
acct_description: Amount of obligation to return securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets.

acct_label: Derivative, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
acct_description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

acct_label: Derivative, Fair Value Hedge, Included in Effectiveness, Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on derivative instrument designated and qualifying as fair value hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Derivative Liability, Not Offset, Policy Election Deduction
acct_description: Fair value of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, elected not to be offset, deducted from derivative liabilities.

acct_label: Diluted Earnings Per Share Pro Forma
acct_description: Pro forma diluted earnings per share, which is commonly presented in initial public offerings.

acct_label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Derivative Instruments, Assets
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Derivative Instruments, Liabilities
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Issuances
acct_description: Amount of issuances of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Purchases
acct_description: Amount of purchases of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Settlements
acct_description: Amount of settlement of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable.

acct_label: Fixtures and Equipment, Gross
acct_description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of fixtures and equipment. Includes, but is not limited to, machinery, equipment, and engines.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Exchange Rate, Translation
acct_description: Foreign exchange rate used to translate amounts denominated in functional currency to reporting currency.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) from Components Excluded from Assessment of Fair Value Hedge Effectiveness, Net
acct_description: Net gain (loss) relating to components of the gain (loss) on the fair value hedging instrument excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Investments, Excluding Other than Temporary Impairments
