Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Five
acct_description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Four
acct_description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Three
acct_description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Two
acct_description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Number of Contracts
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, after Year Five
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year One
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Five
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Four
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Three
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Two
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under investment method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Premium to be Paid, Year One
acct_description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Premium to be Paid, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Premium to be Paid, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Premium to be Paid, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Premium to be Paid, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Litigation Settlement Interest
acct_description: Interest expense (income) directly attributable to an award in settlement of litigation.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount, Consumer (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of consumer loans, including, but not limited to, mortgage, home equity, vehicles, credit card, installment, and lease financing. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans Assumed (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The fair value of loans assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

acct_label: Loans Assumed
acct_description: The fair value of loans assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest, Change in Redemption Value
acct_description: Change in noncontrolling interest during the period as a result of a change in the redemption value of redeemable noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Debt Assumed (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of debt that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Debt Assumed
acct_description: "The amount of debt that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Value of Liabilities Assumed (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The total amount of [all] liabilities that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Notes Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of an agreement for an unconditional promise by the maker to pay the holder a definite sum of money at a future date.

acct_label: Origination of Loan to Purchase Common Stock
acct_description: Cash outflow for origination of loan for purchasing common stock.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, before Taxes (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The pretax effect on other comprehensive income of a change in accounting principle recognized in the period, which occurred before retrospective adjustments were required, or is in lieu of retrospective adjustments.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, Taxes (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The sum of income taxes on the effects of a change in accounting principle recognized in a period as other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Reclassification Adjustment Realized upon Sale or Liquidation, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Pre tax reclassification adjustment for translation gains or losses realized upon the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity. Includes also reclassification adjustments on foreign currency hedges that are designated and qualified as hedging instruments for hedges of the foreign currency exposure of a net investment in a foreign operation.

acct_label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

acct_label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, after Tax and Reclassification Adjustment
acct_description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Derecognition, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk, realized upon derecognition of financial liability measured under fair value option.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, Unrealized Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax and reclassification adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, Realized upon Sale or Liquidation, before Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for translation gain (loss) realized upon the sale or liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity and foreign currency hedges that are designated and qualified as hedging instruments for hedges of the foreign currency exposure of a net investment in a foreign operation.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Reclassification Adjustment Realized upon Sale or Liquidation, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for translation gain (loss) realized upon the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity. Also includes reclassification adjustments on foreign currency hedges that are designated and qualified as hedging instruments for hedges of the foreign currency exposure of a net investment in a foreign operation.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, before Reclassification Adjustment and Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Transition Asset (Obligation), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Pre tax reclassification adjustment for gains or losses realized upon the sale of securities.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Transition Asset (Obligation), Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for the net transition asset (obligation) recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost.

acct_label: Other Receivables from Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
acct_description: Amount of other receivables due from broker-dealers or clearing organizations.

acct_label: Other Restricted Assets, Current
acct_description: Amount of current assets that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions, classified as other.

acct_label: Other Significant Noncash Transaction, Value of Consideration Received
acct_description: "The value of the noncash (or part noncash) consideration received in a transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of a transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Cash Flows
acct_description: This item represents reductions in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held due to increases in cash flows expected to be collected and recognized over the remaining life of the security.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Change in Status
acct_description: This item represents reductions in the amount of cumulative losses recognized in earnings for other than temporary impairments (OTTI) for which a portion of the impairment had been recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity) due to a change in status of the impaired security because of a change in the entity's intent to either sell the impaired security or it has become more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the security before recovery of its cost basis.

acct_label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in earnings and other comprehensive loss (OCI).

acct_label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Recognized in Earnings
acct_description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

acct_label: Participating Insurance, Percentage of Gross Insurance in Force
acct_description: Percentage of participating insurance contract to insurance contracts in force.

acct_label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Claims Paid
acct_description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Trading Securities Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash outflow to acquire securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes payments for trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).

acct_label: Percentage of Amount Amortized of Ending Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Year Five (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated percentage of the ending balance of the present value of the future insurance profits asset acquired in the purchase of an insurance entity to be amortized in the fifth year after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Percentage of Amount Amortized of Ending Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Year Four (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated percentage of the ending balance of the present value of the future insurance profits asset acquired in the purchase of an insurance entity to be amortized in the fourth year after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Percentage of Amount Amortized of Ending Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Year One (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated percentage of the ending balance of the present value of future profits asset acquired in the purchase of an insurance entity to be amortized in the first year after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Percentage of Amount Amortized of Ending Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Year Three (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated percentage of the ending balance of the present value of the future insurance profits asset acquired in the purchase of an insurance entity to be amortized in the third year after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Percentage of Amount Amortized of Ending Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Year Two (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated percentage of the ending balance of the present value of the future insurance profits asset acquired in the purchase of an insurance entity to be amortized in the second year after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Policy Charges, Insurance (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: An amount that an insurer adds to a policy's premium, or deducts from a policy's cash value or contract holder's account, as compensation for services rendered; may include fees.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Amount of Preferred Dividends in Arrears
acct_description: Aggregate amount of cumulative preferred dividends in arrears.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Including Additional Paid in Capital
acct_description: Aggregate issuance value of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued and outstanding.

acct_label: Premium Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on premium receivable.

acct_label: Premium Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on premium receivable.

acct_label: Premiums Written, Net
acct_description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums written.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Addition from Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of addition for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Percentage, Year Five
acct_description: Percentage of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Percentage, Year Four
acct_description: Percentage of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Percentage, Year One
acct_description: Percentage of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Percentage, Year Three
acct_description: Percentage of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Percentage, Year Two
acct_description: Percentage of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Proceeds from (Payments for) in Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
acct_description: The cash flow from investments sold under the agreement to repurchase such investment.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
acct_description: The net cash flow from purchases followed by sales of securities under terms of reverse repurchase agreements.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Finance Receivables
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the sale or collection of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt and Equity Securities, FV-NI, Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes proceeds from trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Preferred, Carrying Amount
acct_description: As of the reporting date, the carrying amount of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of preferred shares (regardless of class), preferred partnership units (regardless of class), preferential membership interests, or any other form of preferred equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Preferred, Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value as of the reporting date of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of preferred shares (regardless of class), preferred partnership units (regardless of class), preferential membership interests, or any other form of preferred equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

acct_label: Reinsurance, Loss on Uncollectible Accounts in Period, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the write-down or write-off of a receivable from a reinsurer.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
acct_description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable, from recovery.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustments
acct_description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid and amounts expected for incurred losses and settlement expenses, which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Paid and Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustments
acct_description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, policy benefits and policy reserves. Excludes premiums paid under reinsurance contracts.

acct_label: Restricted Investments
acct_description: Investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities whose use is restricted in whole or in part, generally by contractual agreements or regulatory requirements. For use in an unclassified balance sheet.

acct_label: Schedule of Fair Value of Separate Accounts by Major Category of Investment, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value amount of the specified investment category of assets maintained in separate accounts as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Securities Loaned, Fair Value of Collateral
acct_description: Fair value of the securities pledged as collateral against securities loaned.

acct_label: Securities Loaned or Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of securities that an entity sells and agrees to repurchase at a specified date for a specified price.

acct_label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
acct_description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

acct_label: Separate Account Asset
acct_description: Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.

acct_label: Separate Account, Liability
acct_description: Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Incurred Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net
acct_description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of incurred claims and allocated claim adjustment expense used in claims development for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Amount
acct_description: Amount of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Cost
acct_description: Cost of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

acct_label: Current Year Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
acct_description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred in the current reporting period and related claims settlement costs.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Discount Deducted from Reserve
acct_description: Amount of discount deducted from reserve for unpaid claim and claim adjustment expense by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Amortization of Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
acct_description: Amount of amortization of deferred policy acquisition cost recognized, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Benefit, Claim, Loss and Settlement Expenses
acct_description: Amount of insurance benefit, claim, loss and settlement expenses incurred, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
acct_description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized on contract remaining in force, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Net Investment Income
acct_description: Amount of net investment income earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Other Policy Claim and Benefit Payable
acct_description: Amount of claim and benefit payable classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Unearned Premium
acct_description: Amount of premium not yet earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Redemption Value (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount to be paid by the entity upon redemption of the security that is classified as temporary equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Trading
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Trading Securities, Equity
acct_description: Fair value of investments in trading equity securities and other forms of trading securities that provide ownership interests.

acct_label: Derivatives used in Net Investment Hedge, Increase (Decrease), Gross of Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of increase (decrease) in the cumulative translation adjustment from gain (loss) on foreign currency derivatives that are designated as, and are effective as, economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity.

acct_label: Underwriting Income (Loss)
acct_description: The difference between the price paid by the public and the contract price less the related expenses. A broker-dealer may underwrite a security offering by contracting to buy the issue either at a fixed price or a price based on selling the offering on a best-effort basis.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Net
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Withdrawal from Contract Holders Funds
acct_description: The cash outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.

acct_label: Workers' Compensation Discount, Amount
acct_description: Current year monetary amount of the change in worker's compensation reserve liability resulting from the discount applied to reduce the reserve to present value.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs and Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling after 10 Years, Amortized Cost
acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after rolling tenth fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling after 10 Years, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after rolling tenth fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling after Five Through Ten Years, Amortized Cost
acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security, measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in rolling sixth through tenth fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Rolling after Five Through Ten Years, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security, measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in rolling sixth through tenth fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Sold at Par Value
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with interest rate reset through auction process, sold at par value.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Restricted
acct_description: Amount of restricted investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Fair Value, Liability, Recurring Basis, Still Held, Unrealized Gain (Loss), OCI
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Issuances
acct_description: Amount of issuances of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Purchases
acct_description: Amount of purchases of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Sales
acct_description: Amount of sales of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Settlements
acct_description: Amount of settlements of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff, after Recovery
acct_description: Amount, after recovery, of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Other Investments and Securities, at Cost
acct_description: Includes other investments and securities that are not at fair value as of the balance sheet date and those that are not accounted for under the equity method.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage Notes Receivable
acct_description: The cash outflow from the purchase of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Mortgage Notes Receivable
acct_description: The cash inflow from proceeds from sale of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate; includes collections on mortgage notes receivable that are not classified as operating cash flows.

acct_label: Securities for Reverse Repurchase Agreements
acct_description: The carrying value of securities purchased to be resold in reverse repurchase transactions as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Fair Value of Collateral
acct_description: Fair value of securities pledged as collateral against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs, Disposition
acct_description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition costs disposed or classified as held-for-sale.

acct_label: Policyholder Account Balance, Cash Surrender Value
acct_description: Amount of cash to be paid to policyholder upon termination and surrender of long-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, after Reinsurance
acct_description: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of liability for future policy benefit.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Expected Future Policy Benefit, Benefit Payment
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow to policyholder from benefit payment for expected future policy benefit and expense component of liability for future policy benefit.

acct_label: Market Risk Benefit, Change in Fair Value, Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in fair value of contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk. Excludes change attributable to instrument-specific credit risk.

acct_label: Market Risk Benefit, Increase (Decrease) from Equity Market Change
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk from change in equity market assumption.

acct_label: Market Risk Benefit, Interest Expense
acct_description: Amount of interest expense for contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

acct_label: Separate Account, Liability, Cash Surrender Value, Amount
acct_description: Amount of separate account liability payable to policyholder upon surrender of contract before maturity.

acct_label: Separate Account, Liability, Premium and Deposit
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow to separate account liability from premium and deposit from cash received.

acct_label: Separate Account, Liability, Surrender and Withdrawal
acct_description: Amount of decrease in separate account liability from contract redemption and withdrawal of funds.

acct_label: Transfer to (from) Policyholder Account Balance (to) from Separate Account
acct_description: Amount of transfer to (from) liability for policyholder account balance (to) from liability for separate account.

acct_label: Advances from Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of borrowings as of the balance sheet date from the Federal Home Loan Bank, which are primarily used to cover shortages in the required reserve balance and liquidity shortages.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Disclosures, Collateral Pledged
acct_description: Amount of the collateral pledged in support of federal home loan bank advances outstanding.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Maximum Amount Available
acct_description: Amount of maximum advances or credit lines available from the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Year One
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Accumulated Amortization of Other Deferred Costs
acct_description: Accumulated amortization of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs, deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies, or deferred leasing costs for real estate operations.

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Other than Temporary Impairment, Not Credit Loss, Net of Tax, Available-for-sale, Debt Securities
acct_description: Accumulated other comprehensive loss related to portion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) due to factors other than credit losses on debt securities categorized as available-for-sale that an entity does not intend to sell and which it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis of the debt security. The amount represented by this item is net of tax, as applicable.

acct_label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Real Estate
acct_description: The reserve to cover probable credit losses related to specifically identified fixed maturity real estate loans as well as probable credit losses inherent in the remainder of that loan portfolio.

acct_label: Assumed Premiums Earned, Accident and Health (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums assumed and earned for all accident and health insurance assumed from other insurers as a result of reinsurance arrangements.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Gain
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Capitalized Computer Software, Impairments
acct_description: Amount of impairment loss from capitalized computer software costs.

acct_label: Cash and Securities Segregated under Federal and Other Regulations
acct_description: Amount of cash subject to withdrawal restrictions, restricted deposits held as compensating balances, and cash and securities segregated in compliance with regulations (such as cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers).

acct_label: Cash Collateral for Borrowed Securities
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of cash collateral held for borrowed securities, for which the cash is restricted as to withdrawal or usage.

acct_label: Ceded Premiums Earned, Accident and Health (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums assumed and earned by another insurer as a result of reinsurance arrangements.

acct_label: Collateralized Financings
acct_description: The value of the collateral (typically cash) that the entity receives in a financing transaction in exchange for securities lent. This item represents a liability in the financial statements of the lender of the securities.

acct_label: Credit Risk Derivatives, at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Fair value of credit risk derivative asset after deduction of credit risk derivative liability.

acct_label: Debt and Equity Securities, Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss
acct_description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities, excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred policy acquisition cost.

acct_label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value of the gross assets less the gross liabilities of a derivative asset or group of derivative assets.

acct_label: Derivative Asset, Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell, Securities Borrowed, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments, Gain Recognized in Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Effective Portion (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The effective portion of gains on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments that was recognized in other comprehensive income during the current period.

acct_label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value of the gross liabilities less the gross assets of a derivative liability or group of derivative liabilities.

acct_label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

acct_label: Derivative, Net Hedge Ineffectiveness Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from the ineffectiveness of the hedge.

acct_label: Direct Premiums Earned, Accident and Health (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums earned directly for all accident and health insurance before adding contracts assumed from other insurers or subtracting any amounts assumed by other insurers.

acct_label: Embedded Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Embedded Derivative, Net
acct_description: Net Increase or Decrease in the fair value of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives included in earnings in the period.

acct_label: Fair Value, Level 2 to level 1 Transfers, Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the transfers of assets or liabilities measured on a recurring basis out of Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 1.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank Advances
acct_description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances to member financial institutions.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank Borrowings, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of borrowing from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
acct_description: Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock represents an equity interest in a FHLB. It does not have a readily determinable fair value because its ownership is restricted and it lacks a market (liquidity).

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, 30 to 59 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Financing receivables that are less than 60 days past due but more than 29 days past due.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, 60 to 89 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Financing receivables that are less than 90 days past due but more than 59 days past due.

acct_label: Repossessed Assets
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance; includes real and personal property; equity interests in corporations, partnerships, and joint ventures; and beneficial interests in trusts.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Derivative Assets at Fair Value (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of foreign currency derivative assets, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as assets on the balance sheet.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) from Hedged Firm Commitment Not Qualifying as Fair Value Hedge, Net
acct_description: Amount of net gain (loss) recognized in earnings when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as a fair value hedge.

acct_label: Gain on Cash Flow Hedge Ineffectiveness
acct_description: The gain recognized in earnings during the reporting period representing the amount of the cash flow hedges' ineffectiveness.

acct_label: Gain on Discontinuation of Cash Flow Hedge Due to Forecasted Transaction Probable of Not Occurring
acct_description: The amount of gain reclassified into earnings in the period when cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

acct_label: Gain on Fair Value Hedge Ineffectiveness
acct_description: Amount of gain recognized in the income statement from the hedging ineffectiveness of a fair value hedge.

acct_label: Impact of Restatement on Opening Retained Earnings, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount after tax of cumulative effect of restatement on the opening retained earnings of the earliest year presented.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with No Related Allowance, Average Recorded Investment
acct_description: Amount of average investment of impaired financing receivables for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with No Related Allowance, Interest Income, Accrual Method
acct_description: Amount of interest income, recognized on accrual basis, on financing receivables that are recognized as impaired, for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

acct_label: Impairment of Real Estate
acct_description: The charge against earnings in the period to reduce the carrying amount of real property to fair value.

acct_label: Income Tax Effects Allocated Directly to Equity
acct_description: The sum of the tax effects of all items occurring during the period that have been charged or credited directly to other comprehensive income or to related components of shareholders' equity.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Reinsurance Premiums
acct_description: The change in prepaid reinsurance premiums recorded on the balance sheet, which is needed to adjust net income to arrive at net cash flows provided by or used in operations.

acct_label: Investments Net Asset Value (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Net asset value of investment in certain entities that calculate net asset value per share. Includes, but is not limited to, by unit, membership interest, or other ownership interest. Investment includes, but is not limited to, investment in certain hedge funds, venture capital funds, private equity funds, real estate partnerships or funds. Excludes fair value disclosure.

acct_label: Liability for Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Disability, Accident and Health
acct_description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to disability, accident and health insurance insured events that have occurred on or before a particular date (ordinarily, the balance sheet date) and the amount needed to provide for the estimated ultimate cost required to investigate and settle claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before a particular date (ordinarily, the balance sheet date), whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

acct_label: Marketable Securities, Equity Securities (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: For an unclassified balance sheet, this item represents investments in common and preferred stocks and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests in a corporation.

acct_label: Maturities of Senior Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow for the settlement of long-term borrowing, with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, as it matures.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Commercial and Consumer, Net
acct_description: The balance represents the amount of loans that are secured by real estate mortgages, offset by the reserve to cover probable credit losses on the loan portfolio.

acct_label: Mortgages Held-for-sale, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of mortgage loans held-for-sale.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Foreign Currency Cash Flow Hedge Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of all foreign currency derivatives designated as hedging instruments in cash flow hedges. Notional amount refers to the number of currency units specified in the foreign currency derivative contract.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent, Available-for-sale Securities
acct_description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent, Available-for-sale Securities
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to the parent entity.

acct_label: Prepaid Reinsurance Premiums
acct_description: The unexpired portion of premiums ceded on policies in force as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the present value of the future profits asset (also known as value of business acquired).

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the present value of future profits asset that was amortized during the period, generally in proportion to related revenue earned, estimated gross profits, or over the customer relationship or some other period.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Secured Debt
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes tax exempt secured debt.

acct_label: Real Estate Acquired Through Foreclosure
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land and buildings obtained through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement.

acct_label: Securities Borrowed, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

acct_label: Securities Loaned, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Carrying Amount of Assets, Unconsolidated VIE (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount of the assets in the enterprise's statement of financial position that relate to the enterprise's variable interest in the unconsolidated variable interest entity. In general, a VIE is a corporation, partnership, trust, or any other legal structure used for business purposes that either (a) does not have equity investors with voting rights or (b) has equity investors that do not provide sufficient financial resources for the entity to support its activities. A VIE often holds financial assets, including loans or receivables, real estate or other property. A VIE may be essentially passive or it may engage in research and development or other activities on behalf of another company.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Nonconsolidated, Carrying Amount, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of the assets in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the Variable Interest Entity (VIE), where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Current Weighted-Average Discount Rate
acct_description: Current weighted-average discount rate used to measure liability for future policy benefit.

acct_label: Accrued Payroll Taxes
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory payroll taxes incurred through that date and withheld from employees pertaining to services received from them, including entity's matching share of the employees FICA taxes and contributions to the state and federal unemployment insurance programs.

acct_label: Common Stock, Including Additional Paid in Capital (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value (in cases of no-par value stock) for common stock held by shareholders. Aggregate value for common stock issued and outstanding.

acct_label: Costs of Metals Sold (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred related to exploration, development, mining, processing and providing mining support activities related to industrial metals and minerals.

acct_label: Deposit Liabilities, Effect of (Increase) Decrease in Interest Accrual Assumption on Expected Recovery Amounts
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in expense due to change in the interest accrual assumption on expected recoveries.

acct_label: Deposit Liability, Current
acct_description: The current portion, due within one year or one operating cycle, if longer, of deposits held other than customer deposits.

acct_label: Development Stage Enterprise, Deficit Accumulated During Development Stage (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative net losses reported during the development stage.

acct_label: Due to Other Related Parties, Current
acct_description: Amount payable to related parties classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash
acct_description: Amount of effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances held in foreign currencies. Excludes cash equivalents.

acct_label: Exploration Expense, Mining (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Exploration expenses (including prospecting) related to the mining industry would be included in operating expenses. Exploration costs include costs incurred in identifying areas that may warrant examination and in examining specific areas that are considered to have prospects of mineral reserves.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Unproved Property
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property without proven oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Impairment of Ongoing Project
acct_description: Amount recognized as an operating expense or loss during the period to reduce the carrying amount of a project that has been impaired but not abandoned.

acct_label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

acct_label: Mineral Properties, Net
acct_description: Mineral properties, net of adjustments.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Other Assets Acquired
acct_description: Amount of assets, classified as other, acquired in a noncash or part noncash acquisition.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Payables Assumed
acct_description: "The amount of payables that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Noninterest Income, Other
acct_description: Represents the total of noninterest income derived from certain activities and assets including (for example): (1) venture capital investments; (2) bank owned life insurance; (3) foreign currency transactions; and (4) mortgage servicing rights.

acct_label: Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Portion of equity (net assets) in a subsidiary not attributable, directly or indirectly, to the parent entity which is not redeemable by the parent entity.

acct_label: Salary and Wage, Officer, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
acct_description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by officer. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

acct_label: Other Additional Capital
acct_description: Amount of additional paid-in capital (APIC) classified as other.

acct_label: Other Liabilities and Deferred Revenue, Noncurrent
acct_description: Aggregate carrying amount, as of the balance sheet date, of noncurrent obligations and noncurrent portion of deferred revenue not separately disclosed in the balance sheet. Noncurrent liabilities are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Deferred revenue is a liability related to a revenue producing activity for which revenue has not yet been recognized, and is not expected to be recognized in the next twelve months.

acct_label: Other Notes Payable, Current
acct_description: Amount of long-term notes classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Other Recurring Income
acct_description: Amount of recurring income classified as other.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Mining Assets
acct_description: The cash outflow from the purchase of mining and mining related assets during the period.

acct_label: Proceeds from Unsecured Notes Payable
acct_description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is uncollateralized (where debt is not backed by the pledge of collateral).

acct_label: Royalty Income, Nonoperating
acct_description: Ancillary revenue earned during the period from the consideration paid to the entity for the use of its rights and property by another party. Examples include licensing the use of copyrighted materials and leasing the extraction of natural resources.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Aggregate Intrinsic Value, Outstanding
acct_description: Intrinsic value of outstanding award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Purchase of Assets
acct_description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.

acct_label: Development Stage Entities, Stock Issued, Value, Issued for Cash (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Value of shares issued as consideration for cash for development stage entities.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Purchase of Assets
acct_description: Value of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.

acct_label: Accrued Vacation, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for unused vacation time owed to employees based on the entity's vacation benefit given to its employees. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Contracts Receivable, Claims and Uncertain Amounts, Expected to be Collected in Next Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts that are expected to be collected in the next fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Compensated Absences
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from compensated absences (includes, but not limited to, sick and personal days).

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Unbilled Receivables
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of the amount of revenue for work performed for which billing has not occurred, net of uncollectible accounts.

acct_label: Liability for Uncertainty in Income Taxes, Current
acct_description: Amount recognized for uncertainty in income taxes classified as current.

acct_label: Participating Securities, Distributed and Undistributed Earnings (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate of earnings distributed and earnings allocated to participating securities under the two-class method to the extent that participating securities may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

acct_label: Restricted Cash and Investments
acct_description: Cash and investments whose use in whole or in part is restricted for the long-term, generally by contractual agreements or regulatory requirements. For use in an unclassified balance sheet.

acct_label: Settlement of Asset Retirement Obligations Through Noncash Payments, Amount
acct_description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled through noncash transactions. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement from service of a tangible long-lived asset.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Benefit Plan
acct_description: Value of shares issued during the period to an employee benefit plan, such as a defined contribution or defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Accretion Expense
acct_description: Amount recognized for the passage of time, typically for liabilities, that have been discounted to their net present values. Excludes accretion associated with asset retirement obligations.

acct_label: Amortization of Deferred Loan Origination Fees, Net
acct_description: The net increase(decrease) in interest income during the period representing the allocation of deferred loan origination fees less deferred loan origination costs using the effective interest method over the term of the debt arrangement to which they pertain taking into account the effect of prepayments.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Per Share, Basic
acct_description: Per basic share amount of pro forma income from continuing operations, after tax, as if the business combination had been completed at the beginning of a period.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Per Share, Diluted
acct_description: Per diluted share amount of pro forma income from continuing operations, after tax, as if the business combination had been completed at the beginning of a period.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Liabilities, Long-term Debt (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to the current portion of long-term debt of the acquired entity.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Other Liabilities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to other liabilities not separately disclosed in the balance sheet.

acct_label: Business Combination, Acquired Receivable, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of acquired receivable from business combination, excluding certain loans and debt securities acquired in transfer.

acct_label: Business Combination, Provisional Information, Initial Accounting Incomplete, Adjustment, Intangibles
acct_description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to intangibles acquired in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

acct_label: Business Combination, Separately Recognized Transactions, Additional Disclosures, Acquisition Costs
acct_description: For transactions that are recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination, such as related to pre-existing relationships with the acquiree, this element represents the disclosure of the amount of acquisition related costs.

acct_label: Business Combination, Separately Recognized Transactions, Revenues and Gains Recognized
acct_description: The revenues and gains recognized recorded for each transaction with the acquiree that is recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination.

acct_label: Derivative, Fixed Interest Rate
acct_description: Fixed interest rate related to the interest rate derivative.

acct_label: Derivative, Nonmonetary Notional Amount, Percent of Required Need, Coverage
acct_description: The percentage of expected requirements covered by the aggregate notional amount of derivative contracts expressed in nonmonetary units. For example, the number of barrels specified in a fuel oil forward purchase contract as a percentage of expected need.

acct_label: Equity Method Investment, Quoted Market Value
acct_description: This item represents the aggregate value of each identified investment accounted for under the equity method of accounting based on the quoted market price for those investments in common stock for which a quoted market price is available.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Fair Value of Interest Rate Fair Value Hedging Instruments (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) related to the fair value of interest rate derivatives designated as fair value hedging instruments. Recognized in earnings and offsets the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge is determined to be effective.

acct_label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets, Translation and Purchase Accounting Adjustments
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit, from foreign currency translation and purchase accounting adjustments.

acct_label: Inventory, Work in Process and Raw Materials, Net of Reserves
acct_description: The aggregate carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of items which are partially completed at the time of measurement and unprocessed items that will go through the production process and become part of the final product.
