Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Oil and Gas Property, Lease Operating Expense (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of lease operating expense related to property used in oil and gas production.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
acct_description: The percentage points (also referred to as 'margin') added to the reference rate as stated in the loan agreement and used to compute the variable rate on the loans receivable. For instance, the loan agreement might state that the interest rate the borrower is obligated to pay is the London Interbank Offered Rate (LIBOR) plus three quarters (3/4) of a percentage point adjusted quarterly (each three months). LIBOR in this example is the index or reference rate, 3/4 percentage point is the margin, the reference rate plus the margin is the fully indexed rate. This element would be used to report separately the margin.

acct_label: Long-term Purchase Commitment, Minimum Energy Volume Required
acct_description: Energy volume that must be purchased within the specified time period of the agreement to avoid penalties or unfavorable effects on pricing, among other adverse consequences.

acct_label: Marketable Securities, Fixed Maturities (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: For an unclassified balance sheet, this item represents investments in debt securities having predetermined or determinable maturity dates.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Diluted
acct_description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) from continuing operations available to common shareholders.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
acct_description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from discontinued operations available to common shareholders.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Diluted
acct_description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) from discontinued operations available to common shareholders.

acct_label: Nonmonetary Notional Amount of Price Risk Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of price risk derivatives not designated as a hedging instrument with notional amounts expressed in nonmonetary units. For example the number of barrels specified in a fuel oil forward purchase contract.

acct_label: OCI, Equity Method Investment, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of other comprehensive income (loss) (OCI) for proportionate share of equity method investee's OCI.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Property, Full Cost Method, Net
acct_description: Oil and gas properties, net of depletion, carried under the full cost method.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method, Net
acct_description: Oil and gas properties net of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization, impairment, and abandonment, carried under the successful effort method.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Investment Transferred from Available-for-sale to Equity Method, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) of investment classified as available-for-sale transferred to equity method.

acct_label: Other Interest and Dividend Income
acct_description: Amount, after discount, accretion and premium amortization, of interest income and dividend income classified as other.

acct_label: Other Long-term Debt, Current
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Other Payments to Acquire Businesses
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Business Three, Net of Cash Acquired
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with a third acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

acct_label: Payments to Explore and Develop Oil and Gas Properties
acct_description: The cash outflow for exploration and development of oil and gas properties. It includes cash payments related to development of oil and gas wells drilled at previously untested geologic structures (to determine the presence of oil or gas) and wells drilled at sites where the presence of oil or gas has already been established (to extract the oil or gas).

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Per Share Amounts of Preferred Dividends in Arrears
acct_description: Per share amount of cumulative preferred dividends in arrears.

acct_label: Previously Estimated Development Costs Incurred
acct_description: Amount of increase in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of previously estimated development costs incurred.

acct_label: Previously Estimated Development Costs Incurred During Period (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of (increase) decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of previously estimated development costs incurred.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Redeemable Convertible Preferred Stock
acct_description: The cash inflow from issuance of callable preferred stock which is identified as being convertible to another type of financial security at the option of the issuer or the holder.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Interest in Corporate Unit
acct_description: The cash inflow resulting from the sale of an interest in a corporate unit during the period.

acct_label: Productive Gas Wells, Number of Wells, Net
acct_description: The total number of producing gas wells and gas wells capable of production, in which the entity owns a fractional working interest.

acct_label: Projects that have Exploratory Well Costs that have been Capitalized for Period Greater than One Year, Number of Projects
acct_description: The number of projects for which exploratory well costs have been capitalized for a period of greater than one year after the completion of drilling.

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Extensions, Discoveries, and Additions
acct_description: Additions to proved reserves that result from (1) extension of the proved acreage of previously discovered (old) reservoirs through additional drilling in periods after discovery and (2) discovery of new fields with proved reserves or of new reservoirs of proved reserves in old fields.

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Production
acct_description: Production of proved reserves.

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Purchases of Minerals in Place
acct_description: Purchase of minerals in place.

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Revisions of Previous Estimates
acct_description: Revisions represent changes in previous estimates of proved reserves, either upward or downward, resulting from new information (except for an increase in proved acreage) normally obtained from development drilling and production history or resulting from change in economic factors.

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Sales of Minerals in Place
acct_description: Sales of minerals in place.

acct_label: Proved Developed Reserves (Volume)
acct_description: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved developed reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities does not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. The unit of measure for reserve quantities is defined as "barrels" for oil and synthetic oil reserves or "cubic feet" or "cubic meters" for natural gas and synthetic gas reserves.

acct_label: Proved Undeveloped Reserves (Volume) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved undeveloped reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other renewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities does not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. The unit of measure for reserve quantities is defined as "barrels" for oil and synthetic oil reserves or "cubic feet" or "cubic meters" for natural gas and synthetic gas reserves.

acct_label: Proved Undeveloped Reserve (Volume)
acct_description: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved undeveloped reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other renewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities does not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. The unit of measure for reserve quantities is defined as "barrels" for oil and synthetic oil reserves or "cubic feet" or "cubic meters" for natural gas and synthetic gas reserves.

acct_label: Ratio of Indebtedness to Net Capital (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Total Aggregate Indebtedness divided by Net Capital.

acct_label: Repayments of Unsecured Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt unsecured debt.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Accretion of Asset Retirement Obligations
acct_description: Accretion expense of asset retirement obligations related to oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Transportation Costs
acct_description: Includes the cost to prepare and move liquid hydrocarbons and natural gas to their points of sale.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Maximum Employee Subscription Rate
acct_description: The highest percentage of annual salary that an employee is permitted to utilize with respect to the plan.

acct_label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow of Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Translation Adjustment Functional to Reporting Currency, Tax Benefit (Expense) (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of income tax benefit or expense because of the current period translation adjustment resulting from translating foreign currency financial statements into the reporting currency.

acct_label: Unamortized Costs Capitalized Less Related Deferred Income Taxes Exceed Ceiling Limitations, Expense
acct_description: The excess of unamortized costs capitalized within a cost center, less related deferred income taxes, over the cost center ceiling limitation, which is charged to expense for oil and gas producing companies that use full cost method of accounting for investments in oil and gas producing properties.

acct_label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Restricted Stock
acct_description: Number of shares of restricted stock determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that restricted shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Restricted shares are subject to sales, contractual, regulatory or other restrictions that prevent or inhibit the holder from freely disposing of them before the restriction ends.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
acct_description: Value of new stock classified as temporary equity issued during the period.

acct_label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received on Transaction
acct_description: Cash received on stock transaction after deduction of issuance costs.

acct_label: Due from Affiliate, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

acct_label: Billings in Excess of Cost
acct_description: Liability attributable to (i) billings in excess of costs under the percentage of completion contract accounting method representing the difference between contractually invoiced amounts (billings) and revenue recognized based, for example, on costs incurred to estimated total costs at period end or (ii) contractually invoiced amounts (billings) in excess of costs incurred and accumulated under the completed contract accounting method.

acct_label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes effect from exchange rate changes.

acct_label: Cash Surrender Value, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of the amount that could be realized under a life insurance contract or contracts owned by the entity, commonly known as corporate-owned life insurance (COLI) or bank-owned life insurance (BOLI).

acct_label: Common Stock Issued, Employee Trust, Deferred
acct_description: Aggregate value of common stock held in a trust that has been set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees but not yet earned.

acct_label: Compensation and Benefits Trust
acct_description: The value of a trust established to hold the stock of an employee compensation and benefits plan as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Performance Obligation Satisfied in Previous Period
acct_description: Amount of revenue recognized from performance obligation satisfied or partially satisfied in previous reporting periods. Includes, but is not limited to, change in transaction price.

acct_label: Costs in Excess of Billings
acct_description: Amount of receivable reflecting the cost incurred on uncompleted contracts in excess of related billings.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Amount of Other Income (Loss) from Disposition of Discontinued Operations, before Income Tax (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Other pretax income (loss) amounts relating to a disposal group that is classified as a component of the entity, exclusive of the following elsewhere enumerated categories: income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, provision (or any reversals of earlier provisions) for loss on disposal, and adjustments of a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Meals and Entertainment, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to meals and entertainment expense.

acct_label: Excess of Replacement or Current Costs over Stated LIFO Value
acct_description: The excess of replacement or current cost over the stated LIFO (last in first out) inventory value when the LIFO inventory method is utilized.

acct_label: Extended Product Warranty Accrual
acct_description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of the aggregate extended product warranty liability. Does not include the ending balance for the standard product warranty liability.

acct_label: Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Additions from Business Acquisition
acct_description: Liability for an extended product warranty acquired in a business acquisition. Does not include any liability for a standard warranty acquired in a business acquisition.

acct_label: Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Decrease for Payments
acct_description: Amount of decrease in the extended product warranty accrual from payments made in cash or in kind to satisfy claims under the terms of the extended product warranty. Excludes standard product warranties.

acct_label: Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Increase for Warranties Issued
acct_description: Amount of increase in the extended product warranty accrual from warranties issued. Excludes standard product warranties.

acct_label: Insurance Recoveries
acct_description: The amount recovered from insurance. These recoveries reduce costs and losses that are reported as a separate line item under operating expenses.

acct_label: Minimum Net Capital Required for Entity
acct_description: Minimum amount of net capital required to be maintained by the entity to engage in securities transactions.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, on foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Payment to Acquire Life Insurance Policy, Investing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Restricted Investments
acct_description: The cash outflow to acquire investments (not to include restricted cash) that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

acct_label: Restricted Investments, at Fair Value
acct_description: The aggregate value of all restricted investments.

acct_label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Expected Cost Remaining
acct_description: Amount of expected cost remaining for the specified restructuring cost.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Change in Tax Rate, Deferred Tax Asset, Provisional Income Tax Expense (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax expense for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax asset from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), after Adjustments and Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), after Adjustments, Tax
acct_description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: AOCI, Derivative Qualifying as Hedge, Excluded Component, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative hedge.

acct_label: Accrued Advertising, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for advertising of the entity's goods and services. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Gift Card Liability, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liability for outstanding gift cards. Retail customers purchase gift cards or gift certificates that can be redeemed at a later date for merchandise or services; those unredeemed represent a liability of the entity because the revenue is being deferred.

acct_label: Cooperative Advertising Amount
acct_description: Total amount received by an entity from a vendor under a cooperative advertising arrangement that has been offset against advertising expense.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Depreciation (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of a tangible asset over the asset's useful life. This element applies only to an asset used in the production of goods sold.

acct_label: Customer Loyalty Program Liability, Current
acct_description: Value of deferred revenue or cost to provide products or services, which is expected to be recognized in income or incurred within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, resulting from customer loyalty program. Excludes liability associated with frequent flier programs. Includes liability associated with customer loyalty programs for other businesses, for example, but is not limited to, hotels, supermarkets, credit card companies, automobile rental companies, and book sellers.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Effective Percentage Rate Range, Maximum (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: When presenting a range of interest rates, the highest effective rate for funds borrowed under the debt agreement as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Effective Percentage Rate Range, Minimum (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: When presenting a range of interest rates, the lowest effective rate for funds borrowed under the debt agreement as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Other, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in other income tax contingencies.

acct_label: Insured Event, Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of excess (deficiency) of insurance recovery over the loss incurred from an insured event.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Contingent Rentals
acct_description: The increases or decreases in lease payments that result from changes occurring after the inception of the lease in the factors (other than the passage of time) on which lease payments are based, except that any escalation of minimum lease payments relating to increases in construction or acquisition cost of the leased property or for increases in some measure of cost or value during the construction or preconstruction period, are excluded from contingent rentals. Contingent rentals also may include amounts for which the triggering events have not yet occurred or the specified targets for which have not yet been achieved (such as sales based percentage rent), but which events are considered probable of occurring or which specified targets are considered probable of being achieved.

acct_label: Participating Securities, Distributed and Undistributed Earnings (Loss), Diluted
acct_description: Amount of earnings (loss) distributed and earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

acct_label: Payments for Other Fees
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for fees classified as other.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Tenant Allowance
acct_description: Net cash outflow or inflow from monetary allowance granted by the landlord to a tenant to entice tenant to move into landlords building which will enable the tenant to prepare the leased premises for tenants occupancy.

acct_label: Pre-Opening Costs
acct_description: Expenditures associated with opening new locations which are noncapital in nature and expensed as incurred.

acct_label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

acct_label: Revenue Recognition, Gift Cards, Breakage (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of breakage recognized related to unredeemed gift cards. Breakage occurs when a customer pays in advance of vendor performance and does not demand full performance for various reasons.

acct_label: Application of Recognition Provisions of FAS 158, Effect on Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Adjustment of accumulated other comprehensive income, net of tax, to reflect the application of FAS 158 recognition provisions. It excludes the adjustment to other comprehensive income to eliminate additional minimum pension liability (AML), as well as related intangible assets.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Equity Securities, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain, before Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of unrealized gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investments in equity securities classified as available-for-sale.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Equity Securities, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investments in equity securities classified as available-for-sale.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Other Noncurrent Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to other noncurrent assets not separately disclosed.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI, Cost
acct_description: Cost of investment in debt investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI). Excludes equity method investment and investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Contributions by Plan Participant
acct_description: Amount of contributions received by defined benefit plan from participant which increase benefit obligation.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Real Estate (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation percentage of investments in real estate to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

acct_label: Income Tax Effects Allocated Directly to Equity, Equity Transactions
acct_description: The tax effect of an increase or decrease in contributed capital (for example, deductible expenditures reported as a reduction of the proceeds from issuing capital stock) during the period charged or credited directly to shareholders' equity.

acct_label: Increase in Unrecognized Tax Benefits is Reasonably Possible
acct_description: Amount of increase reasonably possible in the next twelve months for the unrecognized tax benefit.

acct_label: Long Lived Assets Held-for-sale, Proceeds from Sale (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amounts received from the disposal of the long-lived asset during or after the reporting period.

acct_label: Municipal Debt Securities, at Carrying Value
acct_description: Bonds or similar securities issued by state, city, or local governments or the agencies operated by state, city, or local governments which are short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), before Adjustments and Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax and adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Quantifying Misstatement in Current Year Financial Statements, Amount
acct_description: Amount of each individual error being corrected in the correcting adjustment.

acct_label: Restricted Cash Equivalents
acct_description: Amount of cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average period between the balance sheet date and expiration for equity-based awards other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan), which may be expressed in a decimal value for number of years.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Grant Date Intrinsic Value
acct_description: The grant-date intrinsic value of options granted during the reporting period as calculated by applying the disclosed option pricing methodology.

acct_label: Treasury Stock Reissued at Lower than Repurchase Price
acct_description: In cases when treasury stock is reissued at a price lower than the cost to repurchase, the excess difference between the selling price and cost to repurchase is charged against retained earnings (assuming that all APIC arising from treasury stock transactions has first been exhausted).

acct_label: Equity Securities, FV-NI and without Readily Determinable Fair Value
acct_description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI) and investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

acct_label: Repayments of Commercial Paper
acct_description: The cash outflow due to repaying amounts borrowed by issuing commercial paper.

acct_label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Impairment Loss, Annual Amount
acct_description: Amount of impairment loss on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

acct_label: Common Stock Held in Trust
acct_description: Value of common stock held in trust.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate at Period End (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The effective interest rate at the end of the reporting period.

acct_label: Deferred Finance Costs, Own-share Lending Arrangement, Issuance Costs, Net
acct_description: Amount of issuance costs recognized in a share-lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing, after deduction of accumulated amortization or the effects of subsequent adjustments.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Plan Asset Allocations Range Maximum (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation maximum percentage of investments of this type to total plan assets presented on a weighted average basis.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Plan Asset Allocations Range Minimum (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation minimum percentage of investments of this type to total plan assets presented on a weighted average basis.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Accounts Payable, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as accounts payable attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Accrued Income Tax Payable, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount classified as income tax obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Gross Profit (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of gross profit attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Intangible Assets, Net (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: For the disposal group, including a component of the entity (discontinued operation), carrying value (net of any accumulated amortization and write-downs) of nonphysical assets (such as copyrights, customer lists, patents, trade names, core deposits, trade secrets, and contractual rights), not elsewhere itemized.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Income
acct_description: Amount of other income attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Pension Plan Benefit Obligation
acct_description: Amount classified as defined benefit plan benefit obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

acct_label: Financing Interest Expense
acct_description: This element represents interest incurred for borrowed money which was used to produce goods or render services.

acct_label: Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Derivative at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all interest rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

acct_label: Product Warranty Accrual, Currency Translation, Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Total Increase or Decrease in the standard and extended product warranty liability due to currency translation.

acct_label: Repayments of Senior Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow for a long-term debt where the holder has highest claim on the entity's asset in case of bankruptcy or liquidation during the period.

acct_label: Standard and Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) the standard and extended product warranty accrual.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Fair Value of Hedged Item in Interest Rate Fair Value Hedge
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) included in earnings related to the fair value of the hedged item in an interest rate fair value hedge, offset by the gain (loss) on the hedging instrument to the extent that the fair value hedge is determined to be effective.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income Minimum Pension Liability, after Tax (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: After tax amount of additional minimum pension liability not yet recognized as a net periodic pension cost.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Other, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other income tax settlements.

acct_label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits Resulting in Net Operating Loss Carryforward (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of an unrecognized tax benefit that is directly related to a position taken in a tax year that results in a net operating loss carryforward. This amount is presented as a reduction of the related deferred tax asset in the balance sheet if that deferred tax asset is not used. This amount is presented separately from the deferred tax asset for a net operating loss carryforward if this unrelated tax benefit is associated with a different tax position.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Related Parties
acct_description: Amount for accounts payable to related parties.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Other Income, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net gains or losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to other income from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Cost, Amortization
acct_description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of intangible asset over its useful life directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

acct_label: Cost, Depreciation
acct_description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible asset over its useful life directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

acct_label: Cost, Depreciation and Amortization
acct_description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible and intangible assets over their useful lives directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Amortization (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of the costs of intangible assets over the expected benefit period of such assets. This element applies only to intangible assets used in the production of goods.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Collateral Amount
acct_description: Amount of assets pledged to secure a debt instrument.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Fee Amount
acct_description: Amount of the fee that accompanies borrowing money under the debt instrument.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Recorded Liability
acct_description: The carrying amount of the liability as of the balance sheet date to an individual under a deferred compensation arrangement. This amount may be the result of periodic accruals made over the period of active employment, or reflect termination benefits resulting contractual terms or a death benefit.

acct_label: Due to Officers or Stockholders, Current
acct_description: Amounts due to recorded owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Foreign Currency Exchange Rate, Remeasurement
acct_description: Foreign exchange rate used to remeasure amounts denominated in a currency other than functional currency into functional currency.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Derivative Assets
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying value of derivative instruments reported as assets that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Insurance Settlements Receivable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in insurance settlements receivable, which are amounts due in settlement of a claim for reimbursement from an insurance company when the Company has suffered a loss covered under an insurance policy. The expectation is that such reimbursement will be received within one year of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Notes Receivable, Current
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of amounts due within one year (or one business cycle) from note holders for outstanding loans.

acct_label: Energy Related Inventory, Crude Oil, Products and Merchandise
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of finished goods inventories for petroleum products, crude oil, petrochemical products, and other oil and gas inventories.

acct_label: Investment Income, Net, Amortization of Discount and Premium
acct_description: Amount of accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) on nonoperating securities.

acct_label: Lessee, Finance Lease, Discount Rate
acct_description: Discount rate used by lessee to determine present value of finance lease payments.

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Discount Rate
acct_description: Discount rate used by lessee to determine present value of operating lease payments.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Accrual, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Other Inventory, in Transit, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount of merchandise or supplies to which the entity holds the title but does not hold physical possession because the goods are currently being transported.

acct_label: Other Postretirement Benefits Cost (Reversal of Cost)
acct_description: Amount of cost (reversal of cost) for other postretirement benefits. Excludes pension benefits.

acct_label: Pledged Assets, Not Separately Reported, Finance Receivables
acct_description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of finance receivables which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Finance Receivables Pledged as Collateral, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of finance receivables which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Loans Pledged as Collateral, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of loans which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation primarily arising from secured borrowings and repurchase agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Postemployment Benefits Liability, Current
acct_description: For a classified balance sheet, the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the portion of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement that is payable within one year of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Postemployment Benefits Liability, Noncurrent
acct_description: For a classified balance sheet, the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the portion of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement that is payable after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Discount
acct_description: Disclosure of the unamortized amount of the discount on the note or receivable which is deducted from the face amount of the receivable or loan. The discount or premium is the difference between the present value and the face amount.

acct_label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Effective Yield (Interest Rate)
acct_description: Yield on the receivable, on which interest has been imputed, as calculated from its issuance value or purchase price. The calculated effective interest rate considers factors such as the issued face value or price paid for the receivable, the time period between payments, and the time until maturity [full receipt] of the receivable.

acct_label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Treasury Stock
acct_description: Number of shares of treasury stock determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that treasury shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Treasury stock is stock that the Entity has issued but subsequently reacquired.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Cost of Acquired Entity, Equity Interests Issued and Issuable (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The acquisition-date fair value of the equity interests of the acquirer, including the number of instruments or interests issued or issuable in consideration for the business combination.

acct_label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred, Including Equity Interest in Acquiree Held Prior to Combination
acct_description: Fair value at acquisition-date of the assets transferred by the acquirer, liabilities incurred by the acquirer, and equity interests issued by the acquirer, including but not limited to, instruments or interests issued or issuable in consideration for the business combination.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Noncurrent Assets
acct_description: Amount of assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Step Acquisition, Equity Interest in Acquiree, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value at acquisition-date of the equity interest in the acquiree held by the acquirer, immediately before the acquisition date for businesses combined in stages.

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Transferor and Transferee, Proceeds from Collections Reinvested in Revolving Period Transfers
acct_description: Cash Flows between a transferor and a transferee attributable to collections reinvested in revolving period transfers related to either a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Transferor and Transferee, Proceeds from New Transfers
acct_description: Cash Flows between a transferor and a transferee attributable to newly transferred assets related to either a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Transferor and Transferee, Beneficial Interest
acct_description: Cash flows between transferee and transferor in payment of the transferor's beneficial interest related to a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction.

acct_label: Cash Segregated under Commodity Exchange Act Regulation
acct_description: Cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to the Commodity Exchange Act.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Benefit Obligation, Weighted-Average Interest Crediting Rate
acct_description: Weighted-average interest crediting rate used to determine benefit obligation of defined benefit plan. Plan includes, but is not limited to, cash balance and other defined benefit plans with promised interest crediting rate.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Weighted-Average Interest Crediting Rate
acct_description: Weighted-average interest crediting rate used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan. Plan includes, but is not limited to, cash balance and other defined benefit plans with promised interest crediting rate.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, (Increase) Decrease for Remeasurement due to Settlement
acct_description: Amount of (increase) decrease to benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from remeasurement due to settlement. Excludes decrease to benefit obligation for settlement payment.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Divestiture
acct_description: Amount of decrease in plan assets of defined benefit plan from disposal or classification as held-for-sale.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Other Plan Assets (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The percentage of the fair value of investments other than debt securities, equity securities, and real estate to the fair value of total plan assets held as of the measurement date.

acct_label: Continuing Involvement with Derecognized Transferred Financial Assets, Amount Outstanding
acct_description: Amount of transferred financial assets in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the assets underlying the transaction that have been derecognized. Continuing involvement includes, but is not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in transferred financial assets.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Accrued Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as accrued liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Intangible Assets, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as intangible assets, excluding goodwill, attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Effect on Future Earnings, Offset Amount
acct_description: The amount that will be offset against future earnings by anticipated increases or decreases in other expenses or revenues.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Dividends Paid to ESOP
acct_description: Dividends paid on stock held by an employee stock ownership plan.

acct_label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Noncontrolling Interest (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests of an equity method investment of the entity.

acct_label: Extinguishment of Debt, Gain (Loss), Per Share, Net of Tax
acct_description: Per share impact of the gain (loss) on the extinguishment of debt, net of applicable taxes.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Liability at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all foreign currency derivative liabilities not designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Impairment Effect on Earnings Per Share, after Tax
acct_description: After tax earnings per share or per unit impact arising from asset impairment.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Payables to Customers
acct_description: The change during the period, either increase or decrease, in amounts payable to customers. The term customers generally excludes other broker-dealers; persons who are principal officers, directors, and stockholders; and persons whose securities or funds are part of the regulatory net capital of the broker-dealer. Another broker-dealer's account can be classified as a customer if the account is carried as an omnibus account in compliance with certain regulations. The accounts of principal officers, directors and stockholders may be combined in the customer captions if they are not material and the combination is disclosed in the oath that is required to accompany the annual audited FOCUS Report.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Investments for Operating Activities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in marketable securities and investments pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

acct_label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Equity Forward Agreements
acct_description: Additional shared included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of equity forward arrangements using the reverse treasury stock method.

acct_label: Interest Rate Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Asset at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative assets not designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Interest Rate Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Liability at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative liabilities not designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Investments and Other Noncurrent Assets
acct_description: Amount of investments, and noncurrent assets classified as other.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments in Hedges, Net Investment in Foreign Operations, Assets, Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Net fair value of all derivatives designated as hedges of net investment in foreign operations.

acct_label: New Accounting Pronouncement or Change in Accounting Principle, Effect of Change on Diluted Earnings Per Share (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the effect of a change in accounting principle on diluted earnings per share.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Nonderivative Instruments
acct_description: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payments on a nonderivative instrument.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net Investment Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification and Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative designated and qualifying as net investment hedge.

acct_label: Payables to Customers
acct_description: Amounts payable to customers at the balance sheet date. The term customers generally excludes other broker-dealers; persons who are principal officers, directors, and stockholders; and persons whose securities or funds are part of the regulatory net capital of the broker-dealer. Another broker-dealer's account can be classified as a customer if the account is carried as an omnibus account in compliance with certain regulations. The accounts of principal officers, directors and stockholders may be combined in the customer captions if they are not material and the combination is disclosed in the oath that is required to accompany the annual audited FOCUS Report.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Retained Interest in Securitized Receivables
acct_description: The cash outflow for the purchase of a retained interest in a receivable securitized via a structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

acct_label: Price Risk Cash Flow Hedge Asset, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative assets designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

acct_label: Price Risk Cash Flow Hedge Liability, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative liabilities designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

acct_label: Price Risk Cash Flow Hedge Unrealized Gain (Loss) to be Reclassified During Next 12 Months
acct_description: The estimated net amount of unrealized gains or losses on price risk cash flow hedges as of the balance sheet date expected to be reclassified to earnings within the next twelve months.

acct_label: Price Risk Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments Asset, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative assets not designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Price Risk Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments Liability, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative liabilities not designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Proceeds from Collection of Retained Interest in Securitized Receivables
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from collection on beneficial interest in securitization of receivables.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Receivables
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of receivables classified as other.

acct_label: Qualitative and Quantitative Information, Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Principal Amount Outstanding, Continued Recognition, Amount (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: This includes the recognized portion of the total principal amount of financial assets which have been either securitized, used in an asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer which are accounted for as sales and in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in transferred financial assets).

acct_label: Qualitative and Quantitative Information, Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Principal Amount Outstanding, Derecognized Amount (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: This includes only the derecognized portion of the total principal amount of financial assets which have been either securitized, used in an asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfers which are accounted for as sales and in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in transferred financial assets).

acct_label: Qualitative and Quantitative Information, Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Principal Amount Outstanding (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The total principal outstanding of financial assets transferred in a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer that has been accounted for as sales and in which the transferor continues to have involvement, including both the derecognized and recognized portion of such transferred assets.

acct_label: Qualitative and Quantitative Information, Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Arrangements of Financial Support, Amount
acct_description: The transferor's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its continuing involvement in transferred financial assets.

acct_label: Reinsurance Payable
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the known and estimated amounts owed to insurers under reinsurance treaties or other arrangements.

acct_label: Repayments of Accounts Receivable Securitization
acct_description: Repayments of securitizations of receivables treated as collateralized borrowings, which are classified as financing transactions.

acct_label: Retained Interest, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of interest continued to be held by a transferor after transferring financial assets to a third party.

acct_label: Revenue from External Customers (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenue from external customers for the reportable segment. Such disclosure is presented if the amount is: (a) included in the measure of segment profit or loss reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in that measure of segment profit or loss.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Held-for-Sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, after Valuation Allowance
acct_description: Amount, after valuation allowance, of accounts receivable held for sale and not part of disposal group.

acct_label: Transfer of Financial Assets Accounted for as Sales, Amount Derecognized
acct_description: Amount of derecognized financial assets from transactions which comprise an initial transfer and an agreement entered into in contemplation of the initial transfer resulting in retention of substantially all of the exposure to the economic return throughout the term of the transaction, at the date of derecognition.

acct_label: Transfer of Financial Assets Accounted for as Sales, Cash Proceeds Received for Assets Derecognized, Amount
acct_description: Amount, before counterparty netting, of cash proceeds received in transfers of derecognized financial assets from transactions which comprise an initial transfer and an agreement entered into in contemplation of the initial transfer resulting in retention of substantially all of the exposure to the economic return throughout the term of the transaction.

acct_label: Transfer of Financial Assets Accounted for as Sales, Fair Value of Derecognized Assets
acct_description: Fair value of derecognized financial assets from transactions which comprise an initial transfer and an agreement entered into in contemplation of the initial transfer resulting in retention of substantially all of the exposure to the economic return throughout the term of the transaction.

acct_label: Derivatives used in Net Investment Hedge, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of cumulative translation adjustment attributable to gain (loss) on foreign currency derivatives that are designated as, and are effective as, economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Marketable Securities, Cost Method Investments, and Other Investments
acct_description: The aggregate net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of marketable securities categorized as trading held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period, which may have arisen from (a) securities classified as trading, (b) the unrealized holding gain (loss) on held-to-maturity securities transferred to the trading security category, and (c) the cumulative unrealized gain (loss) which was included in other comprehensive income (a separate component of shareholders' equity) on available-for-sale securities transferred to trading securities during the period and/or any unrealized gains or losses on investments that are separately or otherwise not categorized as trading or available-for-sale.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain, before Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain recognized in the income statement.

acct_label: Dividends Receivable
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but not received.

acct_label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Impairment Loss, Cumulative Amount
acct_description: Amount of cumulative impairment loss on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

acct_label: Allowance for Funds Used During Construction, Investing Activities
acct_description: Cash inflow due to change during the period in the allowance for other funds used during construction classified as an investing activity.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Electric (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Total costs related to electricity produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Cost of Services, Depreciation and Amortization (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Depreciation of property, plant and equipment directly related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period.

acct_label: Customer Advances for Construction
acct_description: For utilities only, represents the carrying amount of the liability as of the balance sheet date for payments received by a utility from its customers in advance of performing its obligations under terms of its construction agreements.

acct_label: Energy Related Inventory, Other Fossil Fuel
acct_description: Amount of fossil fuel included in inventory classified as other.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Regulatory Clause Revenue
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in unrecovered fuel costs for a regulated utility company.

acct_label: Nuclear Fuel, Net of Amortization
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet of nuclear fuel held as property plant and equipment. This amount is net of amortization based on the energy produced over the life of the fuel.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Investments to be Held in Decommissioning Trust Fund
acct_description: The cash outflow for the purchase of investments that will be held in a decommissioning trust fund.

acct_label: Proceeds from Contribution in Aid of Construction
acct_description: The cash inflow from developers, builders, governmental agencies and municipalities that provide the entity with cash to extend its construction services to their properties.

acct_label: Proceeds from Decommissioning Trust Fund Assets
acct_description: The cash inflow from the sale of assets held in a decommissioning trust fund.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's assets included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

acct_label: Acquisition Costs, Cumulative
acct_description: The capitalized costs incurred (excluded from amortization), as of the date of the balance sheet, to purchase, lease or otherwise acquire an unproved property, including costs of lease bonuses and options to purchase or lease properties, the portion of costs applicable to minerals when land including mineral rights is purchased in fee, brokers' fees, recording fees, legal costs, and other costs incurred in acquiring properties.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Dividends in Excess of Retained Earnings
acct_description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from dividends legally declared (or paid) in excess of retained earnings balance.

acct_label: Capitalized Costs of Unproved Properties Excluded from Amortization, Cumulative
acct_description: The sum of the capitalized costs incurred, as of the balance sheet date, of unproved properties excluded from amortization including acquisition costs, exploration costs, development costs, and production costs.

acct_label: Common Stock Dividends, Shares
acct_description: Number of shares of common stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as current.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Increase (Decrease), Net
acct_description: Net increase or decrease in the carrying amount of the debt instrument for the period.

acct_label: Derivative Financial Instruments, Assets, Fair Value Disclosure (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Derivative financial instruments meeting the definition of an asset which the Company is a party to as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Equity Method Investment Retained after Disposal, Ownership Interest Prior to Disposal
acct_description: Percent, prior to disposal, of ownership interest of a discontinued operation in which an equity method investment is retained.

acct_label: Due from Related Parties, Noncurrent
acct_description: Aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date. which are usually due after one year (or one business cycle).

acct_label: Fair Value, Net Derivative Asset (Liability) Measured on Recurring Basis, Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Net Derivative Asset (Liability) Measured on Recurring Basis, Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Transfers, Net
acct_description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset) into (out of) level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Outstanding Checks, Financing Activities
acct_description: The change in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in outstanding checks, the liability that represents checks that have been issued but that have not cleared. The entity may classify these cash flows as financing or operating activities.

acct_label: Inventory, Gas in Storage Underground, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of natural gas stored underground in depleted gas reservoirs, aquifers, or salt caverns to meet future seasonal and peak load demands and also as insurance against unforeseen supply disruptions, and deemed to be a noncurrent asset because it is not expected to be used within 12 months or in the normal operating cycle.

acct_label: Natural Gas Storage Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from storage facilities, such as a LNG ( Liquefied Natural Gas) storage facility.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Property, Full Cost Method, Gross
acct_description: Oil and gas properties, gross, carried under the full cost method.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method, Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion Amortization and Impairment
acct_description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization and impairment of oil and gas property carried under the successful effort method.

acct_label: Other Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
acct_description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates, classified as other. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

acct_label: Other Inventory, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of inventories not expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within the normal operating cycle (such as inventory related to long-term contracts or program rights).

acct_label: Preferred Stock Dividends, Shares
acct_description: Number of shares of preferred stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Convertible Preferred Stock
acct_description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stocks identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.

acct_label: Proceeds from Other Short-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from short-term debt classified as other.

acct_label: Redeemable Preferred Stock Dividends
acct_description: Dividends paid to preferred stock holders that is redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Income Tax Expense (Benefit) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of income tax expense or benefit attributed to a reportable segment.

acct_label: Senior Notes, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of Notes with the highest claim on the assets of the issuer in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion. Senior note holders are paid off in full before any payments are made to junior note holders.

acct_label: Senior Notes, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term notes having the highest claim on the assets of the issuer in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Senior note holders are paid off in full before any payments are made to debt holders having a lesser priority of repayment.

acct_label: Time Deposits, at Carrying Value
acct_description: Any certificate of deposit or savings account held by a bank or other financial institution for a short-term specified period of time. Because of their short-term, time deposits are considered highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
acct_description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, from recovery.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Payment for Settlement
acct_description: Amount of payment, which decreases benefit obligation of defined benefit plan, for irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk for obligation and assets used to effect settlement. Transaction constituting settlement includes, but is not limited to, making lump-sum cash payment to participant in exchange for their rights to receive specified benefits and purchasing nonparticipating annuity contract. Excludes decreases to benefit obligation for remeasurement due to settlement.

acct_label: Accelerated Share Repurchase Program, Adjustment
acct_description: The amount needed to adjust previously recorded stockholders' equity balances to the actual aggregate amounts paid, whether in cash or other consideration, to acquire all of the shares purchased under an Accelerated Share Repurchase arrangement.

acct_label: Additions to Other Assets, Amount
acct_description: Amount of significant additions in the period in other assets (current, noncurrent, or unclassified).

acct_label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, ESPP, Increase for Cost Recognition
acct_description: Amount of increase in additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for employee stock purchase program (ESPP) award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Preacquisition Contingency, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount assigned in the purchase price allocation to the preacquisition contingency.

acct_label: Capital Expenditure, Discontinued Operations
acct_description: Amount of capital expenditure attributable to discontinued operations.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Long Lived Assets, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount classified as long lived assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Maintenance Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred and are directly related to generating maintenance revenues. Also includes cost of maintenance on client contracts.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as current.

acct_label: Other Labor-related Expenses
acct_description: Amount of labor-related expenses classified as other.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Life Insurance Policies
acct_description: The net cash outflow or inflow for net proceeds and payments derived from carrying life insurance policies for which the entity is the beneficiary.

acct_label: Recorded Third-Party Environmental Recoveries Receivable
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of known and reasonably estimable amounts of recoveries from third-parties pertaining to an entity's environmental remediation obligations. An entity's balance sheet may include several assets that relate to an environmental remediation obligation. Among them are the following: a.
