Receivables from other potentially responsible parties that are not providing initial funding; b. anticipated recoveries from insurers; and c. anticipated recoveries from prior owners as a result of indemnification agreements.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Other Share Increase (Decrease) in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
acct_description: Weighted average price at which grantees could acquire or could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to any other type of change in shares reserved for issuance.

acct_label: Undistributed Earnings Allocated to Participating Securities (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Earnings allocated (not distributed) to participating securities under the two-class method to the extent that participating securities may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

acct_label: Workers' Compensation Liability, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations and payables pertaining to claims incurred of a workers compensation nature. Used to reflect the noncurrent portion of the liabilities (due beyond one year; or beyond one operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Cumulative Effect on Retained Earnings, before Tax (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the cumulative effect on retained earnings before related income tax effect.

acct_label: Debt and Equity Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense, Capitalized Software
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from capitalized software.

acct_label: Environmental Cost Recognized, Recovery Credited to Expense (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of any recovery from third parties that is credited to environmental remediation costs in the reporting period.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Increase (Decrease), Other, Net
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease), classified as other, of the credit facility.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Receivable, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of receivables pertaining to a loss contingency.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Derivative Instruments Designated as Net Investment Hedges (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of all derivatives designated as a hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation. The notional amount relates to a number of currency units, shares, bushels, pounds, or other units specified in a derivative instrument.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), before Adjustments, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax and before adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Other Nonrecurring (Income) Expense
acct_description: Amount of other expense (income) that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

acct_label: Recovery of Direct Costs
acct_description: Return of or reimbursements received in relation to direct costs and expenses previously paid or incurred.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain on Securities
acct_description: The increase (decrease), resulting in a gain, in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of securities held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

acct_label: Hedged Asset, Fair Value Hedge, Cumulative Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged asset in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk.

acct_label: Proceeds from Hedge, Investing Activities
acct_description: The cash inflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either a cash flow hedge, fair value hedge, or hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation.

acct_label: Treasury Stock, Retired, Par Value Method, Amount
acct_description: Amount of decrease of par value, additional paid in capital (APIC) and retained earnings of common and preferred stock retired from treasury when treasury stock is accounted for under the par value method.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Property (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to land and building to be used in the normal course of business, not including assets that are held-for-sale.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Equipment
acct_description: Amount of tangible personal property used to produce goods and services, including, but is not limited to, tools, dies and molds, computer and office equipment, acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Income Statement, Sales Type Lease Revenue
acct_description: Revenue realized in the period on sales type leases.

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Retainage
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer withheld under retainage provision in long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional.

acct_label: Construction Loan
acct_description: This element represents the carrying value of a short-term real estate loan to finance building costs. The funds are disbursed as needed or in accordance with a prearranged plan; generally, a portion of the funds is disbursed at inception and the remainder as construction progresses. The money is repaid on completion of the project, usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property. Note that there are separate concepts for the current and noncurrent portions of long-term construction loans.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Loans
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loans classified as other.

acct_label: Payments for Purchase of Other Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Cash paid to purchase assets other than those represented by other elements (securities, loans, mortgages, real estate).

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Equipment on Lease
acct_description: The cash outflow for payments to acquire rented equipment which is recorded as an asset.

acct_label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Gross
acct_description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services subject to or available for lease.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Lease Income
acct_description: Amount of lease income from variable lease payments, interest income from net investment on sales-type lease, and profit (loss) recognized at commencement.

acct_label: Advance Rent
acct_description: Amount at the balance sheet date that has been received by the entity that represents rents paid in advance.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Leased Assets, Net, Operating Leases
acct_description: The net gain (loss) arising from the lessor's sale of assets held- or available-for-lease under contractual arrangements classified as operating leases.

acct_label: Amortization of Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSRs)
acct_description: The periodic amortization (in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income or loss) of capitalized servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

acct_label: Amount Available for Dividend Distribution without Prior Approval from Regulatory Agency (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of dividends that may be paid or declared in any calendar year without prior approval of regulatory agencies.

acct_label: Asset-Backed Securities, at Carrying Value
acct_description: Investments in notes or bonds that are collateralized by a specific group of underlying assets owned by the issuer of the notes or bonds which are short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

acct_label: Assumption for Fair Value of Assets or Liabilities that relate to Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Discount Rate
acct_description: Discount rate which is used to value residual cash flows generated by financial assets of a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer regardless of when the transfer occurred.

acct_label: Assumption for Fair Value of Assets or Liabilities that relate to Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Prepayment Speed
acct_description: Estimated rate of prepayment of principal on financial assets regardless of when the transfer occurred.

acct_label: Average Balance During Period of Loans Held-in-portfolio (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: This is the result of the average balance during the period of total loans managed or securitized less securitized loans and loans that are in the process of being securitized.

acct_label: Bank Owned Life Insurance
acct_description: The carrying amount of a life insurance policy on an officer, executive or employee for which the reporting entity (a bank) is entitled to proceeds from the policy upon death of the insured or surrender of the insurance policy.

acct_label: Bank Owned Life Insurance Income
acct_description: Earnings on or other increases in the value of the cash surrender value of bank owned life insurance policies.

acct_label: Brokerage Commissions Revenue
acct_description: Amount of commission revenue from buying and selling securities on behalf of customers.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Assets
acct_description: Amount of assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Carrying Value of Federal Funds Purchased, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, and Deposits Received for Securities Loaned
acct_description: Carrying value of federal funds purchased and securities sold under repurchase agreements and deposits received for securities loaned.

acct_label: Cash Acquired in Excess of Payments to Acquire Business
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the acquisition of a business when the cash held by the acquired business exceeds the cash payments to acquire the business.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Reclassifications from Nonaccretable Difference
acct_description: Change in the estimate of cash flows expected to be collected, after acquisition of a loan, which results in an increase in accretable yield (for example, if actual cash flows are significantly greater than previously expected). This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield
acct_description: Amount of the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Accretion
acct_description: Amount of accretion recognized for the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Additions
acct_description: Amount of additions to the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Debt and Equity Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Nonaccrual, Interest Income
acct_description: Amount of interest income on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), on nonaccrual status.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Past Due
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), past due.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Sold, Amount
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security, measured at amortized cost, sold.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Gain
acct_description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Loss
acct_description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other Loss Carryforwards
acct_description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible loss carryforwards, classified as other.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Provision for Loan Losses
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the provision for loan losses.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Mortgage Servicing Rights
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from mortgage servicing rights.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Prepaid Pension Costs (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount as of the balance sheet date of the estimated future tax effects attributable to the difference between the tax basis of pension liabilities funded in advance and the basis of a prepaid pension asset determined in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles. The difference in basis of such costs will increase future taxable income when such basis difference reverses. Prepaid pension costs represented the cumulative employer's contributions in excess of net pension cost recognized, before the adoption of the recognition provisions of FAS 158. Under FAS 158, prepaid pension costs are no longer recognized in the statement of financial position.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Debt Securities, Range Maximum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation maximum percentage of investments in debt securities to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Debt Securities, Range Minimum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation minimum percentage of investments in debt securities to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Other, Range Maximum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation maximum percentage in other than debt securities, equity securities, and real estate to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Other, Range Minimum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation minimum percentage in other than debt securities, equity securities, and real estate to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

acct_label: Demand Deposit Accounts
acct_description: The amount of money in accounts that may bear interest and that the depositor is entitled to withdraw at any time without prior notice.

acct_label: Deposits, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of deposit liabilities held by the entity, including, but not limited to, foreign and domestic, interest and noninterest bearing, demand deposits, saving deposits, negotiable orders of withdrawal (NOW) and time deposits.

acct_label: Deposits, Money Market Deposits
acct_description: Amount of deposits in accounts that offer many of the same services as checking accounts although transactions may be somewhat more limited, share some of the characteristics of a money market fund and are insured by the Federal government, also known as money market accounts.

acct_label: Deposits, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW)
acct_description: Amount of deposits in interest-bearing transaction accounts at banks or savings and loans, that are restricted in regard to ownership and can usually only be held by individuals, nonprofit entities and governments. Negotiable order of withdrawal accounts differ from money market demand accounts as they typically have higher reserve requirements and no limit on the number of checks that can be written.

acct_label: Equipment Expense
acct_description: This element represents equipment expense including depreciation, repairs, rentals, and service contract costs. This item also includes equipment purchases which do not qualify for capitalization in accordance with the entity's accounting policy. This item may also include furniture expenses.

acct_label: Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation Premium Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance.

acct_label: Federal Funds Purchased
acct_description: Amount of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank.

acct_label: Federal Funds Purchased and Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
acct_description: Amount after offset of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank and securities that an entity sells and agrees to repurchase at a specified date for a specified price.

acct_label: Federal Funds Sold and Securities Borrowed or Purchased under Agreements to Resell, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of federal funds sold and securities borrowed or purchased under agreements to resell.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Branch of FHLB Bank, Weighted Average Interest Rate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Describes the weighted average interest rate applicable to the specific advances from the Federal Home Loan Bank, by branch, as of the Balance Sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Disclosures, Repayment and Penalties
acct_description: Amount of repayments and penalties incurred in the satisfaction or roll-over of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) advance.

acct_label: Long-term Federal Home Loan Bank Advances
acct_description: Including both current and noncurrent portions, Federal Home Loan Bank borrowings initially due beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Short-term (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Federal Home Loan Bank borrowings due within one year of the latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Weighted Average Interest Rate
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank Stock and Federal Reserve Bank Stock
acct_description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) and Federal Reserve Bank stock.

acct_label: Federal Reserve Bank Stock
acct_description: Federal Reserve Bank stock represents an equity interest in the Federal Reserve Bank. It does not have a readily determinable fair value because its ownership is restricted and it lacks a market (liquidity).

acct_label: Fees and Commissions, Depositor Accounts (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Includes amounts charged depositors for: (1) maintenance of their accounts (maintenance charges); (2) failure to maintain specified minimum balances on account; (3) exceeding the number of checks or transactions allowed to be processed in a given period; (4) checks drawn on no minimum balance deposit accounts; (5) withdrawals from nontransaction deposit accounts; (6) closing savings accounts before a specified minimum period of time has elapsed; (7) accounts which have remained inactive for extended periods of time or which have become dormant; (8) use of automated teller machines or remote service units; (9) checks drawn against insufficient funds that the bank assesses regardless of whether it decides to pay, return or hold the check; (10) issuing stop payment orders; (11) certifying checks; and (12) accumulating or disbursing funds deposited in IRAs or Keogh Plan accounts when not handled by the bank's trust department. This item does not include penalties assessed on the early withdrawal of time deposits.

acct_label: Fees and Commissions, Fiduciary and Trust Activities (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Income from services rendered by trust departments or by any consolidated subsidiaries acting in a fiduciary capacity, including fees earned for (1) acting as an agent for fiduciary placement and loans and (2) custody or investment advisory services when such fees are not separately billed to the customer. This item excludes commissions and fees received for the accumulation or disbursement of funds deposited to Individual Retirement or Keogh plan accounts when such are not handled by the reporting entity's trust department.

acct_label: Fees and Commissions, Mortgage Banking and Servicing
acct_description: Income from mortgage banking activities (fees and commissions) and servicing real estate mortgages, credit cards, and other financial assets held by others net of any related impairment of capitalized service costs. Also includes any premiums received in lieu of regular servicing fees on such loans only as earned over the life of the loans.

acct_label: Financial Assets Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Gross Including Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
acct_description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a financial asset repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same financial asset at a date certain for a specified price. Includes repurchase-to-maturity transactions and liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

acct_label: Financial Services Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate financial services revenue and operating interest income earned during the reporting period.

acct_label: Financing Receivable (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the recorded investment in a contractual right to receive money on demand or on fixed or determinable dates that is recognized as an asset in the creditor's statement of financial position. Examples include, but are not limited to, accounts receivable (with terms exceeding one year), notes receivable and receivables relating to lessor's rights to payments from leases other than operating leases that have been recorded as assets.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Individually Evaluated for Impairment (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were individually evaluated for impairment.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual, No Allowance
acct_description: Amount of financing receivable on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Allowance for Credit Loss at Acquisition Date
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss at acquisition date of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Amount at Par Value
acct_description: Amount at par value of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Amount at Purchase Price
acct_description: Amount at purchase price of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Discount (Premium)
acct_description: Amount of discount (premium) attributable to other factors on financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Not Past Due
acct_description: Amount of financing receivable not past due.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Revolving
acct_description: Amount of financing receivable that can be withdrawn, repaid and redrawn.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Revolving, Converted to Term Loan
acct_description: Amount of revolving financing receivable converted to term loan.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Core Deposits, Gross
acct_description: Bank deposits belonging to an acquired bank that can be counted on as a stable source of lending funds. These deposits have the following attributes: predictable costs and low sensitivity to interest rates. This intangible asset is usually amortized over its estimated useful life.

acct_label: Foreclosed Real Estate Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense recognized during the period for the foreclosure on real estate assets.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Derivatives Recorded in Earnings, Net
acct_description: Aggregate impact of foreign currency derivatives on earnings for the period. Includes impact of foreign currency cash flow hedge ineffectiveness and the ineffectiveness of fair value hedging derivatives and full change in fair value of the foreign currency derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Mortgage Loans
acct_description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans made to finance real estate acquisitions. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sales of Mortgage Backed Securities (MBS)
acct_description: Net gain (loss) resulting from the sales of securitized, pay-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans (mortgages).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Accumulated Loss
acct_description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous loss position for 12 months or longer.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Aggregate Losses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the excess of amortized cost basis over fair value of securities that have been in a loss position for twelve months or longer for those securities which are categorized as held-to-maturity.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Unrealized Loss Position, Accumulated Loss
acct_description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in unrealized loss position.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Aggregate Losses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the excess of amortized cost basis over fair value of securities in a loss position and which are categorized as held-to-maturity.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Unrealized Loss Position, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in unrealized loss position.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Accumulated Loss
acct_description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous loss position for less than 12 months.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Aggregate Losses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the excess of amortized cost basis over fair value of securities that have been in a loss position for less than twelve months for those securities which are categorized as held-to-maturity.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Amortized Cost
acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Fair Value Disclosure (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the portion of the balance sheet assertion valued at fair value by the entity whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission. This item represents investments in debt securities which are categorized as held-to-maturity and that have scheduled maturities more than one year from the balance sheet date or operating cycle, if longer; such investments are normally measured at amortized cost (carrying value) unless circumstances indicate that the value to be recovered from the investment is less than its carried amount. The held-to-maturity category is for those securities that the Company has the positive intent and ability to hold until maturity.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Sold Security, at Carrying Value (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: For any sales of securities categorized as held-to-maturity, this item represents the net carrying amount of the sold security.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Sold, Realized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Aggregate Loss (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss on investments in held-to-maturity securities that have been in a loss position for twelve months or longer.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Aggregate Loss (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss on investments in held-to-maturity securities.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Aggregate Loss (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss before deducting unrealized gain on investments in held-to-maturity securities that have been in a loss position for less than twelve months.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with No Related Allowance, Recorded Investment
acct_description: Amount of investment in impaired financing receivables for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with No Related Allowance, Unpaid Principal Balance
acct_description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables for which there is no related allowance for credit losses.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with Related Allowance, Average Recorded Investment
acct_description: Amount of average investment of impaired financing receivables for which there is a related allowance for credit losses.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with Related Allowance, Interest Income, Accrual Method
acct_description: Amount of interest income, recognized on accrual basis, on financing receivables, for which there is a related allowance for credit losses and are recognized as impaired.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with Related Allowance, Recorded Investment
acct_description: Amount of investment in impaired financing receivables for which there is a related allowance for credit losses.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with Related Allowance, Unpaid Principal Balance
acct_description: Unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables for which there is a related allowance for credit losses.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) Cash Collateral from Counterparties
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of cash held either as collateral directly or provided to third parties associated with derivative instruments. Upon the occurrence of any specified triggering event or condition associated with the derivative, these amounts can be utilized to recover all or a portion of the amounts due or payable under the derivative.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of loans or securitized loans that are held with the intention to sell in the near future.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Payables to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations incurred arising from transactions with broker-dealers, such as amounts due on margin and unsettled cash transactions; includes payables to brokers, dealers and clearing organizations.

acct_label: Information Technology and Data Processing
acct_description: The amount of expenses incurred in the period for information technology and data processing products and services.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Federal Funds Purchased and Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
acct_description: The aggregate expense incurred on federal funds purchased and securities sold under agreements to repurchase. If amounts recognized as payables under repurchase agreements have been offset against amounts recognized as receivables under reverse repurchase agreements and reported as a net amount on the balance sheet, the income and expense from these agreements may be reported on a net basis.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Other Short-term Borrowings
acct_description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on other short-term borrowings.

acct_label: Interest Income, Federal Funds Sold and Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
acct_description: The aggregate interest income earned from (1) the lending of excess federal funds to another commercial bank requiring such for its legal reserve requirements and (2) securities purchased under agreements to resell.

acct_label: Interest Income, Securities, Operating, Taxable
acct_description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities subject to state, federal and other income tax.

acct_label: Interest Income, Securities, Operating, Tax Exempt
acct_description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities exempt from state, federal and other income tax.

acct_label: Junior Subordinated Debenture Owed to Unconsolidated Subsidiary Trust
acct_description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, the carrying value of junior subordinated long-term debt owed to unconsolidated subsidiary trusts as of the balance sheet date. Such debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets and was initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Leases Receivable, Gross, Commercial, Lease Financing (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of commercial leases and leveraged lease transactions where the entity is long-term creditor. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loan Processing Fee
acct_description: Expenses paid for obtaining loans which includes expenses such as application and origination fees.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Commercial (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of commercial loans and leases receivable includes, but not limited to, commercial and industrial loans, agricultural loans, mortgage loans, promissory notes, interbank and other loans to financial institutions, draws against credit facilities, trade financing, lease financings. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of consumer loans, including, but not limited to, mortgage, home equity, vehicles, credit card, installment, and lease financing. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Home Equity (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of revolving, open-end loan, extended under a line of credit and secured by the borrower's residential property. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Installment and Revolving (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of installment and revolving loans issued to individuals, including, but not limited to credit card, automobile, boat, student, durable home appliance loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Mortgage (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of consumer mortgage. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes subordinated loans such as home equity lines of credit and loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Additions
acct_description: Reflects the amount of new advances made to related parties in the form of loan and lease receivables.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Collections (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the amount of collections received from related parties to reduce the carrying amounts of loans and leases receivable due from them.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Proceeds
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from related parties which reduce the amount of loans and leases receivable due from related parties.

acct_label: Loans Held-for-sale, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of loans held-for-sale including, but not limited to, mortgage loans and finance receivables.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Commercial and Industrial (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of loans issued to commercial and industrial institutions. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes real estate loans and loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Commercial, Construction (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of commercial construction loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Commercial, Real Estate (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of commercial loans issued to businesses to acquire, develop, construct, improve, or refinance land or building. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Loans Receivable, Net (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount classified as loans attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Held-for-Sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, after Valuation Allowance
acct_description: Amount, after valuation allowance, of financing receivable held for sale and not part of disposal group. Excludes loan covered under loss sharing agreement and loan classified as investment in debt security.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Payments (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of payments made reducing loss contingency liability.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Receivable, Additions
acct_description: Amount of additions to receivables pertaining to a loss contingency.

acct_label: Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSR) Impairment (Recovery)
acct_description: The adjustment to the carrying value of the rights retained or purchased to service mortgages. These adjustments are made when the estimate of the fair value is changed. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

acct_label: Noninterest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Demand
acct_description: Amount of money in noninterest-bearing domestic accounts that entitle the depositor to withdraw funds at any time without prior notice, also known as demand deposits.

acct_label: Origination of Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSRs) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The increase during the reporting period in the cumulative value of servicing rights. This increase is the result of new servicing rights that are created when mortgages are sold or transferred.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Unamortized Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Pretax change in the value of either the benefit obligation or the plan assets resulting from experience different from that assumed or from a change in an actuarial assumption, or the consequence of a decision to temporarily deviate from the substantive plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost.

acct_label: Other Derivatives Not Designated as Hedging Instruments at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Net fair value of all derivative instruments not designated as a hedging instrument.

acct_label: Other Real Estate and Foreclosed Assets
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of other real estate and foreclosed assets. Other real estate may include real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. Foreclosed assets include all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings.

acct_label: Payments for Origination and Purchases of Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The aggregate amount of cash outflow for loans purchased and created with the intention to resell them in the near future.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) from acquisition (sale) of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) stock.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock.

acct_label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Loans Receivable, for Federal Home Loan Bank Debt
acct_description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of loans receivable which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of FHLB debt obligations, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Securities
acct_description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to another party to serve as collateral to partially or fully secure a debt obligation, repurchase agreement or other current or potential obligation, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Redemption Amount
acct_description: The redemption (or callable) amount of currently redeemable preferred stock. Includes amounts representing dividends not currently declared or paid but which will be payable under the redemption features or for which ultimate payment is solely within the control of the issuer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Other Investments
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the maturity (principal being due), prepayment and call (request of early payment) of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash inflow from Sales of Loans Held For Investment.

acct_label: Real Estate, Write-down or Reserve, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of any write-down or reserve provided in the period on a real estate investment.

acct_label: Payments of FHLBank Borrowings, Financing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for repayment of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost, Other than Temporary Impairments
acct_description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) applied to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost
acct_description: Amortized amount of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost, Additions
acct_description: Amount of additions from purchases, assumption or transfer to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Value, Amortization (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Decreases in the value of servicing assets due to the periodic amortization in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost, Amortization
acct_description: Amount of amortization of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Value, Other than Temporary Impairments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Adjustment made to the carrying value of servicing assets measured using the amortization method related to an other-than-temporary impairment, for example, due to a decrease in future servicing income or an increase in servicing costs.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Additions
acct_description: The value of new servicing assets, subsequently measured at fair value, acquired or created during the current period through purchases or from transfers of financial assets.

acct_label: Transfer of Portfolio Loans and Leases to Held-for-sale (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Value of loans and leases held in the entity's portfolio to loans and leases held-for-sale in noncash transactions.

acct_label: Undistributed Earnings, Diluted
acct_description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed. Includes the adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

acct_label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Deductions for Aggregate Write-Downs
acct_description: Amount of decrease in the valuation allowance for impairment of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer from write-downs charged against the allowance.

acct_label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Balance
acct_description: Reflects the estimated amount of impairment as of the balance sheet date of recognized servicing assets that are being amortized in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income or loss.

acct_label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Additions (Deductions) for Expenses (Recoveries)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for impairment of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer from expenses (recoveries) recognized.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
acct_description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Amount
acct_description: Fair value of an asset representing net future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues, in excess of future costs related to servicing arrangements.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Changes in Fair Value Resulting from Changes in Valuation Inputs or Changes in Assumptions
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value from changes in the inputs, assumptions, or model used to calculate the fair value of the contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Disposals
acct_description: Decrease in servicing assets subsequently measured at fair value resulting from conveyance of servicing rights to unrelated parties.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Other Changes in Fair Value
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) from changes in fair value classified as other for a contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Affordable Housing Project Investment, Write-down, Amount
acct_description: Amount of write-down from impairment of an investment in a qualified affordable housing project.

acct_label: Distributed Earnings
acct_description: The total amount of dividends declared in the period for each class of stock and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid for the period (for example, unpaid cumulative dividends). Dividends declared in the current period do not include dividends declared in respect of prior-period unpaid cumulative dividends. Preferred dividends that are cumulative only if earned are deducted only to the extent that they are earned.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Loans from Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loans from another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Prepayment Fees on Advances, Net
acct_description: Amount of income earned, after hedging basis adjustments, from fees charged for prepayment of certain Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances before original maturity.

acct_label: Proceeds from FHLBank Borrowings, Financing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.

acct_label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to common stock as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

acct_label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Available to Common Shareholders, Diluted
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss), allocated to common stock, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Cash Flow Hedging Instruments
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) related to derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments, recorded in results of operations to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be ineffective.

acct_label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Downward Price Adjustment, Cumulative Amount
acct_description: Amount of cumulative loss from downward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Related Parties, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

acct_label: Due to Officers or Stockholders
acct_description: Amounts due to recorded owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Officers and Stockholders
acct_description: The increase (decrease), during an accounting period, in total obligations owed to the reporting entity's executives and owners.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Security Deposits
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in security deposits.

acct_label: Security Deposit Liability
acct_description: This element represents money paid in advance to protect the provider of a product or service, such as a lessor, against damage or nonpayment by the buyer or tenant (lessee) during the term of the agreement. Such damages may include physical damage to the property, theft of property, and other contractual breaches. Security deposits held may be interest or noninterest bearing.

acct_label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Amortization
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

acct_label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Net
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

acct_label: Deferred Revenue and Credits, Current
acct_description: Total carrying amount of consideration received or receivable as of the balance sheet date on potential earnings that were not recognized as revenue or other forms of income in conformity with GAAP, and which are expected to be recognized as such within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

acct_label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill), Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, that lack physical substance, having a projected indefinite period of benefit.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Increase (Decrease), Cost
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cost for defined contribution plan.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Insignificant, Plan Contribution
acct_description: Amount of contribution received by multiemployer pension plan from all employers participating in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

acct_label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Assumed Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
acct_description: Liability as of the balance sheet date for the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims and claim adjustment expense relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date for those liabilities owed to another party as a result of assuming another insurer's primary obligation.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Equity Securities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading which are intended be sold more than one year from the balance sheet date or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration, Liability, Measurement Input
acct_description: Value of input used to measure contingent consideration liability from business combination.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Contingent Liability
acct_description: The amount of liability arising from an inherited contingency (as defined) which has been recognized as of the acquisition date.

acct_label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: Amount of accumulated amortization of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

acct_label: Financial Instruments, Owned, State and Municipal Government Obligations, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in fixed income obligations issued by state and local governments and authorities. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, State and Local, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in state and local income tax contingency.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Due from Employee, Current
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from employees for floats, allowances and loans (generally evidenced by promissory notes).

acct_label: Inventory, Land Held-for-sale
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of parcels of land held for sale, and on which the entity has no intention or no further intention to perform construction activities.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Discount from Market Price, Purchase Date
acct_description: Discount rate from fair value on purchase date that participants pay for shares.

acct_label: Royalty Guarantees, Commitments, Amount
acct_description: The amount the entity has committed to make for future royalty guarantees.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Restricted
acct_description: The carrying amount of securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading which serve as security for borrowings or other arrangements.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-04, Cash Dividends Paid to Registrant, Consolidated Subsidiaries
acct_description: This element represents disclosure of the aggregate cash dividends paid to the entity by consolidated subsidiaries.

acct_label: Derivative, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
acct_description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the interest rate derivative.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Unearned Premiums
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) unearned premiums written. Excludes portion of unearned premiums amortized into income.

acct_label: Land Available-for-sale
acct_description: Carrying value of land held for sale.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Period Expense (Income)
acct_description: Amount of expense (income) recognized due to changes in the accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities Adjustment, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Gross appreciation or the gross loss in value of the total of unsold available-for-sale securities (except when designated as a fair value hedge or which had been determined to have had an other than temporary decline in fair value below its amortized cost basis). While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, OTTI, before Tax, after Adjustments
acct_description: Amount, before tax, after adjustments, of increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

acct_label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Securities for Federal Home Loan Bank
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for FHLB debt obligations, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Paid Claims and Claims Adjustments
acct_description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to and paid by the ceding insurer.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverables on Unpaid Losses (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount after valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid, amounts expected of incurred losses and settlement expenses, which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Percentage of Total (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage of total reinsurance recoverables.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Accumulated Unallocated Claim Adjustment Expense
acct_description: Amount of liability for unallocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts.

acct_label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments without Regulatory Approval
acct_description: Amount of dividends that can be declared or paid without approval of regulatory agency.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Amortization of Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense on deferred policy acquisition cost for property-casualty insurance underwriter.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
acct_description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost related to property-casualty insurance policy written.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Earned Premium
acct_description: Amount of premium revenue earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Net Investment Income
acct_description: Amount of net investment income earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Paid Claim and Claim Adjustment Expense
acct_description: Amount of loss reported and paid for claim and claim adjustment expense by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Premium Written
acct_description: Amount of premium written by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Reserve for Unpaid Claim and Claim Adjustment Expense
acct_description: Amount of reserve, policy claim payable and loss expense incurred by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Unearned Premium
acct_description: Amount of premium written but not yet earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

acct_label: Capitalized Computer Software, Amortization
acct_description: Amount of expense for amortization of capitalized computer software costs.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Other, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Other assets that are held for sale apart from normal operations, not otherwise included elsewhere in the taxonomy and which are anticipated to be sold in less than one year, but by their nature which are not considered current (originally classified based on not being realized or converted to working capital within one year of the date of the statement of financial position or operating cycle, if longer).

acct_label: Cost of Services, Oil and Gas (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Costs of generating revenue from oil and gas-related services including well services (such as drilling, rigs and analytic evaluations), transportation, and other supporting contractor services, during the reporting period.

acct_label: Depletion
acct_description: The noncash expense charged against earnings to recognize the consumption of natural resources.

acct_label: Exploration Costs, Period Cost
acct_description: "The capitalized costs incurred during the period (excluded from amortization) in identifying areas that may warrant examination and in examining specific areas that are considered to have prospects of containing oil and gas reserves, including costs of drilling exploratory wells and exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells. Exploration costs may be incurred both before acquiring the related property (sometimes referred to in part as prospecting costs) and after acquiring the property. Principal types of exploration costs, which include depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of exploration activities, are: costs of topographical, geographical and geophysical studies, rights of access to properties to conduct those studies, and salaries and other expenses of geologists, geophysical crews, and others conducting those studies. Collectively, these are sometimes referred to as geological and geophysical or ""G&G"" costs. Exploration costs also include costs of carrying and retaining undeveloped properties, such as delay rentals, ad valorem taxes on properties, legal costs for title defense, the maintenance of land and lease records, dry hole contributions and bottom hole contributions, costs of drilling and equipping exploratory wells and costs of drilling exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells."

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Liabilities
acct_description: Change during the period in carrying value for all deferred liabilities due within one year or operating cycle.

acct_label: Land Improvements
acct_description: Amount before accumulated deprecation and depletion of additions or improvements to real estate held for productive use. Examples include, but are not limited to, walkways, driveways, fences, and parking lots.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Land Held-for-use
acct_description: The cash outflow for acquisition of land for use; excludes purchases of land held as inventory or as investments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Retained Earnings (Deficit)
acct_description: Amount of retained earnings or deficit at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Retained Earnings (Deficit)
acct_description: Amount of retained earnings or deficit at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Four and Five
acct_description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in fourth and fifth fiscal years following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Two and Three
acct_description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in second and third fiscal years following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Fair Value of Shares
acct_description: The fair value of shares that would be issued, determined under the conditions specified in the contract if the settlement were to occur at the reporting date.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Number of Shares
acct_description: The number of shares that would be issued, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if the settlement were to occur at the reporting date.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Machinery and Equipment
acct_description: The cash inflow from sale of machinery and equipment.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Contract Revenue Cost (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred and are directly related to generating contract revenues.

acct_label: Long-term Investments and Receivables, Net
acct_description: The total amount of investments that are intended to be held for an extended period of time (longer than one operating cycle) and amount due to the Entity from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such investments and receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

acct_label: Other Deferred Credits, Current
acct_description: Amount of unearned revenue or income classified as other, expected to be taken into income within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Capital Shares Reserved for Future Issuance
acct_description: Aggregate number of nonredeemable preferred shares reserved for future issuance.

acct_label: Revenue, Oil and Gas Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from oil and gas-related services including well services (such as drilling, rigs and analytic evaluations), transportation, and other supporting contractor services, during the reporting period.
