acct_label: Assumed Premiums Earned, Life (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums earned for all life insurance assumed from other insurers as a result of reinsurance arrangements.

acct_label: Ceded Premiums Earned, Life (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums assumed and earned by another insurer as a result of reinsurance arrangements.

acct_label: Direct Premiums Earned, Life (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums earned directly for all life insurance before adding contracts assumed from other insurers or subtracting any amounts assumed by other insurers.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Client Funds Held
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the carrying amount of client funds held and maintained in custodial and separate accounts, and which are owned by clients or contract holders.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Loss and Loss Adjustment Expense Reserve (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the reserve account established to account for expected but unspecified losses.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Reinsurance Payables
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due to other insurance companies when the reporting entity has assumed a portion of the cedant's insurance risk which has resulted in insurance losses.

acct_label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Reported and Incurred but Not Reported (IBNR) Claims (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The accrued obligation as of the balance sheet date which represents the cost of settling insured claims and insured claims relating to insured events that have occurred but have not yet been reported to the insurer or reinsurer as of the date of the financial statements.

acct_label: Other Marketable Securities, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of debt and equity financial instruments classified as other and noncurrent.

acct_label: Reinsurance Effect on Claims and Benefits Incurred, Net Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The net amount of the provision for the period for claims and benefits incurred on contracts directly written, assumed, and ceded.

acct_label: Reinsurance Effect on Claims and Benefits Incurred, Policies Acquired in Period (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the provision for the period for claims and benefits incurred on contracts acquired by the insurer during the period in other than reinsurance arrangements.

acct_label: Reserve for Losses and Loss Adjustment Expenses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Alternate concept name for the aggregate amount of policy reserves (provided for future obligations including unpaid claims and claims adjustment expenses) and policy benefits (liability for future policy benefits) as of the balance sheet date; grouped amount of all the liabilities associated with the company's insurance policies.

acct_label: Warrants Not Settleable in Cash, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of warrants not settleable in cash classified as equity.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Liabilities, Deferred Revenue
acct_description: Amount of deferred revenue expected to be recognized as such within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Deposit Contracts, Liabilities
acct_description: Carrying amount of liabilities as of the balance sheet date pertaining to amounts received by the insurer or reinsurer from the insured (including a ceding company) under insurance or reinsurance contracts for which insurance risk is not transferred.

acct_label: Derivative, Average Forward Price
acct_description: The average forward price on the group of price risk forward or futures contracts, such as gas futures contracts.

acct_label: Dividend, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Cash
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Due to Employees, Current
acct_description: Amounts due to employees, not to include stockholders or officers. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Interest Expense, Subordinated Notes and Debentures
acct_description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on subordinated notes and debentures. Includes amortization of expenses incurred in the issuance of subordinated notes and debentures.

acct_label: Loss on Derivative Instruments, Pretax
acct_description: Aggregate loss on all derivative instruments charged against earnings during the period, before tax effects.

acct_label: Mineral Properties, Accumulated Depletion
acct_description: The accumulated decrease in the carrying value of the mineral properties as a result of mine or mineral production.

acct_label: Natural Gas Production Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from natural gas production during the reporting period. Natural gas consists largely of the hydrocarbon methane, and is found in underground formations either by itself or with crude oil.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Property, Full Cost Method, Depletion
acct_description: Depletion of oil and gas property carried under the full cost method.

acct_label: Payments for Merger Related Costs
acct_description: The amount of cash paid during the reporting period for charges associated with the mergers.

acct_label: Preferred Stock Conversions, Inducements
acct_description: The excess of (1) the fair value of all securities and other consideration transferred in transactions by the registrant to the holders of the convertible preferred stock over (2) the fair value of securities issuable pursuant to the original conversion terms, during the accounting period.

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Net, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Volume increase (decrease) of proved reserves of oil and gas.

acct_label: Salary and Wage, NonOfficer, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
acct_description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer employee. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Number of Shares, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Number of increase (decrease) of non-vested options.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Dividend
acct_description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Discount Rate
acct_description: Rate applied to the undiscounted amount of environmental loss contingencies to arrive at the present value recorded as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Current Weighted-Average Discount Rate
acct_description: Current weighted-average discount rate used to measure present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Increase (Decrease) for Other Change
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from change, classified as other.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Investments
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Long-term Transition Bond, Noncurrent
acct_description: Long-Term transition bonds are bonds under the Competition Act in which the proceeds of Transition Bonds are required to be used principally to reduce qualified stranded costs and the related capitalization of the utility. This represents the noncurrent portion.

acct_label: Capitalized Software Development Costs for Software Sold to Customers
acct_description: Unamortized costs incurred for development of computer software, which is to be sold, leased or otherwise marketed, after establishing technological feasibility through to the general release of the software products. Excludes capitalized costs of developing software for internal use.

acct_label: Estimate of Cancellations
acct_description: Estimates of cancellations for refundable service fees, if accounted for by analogy to FASB Statement No. 48.

acct_label: Investments in and Advances to Affiliates, at Fair Value, Gross Additions
acct_description: Gross additions to the investment in and advance to the affiliate.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Interest Rate
acct_description: Rate of interest used to calculate the liability for future policy benefits.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Annual Principal Payment
acct_description: Amount of the total principal payments made during the annual reporting period.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Discount Rate
acct_description: The interest rate used to discount the estimated cash flows associated with the payment of malpractice claims.

acct_label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Valuation Method, Risk Free Interest Rate
acct_description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing a nonvested share or option award issued to other than an employee.

acct_label: Short-term Debt, Interest Rate Increase
acct_description: Percentage increase in the stated interest rate on a short-term debt instrument.

acct_label: Workers' Compensation Discount, Percent
acct_description: Percent discount applied to worker's compensation reserve liability to reduce the reserve to present value.

acct_label: Cash, Uninsured Amount
acct_description: The amount of cash as of the balance sheet date that is not insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable, classified as current.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Assumption for Fair Value of Assets or Liabilities that relate to Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Weighted Average Life (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average life of securitized assets. This is used as a key input and assumption in measuring the fair value of assets or liabilities that relate to a transferor's continuing involvement, if any, as of the date of the latest statement of financial position presented.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Restricted, Current (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Investments in debt and equity securities which are categorized neither as trading securities nor held-to-maturity securities, which are intended be sold or mature within one year from the balance sheet date or the normal operating cycle, whichever is longer, and that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Restricted, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Investments in debt and equity securities which are categorized neither as trading securities nor held-to-maturity securities, which are intended be sold or mature greater than one year from the balance sheet date or the normal operating cycle, whichever is longer, and that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Business Combination
acct_description: Amount of increase in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from business combination.

acct_label: Derivative, Forward Exchange Rate (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The contractual rate at which a foreign currency can be purchased or sold under the terms of a foreign currency derivative contract.

acct_label: Derivative, Forward Exchange Rate
acct_description: Contractual rate at which a foreign currency can be purchased or sold.

acct_label: Dividends, Stock
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid stock dividends declared for classes of stock, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Weighted-Average Useful Life (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The calculated weighted-average useful life of all finite-lived intangible assets.

acct_label: Funds Held for Clients
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the funds held on behalf of others and that are expected to be liquidated within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. This does not include funds held under reinsurance agreements.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Financing Receivable
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of financing receivable.

acct_label: Impairment Charge on Reclassified Assets
acct_description: For the asset that is reclassified back to held and used from held-for-sale, the amount of impairment charge that is recognized on the reclassification date.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Consumer, Allowance (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The allowance for consumer loan and lease losses represents the reserve to cover probable credit losses related to specifically identified consumer loans and leases, as well as probable credit losses inherent in the remainder of the consumer loan portfolio as of the balance sheet date. For banks, include currently required allocated transfer risk reserves. Include carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for consumer loan losses in connection with business combinations determined to be appropriate.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Ratio of Nonperforming Loans to All Loans
acct_description: Reflects the percentage derived from dividing impaired loans on which interest has ceased to be accrued by total loans.

acct_label: Long-term Commercial Paper
acct_description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term unsecured obligations issued by corporations and other borrowers to investors (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Patents Allegedly Infringed, Number
acct_description: Number of another entity's patents that the entity has allegedly infringed.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Foreign Currency Derivative Purchase Contracts (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of foreign currency derivatives to purchase a foreign currency. Notional amount refers to the number of currency units specified in the foreign currency derivative contract.

acct_label: Payments for Hedge, Financing Activities
acct_description: The cash outflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either cash flow hedge, fair value hedge or hedge of net investment in foreign operations.

acct_label: Payments for Reinsurance
acct_description: Cash payments made for reinsurance during the current period.

acct_label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Expected Cost
acct_description: Amount expected to be recognized in earnings for the specified restructuring cost.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Undistributed Accumulated Earnings of Foreign Subsidiary, Provisional Unrecognized Deferred Tax Liability (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reasonable estimate for deferred tax liability not recognized for temporary differences related to foreign subsidiary and intended to be permanently reinvested outside country of domicile for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. Temporary differences include, but are not limited to, undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiary not subject to transition tax and other basis difference.

acct_label: Technology Services Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from providing technology services. The services may include training, installation, engineering or consulting. Consulting services often include implementation support, software design or development, or the customization or modification of the licensed software.

acct_label: Amount Recognized in Income Due to Inflationary Accounting
acct_description: The amount that will be recognized through the income statement (as well as the impact on the other financial statements) as part of highly inflationary accounting.

acct_label: Assets, Fair Value Disclosure, Nonrecurring (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the aggregate of the assets reported on the balance sheet at period end measured at fair value on a nonrecurring basis by the entity. This element is intended to be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements.

acct_label: Business Combination, Separately Recognized Transactions, Additional Disclosures, Acquisition Cost Expensed
acct_description: For transactions that are recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination, such as related to pre-existing relationships with the acquiree, this element represents the disclosure of the amount of acquisition related costs which have been expensed.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Asset, Intra-entity Transfer, Asset Other than Inventory
acct_description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary difference from intra-entity transfer of asset within consolidated group. Excludes intra-entity transfer of inventory.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Foreign Currency Translation
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which (increases) decreases allowance for credit loss on financing receivable.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Computer Software, Gross (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs to ready software for sale or licensing, or for long-term internal use.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Price Risk Cash Flow Hedge Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of all price risk derivatives designated as hedging instruments in cash flow hedges. Notional amount refers to the number of currency units specified in the price risk derivative contract. Excludes notional amount expressed in nonmonetary terms such as for a commodity forward contract.

acct_label: Other Borrowings
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date for the aggregate of other miscellaneous borrowings owed by the reporting entity.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Transition Asset (Obligation), Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Tax effect of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for the net transition asset (obligation) recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Employee Benefit Plan
acct_description: Number of shares issued during the period to an employee benefit plan, such as a defined contribution or defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Medium-term Notes
acct_description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value at the balance sheet date of a financial instrument used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with original maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

acct_label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Downward Price Adjustment, Annual Amount
acct_description: Amount of loss from downward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

acct_label: Accrued Rent, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for contractual rent under lease arrangements. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Foreign Currency Translation
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from converting allowance reserve for credit loss to currency of reporting entity from amount denominated or measured in a different currency, which decreases (increases) the allowance for loan and lease losses.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Notes Payable and Long-term Debt (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to notes payables and long-term debt assumed from the acquired entity.

acct_label: Cost-method Investments, Realized Losses
acct_description: For investments in debt and equity securities accounted for at cost, the excess of the carrying amount over net sale proceeds of investments disposed of during the period and any losses recognized thereon for impairments of other than a temporary nature.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Effect of Plan Amendment on Accumulated Benefit Obligation (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of increase or decrease in the accumulated benefit obligation related to the effects of a change in the substantive terms of an existing defined benefit pension plan or the initiation of a new plan. A plan amendment may increase or decrease benefits, including those attributed to years of service already rendered.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Collateral for Secured Borrowings
acct_description: Reflects the aggregate value of loans, trade receivables, securities and financial instruments that serve as collateral for obligations arising from a transfer of financial assets recorded as a secured borrowing.

acct_label: New Accounting Pronouncement or Change in Accounting Principle, Effect of Change on Basic Earnings Per Share (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the effect of a change in accounting principle on basic earnings per share.

acct_label: Proceeds from Accounts Receivable Securitization
acct_description: Proceeds from securitizations of receivables treated as collateralized borrowings, which are classified as financing transactions.

acct_label: Unusual or Infrequent Item, or Both, Net (Gain) Loss
acct_description: Amount of (gain) loss for an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or occurs infrequently, or both.

acct_label: Adjustment for Long-term Intercompany Transactions, Gross of Tax
acct_description: Current period adjustment resulting from gains and losses on intercompany foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, that is, settlement is not planned or anticipated in the foreseeable future. Resulting from the entities to the transaction being consolidated, combined, or accounted for by the equity method in the reporting entity's financial statements.

acct_label: Amortization of Deferred Hedge Gains
acct_description: The amount of expense charged against earnings by an Entity to record deferred gains and losses on hedge instruments. Examples include gain on economic hedges, amortization of gain on designated fair value hedge and so forth.

acct_label: Assets Held-in-trust
acct_description: The total amount of cash and securities held by third party trustees pursuant to terms of debt instruments or other agreements as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, which can be used by the trustee only to pay the noncurrent portion of specified obligations.

acct_label: Capitalized Computer Software, Impairments (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: For each income statement presented, the amount charged to expense for write-downs of capitalized computer software costs to net realizable value.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain Reclassified to Other Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of gains on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to other expense from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Deferred Gain (Loss) on Discontinuation of Interest Rate Fair Value Hedge
acct_description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of the unamortized adjustment to the carrying value of an interest-bearing hedged item made under an effective interest rate fair value hedge that is amortized upon discontinuation of the interest rate fair value hedge.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Asset, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument and classified as an asset.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Liability, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument and classified as a liability.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Goodwill, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount classified as goodwill attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Fair Value Hedge Assets
acct_description: Fair value of all derivative assets designated as fair value hedging instruments.

acct_label: Gain from Hedged Firm Commitment Not Qualifying as Fair Value Hedge
acct_description: Amount of gain recognized in earnings when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as a fair value hedge.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Interest Rate Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) included in earnings for the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value of interest rate derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Health Care Trust Fund, Assets Limited as to Use, Current
acct_description: The portion of trust fund assets classified as current assets because they are expected to be liquidated to pay current liabilities as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Loss from Hedged Firm Commitment Not Qualifying as Fair Value Hedge
acct_description: Amount of loss recognized in earnings when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as a fair value hedge.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Interest Rate Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of all interest rate derivatives not designated as hedging instruments. Notional amount refers to the monetary amount specified in the interest rate derivative contract.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Postemployment Benefits Liability
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement.

acct_label: Stock Repurchase Program, Period in Force (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The number of years over which shares may be purchased under a stock repurchase plan authorized by an entity's Board of Directors.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Liquidation Preference
acct_description: The aggregate liquidation preference (or restrictions) of stock classified as temporary equity that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Liquidation Preference Per Share
acct_description: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of stock classified as temporary equity that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedges, Pretax, Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized Gain or Loss related to the Increase or Decrease in fair value of interest rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments, which was recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge was determined to be effective.

acct_label: Billings in Excess of Cost, Noncurrent
acct_description: Liability attributable to (i) billings in excess of costs under the percentage of completion contract accounting method representing the difference between contractually invoiced amounts (billings) and revenue recognized based, for example, on costs incurred to estimated total costs at period end or (ii) contractually invoiced amounts (billings) in excess of costs incurred and accumulated under the completed contract accounting method that are expected to be realized more than one year or one operating cycle, whichever is longer, from the reporting date.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Domestic, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in domestic income tax contingency.

acct_label: Impaired Assets to be Disposed of by Method Other than Sale, Amount of Impairment Loss
acct_description: Loss recognized as a result of the initial and subsequent write-down of a long-lived asset's carrying amount to fair value.

acct_label: Other Employee-related Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Amount of obligations incurred for employer-related costs classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted EPS.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Significant, Employer Contribution, Cost
acct_description: Amount of cost for employer contribution to multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

acct_label: Debt Conversion, Converted Instrument, Rate
acct_description: Dividend or interest rate associated with the financial instrument issued in exchange for the original debt being converted in a noncash or part noncash transaction. Noncash are transactions that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments. Part noncash refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Threshold Percentage of Stock Price Trigger
acct_description: Minimum percentage of common stock price to conversion price of convertible debt instruments to determine eligibility of conversion.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Noncurrent Assets and Liabilities, Net
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent operating assets after deduction of noncurrent operating liabilities classified as other.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Receivable, Current
acct_description: Amount of receivable related to a loss contingency accrual that is expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. For example, an insurance recovery receivable.

acct_label: AOCI Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Tax
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Fair Value of Assets Acquired
acct_description: The fair value of assets acquired in noncash investing or financing activities.

acct_label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year One
acct_description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Payment for Other Postretirement Benefits
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for other postretirement benefit. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree. Excludes pension benefit.

acct_label: Standard Product Warranty Accrual, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the standard product warranty accrual. Excludes extended product warranties.

acct_label: Occupancy Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred and are directly related to generating occupancy revenues.

acct_label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Other, Increase for Cost Recognition
acct_description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement, classified as other.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Equity Securities, Gross Unrealized Loss
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss before deducting unrealized gain on investments in available-for-sale equity securities.

acct_label: Contract Receivable Retainage, Next Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Interest and Dividend Income, Securities, Operating, Available-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Assets Held-in-trust, Noncurrent
acct_description: The amount of cash, securities, or other assets held by a third-party trustee pursuant to the terms of an agreement which assets are available to be used by beneficiaries to that agreement only within the specific terms thereof and which agreement is expected to terminate more than one year from the balance sheet date (or operating cycle, if longer) at which time the assets held-in-trust will be released or forfeited.

acct_label: Business Combination, Indemnification Assets, Amount as of Acquisition Date
acct_description: The amount of indemnification assets (amounts to be reimbursed if and when certain assumed liabilities are paid) recognized at the acquisition date of a business combination.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Contribution Rate Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Increase (decrease) in employer's contractual contribution rate to multiemployer plan.

acct_label: Assumed Premiums Earned, Other Insurance (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums assumed and earned for all other insurance assumed from other insurers as a result of reinsurance arrangements.

acct_label: Assumed Premiums Written, Other Insurance (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums assumed for all other insurance assumed from other insurers as a result of reinsurance arrangements.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Amortized Cost
acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Income Tax Expense on Change in Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the tax effects occurring during the period which are related to the net unrealized gain (loss) resulting from changes in the fair [carrying] value during the period of available-for-sale securities. Such tax affects would have been charged or credited directly to other comprehensive income or to related components of shareholders' equity.

acct_label: Available-for-sale, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Number of Positions (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Disclosure regarding factors used to determine that the impairment of securities not categorized as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities (hence equal to available for sale securities) where cost exceeds fair value is not an other than temporary impairment (OTTI). This item contains disclosure of the number of investment positions in the available-for-sale investments determined to be temporarily impaired.

acct_label: Ceded Credit Risk, Claims, Loss Adjustment Expense Incurred (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amounts for the processing of insurance claims, such as legal fees and estimator fees that have been assumed by and are receivable from the identified reinsurer with respect to disclosure of a concentration of credit risk.

acct_label: Ceded Credit Risk, Premiums Earned (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amounts for insurance premiums received or receivable from policyholders on ceded insurance contracts that are due the reinsurer with respect to disclosure of a concentration of credit risk.

acct_label: Ceded Premiums Earned, Other Insurance (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums assumed and earned by another insurer as a result of reinsurance arrangements.

acct_label: Ceded Premiums Written, Other Insurance (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums assumed by another insurer as a result of reinsurance arrangements.

acct_label: Cost-method Investments, Realized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other than Temporary Impairments
acct_description: This item represents the gain (loss) realized during the period from the sale of investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain (Loss), before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Loss, Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
acct_description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Direct Premiums Earned, Other Insurance (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums earned directly for all other insurance before adding contracts assumed from other insurers or subtracting any amounts assumed by other insurers.

acct_label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Realized Gain
acct_description: Amount of realized gain from sale of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Excess, Actual
acct_description: Ratio of total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Fees and Commissions (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of fees and commissions from financial services and banking activities and correspondent clearing. Includes fees from depositor accounts, credit cards, merchant discounts, and fiduciary and trust activities, guarantee fees, investment advisory, management, and administrative fees, transfer agent fees, and insurance commissions.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Premiums Receivable
acct_description: The change in the premium receivable balance on the balance sheet.

acct_label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
acct_description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

acct_label: Limited Partners' Contributed Capital
acct_description: The amount of capital contributed by the limited partners.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Other Underwriting Expense
acct_description: Costs incurred during the period, such as those relating to general administration and policy maintenance that do not vary with and are not primarily related to the acquisition or renewal of insurance contracts.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Limited Partnership Interests
acct_description: Cash outflow related to the acquisition or continued holding of limited partnership interests held for investment purposes.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage-backed Securities (MBS), Available-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of mortgage-backed security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Premiums Earned, Net, Other Insurance
acct_description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of other types of premiums earned.

acct_label: Premiums Written, Net, Other Insurance (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums written for all other insurance and reinsurance contracts after subtracting any amounts ceded to another insurer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale, Maturity and Collection of Long-term Investments
acct_description: The cash inflow from sales, maturities, prepayments, calls and collections of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Mortgage-backed Securities (MBS), Available-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in mortgage-backed security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Assumed and Ceded
acct_description: Amount of recovery (expense) related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies assumed and ceded.

acct_label: Salvage and Subrogation Recoveries, Value
acct_description: The estimated amount as of the balance sheet date to be received by an insurer from the sale of property (usually damaged) on which the insurer has paid a total claim to the insured and has obtained title to the property and the right of an insurer to pursue any course of recovery of damages, in its name or in the name of the policyholder, against a third party who is liable for costs relating to an insured event that have been paid by the insurer. Estimated salvage and subrogation is generally deducted from the liability for unpaid claims.

acct_label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Permitted Practice, Amount
acct_description: Amount of each item listed to reconcile the differences as of the balance sheet date resulting from applying state permitted statutory accounting practices rather than statutory accounting practices permitted by National Association of Insurance Commissioners.

acct_label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments
acct_description: Amount of dividends available for payment after computation of statutory restrictions on capital surplus.

acct_label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
acct_description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

acct_label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Net Income Amount
acct_description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

acct_label: Trading Securities, Equity, Cost
acct_description: Cost of investments in equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of amount due from customers or clients for goods or services, including trade receivables, that have been delivered or sold in the normal course of business, and amounts due from others, including related parties.

acct_label: Capitalized Computer Software, Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: For each balance sheet presented, the amount of accumulated amortization for capitalized computer software costs.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Cumulative Catch-up Adjustment to Revenue, Change in Estimate of Transaction Price
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from change in estimate of transaction price which (increases) decreases obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due. Includes, but is not limited to, change in assessment of whether estimate of variable consideration is constrained.

acct_label: Deferred Income Taxes and Other Assets, Current
acct_description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and other assets expected to be realized or consumed within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Benefit Obligation, (Increase) Decrease for Settlement and Curtailment
acct_description: Amount of (increase) decrease in accumulated benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from effects of settlement and curtailment.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Foreign Currency Translation Gains (Losses)
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) in the disposal group, including discontinued operation, recognized in the statement of income as a result of the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Earnings, Net
acct_description: The amount of net gains or losses on foreign currency cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income upon the hedged transaction affecting earnings.

acct_label: Inventory, Finished Goods and Work in Process, Gross
acct_description: Amount before valuation reserves of merchandise or goods held by the entity that are readily available for sale and items held by the entity which are partially complete or in the process of being readied for sale.

acct_label: Inventory, Finished Goods and Work in Process, Net of Reserves
acct_description: The aggregated amount of merchandise or goods held by the entity and readily available for future sale plus items held by the entity which are partially complete or in the process of being readied for future sale. This amount is net of valuation reserves and adjustments.

acct_label: Liability, Pension and Other Postretirement and Postemployment Benefits, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for pension, other postretirement and postemployment benefits, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Price Risk Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Earnings, Net
acct_description: The amount of net gains or losses on price risk cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Provisional Liability (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reasonable estimate for tax liability for which accounting for tax effect from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Price Risk Cash Flow Derivatives, before Tax
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) arising from the change in fair value of price risk derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income in the period, before taxes, to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

acct_label: Weighted Average Number Basic Shares Outstanding Adjustment, Pro Forma
acct_description: Adjustment to the weighted average number of basic shares outstanding to convert this to a pro forma presentation.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Cost of Acquired Entity, Liabilities Incurred (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Fair Value of the liabilities incurred by the acquirer to former owners of the acquiree, including the fair value of any contingent consideration. If liabilities transferred as consideration remain within the combined entity after the business combination (for example, because the assets or liabilities were transferred to the acquiree rather than to its former owners), and the acquirer therefore retains control of them; in that situation, the acquirer measures those liabilities at their carrying amounts immediately before the acquisition date.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Accounts Receivable
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Product Liability, Gross
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of the accrual for damages arising from third-party use of the entity's product or process.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities Adjustment, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, before Tax, after Reclassification Adjustment, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for defined benefit plan, attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss), attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Product Liability Accrual, Period Expense
acct_description: The amount of loss reported during the period pertaining to product liability.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for the reportable segment.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Depreciation Expense (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of depreciation expense for the reportable segment. Such disclosure is presented if the amount is: (a) included in the measure of segment profit or loss reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in that measure of segment profit or loss.

acct_label: Unsolicited Tender Offer Costs
acct_description: Costs incurred in connection with an unsolicited tender offer (one where the Entity being sought has not requested the offer). These would include costs relating to evaluation and dissemination of information regarding an unsolicited tender offer. A tender offer is a broad solicitation by an Entity or a third party to purchase a substantial percentage of another entity's shares or units for a limited period of time. The offer is at a fixed price, usually at a premium over the current market price, and is contingent on shareholders' tendering a fixed number of their shares or units.

acct_label: Bank Acceptances Executed and Outstanding
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of drafts and bills of exchange that have been accepted by the reporting bank, or by others for its own account, as its liability to holders of the drafts.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Increase (Decrease) for Contract Acquired in Business Combination
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due, from business combination.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Employee Stock Ownership Plan Dividend, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification, Tax, Parent
acct_description: Amount, after reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Provisional Liability, Current (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reasonable estimate for tax liability for which accounting for tax effect from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as current.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Provisional Liability, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reasonable estimate for tax liability for which accounting for tax effect from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Insignificant, Employer Contribution, Cost
acct_description: Amount of cost for employer contribution to multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

acct_label: Effect on Future Earnings, Amount
acct_description: The quantified amount of the future effect on earnings.

acct_label: Accrued Royalties
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for royalties.

acct_label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Impairment Loss
acct_description: Amount of impairment loss for asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Asset Retirement Obligations
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the carrying amount of asset retirement obligations.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Held-for-sale Real Estate
acct_description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Extension and Discovery (Energy)
acct_description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from the extension of the proved acreage of previously discovered reservoir or discovery of new field with proved reserve or of new reservoir of proved reserve in old field, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Net (Energy)
acct_description: Energy measure of proved reserve of oil and gas, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Production (Energy)
acct_description: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from production, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Purchase of Mineral in Place (Energy)
acct_description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from purchase of mineral in place, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Revision of Previous Estimate (Energy)
acct_description: Energy measure of increase (decrease) in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas related to revision of a previous estimate resulting from new information, except for an increase in proved acreage, or change in economic factors, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Sale of Mineral in Place (Energy)
acct_description: Energy measure of decrease in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from sale of mineral in place, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

acct_label: Proved Undeveloped Reserves (Energy)
acct_description: Energy measure of proved undeveloped reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Domestic, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in domestic income tax contingency.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

acct_label: Derivative Asset, Number of Instruments Held
acct_description: The number of derivative instruments of a particular derivative asset or group of derivative assets held by the entity.

acct_label: Development Costs, Period Cost
acct_description: The capitalized costs incurred during the period (excluded from amortization) to obtain access to proved reserves and to provide facilities for extracting, treating, gathering and storing the oil and gas.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Commodity Contracts
acct_description: The difference between the book value and the sale price of agreements to purchase or sell mineral resources, energy, and agricultural products at some future point. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds.

acct_label: Gas and Oil Area, Developed, Gross
acct_description: Area spaced or assigned to productive wells in which a working interest is owned.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Royalties Payable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligations due for compensation payments related to the use of copyrights, patents, trade names, licenses, technology. Royalty payments are also paid by the lease holders for oil, gas, and mineral extraction.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate, over Time
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate of long-term debt outstanding calculated over time.

acct_label: Noncash Project Abandonment Costs
acct_description: The expense charged against earnings to eliminate the capitalized costs of projects that have been terminated during the reporting period, which is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by (used in) operations using the indirect method.

acct_label: Oil and Condensate Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from sale of residue oil and condensate, which normally exists in the reservoir as gas but condenses out as a liquid during production.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Joint Interest Billing Receivables, Current
acct_description: Current portion of accounts receivable attributable to joint interest partners in oil and gas properties. These are billings to the non-operators associated with the operation of wells and are based on those owners' working interests in the wells. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method, Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
acct_description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of oil and gas property carried under the successful effort method. Oil and gas property include, but not limited to, the entity's wells and related equipment and facilities.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method, Accumulated Impairment
acct_description: Accumulated impairment of oil and gas property carried under the successful effort method.

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Net (Energy), Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Energy measure of increase (decrease) of quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

acct_label: Proved Developed Reserves (Energy)
acct_description: Energy measure of interests in proved developed reserves of crude oil, including condensate and natural gas liquids, natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas.

acct_label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
acct_description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Commodity Contracts
acct_description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open agreements to purchase or sell mineral resources, energy, and agricultural products at some future point held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Portion of net income (loss) attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of liabilities incurred for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business and related party payables.

acct_label: Accumulated Distributions in Excess of Net Income
acct_description: The amount as of the balance sheet date by which cumulative distributions to shareholders (or partners) exceed retained earnings (or accumulated earnings).

acct_label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Net Income, Per Outstanding Unit, Amount
acct_description: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic net Income or Loss per outstanding limited partnership unit in the future and that were not included in the computation of diluted net income per limited partnership unit, because to do so would increase net income per unit amounts or decrease loss per unit amounts for the period presented.

acct_label: Assets, Noncurrent, Other than Noncurrent Investments and Property, Plant and Equipment
acct_description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets, excluding property, plant, and equipment and other property and investments, that are expected to be realized in cash, sold or consumed after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. Alternate captions include Total Deferred Charges and Other Assets.

acct_label: Due to Affiliate
acct_description: Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, State and Local, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax settlement.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Unrealized Loss, Included in Earnings (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss recognized in the income statement from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Loans Payable, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of contractual obligation to pay money on demand or on fixed or determinable dates.

acct_label: Marketable Securities, Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss
acct_description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments receivable in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year ended for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

acct_label: Liability, Other Postretirement Defined Benefit Plan
acct_description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit other postretirement plan. Excludes pension plan.

acct_label: Payment to Acquire Life Insurance Policy, Operating Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as operating activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Purchase Price of Common Stock, Percent
acct_description: Purchase price of common stock expressed as a percentage of its fair value.

acct_label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization Expense, Property, Plant and Equipment, Current Charge (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The reporting period depreciation, depletion and amortization expense on long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include land, buildings, machinery and equipment, and other types of furniture and equipment including, but not limited to, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment and software.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Minimum Payments to be Received
acct_description: Amount of remaining payments as of the balance sheet date that lessees are obligated to make or can be required to make under direct financing leases, including any guarantee of residual value and executory costs. The amount also includes any guaranteed rental payments by an unrelated third-party provided that are financially capable of making such payments.

acct_label: Cost of Property Repairs and Maintenance
acct_description: The aggregate costs of keeping the property in good condition but that do not appreciably prolong the life or increase the value of the property.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liability Not Recognized, Amount of Unrecognized Deferred Tax Liability, Undistributed Earnings of Domestic Subsidiaries
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized because of the exceptions to comprehensive recognition of deferred taxes related to undistributed earnings of domestic subsidiaries.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Benefit Obligation, Increase (Decrease) for Plan Amendment
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated benefit obligation from change in existing term of defined benefit plan or initiation of new defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Effect on Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) Due to Change in Measurement Date, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Net of tax adjustment increasing or decreasing accumulated other comprehensive income due to a change in the measurement date for a defined benefit pension and other postretirement plan in the initial application of the measurement provisions of FAS 158.

acct_label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Capitalized, after Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

acct_label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Expense, Amortization
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Holiday, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income exempt from income tax because of a tax holiday.

acct_label: Inventory Recall Expense
acct_description: Reflects the amount charged against earnings comprised of the costs to announce and effect a recall of defective merchandise.

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Lease Not yet Commenced, Assumption and Judgment, Value of Underlying Asset, Amount
acct_description: Amount lessor expects from underlying asset following end of operating lease term for lease that has not yet commenced.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing lease.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Prior Service Costs Arising During Period ,Tax (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Tax effect on the cost of benefit improvement resulting from a plan amendment that occurred during the period. The cost has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost pursuant. A plan amendment includes provisions that grant increased benefits based on service rendered in prior periods.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Write-down of Securities, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized loss realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Write-down of Securities, Tax
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized loss realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Recognized in Earnings, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Payments of Derivative Issuance Costs
acct_description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of a derivative security.

acct_label: Liability, Pension and Other Postretirement and Postemployment Benefits, Current
acct_description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for pension, other postretirement and postemployment benefits, classified as current.

acct_label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt, Maturing in Three Months or Less
acct_description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within three months.

acct_label: Repayments of Short-term Debt, Maturing in Three Months or Less
acct_description: The cash outflow from a repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment within three months.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Lease Receivable
acct_description: Present value of lease payments not yet received by lessor and amount expected to be derived from underlying asset, following end of lease term guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor, from sales-type lease.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Revenue
acct_description: Amount of sales-type lease revenue.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Unguaranteed Residual Asset
acct_description: Present value expected to be derived from underlying asset following end of lease term not guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Income (Loss) before Income Taxes (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of income or loss for the reportable segment before income taxes and extraordinary items.

acct_label: Segment Reporting, Reconciling Item for Operating Profit (Loss) from Segment to Consolidated, Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of an item in the reconciliation of total profit or loss from reportable segments, to the entity's consolidated income before income taxes, extraordinary items, discontinued operations.

acct_label: Capitalized Computer Software, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in capitalized computer software costs.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Allowance for Uncollectible Minimum Lease Payments
acct_description: The estimate of contractual payments on direct financing leases that are probable of not being collected as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Deferred Income
acct_description: The remaining (unamortized) difference between the gross investment in a direct financing lease and the cost or carrying amount, if different, of the leased property as of the balance sheet date.
