acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Unguaranteed Residual Values of Leased Property
acct_description: The estimate of the lease property's economic value at the end of the direct financing lease term excluding any amounts guaranteed by either the lessee or a third-party.

acct_label: Entity-Wide Information, Revenue from External Customers, Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate, enterprise-wide revenues from external customers recognized during the period for each product and service or each group of similar products and services, if not provided as part of reportable operating segment information.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Finance Receivables
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in outstanding loans including accrued interest.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Receivable
acct_description: Amount of receivable related to a loss contingency accrual. For example, an insurance recovery receivable.

acct_label: Net Investment in Direct Financing and Sales Type Leases
acct_description: The net amount due as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing and sales-type leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Long-term Investments
acct_description: The net amount paid (received) by the reporting entity through acquisition or sale and maturities of long-term investments which qualify for treatment as an investing activity based on management's intention and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the long-term.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipt, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipts, Five Fiscal Years Thereafter (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate amount for the next five fiscal years following the first five fiscal years (that is the aggregate of fiscal years six through ten) following the balance sheet date of the prescription drug subsidy receipts expected to be received.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipt, Year One
acct_description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipts, Year Five (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the prescription drug subsidy receipts expected to be received in Year 5 after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipt, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipts, Year Four (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the prescription drug subsidy receipts expected to be received in Year 4 after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipt, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipts, Year One (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the prescription drug subsidy receipts expected to be received in Year 1 after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipts, Year Three (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the prescription drug subsidy receipts expected to be received in Year 3 after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipt, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected in third fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipts, Year Two (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the prescription drug subsidy receipts expected to be received in Year 2 after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipt, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of prescription drug subsidy receipt expected in second fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Gross Proceeds, Investing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow before closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in investing activities.

acct_label: Consolidation, Less than Wholly Owned Subsidiary, Parent Ownership Interest, Change Due to Net Income Attributable to Parent and Effects of Changes, Net
acct_description: This element represents the total net income attributable to the parent for the period and the effect of net changes during the period impacting the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary as it relates to the total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The changes to the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary represented by this element did not result in a deconsolidation of the subsidiary from the consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Provision for Loss (Gain) on Disposal, before Income Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a discontinued operation.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Inventory
acct_description: Amount classified as inventory attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Long-term Revenue Growth Rate (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage of assumed long-term growth in revenues, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Salaries
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period in accrued salaries.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Net Nonmonetary Assets Acquired (Liabilities Assumed) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The net book value of a nonmonetary asset transferred or exchanged in connection with the acquisition of a business or asset in a noncash transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. Nonmonetary assets and liabilities are assets and liabilities that will not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the future.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Other Liabilities Assumed (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of liabilities that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition that are not presented as a separate disclosure or otherwise listed in the existing taxonomy. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Other Liabilities Assumed
acct_description: Amount of liabilities, classified as other, assumed in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash or part noncash acquisition.

acct_label: Servicing Assets and Servicing Liabilities at Fair Value, Assumptions Used to Estimate Fair Value, Discount Rate
acct_description: Discount rate used to estimate the fair value of servicing assets and servicing liabilities.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Assets, Marketable Securities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to marketable securities.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Noncurrent Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to noncurrent assets.

acct_label: Ceded Credit Risk, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Sum of amounts at risk of not being collected pertaining to a specified reinsurer with respect to disclosure of a concentration of credit risk.

acct_label: Ceded Credit Risk, Claims Receivable (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reported and estimated unreported claims assumed by and receivable from the identified reinsurer with respect to disclosure of a concentration of credit risk.

acct_label: Ceded Credit Risk, Other Risks (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amounts receivable or due pertaining to other risks that have been assumed by a specified reinsurer with respect to disclosure of a concentration of credit risk.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale and Held-to-maturity
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

acct_label: Funds Held under Reinsurance Agreements, Asset
acct_description: Amount of the reinsurer's funds held on its behalf by the ceding insurer, including funds held in trust, under reinsurance treaties or contracts with the assuming insurer as security for the payment of the obligations thereunder.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Loans and Leases
acct_description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans and leases that were sold during the reporting period. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sales. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sales of Loans, Net
acct_description: The net gain (loss) resulting from a sale of loans, including adjustments to record loans classified as held-for-sale at the lower-of-cost-or-market and fair value adjustments to loan held for investment purposes.

acct_label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Other Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The net gain (loss) resulting from the sale or disposal of assets not required to be reported separately in the statement of income.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Restricted
acct_description: Amount of restricted investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Subsidiaries, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) of subsidiary attributable to the parent entity.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Trading Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of trading liabilities from the reporting entity's trading activities. This include liabilities resulting from sales of assets that the reporting entity does not own and revaluation losses.

acct_label: (Increase) Decrease in Unearned Premiums, Net
acct_description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of decrease (increase) in unearned premiums.

acct_label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Net
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of reserves for the costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims, net of estimated reinsurance recoveries.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, Interest Lost on Nonaccrual Loans
acct_description: Reflects the amount of additional interest income that would have been recorded if impaired or nonperforming loans were instead current, in compliance with their original terms, and outstanding throughout the reporting period or since origination (if held for part of the period).

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Accounts Receivable Acquired
acct_description: "The amount of accounts receivable that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Covered
acct_description: Carrying amount of other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Non Covered
acct_description: Carrying amount of other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate
acct_description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth; includes real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes real estate acquired for use by the owner.

acct_label: Pledged Assets, Not Separately Reported, Other
acct_description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of other assets which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Securities for Letter of Credit Facilities
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for letter of credit arrangements, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Receivables from Brokers-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
acct_description: Amount receivable from broker-dealers and clearing organizations, including, but not limited to, securities failed-to-deliver, certain deposits for securities borrowed, open transactions, good faith and margin deposits, commissions and floor brokerage receivables.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contract, Discounted Liability, Discount
acct_description: Amount of cumulative discount related to the time value of money deducted from short-duration insurance contract liabilities that are reported at present value.

acct_label: Trading Account Assets, Fair Value Disclosure (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the portion of the balance sheet assertion valued at fair value by the entity whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission. This item represents marketable and other securities categorized as trading securities as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Trading Liabilities
acct_description: The carrying amount of liabilities as of the balance sheet date that pertain to principal and customer trading transactions, or which may be incurred with the objective of generating a profit from short-term fluctuations in price as part of an entity's market-making, hedging and proprietary trading. Examples include short positions in securities, derivatives and commodities, obligations under repurchase agreements, and securities borrowed arrangements.

acct_label: Trading Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of liabilities pertaining to principal and customer trading transactions, or which may be incurred with the objective of generating a profit from short-term fluctuations in price as part of an entity's market-making, hedging and proprietary trading. Examples include, but are not limited to, short positions in securities, derivatives and commodities.

acct_label: Workers' Compensation Discount, Prior Year Amount
acct_description: Prior year monetary amount of the change in worker's compensation reserve liability resulting from the discount applied to reduce the reserve to present value.

acct_label: Commissions Payable to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
acct_description: Amount payable to broker-dealers or clearing organizations for executing or clearing trades or orders.

acct_label: Assets Disposed of by Method Other than Sale, in Period of Disposition, Gain (Loss) on Disposition
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from the disposal of an asset through means other than sale, for example, but not limited to, abandonment, spin-off, and expropriation.

acct_label: Common Stock, Other Shares, Outstanding
acct_description: Total number of shares of other common stock instruments held by shareholders, such as exchangeable shares. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized.

acct_label: Construction Payable
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies and services pertaining to construction projects such as a housing development or factory expansion not classified as trade payables.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Cash Awards Granted, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of commitment made to pay deferred cash remuneration.

acct_label: Deferred Rent Credit, Current
acct_description: For a classified balance sheet, the cumulative difference as of the balance sheet date between the payments required by a lease agreement and the rental income or expense recognized on a straight-line basis, or other systematic and rational basis more representative of the time pattern in which use or benefit is granted or derived from the leased property, expected to be recognized in income or expense, by the lessor or lessee, respectively, within one year of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Food and Beverage, Cost of Sales (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The cost related to generating revenue from the sale of food (prepared and cooked-to-order foodstuffs, as well as snack items) and beverages (bottled or on-tap alcoholic beverages, as well as nonalcoholic beverages like carbonated drinks, juices, energy/sports drinks, water, coffee, and tea).

acct_label: Franchise Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue earned during the period from consideration (often a percentage of the franchisee's sales) received for the right to operate a business using the entity's name, merchandise, services, methodologies, promotional support, marketing, and supplies.

acct_label: Indefinite-Lived License Agreements
acct_description: Carrying amount (original costs adjusted for previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date for the capitalized costs to acquire rights under a license arrangement (for example, to sell specified products in a specified territory) having an indefinite period of benefit.

acct_label: Number of Restaurants
acct_description: Represents the number of restaurants.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Limited Partnership
acct_description: Net cash outflow or inflow from limited partnership investments held by the entity for investment purposes.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Commercial Real Estate
acct_description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of property as primarily intended to generate income for its owner.

acct_label: Net Rentable Area
acct_description: Net rentable area for properties owned.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Units
acct_description: The number of each class of partnership units outstanding at the balance sheet date. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

acct_label: Advance Payments Netted Against Claim Receivable
acct_description: Amount of advance payments received on the contract before its termination shown as a deduction from the claim receivable related to a termination of a contract.

acct_label: Long-term Construction Loan
acct_description: This element represents the current and noncurrent portions of a long-term real estate loan with an initial maturity beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, to finance building costs. The funds are disbursed as needed or in accordance with a prearranged plan; generally, a portion of the funds is disbursed at inception and the remainder as construction progresses. The money is repaid on completion of the project (generally one to seven years), usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property.

acct_label: Payments for Delayed Tax Exempt Exchange
acct_description: Cash outflow related to a property which is traded for the promise to provide a replacement like-kind property in the near future also known as a tax deferred exempt exchange.

acct_label: Proceeds from Insurance Premiums Collected
acct_description: Cash received as payments for insurance premiums during the current period.

acct_label: Securities Held as Collateral, at Fair Value
acct_description: The carrying amount (fair value) as of the balance sheet date of securities held that had been pledged by counterparties under financing and lending arrangements, pursuant to which the entity has the right by agreement or custom to sell or re-pledge such securities.

acct_label: Common Stocks, Including Additional Paid in Capital
acct_description: Amount of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value for common stock issued.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to General Partners
acct_description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to general partners.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Selling Profit (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of profit (loss) recognized at commencement from sales-type lease.

acct_label: Other Inventory, Warehouse, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held by the entity in a building or part of a building for future sale.

acct_label: Investment Company, Total Return
acct_description: Percentage increase (decrease) in fund net asset value, assuming reinvestment of dividends and capital gain distributions.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Limited Partnerships
acct_description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling partners of a limited partnership included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Lease Receivables
acct_description: The cash outflow for the purchase of receivables arising from the lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent.

acct_label: Repayments of Advances for Construction
acct_description: The cash outflow for the payments made by the entity, generally on a straight-line basis over periods ranging from five to forty years to developers, builders, government agencies and municipalities for borrowings received in construction.

acct_label: Accrued Royalties (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for royalties. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Business Combination, Provisional Information, Initial Accounting Incomplete, Adjustment, Financial Assets
acct_description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to financial assets acquired in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

acct_label: Business Combination, Provisional Information, Initial Accounting Incomplete, Adjustment, Financial Liabilities
acct_description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to financial liabilities assumed in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

acct_label: Marketable Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Notional Amount of Foreign Currency Derivative Sale Contracts (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of foreign currency derivatives to sell a foreign currency. Notional amount refers to the number of currency units specified in the foreign currency derivative contract.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to noncontrolling interests.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, Realized upon Sale or Liquidation, Tax
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for translation gain (loss) realized upon the sale or liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity and foreign currency hedges that are designated and qualified as hedging instruments for hedges of the foreign currency exposure of a net investment in a foreign operation.

acct_label: Payments for Other Operating Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for operating activities classified as other.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Derivative Instrument, Investing Activities
acct_description: The net cash outflow or inflow from derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Assets, Investing Activities
acct_description: Aggregate cash payments for a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include securities, other types of investments, or productive assets, are purchased from third-party sellers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate payments for all asset purchases that are classified as investing activities.

acct_label: Payments to Suppliers and Employees
acct_description: Cash payments to suppliers for goods and services provided and to employees for services provided.

acct_label: Prepaid Expense Other, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts paid in advance which will be charged against earnings in periods after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Customers
acct_description: Cash receipts from customers during the current period which are usually for sales of goods and services.

acct_label: Proceeds from Other Operating Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from operating activities classified as other.

acct_label: Proceeds from Royalties Received
acct_description: Cash received for royalties during the current period.

acct_label: Redemption Premium
acct_description: The excess of the (1) fair value of consideration transferred to the holders of a security in excess of (2) the carrying amount of the security reported on the registrant's balance sheet, which will be deducted from net earnings to derive net earnings available to common shareholders. This amount is generally an adjustment considered in the computation of earnings per share.

acct_label: Settlement Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Amounts payable for money transfers, money orders, and consumer payment service arrangements. Settlement liabilities include amounts payable to intermediaries for global payment transfers.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Loans and Leases Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash outflow from (a) purchases of loans held-for-investment, (b) purchases of leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

acct_label: Asset at Fair Value, Changes in Fair Value Resulting from Changes in Assumptions
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value from changes in the assumptions or model used to calculate the fair value of a contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Debt Securities
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Derivative, Forward Interest Rate
acct_description: Stated rate on an interest rate forward or futures contract.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Unrecognized Unrealized Appreciation (Depreciation), Net
acct_description: This element represents the net excess or deficiency of the fair value of an investment (security, contract) over or under its cost (face amount, notional amount), respectively, which excess value or deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

acct_label: Accounts and Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss of accounts and financing receivables. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

acct_label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer), including liabilities for compensation costs, fringe benefits other than pension and postretirement obligations, rent, contractual rights and obligations, and statutory obligations.

acct_label: Accrued Bonuses
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for incentive compensation awarded to employees and directors or earned by them based on the terms of one or more relevant arrangements.

acct_label: Accrued Vacation
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for unused vacation time owed to employees based on the entity's vacation benefit given to its employees.

acct_label: Additional Paid in Capital, Preferred Stock
acct_description: Value received from shareholder in nonredeemable preferred stock-related transaction in excess of par value, value contributed to entity and value received from other stock-related transaction. Includes, but is not limited to, preferred stock redeemable solely at option of issuer. Excludes common stock.

acct_label: Advances, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances carried under the fair value option.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Net Tangible Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to net tangible assets.

acct_label: Convertible Preferred Stock Converted to Other Securities
acct_description: Value of convertible preferred stock that was converted to other securities.

acct_label: Custody Fees
acct_description: Those fees charged for services related to holding, advising, and managing customer investment assets. These account fees usually charged annually or semi-annually, on a per security basis, for the costs of services.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Cash Awards Granted, Percentage
acct_description: Commitment made to pay deferred cash remuneration expressed as a percentage of the individual's base salary.

acct_label: Deferred Revenue, Additions
acct_description: Amount of deferred revenue recognized for transactions arising during the current reporting period. Deferred revenue is a liability as of the balance sheet date related to a revenue producing activity for which revenue has not yet been recognized. Generally, an Entity records deferred revenue when it receives consideration from a customer before achieving certain criteria that must be met for revenue to be recognized in conformity with GAAP.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense, Capitalized Patent Costs
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from patent costs.

acct_label: Direct Costs of Leased and Rented Property or Equipment
acct_description: Amount of expense incurred and directly related to generating revenue by lessor from operating lease of rented property and equipment.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Planned Sale, Investments Not Identified, Percentage
acct_description: The total percentage of all investments, comprising or included in the major category, of those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) for which the entity has intentions to sell or liquidate, but the specific assets for sale or liquidation have not been identified (for example, the entity intends to sell 20 percent of its investments in private equity funds, but the individual investments to be sold have not been identified).

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) Included in Other Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of the total change in unrealized (holding) gains or losses for the period which are included in the statement of income (or changes in net assets) in other income. Such unrealized (holding) gains or losses relate to those liabilities still held at the reporting date for which fair value is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

acct_label: Fair Value, Option, Ineligible Items, Carrying Amount
acct_description: Carrying amount of items included in each line item in the statement of financial position that are not eligible for the fair value option.

acct_label: Financial Liabilities Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value of financial obligations, including, but not limited to, debt instruments, derivative liabilities, federal funds purchased and sold under agreements to repurchase, securities loaned or sold under agreements to repurchase, financial instruments sold not yet purchased, guarantees, line of credit, loans and notes payable, servicing liability, and trading liabilities.

acct_label: Grants Receivable, Current
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts due under the terms of governmental, corporate, or foundation grants. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Income Tax (Expense) Benefit, Continuing Operations, Government Grants
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit from continuing operations attributable to government grants to the extent recognized as a reduction of income tax expense.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Notes Receivables
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of the amounts due from borrowers for outstanding secured or unsecured loans evidenced by a note.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Balance, Principal Amount
acct_description: For investments which are quantified by principal amount, the principle balance held at close of period.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, Troubled Debt, Interest Income
acct_description: The gross interest income that would have been recorded in the period on troubled debt restructurings, if the loans had been current in accordance with their original terms and had been outstanding throughout the period or since origination, if held for part of the period.

acct_label: Other Assets Held-for-sale (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The lower of the carrying value or fair value less cost to sell of assets held-for-sale, other than loans receivable.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
acct_description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Amortizable Intangible Assets, Net
acct_description: Amount of intangible assets subject to amortization at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Nonamortizable Intangible Assets
acct_description: Amount of intangible assets not subject to amortization at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Redemption Amount, Future Redeemable Securities
acct_description: The redemption (or callable) amount of redeemable preferred stock, excluding currently redeemable preferred stock. Includes amounts representing dividends not declared or paid but which will be payable under the redemption features or for which ultimate payment is solely within the control of the issuer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Deposits with Other Institutions
acct_description: Cash received from refund of deposits with other institutions during the period.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock, Preference Stock, and Warrants
acct_description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholder, which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation and from issuance of rights to purchase common shares at a predetermined price.

acct_label: Proceeds from Previous Acquisition
acct_description: Cash inflow representing an adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

acct_label: Reporting Unit, Amount of Fair Value in Excess of Carrying Amount
acct_description: Amount of fair value of reporting unit in excess of carrying amount.

acct_label: Restricted Stock Award, Forfeitures
acct_description: The total value of forfeitures related to restricted stock awards forfeited during the period.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Monthly Rental Payments
acct_description: The amount of the monthly rental payments due under the lease entered into in connection with the transactions involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Expirations
acct_description: Number of shares under non-option equity instrument agreements for which rights to exercise lapsed.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Changes in Capital Structure, Subsequent Changes to Number of Common Shares
acct_description: Change in number of shares issued and outstanding as a result of capital structure change to a stock dividend, stock split or reserve split occurring after the balance sheet date but prior to the later of the issuance of financial statements or the effective date of registration statement.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital, Actual
acct_description: Amount of tangible capital as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Stock Split
acct_description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a stock split in which per-share par value or stated value is not changed proportionately.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Other Receivables
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow from the purchase of receivables classified as other.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Rent
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for rent that provides economic benefits in future periods.

acct_label: Investment Company, Fee Paid Indirectly
acct_description: Amount that would have been incurred for brokerage service had service been paid for directly in arm's-length transaction.

acct_label: Other Research and Development Expense
acct_description: Amount of other research and development expense.

acct_label: Proceeds from License Fees Received
acct_description: Cash received from licensees for license fees during the current period.

acct_label: Stock Dividends, Shares
acct_description: Number of shares of common and preferred stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

acct_label: Capital Units, Net Amount
acct_description: Net amount applicable to investors of capital units or shares.

acct_label: Common Stock, Discount on Shares
acct_description: Discount on common shares, or any unamortized balance thereof, shown separately as a deduction from the applicable account(s) as circumstances require.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital, Excess, Actual
acct_description: Amount of total risk-based capital exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Payments to Fund Long-term Loans to Related Parties
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with extending a long-term loan to a related party. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances to Affiliates.

acct_label: Program Rights Obligations
acct_description: Total amount of obligations related to rights to programming, including, but not limited to, feature films and episodic series, acquired under license agreements.

acct_label: Restricted Stock, Shares Issued Net of Shares for Tax Withholdings
acct_description: Number, after shares used to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement, of restricted shares issued. Excludes cash used to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Regulatory Assets and Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from regulatory assets and liabilities.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Regulatory Assets and Liabilities
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences derived regulatory assets and liabilities.

acct_label: Electric Domestic Regulated Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue derived from the regulated (by a federal, state, or local government or agency) generation, transmission and distribution of electricity.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable and Other Operating Assets
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in receivables, and operating assets classified as other.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Affiliates, Current
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in current obligations (due within one year or one operating cycle) owed to an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Notes Payable, Related Parties, Current
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the current portion (due within one year or one business cycle, whichever is longer) of the amount owed by the reporting entity in the form of loans and obligations (generally evidenced by promissory notes) made by the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families; affiliates; or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Notes Receivable, Related Parties
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount owed to the reporting entity in the form of loans and obligations (generally evidenced by promissory notes) made to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

acct_label: Jointly Owned Utility Plant, Proportionate Ownership Share
acct_description: The proportionate share of interest (percent) in a jointly owned utility plant.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Allowance for Funds Used During Construction, Additions
acct_description: Total increase in earnings in the period representing the cost of equity (based on assumed rate of return) and/or borrowed funds (based on interest rate) used to finance construction of regulated assets, which is expected to be recovered through rate adjustments.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Amount of Acquisition Adjustments
acct_description: Amount of acquisition adjustments included in property, plant and equipment (PPE) for utilities.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Construction Work in Progress
acct_description: Period end amount of construction work in progress in public utility.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Plant in Service
acct_description: Period end amount of total gross PPE.

acct_label: Regulated Operating Revenue, Other
acct_description: The amount of regulated other operating revenues recognized during the period.

acct_label: Accelerated Share Repurchases, Final Price Paid Per Share
acct_description: Final price paid per share for the purchase of the targeted number of shares, determined by an average market price over a fixed period of time.

acct_label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Provision for Loss, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the amount charged against earnings during the period as bad debt expense, net of recoveries of previously expensed credit losses.

acct_label: Assets Held-in-trust, Current
acct_description: The amount of cash, securities, or other assets held by a third-party trustee pursuant to the terms of an agreement which assets are available to be used by beneficiaries to that agreement only within the specific terms thereof and which agreement is expected to terminate within one year of the balance sheet date (or operating cycle, if longer) at which time the assets held-in-trust will be released or forfeited.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Total Capital, Actual
acct_description: Amount of total capital as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
acct_description: Amount of minimum total risk-based capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
acct_description: Amount of minimum total risk-based capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Actual
acct_description: Ratio of total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Contractual Maturities, Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, after 12 Months
acct_description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more, maturing after twelve months from the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contractual Maturities, Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Six Months Through 12 Months
acct_description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more, maturing within six to twelve months after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contractual Maturities, Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Three Months or Less
acct_description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more, maturing within three months or fewer from the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contractual Maturities, Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Three Months Through Six Months
acct_description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more, maturing within three to six months after the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Current
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as current.

acct_label: Deferred Revenue, Revenue Recognized (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of previously reported deferred or unearned revenue that was recognized as revenue during the period. Deferred revenue is a liability related to a revenue producing activity for which revenue has not yet been recognized. Generally, an entity records deferred revenue when it receives consideration from a customer before achieving certain criteria that must be met for revenue to be recognized in conformity with GAAP.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Amount of Adjustment to Prior Period Gain (Loss) on Disposal, before Income Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of an increase (decrease) to a gain (loss) previously reported in discontinued operations in a prior period.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Tax Effect of Other Income (Loss) from Disposition of Discontinued Operation (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Tax expense or benefit on other income (loss) amounts relating to a disposal group that is classified as a component of the entity, exclusive of the following elsewhere enumerated categories: income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, provision (or any reversals of earlier provisions) for loss on disposal, and adjustments of a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, State and Local, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax contingency.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Loss Severity (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Loss, including interest and principal, incurred on a defaulted security, expressed as a percentage of the original principal balance, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Financial Instruments, Owned, at Fair Value
acct_description: The aggregate fair value as of the balance sheet date of financial instruments and other positions owned by the entity including: (1) mortgages, mortgage-backed and asset backed securities; (2) US government and agency obligations; (3) state and municipal government obligations; (4) other sovereign government debt; (5) corporate obligations; (6) corporate equities; (7) principal investments; (8) derivative contracts; and (9) physical commodities. Includes both pledged and unpledged holdings.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities Pledged as Collateral (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount of held-to-maturity securities that serve as collateral for borrowings.

acct_label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Interest Income, Cash Basis Method
acct_description: Amount of interest income recognized on a cash-basis method of accounting that the financing receivables (with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses) were impaired.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Payables under Repurchase Agreements
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability under agreements to repurchase securities that were sold.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Commercial
acct_description: Interest and fee income related to commercial loans including industrial and agricultural, real estate (commercial and residential, construction and development), trade financing, and lease financing.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans Held-for-sale, Mortgages
acct_description: Interest and fee income from mortgage loans considered to be held-for-sale.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Nonmortgage Loans and Leases Held-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of interest and fee income earned from loans held-for-sale, including interest earned from direct financing and sales-type leases held-for-sale, but excluding mortgage loans held-for sale.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Other Loans
acct_description: Amount of interest and fee income from loans classified as other.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Deposit Liabilities
acct_description: The aggregate of all domestic and foreign interest-bearing deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Demand Deposit Accounts
acct_description: Interest expense incurred on demand deposit accounts that represent borrowings rather than outstanding drafts.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank Advances, Short-term
acct_description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on short-term borrowings associated with Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank advances.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Money Market Deposits
acct_description: Interest expense incurred on all money market deposits.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Savings Deposits
acct_description: Interest expense incurred on all savings account deposits.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Time Deposits
acct_description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, in domestic offices.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Nonperforming, Accrual of Interest
acct_description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans deemed to be questionable as to collection on which interest is continuing to be earned or accrued.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Mortgage Loans (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount classified as mortgage loans attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

acct_label: Loans Receivable Held-for-sale, Net, Not Part of Disposal Group, Mortgage (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for bad debt, of mortgage loan receivables held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

acct_label: Loans Receivable with Fixed Rates of Interest (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans charging borrowers fixed rates of interest.

acct_label: Loans Receivable with Fixed Rates of Interest
acct_description: Amount of loan with fixed rate of interest.

acct_label: Loans Receivable with Variable Rates of Interest (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans charging borrowers variable, or adjustable, rates of interest.

acct_label: Loans Receivable with Variable Rates of Interest
acct_description: Amount of loan with variable or adjustable rate of interest.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Cost of Mortgage Sold
acct_description: Amount of decrease in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from sale.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Other Addition
acct_description: Amount of addition to investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, classified as other.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Write-down or Reserve, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of any write-down or reserve provided in the period on a mortgage loan on real estate.

acct_label: Noninterest-bearing Deposit Liabilities
acct_description: The aggregate amount of all domestic and foreign noninterest-bearing deposits liabilities held by the entity.

acct_label: Other Assets Held-for-sale, Current (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The lower of the carrying value or fair value less cost to sell of current assets held for sale that are not elsewhere specified in the taxonomy. The carrying value of major classes of assets and liabilities of the disposal group are separately disclosed in the balance sheet in the specific concepts provided.

acct_label: Premiums Receivable, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts, Additions for Charges to Expense (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of increase in the allowance for premiums receivable from charges to expense.

acct_label: Premiums Receivable, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts, Provision Charged to Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount charged against earnings during the period to provide for known and estimated losses on collections of premiums receivable.

acct_label: Premiums Receivable, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts, Provision Charged to Expense (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of expense for known and estimated loss on collection of premiums receivable.

acct_label: Premium Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
acct_description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on premium receivable from recovery.

acct_label: Principal Amount Outstanding on Loans Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement
acct_description: This is the principal amount outstanding for securitized loans only (across all types of loans).

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The cash inflow from sale proceeds and collection of repayments from borrowers on loans classified as held-for-sale, including proceeds from loans sold through mortgage securitization; includes mortgages and other types of loans.

acct_label: Real Estate Owned, Valuation Allowance, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Total Increase or Decrease in the real estate owned valuation allowance for period.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital, Minimum
acct_description: Amount of minimum tangible capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
acct_description: Ratio of minimum tangible capital to tangible assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital Ratio, Actual
acct_description: Ratio of tangible capital to tangible assets as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Actual
acct_description: Amount of Tier 1 leverage capital as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
acct_description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
acct_description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Actual
acct_description: Ratio of Tier 1 capital to average assets as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Actual
acct_description: Amount of Tier 1 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
acct_description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
acct_description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Actual
acct_description: Ratio of Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Time Deposit Maturities, after Year One
acct_description: Amount of time deposit maturing after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Transfer Other Real Estate (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Value of real estate transferred in noncash transactions during the reporting period.

acct_label: Variable Interest, Maximum Exposure to Loss (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Quantifies the entity's maximum exposure to loss.

acct_label: Assets Disposed of by Method Other than Sale, in Period of Disposition, Gain (Loss) on Disposition (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The loss or gain included in earnings during the period resulting from the disposal of an asset through a means other than through sale, such as abandonment, spin-off, and expropriation.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Income Statement, Direct Financing Lease Revenue
acct_description: Revenue realized in the period on direct financing leases.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases
acct_description: The net investment in direct financing leases as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: Accumulated amortization of deferred income and initial direct costs pertaining to direct financing leases, which resulted from producing constant periodic rates of return on the net investments in the leases over their respective lease terms.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, before Adoption of FAS 158 Recognition Provisions, Net Amount Recognized (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Disclosure under FAS 132R, before it was amended by FAS 158, of the net amount recognized in the statement of financial position for a defined benefit plan(s). This will normally be the same amount as Defined Benefit Plan, before Adoption of FAS 158 Recognition Provisions, Amounts Recognized in Balance Sheet, Total.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, before Adoption of FAS 158 Recognition Provisions, Net (Gains) Losses, Not yet Recognized (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Disclosure under FAS 132R, before it was amended by FAS 158, of the cumulative net gain (loss) that has not yet been recognized as a part of net periodic benefit cost.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, before Adoption of FAS 158 Recognition Provisions, Net Prior Service Costs (Credits), Not yet Recognized (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Disclosure under FAS 132R, before it was amended by FAS 158, of the portion of prior service costs and credits, due to benefit changes attributable to plan participants' prior service pursuant to a plan amendment or a plan initiation, which has not yet been recognized as components of net periodic benefit cost.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, before Adoption of FAS 158 Recognition Provisions, Net Transition Obligations (Assets), Not yet Recognized (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Disclosure under FAS 132R, before it was amended by FAS 158, of the net unamortized portion of the transition obligations (assets) that existed at the initial date of application of FAS 87 and FAS 106, which are the net transition amounts that have not yet been recognized as components of net periodic benefits cost.

acct_label: Due to Related Parties (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties. For classified balance sheets, represents the current portion of such liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer). For unclassified balance sheets, represents the total of such liabilities.

acct_label: Inventory, Real Estate, Improvements
acct_description: Represents improvements to real estate during development for ultimate sale to third parties. Improvements may consist of project infrastructure and other expenditures necessary to completion of the development project which is generally of a long-term nature.

acct_label: Land Available for Development
acct_description: Carrying amount of land available for development.

acct_label: Owned Property Management Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate costs related to management of owned properties during the reporting period.

acct_label: Profit (Loss) from Real Estate Operations
acct_description: The net cost of operation of other real estate (including provisions for real estate losses, rental income, and gains and losses on sales of real estate).

acct_label: Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Carrying Amount of Land and Buildings and Improvements (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Gross amount at which land and buildings and improvements are carried at the end of the period for each property.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Cost Capitalized Subsequent to Acquisition, Cost
acct_description: Amount of cost capitalized subsequent to acquisition for real estate investment property, including, but not limited to, real estate tax and insurance, by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes initial purchase price and improvement, and real estate not held as investment or interest.

acct_label: Real Estate Inventory, Capitalized Interest Costs, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in capitalized interest costs in real estate inventory.

acct_label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Loans Sold
acct_description: Amount of reduction of allowance reserve for credit loss arising from sale of loan and lease portfolios.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Liabilities, Other Liabilities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to other current liabilities of the acquired entity. Does not include amounts allocated to the current portion of long-term debt, accounts payable and accrued expenses.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Sales Type Leases, Unguaranteed Residual Values of Leased Property
acct_description: The estimate of the lease property's economic value at the end of the sales-type lease term excluding any amounts guaranteed by either the lessee or a third-party.

acct_label: Contracts Receivable, Claims and Uncertain Amounts
acct_description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts.

acct_label: Contracts Receivable, Claims and Uncertain Amounts, Expected to be Collected after Next Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts that are expected to be collected after the next fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as current.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Customer Advances and Progress Payments for Long-term Contracts or Programs
acct_description: The amount of the offset related to government or other customer advances received on a contract when the expected advances will be applied in payment to those particular charges of the receivable.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Noncurrent Assets for Plan Benefits (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: For classified balance sheets, the amount for overfunded plans recognized in the balance sheet as a noncurrent asset associated with a defined benefit pension plan or other postretirement defined benefit plan. For unclassified balance sheets, this represents the entire assets recognized in the balance sheet that are associated with the defined benefit plans.

acct_label: Dividend, Share-based Payment Arrangement
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax on Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Amount
acct_description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

acct_label: Financial Services Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered by an entity.

acct_label: Income Tax Examination, Penalties Accrued
acct_description: The amount of estimated penalties accrued as of the balance sheet date arising from income tax examinations.

acct_label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Participating Nonvested Shares with Non-forfeitable Dividend Rights
acct_description: This element represents nonvested share-based payment awards that contain non-forfeitable rights to dividends or dividend equivalents (whether paid or unpaid). Basic and dilutive earnings per share are generally disclosed for such shares using the two-class method.

acct_label: Interest Income, Purchased Receivables
acct_description: Interest earned from receivables purchased; for instance, receivables purchased through a factoring arrangement.

acct_label: Inventory Amount, Unpriced Change Orders for Long-term Contracts or Programs
acct_description: Amount of unpriced change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization included in inventory as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Inventory for Long-term Contracts or Programs, Gross
acct_description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves, and progress payments, of inventory associated with long-term contracts, expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Lease Incentive Receivable
acct_description: This item represents a receivable for an incentive or inducement contractually stipulated between parties to a lease whereby the lessor has committed to provide the entity (lessee) with a cash payment as inducement to enter the lease.

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payments to be Received, after Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in period after fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payments to be Received, Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in next rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payments to be Received, Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payments to be Received, Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in fourth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payments to be Received, Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in third rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payments to be Received, Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor in second rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date for operating lease. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, End of Period, in Allowance for Loan Loss (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans which have been written down and for which there is a related reserve for credit loss.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, End of Period, Not in Allowance for Loan Loss (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans which have been written down and for which there is no related reserve for credit loss.

acct_label: Other Inventory, Capitalized Costs, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before valuation and last-in first out (LIFO) reserves, of costs capitalized in inventory classified as other, expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Progress Payments Netted Against Inventory for Long-term Contracts or Programs
acct_description: Amount of advances received from customers under long-term contracts which have been offset against inventories accounts at the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Lease Receivable, Lease Payments to be Received, after Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases after fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Lease Receivable, Lease Payments to be Received, Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date.
