For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Lease Receivable, Lease Payments to be Received, Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in third rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Lease Receivable, Lease Payments to be Received, Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in second rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Lease Receivable, Payments to be Received, Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in next rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Lease Receivable, Payments to be Received, Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases in fourth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Profit (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of profit (loss) for sales-type lease and (loss) for direct financing lease recognized at commencement.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
acct_description: Amount of writeoff of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, charged against allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Cost Method Investments, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of investments accounted under the cost method.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Non-Recourse Debt
acct_description: Amount represents the difference between the cash acquisition price of the debt and the net carrying amount of the debt at the time of its extinguishment (or deconsolidation of in-substance real estate when an entity defaults on its debt obligations).

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Employee Stock Ownership Plan Dividend, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Dividends Receivable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in cash disbursements due from investments, representing the shareholders' portion of profits.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Related Parties (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Amount for accounts payable to related parties. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Increase in Carrying Amount of Redeemable Preferred Stock
acct_description: Amount of decrease (increase) in additional paid in capital (APIC) for the increase in carrying amount of redeemable preferred stock.

acct_label: Customer Advances or Deposits, Noncurrent
acct_description: Aggregate noncurrent portion of prepayments received from customers for goods or services to be provided in the future, as well as the current portion of money or property received from customers that is to be returned upon satisfactory contract completion or as partial prepayment for goods or services to be provided in the future.

acct_label: Due from Banks
acct_description: A bank's noninterest bearing demand deposits in other banks (such as correspondents).

acct_label: Due from Officers or Stockholders
acct_description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Carrying Value of Assets Received as Consideration in Disposal of Business (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The changes in the carrying value of assets received as consideration in the disposal or of residual interests in the business.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Medium-term Notes
acct_description: Interest expense on medium-Term notes.

acct_label: Mineral Rights
acct_description: Carrying amount at the balance sheet date of mineral rights, or rights to extract a mineral from the earth or to receive payment in the form of a royalty for the extraction of minerals, net of amortization.

acct_label: Payments for Leasing Costs, Commissions, and Tenant Improvements
acct_description: Net cash outflow for the allowance granted to lessee and/or direct costs incurred by lessor used to prepare the leased premises for tenant's occupancy; for costs that are essential to originating the lease and would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement, including but not limited to, evaluating the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and costs incurred in negotiating, processing, and executing the lease agreement; and for any commission(s) incurred.

acct_label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits
acct_description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Proceeds from Collection of Long-term Loans to Related Parties
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with collection, whether partial or full, of long-term loans to a related party. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances to Affiliates.

acct_label: Receivable from Shareholders or Affiliates for Issuance of Capital Stock
acct_description: Amount due from owner or affiliate of reporting entity for issuance of shares. Includes, but is not limited to, amount due for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount due from officer or director.

acct_label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit), Correction of Error (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative effect of correction of an error in prior periods on retained earnings. An error in recognition, measurement, presentation or disclosure resulting from mathematical mistakes, mistakes in the application of GAAP, oversight or misuse of facts that existed at the time the financial statements were prepared are considered to be errors that require a correction. A change from the application of an accounting principle that is non GAAP to one that is consistent with GAAP is considered to be an error correction.

acct_label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable. pertaining to goods and services received from vendors; and for costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred in connection with contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent, salaries and benefits, and utilities. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Direct Materials (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost of materials used in goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Cost of Services, Licenses and Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost of generating revenue from multiple-deliverable arrangements that include licensing fees and services revenue. Licensing revenue is consideration received from another party for the right to use, but not own, certain of the entity's intangible assets. Licensing arrangements include, but are not limited to, rights to use a patent, copyright, technology, manufacturing process, software or trademark. Licensing fees are generally, but not always, fixed as to amount and not dependent upon the revenue generated by the licensing party. An entity may receive licensing fees for licenses that also generate royalty payments to the entity. Services revenue may be derived by providing other, nonspecified, services during the reporting period.

acct_label: Accrued Payroll Taxes, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory payroll taxes incurred through that date and withheld from employees pertaining to services received from them, including entity's matching share of the employees FICA taxes and contributions to the state and federal unemployment insurance programs. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Bad Debt Reserve, Tax Purpose of Qualified Lender
acct_description: Amount of bad debt reserves for tax purposes of qualified lenders excluded in calculating deferred taxes.

acct_label: Cost of Services, Depreciation (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of a tangible asset used in providing revenue generating services over the asset's useful life.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Long-term Receivables, Current
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due within one year (or one business cycle) of receivables that were originally due beyond one year (or one business cycle).

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Share Value, Amount
acct_description: Amount that would be paid, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if the holder of the share has the right to redeem the shares.

acct_label: Taxes and Licenses
acct_description: Amount of tax expense, excluding income, excise, production and property taxes, and licenses and fees not related to production.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration, Asset, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of asset recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination, expected to be realized beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Adjustments, Noncash Items, to Reconcile Net Income (Loss) to Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
acct_description: The aggregate amount of adjustments to net income or loss necessary to remove the effects of all items whose cash effects are investing or financing cash flows. The aggregate amount also includes all noncash expenses and income items which reduce or increase net income and are thus added back or deducted when calculating cash provided by or used in operating activities.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Other
acct_description: Amount of other assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Liabilities, Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt due within one year or within the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Loss Reclassified to Earnings (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Sale
acct_description: Amount of decrease from sale of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time and other income.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Intra-Entity Amounts, Discontinued Operation after Disposal, Revenue
acct_description: Amount of revenue in continuing operations related to continuing involvement in a discontinued operation after disposal that before the disposal was eliminated as intra-entity transactions.

acct_label: Distribution Made to Member or Limited Partner, Cash Distributions Declared (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The equity impact of cash distributions declared to a common shareholder or unit-holder by a LLC or LP.

acct_label: Due from Joint Ventures
acct_description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from an entity in which the reporting entity shares joint control with another party or group.

acct_label: Due from Officers or Stockholders, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amounts due from owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company, which are usually due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Inventories
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to inventories.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Pension Obligations
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to pension obligations.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Property and Equipment, Net
acct_description: Total fresh-start adjustment to property and equipment, net.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Retained Earnings (Deficit)
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to retained earnings or deficit.

acct_label: Income Tax Examination, Penalties Expense
acct_description: The amount of estimated penalties recognized in the period arising from income tax examinations.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Equity in Earnings (Losses) of Unconsolidated Subsidiary, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to equity in earnings (loss) of unconsolidated subsidiaries exempt from income taxes.

acct_label: Investments in and Advances to Affiliates, Dividends or Interest
acct_description: Amount of dividends or interest. Give totals for each group. If operations of any controlled companies are different in character from those of the company, group such affiliates (1) within divisions and (2) by type of activities.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Additional Paid-in Capital
acct_description: Amount of additional paid-in capital at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Amortizable Intangible Assets
acct_description: Amount of amortizable intangible assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Cash and Cash Equivalents
acct_description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Common Stock
acct_description: Amount of common stock at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Goodwill
acct_description: Amount of goodwill at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Liabilities and Stockholders' Equity
acct_description: Total liabilities and stockholders' equity at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Nonamortizable Intangible Assets
acct_description: Amount of nonamortizable intangible assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of accumulated other comprehensive Income or Loss at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Cash and Cash Equivalents
acct_description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Common Stock
acct_description: Amount of common stock at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Preferred and Common Stock Held in Treasury
acct_description: Amount of preferred and common stock held in treasury at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Unrealized Loss on Foreign Currency Derivatives, before Tax
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income pertaining to the decrease in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments to the extent that a cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

acct_label: Long-term Transition Bond, Current
acct_description: Long-Term transition bonds are bonds under the Competition Act in which the proceeds of Transition Bonds are required to be used principally to reduce qualified stranded costs and the related capitalization of the utility. This represents the current portion.

acct_label: Regulated Entity, Other Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Total of noncurrent other assets held by public utility entities.

acct_label: Capital Leased Assets, Number of Units
acct_description: The number of units (items of property) under capital lease arrangements.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Trading, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Due from Employees
acct_description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from an Entity employee, not to include stockholders or officers.

acct_label: Food and Beverage Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from sale of food (prepared and cooked-to-order foodstuffs, as well as snack items) and beverages (bottled or on-tap alcoholic beverages, as well as nonalcoholic beverages like carbonated drinks, juices, energy/sports drinks, water, coffee, and tea).

acct_label: Payments for Purchase of Securities, Operating Activities
acct_description: Cash paid to purchase debt and equity securities, classified as operating activities, during the period; includes trading securities and any other investments classified as operating.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Shares Subscribed but Unissued
acct_description: The number of nonredeemable preferred stock (shares) (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) allocated to investors to buy shares of a new issue of preferred stock before they are offered to the public. When stock is sold on a subscription basis, the issuer does not initially receive the total proceeds. In general, the issuer does not issue the shares to the investor until it receives the entire proceeds.

acct_label: US Government Securities, at Carrying Value
acct_description: Debt (bills, notes or bonds) that are issued by the government of the United States which are short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Liability, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for all deferred compensation arrangements payable beyond one year (or the operating cycle, if longer). Represents currently earned compensation under compensation arrangements that is not actually paid until a later date. For an unclassified balance sheet, represents the entire liability.

acct_label: Amortization of Leased Asset
acct_description: The expense charged against earnings for the periodic recognition of capitalized leases. This element may apply to energy companies that lease mineral producing properties and to other enterprises that capitalize property, plant, or equipment obtained through capital leases.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Cash-based Arrangements, Liability, Classified, Noncurrent
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements payable after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Represents currently earned compensation under cash arrangements (such as a profit-sharing plan, rabbi trust, and employee contract--excluding equity-based arrangements) that is not actually paid until a later date.

acct_label: Promotional Allowances (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the estimated retail value of accommodations, food and beverage, and other services furnished to guests without charge.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Charitable Contributions, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to charitable contributions expense.

acct_label: Sales Revenue, Goods, Net, Percentage (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The percentage of net product revenue to total net revenue from the sale of goods as of year end.

acct_label: Shipping and Handling Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Fees charged to customers for the delivery, generally by postal or freight service providers, of product or goods purchased.

acct_label: Subsequent Event, Amount, Higher Range (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The highest estimated amount of the financial effect of the event or transaction that occurred between the balance sheet date and the date the financial statements are issued or available to be issued.

acct_label: Subsequent Event, Amount, Lower Range (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The lowest estimated amount of the financial effect of the event or transaction that occurred between the balance sheet date and the date the financial statements are issued or available to be issued.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Cost of Sales, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net gains or losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to cost of sales from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Deferred Income, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Derivative, Higher Range of Basis Spread on Variable Rate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: High end of the range of percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the group of interest rate derivatives.

acct_label: Derivative, Lower Range of Basis Spread on Variable Rate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Low end of the range of percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the group of interest rate derivatives.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Deferred Tax Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount classified as deferred tax liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Due from Joint Ventures, Current
acct_description: Amounts due from an entity in which the reporting entity shares joint control with another party or group, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Investments (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Fair Value Hedges, Net
acct_description: Net fair value of all derivative instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Cash Flow Hedge Liability at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all foreign currency derivative liabilities designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Fair Value Hedge Ineffectiveness
acct_description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings during the period due to the ineffectiveness on foreign currency fair value hedges.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Equity Method Investments (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The difference between the book value and the sale price of investments in joint ventures and entities in which the reporting entity has an equity ownership interest, generally of 20 to 50 percent, and exercises significant influence. This element refers to the noncash Gain or Loss.

acct_label: Incentive from Lessor
acct_description: This item represents the deferred credit for an incentive or inducement received by a lessee from a lessor, in order to motivate the lessee to enter the lease agreement, which incentive or inducement is to be recognized as a reduction of rental expense over the lease term.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Industry Fund Obligation (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Change in Industry Fund also known as a multi-employer pension fund, which normally covers employees in a particular industry or group of industries, or in a particular geographic area.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Nonderivative Instruments Designated as Net Investment Hedges (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of all nonderivative instruments that are designated as hedging instruments in a hedge of the net investment of foreign operations. For example, foreign currency denominated intercompany loans.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Write-down of Securities Included in Net Income, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Reclassification adjustment for unrealized gains or losses realized upon the write-down of securities, after tax.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Write-down of Securities Included in Net Income, Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Tax effect on the reclassification adjustment for losses realized upon the write-down of securities.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Hedge, Financing Activities
acct_description: The net cash outflow or inflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either cash flow hedge, fair value hedge or hedge of net investment in foreign operations.

acct_label: Proceeds from Other Equity
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from the issuance of equity classified as other.

acct_label: Quarterly Financial Information, Quarterly Charges and Credits, Amount Affecting Comparability
acct_description: Amount of the item included in the interim period that affected period-to-period comparability (excluding restatement adjustments).

acct_label: Securities Borrowed, Fair Value of Collateral
acct_description: Fair value of the securities received as collateral against securities borrowed.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation, Shares Authorized under Stock Option Plans, Exercise Price Range, Exercisable Options, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average remaining life of the outstanding, exercisable stock options as of the balance sheet date for all option plans in the customized range of exercise prices.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation, Shares Authorized under Stock Option Plans, Exercise Price Range, Exercisable Options, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average remaining life of the exercisable stock options as of the balance sheet date for all option plans in the customized range of exercise prices.

acct_label: Short-term Debt, Maximum Month-end Outstanding Amount
acct_description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, maximum month-end borrowings during the period.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Dividend Rate, Per-Dollar-Amount
acct_description: The amount per share used to calculated dividend payments on preferred stock.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Real Estate (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The percentage of the fair value of real estate to the fair value of total plan assets held as of the measurement date.

acct_label: Excise and Sales Taxes
acct_description: The amount of excise and sales taxes included in sales and revenues, which are then deducted as a cost of sales. Includes excise taxes, which are applied to specific types of transactions or items (such as gasoline or alcohol); and sales, use and value added taxes, which are applied to a broad class of revenue-producing transactions involving a wide range of goods and services.

acct_label: Other Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations
acct_description: Amount of other current and other deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingency, Undiscounted, to be Paid, Year Five
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingency, Undiscounted, to be Paid, Year Four
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingency, Undiscounted, to be Paid, Year Two
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingency, Undiscounted, to be Paid, Year Three
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingency, Undiscounted, to be Paid, Year One
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Cooperative Advertising Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense under a cooperative advertising arrangement.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect on Retained Earnings, Tax (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the related income tax effect of a cumulative effect on retained earnings.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Amounts of Material Contingent Liabilities Remaining
acct_description: Amounts of material contingent liabilities, for example, but not limited to, product or environmental liabilities or litigation, that remain with the entity despite the disposal of the disposal group that is classified as a component of the entity.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Stock in Subsidiary
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Other, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other income tax settlements.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Gift Card Liability
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligation for outstanding gift cards. Retail customers purchase gift cards or gift certificates that can be redeemed at a later date for merchandise or services; those unredeemed represent a liability of the entity because the revenue is being deferred.

acct_label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets, Impairment Losses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Impairment recognized during the period and allocated to the reportable segment that results from the write-down of indefinite-lived intangible assets after comparing the implied fair value of reporting unit indefinite-lived intangible assets with the carrying amount of that indefinite-lived intangible assets, which are assessed at least annually for impairment.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Month-end Outstanding Amount
acct_description: Maximum month-end amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

acct_label: Long-term Purchase Commitment, Minimum Quantity Required
acct_description: Number of units of goods that must be purchased within the specified time period of the agreement to avoid penalties or unfavorable effects on pricing, among other adverse consequences.

acct_label: Prepaid Advertising
acct_description: Amount of consideration paid in advance for advertising that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Receivables Held-for-sale, Net Amount (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate of (trade) accounts and loans receivables that will be sold to other entities, at lower of cost or net realizable value.

acct_label: Revenue Recognition, Sales Returns, Reserve for Sales Returns
acct_description: Amount of estimated sales returns.

acct_label: Sales Returns and Allowances, Goods (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Total deduction from sales during the period arising from goods returned by customers (other than under warranty provisions) and price reductions (allowance, price protection agreements) given by the entity. Returns and allowances are a deduction from gross revenue in arriving at net revenue.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Shares Purchased for Award
acct_description: Number of shares purchased for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Site Contingency, Accrual, Undiscounted Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated undiscounted amount of the accrual for the environmental loss contingencies at an individual site as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Buildings
acct_description: Amount of facility held for productive use including, but not limited to, office, production, storage and distribution facilities, acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Land
acct_description: Amount of real estate acquired, at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Customer Advances and Deposits
acct_description: Refundable consideration, usually cash, held by the entity pending satisfactory completion of the entity's obligations or pending the closing of a contract.

acct_label: Derivative, Excluded Component, Gain (Loss), Recognized in Earnings
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of mortgage loans that are held with the intention to sell or be securitized in the near future.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accounts Payable
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Interest
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for interest that provides economic benefits in future periods.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Commercial and Residential, Real Estate
acct_description: Interest and fee income from commercial and residential real estate loans.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Commercial, Allowance (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The allowance for commercial loan and lease losses represents the reserve to cover probable credit losses related to specifically identified commercial loans and leases, as well as probable credit losses inherent in the remainder of the commercial loan portfolio as of the balance sheet date. For banks, include currently required allocated transfer risk reserves. Include carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for commercial loan losses in connection with business combinations determined to be appropriate.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Deferred Income, Commercial (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the cumulative amount of interest and fees paid by commercial loan borrowers which have not yet been taken into income in conformity with GAAP. Also reflects the amount of unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of acquired loans which have been classified as commercial loans by the entity and that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Commercial, Real Estate Loans (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount classified as commercial mortgage loans attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Carrying Amount of Mortgages (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount of the outstanding balance due under the mortgage loan.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Collections of Principal
acct_description: The amount of principal collected on mortgage loans on real estate during the reporting period.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, New Mortgage Loan
acct_description: Amount of increase in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from new investment.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Number of Loans
acct_description: Indicates the number of mortgages under each classification.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Principal Amount of Delinquent Loans
acct_description: Amount of principal due on loans that have been delinquent, which may exclude loans having interest delinquent for three months or less, as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Prior Liens (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of any prior liens on the real estate that secures the mortgage loan.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Prior Liens
acct_description: Amount of prior lien on the real estate that secures the mortgage loan.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Renewed and Extended, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of mortgage loans on real estate that were renewed or extended.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Renewed and Extended, Amount
acct_description: Amount of mortgage loan in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, renewed or extended.

acct_label: Notes Reduction
acct_description: The value of notes retired (or transferred to another entity) in noncash investing or financing transactions.

acct_label: Number of Units in Real Estate Property
acct_description: The number of units in a real estate property owned as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Payments for Purchase of Other Assets
acct_description: Amount of cash paid to purchase other assets as part of operating activities.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate and Real Estate Joint Ventures
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held-for-investment and real estate joint ventures.

acct_label: Proceeds from Real Estate and Real Estate Joint Ventures
acct_description: The cash inflow from the sale of real estate held-for-investment and real estate joint ventures.

acct_label: Proceeds, Financing Receivable, Previously Written Off, Recovery
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of financing receivable, previously written off.

acct_label: Proceeds from Recoveries of Loans Previously Charged off (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The cash inflow from loans reinstated and recovered that were previously deemed uncollectible.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Wholly Owned Real Estate and Real Estate Acquired in Settlement of Loans
acct_description: The cash inflow from proceeds From Sales of Wholly Owned Real Estate and Real Estate Acquired in Settlement of Loans.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Improvements
acct_description: Amount of increase in real estate investments related to improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Other Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of increase in real estate investments from acquisitions other than through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Other Addition
acct_description: Amount of other additions excluding acquisition or improvement to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Cost Capitalized Subsequent to Acquisition, Building and Improvements
acct_description: Amount of building and improvement costs capitalized since acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Cost Capitalized Subsequent to Acquisition, Land
acct_description: Amount of land costs capitalized since acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Investment Property, Net
acct_description: Amount after accumulated depreciation of real estate held for investment for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Improvements
acct_description: Improvements to other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from capital contributions to an entity associated with a dividend reinvestment plan.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Charges to Expense for New Losses
acct_description: Amount of expense for newly incurred environmental loss contingencies. Includes, but is not limited to, remediation expense and interest accretion.

acct_label: Concentration Risk, Percentage (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: For an entity that discloses a concentration risk in relation to quantitative amount, which serves as the "benchmark" (or denominator) in the equation, this concept represents the concentration percentage derived from the division.

acct_label: Customer Refund Liability, Current
acct_description: Current regulatory liabilities generally represent obligations to make refunds to customers for various reasons including overpayment.

acct_label: Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) the extended product warranty accrual. Excludes standard product warranties.

acct_label: Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the extended product warranty liability. Excludes standard product warranties.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Recoveries (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Reduction to the allowance for credit losses related to collections on financing receivables which have been partially or fully charged off as bad debts.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Write-down of Securities Included in Net Income, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Net of tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized (losses) realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Percentage of FIFO Inventory
acct_description: The percentage of FIFO (first in first out) inventory to total inventory as of the balance sheet date if other than 100 percent.

acct_label: Financial Instruments, Owned, US Government and Agency Obligations, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in debt obligations issued by the US government including short-term Treasury bills, medium-term Treasury notes, and long-term Treasury bonds, as well as debt issued by agencies. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

acct_label: Special Assessment Bond, Current
acct_description: The current portion of the carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a type of municipal bond typically used to fund a development project. Also called special assessment limited liability bond, special district bond, special purpose bond, special tax bond and community development obligation. Interest owed to lenders is paid by taxes levied on the community benefiting from the particular bond-funded project. For example, if a bond of this sort was issued to pay for sidewalks to be repaved in a certain community, an additional tax would be levied on homeowners in the area benefiting from this project.

acct_label: Product Liability Accrual, Component Amount
acct_description: Recorded amount of the accrual for a material component of a product liability contingency.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Refund Liability, Current
acct_description: Amount of liability for consideration received or receivable from customer which is not included in transaction price, when consideration is expected to be refunded to customer, classified as current.

acct_label: Customer Refundable Fees, Proceeds
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from customers for revenue related transactions that are refundable to the customers and do not meet the criteria for revenue recognition.

acct_label: Deferred Income, Current
acct_description: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

acct_label: Freight Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost of freight-in, whether based on weight, negotiated freight rates and method of transportation (that is, rail, barge, truck, and so forth).

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Materials and Supplies
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of capitalized costs of materials, supplies, or both, which are not included in inventory.

acct_label: Auction Rate Securities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of securities that are debt instruments (corporate or municipal bonds) that typically have long-term nominal maturities for which the interest rate is reset through an auction process.

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Excluding Contract Retainage, Year One
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Cost of Services, Excluding Depreciation, Depletion, and Amortization (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate cost of services rendered during the reporting period, excluding depreciation, depletion and amortization.

acct_label: Obligations, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value of obligations measured on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Book Overdrafts
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in book overdrafts.

acct_label: Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure, Nonrecurring (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregation of the liabilities reported on the balance sheet measured at fair value on a nonrecurring basis by the entity.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Write-down of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized (losses) realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Other Assets Pledged as Collateral, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of other assets which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge them.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Forfeited (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Number of share options (or share units) forfeited during the period.

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Contract Cost, Subject to Uncertainty, Amount
acct_description: Amount of cost incurred on construction contract for unapproved change order, claim, or similar item subject to uncertainty.

acct_label: Unbilled Change Orders, Amount Expected to be Collected within One Year
acct_description: Amount of unbilled change orders from customers under long-term contracts or programs associated with unpriced change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization which is expected to be collected within one year from the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Common Stock, Other Value, Outstanding
acct_description: Value of shares of other common stock instruments held by shareholders, such as exchangeable shares. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Flight Equipment
acct_description: Cash received from sales of long-lived depreciable flight assets, including owned aircraft or capital improvements.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Tax Effect of Adjustment to Prior Period Gain (Loss) on Disposal
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for an increase (decrease) to a gain (loss) previously reported in discontinued operations in a prior period.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Interest Payments from ESOP
acct_description: An entity often discloses the amount of interest paid by the ESOP to a lender.

acct_label: Investments in and Advances to Affiliates, Balance, Principal Amount
acct_description: Amount of principal loans outstanding to affiliates for management investment companies.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest, Amount
acct_description: The portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Payments
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow reducing loss contingency liability.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Other (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of net income or loss for the period allocated to noncontrolling shareholders, unit holders, partners, or other equity holders in one or more of the entities consolidated into the reporting entity's financial statements other than those noncontrolling interests already defined within the taxonomy.

acct_label: Notes Payable to Bank, Current
acct_description: Current portion of the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer, on all notes payable to banks paid on an installment with long term maturities. This can include the amount of any loans from the applicant firm. This does not, however, include any mortgage balances.

acct_label: Research and Development Arrangement with Federal Government, Costs Incurred, Net
acct_description: The net amount of research and development costs incurred for a fixed-price, best-efforts research and development cost-sharing arrangement with the Federal Government.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Weighted Average Expected Dividend
acct_description: Disclosure of the weighted average expected dividend for an entity using a valuation technique with different dividend rates during the contractual term.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net Investment Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from derivative designated and qualifying as net investment hedge.

acct_label: Unusual or Infrequent Item, or Both, Loss, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before deduction of insurance proceeds, of loss recognized in the income statement for an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

acct_label: Unusual or Infrequent Item, or Both, Gain, Gross
acct_description: Amount of gain recognized in the income statement for an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Liabilities, Deferred Revenue (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to deferred revenue of the acquired entity.

acct_label: Business Combination, Indemnification Assets, Range of Outcomes, Value, High
acct_description: For indemnification assets recognized in connection with a business combination, this element represents an estimate of the high-end of the potential range (undiscounted) of the indemnification benefit which may be realized.

acct_label: Business Combination, Step Acquisition, Equity Interest in Acquiree, Remeasurement Loss
acct_description: In a business combination achieved in stages, this element represents the amount of loss recognized by the entity as a result of remeasuring to fair value the equity interest in the acquiree it held before the business combination.

acct_label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Net, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer; classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Threshold Trading Days
acct_description: Threshold number of specified trading days that common stock price to conversion price of convertible debt instruments must exceed threshold percentage within a specified consecutive trading period to trigger conversion feature.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Joint Venture Partners (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of net Income or Loss for the period allocated to noncontrolling shareholders, unit holders, partners, or other equity holders in joint ventures included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) Joint Venture Partners, Redeemable
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to redeemable noncontrolling shareholder, unit holder, partner, or other equity holder of a joint venture.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to noncontrolling interests.

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Loss Exposure Not Accrued, High Estimate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: High-end of the range estimate for a reasonably possible liability for product liability damages for which no accrual has been recorded.

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Loss Exposure Not Accrued, Low Estimate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Low-end of the range estimate for a reasonably possible liability for product liability damages for which no accrual has been recorded.

acct_label: Net Assets
acct_description: The net of assets and liabilities.

acct_label: Communication
acct_description: The amount of expense incurred in the period for communication, which is the exchange of information by several methods.

acct_label: Cost of Other Property Operating Expense
acct_description: Other operating costs incurred during the reporting period and may include amounts paid to maintain the property.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Off-market Lease, Favorable, Gross
acct_description: This element represents the identifiable intangible asset established upon acquisition based on a favorable difference between the terms of an acquired lease and the current market terms for that lease at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Franchise Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred and are directly related to generating franchise revenues.

acct_label: Franchisor Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenue earned from franchisor owned outlets and franchised outlets.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Disposition of Discontinued Operations for Other Stock, Per Basic Share (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Income (loss) from disposition of discontinued operations per basic share of common stock or other stock outstanding.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Periodic Payment, Principal
acct_description: Amount of the required periodic payment applied to principal.

acct_label: Liquidation Basis of Accounting, Remeasurement, Gain (Loss) on Accrued Costs to Dispose of Assets and Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from remeasurement of estimated accrued costs to dispose of assets or other items expected to be sold in liquidation.

acct_label: Liquidation Basis of Accounting, Remeasurement, Gain (Loss) on Asset
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from remeasurement of an asset to reflect the change in value under liquidation basis.

acct_label: Loans Payable, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

acct_label: Losses (Gains) on Sales of Assets and Asset Impairment Charges (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate impact on earnings in the period of (a) the loss (gain) from the difference between the sale price or salvage price and the book value of an asset that was sold or retired during the reporting period, and (b) the charge against earnings resulting from the aggregate write down of all assets from their carrying value to their fair value.

acct_label: Number of Properties Subject to Ground Leases
acct_description: Number of separate real estate development properties located on land subject to ground leases.

acct_label: Agricultural Related Inventory, Feed and Supplies
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of materials capitalized as inventory because of their use in the growth and maintenance of animals and crops.

acct_label: Consolidation, Less than Wholly Owned Subsidiary, Parent Ownership Interest, Changes, Issuance of Equity by Subsidiary to Noncontrolling Interests
acct_description: Represents a sale (new stock issuance) by a subsidiary to noncontrolling interests (third parties, parties directly or indirectly unrelated to parent) during the period. The capital transaction by subsidiary does not result in a loss of control by the parent, but does effect a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent.

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Excluding Contract Retainage, after Year One
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Excluding Contract Retainage, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Excluding Contract Retainage, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Excluding Contract Retainage, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Distributions Paid (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of distributions made to the individual during the period.

acct_label: Income Tax Examination, Estimate of Possible Loss
acct_description: Estimated amount of loss resulting from an adverse tax position.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Outstanding Checks, Operating Activities
acct_description: The change in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in outstanding checks, the liability that represents checks that have been issued but that have not cleared. The entity may classify these cash flows as financing or operating activities. Another element, Increase (Decrease) in Outstanding Checks, Financing Activities, represents cash flows from outstanding checks classified as financing activities.

acct_label: Patronage Refunds
acct_description: Amount of earnings distributed to patrons of the agricultural cooperative.

acct_label: Patronage Source Earnings
acct_description: Amount of revenue in excess of cost resulting from transactions for or with patrons.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Securities Pledged under Letter of Credit Facilities, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities that are restricted as collateral under letter of credit agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Securities, Operating Activities
acct_description: Cash received from sale of investments in debt and equity securities, classified as operating activities, during the period; includes trading securities and any other investments classified as operating.

acct_label: Advance Payments by Borrowers for Taxes and Insurance
acct_description: Carrying amount of accumulated prepayments received by financial institutions from borrowers for taxes (for example, property taxes) and insurance (for example, property and catastrophe) which will periodically be remitted to the appropriate governmental agency or vendor on behalf of the borrower.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense, Debt Issuance Costs
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from debt issuance costs.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

acct_label: Depreciation Premises and Equipment (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of expense charged against earnings in the period to allocate the cost, net of salvage value, of premises and equipment over their remaining estimated productive lives.

acct_label: Federal Funds Sold
acct_description: The amount outstanding of funds lent to other depository institutions, securities brokers, or securities dealers in the form of Federal Funds sold; for example, immediately available funds lent under agreements or contracts that mature in one business day or roll over under a continuing contract, regardless of the nature of the transaction or the collateral involved, excluding overnight lending for commercial and industrial purposes. Also include Federal Funds sold under agreements to resell on a gross basis, excluding (1) sales of term Federal Funds, (2) due bills representing purchases of securities or other assets by the reporting bank that have not yet been delivered and similar instruments, (3) resale agreements that mature in more than one business day involving assets other than securities, and (4) yield maintenance dollar repurchase agreements.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Disclosures, Weighted Average Interest Rate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: States the weighted average interest rate applicable to the advances from the Federal Home Loan Bank outstanding as of the Balance Sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of federal home loan bank advances. Advances are loans from the federal home loan bank system to a member (shareholder).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Fees and Commissions, Mortgage Banking (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The noninterest income derived from mortgage banking activities (fees and commissions), excluding fees earned from servicing third-party assets.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Owned and Pledged as Collateral, Amount Eligible to be Repledged by Counterparty
acct_description: Fair value of financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes that are carried at fair value and pledged to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions where counterparty has the right to re-pledge such.

acct_label: Income Tax Examination, Range of Possible Losses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The estimated range of reasonably possible losses resulting from an adverse position taken by a taxing authority.

acct_label: Interest Income, Securities, Mortgage Backed
acct_description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securitized, pass-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Percent of Net Assets
acct_description: Percent of net assets at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, each category should have a percent of net assets for the aggregated value of the Investments in the category.

acct_label: Life Insurance, Corporate or Bank Owned, Change in Value
acct_description: The change in cash surrender or contract value during the period which adjusted the amount of premiums paid in determining the expense or income recognized under the contract for the period.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Loans and Leases
acct_description: The net cash outflow or inflow for other changes, net, in the loan and lease balances held for investment purposes that are not separately disclosed. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

acct_label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Securities for Repurchase Agreements
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for repurchase agreements, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Federal Reserve Bank Stock
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) stock.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Foreclosed Assets
acct_description: The cash inflow from the sale assets received in full or partial satisfaction of a receivable including real and personal property; equity interests in corporations, partnerships, and joint ventures; and beneficial interests in trusts. Foreclosed assets also include loans that are treated as if the underlying collateral had been foreclosed because the institution has taken possession of the collateral, even though legal foreclosure or repossession proceedings have not taken place.

acct_label: Bank Servicing Fees (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenue from servicing real estate mortgages, credit cards, and other financial assets held by others. Includes premiums received in lieu of regular servicing fees.

acct_label: Servicing Liability at Amortized Cost, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of the servicing liability that has been amortized.

acct_label: Supplies and Postage Expense
acct_description: The aggregate amount of expenses directly related to the supplies and postage.

acct_label: Travel and Entertainment Expense
acct_description: Expenses incurred for travel and entertainment during the period.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Parent's Basis in Discontinued Operation
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from the entity's basis in a discontinued operation.

acct_label: Employee Benefit and Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash
acct_description: Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for employee benefits and share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, pension, other postretirement, postemployment and termination benefits.

acct_label: Subsidiary of Limited Liability Company or Limited Partnership, Ownership Interest
acct_description: The number of units or percentage investment held in the subsidiary by the limited liability company or limited partnership.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) the accrual for environmental loss contingencies.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Increase (Decrease) for Currency Translation (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The Increase or Decrease in the accrual for environmental loss contingencies during the reporting period related to currency translations.

acct_label: AOCI before Tax, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount before tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, attributable to parent. Excludes net income (loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners (distributions to owners).

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Special Purpose Entity (SPE) and Transferor, Proceeds from Collections Reinvested in Revolving Period Securitizations (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of proceeds from collections reinvested in previous securitization or asset-backed financing arrangement.

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Special Purpose Entity (SPE) and Transferor, Proceeds from Newly Securitized Assets (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of proceeds from new securitizations or asset-backed financing arrangements during this reporting period for this class of securitization or asset-backed financing arrangement.

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Special Purpose Entity (SPE) and Transferor, Purchases of Previously Transferred Financial Assets (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of cash outflow used to purchase previously transferred financial assets (or its underlying collateral), including delinquent or foreclosed assets, from the securitization or asset-backed financing arrangement SPE.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Share-based Arrangements, Liability, Classified, Noncurrent
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements payable after one year (or the operating cycle, if longer).
