acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Investment within Plan Asset Category, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of investment to total investment within defined benefit plan asset category.

acct_label: Environmental Cost Recognized, Capitalized in Period (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of environmental remediation costs capitalized during the period. These expenditures may relate to long-lived improvements in operating facilities.

acct_label: Nonoperating Gains (Losses)
acct_description: The aggregate amount of gains or losses resulting from nonoperating activities (for example, interest and dividend revenue, property, plant and equipment impairment loss, and so forth).

acct_label: Payments for Merger Related Costs and Restructuring Costs (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of cash paid during the reporting period for charges associated with mergers and the consolidation and relocation of operations, disposition or abandonment of operations or productive assets (that is, for reorganizing and restructuring charges and other related expenses). These charges may be incurred in connection with a business combination, change in strategic plan, a managerial response to declines in demand, increasing costs or other environmental factors.

acct_label: Proceeds from Operating Activities
acct_description: Total amount of cash received from operating activities during the current period.

acct_label: Cost of Services, Direct Materials (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost of materials used in services rendered by an entity during the reporting period.

acct_label: Deferred Gain (Loss) on Discontinuation of Foreign Currency Fair Value Hedge (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of the unamortized adjustment to the carrying value of an interest-bearing hedged item made under an effective foreign currency fair value hedge that is amortized upon discontinuation of the hedge.

acct_label: Derivatives used in Net Investment Hedge, Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from transactions on foreign currency derivatives that are designated as, and are effective as, economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity.

acct_label: Fair Value, Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Gain (Loss) Included in Investment Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of the total realized and unrealized gains or losses for the period which are included in the statement of income (or changes in net assets) in investment income; the fair value of which assets was or is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Cash Flow Hedge Ineffectiveness
acct_description: The net gain (loss) during the reporting period due to ineffectiveness in foreign currency cash flow hedges. Recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Raw Materials, Packaging Materials and Supplies Inventories
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of raw materials, packaging materials and supplies held in inventory.

acct_label: Land under Purchase Options, Recorded
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land not owned but under a contract in which the entity has an option to purchase the land.

acct_label: Operating Lease, Residual Value of Leased Asset
acct_description: Amount of residual asset covered by residual value guarantee under operating lease. Excludes guarantee considered to be lease payments for lessor.

acct_label: Other Cost of Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Other costs incurred and are directly related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Medium-term Notes
acct_description: The cash inflow from a debt funding received on a regular basis with maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Share-based Liabilities Paid (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of liabilities paid for share-based compensation.

acct_label: Derivatives used in Net Investment Hedge, Tax Benefit (Expense) (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Tax effect of current period adjustment resulting from gains and losses on foreign currency transactions that are designated as, and are effective as, economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity.

acct_label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Common Stock Subject to Repurchase or Cancellation
acct_description: Number of shares of common stock subject to repurchase or cancellation determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that these shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Common stock subject to repurchase are outstanding common shares that are contingently returnable (that is, subject to recall).

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Held-to-maturity Securities, Short-term
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) through acquisition (sale) of short-term held-to-maturity securities.

acct_label: Value Added Tax Receivable
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities.

acct_label: Business Combination, Step Acquisition, Equity Interest in Acquiree, Fair Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: In a business combination achieved in stages, this element represents the acquisition-date fair value of the equity interest in the acquiree held by the acquirer immediately before the acquisition date.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Interest Expense, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net gains or losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to interest expense from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Debt and Equity Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from investment in debt and equity securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income, and recognized from transfer of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Derivative, Average Fixed Interest Rate
acct_description: Average fixed interest rate related to the group of interest rate derivatives.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Property and Other Taxes Payable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of cash payments due to taxing authorities for non-income-related taxes.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Variable Interest Entity
acct_description: Portion of equity (net assets) in a variable interest entity (VIE) not attributable, directly or indirectly, to the parent entity. That is, this is the portion of equity in a VIE that is attributable to the noncontrolling interest (previously referred to as minority interest).

acct_label: Notes Issued (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The fair value of notes issued in noncash investing and financing activities.

acct_label: Notes Payable to Bank, Noncurrent
acct_description: The total amount due within more than 12 month, or the operating cycle if longer, on all notes payable to banks paid on an installment. This can include the amount of any loans from the applicant firm. This does not, however, include any mortgage balances.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Price Risk Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of price risk derivatives, which relates to the monetary amount specified in the price risk derivative instruments. Excludes notional amounts on derivatives expressed in nonmonetary units.

acct_label: Price Risk Derivative Assets, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of price risk derivative assets, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as assets on the balance sheet.

acct_label: Price Risk Derivative Liabilities, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of price risk derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as liabilities on the balance sheet.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Decrease in Deferred Tax Liability due to Transition Tax (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of decrease in deferred tax liability previously recognized attributable to taxable temporary differences from undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiary and other recognized entity now subject to transition tax.

acct_label: Transfer Investments (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Value of investments transferred in noncash transactions.

acct_label: Amount Available for Dividend Distribution with Approval from Regulatory Agencies (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of dividends that can be declared or paid with approval of relevant regulatory agencies.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing and Sales Type Leases
acct_description: The lessor's asset under sales type and direct financing leases. The net investment in direct financing and sales-type leases as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) estimated executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Cost-method Investments, Aggregate Carrying Amount, Not Evaluated for Impairment
acct_description: "This element represents the aggregate carrying amount of all cost-method investments held by the Entity which was not evaluated for impairment. Because the fair value of cost-method investments is not readily determinable, the evaluation of whether an investment is impaired generally consists of whether an event or change in circumstances has occurred during the reporting period that may have a significant adverse effect on the fair value of the investment (an ""impairment indicator""). Impairment indicators include, but are not limited to: (1) significant deterioration in the earnings performance, credit rating, asset quality, or business prospects of the investee; (2) significant adverse change in the regulatory, economic, or technological environment of the investee; (3) significant adverse change in the general market condition of either the geographic area or the industry in which the investee operates; (4) a bona fide offer to purchase (whether solicited or unsolicited), an offer by the investee to sell, or a completed auction process for the same or similar security for an amount less than the cost of the investment; or (5) factors that raise significant concerns about the investee's ability to continue as a going concern, such as negative cash flows from operations, working capital deficiencies, or noncompliance with statutory capital requirements or debt covenants."

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Time Deposits
acct_description: Net cash inflow (outflow) of time deposits.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Collective-Bargaining Arrangement, Percentage of Contributions Required for Multiple Collective-Bargaining Arrangements (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage of contributions required of employer under collective bargaining arrangement to total contributions required under all collective bargaining arrangements for pension and other postretirement plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Significant, Employer Contribution under Collective-Bargaining Arrangement to All Participating Employer Contributions, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of employer contribution required by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to total contribution from all participating employers in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plans, Collective-Bargaining Arrangement, Percentage of Contributions (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage of contributions required by a collective bargaining arrangement to contributions required by all collective bargaining arrangements related to a pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Payments for) in Interest-bearing Deposits in Banks
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow in Interest-bearing Deposits by banks in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Lease Receivables
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of receivables arising from the lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent; excludes proceeds from sales-type lease transactions, which are classified as operating activities.

acct_label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Interest Income
acct_description: Amount of interest income from net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

acct_label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments with Regulatory Approval
acct_description: Amount of dividends that can be declared or paid with approval of regulatory agency.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), Adjustments, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of adjustments from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), Adjustments, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of adjustments from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), Adjustments, Tax
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for adjustments from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), before Adjustments, Tax
acct_description: Amount, before adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Asset Management Fees (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue recognized in the period for (1) performance (incentive) fees based on the investment results achieved for management of certain institutional accounts and hedge funds, (2) schedule-based fees earned for management of mutual funds and closed-end funds, based either on average daily net assets or on a combination of the average daily net assets and gross income, and (3) other investment management and advisory fees.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assets for Plan Benefits (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: This represents the entire assets recognized in the balance sheet that are associated with the defined benefit plans.

acct_label: Investments in and Advances to Affiliates, at Fair Value, Gross Reductions
acct_description: Gross reductions to the investment in and advance to the affiliate.

acct_label: Investments in and Advances to Affiliates, Dividend or Interest Credited to Income
acct_description: At the close of the period, the dividends or interest included in caption 1 of the statement of operations. In addition, show as the final item the aggregate of dividends and interest included in the statement of operations in respect of investments in affiliates not held at the close of the period. The total of this column would be expected to agree with the correlative amount shown on the related statement of operations.

acct_label: Tax Basis of Investments, Unrealized Appreciation (Depreciation), Net
acct_description: The net unrealized appreciation or depreciation.

acct_label: Undistributed Net Realized Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the accumulated amount as of the reporting date of undistributed income derived from the gain (loss) on sale of properties which is otherwise disclosed. The purpose of separately disclosing such information is to distinguish between income generated from the gain (loss) attributable to the sale of a real estate investment trust's portfolio properties and the operation of such properties.

acct_label: Compensation Expense, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
acct_description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit. Other employee benefit expense includes, but is not limited to, service component of net periodic benefit cost for defined benefit plan. Excludes compensation cost in cost of good and service sold.

acct_label: Investment Company, Distribution to Shareholders, Per Share
acct_description: Per share or unit amount of distribution to shareholders. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend and capital gain. Excludes distribution for tax return of capital.

acct_label: Investment Company, Dividend Distribution
acct_description: Amount of dividend distribution from ordinary income and capital gain. Excludes distribution for tax return of capital.

acct_label: Investment Company, Expense Ratio Including Incentive Fee
acct_description: Percentage, after deduction of fee waiver and incentive fee, of expense to average net assets.

acct_label: Investment Company, Financial Commitment to Investee, Future Amount
acct_description: Amount of financial support to be provided in future by investment company to investee.

acct_label: Investment Company, Gain (Loss) on Investment, Per Share
acct_description: Per share or unit amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

acct_label: Investment Company, Investment Income (Loss) from Operations, Per Share
acct_description: Per share or unit amount of investment income (loss) and realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

acct_label: Investment Company, Investment Income (Loss), Per Share
acct_description: Per share or unit amount, after investment expense, of dividend and interest investment income (loss).

acct_label: Investment Company, Investment Income (Loss) Ratio
acct_description: Percentage of investment income (loss) to average net assets.

acct_label: Investment Company, Net Asset Value Per Share, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Per share or unit amount of increase (decrease) in net asset value.

acct_label: Tax Basis of Investments, Cost for Income Tax Purposes
acct_description: The aggregate cost of investments for Federal income tax purposes.

acct_label: Tax Basis of Investments, Gross, Unrealized Appreciation
acct_description: Aggregate gross unrealized appreciation for all Investments in which there is an excess of value over tax cost.

acct_label: Tax Basis of Investments, Gross, Unrealized Depreciation
acct_description: The aggregate gross unrealized depreciation for all Investments in which there is an excess of tax cost over value.

acct_label: Investment Company, Distributable Earnings (Loss), Accumulated Capital Loss Carryforward
acct_description: Amount of accumulated undistributed deficit from capital loss carryforward of investment company.

acct_label: Investment Company, Distributable Earnings (Loss), Accumulated Appreciation (Depreciation)
acct_description: Amount of accumulated undistributed earnings (deficit) from unrealized appreciation (depreciation) of investment company.

acct_label: Investment Company, Distributable Earnings (Loss), Accumulated Long-term Capital Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of accumulated undistributed earnings (deficit) from long-term capital gain (loss) of investment company.

acct_label: Investment Company, Distributable Earnings (Loss), Accumulated Ordinary Income (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of accumulated undistributed earnings (deficit) from ordinary income (loss) of investment company.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts, Percentage of Accounts Receivable
acct_description: Ratio of the allowance for doubtful accounts to accounts receivable, expressed as a percentage, for health care organizations.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Extraordinary Items, Net of Tax, Per Basic and Diluted Share (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The income (loss) from extraordinary items, net of related tax effect, per each basic and diluted share of common stock or unit when the per share amount is the same for both basic and diluted shares.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Periodic Payment, Interest
acct_description: Amount of the required periodic payment applied to interest.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Restricted Certificates of Deposit
acct_description: The cash outflow from temporary investment with specific maturity and interest rate that are prohibited for current use.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Component Amount
acct_description: Recorded amount of the accrual for a material component of an environmental loss contingency.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments in Hedges, Assets, at Fair Value
acct_description: Aggregate fair value of all derivative assets designated as hedging instruments. Includes instruments designated as cash flow hedges, fair value hedges, and hedges of net investments in foreign operations.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments in Hedges, Liabilities, at Fair Value
acct_description: Aggregate fair value of all derivative liabilities designated as hedging instruments. Includes instruments designated as cash flow hedges, fair value hedges, and hedges of net investments in foreign operations.

acct_label: Environmental Costs Recognized, Capitalized
acct_description: Amount of costs recognized in the balance sheet for known or estimated future costs arising from requirements to perform activities to remediate one or more sites.

acct_label: Unusual or Infrequent Item, Gross (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before insurance proceeds of gain (loss) income statement effect of each material event or transaction (that would not reasonably be expected to recur in the foreseeable future) that possesses a high degree of abnormality and are clearly unrelated to, or incidentally related to, the ordinary and typical activities of the entity.

acct_label: Derivative, Exchange Rate Cap
acct_description: Cap rate on a foreign currency derivative for example, but not limited to, a cap or a collar.

acct_label: Proceeds from Other Deposits
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow for receipts of deposits classified as other.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Employee Related Charges
acct_description: Amount of reorganization items related to employee related charges.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Net Gain (Loss) on Rejection of Leases and Other Executory Contracts
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on rejection of leases and other executory contracts, reported as a reorganization item.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Revaluation of Assets and Liabilities
acct_description: Amount recognized from the revaluation of assets and liabilities.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax, Per Basic and Diluted Share
acct_description: Per basic and diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation, when the per share amount is the same.

acct_label: Embedded Derivative, No Longer Bifurcated, Amount Reclassified to Stockholders' Equity
acct_description: The amount of the liability for the conversion option reclassified to stockholders' equity when the embedded option no longer required separation from the host instrument.

acct_label: Expense Related to Distribution or Servicing and Underwriting Fees
acct_description: Expense related to distribution, servicing and underwriting fees.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Entity Credit Risk (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Risk associated with risk of default, credit spread risk and downgrade risk, expressed as a percentage, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Debtor-in-Possession Financing
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to debtor-in-possession financing.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Goodwill
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to goodwill.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Nonamortizable Intangible Assets
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to nonamortizable intangible assets.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Pension Costs (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in prepaid pension costs.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Accounts Payable
acct_description: Amount of accounts payable at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Accrued Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of accrued liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
acct_description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of accumulated other comprehensive Income or Loss at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Assets
acct_description: Total assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Buildings and Improvements
acct_description: Amount of buildings and improvements at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Current Assets
acct_description: Total current assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Current Liabilities
acct_description: Total current liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Current Maturities of Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of current maturities of long-term debt at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Deferred Income Tax Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent deferred income tax assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent deferred tax liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Equipment
acct_description: Amount of equipment at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Inventories
acct_description: Amount of inventories at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Land
acct_description: Amount of land at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Liabilities
acct_description: Total liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Liabilities Subject to Compromise
acct_description: Amount of liabilities subject to compromise at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Long-term Debt
acct_description: Total long-term debt at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Other Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of other noncurrent assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Other Noncurrent Obligations
acct_description: Total other noncurrent obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Pension Obligations
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent pension obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Preferred and Common Stock Held in Treasury
acct_description: Amount of preferred and common stock held in treasury at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Prepaid and Other Current Assets
acct_description: Amount of prepaid and other current assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Property and Equipment, Net
acct_description: Total property and equipment, net at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Receivables, Net
acct_description: Amount of receivables, net at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Short-term Borrowings
acct_description: Amount of short-term borrowings at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Stockholders' Equity
acct_description: Total stockholders' equity at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Reorganization Value
acct_description: Amount attributed to the reconstituted entity, as well as the expected net realizable value of those assets that will be disposed before reconstitution occurs.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Tax Benefit of Dividends Paid to Plan
acct_description: The tax benefit resulting from dividends paid on preferred stock held by an employee stock option plan, when that stock is not a common stock equivalent.

acct_label: Impairment of Retained Interest
acct_description: The charge against earnings to reduce the carrying value of an interest continued to be held by the transferor in a securitized financial instrument.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's liabilities included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

acct_label: Proceeds from Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
acct_description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months. Includes proceeds from long-term and short-term debt.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Cap Rate (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Ratio of the net operating income produced by an asset and its capital cost (original prices paid to buy the asset), used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Retail Related Inventories
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the book value of merchandise inventory held by a retailer, wholesaler, or distributor for future sale; includes packaging and other supplies used to store, transport, or present merchandise inventory.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Consumer Installment, Credit Card
acct_description: Interest and fee income from credit card balances due from individuals. Such loans are considered revolving credit arrangements.

acct_label: Inventory, Land Held for Development and Sale
acct_description: Carrying amount net of impairment reserves as of the balance sheet date primarily consisting of deposits for land purchases (including option payments), related acquisition costs, and land which is not expected to be developed in the next two years.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Projects
acct_description: The cash outflow from the amount invested for projects in hopes of getting a future return or interest from it.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Reallocation of Noncontrolling Interest (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Change in additional paid in capital as a result of a reallocation of a subsidiary's stockholders' equity to noncontrolling interest due to the subsidiary issuing stock. This reallocation is from a capital transaction.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Transfers to Trading, Gains (Losses)
acct_description: This item represents the difference between the gross amount of gains (losses) included in earnings for transfers of securities from the available-for-sale category into the trading category. Such net gain (loss) included in earnings represents the net unrealized gain (loss) which had been included in other comprehensive income and is associated with the securities transferred from the available-for-sale category to the trading category.

acct_label: Derivative Credit Risk Valuation Adjustment, Derivative Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of credit risk valuation adjustment to derivative liabilities to properly reflect the credit quality of the entity.

acct_label: Earnings Per Share, Basic, Undistributed
acct_description: The earnings attributable to each security on the basis that all of the earnings for the period had been distributed (to the extent that each security may share in earnings). This is the earnings amount which reflects the participation rights in undistributed earnings of each security.

acct_label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted, Undistributed
acct_description: The earnings attributable to each security on the basis that all of the earnings for the period had been distributed (to the extent that each security may share in earnings). This is the earnings amount which reflects the participation rights in undistributed earnings of each security, after giving effect to all dilutive potential common shares outstanding during the period.

acct_label: Fair Value, Assets and Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Gain (Loss) Included in Earnings
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in income from asset and liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

acct_label: Fair Value, Option, Aggregate Differences, Long-term Debt Instruments
acct_description: This item represents the difference between the aggregate fair value and the aggregate unpaid principal balance of long-term debt instruments that have contractual principal amounts and for which the fair value option has been elected.

acct_label: Fees and Commissions, Credit and Debit Cards (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of income earned from credit card services (including late, over limit, and annual fees) and debit card services (including interchange fees, annual fees and other fees). Excludes interest income earned on credit card balances and transactions.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss and Fee
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss and fee, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Change in Method, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable from change in methodology.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Number of Contracts (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Number of financing receivables that have been modified by troubled debt restructurings.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Post-Modification Recorded Investment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of investment in financing receivables (after modification) modified by troubled debt restructurings.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Purchase
acct_description: Amount of increase from purchase of financing receivable.

acct_label: Financing Receivables, Impaired, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Write-down
acct_description: Reflects the amount of the write-down related to a troubled debt restructuring.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Transfer to Held-for-Sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Expense Reversal
acct_description: Amount of expense reversal of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable transferred to held-for-sale classification.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Federal Funds Purchased and Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Net
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the fund lent to other financial institution arising from the excess in reserve deposited at Federal Reserve Bank to meet legal requirement. This borrowing is usually contracted on an overnight basis at an agreed rate of interest. Also include cash inflow or outflow from investment sold under the agreement to reacquire such investment.

acct_label: Insurance Services Revenue
acct_description: Revenue from insurance services, including net premiums earned, gain on sale of insurance block, agency management fees and insurance contract fees and commissions.

acct_label: Interest and Dividend Income, Securities, Operating, Other
acct_description: Amount of other operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities.

acct_label: Interest and Dividend Income, Securities, Operating, Trading or Measured at Fair Value
acct_description: Amount of operating dividend and interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on trading securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases Held-for-sale
acct_description: The amount of interest and fee income earned from loans held-for-sale, including mortgage loans, and interest earned from direct financing and sales-type leases held-for-sale.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases Held-in-portfolio
acct_description: Interest and fee income generated by loans the Entity intends and has the ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (1) industrial and agricultural; (2) real estate; and (3) real estate construction loans; (4) trade financing; (5) lease financing; (6) home equity lines-of-credit; (7) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (8) credit card and other revolving-type loans. Also includes interest income for leases held by the Entity.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Other Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of interest and fee income from loans held-for-sale and classified as other.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Brokered
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic third-party deposits placed by or through the assistance of a deposit broker, also known as brokered deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Demand
acct_description: Amount of money in interest-bearing domestic accounts that entitle the depositor to withdraw funds at any time without prior notice, also known as demand deposits.

acct_label: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Operating
acct_description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale); classified as operating.

acct_label: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Trading, Operating
acct_description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount, on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as operating.

acct_label: Interest Income, Securities, Other US Government
acct_description: Interest income on securities issued by US government agencies not including US Treasury Securities.

acct_label: Interest Income, Securities, State and Municipal
acct_description: Interest income, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, derived from debt securities issued by municipal governments, local taxing districts and US state government agencies.

acct_label: Interest Income, Securities, US Treasury
acct_description: Interest income on US treasury securities. US treasury securities are negotiable debt obligations of the US government, secured by its full faith and credit and issued at various schedules and maturities. The income from treasury securities is exempt from state and local, but not federal, taxes. There are three types of securities issued by the US treasury (bonds, bills, and notes), which are distinguished by the amount of time from the initial sale of the bond to maturity.

acct_label: Investment Banking, Advisory, Brokerage, and Underwriting Fees and Commissions
acct_description: Amount of fees and commissions from banking, advisory, brokerage, and securities underwriting activities. Activities include, but are not limited to, underwriting securities, private placements of securities, investment advisory and management services, merger and acquisition services, sale and servicing of mutual funds, and other related consulting fees.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, before Fees, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before allowance and fees, of loans and leases receivable. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Real Estate (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of consumer real estate loans. Includes, but not limited to, construction financing, residential mortgage loans, and home equity lines of credit. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, Interest Income Recognized, Change in Present Value Attributable to Passage of Time
acct_description: The amount of interest income on impaired and nonperforming loans that is due to the change in present value attributable to the passage of time.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Loans (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount classified as other loans attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

acct_label: Loans Receivable Held-for-sale, Net, Not Part of Disposal Group, Other (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for bad debt, of other loan receivables held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interests.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Reclassification for Discontinuance, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from discontinuance of cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

acct_label: Other Real Estate
acct_description: Carrying amount of other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This does not include real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.

acct_label: Payments for Origination of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The amount of cash paid for the origination of mortgages that are held for sale.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Federal Reserve Bank Stock
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) from acquisition or sale of Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) stock.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Federal Reserve Bank Stock
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) stock.

acct_label: Principal Investment Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss), from the firm's direct investment activity, conducted separately from customer trading activities, and includes, but is not limited to, investments in private equity, alternative investment products, real estate, and exchanges and memberships.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Federal Funds Sold and Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell, Net
acct_description: The cash flow from the funds lent to and (borrowed from) other financial reporting institutions arising from excess or shortfall in reserve deposited at the Federal Reserve Bank to meet legal requirements. This lending and borrowing is usually contracted on an overnight basis at an agreed rate of interest. Also include cash outflow or inflow from investments purchased under the agreement to resell such investment.

acct_label: Security Owned and Sold, Not yet Purchased Fair Value, Security Owned
acct_description: Fair value of financial instruments held by a broker-dealer for their own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes determined by management based upon quoted prices of a financial instrument with similar characteristics or on a valuation technique or model.

acct_label: Security Owned and Sold, Not yet Purchased Fair Value, Security Sold, Not yet Purchased
acct_description: Fair value of financial instruments sold short by a broker-dealer for their own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes determined by management based upon quoted prices of a financial instrument with similar characteristics or on a valuation technique or model.

acct_label: Transfer of Loans Held-for-sale to Portfolio Loans
acct_description: Value of loans held-for-sale transferred to loans held in the entity's portfolio in noncash transactions.

acct_label: Short-term Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate, over Time
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate of short-term debt outstanding calculated over time.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Other Loans and Leases
acct_description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of other loans and leases that were sold during the reporting period; excludes gains (losses) on sales of consumer and mortgage loans. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sales. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on financing receivable.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Workers' Compensation Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due for insurance (or actual expenses) to cover the medical expenses and lost income for employees that are injured during the course of doing work-related activities.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Other Contracts
acct_description: Amount of accrued obligation to policyholders that relates to insured events under other insurance contracts.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Management Contract Rights
acct_description: The cash outflow from amounts paid for the rights to manage the property.

acct_label: Basic Earnings Per Share Adjustment, Pro Forma
acct_description: Pro Forma Basic Earnings Per Share Adjustment to reconcile between Net Income and Pro Forma.

acct_label: Debt Conversion, Original Debt, Interest Rate of Debt
acct_description: "The rate of interest that was being paid on the original debt issue that is being converted in the noncash (or part noncash) transaction. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: FDIC Indemnification Asset, Net Write Offs
acct_description: Amount of decreases to the indemnification asset due to write offs of loans, net of recoveries, relating to loss sharing agreements with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC).

acct_label: Unrealized Gain on Foreign Currency Derivatives, before Tax
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain related to the increase in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

acct_label: Interest Income, Federal Funds Sold
acct_description: Interest income on federal funds sold. Federal funds sold represent the excess federal funds held by one commercial bank which it lends to another commercial bank, usually at an agreed-upon (federal funds) rate of interest. Such loans generally are of short-duration (overnight).

acct_label: Decommissioning Fund Investments
acct_description: Decommission fund to pay for the costs of decontaminating and decommissioning of facilities through collection of revenues derived from utility assessments and government appropriations. Decommission fund investment for the process whereby a power station, at the end of its economic life, is taken permanently out of service and its site made available for other purposes. In the case of a nuclear station this comprises three different states of clearance. Immediately after the final closure, radioactive material such as nuclear fuel and operational waste is removed and the buildings surrounding the reactor shield are dismantled and finally the reactor itself is dismantled.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax (expense) benefit for (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Plan Amendments, Tax Effect
acct_description: Tax effect of plan amendments that occurred that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost.

acct_label: Proceeds from Collaborators
acct_description: Cash received from collaborators during the current period.

acct_label: Regulated Operating Revenue
acct_description: The total amount of regulated operating revenues recognized during the period.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Changes in Accounting and Extraordinary Items, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The pro forma income from continuing operations before changes in accounting and extraordinary items, net of tax effect, for the period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of a period.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional.

acct_label: Deferred Sales Commission
acct_description: Carrying amount of advanced commission payments.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Long Lived Assets, Current (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount classified as long lived assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Extraordinary Item, Gain (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Net of tax amount of gain (loss) classified as extraordinary item, attributable to noncontrolling interests.

acct_label: Fair Value, Financial Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Cash Surrender Value (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position asset caption which represents a class of assets, or which may include an individual asset, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Control Premium (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage above fair value that an investor seeking to acquire control of an entity will pay, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items, Per Basic and Diluted Share (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net income (loss) before extraordinary items per each basic and diluted share of common stock or unit when the per share amount is the same for both basic and diluted shares.

acct_label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Extraordinary Items (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The sum of the current income tax expense or benefit and the deferred income tax expense or benefit allocated to Income or Loss from extraordinary items.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Held-to-maturity Transferred to Available-for-Sale Securities, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Unrealized holding gain (loss), net of tax, at the date of the transfer for a debt security from the held-to-maturity category transferred into the available-for-sale category. Also includes the unrealized gain (loss) at the date of transfer for a debt security from the available-for-sale category transferred into the held-to-maturity category.

acct_label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer from Held-to-Maturity, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
acct_description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Distribution Made to Limited Partner, Unit Distribution
acct_description: Number of units distributed for payment of a unit distribution to unit-holder of limited partnership (LP).

acct_label: Noncash Contribution Expense
acct_description: Noncash charitable contributions made by the entity during the period.

acct_label: Production Related Impairments or Charges
acct_description: Nonrecurring impairment charges related to the write-off of production-related equipment and inventory. This tag is used when an Entity charges this cost to cost of goods sold.

acct_label: Home Building Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate costs related to design, development, general contracting, remodeling, and renovation services for residential buildings, including single-family houses, multifamily housing, townhomes, apartments, and modular housing.

acct_label: Home Building Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue related to the sale of homes and home building activities including design, development, general contracting, and renovation services for residential buildings, including single-family houses, multifamily housing, townhouses, apartments, and modular housing.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Construction Payables
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of obligations, not classified as trade payables, incurred and payable for the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies, and services pertaining to construction projects.

acct_label: Administrative Fees, Amount Paid (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount paid to managing member or general partner, affiliate of managing member or general partner, or affiliate of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP) for administrative services provided to the LLC or LP, for example, but not limited to, salaries, rent, or other overhead costs.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Deferred Revenue, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as deferred revenue attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Other, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other income tax contingencies.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Additional Paid-in Capital
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to additional paid-in capital.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to noncurrent deferred income tax liabilities.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Credit Risk Hedge Ineffectiveness (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings during the reporting period due to the ineffectiveness of the hedge on credit risk.

acct_label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Transferor and Transferee, Servicing Fees
acct_description: Cash Flows between a transferee and a transferor attributable to servicing fees related to a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

acct_label: Assets that Continue to be Recognized, Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Assets and any Other Financial Assets Managed Together, Net Credit Losses During Period (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Net credit losses are charge-offs and are based on total loans outstanding during the period.

acct_label: Servicing Liability at Amortized Cost, Additions
acct_description: Amount of additions from purchases, assumption or transfer to contract to service financial assets under which estimated future revenues from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenue are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer for performing the servicing.

acct_label: Servicing Liability at Amortized Value, Amortization (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Decreases in the value of a servicing liability due to amortization, the periodic mark down in value in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income.

acct_label: Servicing Liability at Amortized Cost, Balance
acct_description: Amortized amount of contract to service financial assets under which estimated future revenues from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenue are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer for performing the servicing.

acct_label: Servicing Liability at Amortized Cost, Disposals
acct_description: Amount conveyed to unrelated parties of contract to service financial assets under which estimated future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer for performing the servicing.

acct_label: Trading Securities, Other (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of other investments classified as trading.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Reclassified to Receivable
acct_description: Amount of decrease in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time from transfer to receivable due to right to consideration becoming unconditional.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Expenses, Net
acct_description: Total costs of health care costs, net of recoveries of stop-loss insurance. Costs of services rendered (including costs of services rendered but not yet reported).

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Other Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of health care revenue classified as other.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Resident Service Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenues recognized from services provided to residents in facilities owned or operated by the health care organization (not including patient service revenue), which may be based on contractual rates set forth in agreements with third-party payers.

acct_label: Management Fees, Incentive Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue for operating and managing another entity's business during the reporting period which is based on meeting certain operating or revenue metrics (for example: occupancy or vacancy rates, profitability or expense targets), or otherwise meant to incentivize the operator other than by guaranteed or minimum compensation.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Repatriation of Foreign Earnings, Jobs Creation Act of 2004, Amount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the temporary incentive for US corporations to repatriate accumulated foreign earnings under the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), after Adjustments and Tax, Parent
acct_description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge, attributable to parent. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), after Adjustments, Tax, Parent
acct_description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge, attributable to attributable to parent. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Accrued Fees and Other Revenue Receivable
acct_description: For an unclassified balance sheet, the amount of fees and other revenue, excluding investment income receivable, earned but not yet received, which were recognized in conformity with revenue recognition criteria based on estimates or specific contractual terms.

acct_label: Charity Care, Direct and Indirect Cost Basis, Amount
acct_description: The amount of charity care provided during the period based on the provider's direct and indirect costs of providing charity care services.

acct_label: Sales Allowances, Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate selling price reductions recognized during an accounting period due to the rendering of deficient or nonconforming services. Allowances are a deduction from gross revenue in arriving at net revenue.

acct_label: Undistributed Earnings of Domestic Subsidiaries
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings of domestic subsidiaries or domestic joint ventures intended to be permanent.

acct_label: Cash Reserve Deposit Required and Made
acct_description: Cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to SEC Regulations.

acct_label: Cash Segregated under Other Regulations
acct_description: Cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to regulations other than SEC Regulations and the Commodity Exchange Act.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield
acct_description: The aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan for loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Accretion
acct_description: Current period recognition due to accretion of the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan for loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Additions
acct_description: Increases in the aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan due to the acquisition of similar loans accounted for as debt securities during the period. This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Carrying Amount, Net
acct_description: The recorded balance, net of any applicable reductions (for example, unamortized accretable yield and other-than-temporary impairments), for loans accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer, Accretable Yield
acct_description: The aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan. This relates to loans with deteriorating of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer, Nonaccretable Difference
acct_description: The amount of the loan's contractually required payments receivable in excess of the amount of its cash flows expected to be collected. This relates to loans with deteriorating of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Disposals of Loans
acct_description: Amount of reduction, resulting from a sale or transfer of a loan, in the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Reclassifications from Nonaccretable Difference
acct_description: Amount of increase of reclassification from nonaccretable difference to the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Reclassifications (to) from Nonaccretable Difference
acct_description: Amount of reclassification (to) from nonaccretable difference (from) to the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Reclassifications to Nonaccretable Difference
acct_description: Change in the estimate of cash flows expected to be collected, after acquisition of a loan not accounted for as a debt security, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable, which results in a decrease in accretable yield (for example, if it is probable that expected cash flows will be less than previously expected).

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, at Acquisition, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value at acquisition of acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, Cash Flows Expected to be Collected at Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of cash flows expected to be collected at acquisition of acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, Contractually Required Payments Receivable at Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of contractually required payments receivable at acquisition of acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Allowance for Loan Losses
acct_description: Reserve for loans impairments recorded after acquisition as a result of current information and events which result in it being probable that estimated cash flows will be less than previously expected or because actual cash flows are less than cash flows previously expected. This relates to loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Carrying Amount, Net
acct_description: The recorded balance, net of any applicable reductions (for example, unamortized accretable yield and allowance for loan losses). This relates to loans not accounted for debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Outstanding Balance
acct_description: The undiscounted sum of all amounts, including amounts deemed principal, interest, fees, penalties, and other under the loan, owed to the investor at the reporting date, whether or not currently due and whether or not any such amounts have been written or charged off by the investor. This relates to loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Contractually Specified Servicing Fee, Late Fee, and Ancillary Fee Earned in Exchange for Servicing Financial Asset
acct_description: Amount of contractually specified servicing fee, late fee, and ancillary fee recognized as income for servicing asset and servicing liability.

acct_label: Deposit Liabilities Reclassified as Loans Receivable
acct_description: Amount of deposits held by the entity that have been reclassified as loan balances receivable, for example, but not limited to, overdrafts receivable.

acct_label: Derivative Credit Risk Valuation Adjustment, Derivative Assets
acct_description: Amount of credit risk valuation adjustment to derivative assets to properly reflect the credit quality of the counterparties.

acct_label: Fair Value Disclosure, Off-balance Sheet Risks, Face Amount, Liability
acct_description: The face amount of financial liabilities, which are not recognized in the financial statements (off-balance sheet) because they fail to meet some other criterion for recognition.

acct_label: Fair Value, Option, Loans Held as Assets, 90 Days or More Past Due
acct_description: This item represents the aggregate fair value of loans held as assets that are 90 days or more past due for which the fair value option has been elected.

acct_label: Fair Value, Option, Loans Held as Assets, Aggregate Amount in Nonaccrual Status
acct_description: This item represents the aggregate fair value of loans held as assets that are in nonaccrual status for which the fair value option has been elected, if the entity's policy is to recognize interest income separately from other changes in fair value.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Amount of Available, Unused Funds
acct_description: Amount of advances or credit lines available from the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, Fixed Rate
acct_description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) advances which have fixed interest.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Fixed Rate, Year One
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Floating Rate, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with floating interest rate maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.
