Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year One
acct_description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Five
acct_description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Four
acct_description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Three
acct_description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, Year Two
acct_description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Fair Value Method, Gain (Loss)
acct_description: This item represents the gains or losses recognized and realized during the period on investments in life settlement contracts sold during the period.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, after Year Five
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year One
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Five
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Four
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Three
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Year Two
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Fair Value Method, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of investments in life settlement contracts held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Insurance-related Assessment, Premium Tax Offset
acct_description: The amount of insurance-related assessment liability that is expected to be recovered through a premium tax offset based on current laws applied to in-force policies.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Policyholder Dividends, Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for dividends to policyholders.

acct_label: Policyholder Dividends Payable
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liability for dividends that are payable to the policyholders based upon the terms of the underlying insurance contracts.

acct_label: Policyholder Dividends, Rate on Policy Earnings
acct_description: The percentage of earnings allocable to participating policyholders based on earnings of such policies for payment of dividends.

acct_label: Premium Deficiency Testing Expense, Long-Duration Contract, Amount
acct_description: Amount of expense for premium deficiency and loss recognition testing on long-duration contract issued by insurance entity. Excludes closed block.

acct_label: Premiums Earned, Net, Accident and Health
acct_description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of accident and health premiums earned.

acct_label: Premiums Written, Net, Accident and Health (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums written for all accident and health insurance and reinsurance contracts after subtracting any amounts ceded to another insurer.

acct_label: Premiums Written, Net, Life (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums written for all life insurance and reinsurance contracts after subtracting any amounts ceded to another insurer.

acct_label: Receivable from Officers and Directors for Issuance of Capital Stock
acct_description: Amounts receivable from officers and directors resulting from the sale of stock to officers or directors before the cash payment is received.

acct_label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Prescribed Practice, Amount
acct_description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of each item listed to reconcile the differences resulting from applying state prescribed statutory accounting practices rather than statutory accounting practices prescribed by National Association of Insurance Commissioners.

acct_label: Structured Settlement Annuities, Interest Rate, High End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Maximum interest rate in the range of interest rates used to calculate future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and related expenses less the present value of future net premiums using assumptions such as estimates of expected investment yields, mortality, morbidity, terminations and expenses, applicable at the time the insurance contracts are made and cost of settling insured claims and cost incurred in the claim settlement process of structured settlement annuities.

acct_label: Structured Settlement Annuities, Interest Rate, Low End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Minimum interest rate in the range of interest rates used to calculate future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and related expenses less the present value of future net premiums using assumptions such as estimates of expected investment yields, mortality, morbidity, terminations and expenses, applicable at the time the insurance contracts are made and cost of settling insured claims and cost incurred in the claim settlement process of structured settlement annuities.

acct_label: Embedded Derivative, Gain on Embedded Derivative
acct_description: Increase in the fair value of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives included in earnings in the period.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Trading, Amortized Cost
acct_description: Amortized cost of investments in debt securities classified as trading.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Adverse Development, Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for adverse development on liability of future policy benefit from net premium exceeding gross premium.

acct_label: Common Stocks, Including Additional Paid in Capital, Net of Discount
acct_description: Amount after discount on shares of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value for common stock held by shareholders. Includes common stock repurchased and held as treasury stock.

acct_label: Adjustment for Long-term Intercompany Transactions, Net of Tax
acct_description: Current period adjustment resulting from gains and losses on intercompany foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature because settlement is not planned or anticipated in the foreseeable future. Resulting from the entities to the transaction being consolidated, combined, or accounted for by the equity method in the reporting entity's financial statements.

acct_label: Adjustment for Long-term Intercompany Transactions, Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) related to gain (loss) on intercompany foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature or settlement is not planned or anticipated in the foreseeable future.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect on Retained Earnings, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the cumulative effect on retained earnings net of related income tax effect.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Trading and Available-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Repatriation Foreign Earnings, Jobs Creation Act of 2004, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the temporary incentive for U.S. entities to repatriate accumulated foreign earnings under the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Hedging Activity
acct_description: Gain (loss) incurred in hedging activities.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Previously Unissued Stock by Equity Investee
acct_description: The profit or loss on sales of previously unissued stock by equity investees made to investors outside the consolidated group that is not reported as operating income. Represents the difference in the parent company's carrying amount of the equity interest in the subsidiary or equity investee immediately before and after the transaction.

acct_label: Indefinite-Lived Franchise Rights
acct_description: Carrying amount (original costs adjusted for previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date for the rights acquired through a franchise arrangement having an indefinite period of benefit.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Price Risk Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of all price risk derivatives not designated as hedging instruments. Notional amount refers to the number of currency units specified in the foreign currency derivative contract.

acct_label: Other Nonrecurring Gain
acct_description: Amount of gain that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

acct_label: Securities Owned Not Readily Marketable (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value of owned private equity or other securities for which a quoted market price is not readily determinable, the value of which has been determined by management based upon fair value methods, including pricing of similar securities and valuation techniques and is included in the schedule of financial condition or the balance sheet.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Trading, Unrealized Gain
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Trading, Unrealized Loss
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax, Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent, Not Allowable for Net Capital (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of stockholders' equity attributable to the parent entity not allowable for net capital computed in accordance and used for compliance with regulatory requirements.

acct_label: Translation Adjustment Functional to Reporting Currency, Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from translating foreign currency financial statements into the reporting currency.

acct_label: Deferred Income
acct_description: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

acct_label: Proceeds from Construction Loans Payable
acct_description: The cash inflow from borrowings to finance the cost of construction.

acct_label: Dilutive Securities, Effect on Basic Earnings Per Share, ESOP Convertible Preferred Stock
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of convertible preferred stock of an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Debt Structure, Direct Loan, Amount
acct_description: The amount reported as a liability as of the balance sheet date by the entity (the employer) of the loan made by a third-party lender directly to the ESOP.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Number of Suspense Shares
acct_description: Shares contributed to the ESOP that have not yet been released, committed to be released, or allocated to participant accounts. Suspense shares generally collateralize ESOP debt.

acct_label: General and Administrative Costs in Inventory, Amount Incurred
acct_description: Aggregate amount of general and administrative costs incurred in each period and charged to inventory.

acct_label: Capitalized Costs, Asset Retirement Costs
acct_description: The amount of asset retirement costs previously incurred and capitalized separately from the capitalized amount of the associated long-lived assets.

acct_label: Former Gain Contingency, Recognized in Current Period
acct_description: Amount of gain recognized in the period that had been disclosed in prior periods as a contingent gain.

acct_label: Carrying Value of Securities Sold under Repurchase Agreements and Deposits Received for Securities Loaned
acct_description: Carrying value of securities sold under agreements to repurchase and deposits received for securities loaned.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset and Liability, Gain (Loss) Included in Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents total gains (losses) for the period (realized and unrealized), arising from assets and liabilities measured at fair value on a recurring basis using unobservable inputs (Level 3), which are included in other comprehensive income (a separate component of shareholders' equity).

acct_label: Financial Instruments, Owned, Principal Investments, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in private equity, mezzanine, venture capital, merchant banking, real estate and special situations investments. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, 1 to 29 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Financing receivables that are less than 30 days past due.

acct_label: Interest Expense, NOW Accounts, Money Market Accounts, and Savings Deposits
acct_description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on the following for deposits in domestic offices: (1) transaction accounts (NOW, and telephone and preauthorized transfer accounts), (2) money market deposits and (3) savings deposits.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Time Deposits, $100,000 or More
acct_description: Interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, of $100,000 or more in domestic offices.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Time Deposits, Less than $100,000
acct_description: Interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, less than $100,000 in domestic offices.

acct_label: Interest Income, Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
acct_description: Interest income derived from securities purchased under agreements to resell. The difference in the price at which the institution buys the securities and resells the securities represents interest for the use of the funds by the other party. Most repurchase and sale agreements involve obligations of the federal government or its agencies, but other financial instruments, such as commercial paper, banker's acceptances and negotiable certificates of deposits are sometimes used in such transactions.

acct_label: Investment Sold, Not yet Purchased, Sale Proceeds
acct_description: The amount of proceeds received resulting from the short sale of a security.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Available-for-sale Securities
acct_description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

acct_label: Payments for Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with agreements to purchase and then resell securities to counterparties (reverse repurchase agreements).

acct_label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Loans Receivable Pledged as Collateral
acct_description: The sum of the carrying amounts, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of loans receivable which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of related debt obligations, primarily secured borrowings and repurchase agreements, and for which the transferees are not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Cash Paid
acct_description: Aggregate dividends paid during the period for each share of preferred stock outstanding.

acct_label: Proceeds from Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with agreements to purchase and then resell securities to counterparties (reverse repurchase agreements).

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Average Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of average assets attributed to the reportable segment.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Federal Funds Purchased
acct_description: Gross expenses on the purchase of Federal funds at a specified price with a simultaneous agreement to sell the same to the same counterparty at a fixed or determinable price at a future date.

acct_label: Cost-method Investments, Realized Gains
acct_description: For investments in debt and equity securities accounted for at cost, the excess of net sale proceeds over the carrying amount of investments disposed of during the period.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Receivables
acct_description: The cash outflow for the purchase of all receivables.

acct_label: Percentage of Weighted Average Cost Inventory
acct_description: The percentage of weighted average cost inventory present at the reporting date when inventory is valued using different valuation methods.

acct_label: Gain from Components Excluded from Assessment of Cash Flow Hedge Effectiveness
acct_description: The gain relating to components of the gain (loss) on the cash flow hedging instrument excluded from the assessment of cash flow hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Accrued Utilities
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for utilities, such as electrical power, heating oil, natural gas, and water.

acct_label: Investment Company, Realized and Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investment and Foreign Currency
acct_description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment, foreign currency translation and foreign currency denominated asset and liability.

acct_label: Due from Joint Ventures, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amounts due from an entity in which the reporting entity shares joint control with another party or group, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Due from Affiliates, Current
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current receivables (due within one year or one operating cycle) to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

acct_label: Other Extraordinary Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Gains (losses) arising from all events or transactions meeting the criteria of unusual in nature and infrequent in occurrence not other defined. Classified separately in the income statement if it is material in relation to income before extraordinary items or to the trend of annual earnings before extraordinary items, or is material by other appropriate criteria. This element is gross of the related tax effect.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Number of Employees Covered (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Number of employees eligible to participate in the defined contribution plan or plans described.

acct_label: Inventory, Work in Process and Raw Materials
acct_description: The aggregate carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of items held by the entity which are partially completed at the time of measurement and unprocessed items that will go through the production process and become part of the final product. Includes supplies used directly or indirectly in the manufacturing or production process. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines work in process and raw materials into an aggregate amount.

acct_label: Nonfinancial Liabilities Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value of obligations not classified as financial liabilities. Includes, but is not limited to, accounts payable and accrued liabilities, commitments, obligations, and other liabilities.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Related Parties, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of accounts payable to related parties, due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Deferred Revenue, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount classified as deferred revenue attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Realized Loss
acct_description: Amount of realized loss from sale of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

acct_label: Due to Other Related Parties, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount payable from related parties classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Previously Unissued Stock by Subsidiary
acct_description: The profit or loss on sales of previously unissued stock by subsidiaries made to investors outside the consolidated group that is not reported as operating income. Represents the difference in the parent company's carrying amount of the equity interest in the subsidiary or equity investee immediately before and after the transaction.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Capitation Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenue recognized based on fees charged on a per capita basis.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Operating Assets
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of assets used to generate operating income.

acct_label: Interest Income, Domestic Deposits
acct_description: Interest earned on deposits in United States money market accounts and other United States interest earning accounts.

acct_label: Management Fee Payable
acct_description: Carrying amount of the unpaid portion of the fee payable to the managing member or general partner for management of the fund or trust.

acct_label: Troubled Debt Restructuring, Debtor, Current Period, Gain (Loss) on Restructuring, Net of Tax
acct_description: For a debtor, the aggregate gain (loss) recognized on the restructuring of payables, after the impact of income tax expense or benefit, arising from the difference between the book value of the debt before the restructuring and the fair value of the payments on the debt after restructuring is complete.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Deferred Tax Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount classified as deferred tax assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Accounts Receivable (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Contractual Rights, Gross
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of an intangible asset that arises from a contractual arrangement with a third party (not including franchise rights and license agreements).

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Discontinuation of Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Due to Forecasted Transaction Probable of Not Occurring, Net
acct_description: The amount of net gain (loss) reclassified into earnings when interest rate cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Related Receivable Carrying Value, Current (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The portion of the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of a recorded receivable related to a loss contingency accrual that is expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. For example, an insurance recovery receivable to the extent that the insurance recovery is probable and does not exceed the amount of the loss previously recognized in the financial statements.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Software
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition from vendors of software programs or applications for internal use (that is, not to be sold, leased or otherwise marketed to others) that qualify for capitalization.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Other, on Statement of Financial Position, at Fair Value
acct_description: The sum of the fair values, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of assets which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of debt obligations, primarily secured borrowings, repurchase agreements or other current or potential obligations, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Repurchase Agreement Counterparty, Amount at Risk
acct_description: The amount at risk under repurchase agreements is defined as the excess of carrying amount (or market value, if higher than the carrying amount or if there is no carrying amount) of the securities or other assets sold under agreement to repurchase, including accrued interest plus any cash or other assets on deposit to secure the repurchase obligation, over the amount of the repurchase liability (adjusted for accrued interest).

acct_label: Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement, Financial Asset for which Transfer is Accounted as Sale, Gain (Loss) on Sale
acct_description: Reflects, by transferred financial asset type, the amount of sales proceeds in excess of or deficient from the sum of the carrying amounts of transferred financial assets plus transaction costs, including those transactions in which the seller/transferor has continuing involvement with the financial assets that have been transferred.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Weighted Average Purchase Price of Shares Purchased
acct_description: Weighted average purchase price of capital shares purchased through an employee stock ownership plan.

acct_label: Business Combination, Liabilities Arising from Contingencies, Amount Recognized
acct_description: The amount, measured at acquisition-date fair value, of all liabilities assumed that arise from contingencies and were recognized by the entity.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Price Risk Hedge Ineffectiveness
acct_description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings during the reporting period due to the ineffectiveness on price risk cash flow and fair value hedges.

acct_label: Payments for Repurchase of Convertible Preferred Stock
acct_description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock originally issued and identified as a security that can be exchanged for another type of financial security. This repurchased stock is held in treasury.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Accretion of Redemption Discount
acct_description: The amount of accretion of the preferred stock redemption discount during the period.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Accretion of Dividends
acct_description: Value of accretion of temporary equity during the period due to unpaid dividends.

acct_label: Dividends, Common Stock, Paid-in-kind
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in payment-in-kind (PIK).

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Accretion to Redemption Value, Adjustment
acct_description: Amount of decrease to net income for accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Cost of Acquired Entity, Planned Restructuring Activities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the acquisition costs expected to be expended for restructuring activities for the acquired entity. Exit activities of the acquired entity may include involuntary termination benefits to be paid to acquired entity employees, and relocation costs for employees of acquired entity.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Increase (Decrease) for Contract Acquired in Business Combination
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, from business combination.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Conversion Ratio (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The ratio applied to the debt for purposes of determining the number of shares of the equity security into which the debt will be converted.

acct_label: Dividend, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Paid-in-Kind
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid paid-in-kind dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Government Contract Receivable, Unbilled Amounts
acct_description: Unbilled amounts (net of unliquidated progress payments) of government contract receivables.

acct_label: Research and Development Arrangement, Contract to Perform for Others, Compensation Earned
acct_description: The amount of compensation earned (contract income) under a research and development arrangement accounted for as a contract to perform research and development for others.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Accretion to Redemption Value
acct_description: Value of accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value during the period.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Par Value
acct_description: Carrying amount of the par value of temporary equity outstanding. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

acct_label: Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Increase (Decrease) for Preexisting Warranties
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the extended product warranty accrual from changes in estimates attributable to preexisting product warranties. Excludes standard product warranties.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Change in the value of each type or class of stock classified as temporary equity during the period. The redemption requirement does not constitute an unconditional obligation that will be settled in a variable number of shares constituting a monetary value predominantly indexed to (a) a fixed monetary amount known at inception, (b) an amount inversely correlated with the residual value of the entity, or (c) an amount determined by reference to something other than the fair value of issuer's stock. Does not include mandatorily redeemable stock. The exception is if redemption is required upon liquidation or termination of the reporting entity.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Ongoing Equity Method Investment in Discontinued Operation after Disposal
acct_description: Amount of share in income (loss) of the equity method investee after the disposal of the discontinued operation.

acct_label: Maximum Potential Future Exposure on Credit Risk Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Maximum amount the entity would be obligated to pay on the credit risk derivatives upon occurrence of a credit event.

acct_label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash and Cash Equivalents, Discontinued Operations
acct_description: The effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances in discontinuing operations held in foreign currencies.

acct_label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Expected Cost Remaining (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of expected cost remaining for the specified type of restructuring cost.

acct_label: Segment Reporting, Asset Reconciling Item, Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of an item in the reconciliation of total assets from reportable segments to the entity's consolidated assets.

acct_label: Segment Reporting, Entity Consolidated Revenue (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Consolidated entity revenues.

acct_label: Segment Reporting, Income before Income Taxes, Extraordinary Items, and Discontinued Operations (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Consolidated income before income taxes, extraordinary items, and discontinued operations.

acct_label: Significant Commitment, Remaining Minimum Amount Committed (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The floor amount as of the balance sheet date that the entity must expend to satisfy the terms of the disclosed arrangements (excluding long-term commitments) in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier, or to commit resources to supply goods or services to a customer.

acct_label: Cost of Services, Maintenance Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Maintenance costs incurred and directly related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period.

acct_label: Accrual for Taxes Other than Income Taxes
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes.

acct_label: Affiliate Costs
acct_description: Costs associated with revenues arising from an entity that is an affiliate of the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

acct_label: Amortization of Below Market Lease
acct_description: Amount of amortization of acquired leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

acct_label: Amortization of Lease Incentives
acct_description: Amount of amortization of lease incentive costs incurred by the lessor for the benefit of the lessee.

acct_label: Below Market Lease, Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: Amount of accumulated amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

acct_label: Below Market Lease, Acquired
acct_description: Amount of acquired leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

acct_label: Below Market Lease, Gross
acct_description: Amount before amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

acct_label: Below Market Lease, Net
acct_description: Amount after amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Contingent Rental Payments Received
acct_description: For sales-type and direct financing leases, total contingent rentals received during the period.

acct_label: Cost of Services, Environmental Remediation (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred in providing environmental engineering and consulting; environmental testing and analysis; and remediation services during the reporting period.

acct_label: Deferred Costs, Leasing, Gross
acct_description: For an unclassified balance sheet, this element represents costs incurred by the lessor that are (a) costs to originate a lease incurred in transactions with independent third parties that (i) result directly from and are essential to acquire that lease and (ii) would not have been incurred had that leasing transaction not occurred and (b) certain costs directly related to specified activities performed by the lessor for that lease. Those activities are: evaluating the prospective lessee's financial condition; evaluating and recording guarantees, collateral, and other security arrangements; negotiating lease terms; preparing and processing lease documents; and closing the transaction. This amount is before considering accumulated amortization representing the periodic charge to earnings to recognize the deferred costs over the term of the related lease.

acct_label: Deferred Leasing Commissions
acct_description: Amount of unrecognized fee revenue received at the inception of a lease that is deferred and recognized over the life of the lease.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Acquired-in-Place Leases
acct_description: This element represents the amount of value allocated by a lessor (acquirer) to lease agreements which exist at acquisition of a leased property. Such amount may include the value assigned to existing tenant relationships and excludes the market adjustment component of the value assigned for above or below-market leases acquired.

acct_label: Incentive to Lessee
acct_description: This item represents the deferred charge for an incentive or inducement granted by a lessor to a lessee, in order to motivate the lessee to enter the lease agreement, which incentive or inducement is to be recognized as a reduction of rental revenue over the lease term.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Loans, Deferred Income
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in net unamortized loan origination fees and other fees that are collected at origination but recorded as income over the life of the loan.

acct_label: Lease Incentive, Payable
acct_description: This item represents an incentive or inducement contractually stipulated between parties to a lease whereby the lessor has committed to provide the entity (lessee) with a cash payment as inducement to enter the lease.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount, Commercial (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of commercial loans and leases receivable including, but not limited to, commercial and industrial loans, agricultural loans, mortgage loans, promissory notes, interbank and other loans to financial institutions, draws against credit facilities, trade financing, lease financings. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Amortization of Premium
acct_description: Amount of decrease in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from amortization of premium.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Delinquent Principal or Interest, Acquired from Affiliates
acct_description: Amount of principal due on loans that have been delinquent, which may exclude loans having interest delinquent for three months or less, as of the balance sheet date that were acquired from controlled and other affiliates.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Interest Acquired
acct_description: "The level of ownership or equity interest acquired in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Other Real Estate Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Other real estate revenue not otherwise specified in the taxonomy.

acct_label: Payments for Tenant Improvements
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for the allowance granted to lessee and/or direct costs incurred by lessor used to prepare the leased premises for tenant's occupancy.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Land
acct_description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes land acquired for use by the owner.

acct_label: Proceeds from Collection of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The cash inflow from collection of repayments from borrowers on loans that are secured with real estate mortgages and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

acct_label: Tenant Improvements
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of improvements having a life longer than one year that were made for the benefit of one or more tenants.

acct_label: Amortization of above and below Market Leases
acct_description: Amount of non-cash amortization of intangible asset (liability) for above and below market leases.

acct_label: Accrued Sales Commission
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for sales commissions.

acct_label: Causes of Increase (Decrease) in Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Amount (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in reserve for incurred claims and claim adjustment expenses attributable to insured events of prior fiscal years.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost, Amortization Expense, Effect of Adjustments to Estimated Gross Profit (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of adjustment to amortization of deferred policy acquisition costs arising from a revision in estimated gross profit (when such amount serves as the basis for allocating amortization of DAC to reporting periods).

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost, Amortization Expense, Effect of Adjustments to Estimated Gross Profit or Estimated Gross Margin
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) of deferred policy acquisition costs from a revision in estimated gross profit or estimated gross margin.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs, Net (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The unamortized portion as of the balance sheet date of capitalized acquisition costs that are related directly to the successful acquisition of new and renewal insurance contracts.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Administrative Expense
acct_description: Amount of administrative expense incurred by defined contribution plan.

acct_label: Effects of Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss) on Present Value of Future Insurance Profits
acct_description: Amount of adjustment to reflect the effect that would have been recognized had the unrealized holding gain (loss) actually been realized on the present value of future insurance profits being amortized using the gross profit method and the present value of future profits recognized as a result of a purchase of an insurance entity holding long-duration contracts.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Stop Loss Insurance Recoveries
acct_description: Amount of stop-loss insurance recoveries. In stop-loss insurance, prepaid health care providers or associated entities transfer portions of their financial risks to other companies. A provider typically contracts to recover health care costs in excess of stated amounts during the contract periods.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Additions (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Additions in intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination during the year.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Amortization Expense, Next Twelve Months (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year for intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Amortization Expense, Year Five (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year for intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Amortization Expense, Year Four (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year for intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Amortization Expense, Year Three (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year for intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Amortization Expense, Year Two (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year for intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Impairment Write-down (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The reduction in intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination resulting from impairment charged against earnings during the period to reduce the intangible assets to a fair value lower than the amortized carrying value.

acct_label: Intangibles Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of expense for amortization of intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination.

acct_label: Life Insurance Assumed Ratio
acct_description: Ratio of life insurance assumed from another insurer to gross life insurance in force.

acct_label: Mortgage Loan Related to Property Sales
acct_description: Mortgage loan related to property sales in noncash investing and financing activities.

acct_label: Net Investment Income, Insurance Entity, Equity Securities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of investment earnings, excluding realized and unrealized gain (loss), recognized in the period on holdings of equity securities, net of related investment expenses.

acct_label: Net Investment Income, Insurance Entity, Other Long-term Investments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of investment earnings, excluding realized and unrealized gain (loss), recognized in the period on investments that the entity intends to hold for at least a year which are not otherwise specified in the disclosed schedule of investments, net of related investment expenses.

acct_label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer from Held-to-Maturity, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Other Expense, Capitalization to Deferred Acquisition Cost (DAC) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Represents the total amount of operating expenses resulting from the amortization or adjustments of amounts capitalized as deferred policy acquisition costs.

acct_label: Participating Insurance, Additional Income Allocated
acct_description: Amount of additional income allocated to policy holders whose contracts entitle them to a portion of the entity's earnings or surplus, paid through dividends.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Policy Loans
acct_description: Net amount paid or received by the entity associated with issuance or collection of loans made to policy holders, principally secured by the benefits under the policy.

acct_label: Premium Income Subject to Participation Through Reinsurance, Percentage (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Ratio of premium income to reinsurance.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year One
acct_description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset representing the present value of future profits.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investment
acct_description: Amount of unrealized investment gain (loss) which decreases (increases) present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Reinsurance Retention Policy, Reinsured Risk, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of risk reinsured on insurance products per entity policy.

acct_label: Short-Duration Contracts, Discounted Liabilities, Amount
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loss reserves carried at present value.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claim Adjustment Expense, Other Reconciling Item
acct_description: Amount of reconciling item for the reconciliation of the liability in the disclosure of claims development (in excess of) less than the liability for unpaid claims and claims adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts, classified as other.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Depletion, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to depletion.

acct_label: Mineral Properties, Gross
acct_description: Carrying amount at the balance sheet date of mineral properties, gross of adjustments.

acct_label: Amount of Regulatory Assistance Received (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of regulatory assistance received, including the settlement of claims with the federal government, assistance in connection with a business combination, and capital forbearance.

acct_label: Amount of Regulatory Assistance Received
acct_description: Amount of regulatory assistance received from a federal regulatory agency in conjunction with either an acquisition of a troubled financial institution, transfer of nonperforming assets to a newly-formed entity, or other reorganization.

acct_label: Business Combination, Separately Recognized Transactions, Net Gains and Losses
acct_description: The net gains or losses recognized for each transaction with the acquiree that was recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination.

acct_label: Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Fair Value Hedging Instruments
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from the increase (decrease) in fair value of foreign currency derivatives and nonderivative instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments which were recognized in earnings, net of offsets by the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge was determined to be effective.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Fair Value
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) to additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from changes in fair value of common and preferred stock issued to employee benefit trust but unearned.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Prescription Drug Benefit, Accumulated Postretirement Benefit Obligation, Decrease for Subsidy
acct_description: Amount of decrease in accumulated postretirement benefit obligation for government subsidy related to prescription drug benefits attributed to past service.

acct_label: Gain on Derivative Instruments, Pretax
acct_description: Aggregate gain on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

acct_label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Capitalized, Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: Amount of accumulated amortization of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

acct_label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Capitalized, before Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

acct_label: Accrued Rent, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer) for contractual rent under lease arrangements.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration, Asset
acct_description: Amount of asset recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Other-than-Temporary Impairment Charges (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Expense recorded to write-down the amortized cost basis of loans after acquisition, to fair value when the decline in the fair value is determined to be other than temporary. This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Customer Deposits, Noncurrent
acct_description: The noncurrent portion of money or property received from customers that is to be returned upon satisfactory contract completion or as partial prepayment for goods or services to be provided in the future.

acct_label: Effect on Future Earnings and Cash Flows, Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The quantified amount of the future effect on earnings or cash flow for this type of reduction or increase.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) from Hedged Firm Commitment Not Qualifying as Foreign Currency Fair Value Hedge, Net
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in earnings for the period when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as an foreign currency fair value hedge.

acct_label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Gross, Payment for Claims
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims.

acct_label: Long-Lived Assets to be Abandoned, Carrying Value of Asset (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount on the books of the entity of the asset to be abandoned.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Product Liability, Undiscounted, to be Paid, after Year Five
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Product Liability, Undiscounted, to be Paid, Year Five
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Product Liability, Undiscounted, to be Paid, Year Four
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Product Liability, Undiscounted, to be Paid, Year Two
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Product Liability, Undiscounted, to be Paid, Year Three
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Product Liability, Undiscounted, to be Paid, Year One
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for damage arising from third-party use of product or process to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities Adjustment, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to noncontrolling interest. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, before Tax, after Reclassification Adjustment, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for defined benefit plan, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests.

acct_label: Payments for Deposits Applied to Debt Retirements
acct_description: Cash outflow during the period as a deposit on account for application (deposits to retire or pay down) against an amount of debt owed by the entity.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
acct_description: The cash inflow from a borrowing net of the cash outflow from repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months but less than one year or one operating cycle (if the normal cycle is more than one year).

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Accrual, Discount Rate
acct_description: Rate applied to the undiscounted amount of estimated damages for product liability to arrive at the present value recorded as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Valuation Method, Expected Dividend Rate
acct_description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the expected term of a nonvested share or option award issued to other than an employee.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity, Change in Reporting Entity
acct_description: Impact on total stockholders' equity of cumulative effect of change in reporting entity. A change in reporting entity is considered as follows: (1) presenting consolidated statements in place of the financial statements of individual reporting entities; (2) changing the combination of subsidiaries that make up the group for which the consolidated financial statements are presented; and (3) changing the entities included in the combined financial statements. A business combination accounted for under the purchase method and the consolidation of a variable interest entity are not considered a change in reporting entity.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Unavailability of Information, Number of Entities
acct_description: Number of entitles entity is unable to obtain the information necessary to (1) determine whether the entity is a VIE, (2) determine whether the registrant is the VIE's primary beneficiary, or (3) perform the accounting required to consolidate the VIE for which it has been determined to be the primary beneficiary.

acct_label: Deferred Gas Cost
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized gas costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Dividends, Paid-in-kind
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid paid-in-kind dividends (PIK) declared for classes of stock, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred.

acct_label: Gas Domestic Regulated Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue derived from the regulated (by a federal, state, or local government or agency) generation, transmission and distribution of [natural] gas.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Gas Cost
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in carrying amount of capitalized gas costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Fuel Inventories
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of fuel held in inventory.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Equipment
acct_description: Period end book value of equipment owned (but not classified elsewhere) by the public utility.

acct_label: Unrecovered Costs for Purchased Gas Amount
acct_description: Discloses the amount of unrecovered costs for purchased gas.

acct_label: Accumulated Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs, Line of Credit Arrangements
acct_description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements.

acct_label: Allowance for Notes, Loans and Financing Receivable (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: For an unclassified balance sheet, the valuation allowance relating to a written agreement to receive money (at a specified future date(s), consisting of principal as well as any accrued interest) for the portion that is expected to be uncollectible.

acct_label: Costs of Real Estate Services and Land Sales (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate costs of real estate land sales including administrative paperwork, real estate brokerage, title, and property management operations.

acct_label: Lease Deposit Liability
acct_description: Amount of liability for lease payments received, including variable lease payments, when collectability is not probable at commencement date for sales-type lease.

acct_label: Proceeds from Unsecured Lines of Credit
acct_description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is uncollateralized (where debt is not backed by the pledge of collateral).

acct_label: Square Footage of Real Estate Property (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of square footage related to a real estate property.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Leasing Fees
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the book value of deferred leasing fees. Amortization of these fees over the terms of the leases reduces deferred leasing fees. Originating new leases increases the balance of deferred leasing fees.

acct_label: Future Minimum Sublease Rentals, Sale Leaseback Transactions
acct_description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals to be received by the seller-lessee for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing.

acct_label: Future Minimum Sublease Rentals, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Thereafter
acct_description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Future Minimum Sublease Rentals, Sale Leaseback Transactions, within Five Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Future Minimum Sublease Rentals, Sale Leaseback Transactions, within Four Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Future Minimum Sublease Rentals, Sale Leaseback Transactions, within Three Years
acct_description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Income Tax Effects Allocated Directly to Equity, Prior Period Adjustment
acct_description: The tax effect of correction of an error charged or credited directly to the opening balance of retained earnings.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Joint Ventures
acct_description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling shareholders, partners, or other equity holders in joint ventures included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: Standard Product Warranty Accrual, Current
acct_description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of the aggregate standard product warranty liability that is expected to be paid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the extended product warranty liability.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Preacquisition Contingency, Amount of Settlement
acct_description: Amount paid or received to resolve the preacquisition contingency.

acct_label: Contingent Consideration Classified as Equity, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value of contingent consideration in a business combination that is classified in shareholders' equity.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Current Assets (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: For a classified balance sheet, the amount recognized in balance sheet as a current asset associated with the plan.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Short-term Borrowings
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to short-term borrowings.

acct_label: Other Accrued Liabilities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable arising from transactions not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Reinsurance Recoverable
acct_description: Amount of guaranteed minimum benefits the ceding insurer expects to recover on insurance policies ceded to other insurance entities as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Transfers to Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of reduction, resulting from a reclassification to held-for-sale, in the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Provision for Loan Losses
acct_description: Amount of expense related to loan loss not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Contract Receivable, Due after Rolling Year Five (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contract Receivable, Due in Next Rolling Twelve Months (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contract Receivable, Due in Rolling Year Five (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contract Receivable, Due in Rolling Year Four (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contract Receivable, Due in Rolling Year Three (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
