acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contract Receivable, Due in Rolling Year Two (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Deferred Discounts, Finance Charges and Interest Included in Receivables
acct_description: Unearned discounts (other than cash or quantity discounts and the like), finance charges, and interest included in the face amount of receivables, that are shown as a deduction from the related receivables. For example, 1) finance charges booked as a receivable when a loan is made and recognized as income at a later date; and 2) interest charges deducted from the face loan amount, resulting in a discounted amount actually advanced to the borrower (wherein the receivable includes the amount actually advanced to the borrower and the as yet unearned interest income).

acct_label: Dividend Payment Restrictions Schedule, Amounts Paid (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of dividends distributed to shareholders in the current accounting period.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sales of Consumer Loans
acct_description: The gains (losses) included in earning that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of consumer loans. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Commitments, Variable Rates
acct_description: Reflects the amount of cash required to fully fund agreements to provide advances to borrowers and lessees at interest rates that increase or decrease depending on certain facts or circumstances.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Installment, Durable Goods (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of consumer loans to acquire durable goods, including, but not limited to, automobiles, recreational vehicles, boats, refrigerators, washers and dryers. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Installment, Other (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of other consumer installment loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Net Realized and Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Trading Securities
acct_description: The sum of the realized and unrealized net gain (loss) on trading securities during the period.

acct_label: Off-market Lease, Unfavorable
acct_description: This element represents a liability associated with the acquisition of an off-market lease when the terms of the lease are unfavorable to the market terms for the lease at the date of acquisition.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Income Loss, Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Available-for-sale Securities
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

acct_label: Proceeds from Loan and Lease Originations and Principal Collections (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The cash inflow or outflow related to a loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property), lease origination, and principal collections. It is through the origination process that the terms of the mortgage agreement (amount of loan, interest rate, compounding frequency, etc) or lease are established and the involved parties legally bind themselves to the transaction.

acct_label: Proceeds from Loan and Lease Originations and Principal Collections
acct_description: Cash inflow related to a loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property), lease origination, and principal collections.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Debt and Equity Securities, FV-NI, Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the sale, maturities, repayments and calls of securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes proceeds from trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSR)
acct_description: The cash inflow from the sale of servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.

acct_label: Receivables, Change in Method of Calculating Impairment, Recorded Investment (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of receivables for which the allowance for credit losses had previously been measured under a general allowance for credit losses methodology, and are now identified as troubled debt restructurings.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Accumulated Foreign Exchange
acct_description: Amount of accumulated increase (decrease) to the liability for unpaid claims and claim adjustment expenses used for claim development from a foreign exchange rate (gain) loss.

acct_label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Owned, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations (owned aircraft and capitalized improvements) and capitalized assets classified as property, plant and equipment that are owned by the entity. Excludes assets subject to a capital lease.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Conversion of Units
acct_description: The number of shares issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

acct_label: Development Stage Entities, Stock Issued, Shares, Issued for Noncash Consideration (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Number of shares issued for noncash consideration for development stage entities.

acct_label: Cost, Direct Tax and License
acct_description: Amount of tax incurred and cost of license directly related to good produced or service rendered.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Loss Reclassified to Interest Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to interest expense from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Right to Recover Product
acct_description: Amount of right to recover product from customer on settling refund liability.

acct_label: Derivative, Cost of Hedge Net of Cash Received
acct_description: The premium (cost) of a hedge, net of any cash received on settlement during the period.

acct_label: Preproduction Costs Related to Long-term Supply Arrangements, Asset for Molds Dies and Tools Owned
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of molds, dies, and other tools that will be used in producing products under a long-term supply arrangement.

acct_label: Contracts Receivable (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amounts due for services rendered or to be rendered, actions taken or to be taken, or a promise to refrain from taking certain actions in accordance with the terms of a legally binding agreement between the entity and, at a minimum, one other party. Such amounts may be billed or unbilled depending on the specifics of the contract.

acct_label: Deferred Set-up Costs, Noncurrent
acct_description: Deferred incremental direct costs incurred typically at a contract's inception so that the company may be in a position to fulfill all contractual obligations of an arrangement. The costs are directly related to specified activities under the arrangement and are deferred in order to match revenue that will be recognized after one year from the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle if longer). Excludes start-up costs (such as one-time activities related to opening a new facility, introducing a new product or service, establishing business with a new class of customers, preopening costs, and organization costs), which are expensed as incurred.

acct_label: General and Administrative Costs in Inventory, Amount Remaining
acct_description: Actual or estimated amount of general and administrative costs remaining in inventory.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Initial Consolidation, Gain (Loss)
acct_description: The gain (loss) recognized on initial consolidation of a variable interest entity (VIE) when the VIE is not a business (as defined).

acct_label: Accelerated Share Repurchases, Initial Price Paid Per Share
acct_description: The price paid per share to immediately purchase the targeted number of shares on the date of executing the accelerated share repurchase agreement.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional.

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Accrual, Present Value
acct_description: Present value of the accrual for product liability loss contingencies as of the balance sheet date (if the accrual qualifies for discounting).

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Third Party Recovery
acct_description: Amount of the estimated recovery from third parties recorded in the period pertaining to product liability damages from specified products.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Projected Benefit Obligation (Asset) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to a liability for the projected benefit obligation in excess of plan assets or an asset for plan assets in excess of the projected benefit obligation of a single-employer defined benefit pension plan.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Claims Incurred in Period
acct_description: Amount of loss recognized for asserted and unasserted malpractice claims.

acct_label: Proceeds from Customers for Progress Payments
acct_description: Cash received from customers as progress payments on projects that have been partially completed.

acct_label: Repayments of Unsecured Tax Exempt Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow to repay long-term tax exempt debt that is not secured by collateral.

acct_label: Payment for Contingent Consideration Liability, Investing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow, made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional.

acct_label: Dividend, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Shares
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid stock dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Hedging Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Fair value of liability arising from a financial instrument or contract used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), expected to be settled after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Product Liability, Net
acct_description: Present value of the estimated aggregate accrual for damages arising from third-party use of the entity's product(s) or process(es) as of the balance sheet date (if the accrual qualifies for discounting).

acct_label: Preproduction Costs Related to Long-term Supply Arrangements, Asset for Molds Dies and Tools Not Owned
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of molds, dies, and other tools that the entity does not own which are or will be used in producing goods under a long-term supply arrangement, and for which there is a noncancelable right of use during such arrangement.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Common, Carrying Amount
acct_description: As of the reporting date, the carrying amount of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of common shares (regardless of class), limited partnership units (regardless of class), non-preferential membership interests, or any other form of common equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Intrinsic Value, Amount Per Share
acct_description: Per share or unit weighted-average intrinsic value of award vested under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Other Changes
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in temporary equity from changes classified as other.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Severance Payments
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from severance costs.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax, Per Basic and Diluted Share
acct_description: Per basic and diluted share amount, after tax, of the gain (loss) on the disposal of discontinued operations, when the per share amount is the same.

acct_label: Mandatorily Redeemable Preferred Stock, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of shares that an entity is required to redeem for cash or other assets at a fixed or determinable date or upon the occurrence of an event.

acct_label: Class of Warrant or Right, Unissued
acct_description: The number of warrants or rights which entitle the entity to receive future services in exchange for the unvested, forfeitable warrants or rights.

acct_label: Warrant, Exercise Price, Decrease
acct_description: Per share decrease in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Securities Loaned Transactions
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability arising from securities loaned transactions.

acct_label: Credit and Debit Card Receivables, at Carrying Value
acct_description: Amount due the Entity as a result of customers utilizing point of sale debit or credit cards in exchange transactions with the entity which are short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Number of Contracts (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The number of financing receivables that have been modified by troubled debt restructurings.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Modifications, Pre-Modification Recorded Investment (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the outstanding recorded investment related to financing receivables that have been modified by troubled debt restructurings before the financing receivable has been modified.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Consumer, Credit Card Loans (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount classified as credit card loans attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

acct_label: Secured Debt, Other
acct_description: Amount of collateralized debt obligations classified as other.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual, Percent Past Due (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Percent of nonaccrual financing receivable balances outstanding that are past due.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual, Percent Past Due
acct_description: Percentage of nonaccrual financing receivable balance outstanding that is past due.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Percent Past Due (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Percent of financing receivables past due.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Percent Past Due
acct_description: Percentage of financing receivable balance that is past due.

acct_label: Late Fee Income Generated by Servicing Financial Assets, Amount
acct_description: All amounts that are due to the servicer of a financial asset as a result of the debt holder not meeting the monthly payment terms.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Nonconsolidated, Carrying Amount, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of the liabilities in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the Variable Interest Entity (VIE), where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

acct_label: Repayments of Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
acct_description: The cash outflow from a repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months. Includes repayments of short-term and long-term debt.

acct_label: Airline Related Inventory, Aircraft Fuel, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of fuel used in air transportation.

acct_label: Airline Related Inventory, Valuation Reserves
acct_description: The amount of the valuation account as of the balance sheet date which reduces the carrying amount of airline related inventory (including expendable merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies to be used primarily in air transport of passengers or freight) to net realizable value; takes into consideration such factors as market value, excessive quantities based on expected sales, technological obsolescence, and shrinkage.

acct_label: Asset, Reporting Currency Denominated, Value
acct_description: The reporting currency-denominated asset value.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Equity Interest Issued or Issuable, Number of Shares (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Number of shares of equity interests issued or issuable to acquire entity.

acct_label: Business Combination, Separately Recognized Transactions, Assets Recognized
acct_description: The assets recognized for each amount of assets recorded in a transaction with the acquiree that is recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination.

acct_label: Customer Refundable Fees, Refund Payments (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of refund payments made to customers during the period.

acct_label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value of Collateral
acct_description: Fair value of securities pledged as collateral against derivative liabilities.

acct_label: Grants Receivable
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts due under the terms of governmental, corporate, or foundation grants.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Air Traffic Revenue
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of unearned revenue related to tickets sold but not yet recognized as revenue and the estimated incremental cost for points or miles outstanding and awards that expect to be redeemed through customer loyalty programs.

acct_label: Payments for Flight Equipment
acct_description: The cash outflow for acquisition of long-lived depreciable flight assets, including owned aircraft or capital improvements.

acct_label: Price Risk Derivatives, at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of price risk derivative assets, net of price risk derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized on the balance sheet.

acct_label: Unrealized Loss on Price Risk Cash Flow Derivatives, before Tax
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss related to the decrease in fair value of price risk derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income in the period, before taxes, to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

acct_label: Consideration Received for Beneficial Interest Obtained for Transferring Financial Asset
acct_description: Amount of beneficial interest received as consideration for transferring noncash financial asset. Includes, but is not limited to, trade receivable in securitization transaction.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

acct_label: Restricted Cash Equivalents, Current
acct_description: Amount of cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Contingent Rental Payments Due
acct_description: Amount due based upon the occurrence of an event specified in the contractual terms.

acct_label: Cost of Goods and Services, Energy Commodities and Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Total costs incurred and are directly related to energy commodities and services provided during the reporting period.

acct_label: Long-term Transition Bond
acct_description: Long-Term transition bonds are bonds under the Competition Act in which the proceeds of Transition Bonds are required to be used principally to reduce qualified stranded costs and the related capitalization of the utility. This represents the current and noncurrent portions. The initial maturity is beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Prescription Drug Benefit, Net Periodic Postretirement Benefit Cost, (Increase) Decrease for Subsidy
acct_description: Amount of (increase) decrease in net periodic benefit cost from government subsidy for prescription drug benefits.

acct_label: Related Party Tax Expense, Due from Affiliates, Current
acct_description: The amount of any current tax-related balances due from affiliates as of the date of each statement of financial position presented.

acct_label: Electric and Gas Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount of revenues for public and other utilities generated by the sale of electricity, water, gas, and other services.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration Arrangements, Change in Amount of Contingent Consideration, Asset (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the amount of any change, including any differences arising upon settlement, recognized during the reporting period in the value of an asset or assets, arising from an item of contingent consideration, recognized in a business combination.

acct_label: Deferred Revenue, Refund Payments
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow to customers for refund payments of revenue that was previously reported as deferred or unearned revenue.

acct_label: Deposits, Money Market Deposits and Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW)
acct_description: Amount of deposits in accounts that offer many of the same services as checking accounts although transactions may be somewhat more limited, share some of the characteristics of a money market fund and are insured by the Federal government, also known as money market accounts. Also includes amount of deposits in interest-bearing transaction accounts at banks or savings and loans, that are restricted in regard to ownership and can usually only be held by individuals, nonprofit entities and governments. Negotiable order of withdrawal accounts differ from money market demand accounts as they typically have higher reserve requirements and no limit on the number of checks that can be written.

acct_label: Due from Customer Acceptances
acct_description: Amounts receivable from customers on short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by the institution (also known as banker's acceptance transactions) that are outstanding on the reporting date.

acct_label: Financial Instruments, Owned and Pledged as Collateral, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of financial instruments and other positions owned by the entity and pledged to counterparties as collateral, including: (1) mortgages, mortgage-backed and asset backed securities; (2) US government and agency obligations; (3) state and municipal government obligations; (4) other sovereign government debt; (5) corporate obligations; (6) corporate equities; (7) principal investments; (8) derivative contracts; and (9) physical commodities.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Effect of Change in Method
acct_description: The effect of a change in method or methods for calculating the allowance for credit losses on the current period provision.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Credit Risk Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of credit risk derivatives.

acct_label: OCI, Equity Method Investment, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of other comprehensive income (loss) (OCI) for proportionate share of equity method investee's OCI.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Investment Transferred from Available-for-sale to Equity Method, Tax
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) of investment classified as available-for-sale transferred to equity method.

acct_label: Payments for FHLBank Advance, Investing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for disbursement to borrower related to advance, made by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), classified as investing activity.

acct_label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Loans Receivable, for Other Arrangements
acct_description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of loans receivable which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of other debt obligations, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Transfer of Loans Held-for-sale to Portfolio Loans (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Value of loans held-for-sale transferred to loans held in the entity's portfolio in noncash transactions.

acct_label: Variable Interest, Carrying Amount, Liabilities (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Quantifies the net carrying amount of the entity's liabilities.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Measure of Activity, Expense
acct_description: The amount of expense between the reporting entity and the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Financial or Other Support, Amount
acct_description: The amount of financial or other support the reporting entity has provided (explicitly or implicitly) to the Variable Interest Entity (VIE) that it was not previously contractually required to provide or that the reporting entity intends to provide, including, for example, situations in which the reporting entity assisted the VIE in obtaining another type of support.

acct_label: Security Owned and Pledged as Collateral, Associated Liabilities, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of liabilities arising from or related to a financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) which has been pledged to counterparties.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments, Five Rolling Years Thereafter (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of benefits from a defined benefit plan expected to be paid in the five rolling twelve months after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments, Next Rolling Twelve Months (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of benefits from a defined benefit plan expected to be paid in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments, Rolling Year Five (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of benefits from a defined benefit plan expected to be paid in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments, Rolling Year Four (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of benefits from a defined benefit plan expected to be paid in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments, Rolling Year Two (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of benefits from a defined benefit plan expected to be paid in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Incremental Effect on Balance Sheet, Liability or Equity Line Item Change Due to Additional Minimum Pension Liability (AML) Adjustment, Period Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Changes in individual asset line items in the year-end statement of financial position that are incrementally affected by the additional minimum pension liability (AML) adjustment by the recognition provisions of FAS 158 in the year of initial application.

acct_label: Impact of Restatement on Earnings Per Share, Diluted (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Per share amount effect of a restatement of results of operations on diluted earnings per share.

acct_label: Interest Rate Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Other Assets Acquired (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of assets that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition that are not presented as a separate disclosure or not otherwise listed in the existing taxonomy. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Restatement of Prior Year Income, Tax Effects (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The tax effect of the restatement to correct an error in net income of prior periods for the year in which any adjustments are first made. In statements containing more than one period, disclose the effects for each period.

acct_label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Reportable Segment, Incurred Cost (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Discloses the amount charged against the accrued restructuring reserves, or earnings if not previously accrued, during the period for the segment's restructuring cost.

acct_label: Special Assessment Bond
acct_description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a type of municipal bond typically used to fund a development project. Also called special assessment limited liability bond, special district bond, special purpose bond, special tax bond and community development obligation. Interest owed to lenders is paid by taxes levied on the community benefiting from the particular bond-funded project. For example, if a bond of this sort was issued to pay for sidewalks to be repaved in a certain community, an additional tax would be levied on homeowners in the area benefiting from this project.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Gain (Loss) on Settlement of Other Claims, Net
acct_description: Amount of net gain (loss) on settlement of other claims for entities in bankruptcy, reported as a reorganization item.

acct_label: Nondebtor Reorganization Items, Net (Gain) Loss on Settlement of Other Claims
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on settlement of other claims for entities not in bankruptcy, reported as a reorganization item.

acct_label: Equity, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value of the entity's equity.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in liabilities subject to compromise.

acct_label: Reorganization Value, Cash in Excess of Normal Operating Needs
acct_description: Amount of reorganization value related to cash in excess of normal operating requirements generated by operations. Reorganization value is the amount attributed to the reconstituted entity, as well as the expected net realizable value of those assets that will be disposed before reconstitution occurs.

acct_label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Impairment
acct_description: Amount of impairment loss on capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Elimination as Part of Reorganization
acct_description: Redemption of temporary equity as the result of a triggering event associated with the temporary equity.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, before Adoption of FAS 158 Recognition Provisions, Accrued Benefit Liability (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Disclosure under FAS 132R, before it was amended by FAS 158, of the accrued benefit liability, if any, as one of the amounts recognized in the balance sheet prior to the adoption of the recognition provisions of FAS 158.

acct_label: Junior Subordinated Debenture Owed to Unconsolidated Subsidiary Trust, Noncurrent
acct_description: The noncurrent portion of the carrying value of junior subordinated long-term debt owed to unconsolidated subsidiary trusts as of the balance sheet date. Such debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets and was initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

acct_label: Convertible Debt, Current
acct_description: The portion of the carrying value of long-term convertible debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle if longer. Convertible debt is a financial instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

acct_label: Debt Issuance Costs, Gross, Current
acct_description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

acct_label: Deferred Taxes, Business Combination, Valuation Allowance, Available to Reduce Goodwill and Intangible Assets
acct_description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded in a business combination against deductible temporary differences for which related tax benefits will be recorded as a reduction of the acquired entity's goodwill and other noncurrent intangible assets.

acct_label: Fair Value, Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) Included in Other Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of the total change in unrealized (holding) gains or losses for the period which are included in the statement of income (or changes in net assets) in other income. Such unrealized (holding) gains or losses relate to those assets still held at the reporting date for which fair value is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

acct_label: Foreign Currency Exchange Rate, Translation (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The foreign exchange rate used to translate amounts denominated in the functional currency to the reporting currency.

acct_label: Income Tax Examination, Penalties from Examination (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of penalty expense recorded in the period based upon the specified tax examination.

acct_label: Retention Payable
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract.

acct_label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Retained Earnings Not Available for Dividends
acct_description: The amount of retained earnings as of the balance sheet date that cannot be distributed to stockholders pursuant to statutory rules and regulations.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Income Statement, Lease Revenue
acct_description: Total amount of lease revenue realized in the period on leasing arrangements.

acct_label: Cost of Merchandise Sales, Buying and Occupancy Costs (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate of buying and occupancy costs reported during the period related to merchandise sold. Costs could include, but not be limited to, inbound and outbound freight; costs of operating distribution centers; payroll, benefits, and travel costs directly associated with buying inventory; systems costs related to the buying and tracking of inventory; rent; depreciation; property taxes; and facility operations.

acct_label: Due from Other Related Parties
acct_description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling Year Two and Three
acct_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second and third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Other Loans Payable
acct_description: Amount of long-term loans payable classified as other.

acct_label: Proceeds from Interest Received
acct_description: Interest received on loans and other debt instruments during the current period.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plans, Contribution Rate Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Increase (decrease) in the employer's contractual contribution rate to the multiemployer plan. A multiemployer plan is a pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

acct_label: Payments for Deposits with Other Institutions
acct_description: Cash paid to make deposits at other institutions during the period.

acct_label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
acct_description: Number of shares (or other type of equity) forfeited during the period.

acct_label: Deposits with Clearing Organizations and Others, Securities
acct_description: The amount of securities on deposit with clearing organizations and other entities which provide services necessary to operations of the Company. This item would include, for instance, securities advanced as refundable collateral for securities borrowed.

acct_label: Floor Brokerage
acct_description: Broker-dealers often use other brokers to execute trades on their behalf. The trading broker-dealer becomes a customer of the executing broker-dealer and pays a floor brokerage fee. Such fees are paid periodically either directly to the executing broker-dealer or through a clearing house.

acct_label: General Contractor Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate costs related to general contracting services.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Earnest Money Deposits Outstanding
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of deposits given by the reporting entity to a seller which shows that the prospective buyer is serious about purchasing a property.

acct_label: Noncash Commission and Closing Costs (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The expense related to real estate commissions and closing costs that are not paid in cash. Is an adjustment to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Furniture and Fixtures
acct_description: The cash outflow for acquisition of furniture and fixtures.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Shares Subscribed but Unissued, Subscriptions Receivable
acct_description: Amount of subscription receivable from investors who have been allocated nonredeemable preferred stock or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

acct_label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Owned, Net
acct_description: The net amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations (owned aircraft and capitalized improvements) and capitalized assets classified as property, plant and equipment that are owned by the entity. Excludes assets subject to a capital lease.

acct_label: Development Stage Entities, Stock Issued, Value, Issued for Noncash Consideration (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Value of shares issued for noncash consideration for development stage entities.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Redemption Price Per Share
acct_description: Amount to be paid per share that is classified as temporary equity by entity upon redemption. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

acct_label: Loss from Components Excluded from Assessment of Fair Value Hedge Effectiveness
acct_description: Loss relating to components of the gain (loss) on the fair value hedging instrument excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Business Combination, Assets and Liabilities Arising from Contingencies, Amount Recognized, Net
acct_description: The net amount, measured at acquisition-date fair value, of all the assets acquired and liabilities assumed that arise from contingencies and were recognized by the entity.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Weighted Average Price Paid for Shares Purchased (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The average of prices paid for shares purchased on the open market for issuance to employees under the plan.

acct_label: Stock Granted During Period, Shares, Share-based Compensation (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Number of shares of stock (or other type of equity) granted during the period as a result of any equity-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Capitalized Costs, Uncompleted Wells, Equipment and Facilities
acct_description: Capitalized costs of which include those incurred to (1) drill and equip wells that are not yet completed (2) acquire or construct equipment and facilities that are not yet installed.

acct_label: Gas Balancing Payable, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to an underproduced working interest owner when an overproduced working interest owner has sold gas in excess of the party's ownership percentage. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Results of Operations, Expense from Oil and Gas Producing Activities
acct_description: The amount of expenses related to oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Accrued Insurance (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable to insurance entities to mitigate potential loss from various risks or to satisfy a promise to provide certain coverage's to employees. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Discontinued Operations, Investing Activities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Cash provided by or used in the investing activities of the entity's discontinued operations during the period. The reporting entity may disclose the net cash flows from discontinued operations below the net cash flows from financing activities or include cash flows from discontinued operations, by category (operating, investing, or financing), in the body of the cash flow statement. This element is used to disclose cash flows from the investing activities of discontinued operations as a component of net cash flows from discontinued operations, which is reported below net cash flows from financing activities of continuing operations.

acct_label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Discontinued Operations, Operating Activities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Cash provided by or used in the operating activities of the entity's discontinued operations during the period. The reporting entity may disclose the net cash flows from discontinued operations below the net cash flows from financing activities or include cash flows from discontinued operations, by category (operating, investing, or financing), in the body of the cash flow statement. This element is used to disclose cash flows from the operating activities of discontinued operations as a component of net cash flows from discontinued operations, which is reported below net cash flows from financing activities of continuing operations.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Postretirement Plan Benefit Obligation
acct_description: Amount classified as defined benefit non-pension postretirement plan obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties, Applicable Income Taxes (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the applicable amount of income taxes or benefit realized on the gain (loss) on sale of properties during the reporting period.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Employee-Related Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in employer-related costs classified as other and current.

acct_label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Year One
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities of one year or less.

acct_label: Business Combination, Provisional Information, Initial Accounting Incomplete, Adjustments Related to Previous Period
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in income that would have been recognized in previous periods if the adjustments to provisional amounts were recognized as of the acquisition date.

acct_label: Assets that Continue to be Recognized, Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Assets and any Other Financial Assets Managed Together, Net Credit Losses During Period
acct_description: Amount of net credit losses charged off.

acct_label: Assumption for Fair Value of Assets or Liabilities that relate to Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Expected Credit Losses
acct_description: Rate at which principal will not be repaid on securitized financial assets regardless of when the transfer occurred.

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Transferor and Transferee, Purchases of Previously Transferred Financial Assets
acct_description: Cash Flows between a transferor and a transferee attributable to purchases of previously transferred financial assets (or its underlying collateral) related to a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

acct_label: Derecognized Assets, Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Assets and any Other Financial Assets Managed Together, Delinquent Amount at End of Period
acct_description: This is the amount of the financial instruments that are considered delinquent (past due) at the end of the period.

acct_label: Derivative, Fair Value, Amount Offset Against Collateral, Net
acct_description: The net amount as of the balance sheet date of the fair value of derivative assets and derivative liabilities that in accordance with the entity's accounting policy were offset against collateral under a master netting arrangement.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Preferred Unit Holders
acct_description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling preferred unit holders in an entity included in the reporting entity's consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: Other Unrecorded Amounts (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrecorded indebtedness classified as other.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Transaction Costs, Investing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for transaction costs in a sale-leaseback recognized in investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, closing and debt issuance costs.

acct_label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 10 Percent Adverse Change in Discount Rate
acct_description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 10 percent adverse change of the discount rate on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 10 Percent Adverse Change in Expected Credit Losses
acct_description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 10 percent adverse change of the expected credit losses, including expected static pool losses, on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 20 Percent Adverse Change in Discount Rate
acct_description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 20 percent adverse change of the discount rate on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 20 Percent Adverse Change in Expected Credit Losses
acct_description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 20 percent adverse change of the expected credit, including expected static pool losses, on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Due from Other Related Parties, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Due to Officers or Stockholders, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amounts due to recorded owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).

acct_label: Payments for Exploitation Liabilities (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Cash payments related to exploitation costs.

acct_label: Transfer to Investments
acct_description: Value of investments transferred to the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Other Related Parties
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in related party payables classified as other.

acct_label: Consolidation, Less than Wholly Owned Subsidiary, Parent Ownership Interest, Changes, Net
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period impacting the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary as it relates to the total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The changes to the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary represented by this element did not arise in a deconsolidation of the subsidiary from the consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Fair Value
acct_description: The aggregate fair value as of the reporting date of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

acct_label: Proceeds from Secured Lines of Credit
acct_description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Imputed Interest Rate
acct_description: The financing cost related to leases that have been recorded under the deposit method, as a financing or as a capital leases in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Investment within Plan Asset Category, Amount
acct_description: Amount of investment within defined benefit plan asset category.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract Receivables, Net
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables arising from the contracting of goods and services, net for uncollectible accounts.

acct_label: Proceeds from Lease Payment, Sales-Type and Direct Financing Leases, Investing Activity
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from principal payment received from sales-type and direct financing leases classified as investing activity.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Extraterritorial Income Exclusion, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and the expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for extraterritorial income exclusion.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Receivable, Proceeds
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from the collection of receivables related to a loss contingency.

acct_label: Extinguishment of Debt, Gain (Loss), Income Tax
acct_description: Current period income tax expense or benefit pertaining to a gain (loss) on an extinguishment of debt.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Reorganization Value in Excess of Amounts Allocable to Identifiable Assets
acct_description: Amount of reorganization value in excess of amounts allocable to identifiable assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Extraordinary Items and Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the disclosure of summarized financial information for unconsolidated subsidiaries and 50 percent-or-less owned entities accounted for using the equity method of accounting. If investments in common stock of corporate joint ventures or other investments accounted for under the equity method are, in the aggregate, material in relation to the financial position or results of operations of an investor, it may be necessary to present summarized information as to assets of the investee, or group of investments for which combined disclosure is appropriate, either by individual financial statement caption or in groups, as appropriate. Such summarized financial information may, at a minimum, include income or loss from continuing operations before extraordinary items and cumulative effect of a change in accounting principle.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) of Consolidated Entities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of net Income or Loss for the period allocated to noncontrolling shareholders, partners, or other equity holders in one or more of the entities included in the reporting entity's consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: Other Loans Payable, Current
acct_description: Amount of long-term loans classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Equity in Net Income of Equity Method Investees of Segment (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of income or loss recognized by the reportable segment for its share of an investee's net income or loss reported under the equity method of accounting.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Other Share Increase (Decrease) in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average price at which grantees could acquire or could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to any other type of change in shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan during the reporting period.

acct_label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Net, Incurred Loss
acct_description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred and costs incurred in the claim settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims.

acct_label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Net, Payment for Claims
acct_description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessor Balance Sheet, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Current
acct_description: The net amount due within one year of the balance sheet date or the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs, less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessor Balance Sheet, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Noncurrent
acct_description: The net amount due after one year of the balance sheet date or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Unguaranteed Residual Asset
acct_description: Present value expected to be derived from underlying asset, following end of lease term, not guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor.

acct_label: Franchisor Costs
acct_description: Aggregate costs incurred that are directly related to activities, including but not limited to, generating franchise revenues from franchisor owned outlets and franchised outlets.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Lease Financing
acct_description: Interest and fee income generated by direct lease financing which consists of an institution owning and leasing personal property for the use of its customers at the customers' specific request.

acct_label: Pledged Assets, Not Separately Reported, Nonsecuritized Investments
acct_description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of investments which are not evidenced by ownership of securities, such as interests in partnerships or other forms of unincorporated entities, but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Pledged Assets, Other, Not Separately Reported on Statement of Financial Position
acct_description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of all assets that are pledged as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation primarily arising from secured borrowings, repurchase agreements or other current or potential obligations, where the secured party does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge the collateral and therefore are not reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position.

acct_label: Significant Changes, Franchises Sold
acct_description: The number of franchises sold during the period when there are significant changes in franchisor-owned outlets or franchised outlets during the period.

acct_label: Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Minimum Pension Liability, before Tax (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Before tax amount of additional minimum pension liability not yet recognized as a net periodic pension cost.

acct_label: Derivative, Floor Interest Rate
acct_description: Floor rate on an interest rate derivative such as an interest rate floor or collar. If market rates falls below the floor rate, a payment or receipt is triggered on the contract.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Accrued Advertising
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for advertising of the entity's goods and services.

acct_label: Other Selling and Marketing Expense
acct_description: Amount of selling and marketing expense classified as other.

acct_label: Reclassifications of Temporary to Permanent Equity
acct_description: The difference between the carrying amount of a financial instrument subject to a registration payment arrangement recorded as temporary equity prior to adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2 and the carrying amount reclassified to permanent equity upon the adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2. Recorded as a cumulative effect adjustment to the beginning balance of retained earnings. Does not apply to registration payment arrangements that are no longer outstanding upon adoption of FSP EITF 00-19-2.

acct_label: Repayments of Subordinated Short-term Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow for an obligation which places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior loan) in liquidation of the entity's assets scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle of the entity, if longer.

acct_label: Income Tax Refunds, Discontinued Operations
acct_description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes from discontinued operations.

acct_label: Closed Block Assets and Liabilities, Maximum Future Earnings to be Recognized
acct_description: The carrying amount of closed block liabilities in excess of the carrying amount of closed block assets at the date of demutualization (adjusted to eliminate the impact of related amounts in accumulated other comprehensive income).

acct_label: Bankruptcy Claims, Number of Claims Expunged by Bankruptcy Court
acct_description: The aggregate number of claims filed that the bankruptcy court has expunged.

acct_label: Bankruptcy Claims, Number of Claims under Review by Management
acct_description: The aggregate number of claims under review by the management of the entity.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Provision for Expected Allowed Claims
acct_description: Amount of expense for claims expected to be incurred by an entity in reorganization.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease
acct_description: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease.

acct_label: Dividends, Preferred Stock, Paid-in-kind
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in payment-in-kind (PIK).

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Amortizable Intangible Assets
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to amortizable intangible assets.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Postemployment Obligations
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the current portion of the liability that represents various benefits due to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement.

acct_label: Loss on Cash Flow Hedge Ineffectiveness
acct_description: The loss recognized in earnings during the reporting period representing the amount of the cash flow hedges' ineffectiveness.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Present value of the accrual for environmental loss contingencies.

acct_label: Financial Instruments, Owned, Physical Commodities, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in physical commodity contracts (for example, agricultural products, metals and energy). Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

acct_label: Standard Product Warranty Accrual, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of the aggregate standard product warranty liability that is expected to be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the extended product warranty liability.

acct_label: Proceeds from Interest and Dividends Received
acct_description: Cash received for dividends and interest on the entity's equity and debt investments during the current period.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect on Retained Earnings, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the cumulative effect on retained earnings before related income tax effect.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Cumulative Gain Recognized
acct_description: Cumulative amount of gain recognized (out of deferred gain) as income or a reduction in rent expense.

acct_label: Cost of Services, Energy Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred in providing energy services during the reporting period.

acct_label: Deferred Fuel Cost
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized fuel costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Earnings Per Share, Basic, Distributed
acct_description: Dividends declared in the period and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid per security.

acct_label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted, Distributed
acct_description: Dividends declared in the period and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid per security, taking into account all dilutive potential common shares outstanding during the period.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Allowance for Equity Funds Used During Construction
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the capitalized cost of equity (based on assumed rate of return) and / or borrowed funds (based on interest rate) used to finance construction of regulated assets, which is expected to be recovered through rate adjustments. As a result of this capitalization, net income is increased. This element pertains to certain regulated industries, such as public utilities.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Fuel Costs
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in carrying amount of capitalized fuel costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Other Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of interest expense incurred on long-term debt classified as other, including, but not limited to, interest on long-term notes and amortization of issuance costs.

acct_label: Long-term Pollution Control Bond, Current
acct_description: Current portion of a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Write-down of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Pre tax reclassification adjustment for losses realized upon the write-down of securities.

acct_label: Proceeds from Pollution Control Bond
acct_description: The cash inflow from amounts received from a long-term debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Allowance for Funds Used During Construction, Rate
acct_description: Effective rate, including composite rate, of cost of financing additions to qualifying regulated assets, commonly called allowance for funds used during construction.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Inventory
acct_description: The period end amount for a type of inventory held by the utility in a schedule of inventories.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Fuel
acct_description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to fuels owned by the public utility.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Nuclear Fuel under Capital Lease (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Discloses the period end balance sheet amount of total nuclear fuel under capital leases included in plants in service.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Requested Rate Increase (Decrease), Amount
acct_description: Amount of public utility's requested rate increase (decrease) with regulatory agency.

acct_label: Repayments of Pollution Control Bond
acct_description: The cash outflow from settlement of a long-term debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

acct_label: Utilities Operating Expense, Fuel Used
acct_description: Amount of operating expense for fuel used by regulated operation.

acct_label: Utilities Operating Expense, Purchased Power
acct_description: Amount of operating expense for purchased power of regulated operation.

acct_label: Interest Income, Securities, Operating, Tax Advantaged
acct_description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities subject to tax benefits. Excludes operating interest income on securities exempt from state, federal and other income tax.

acct_label: Restatement of Prior Year Income, Gross (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Resulting effect of restatement to correct an error, before tax effects, on the net income of prior periods for the year in which any adjustments are first made. In statements containing more than one period, discloses the effects for each period.

acct_label: Construction and Development Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate costs related to construction and development services during the reporting period.

acct_label: Construction Materials Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from sale of construction products and materials, including clay and brick products, ceramic floor and wall tile, framing structures and doors, insulation, roofing, wallboard, and other construction products.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories and Other Operating Assets
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in inventory, and assets classified as other.

acct_label: Insurance Tax
acct_description: Represents total insurance tax expense reflected in the income statement for each period presented.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Consumer Installment, Automobiles, Marine, and Other Vehicles
acct_description: Interest and fee income generated by automobile, marine, and other vehicle loans made to individuals.

acct_label: Junior Subordinated Notes, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of portion of long-term debt due within one year or the operating cycle if longer identified as Junior Subordinated Notes, which have a lower priority than senior instruments.

acct_label: Lease Incentive, Payable (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents an incentive or inducement contractually stipulated between parties to a lease whereby the lessor has committed to provide the entity (lessee) with a cash payment as inducement to enter the lease.

acct_label: Operating Lease, Rent Expense (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Rent expense for each period for which an income statement is presented for minimum lease payments, contingent rentals, and sublease rentals.

acct_label: Participating Mortgage Loans, Unamortized Debt Discount, Amount
acct_description: The amount of the related debt discount at the end of the accounting period.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Insurance Investments
