acct_description: Amount of selling, general, and administrative expenses, and other expenses, related to investments in real estate partnerships.

acct_label: Exchange Fees
acct_description: The amount of expense in the period for fees charged by securities exchanges for the privilege of trading securities listed on that exchange. Some fees vary with the related volume, while others are fixed.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Exercise Price
acct_description: The per share price that the individual must pay to acquire shares under the deferred compensation arrangement.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Increase (Decrease) from Modification
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in financing receivable modified from troubled debt restructuring.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to Limited Partners
acct_description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.

acct_label: Payment for Management Fee
acct_description: Amount paid to managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

acct_label: Debt Securities, Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Fair Value, Asset (Liability), Recurring Basis, Still Held, Unrealized Gain (Loss), OCI
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset (liability) measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Other Domestic Deposits
acct_description: Interest expense incurred on other deposits in domestic offices.

acct_label: Loans Receivable Held-for-sale, Reconciliation to Cash Flow, Deductions from Held-for-sale
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for bad debt, of deductions to loan receivables held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest, Amount Represented by Preferred Stock
acct_description: The amount of noncontrolling interest in subsidiary represented by preferred securities issued by the subsidiary.

acct_label: Payments to Purchase Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The aggregate cash outflow used to purchase all loans that are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

acct_label: Assets that Continue to be Recognized, Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Assets and any Other Financial Assets Managed Together, Delinquent Amount at End of Period
acct_description: This is the amount of the financial instruments that are considered delinquent (past due) at the end of the period.

acct_label: Continuing Involvement with Continued to be Recognized Transferred Financial Assets, Amount Outstanding
acct_description: Amount of transferred financial assets in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the assets underlying the transaction that continue to be recognized in the statement of financial position. Includes, but is not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in transferred financial assets.

acct_label: Accounts and Financing Receivables, Held-for-Sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, after Valuation Allowance
acct_description: Amount, after valuation allowance, of accounts and financing receivables held for sale and not part of disposal group. Excludes loan covered under loss sharing agreement and loan classified as investment in debt security.

acct_label: Venture Capital Gain (Loss), Net
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on venture capital activities. Includes venture capital revenue, fair value adjustments, interest and dividends, investment gain (loss) and fee or other income from venture capital activities.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Debt Securities, Trading
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Buildings (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to buildings included in real estate.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Land (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to land included in real estate.

acct_label: Derivative, Exchange Rate Floor
acct_description: Floor rate on a foreign currency derivative for example, but not limited to, a floor or a collar.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Assets of Business Transferred under Contractual Arrangement (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: In a transaction not treated as a divestiture for accounting purposes and in which the disposed operation is not consolidated for accounting purposes, the aggregate amount of the disposed assets that are segregated in the balance sheet.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Planned Sale, Investments Not Identified, Value
acct_description: The total fair value for all investments, comprising or included in the major category, of those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) for which the entity has intentions to sell or liquidate, but the specific assets for sale or liquidation have not been identified (for example, the entity intends to sell $10,000,000 of its investments in private equity funds, but the individual investments to be sold have not been identified).

acct_label: Incentive Fee Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for incentive rights held by the managing member or general partner, of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

acct_label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Written Put Options
acct_description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of outstanding written put options using the reverse treasury stock method.

acct_label: Interest Paid, Discontinued Operations
acct_description: The amount of cash paid during the current period for interest owed on debt associated with discontinued operations.

acct_label: Net Assets, Adjusted Balance (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of assets after deduction of liabilities and cumulative effect adjustment of a new accounting principle applied in the period of adoption.

acct_label: Non-Recourse Debt
acct_description: Amount of debt for which creditor does not have general recourse to the debtor but rather has recourse only to the property used for collateral in the transaction or other specific property.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repurchase of) Trust Preferred Securities
acct_description: The cash inflow from issuance of trust preferred securities, net of the cash outflow for repurchasing trust preferred securities, by a business trust or other special purpose entity, mainly established by a bank holding entity, to third party investors. The trust's assets are deeply subordinated debentures of the bank holding entity. Most trust preferred securities are subject to a mandatory redemption upon the repayment of the debentures.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) before accumulated depreciation of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

acct_label: Real Estate Variable Interest Entity Borrowings
acct_description: For banks, amount of liabilities in variable interest entities for which a financial institution is required to include in its calculation of net investment in real estate assets held for development or sale.

acct_label: Federal Funds Purchased and Securities Loaned or Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank and securities that an entity sells and agrees to repurchase at a specified date for a specified price.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Activity for Year, Maximum Outstanding at any Month End
acct_description: The maximum balance outstanding at any month end during the period as of the Balance Sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Disclosures, Interest Rate, Range from (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: States the lowest interest rate applicable to any of the advances from the Federal Home Loan Bank as of the Balance Sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Disclosures, Interest Rate, Range to (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: States the highest interest rate applicable to any of the advances from the Federal Home Loan Bank as of the Balance Sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Time Deposit
acct_description: Amount of interest expense on time deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Other, Net of Deferred Income (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the net carrying amount of loans and leases held in portfolio, not otherwise defined in the taxonomy, after deducting deferred income, but before deducting the allowance for losses on such loans and leases.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Depreciation, Depletion, Amortization and Accretion
acct_description: Depreciation, depletion, amortization, and accretion related to oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Cash-based Arrangements, Liability, Current and Noncurrent
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements. Represents currently earned compensation under cash arrangements (such as a profit-sharing plan, rabbi trust, and employee contract--excluding equity-based arrangements) that is not actually paid until a later date.

acct_label: Environmental Costs Recognized, Recovery Credited to Expense
acct_description: Amount of any recovery from third parties that is credited to environmental remediation costs.

acct_label: Deferred Storm and Property Reserve Deficiency, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized storm costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Forward Contract Indexed to Issuer's Equity, Forward Rate Per Share
acct_description: The per share price of the Company's stock at which the contract holder of the freestanding contract has the right to purchase or sell the Company's stock at a future date.

acct_label: Forward Contract Indexed to Issuer's Equity, Shares
acct_description: The maximum number of shares that could be issued to net share settle a contract, if applicable. If a contract does not have a fixed or determinable maximum number of shares that may be required to be issued, disclose the fact that a potentially infinite number of shares could be issued to settle the contract.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Recoverable Property Damage Costs
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the public utility damage costs that will be permitted by regulatory agencies to be recovered from rate payers.

acct_label: Proceeds from Advances for Construction
acct_description: The cash inflow from borrowing by the entity from developers, builders, government agencies and municipalities for construction that are repaid in cash, generally on a straight-line basis over periods ranging from five to forty years.

acct_label: Coal Products and Services Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue derived from sale of coal and related products. Also includes rendering of services and selling of products for exploration, development, mining, and processing, as well as supporting activities.

acct_label: Cost of Coal Products and Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred related to exploration, development, mining, processing and providing mining support activities related to coal.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Refund Liability, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of liability for consideration received or receivable from customer which is not included in transaction price, when consideration is expected to be refunded to customer, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Right to Recover Product, Current
acct_description: Amount of right to recover product from customer on settling refund liability, classified as current.

acct_label: Environmental Exit Costs, Reasonably Possible Additional Losses, Best Estimate
acct_description: Best estimate of the reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of the amount accrued for remediation, site restoration, postclosure, monitoring commitments, or other exit costs associated with the sale, disposal or abandonment of a particular property resulting from unanticipated contamination of the assets.

acct_label: Recorded Third-Party Environmental Recoveries, Current
acct_description: Cumulative amount of the asset for third-party recoveries related to environmental remediation obligations that is recoverable within one year of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Recorded Third-Party Environmental Recoveries, Noncurrent
acct_description: Cumulative amount of the asset for third-party recoveries related to environmental remediation obligations that is recoverable after one year from the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Conversion Gains and Losses on Foreign Investments
acct_description: Represents gains or losses resulting from transactions conducted in foreign currencies.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Disposals of Loans (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Sale or transfer of a loan during the period resulting in a reduction in the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment. This relates to a loan accounted for as an available-for-sale debt security, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans and Debt Securities Acquired in Transfer, No Allowance Recorded and No Subsequent Impairment
acct_description: The recorded amount of loans and debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it was probable, at acquisition, that the investor would be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable, but which are not deemed to be impaired since the acquisition by transfer. Therefore, no allowance for credit losses is recorded.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Deferred Commitment Fee
acct_description: Amount of fee received for commitment to originate or purchase financing receivable where likelihood of commitment being exercised is remote. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Number of Positions
acct_description: Disclosure regarding factors used to determine that the impairment of securities categorized as held-to-maturity where cost exceeds fair value is not an other than temporary impairment (OTTI). This item contains disclosure of the number of investment positions in the held-to-maturity investments determined to be temporarily impaired.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Sold, Realized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Demand Deposits
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow in the total of all demand deposits, including checking and negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) accounts, classified as cash flows from financing activities.

acct_label: Loan Portfolio Expense
acct_description: The loan servicing fees paid to third parties that relate to loan expenses for a portfolio containing the entire group of loans owned by the company.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Commercial, Net of Deferred Income (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the net carrying amount of commercial loans and leases held in portfolio, after deducting deferred income, but before deducting the allowance for losses on commercial loans and leases.

acct_label: Mortgage-backed Securities Held-to-maturity, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value of securitized, pay-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans classified as held-to-maturity.

acct_label: Mortgage Loan Related to Property Sales (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Mortgage loan related to property sales in noncash investing and financing activities.

acct_label: Schedule of Insured Financial Obligations with Credit Deterioration, Insured Contractual Payments Outstanding
acct_description: This element represents the amount of insured contractual payments outstanding on the underlying insured obligations for financial guarantee insurance contracts presented in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain Reclassified to Earnings (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of gains on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of Initial Adoption of FAS 159 (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative-effect adjustment to retained earnings of the first remeasurement to fair value upon the initial adoption of Statement of Financial Accounting Standard No. 159 (FAS No. 159), The Fair Value Option for Financial Assets and Financial Liabilities.

acct_label: Income (Loss) before Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Income or Loss from continuing operations and from discontinued operations after extraordinary items and income taxes but before the cumulative effect of a change in accounting principle.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Not Past Due
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, not past due.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Past Due
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, past due.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Consumer
acct_description: Interest and fee income generated from consumer loans. Consumer loans are loans to individuals for household, family, and other personal expenditures. Such loans include residential mortgages, home equity lines-of-credit, automobiles and marine transport loans, credit card transactions, and others.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Interest Income, Unguaranteed Residual Asset
acct_description: Amount of interest income from unguaranteed residual asset of sales-type lease.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Realized and Unrealized Gain, Included in Earnings (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain recognized in the income statement from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Charitable Contributions, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible charitable contributions expense.

acct_label: Participating Mortgage Loans, Extinguishment Gain (Loss)
acct_description: States the amount of gain (loss) resulting from a participating loan extinguished before its due date.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Deposits Applied to Debt Retirements
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow from payments to deposit account and application of deposits to retire or pay down debt during the period.

acct_label: Retail Land Sales, Deposit Method, Sales Value (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the contractual sales value for a retail land sale accounted for under the deposit method.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Carrying Amount of Liabilities, Consolidated VIE (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount of the variable interest entity's liabilities consolidated into the statement of financial position. In general, a VIE is a corporation, partnership, trust, or any other legal structure used for business purposes that either (a) does not have equity investors with voting rights or (b) has equity investors that do not provide sufficient financial resources for the entity to support its activities. A VIE often holds financial assets, including loans or receivables, real estate or other property. A VIE may be essentially passive or it may engage in research and development or other activities on behalf of another company.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Interest Income on Accumulated Cash
acct_description: Amount of interest income on accumulated cash, reported as a reorganization item.

acct_label: Depletion of Oil and Gas Properties
acct_description: The noncash expense charged against earnings to recognize the consumption of oil and gas reserves that are part of an entities' assets.

acct_label: Development Costs, Cumulative
acct_description: The capitalized costs incurred (excluded from amortization), as of the date of the balance sheet, to obtain access to proved reserves and to provide facilities for extracting, treating, gathering and storing the oil and gas.

acct_label: Exploration Costs, Cumulative
acct_description: "The capitalized costs incurred (excluded from amortization), as of the date of the balance sheet, in identifying areas that may warrant examination and in examining specific areas that are considered to have prospects of containing oil and gas reserves, including costs of drilling exploratory wells and exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells. Exploration costs may be incurred both before acquiring the related property (sometimes referred to in part as prospecting costs) and after acquiring the property. Principal types of exploration costs, which include depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of exploration activities, are: costs of topographical, geographical and geophysical studies, rights of access to properties to conduct those studies, and salaries and other expenses of geologists, geophysical crews, and others conducting those studies. Collectively, these are sometimes referred to as geological and geophysical or ""G&G"" costs. Exploration costs also include costs of carrying and retaining undeveloped properties, such as delay rentals, ad valorem taxes on properties, legal costs for title defense, the maintenance of land and lease records, dry hole contributions and bottom hole contributions, costs of drilling and equipping exploratory wells and costs of drilling exploratory-type stratigraphic test wells."

acct_label: Gas Balancing Payable
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to an underproduced working interest owner when an overproduced working interest owner has sold gas in excess of the party's ownership percentage.

acct_label: Proved Developed Reserves (BOE) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved developed reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities do not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. Measured in barrel of oil equivalent (BOE).

acct_label: Proved Undeveloped Reserve (BOE) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved undeveloped reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities do not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. Measured in barrel of oil equivalent (BOE).

acct_label: Advance Royalties
acct_description: The amount paid to music publishers, record producers, songwriters, or other artists in advance of their earning royalties from record or music sales. Such an amount is based on contractual terms and is generally nonrefundable.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Transfers to Trading, Gross Gains
acct_description: Amount of gain included in earnings for reclassification of securities from available-for-sale into trading.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Transfers to Trading, Gross Losses
acct_description: This item represents the gross amount of losses included in earnings from transfers of securities from the available-for-sale category into the trading category. Such losses represent the unrealized losses included in other comprehensive income associated with the securities transferred from the available-for-sale category to the trading category.

acct_label: Deferred Rent Asset, Net, Current
acct_description: For a classified balance sheet, the cumulative difference between the rental income or payments required by a lease agreement and the rental income or expense recognized on a straight-line basis, or other systematic and rational basis more representative of the time pattern in which use or benefit is granted or derived from the leased property, expected to be recognized in income or expense, by the lessor or lessee, respectively, within one year (or one operating cycle, if longer) of the balance sheet date. Such receivable is reduced by allowances attributable to, for instance, credit risk associated with a lessee.

acct_label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Valuation Method, Expected Volatility Rate
acct_description: The estimated measure of the percentage amount by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during the expected term of a nonvested share or option award issued to other than an employee.

acct_label: Shareholders' Equity, Fair Value Disclosure (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value amount of financial instruments classified in shareholders' equity.

acct_label: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Operating
acct_description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount, on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as operating.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to accumulated other comprehensive Income or Loss.

acct_label: Maturities of Subordinated Debt
acct_description: The cash outflow for a long-term borrowing where lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in case of liquidation of the entity's assets as it matures.

acct_label: Net Interest Income (Loss) after Provision for Loan Losses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: For banks, the amount of interest Income or Loss derived from or related to loans of real estate investments of the financial institution held for development or sale.

acct_label: Operating Insurance and Claims Costs, Production
acct_description: Insurance and claims costs directly related to goods produced and sold, or services rendered, during the reporting period.

acct_label: Proceeds from Subordinated Short-term Debt
acct_description: The cash inflow from an obligation which places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior loan) in liquidation of the entity's assets scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle of the entity, if longer.

acct_label: Business Combination, Step Acquisition, Equity Interest in Acquiree, Including Subsequent Acquisition, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of voting equity interests acquired in a business combination achieved in stages, including equity interests in the acquiree held by the acquirer immediately before the acquisition date and acquired at the acquisition date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Communications, Information Technology and Occupancy
acct_description: The aggregate amount of communications, data processing and occupancy expenses.

acct_label: Fair Value, Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) Included in Investment Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of the total change in unrealized (holding) gains or losses for the period which are included in the statement of income (or changes in net assets) in investment income. Such unrealized (holding) gains or losses relate to those assets still held at the reporting date for which fair value is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

acct_label: Fair Value, Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Gain (Loss) Included in Other Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of the total realized and unrealized gains or losses for the period which are included in the statement of income (or changes in net assets) in other income; the fair value of which assets was or is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Gain (Loss) Included in Investment Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of the total realized and unrealized gains or losses for the period which are included in the statement of income (or changes in net assets) in investment income; the fair value of which liabilities was or is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

acct_label: Fees and Commissions, Transfer Agent (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenues from providing transfer agent services to corporations. Such services include maintaining records of investors and account balances and transactions, canceling and issuing certificates, processing investor mailings and dealing with any associated problems (i.e. lost or stolen certificates).

acct_label: Investment Owned, Unrealized Appreciation (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the excess of the fair value of an investment (security, contract) over its cost (face amount, notional amount) which excess value has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Unrealized Depreciation (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the excess of the cost (face amount, notional amount) of an investment (security, contract) over its fair value which deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

acct_label: Long-term Commercial Paper, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current portion of long-term unsecured obligations issued by corporations and other borrowers to investors (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Net Credit Losses During Period on Loans Managed or Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This is the sum of charge-offs (credit losses) on loans managed or securitized during the period.

acct_label: Proceeds from Securitizations of Consumer Loans
acct_description: The cash inflow from the securitization of receivables for loans to consumers. Securitization is the structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

acct_label: Proceeds from Securitizations of Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The cash inflow from securitizing loans held with the intention to resell in the near future.

acct_label: US Government Agencies Securities, at Carrying Value
acct_description: Debt securities issued by a United States government agency such as Government National Mortgage Association (Ginnie Mae), Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation (Freddie Mac), and Federal National Mortgage Association (Fannie Mae), which are short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

acct_label: Weighted Average Rate, Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits, Point in Time
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate calculated at point in time for domestic deposit liability.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Disposals of Loans
acct_description: Sale or transfer of a loan during the period resulting in a reduction in the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment. This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Noncash Financial or Equity Instrument Consideration, Warrants Issued
acct_description: "The number of warrants issued as [noncash or part noncash] consideration for a business or asset acquired. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), recognized in earnings and other comprehensive income (OCI).

acct_label: Securities Loaned, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
acct_description: Amount of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Capital Lease Obligation Accrual (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to capital lease obligations assumed from the acquired entity.

acct_label: Cash, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash. Cash is the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes effect from exchange rate changes.

acct_label: Contracts Receivable, Claims and Uncertain Amounts, Expected to be Collected in Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of billed or unbilled claims or similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization under long-term contracts that are expected to be collected in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Direct Labor (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Payroll costs incurred (including equity-based compensation) that are directly related to goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Common Stock Reserved for Future Issuance
acct_description: Number of common shares reserved for future issuance related to deferred compensation arrangements with individuals.

acct_label: Fair Value Disclosure, Off-balance Sheet Risks, Amount, Asset
acct_description: The fair value of financial assets, which are not recognized in the financial statements (off-balance sheet) because they fail to meet some other criterion for recognition.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Construction (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of loans issued to build, improve or remodel a residential home. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Commercial, Development (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of commercial loans to develop land for sale or construction thereon. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Securities Pledged as Collateral, at Fair Value
acct_description: The sum of the fair values, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities that are restricted as collateral for the payment of related debt obligations, primarily secured borrowings and repurchase agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Additional Series, Par or Stated Value Per Share (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Face amount or stated value per share of additional series of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer); generally not indicative of the fair market value per share.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Additional Series, Shares Authorized (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The maximum number of an additional series of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Additional Series, Shares Issued (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Total number of additional series of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). May be all or a portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. These shares represent the ownership interest of the preferred shareholders. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Trust Preferred Securities
acct_description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stocks by a business trust or other special purpose entity, mainly established by a bank holding entity, to third party investors. The trust's assets are deeply subordinated debentures of the bank holding entity. Most trust preferred securities are subject to a mandatory redemption upon the repayment of the debentures.

acct_label: Resell Agreements, Period End Amounts Excluding Effects of Agreements Reported Net by Counterparty
acct_description: This is the total amount of resale agreements as of the reporting date. This is a gross amount (does not net agreement amounts by counterparty).

acct_label: Securities Borrowed, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
acct_description: Amount of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Money Market
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Real Estate Owned, Valuation Allowance, Provision
acct_description: Amount of expense recognized in the income statement for a decrease in valuation of real estate owned (REO).

acct_label: Direct Communications and Utilities Costs
acct_description: The aggregate costs of direct communications and utilities incurred during the reporting period.

acct_label: Direct Operating Maintenance Supplies Costs
acct_description: Costs of maintenance supplies used that are directly related to goods produced and sold, or services rendered, during the reporting period.

acct_label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Brokered
acct_description: Amount of interest expense on domestic brokered deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Preferred Stock Redemption Discount
acct_description: The excess of (1) the carrying amount of the preferred stock in the registrant's balance sheet over (2) the fair value of the consideration transferred to the holders of the preferred stock, during the accounting period, which will be added to net earnings to arrive at net earnings available to common shareholders in the calculation of earnings per share.

acct_label: Real Estate Owned, Valuation Allowance
acct_description: For each period for which an income statement is required, disclosure of the changes in the allowance, including balances at end of period.

acct_label: Real Estate Owned, Valuation Allowance, Amounts Applied
acct_description: Amount of the valuation allowance for real estate owned that was applied in the period against the carrying amount of real estate owned that was sold, written down or written off.

acct_label: Real Estate Owned, Valuation Allowance, Provision (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the increase in the real estate owned valuation allowance that is charged against earnings in the period.

acct_label: Repurchase Agreements, Interest Expense Amount
acct_description: This is the amount of interest expense incurred during the reporting period as a result of repurchase agreements.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
acct_description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), from recovery.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
acct_description: Amount of writeoff of investment in debt security, measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), charged against allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Fair Value Hedging Instruments (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from the increase (decrease) in fair value of foreign currency derivatives and nonderivative instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments which were recognized in earnings, net of offsets by the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge was determined to be effective.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) Other Noncontrolling Interests, Redeemable
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to other redeemable noncontrolling equity holder.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Redemption Value
acct_description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.

acct_label: Site Contingency, Loss Exposure Not Accrued, High Estimate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: High-end of the range estimate of the loss exposure for reasonably possible environmental contingencies at an individual site for which no accrual has been recorded.

acct_label: Inventory, Real Estate, Held-for-sale
acct_description: Represents properties which were acquired directly or through foreclosure for which a committed plan to sell exists and an active program to market such properties has been initiated.

acct_label: Other Financial Services Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Other financial services costs incurred during the reporting period.

acct_label: Retail Land Sales, Improvement Costs, Prior Sales (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the cost of improvements during the period related to retail land sales in which the obligation to complete such improvements represent a contractual responsibility of the land developer (seller). Such obligation is generally included in the sales terms.

acct_label: Retail Land Sales, Liability for Improvements
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the liability for the obligation to provide retail land sale buyers with improvements.

acct_label: Advertising Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from the sale of advertising time (such as television and radio) or space (newspaper or magazine pages). May also include advertising, marketing and promotional services rendered during the reporting period.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Liquidating Investment, Remaining Period, High Estimate (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: In the cases where management does not know a certain period over which it will receive distributions from those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) that the entity can never make a redemption from, but from which the entity receives distributions through the liquidation of the underlying assets by the investee, this item represents the upper bound of an estimate of the remaining period (for example, years, months, days) for those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments). The period remaining over which the investee will liquidate its assets (expiration of the finite-lived investment) may be pre-established at the outset of the investment or due to unforeseen events that have occurred since initial recognition of the investment.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Liquidating Investment, Remaining Period, Low Estimate (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: In the cases where management does not know a certain period over which it will receive distributions from those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) that the entity can never make a redemption from, but from which the entity receives distributions through the liquidation of the underlying assets by the investee, this item represents the lower bound of an estimate of the remaining period (for example, years, months, days) for those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments). The period remaining over which the investee will liquidate its assets (expiration of the finite-lived investment) may be pre-established at the outset of the investment or due to unforeseen events that have occurred since initial recognition of the investment.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Redemption Restriction, Percentage
acct_description: The percentage of the total value of investments that cannot be redeemed because of a redemption restriction as of the statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Other Postretirement Benefits Expense (Reversal of Expense), Noncash
acct_description: Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for other postretirement benefits. Excludes pension benefits.

acct_label: Program Rights Obligations, Current
acct_description: Amount of obligations related to rights to programming, including, but not limited to, feature films and episodic series, acquired under license agreements that will be paid within the next twelve months.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Other, Carrying Amount
acct_description: Amount of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the parent entity, classified as other equity.

acct_label: Subscription and Circulation Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from circulation or sale of subscriptions (for example, but not limited to, subscriptions to a magazine or newspaper).

acct_label: Financial Instruments, Owned, Corporate Debt, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of firm holdings in corporate fixed income securities. Includes pledged and unpledged holdings.

acct_label: Financial Instruments, Owned, Mortgages, Mortgage-backed and Asset-backed Securities, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in mortgages, mortgage backed securities (investment instruments that represent ownership of an undivided interest in a group of mortgages, where principal and interest from the individual mortgages are used to pay investors' principal and interest on the mortgage backed security) and asset-backed securities that are primarily paid from the cash flows of a discrete pool of receivables or other financial assets (such as credit-card receivables), either fixed or revolving, that by their terms convert into cash within a finite time period. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Finished Goods and Work in Process Inventories
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the book value of finished goods inventory and work in process inventory.

acct_label: Derivative Instruments in Hedges, Net Investment in Foreign Operations, Assets, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of all derivative assets designated as hedges of net investment in foreign operations.

acct_label: Other Deferred Cost, Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of other deferred costs charged against earnings in the period.

acct_label: Provision for Lease Losses
acct_description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss to be realized from lease transactions.

acct_label: Unusual or Infrequent Item, or Both, Earnings Per Share Impact, Net
acct_description: Per share amount of earnings, after tax, of an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

acct_label: Unusual or Infrequent Item, or Both, Tax Effect
acct_description: Amount of tax related to an event or transaction that is unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence, or both.

acct_label: Other Deferred Costs, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs or deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies.

acct_label: Asset Recovery Damaged Property Costs, Current (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the portion of the reserved funds established by a utility from customer payments to cover the repair costs of damages from major storms, which repairs are expected to be incurred within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Brokered Natural Gas Margin Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue related to brokering natural gas. The entity realizes brokered margin as a result of buying and selling natural gas in back-to-back transactions.

acct_label: Regulated Operating Revenue, Pipelines
acct_description: The amount of regulated pipeline operating revenues recognized during the period.

acct_label: Revenue from Purchased Oil and Gas (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from sale of oil and gas purchased from other sources.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Deferred Selling Profit
acct_description: Amount of deferred selling profit from direct financing lease.

acct_label: Investments in Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of investments in an entity not consolidated. Includes, but is not limited to, investments in an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, an entity in which the reporting entity shares control of the entity with another party or group, an entity which the company has significant influence, but does not have control and subsidiaries that are not required to be consolidated and are accounted for using the equity or cost method.

acct_label: Leveraged Leases, Net Investment in Leveraged Leases Disclosure, Nonrecourse Debt Service
acct_description: The portion of rentals receivable applicable to principal and interest on the nonrecourse debt.

acct_label: Leveraged Leases, Net Investment in Leveraged Leases Disclosure, Rental Receivables, Gross
acct_description: The gross rentals receivable equal to the future cash flows from the lessee.

acct_label: Deferred Finance Costs, Own-share Lending Arrangement, Issuance Costs, Gross
acct_description: Amount of issuance costs recognized in a share-lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing, before deduction of accumulated amortization or effects of subsequent adjustments.

acct_label: Inventory for Long-term Contracts or Programs, General and Administrative Costs Included in Inventory
acct_description: The actual or estimated amount of general and administrative expense remaining in inventory as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Auction Market Preferred Securities, Stock Series, Liquidation Value
acct_description: The amount of the liquidation value for auction market preferred securities.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Indemnification Agreements, Payments
acct_description: Amount of payments made under the terms of an indemnification agreement contained in a lease.

acct_label: Debt of Subsidiary, Not Assumed
acct_description: Debt of a subsidiary that has not been assumed or guaranteed by the entity and any liens on premises of a subsidiary, or its consolidated subsidiaries, which have not been assumed by the entity, or its consolidated subsidiaries.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs, Impairment Loss
acct_description: Amount of impairment loss for deferred policy acquisition costs.

acct_label: Derivative Asset, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement Deduction
acct_description: Fair value of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from derivative assets.

acct_label: Guaranteed Interest Contracts
acct_description: The amount of the liability as of the balance sheet date pertaining to the guarantee given by the insurance entity to contract holders of a specified rate of return (a guaranteed yield) on their investments for a specified period.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Retained Interest in Securitized Receivables (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in retained interest in a securitized receivable, classified as a trading security.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Other than Securities, Loaned for Short Sales, at Fair Value (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate value of non-security investments loaned for short sales. This is not required to be disclosed under Regulation S-X but is commonly reported by Funds.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accrued obligations to policy and contract holders for long-duration insurance contracts.

acct_label: Liability, Premium Deficiency Testing on Long-Duration Contract, Anticipated Investment Income, Amount
acct_description: Amount of anticipated investment income considered when performing premium deficiency testing on long-duration insurance contract issued by insurance entity.

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Estimated Average Investment Yield
acct_description: Estimated average rate of return on investments which is included in the calculation of the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest, Preferred Stock Amount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: State separately the amounts represented by preferred stock if the preferred stock is material in relation to the consolidated stockholders' equity.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Impairment Loss
acct_description: Amount of impairment loss for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Research and Development Arrangement with Federal Government, Customer Funding to Offset Costs Incurred
acct_description: The amount of customer funding recorded as an offset to costs incurred for a fixed-price, best-efforts research and development cost-sharing arrangement with the Federal Government.

acct_label: Retained Earnings, Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative effect of a change in accounting principle on the beginning retained earnings of the earliest period reported that was affected by the change, net of related income tax effect. A change in accounting principle constitutes a change from one generally accepted accounting principle to another generally accepted accounting principle. This may also include a change in the method of applying an accounting principle.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Accounts Receivable, Net (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount, attributed to the reportable segment, due from customers or clients, for goods or services (including trade receivables) that have been delivered or sold in the normal course of business, reduced to the estimated net realizable fair value by an allowance established by the entity of the amount it deems uncertain of collection.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claim Adjustment Expense, Aggregate Reconciling Items
acct_description: Amount of aggregate reconciling items for the reconciliation of the liability in the disclosure of claims development (in excess of) less than the liability for unpaid claims and claims adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts.

acct_label: Subsidiary or Equity Method Investee, Noncontrolling Interest in Income of Subsidiary
acct_description: The dividends from redeemable preferred stock of a subsidiary that are accounted for as a noncontrolling interest in income of a subsidiary in a parent's consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: Unamortized Loan Commitment and Origination Fees and Unamortized Discounts or Premiums, Other (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the cumulative amount of fees paid by borrowers, which relationship is not otherwise defined (such as commercial, consumer, or foreign), which have not yet been taken into income and unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, not otherwise categorized (such as commercial, consumer, or foreign), unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of loans, not otherwise categorized (such as commercial, consumer, or foreign), that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Nonconsolidated, Comparison of Carrying Amount of Assets and Liabilities to Maximum Loss Exposure
acct_description: Difference between the carrying amount of assets and liabilities in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the variable interest entity (VIE) and the reporting entity's maximum exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the VIE, where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Cumulative Catch-up Adjustment to Revenue, Modification of Contract
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from contract modification which increases (decreases) right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

acct_label: Proceeds from Collection of Policy Loans
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the collection of policy loans receivable.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
acct_description: The cash inflow from a borrowing net of the cash outflow from repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months. Includes long-term debt and short-term debt.

acct_label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Reclassifications of Property, Plant and Equipment (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The decrease in accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization (relating to property, plant and equipment) as a result of reclassifications of property, plant and equipment during the period.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Contingent Consideration, Shares Issuable (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Maximum number of shares issuable under the contingent consideration arrangement in a business combination.

acct_label: Expected Amortization Expense of Ending Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Year One (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Expected amortization expense in the first year after the balance sheet date of the present value of the future profits of long-duration contracts acquired in a purchase of an insurance enterprise.

acct_label: Expected Amortization Expense of Ending Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Year Two (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Expected amortization expense in the second year after the balance sheet date of the present value of the future profits of long-duration contracts acquired in a purchase of an insurance enterprise.

acct_label: Interest Accrual Rate Associated with Amortization Method of Present Value of Future Insurance Profits
acct_description: Rate of interest used in determination of present value of future profits on insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Due in Rolling after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Due in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Due in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Due in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Due in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing due in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Period Increase (Decrease), Weighted Average Exercise Price
acct_description: Change in the weighted average exercise price of options outstanding.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Reverse Stock Splits
acct_description: Reduction in the number of shares during the period as a result of a reverse stock split.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Purchase
acct_description: Amount of increase from purchase of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on passage of time.

acct_label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Restricted
acct_description: Amount of restricted investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Fair Value of Hedged Item in Price Risk Fair Value Hedge (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period related to the fair value of the hedged item in a price risk fair value hedge, as offset by the gain (loss) on the hedging instrument to the extent that the fair value hedge is determined to be effective.

acct_label: Medium-term Notes, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying value at the balance sheet date of the noncurrent portion of a financial instrument used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with original maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Other, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the parent entity and classified as other equity.

acct_label: Treasury Stock, Value, Retired, Cost Method (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Value of common and preferred stock retired from treasury during the period. This element is used only when Treasury Stock is accounted for at total cost versus par.

acct_label: Ancillary Fee Income Generated by Servicing Financial Assets, Amount
acct_description: All amounts that are due to the servicer of a financial asset, excluding contractually specified servicing fees and late fees.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Capital Conservation Buffer, Total Risk-Based Capital, Actual
acct_description: Capital conservation buffer percentage calculated as total risk-based capital ratio after deduction of minimum total risk-based capital ratio as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Closed Portfolio and Beneficial Interest, Last-of-Layer, Amortized Cost
acct_description: Amortized cost of closed portfolio of prepayable financial asset and beneficial interest secured by prepayable financial instrument, used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is last layer expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

acct_label: Common Stock, Including Additional Paid in Capital, Net of Discount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value (in cases of no-par value stock) for common stock held by shareholders, net of discount on shares. Aggregate value for common stock issued and outstanding.

acct_label: Customer Securities for which Entity has Right to Sell or Repledge, Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of customer securities accepted as collateral by the entity that it is permitted by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge to counterparties as collateral.

acct_label: Deposits, Retail
acct_description: The aggregate amount of all retail deposit accounts including demand accounts, savings accounts, and certificates of deposit.

acct_label: Hedged Asset, Fair Value Hedge, Last-of-Layer, Amount
acct_description: Amount of asset hedged in last of layer, expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Retail
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic retail deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Foreign Deposit, Retail
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing retail deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Other
acct_description: Amount of other interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Investment Company, Financial Support to Investee Contractually Required, Amount
acct_description: Amount of financial support committed by investment company to investee that is contractually required.

acct_label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Four and Five
acct_description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in fourth and fifth fiscal years following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Two and Three
acct_description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in second and third fiscal years following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Mortgage Servicing Rights
acct_description: The net cash outflow or inflow associated with acquisition or sale of mortgage servicing rights which is the net carrying value of capitalized servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Mortgage-Related Securities Available-for-sale or Held-for-investment
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of mortgage-related securities, classified as available for sale or held for investment, which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Securities Pledged for Federal Home Loan Bank, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the FHLB debt obligations, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Other Debt Securities Available-for-sale or Held-for-investment
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of other securities classified as available for sale or held for investment which are owned but transferred to another party to serve as collateral to partially or fully secure a debt obligation, repurchase agreement or other current or potential obligation, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Premiums Written, Gross
acct_description: Amount of direct and assumed premiums written.

acct_label: Prepayable Financial Asset Closed Portfolio, Last-of-Layer, Amortized Cost
acct_description: Amortized cost of closed portfolio of prepayable financial asset, used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is last layer expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

acct_label: Servicing Assets and Servicing Liabilities at Fair Value, Assumptions Used to Estimate Fair Value, Weighted Average Life (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average life of financial assets and financial liabilities which is used to estimate fair value of servicing assets and servicing liabilities.

acct_label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Brokered
acct_description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic brokered deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Rolling after 10 Years, Weighted Average Yield
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing after tenth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year.
