For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Rolling after Five Through Ten Years, Weighted Average Yield
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in sixth through tenth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Rolling after One Through Five Years, Weighted Average Yield
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in second through fifth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Rolling within One Year, Weighted Average Yield
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in next rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Rolling after Five Through Ten Years, Weighted Average Yield
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), maturing in sixth through tenth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Rolling after One Through Five Years, Weighted Average Yield
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), maturing in second through fifth rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Rolling after Ten Years, Weighted Average Yield
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), maturing after tenth fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Rolling within One Year, Weighted Average Yield
acct_description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), maturing in next rolling fiscal year following latest fiscal year. For interim and annual periods when interim period is reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

acct_label: Dividend Income, Securities, Operating, Taxable
acct_description: Amount of operating dividend income on securities subject to state, federal and other income tax.

acct_label: Liquidation Basis of Accounting, Accrued Costs to Dispose of Assets and Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of estimated accrued costs to dispose of assets or other items expected to be sold in liquidation.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Cumulative Catch-up Adjustment to Revenue, Change in Estimate of Transaction Price
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from change in estimate of transaction price which increases (decreases) right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time. Includes, but is not limited to, change in assessment of whether estimate of variable consideration is constrained.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Impact of Changes in Fair Value of Shares on Number of Shares
acct_description: Increase (decrease) in number of shares from change in fair value of issuer's equity shares affect on settlement amount. For example, but not limited to, additional shares for each $1 decrease in the fair value of one share.

acct_label: Inventory for Long-term Contracts or Programs, General and Administrative Expense Incurred
acct_description: Amount of general and administrative costs charged to inventory.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Receivable, Receipts (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of collections of receivables pertaining to a loss contingency.

acct_label: Site Contingency, Recovery from Third Party of Environmental Remediation Cost
acct_description: Amount of the estimated recovery from third parties recorded in the period for an individual site that reduces environmental remediation expense.

acct_label: Supplemental Unemployment Benefits
acct_description: Liability for benefits due terminated employees.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Accretion of Interest
acct_description: Value of accretion of temporary equity during the period due to unpaid interest.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Building (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Long-lived depreciable assets that include building structures held for productive use subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

acct_label: Payments to Suppliers
acct_description: Payments of cash to suppliers for goods and services during the current period.

acct_label: Advances for Gas Exploration, Development and Production Amount
acct_description: Discloses the period end balance sheet amount of advances for gas exploration, development and production.

acct_label: Management Fees, Base Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Base revenue, as contractually stipulated, for operating and managing another entity's business during the reporting period.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Reclamation Liability, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of a reclamation liability that is associated with a legal obligation for the closure and reclamation of oil and gas properties.

acct_label: Productive Oil Wells, Number of Wells, Gross
acct_description: The total number of producing oil wells and oil wells capable of production, in which the entity owns an undivided working interest.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Deferred Tax Assets, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Gross amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to noncurrent deferred tax assets.

acct_label: Deferred Finance Costs, Own-share Lending Arrangement, Issuance Costs, Amortization Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for amortization of deferred issuance costs associated with an own-share lending arrangement.

acct_label: Deferred Finance Costs, Own-share Lending Arrangement, Issuance Costs, Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The periodic charge to earnings for amortization of deferred issuance costs associated with an own-share lending arrangement during the term of the arrangement.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Timber Property
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property used for growing and harvesting trees.

acct_label: Other Alternative Energy Sales Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue earned during the period from alternative energy sources (for example, ethanol, biomass, solar, geothermal, and wind power).

acct_label: Sales Revenue, Energy Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue derived from energy-related services such as supplying various forms of energy from the operation of on-site facilities or cogeneration plants and procurement services provided to energy purchasers.

acct_label: Site Contingency, Loss Exposure Not Accrued, Best Estimate
acct_description: Best estimate of the loss exposure for reasonably possible environmental contingencies at an individual site for which no accrual has been recorded.

acct_label: Timber and Timberlands
acct_description: Amount before accumulated depreciation and depletion of forest crops and land devoted primarily to the growth and harvest of forest crops for commercial purposes.

acct_label: Timber Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from sale of timber, mill lumber, wood, and other wood products.

acct_label: Short-Duration Contract, Discounted Liability, Discount Rate
acct_description: Discount rate used to obtain present value of liability for unpaid claim and claim adjustment expense for short-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

acct_label: Contract Receivable Retainage, after Next Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected after the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Inventory, Homes under Construction
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized construction costs of homes for future sale.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventory for Long-term Contracts or Programs
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of inventory pertaining to construction, development, or other contracts or programs that initially were expected to take more than one year or the normal operating cycle to complete.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Property, Plant, and Equipment, Net (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Tangible assets attributed to the reportable segment for use in the production or supply of goods and services, for rental to others, or for administrative purposes, net of accumulated depreciation. Examples include land, buildings, machinery, vehicles, furniture, and computer equipment.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-04, Cash Dividends Paid to Registrant, Unconsolidated Subsidiaries
acct_description: This element represents disclosure of the aggregate cash dividends paid to the entity by unconsolidated subsidiaries.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Components Excluded from Assessment of Foreign Currency Cash Flow Hedge Effectiveness
acct_description: The net gain (loss) relating to components of the gain (loss) on foreign currency cash flow hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Short-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Variable Interest Rate
acct_description: The portion of the carrying amount of short-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, which accrues interest at a rate subject to change from time to time.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Assets, Asset Not to be Used (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to assets expected not to be used, including assets that will be sold or otherwise disposed.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Number of Employees
acct_description: Number of employees eligible to participate in defined contribution plan.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Fair Value Hedge Asset at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative assets designated as foreign currency fair value hedging instruments.

acct_label: Capital Units, Authorized
acct_description: Number of authorized capital units or capital shares. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

acct_label: License Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred and are directly related to generating license revenue. Licensing arrangements include, but are not limited to, rights to use a patent, copyright, technology, manufacturing process, software or trademark.

acct_label: Program Rights Obligations, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of obligations related to rights to programming, including, but not limited to, feature films and episodic series, acquired under license agreements that will be paid after one year.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Capital Leases, Net
acct_description: The net gain (loss) arising from the lessor's transactions involving the sale, transfer, or termination of financing agreements classified as capital leases.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Recoverable Refundable Gas Costs
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the asset or liability created by a public utility's ability to recover gas costs that are higher or lower than the basic cost included in rate payer calculations.

acct_label: Natural Gas Midstream Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Midstream costs of residue gas, natural gas liquids and condensate. Midstream is a term sometimes used to identify those industry activities that fall between exploration and production (upstream) and refining and marketing (downstream). The term is most often applied to pipeline transportation of crude oil and natural gas.

acct_label: Propane Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred related to propane gas during the reporting period.

acct_label: Propane Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from sale of propane gas, a product derived from other petroleum products during oil or natural gas processing.

acct_label: Remaining Amounts of Regulatory Assets for which No Return on Investment During Recovery Period is Provided
acct_description: Remaining balance of regulatory assets for which no return on investment during recovery is provided. In some cases, a regulator may permit an enterprise to include a cost that would be charged to expense by an unregulated enterprise as an allowable cost over a period of time by amortizing that cost for rate-making purposes, but the regulator does not include the unrecovered amount in the rate base.

acct_label: Unamortized Loss Reacquired Debt, Noncurrent
acct_description: Unamortized Loss on Reacquired Debt is the loss incurred upon reacquisition or refinancing of debt, is treated as a deferred charge and amortized over the life of the new debt issued.

acct_label: Asset Management Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate costs related to asset management during the reporting period.

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Transition Asset (Obligation), after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

acct_label: Derivative, Swaption Interest Rate
acct_description: Fixed interest rate that will be received or paid upon exercise of the interest rate swaption contract.

acct_label: Expenses and Losses, Reporting Currency Denominated, Value
acct_description: The reporting currency-denominated expense (including losses) amount.

acct_label: Notional Amount of Net Investment Hedging Instruments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Total notional amount of all derivative and nonderivative instruments designated as a hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation. The notional amount relates to a number of currency units, shares, bushels, pounds, or other units specified in a derivative instrument.

acct_label: Number of Price Risk Derivatives Held
acct_description: Number of price risk derivative instruments held by the entity at the reporting date.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Timberlands
acct_description: The cash outflow for acquisition of timber and timberlands during the period.

acct_label: Revenues and Gains, Reporting Currency Denominated, Value
acct_description: The reporting currency-denominated revenue (including gains) amount.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Share Value, Amount, Noncurrent
acct_description: The amount that is required to be paid, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if as of the reporting date, the holder of the share has exercised the right to or the shares are mandatorily redeemable after one year from the reporting date or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Assets, Current (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets, classified as current.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Assets, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Liabilities, Current (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities classified as current.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Liabilities, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Rental Income
acct_description: Amount of rental income attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Condemnation
acct_description: The gain (loss) is the pre-tax difference between the net condemnation award and the entity's adjusted basis of the condemned property.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Periodic Payment Terms, Balloon Payment Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The required large, lump sum payment amount on final maturity date.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Deposits on Real Estate Acquisitions
acct_description: Net cash outflow or inflow from the amount given in advance to show intention to complete the acquisition piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

acct_label: Undistributed Income from Other than Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the balance as of the reporting date of undistributed income derived from other than the gain (loss) on sale of properties which is otherwise disclosed. The purpose of separately disclosing such information is to distinguish between income generated from the operation of a real estate investment trust's property portfolio and the gain (loss) attributable to the sale of such properties.

acct_label: Deductions (Charges) (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Total deductions and charges.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Postretirement Plan Benefit Obligation, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as defined benefit non-pension postretirement plan obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Postretirement Plan Benefit Obligation, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount classified as defined benefit non-pension postretirement plan obligations attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Individually Significant Component Disposed of or Held-for-sale, Excluding Discontinued Operations, before Income Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from an individually significant component disposed of or held-for-sale including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Excludes discontinued operations.

acct_label: Marketable Securities, Fixed Maturities, Current (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of investments in debt securities expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Other Deductions and Charges (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Other deductions and charges as defined.

acct_label: Other Deductions or Allowable Credits (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Other deductions or allowable credits, as defined, including adjustments to net worth related to unrealized profit or loss and certain deferred tax provisions.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Maximum Amount
acct_description: The maximum amount that the issuer could be required to pay to redeem the instrument by physical settlement, if applicable.

acct_label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Net Amount
acct_description: The receivable or note face amount less the unamortized discount or premium.

acct_label: Malpractice Insurance, Deductible
acct_description: Amount of risk retained by the entity before the insurance arrangement begins to provide coverage.

acct_label: Cost, Overhead
acct_description: Indirect cost incurred related to good produced and service rendered.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost, Amortization Expense, Assumption Change
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) to amortization expense of deferred policy acquisition cost (DAC) due to assumption change.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs and Present Value of Future Profits (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The sum of the unamortized portion as of the balance sheet date of (a) capitalized policy acquisition costs, and (b) capitalized present value of the future profits (also known as PVFP).

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs and Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Addition
acct_description: Amount of addition in deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs and Present Value of Future Profits, Amortization (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of DAC and capitalized present value of future profits (also known as VOBA) that was amortized during the period, generally in proportion to related revenue earned, estimated gross profits, or over the customer relationship or some other period.

acct_label: Deferred Sale Inducement Cost, Capitalization
acct_description: Amount of deferred sale inducement cost capitalized.

acct_label: Deferred Sales Inducement Cost, Other Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred sales inducement cost, classified as other.

acct_label: Expected Amortization Expense of Ending Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Year Five (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Expected amortization expense in the fifth year after the balance sheet date of the present value of the future profits of long-duration contracts acquired in a purchase of an insurance enterprise.

acct_label: Expected Amortization Expense of Ending Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Year Four (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Expected amortization expense in the fourth year after the balance sheet date of the present value of the future profits of long-duration contracts acquired in a purchase of an insurance enterprise.

acct_label: Expected Amortization Expense of Ending Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Year Three (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Expected amortization expense in the third year after the balance sheet date of the present value of the future profits of long-duration contracts acquired in a purchase of an insurance enterprise.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Comparability Adjustments (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage of adjustment to the observed price for a similar asset or liability when an identical transaction does not exist, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Guaranteed Benefit Liability, Gross
acct_description: Amount of expected guaranteed benefits in excess of the projected account balances for minimum guaranteed benefit contracts, as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Guaranteed Benefit Liability, Net
acct_description: Amount of expected guaranteed benefits in excess of the projected account balances for minimum guaranteed benefit contracts, net of reinsurance recoverables, as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Incurred Benefits
acct_description: Amount of guaranteed minimum benefit expense incurred for expected guaranteed minimum benefits in excess of projected account values.

acct_label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Other Liability Adjustments
acct_description: Net amount of other increases or decreases to the liability for guaranteed minimum benefits on long-duration contracts occurring during the period.

acct_label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Payment for Benefits
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow to policyholders and contract holders for guaranteed minimum benefit payments.

acct_label: Net Amount at Risk by Product and Guarantee, General Account Value
acct_description: Value of the general accounts corresponding to the specified product, guarantee type and subset of the guarantee.

acct_label: Net Amount at Risk by Product and Guarantee, Net Amount at Risk
acct_description: Net amount at risk, representing the guaranteed benefit in excess of the current account balance corresponding to the specified product, guarantee type and subset of the guarantee.

acct_label: Net Amount at Risk by Product and Guarantee, Net Amount at Risk at Annuitization (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Net amount at risk, representing the guaranteed benefit in excess of the current account balance corresponding to the specified product, guarantee type and subset of the guarantee.

acct_label: Net Amount at Risk by Product and Guarantee, Separate Account Value
acct_description: Value of the separate accounts corresponding to the specified product, guarantee type and subset of the guarantee.

acct_label: Net Change Contract Holders Funds
acct_description: The cash inflow or outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Reclassification Adjustment of Noncredit Portion Included in Net Income, Availabe-for-sale Securities, before Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) related to factors other than credit loss on a previously impaired investment in available-for-sale debt security.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense, Assumption Change
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination from assumption change.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Guarantee Benefit
acct_description: Sum of the amount of guaranteed minimum benefits the ceding insurer expects to recover on insurance policies ceded to other insurance entities as of the balance sheet date for all guaranteed benefit types.

acct_label: Reverse Repurchase Agreements Segregated under Other Regulations (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value of reverse repurchase agreements deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to regulations other than SEC Regulations and the Commodity Exchange Act.

acct_label: Secured Debt, Dollar Rolls
acct_description: Carrying value, as of the balance sheet date, of an agreement to sell a mortgage-backed security with an agreement to purchase a similar mortgage-backed security at a future date.

acct_label: Securities Received as Collateral, Amount Repledged and Sold
acct_description: The fair value of collateral received that has been sold or re-pledged and is owed to the debtor (transferor) upon settlement of the related contractual obligation under which it was received.

acct_label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Dividends Paid with Approval of Regulatory Agency
acct_description: Amount of dividends paid subject to regulatory approval.

acct_label: Direct-to-television Film Costs
acct_description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the physical production of a direct-to-television film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Direct-to-television Film Costs, Completed and Not Released
acct_description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest related to the completion of a direct-to-television film not yet released. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Direct-to-television Film Costs, Preproduction
acct_description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the preproduction of a direct-to-television film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Direct-to-television Film Costs, Production
acct_description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the production of a direct-to-television film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Direct-to-television Film Costs, Released
acct_description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the release of a direct-to-television film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Film, Monetized in Film Group, Capitalized Cost
acct_description: Amount of capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

acct_label: Film, Monetized in Film Group, Capitalized Cost, Completed and Not Released
acct_description: Amount of capitalized film cost for completed and not released film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

acct_label: Film, Monetized in Film Group, Capitalized Cost, Development and Preproduction
acct_description: Amount of capitalized film cost incurred in development and preproduction of film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

acct_label: Film, Monetized in Film Group, Capitalized Cost, Production
acct_description: Amount of capitalized film cost incurred in production of film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

acct_label: Film, Monetized in Film Group, Capitalized Cost, Released
acct_description: Amount of capitalized film cost for released film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

acct_label: Percentage of Unamortized Film Costs
acct_description: The percentage of unamortized film costs for released films, excluding acquired film libraries, that it expects to amortize within three years from the date of the balance sheet.

acct_label: Theatrical Film Costs
acct_description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the physical production of a theatrical film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Theatrical Film Costs, Completed and Not Released
acct_description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest related to the completion of a theatrical film not yet released. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Theatrical Film Costs, Preproduction
acct_description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the preproduction of a theatrical film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Theatrical Film Costs, Released
acct_description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in the release of a theatrical film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), after Adjustments, before Tax, Parent
acct_description: Amount, before tax and after adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge, attributable to parent. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Leases, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to lease expense.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Short-term Borrowings Excluding Federal Funds and Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
acct_description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on short-term borrowings including commercial paper, Federal Home Loan Bank and Federal Reserve Bank advances and other short term borrowings.

acct_label: Affordable Housing Program Assessments
acct_description: Amount of expense for Affordable Housing Program (AHP) assessments required by the Federal Home Loan Bank Act of 1932.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) Preferred Unit Holders, Redeemable
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to redeemable noncontrolling preferred unit holders.

acct_label: Other Deferred Compensation Arrangements, Liability, Current
acct_description: Amount of the liabilities, classified as other, for deferred compensation arrangements payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Common, Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value as of the reporting date of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of common shares (regardless of class), limited partnership units (regardless of class), non-preferential membership interests, or any other form of common equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Range of Estimated Fair Value, High (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Represents the upper bound of a range for the estimate of fair value as of the reporting date of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Interests Continued to be Held by Transferor, Current
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of the assets created and retained during the securitization of trade receivables, which are not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

acct_label: Redeemable Convertible Preferred Stock, Redemption Price Per Share (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount to be paid per share by entity upon redemption.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Discount from Market Price (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: An entity may opt to disclose the discount rate from market value on offering date or purchase date that participants pay for shares. Typically, the participant's per share cost is the lower of the prices on the two dates.

acct_label: Short-term Lease Commitment, Amount
acct_description: Amount of short-term lease commitment.

acct_label: Common Stock, Additional Series, Shares, Issued (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Total number of additional series of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes related common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

acct_label: Common Stock, Additional Series, Value (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Value of each additional class of issued common stock. This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current, Other
acct_description: Amount of other assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Japanese Welfare Pension Insurance Law, Government Subsidy
acct_description: Amount of subsidy from transfer of employee pension fund liability to Japanese government.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Increase (Decrease), Other, Net
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in debt instruments, classified as other.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Executory Costs
acct_description: Estimated remaining costs to be incurred to service the direct financing lease, such as taxes, maintenance and insurance and the profit thereon, that are included in the minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Components Excluded from Assessment of Price Risk Cash Flow Hedge Effectiveness
acct_description: The net gain (loss) relating to components of the gain (loss) on foreign currency cash flow hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Components Excluded from Assessment of Price Risk Fair Value Hedge Effectiveness
acct_description: The net gain (loss) relating to components of the gain (loss) on price risk fair value hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Assets, Raw Materials (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to raw materials inventory.

acct_label: Common Unit, Issued
acct_description: Number of common units issued of limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity, Transfers out of Level 3 (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified in shareholders' equity out of level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

acct_label: General Partner Distributions
acct_description: Distributions from earnings to the general partner of a partnership included in the consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: General Partners' Contributed Capital
acct_description: The amount of capital contributed by the general partner.

acct_label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Distribution Amount
acct_description: The total amount of distributions to limited partners.

acct_label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Authorized
acct_description: The number of limited partner units authorized to be issued.

acct_label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Issued
acct_description: The number of limited partner units issued.

acct_label: Limited Partners' Cumulative Cash Distributions
acct_description: Aggregate cumulative cash distributions made to the limited partners.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Delivery Commitments and Contracts, Remaining Contractual Volume
acct_description: Total amount of product committed to be supplied under existing contracts or agreements.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Contributions
acct_description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Sale of Units
acct_description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Payments for Removal Costs
acct_description: Cash outflow related to disposal costs of plants, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.

acct_label: Revenues, Excluding Interest and Dividends
acct_description: Revenues from operations, excluding interest and dividend income. Includes revenues from the following sources: investment banking (underwriting and financial advisory), principal transactions (sales and trading, and investment gains and losses), commissions, asset management, and investment advisory and other services.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Interest Income
acct_description: Amount of interest income from net investment in sales-type lease.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Variable Lease Income
acct_description: Amount of sales-type lease income from variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor, excluding amount included in measurement of lease receivable.

acct_label: AOCI Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Net Regulatory Assets
acct_description: The net amount of all regulatory assets less all regulatory liabilities as of the end of the period.

acct_label: Undistributed Continuing Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Basic
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to participating securities for basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

acct_label: Undistributed Discontinued Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Basic
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations allocated to participating securities for basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

acct_label: Reporting Unit, Zero or Negative Carrying Amount, Number
acct_description: Number of reporting units with zero or negative amount of net assets.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Health Care Insurance Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in health care insurance liability balances during the period.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Securities Lending Payable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of the liability pertaining to obligations to return collateral that the entity received when it loaned securities to the counterparty to the transaction.

acct_label: Minimum Net Capital Required (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Total minimum net capital required to be maintained to engage in securities transactions.

acct_label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net, Health
acct_description: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for health insurance contracts.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liability Not Recognized, Amount of Unrecognized Deferred Tax Liability, Bad Debt Reserve for Tax Purposes of Qualified Lender
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized because of the exceptions to comprehensive recognition of deferred taxes related to bad debt reserve for tax purposes of a qualified lender.

acct_label: Noninterest Expense Printing and Fulfillment
acct_description: Amounts expended for printing of marketing and compliance communications and fulfillment services.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Leases Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing leases held for investment purposes during an accounting period.

acct_label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Securities for Other Debt Facilities
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for debt facilities other than FHLB loans, repurchase agreements and letter of credit arrangements, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Proceeds from Leases Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash inflow from the sale of a lease held for investment, which may be a lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent.

acct_label: Proceeds from Securitizations of Loans Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash inflow from the securitization of loans held for investment. Securitization is the structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

acct_label: Securities Borrowed, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of securities borrowed from other entities.

acct_label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of Other than 10 or 20 Percent Adverse Change in Discount Rate, Percent
acct_description: A specified percentage variance in the discount rate assumption in the determination of fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Amount, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of life settlement contract accounted for under investment method maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Premium to be Paid, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Deferred Lease Income, Current
acct_description: Amount of deferred lease income, classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, amount paid in advance by lessee.

acct_label: Ground Leases, Net
acct_description: Net long-term land leases which are capitalized as part of real property.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Periodic Payment Terms, Balloon Payment to be Received
acct_description: Amount of large payment to be received at final maturity date of mortgage loans.

acct_label: Excess Stock, Shares Issued
acct_description: Number of excess stock shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Retainage Payable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in retainage obligations due by the reporting entity that are payable within one year (or one business cycle).

acct_label: Other Nonoperating-Asset Related Income
acct_description: Amount of income related to nonoperating assets, classified as other.

acct_label: Excess Stock, Shares Authorized
acct_description: Maximum number of excess stock shares permitted to be issued.

acct_label: Maintenance Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue derived from maintenance services provided under contracts or arrangements with clients. For example, it may include the maintenance of software, plant and equipment, and facilities.

acct_label: Revenue Recognition, Milestone Method, Revenue Recognized
acct_description: The amount of consideration recognized during the period for the milestone or milestones.

acct_label: Plant Held for Future Use Amount
acct_description: Discloses the period end amount of plants held for future use and whether such amount is included in the utility's rate base.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Equipment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to equipment used in the normal course of business, not including equipment that is held-for-sale.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Plant (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to a plant used in the normal course of business, not including a plant that is held-for-sale.

acct_label: Deferred Rent Receivables, Net, Noncurrent
acct_description: For a classified balance sheet, the cumulative difference between the rental income or payments required by a lease agreement and the rental income or expense recognized on a straight-line basis, or other systematic and rational basis more representative of the time pattern in which use or benefit is granted or derived from the leased property, expected to be recognized in income or expense, by the lessor or lessee, respectively, more than one year after the balance sheet date. Such receivable is reduced by allowances attributable to, for instance, credit risk associated with a lessee.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Variable Lease Income
acct_description: Amount of direct financing lease income from variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor, excluding amount included in measurement of lease receivable.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of Income or Loss from the cumulative effect of a change in accounting principle, net of tax effect, per each share of common stock and dilutive common stock equivalents outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Real Estate, Range Maximum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation maximum percentage of investments in real estate to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Real Estate, Range Minimum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Target allocation minimum percentage of investments in real estate to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

acct_label: Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Current
acct_description: Amount at end of the reporting period of the aggregate extended product warranty liability that is expected to be paid within one year of the balance sheet date or normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the standard product warranty liability.

acct_label: Retail Related Inventory, Packaging and Other Supplies
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of items used in storage, presentation or transportation of physical goods that are targeted for sale to end users.

acct_label: General Partners' Capital Account, Units Issued
acct_description: The number of general partner units issued.

acct_label: General Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
acct_description: The number of general partner units outstanding.

acct_label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
acct_description: The number of limited partner units outstanding.

acct_label: Management Fee, Amount Paid (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount paid to managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

acct_label: Other Ownership Interests, Units Outstanding
acct_description: The number of units of other ownership interests outstanding in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Public Sale of Units Net of Offering Costs
acct_description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering, net of offering costs. This is a parenthetical disclosure.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Sale of Units
acct_description: Total units issued during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Sold in Public Offering
acct_description: The number of units sold in a public offering of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

acct_label: Payment for Administrative Fees
acct_description: Amount paid to managing member or general partner, affiliate of managing member or general partner, or affiliate of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP) for administrative services provided to the LLC or LP, for example, but not limited to, salaries, rent, or overhead costs.

acct_label: Preferred Units, Outstanding
acct_description: The number of preferred units outstanding.

acct_label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Tax Benefit
acct_description: The amount of income tax expense reduction and deferred tax asset recorded in the transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Measure of Activity, Other, Amount
acct_description: The amount of activity, consisting of a transaction or a measure not described elsewhere in the taxonomy, occurring during the period between the reporting entity and the Variable Interest Entity (VIE) or potential VIE.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Deposit on Loan
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow from resulting from payment, receipt or drawdown of cash deposit to guarantee a loan during the period.

acct_label: Auction Market Preferred Securities, Shares, Issued
acct_description: Number of auction market preferred securities shares issued.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Other Financial Assets
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on disposal of other assets utilized in financial service operations.

acct_label: Research and Development Expense, Software (Excluding Acquired in Process Cost)
acct_description: Research and development expense during the period related to the costs of developing and achieving technological feasibility of a computer software product to be sold, leased, or otherwise marketed.

acct_label: Subsidiary or Equity Method Investee, Price-Per-Share (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Price-per-share of common or preferred stock issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee.

acct_label: Advertising Revenue Cost (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred and are directly related to generating advertising revenues.

acct_label: Amortization of ESOP Award
acct_description: Value of shares committed to be released under an Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).

acct_label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Accumulated Impairment
acct_description: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Repurchase Obligation Amount
acct_description: An entity will typically disclose the amount of any repurchase obligation.

acct_label: Research and Development Arrangement, Contract to Perform for Others, Costs Incurred, Gross
acct_description: The amount of costs incurred under a research and development arrangement accounted for as a contract to perform research and development for others.

acct_label: Retrospective Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, Tabular Presentation by Financial Statement Line Item, Amount of Application Adjustment (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Direct effect of a change in accounting principle on a previously issued financial statement line item and any per share amounts affected for the prior period presented, and on a statement of financial position line item at the beginning of the current period.

acct_label: Trading Securities, Debt, Current (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Debt securities that are bought and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time, usually less than one year or the normal operating cycle, whichever is longer) or for debt securities formerly categorized as available-for-sale or held-to-maturity which the entity held as of the date it opted to account for such securities at fair value. An enterprise may also categorize such a security as trading without the intent to sell it in the near term assuming the decision to categorize the security as trading occurred at acquisition.

acct_label: Trading Securities, Equity, Current (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value of investments in trading equity securities and other forms of trading securities that provide ownership interests, expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Sales-type Lease
acct_description: Cost of goods sold for sales-type financing lease.

acct_label: Supplemental Unemployment Benefits, Disability Related Benefits
acct_description: Liability for amount due a former employee for benefits as a result of them becoming physically or mentally impaired.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Cost of Providing Special or Contractual Termination Benefits Recognized During Period (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: If applicable, the cost of providing special or contractual termination benefits recognized during the period on the projected benefit obligation.

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Loss Exposure in Excess of Accrual, Best Estimate
acct_description: Best estimate of the reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of the amount accrued for damages pertaining to a specified product.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-04, Cash Dividends Paid to Registrant, 50 Percent or Less Owned Persons
acct_description: This element represents disclosure of the aggregate cash dividends paid to the entity by 50% or less owned persons accounted for using the equity method.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Equity Method Investment Retained after Disposal, Ownership Interest after Disposal
acct_description: Percent, after disposal, of ownership interest of a discontinued operation in which an equity method investment is retained.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Extraterritorial Income Exclusion, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for extraterritorial income exclusion.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Measure of Activity, Operating Income or Loss
acct_description: The amount of income (loss) from operations derived by the reporting entity during the period from the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Measure of Activity, Purchases
acct_description: The amount of purchases between the reporting entity and the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

acct_label: Admissions Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from admissions (for example, tickets to parks, rides and attractions, theaters, sporting events, and movies), as well as patient admissions.

acct_label: Marketable Securities, Restricted, Current (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Total debt and equity financial instruments including: (1) securities held-to-maturity, (2) trading securities, and (3) securities available-for-sale which are intended to be held for less than one year or the normal operating cycle, whichever is longer and that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

acct_label: Supplemental Unemployment Benefits, Salary Continuation
acct_description: Liability for agreement to continue an employee's salary after termination of employment (but before retirement) including death, disability, or other event. For example, a company may agree to continue a disabled employee's salary for six months.

acct_label: Interest Income and Fees, Bankers Acceptances, Certificates of Deposit and Commercial Paper
acct_description: Interest and fee income derived from banker's acceptances, certificates of deposit and commercial paper.

acct_label: Noninterest Expense Investment Advisory Fees
acct_description: This represents the company's cost incurred during an accounting period for managing the money in a fund, which will be billed back to the client and is a component of noninterest expenses.

acct_label: Restricted Stock Award, Forfeitures, Dividends
acct_description: The value of dividends forfeited related to restricted stock awards forfeited.

acct_label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred, Including Equity Interest in Acquiree Held Prior to Combination (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the sum of the: (1) acquisition-date fair value of the total consideration transferred which consists of the sum of the acquisition-date fair values of the assets transferred by the acquirer, the liabilities incurred by the acquirer to former owners of the acquiree, and the equity interests issued by the acquirer and (2) the acquisition-date fair value of any equity interest in the acquiree held by the acquirer prior to the business combination (for example, a step acquisition).

acct_label: Environmental Exit Costs, Reasonably Possible Additional Losses, High Estimate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: High-end estimate of the reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of the amount accrued for remediation, site restoration, postclosure, monitoring commitments, or other exit costs associated with the sale, disposal or abandonment of a particular property resulting from unanticipated contamination of the assets.

acct_label: Weighted Average Rate Domestic Deposit, Other Time Deposit
acct_description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic time deposit liabilities other than certificates of deposit.

acct_label: Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, before Adoption of FAS 158 Recognition Provisions, Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Disclosure under FAS 132R, before it was amended by FAS 158, of accumulated other comprehensive income, if any, as one of the amounts recognized in the balance sheet prior to the adoption of the recognition provisions of FAS 158.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Insurance
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for insurance that provides economic benefits in future periods.

acct_label: Undistributed Continuing Operation Earnings (Loss), Basic
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

acct_label: Undistributed Discontinued Operation Earnings (Loss), Basic
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

acct_label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) from Continuing Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to common stock as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

acct_label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) from Discontinued Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations allocated to common stock as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

acct_label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Equity Unit Purchase Agreements
acct_description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of equity unit purchase agreements using the treasury stock method.

acct_label: Transfer Mortgage Payable
acct_description: The fair value of transfer of mortgage payable in noncash investing or financing activities.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, Net of Federal Home Loan Bank Assessments
acct_description: Amount of profit (loss) after Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments attributable to the parent.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Number of Employees Covered
acct_description: Number of entity's employees covered by multiemployer plan.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Unapproved Contract Claims
acct_description: The total amount of accounts receivable from customers under long-term contracts or programs associated with unapproved change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingency, Undiscounted, to be Paid, after Year Five
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration Arrangements, Change in Range of Outcomes, Contingent Consideration, Liability, Value, High
acct_description: This element represents the amount of any change recognized during the period in the high-end of the estimated range of outcomes (undiscounted) of a liability assumed in a business combination arising from an item of contingent consideration.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration Arrangements, Change in Range of Outcomes, Contingent Consideration, Liability, Value, Low
acct_description: This element represents the amount of any change recognized during the period in the low-end of the estimated range of outcomes (undiscounted) of a liability assumed in a business combination arising from an item of contingent consideration.

acct_label: Cash, Including Discontinued Operations
acct_description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Includes cash within disposal group or discontinued operation.

acct_label: Government Contract Receivable, Progress Payment Offset
acct_description: Amount of progress payment offset against unbilled government contract receivable.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Noncash Financial or Equity Instrument Consideration, Options Issued
acct_description: "The number of options issued as [noncash or part noncash] consideration for a business or asset acquired. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Lapse Rate, High End (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Anticipated rate of future terminations of contracts in force as of the balance sheet date at the high end of the range of reasonable estimates, which is included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Lapse Rate, Low End (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Anticipated rate of future terminations of contracts in force as of the balance sheet date at the low end of the range of reasonable estimates, which is included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Mortality Rate
acct_description: Actuarially determined death rate of policyholders, which is included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Write-down of Securities Included in Net Income, Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Tax effect of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized (losses) realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Payments to Fund Policy Loans
acct_description: The initial funding or additional funding of loans receivable to policy holders principally secured by the benefits under the policy.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Interest Accrued (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of long-term market rate of interest earned on present value of future insurance profits during the reporting period.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Interest Accrued (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of interest earned on present value of future insurance profits.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Unrealized Investment Gains (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the increase in the period in the present value of future profits asset attributable to unrealized investment gains.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Unrealized Investment Gain
acct_description: Amount of unrealized investment gain which decreases present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Quarterly Financial Information, Quarterly Charges and Credits, Amount Reconciling to Previously Reported Results (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount by which previously reported quarterly results were revised (for example, to correct an error, or to give retrospective effect to a change in an accounting principle).

acct_label: Real Estate Investments, Joint Ventures
acct_description: The book value of investments in real estate joint ventures including direct and indirect investments.

acct_label: Cost of Transmission (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred for transmission operations and maintenance by total kilowatt-hours paid to sources.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Depreciation and Amortization, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to depreciation and amortization.

acct_label: Forward Contract Indexed to Issuer's Equity, Indexed Shares
acct_description: The number of issuer's shares to which the forward contract is indexed.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Energy Contracts
acct_description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open agreements to purchase or sell energy at some future point, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Liabilities, Noncurrent, Recourse (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities that have recourse to general credit of primary beneficiary, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Accrued Advertising (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for advertising of the entity's goods and services. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Write-down of Property, Plant and Equipment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The decrease in accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization (relating to property, plant and equipment) as a result of write-downs of property, plant and equipment.

acct_label: Convertible Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Face amount or stated value per share of nonredeemable convertible preferred stock; generally not indicative of the fair market value per share.

acct_label: Convertible Preferred Stock, Shares Issued (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Total number of nonredeemable convertible preferred shares that have been sold (or granted) to the entity's shareholders. Shares issued includes shares outstanding and shares held in treasury.

acct_label: Convertible Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The number of nonredeemable convertible preferred shares that have been issued and are held by the entity's shareholders. Shares outstanding equals shares issued minus shares held in treasury.

acct_label: Deferred Lease Income, after Accumulated Amortization, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of deferred lease income, classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, amount paid in advance by lessee.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Estimated Amount Amortized, Year One (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated amount of the remaining balance as of the most recent fiscal year-end of the intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination to be reduced through amortization in the first year following that balance sheet date.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Estimated Amount Amortized, Year Five (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated amount of the remaining balance as of the most recent fiscal year-end of the intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination to be reduced through amortization in the fifth year following that balance sheet date.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Estimated Amount Amortized, Year Four (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated amount of the remaining balance as of the most recent fiscal year-end of the intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination to be reduced through amortization in the fourth year following that balance sheet date.
