acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Estimated Amount Amortized, Year Three (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated amount of the remaining balance as of the most recent fiscal year-end of the intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination to be reduced through amortization in the third year following that balance sheet date.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Estimated Amount Amortized, Year Two (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated amount of the remaining balance as of the most recent fiscal year-end of the intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination to be reduced through amortization in the second year following that balance sheet date.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Commercial, Trade Financing (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of commercial loans, including, but not limited to, letters of credit, bankers' acceptances, receivables factoring, open account financing, for international trade activities. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Redeemable Convertible Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The number of redeemable convertible preferred shares that have been issued and are held by the entity's shareholders. Shares outstanding equals shares issued minus shares held in treasury.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Insignificant, Employer Contribution under Collective-Bargaining Arrangement to All Participating Employer Contributions, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of employer contribution required by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to total contribution from all participating employers in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

acct_label: Interest Income, Money Market Deposits
acct_description: Interest earned on funds deposited in US domestic money market accounts.

acct_label: Accrued Payroll Taxes (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory payroll taxes incurred through that date and withheld from employees pertaining to services received from them, including entity's matching share of the employees FICA taxes and contributions to the state and federal unemployment insurance programs. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Liabilities Assumed (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Increase in the period in the accrued obligations to policy and contract holders that relates to insured events, and can be viewed as either (a) the estimated present value of future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and expenses less the present value of future net premiums payable under the insurance contracts or (b) the accumulated amount of net premiums already collected less the accumulated amount of benefits and expenses already paid to or on behalf of policyholders.

acct_label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net, Other
acct_description: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for benefits and costs incurred for other insurance contracts.

acct_label: Policy Loans Receivable
acct_description: Carrying amount of loans made to policyholders against the cash surrender value (CSV) or other policyholder funds, and secured by the CSV, policyholder funds or the death benefit provided by the insurance contracts.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) from Price Risk Management Activity
acct_description: Gain (loss) incurred in risk management activities.

acct_label: Other Tax Carryforward, Valuation Allowance (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The portion of the deferred tax asset arising from some other tax carryforward for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

acct_label: Redeemable Convertible Preferred Stock, Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of redeemable convertible preferred stock.

acct_label: Redeemable Preferred Stock, Value, Excluding Additional Paid in Capital (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Value of redeemable preferred shares outstanding.

acct_label: Facility Costs
acct_description: Facility expenses incurred related to gas and oil produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Other Marketable Securities, Current (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of other investments not classified as trading, available-for-sale or held-to-maturity, expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Productive Oil Wells, Number of Wells, Net
acct_description: The total number of producing oil wells and oil wells capable of production, in which the entity owns a fractional working interest.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Decrease, Forgiveness
acct_description: Amount of decrease in line of credit facility from forgiveness by the holder of the line of credit.

acct_label: Liabilities of Business Transferred under Contractual Arrangement, Current
acct_description: The current carrying amount, due within one year or one operating cycle, if longer, of liabilities resulting from the transfer of a business segment under contractual arrangement where the transferor maintains certain risks, obligations or liabilities.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Sales Type Leases, Allowance for Uncollectible Minimum Lease Payments
acct_description: The estimate of minimum payments on sales-type leases that are probable of not being collected as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Sales Type Leases, Executory Costs
acct_description: Estimated remaining costs to be incurred to service the sales-type lease, such as taxes, maintenance and insurance and the profit thereon, that are included in the minimum lease payments.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Cost Method Investments (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Stop Loss Insurance Premium Expense
acct_description: Stop-loss insurance premiums recognized as expense. In stop-loss insurance, prepaid health care providers or associated entities transfer portions of their financial risks to other companies. A provider typically contracts to recover health care costs in excess of stated amounts during the contract periods.

acct_label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted, Pro Forma Adjustment
acct_description: Pro forma diluted earnings per share adjustment to reconcile between net income and pro forma amounts.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Commitments, Fixed Rates
acct_description: Reflects the amount of cash required to fully fund agreements to provide advances to borrowers and lessees at stated interest rates.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Cash Surrender Value
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Divestiture, Amount of Consideration Received (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The value of the consideration received for selling an asset or business through a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests.

acct_label: Storm Damage Provision
acct_description: A noncash adjustment to the provision established for storm damage by an oil, gas, or utility company.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Liabilities of Business Transferred under Contractual Arrangement (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: In a transaction not treated as a divestiture for accounting purposes and in which the disposed operation is not consolidated for accounting purposes, the aggregate amount of the disposed liabilities that are segregated in the balance sheet.

acct_label: Concentration Risk, Net Assets Amount, Geographic Area
acct_description: Carrying amount of total assets less total liabilities of a designated geographic area if disclosed as a concentration risk.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Other Real Estate
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of other real estate investments held by the entity for investment purposes not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

acct_label: Undistributed Continuing Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Diluted
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to participating securities for diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

acct_label: Undistributed Discontinued Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Diluted
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations allocated to participating securities for diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) from Real Estate Investment Partnership
acct_description: Amount of net income (loss) recognized from investments in real estate partnerships and variable interest entities.

acct_label: Available-for-sale, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Other, Percentage of Nonperforming Assets
acct_description: This item represents the percentage of nonperforming assets that the underlying assets in the security represent and which were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Investment Income, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net gains or losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to investment income from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Deposits Received for Securities Loaned, at Carrying Value
acct_description: The amount of cash received as security in return for loaning securities to another party.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Investment Holdings Movements, Issuances (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Represents increases to the amount of certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) due to issuances received from the investee during the period. The alternative investments represented by this item are subject to significant unobservable inputs (Level 3) for purposes of measuring fair value.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Investment Holdings Movements, Net (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Represents the net increase or decrease to the amount of certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) due to purchases, sales, issuances, or settlements during the period. The alternative investments represented by this item are subject to significant unobservable inputs (Level 3) for purposes of measuring fair value.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Investment Holdings Movements, Sales (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Represents decreases to the amount of certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) due to the sale of investments made during the period. The alternative investments represented by this item were subject to significant unobservable inputs (Level 3) for purposes of measuring fair value.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Investment Holdings Movements, Settlements (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Represents decreases to the amount of certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) due to settlements (withdrawals, distributions) received from the investee during the period. The alternative investments represented by this item were subject to significant unobservable inputs (Level 3) for purposes of measuring fair value.

acct_label: Guaranteed Benefit Liability, Gross (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Sum of the amount of expected guaranteed benefits in excess of the projected account balances for minimum guaranteed benefit contracts as of the balance sheet date for all guaranteed benefit types.

acct_label: Guaranteed Benefits Incurred (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Total of amount of guaranteed minimum benefit expense incurred during the period presented, resulting in an increase to the liability for expected guaranteed minimum benefits in excess of projected account values, for all guaranteed benefit types.

acct_label: Guaranteed Benefits Paid (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Total amount of guaranteed minimum benefit payments to policyholders and contract holders, during the period presented, resulting in a decrease to the liability for expected guaranteed minimum benefits in excess of projected account values, for all guaranteed benefit types.

acct_label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Benefits Paid (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of guaranteed minimum benefit payments to policyholders and contract holders, during the period presented, resulting in a decrease to the liability for expected guaranteed minimum benefits in excess of projected account values.

acct_label: Net Amount at Risk by Product and Guarantee, Weighted Average Attained Age (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Weighted average attained age of all policyholders or contract holders in the specified guarantee type and subset of guarantee class.

acct_label: Number of Credit Risk Derivatives Held
acct_description: Number of credit risk derivative instruments held.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense, Accrued Interest
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination from accrued interest on unamortized balance.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Accumulated Depreciation
acct_description: The accumulated depreciation and amortization related to the asset(s) sold in connection with the property sold to another party and leased back to the seller.

acct_label: Traditional Life, Interest Rate, High End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Maximum interest rate for traditional life contracts in the range of interest rates used to calculate future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and related expenses less the present value of future net premiums using assumptions such as estimates of expected investment yields, mortality, morbidity, terminations and expenses, applicable at the time the insurance contracts are made and costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process of traditional life.

acct_label: Traditional Life, Interest Rate, Low End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Minimum interest rate for traditional life contracts in the range of interest rates used to calculate future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and related expenses less the present value of future net premiums using assumptions such as estimates of expected investment yields, mortality, morbidity, terminations and expenses, applicable at the time the insurance contracts are made and costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process of traditional life.

acct_label: Payables for Congressionally Mandated Assessments
acct_description: Amount payable for Congressionally mandated Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments, for example, but not limited to, Resolution Funding Corporation (REFCORP) assessments.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Unamortized Purchase Premium (Discount)
acct_description: Amount of unamortized purchase premium (discount) on financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Primary Beneficiary, Maximum Loss Exposure, Amount
acct_description: Amount of maximum exposure to loss from involvement with consolidated variable interest entity (VIE).

acct_label: Convertible Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The maximum number of nonredeemable convertible preferred shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

acct_label: Cost of Gold Products and Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred related to exploration, development, mining, processing and providing mining support activities related to gold.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, (Gain) Loss on Settlement of Other Claims, Net (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reorganization items related to net gain (loss) on settlement of other claims for entities in bankruptcy.

acct_label: Deferred Finance Cost, Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The charge during the period representing the systematic and rational allocation of deferred finance costs over the term of the debt arrangement to which it pertains.

acct_label: Due to Other Related Parties, Current (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate obligations owed to related parties other than affiliates, officers or stockholders (for example, owner's immediate families or employee pension trusts) at the financial statement date. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Dividend Payments (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of dividends expected to be paid to holders of the underlying shares or contracted instruments over the term of the instruments life.

acct_label: Inventory, Ore Stockpiles on Leach Pads, Gross
acct_description: Amount before last-in first-out (LIFO) and valuation reserves of ore stockpile material contained on a leach pad, for example, but not limited to, copper or gold ore.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Significant Noncash Items Other than Depreciation, Depletion, and Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of significant noncash items other than depreciation, depletion, and amortization expense attributed to a reportable segment.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Additional Series, Value (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Value of each additional class of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Dividend (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Total dividends declared for each class of preferred stock.

acct_label: Reclamation and Mine Shutdown Provision
acct_description: Adjustment of the mine reclamation or mine shutdown liability account that is made when estimates of future costs are changed.

acct_label: Redeemable Preferred Stock (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate value of all preferred stock outstanding, that embody an unconditional obligation requiring the issuer to redeem the instrument by transferring its assets at a specified or determinable date (or dates) or upon an event certain to occur, including convertible preferred, excluding additional paid in capital, at the financial statement date.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Impact of Changes in Fair Value of Shares on Amount
acct_description: Increase (decrease) in settlement amount from change in fair value of issuer's equity shares. For example, but not limited to, issuer obligated to pay an additional Y dollars in cash for each $1 decrease in the fair value of one share.

acct_label: Stock Converted from One Class to Another Class, Value (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Value of stock that was converted from one type or class to another during the period. Conversion may be among classes of common or nonredeemable preferred stock or from common stock or nonredeemable preferred stock to nonredeemable preferred stock or common stock, respectively.

acct_label: Cash and Securities Segregated under Securities Exchange Commission Regulation
acct_description: Cash and securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers.

acct_label: Fair Value, Equity, Level 2 to Level 1 Transfers, Amount
acct_description: Amount of transfers of financial instruments classified in shareholders' equity measured on a recurring basis out of level 2 of the fair value hierarchy into level 1.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Available-for-sale Securities
acct_description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Participating Mortgage Loans, Participation Liabilities, Amount
acct_description: The aggregate amount of the participation liability at the end of the accounting period.

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Period Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The net change during the reporting period in proved reserves that may be the result of revisions in previous estimates, improved recovery, purchases of new reserves, extensions, discoveries, production, sales of reserves, and other actions which result in net changes.

acct_label: Securities Segregated under Securities Exchange Commission Regulation
acct_description: Fair value of securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers.

acct_label: Share of Equity Method Investees' Property Acquisition, Exploration, and Development Costs Incurred in Oil and Gas Producing Activities (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The enterprise's share of the investees' property acquisition, exploration, and development costs incurred in oil and gas producing.

acct_label: Supplemental Information for Property, Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Maximum Interest Rate in Range (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The maximum interest rate in the range of rates estimated at which the discount was computed for each business segment reported.

acct_label: Supplemental Information for Property, Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Minimum Interest Rate in Range (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The minimum interest rate in the range of rates estimated at which the discount was computed for each business segment reported.

acct_label: Accrued Exchange Fee Rebate, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for rebates of an exchange fee some mutual funds impose on shareholders if they exchange (transfer) to another fund within the same fund group. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Loss on Contract Termination for Default
acct_description: The amount of the loss on termination of a contract for default.

acct_label: Recorded Third-Party Environmental Recoveries, Net
acct_description: Present value of the asset for third-party recoveries related to environmental remediation obligations as of the balance sheet date (if the receivable is discounted).

acct_label: Reorganization Value, Net Realizable Value of Asset Dispositions
acct_description: Amount of reorganization value related to estimated net realizable value of asset dispositions. Reorganization value is the amount attributed to the reconstituted entity, as well as the expected net realizable value of those assets that will be disposed before reconstitution occurs.

acct_label: Retail Land Sale Receivables, Weighted Average Interest Rate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: States the weighted average interest rate on accounts receivable from retail land sales.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a disposal group, which is allocated to the operations of the closed block.

acct_label: Average Production Costs Per Barrel of Oil Equivalents (BOE) (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Production costs incurred in lifting the oil and gas to the surface during the reporting period divided by the number of barrels of oil equivalents (BOE) produced. Production (or lifting costs) are costs incurred in lifting the oil and gas to the surface and generally include gathering, treating, primary processing, field storage, property taxes and insurance on proved properties, but do not include depreciation, depletion, accretion, amortization, royalties, income taxes, interest, general and administrative and other expenses.

acct_label: Average Sales Prices
acct_description: The revenues derived from sales of oil or gas in each geographic area during the reporting period divided by the number of barrels of oil produced or thousands of cubic feet of gas produced.

acct_label: Derivative, Average Forward Exchange Rate (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The average contractual rate at which a foreign currency can be purchased or sold under the terms of a group of foreign currency derivative contracts.

acct_label: Derivative, Average Forward Exchange Rate
acct_description: Average contractual rate at which a foreign currency can be purchased or sold.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Offered Quotes (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Price at which a dealer is willing to buy an instrument, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Delivery Commitments and Contracts, Fixed Price
acct_description: The delivery price committed to in the contract.

acct_label: Productive Gas Wells, Number of Wells, Gross
acct_description: The total number of producing gas wells and gas wells capable of production, in which the entity owns an undivided working interest.

acct_label: Wells in Process of Drilling
acct_description: The number of wells in the process of being drilled in each geographic area as of the date listed.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Measurement Input
acct_description: Value of input used to measure debt instrument, including, but not limited to, convertible and non-convertible debt.

acct_label: Fair Value Assumptions, Weighted Average Expected Dividend (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Weighted average expected dividend for an entity using a valuation technique with different dividend rates during the contractual term.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Life Insurance Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in life insurance liability balances during the period.

acct_label: Assets under Management, Carrying Amount
acct_description: The carrying amount of assets an investment adviser manages on behalf of investors.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Charges, Investing
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in noncurrent deferred charges, classified as investing activities.

acct_label: Purchase Options, Land
acct_description: Carrying amount of an option or options to acquire real property.

acct_label: Derivative, Cap Interest Rate
acct_description: Cap rate on an interest rate derivative such as an interest rate cap or collar. If market rates exceed the cap rate, a payment or receipt is triggered on the contract.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, Unrealized Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, before reclassification adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

acct_label: Concessions Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred and are directly related to generating concessions revenue.

acct_label: Concessions Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue earned during the period from concessionaires, other than and excluding concessions earned by hospitality entities (hotels, casinos, cruise lines). An example of a concession is the right to sell souvenirs, food, and beverages at a sporting event.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments, Rolling Year Three (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of benefits from a defined benefit plan expected to be paid in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) Other Noncontrolling Interests, Nonredeemable
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to other nonredeemable noncontrolling equity holder.

acct_label: Occupancy Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue derived from the provision of short term lodging; it does not apply to lease or rental income. Includes hotel rooms, cruise revenue, and other revenue related to lodgings.

acct_label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Shares Approved for Issuance
acct_description: The maximum number of shares (or other type of equity) that have been approved for issuance in the equity-based payment transaction.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration Arrangements, Change in Amount, Contingent Assets and Liabilities, Recognized, Liability (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the amount of any change, including any differences arising upon settlement, recognized during the reporting period in the value of a recognized liability arising from a contingency, assumed in a business combination.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Estimated Future Retirement Benefits Covered by Insurance Contract, Amount
acct_description: Amount of future annual benefit for defined benefit plan participant covered by insurance contract. Includes, but is not limited to, contract issued by employer or its related party.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability Value (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a liability measured at fair value using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3) which is required for reconciliation purposes of beginning and ending balances.

acct_label: Performance Fees (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenue earned by the entity based on the investment results achieved. Excludes fees based upon a percentage of the assets under management not performance-related.

acct_label: Time Sharing Transactions, Allowance for Uncollectible Accounts on Receivables Sold with Recourse
acct_description: Allowance for uncollectible accounts on receivables sold with recourse at the end of the period.

acct_label: Impact of Restatement on Opening Retained Earnings, before Tax (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before tax of cumulative effect of restatement on the opening retained earnings of the earliest year presented.

acct_label: Payments to Employees
acct_description: Payments of cash to employees, including wages and salaries, during the current period.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Other
acct_description: Other increase (decrease) in number of shares reserved for issuance under non-option equity instrument agreements that is not separately disclosed.

acct_label: Accrual for Taxes Other than Income Taxes (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Initial Franchise Fees
acct_description: The amount of initial franchise fees.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Change in Present Value, Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, from change in present value of expected cash flows.

acct_label: Capitalized Costs, Mineral Interests in Proved Properties
acct_description: Capitalized costs of proved properties that include fee ownership or a lease, concession, or other interest representing the right to extract oil or gas subject to such terms as may be imposed by the conveyance of that interest.

acct_label: Capitalized Costs, Mineral Interests in Unproved Properties
acct_description: Capitalized costs of unproven properties that include fee ownership or a lease, concession, or other interest representing the right to extract oil or gas subject to such terms as may be imposed by the conveyance of that interest.

acct_label: Gas Balancing Volume Amount
acct_description: The amount of the gas imbalance in terms of units of measure (Mcf) as of the end of the period.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Cost of Oil and Gas Reclamation
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in accrued costs that represent future cash outlays for restoration and reclamation of oil and gas producing properties.

acct_label: Due to Employees
acct_description: Amounts due to employees, not to include stockholders or officers.

acct_label: Government Contract Receivable
acct_description: The amount of receivables that are derived from government contracts.

acct_label: Payments for Repurchase of Initial Public Offering
acct_description: The cash outflow associated with the repurchase of amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

acct_label: Termination Loans
acct_description: Definite liabilities to third parties under a termination loan agreement, whether or not guaranteed in whole or in part by the government.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Conversion Price, Increase
acct_description: Per share increase in conversion price of debt instrument. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Long-term Debt and Capital Securities
acct_description: Total interest expense on long-term debt and capital securities.

acct_label: Reinsurance Retention Policy, Amount Retained
acct_description: Stated amount that is the upper retention limit per entity policy.

acct_label: Reinsurance Retention Policy, Excess Retention, Amount Reinsured
acct_description: Amount of risk reinsured in excess of stated retention per company policy.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Cumulative Catch-up Adjustment to Revenue, Modification of Contract
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in revenue recognized for cumulative catch-up adjustment from contract modification which (increases) decreases obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets Level 3 Reconciliation, Increase for Purchase
acct_description: Amount, measured using unobservable input, of increase in plan asset of defined benefit plan from purchase.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, Contractually Required Payments Receivable at Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of contractually required payments receivable at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Financial Instruments, Owned, Corporate Equities, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in corporate stocks (common and preferred), stock options, warrants and any other financial instrument which represents, or provides the ability to obtain, ownership rights in a corporation. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

acct_label: Financial Instruments, Owned, Derivatives and Other Contractual Agreements, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in all assets resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments. Their value is derived from the values of one or more underlying assets, reference rates, or indices of asset values. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

acct_label: Financial Instruments, Owned, Other Sovereign Government Obligations, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in fixed income obligations issued by foreign governments. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Sold, Not yet Purchased, Corporate Debt
acct_description: Fair value of obligations arising from corporate debt obligations sold short.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Sold, Not yet Purchased, Corporate Equities
acct_description: Fair value of obligations arising from corporate equity sold short.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Sold, Not yet Purchased, Other Sovereign Government Debt
acct_description: Fair value of obligations arising from foreign government debt obligations short.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Sold, Not yet Purchased, State and Municipal Government Obligations
acct_description: Fair value of obligations arising from state and municipal debt obligations sold short.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Sold, Not yet Purchased, US Government and Agency Obligations
acct_description: Fair value of obligations arising from US treasury and other US government and agency debt obligations sold short.

acct_label: Floor Brokerage, Exchange and Clearance Fees
acct_description: The amount of expense during the period for floor brokerage fees paid to other broker-dealers to execute trades on their behalf, stock exchange fees, order flow fees, and clearance fees.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Receivables from Brokers-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due to the entity related to activities and operations with other broker dealers, and clearing organizations, including deposits.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Fair Value Adjustments on Other Assets (Liabilities) Carried at Fair Value under Fair Value Option
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value adjustment on other assets (liabilities) carried at fair value under the fair value option on the statement of cash flows of Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Receivables under Repurchase Agreements
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due the entity under agreements to sell and repurchase securities.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Securities Borrowed
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due the entity arising from securities borrowed transactions.

acct_label: Weighted Average Rate, Interest-bearing Foreign Deposits, Point in Time
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate calculated at point in time for foreign deposit liability.

acct_label: Capital Units, Value
acct_description: Value of capital units or capital shares. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

acct_label: Interest Income, Securities, US Treasury and Other US Government
acct_description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on U.S. Treasury securities and other U.S. government securities.

acct_label: Payments for Operating Activities
acct_description: Total amount of cash paid for operating activities during the current period.

acct_label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Securities, Operating Activities
acct_description: Cash received from maturities, prepayments and calls of trading securities and other securities, classified as operating.

acct_label: Deposit Assets, Amortizaton Expense from Expirations
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense from expiration of contracts underlying deposit assets.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Fair Value of Shares Subject to Repurchase Obligation
acct_description: Fair value of the shares allocated that are subject to a repurchase obligation.

acct_label: Due from Correspondent Brokers
acct_description: Amount receivable from correspondent broker-dealer.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) Due from Other Related Parties
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in receivables due from related parties classified as other.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling Year Four and Five
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the fourth and fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Net Capital
acct_description: Net capital is equal to the net worth of the broker dealer, less certain items such as exchange memberships, carrying value of securities not readily marketable, haircuts on marketable securities in proprietary accounts, furniture and equipment and other illiquid assets as defined.

acct_label: Receivables from Clearing Organizations
acct_description: Amount of right to receive cash and securities on deposit with clearing organizations. Clearing organizations perform post trade processing and trade comparisons among numerous broker-dealers and act as settlement agents between buying and selling broker-dealers.

acct_label: Securities Failed-to-Deliver
acct_description: Amount receivable as the result of a fail-to-deliver. A fail-to-deliver is a securities sale to another broker-dealer that has not been delivered to buying broker-dealer by the close of business on the settlement date.

acct_label: Securities Segregated under Other Regulations
acct_description: Fair value of securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to regulations other than SEC Regulations and the Commodity Exchange Act.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Capital Securities
acct_description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on capital securities issued by the reporting entity.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Previously Unissued Stock by Subsidiary or Equity Investee, Nonoperating Income
acct_description: The profit or loss on sales of previously unissued stock by subsidiaries or equity investees made to investors outside the consolidated group that is not reported as operating income. Represents the difference in the parent company's carrying amount of the equity interest in the subsidiary or equity investee immediately before and after the transaction.

acct_label: Sale of Stock, Percentage of Ownership before Transaction
acct_description: Percentage of subsidiary's or equity investee's stock owned by parent company before stock transaction.

acct_label: Warrant, Exercise Price, Increase
acct_description: Per share increase in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

acct_label: Office of Finance, Cost Assessed on Federal Home Loan Bank
acct_description: Amount of a Federal Home Loan Bank's (FHLBank) proportionate share of the costs of operating the Office of Finance.

acct_label: Inventory, Buildings and Improvements
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of building structures held as inventory including any additions, improvements, or renovations to those structures.

acct_label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Nonfinancial Assets Pledged as Security, Value
acct_description: The value of assets other than financial instruments pledged to provide security to a suppler under a recorded unconditional purchase obligation arrangement.

acct_label: Realized Gain (Loss) on Marketable Securities and Cost Method Investments, Excluding Other than Temporary Impairments, and Other Investments (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the net total realized gain (loss) included in earnings for the period as a result of selling or holding marketable securities categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, including the unrealized holding gain or loss of held-to-maturity securities transferred to the trading security category and the cumulative unrealized gain or loss which was included in other comprehensive income (a separate component of shareholders' equity) for available-for-sale securities transferred to trading securities during the period. Additionally, this item would include any gains (losses) realized during the period from the sale of investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting and/or investments that are separately or otherwise not categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity.

acct_label: Business Acquisitions, Purchase Price Allocation, Year of Acquisition, Net Effect on Income
acct_description: The net effect on income before taxes of the amortization and accretion of premiums, discounts and intangible assets in the year of acquisition, when the assets of the acquired institution exceed 10 percent of the consolidated assets at the end of the most recent period.

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

acct_label: Competitive Energy Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from selling electricity supply in a retail access program.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Price Risk Cash Flow Hedge Ineffectiveness
acct_description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings during the period due to ineffectiveness in price risk cash flow hedges.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Preferred Unit Holders (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of net Income or Loss for the period allocated to noncontrolling preferred unit holders in an entity included in the reporting entity's consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Limited Partners Units
acct_description: The cash inflow from the issuance of preferred limited partners units during the period.

acct_label: Amount of Embedded Regulatory Asset
acct_description: Discloses amount of embedded regulatory assets within the plant accounts. This may result when the regulatory depreciable life is longer than the depreciable life generally used for nonregulatory accounting.

acct_label: Cost of Purchased Water
acct_description: Cost of water purchased, may include any water related assessment. If water is bought on a unit volume basis, would also be considered as commodity costs.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Water and Waste Water Systems
acct_description: The cash outflow for the purchase of a facility and equipment that provides water supply which includes wells, reservoirs, pumping stations, and control facilities; and waste water systems which includes the waste treatment and disposal facility and equipment to households and industry.

acct_label: Survey Charges Amount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Discloses the period end balance sheet amount of capitalized survey charges.

acct_label: Partners' Capital
acct_description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Approved Return on Equity, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of public utility's approved return on equity.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Common
acct_description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to regulated assets common to business units.

acct_label: Long-term Construction Loan, Noncurrent
acct_description: This element represents the noncurrent portion of a long-term real estate loan to finance building costs. The funds are disbursed as needed or in accordance with a prearranged plan; generally, a portion of the funds is disbursed at inception and the remainder as construction progresses. The money is repaid on completion of the project (generally one to seven years), usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property.

acct_label: Derivative, Swap Type, Fixed Price
acct_description: Fixed price related to the price risk swap derivative.

acct_label: Noninterest Expense Transfer Agent and Custodian Fees
acct_description: Fees paid to an agent employed by a corporation or mutual fund to maintain shareholder records, including purchases, sales, and account balances. Also includes custodian fees incurred during an accounting period from an agent, bank, trust company, or other organization that holds and safeguards an individual's, mutual fund's, or investment company's assets for them. These fees will be billed back to the client and are a component of noninterest expense.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Related Receivable Carrying Value, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The portion of the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of a recorded receivable related to a loss contingency accrual that is expected to be collected after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. For example, an insurance recovery receivable to the extent that the insurance recovery is probable and does not exceed the amount of the loss previously recognized in the financial statements.

acct_label: Prepaid Interest
acct_description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for interest that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Sponsor Fees
acct_description: Fees paid to advisors who provide certain management support and administrative oversight services including the organization and sale of stock, investment funds, limited partnerships and mutual funds.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Available-for-sale Securities, Short-term
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) through acquisition (sale) of short-term available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Drafts Payable
acct_description: Amounts due on drafts payable on the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Fair Value, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity Measured on Recurring Basis, Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized (holding) gain (loss) which is included in the statement of income (or changes in net assets) related to those financial instruments classified in shareholders' equity still held at the reporting date for which fair value is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

acct_label: Other Significant Noncash Transaction, Value of Consideration Given (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The value of the noncash (or part noncash) consideration given (for example, liability, equity) in a transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of a transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Gross, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in asbestos and environmental claims reserve, before estimated recoveries from reinsurers.

acct_label: Supply Commitment, Remaining Minimum Amount Committed
acct_description: The floor amount as of the balance sheet date that the entity must expend to satisfy the terms of disclosed arrangements (excluding long-term commitments) in which the entity must commit resources to supply goods or services to one or more customers.

acct_label: Energy Related Inventory, Coal
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of coal, which is a combustible rock or minerals which are extracted from the ground and used as fuel.

acct_label: Long-term Contract for Purchase of Electric Power, Share of Plant Output Being Purchased
acct_description: Share of plant output being purchased under a long-term contract to purchase electricity from a production plant constructed and financed by a public utility district, cooperative, or other organization.

acct_label: All Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Not Accounted for Using Income Recognition Model
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer, for which it was deemed probable at acquisition that the investor would be unable to collect all contractually required payments, and to which the income recognition total model was not applied.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, Not Accounted for Using Income Recognition Model, at Acquisition
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the acquisition date of loans to which the income recognition total model was not applied. This relates to loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer, for which it was deemed probable at acquisition that the investor would be unable to collect all contractually required payments.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Allowance for Loan Losses, Decreases (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Reduction in the reserve for loans impairments as a result of current information and events which result in it being probable that estimated cash flows will be significantly higher than previously expected or because actual cash flows are significantly greater than cash flows previously expected. This relates to loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Allowance for Loan Losses, Decreases
acct_description: Amount of reduction in the reserve for loans impairments as a result of current information and events which result in it being probable that estimated cash flows will be significantly higher than previously expected or because actual cash flows are significantly greater than cash flows previously expected for loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Credit Derivative, Purchased Credit Protection
acct_description: Amount of purchased credit protection expected to cover future payments under the credit risk derivative.

acct_label: Customer's Liability for Acceptances, Net
acct_description: The aggregate of all customer's outstanding debt to the institution that resulted from short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by an institution (also known as banker's acceptance transactions), net of allowance for uncollectible customer's liability for acceptances.

acct_label: Deposit Liabilities, Collateral Issued, Financial Instruments
acct_description: Amount of securities, mortgage loans, or other financial instruments pledged as collateral for deposits.

acct_label: Guaranty Fee Income (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the portion of monthly guaranty fees collected representing the interest imputed and recognized under the prospective interest method on the present value of the contractually stipulated guarantee payments at inception of the contract.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, after Reclassification Adjustment, Tax
acct_description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, before Tax, after Reclassification Adjustment
acct_description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Derecognition, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk, realized upon derecognition of financial liability measured under fair value option.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Derecognition, Tax
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk, realized upon derecognition of financial liability measured under fair value option.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, Unrealized Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, Tax
acct_description: Amount, before reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk on financial liability measured under fair value option.

acct_label: Threshold Percentage of Value Decline in Equity Securities to be considered Other than Temporary Impairment
acct_description: Threshold percentage by which investments in equity securities have declined in value to be considered other than temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Trade Receivables Held-for-sale, Reconciliation to Cash Flow, Deductions from Held-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of deductions to trade receivables held-for-sale, after allowance for bad debt, that are not part of a disposal group.

acct_label: Effect of Fourth Quarter Events, Amount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the item included in the fourth quarter that affected period-to-period comparability (excluding restatement adjustments), or the extraordinary item or unusual or infrequent item recognized in the fourth quarter in the absence of either a fourth-quarter report or disclosure in the annual report for the fourth quarter.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Maximum Interest Rate in Range (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The highest stated interest rate within the mortgage loans included in the loan grouping.

acct_label: Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Minimum Interest Rate in Range (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The lowest stated interest rate within the mortgage loans included in the loan grouping.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

acct_label: Property Management Fee, Percent Fee
acct_description: The percentage charged for managing real estate properties.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
acct_description: Amount of accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Retainage, after Year One
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer withheld under retainage provision in long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, to be collected after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Retainage, Year One
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer withheld under retainage provision in long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, to be collected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Effects of Cash Flow Hedges Not Considered in Calculating Ceiling Limitation, Amount
acct_description: Amount that would have been charged to income had the effects of the cash flow hedges not been considered in calculating the ceiling limitation at an oil and gas producing company subject to the full cost rules.

acct_label: Other Derivatives Not Designated as Hedging Instruments Assets at Fair Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value of all derivative assets not designated as a hedging instrument.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Total of all Partners' Capital (deficit) items which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest).

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserve, Improved Recovery (Energy)
acct_description: Energy measure of increase in quantity of proved reserve of oil and gas resulting from application of improved recovery techniques, stated in a unit of energy. For example, but not limited to, barrel of oil equivalents (BOE) or one thousand cubic feet of natural gas equivalent (Mcfe).

acct_label: Proved Developed and Undeveloped Reserves, Improved Recovery
acct_description: Changes in proved reserve estimates resulting from application of improved recovery techniques.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Revenue, Other
acct_description: Other revenues from oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Removal Costs
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the costs of disposing of plant, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.

acct_label: Effect on Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) Due to Change in Measurement Date, before Tax (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Before tax adjustment increasing or decreasing accumulated other comprehensive income due to a change in the measurement date for a defined benefit pension and other postretirement plan in the initial application of the measurement provisions of FAS 158.

acct_label: Effect on Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit) Due to Change in Measurement Date, before Tax (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Before tax adjustment decreasing or increasing retained earnings due to a change in the measurement date for a defined benefit pension and other postretirement plan in the initial application of the measurement provision of FAS 158.

acct_label: Translation Adjustment Functional to Reporting Currency, Gain (Loss), Reclassified to Earnings, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount of reclassification from other comprehensive income (loss) to earnings, after tax, related to translation from the functional currency to reporting currency, as a result of the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity.

acct_label: Translation Adjustment Functional to Reporting Currency, Loss (Gain), Reclassified to Earnings, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amounts reclassified from other comprehensive income to earnings during the period related to translation from functional currency to reporting currency, as a result of the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity. Net of tax effect.

acct_label: Amount of Deferred Costs Related to Long-term Contracts
acct_description: Amount of deferred costs for long-term contracts and programs. Includes, but is not limited to, initial tooling costs and deferred production costs.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Royalty, Gross (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of an acquired contractual arrangement associated with the payment of royalties covering a specified period of time.

acct_label: Cost of Domestic Regulated Gas Revenue (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The cost of generation, transmission, and distribution of [natural] gas, which are regulated by a federal, state, or local government or agency.

acct_label: Direct Operating Cost, Royalty Expense (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Royalty expense incurred and are directly related to goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

acct_label: Regulated Operating Revenue, Field Services
acct_description: The amount of regulated field services operating revenues recognized during the period.

acct_label: Subsequent Event, Effect of Change in Tax Status
acct_description: Monetary effect of a change in the tax status effective after year-end but before the financial statements for the reporting period are issued or available to be issue by the entity.

acct_label: Derivative, Average Swaption Interest Rate
acct_description: Average fixed interest rate that will be received or paid upon exercise of a group of interest rate swaption contracts.

acct_label: Direct Costs of Hotels (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate direct costs incurred in operating leased, owned and other hotels.

acct_label: Payment for Incentive Fee
acct_description: Amount paid for incentive rights held by the managing member or general partner, of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Real Estate Held-for-investment
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other real estate held for investment not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

acct_label: Revenue from Hotels (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount, net of promotional allowances, of revenue from managing and operating hotels, including, but not limited to, revenue from occupancy, casino, food and beverage, and retail. Excludes operating lease income.

acct_label: Deferred Taxes, Business Combination, Valuation Allowance, Available to Reduce Intangible Assets
acct_description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded in a business combination against deductible temporary differences for which related tax benefits will be recorded as a reduction of the acquired entity's other noncurrent intangible assets if those tax benefits subsequently become realizable.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Property, Plant, and Equipment Other, Accumulated Depreciation
acct_description: Amount of accumulated depreciation on leased long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale meeting the criteria for capitalization, classified as other.

acct_label: Real Estate Taxes and Insurance
acct_description: The aggregate total of real estate taxes and insurance expense.

acct_label: Retail Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents revenues generated by or derived from a hotel's, or cruise line's, owned retail store operations.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Purchase
acct_description: Amount of increase from purchase of accounts receivable.

acct_label: Gas and Oil Area, Undeveloped, Gross
acct_description: Lease area in which a working interest is owned and on which wells have not been drilled or completed to a point that would permit the production of commercial quantities of oil and gas regardless of whether or not such area contains proved reserves.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Approved Equity Capital Structure, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of public utility's approved equity to capital, including debt and equity.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Expenses, Gross
acct_description: Total expenses of a HCO before stop-loss insurance recoveries. Costs of services rendered (including costs of services rendered but not yet reported).

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Medical Supplies and Drugs Expense (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of medical supplies consumed, for example, but not limited to, bandages, syringes and drugs, for patient care.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Patient Service Revenue Less Provision for Bad Debts
acct_description: Amount of patient service revenue, net of contractual allowances and discounts, less the related provision for bad debts.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Patient Service Revenue Provision for Bad Debts
acct_description: Amount of the provision for bad debts related to patient service revenue.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Revenue Net of Patient Service Revenue Provisions
acct_description: Amount of patient service revenue recognized, net of contractual allowances and discounts, less the provision for bad debts related to patient service revenue plus all other revenue.

acct_label: Malpractice Insurance, Annual Coverage Limit
acct_description: Annual coverage limit provided by the insurance arrangement for malpractice claims.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Claims Incurred, Net
acct_description: Amount of costs associated with malpractice claims and insurance premiums incurred during an accounting period, less insurance recoveries and returns of previously paid premiums.

acct_label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock for Employee Tax Withholding Obligations (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for repurchase of common stock to satisfy employee tax withholding obligations for stock issued as part of an employee benefit plan.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Transfer to Trading, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Includes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) previously recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Commercial, Industrial, and Agricultural Loans
acct_description: Interest and fee income generated from all commercial, industrial, and agricultural loans.

acct_label: Interest Income, Other Domestic Deposits
acct_description: Amount of interest earned on US domestic deposits classified as other. Excludes money market accounts.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Commitments to Purchase or Sell
acct_description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans and leases for which agreements to acquire or dispose exist.

acct_label: Proceeds from Time Deposits Accepted
acct_description: Cash received from customers who deposit money in checking and similar accounts at a financial institution.

acct_label: Unamortized Loan Commitment and Origination Fees and Unamortized Discounts or Premiums, Commercial (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the cumulative amount of fees paid by commercial borrowers which have not yet been taken into income and unamortized costs incurred to originate commercial loans and leases, unamortized commercial loan commitments and commercial loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of commercial loans that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield.

acct_label: Subordinated Liabilities, Extinguished
acct_description: Liabilities that are subordinated to claims of general creditors and were paid or extinguished during the reporting period.

acct_label: Contracts in Force Subject to Participation Through Reinsurance, Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The value of insurance contracts that are subject to reinsurance participation agreements (risk assumed from other insurers).

acct_label: Participating Insurance, Amount in Force
acct_description: Amount of participating insurance in force.

acct_label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Portion of Excess Retained Earnings Not Taxed
acct_description: The amount of retained earnings as of the balance sheet date in excess of statutory unassigned surplus on which no income tax provisions have been made.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain Reclassified to Investment Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of gains on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to investment income from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Held-to-maturity Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Disposals of Loans (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Sale or transfer of a loan during the period that results in a reduction in the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment. This relates to loans accounted for as a held-to-maturity debt security, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Fair Value, Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Federal Funds Sold and Securities Borrowed or Purchased under Agreements to Resell (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position asset caption which represents a class of assets, or which may include an individual asset, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Federal Funds Purchased and Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position liability caption which represents a class of liabilities, or which may include an individual liability, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Gain (Loss) Included in Trading Revenue (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of the total realized and unrealized gains or losses for the period which are included in the statement of income (or changes in net assets) in trading revenue; the fair value of which liabilities was or is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

acct_label: Good Faith and Margin Deposits with Broker-Dealers
acct_description: Amount of right to receive cash and securities on deposit with broker-dealers to demonstrate an intention to complete a purchase (good faith deposit) and collateral deposited by counterparty to cover the credit risk assumed (margin deposit).

acct_label: Hedged Asset, Fair Value Hedge
acct_description: Amount of asset hedged in fair value hedging relationship.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Trade Financing
