acct_description: Interest and fee income generated by trade financing. Trade financing is a specialized area of commercial lending frequently used by businesses that engage in international activities. Such financing includes open account financing, sales on consignment, documentary collections, advances against collections, letters of credit, bankers' acceptances, factoring, and forfeiting.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Foreign, Commercial (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of loans to entities involved in commercial enterprises, not originated within the country of domicile of the reporting entity. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Recognized in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

acct_label: Registration Payment Arrangement, Maximum Potential Consideration
acct_description: Describes the maximum potential amount of consideration, undiscounted, that could be transferred under the registration payment arrangement.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Aggregate Amount of Redemption Requirement
acct_description: Aggregate amount of redemption requirements for each class or type of redeemable stock classified as temporary equity for each of the five years following the latest balance sheet date. The redemption requirement does not constitute an unconditional obligation that will be settled in a variable number of shares constituting a monetary value predominantly indexed to (a) a fixed monetary amount known at inception, (b) an amount inversely correlated with the residual value of the entity, or (c) an amount determined by reference to something other than the fair value of issuer's stock. Does not include mandatorily redeemable stock. The exception is if redemption is required upon liquidation or termination of the reporting entity.

acct_label: Guarantor Obligations, Liquidation Proceeds, Percentage
acct_description: Indicates, if estimable, (as a percentage) the approximate extent to which the proceeds from liquidation of any assets held either as collateral or by third parties would be expected to cover the maximum potential amount of future payments under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees.

acct_label: Cost, Direct Labor
acct_description: Cost of labor directly related to good produced and service rendered. Includes, but is not limited to, payroll cost and equity-based compensation.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Amortized Cost, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Curtailment, Tax Effect (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Tax effect of curtailment of a plan resulting from a plan amendment that occurred during the period. The benefit has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost.

acct_label: Lessor, Sales-type Lease, Assumptions and Judgments, Value of Underlying Asset, Amount
acct_description: Amount that lessor expects to derive from underlying asset following end of sales-type lease term.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Senior Debt Obligations (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Excise Taxes Collected
acct_description: The excise taxes collected by a public utility and reported in revenues if the amount of excise taxes is equal to 1 percent or more of such total.

acct_label: Segment Reporting, Other Significant Reconciling Item, Reconciling Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: For a significant segment item of information disclosed (for example, liabilities) other than profit/loss, revenues, or assets, the total of reconciling items between the total over reportable segments of the significant segment item and the consolidated entity total of the significant segment item.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies, Discount
acct_description: Amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce (reconcile) the undiscounted amount of the accrual for environmental loss contingencies to the present value.

acct_label: Capital Leases of Lessee, Contingent Rentals, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
acct_description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the lessee's capital lease.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Receivable, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of receivable related to a loss contingency accrual that is expected to be collected after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. For example, an insurance recovery receivable.

acct_label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of expense reported during the period resulting from the transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

acct_label: Troubled Debt Restructuring, Debtor, Current Period, Gain (Loss) on Restructuring, Per Share, Net
acct_description: Provide the per share amount of gain (loss), after the impact of income taxes, on restructuring of payables (or debt) for all restructuring gains (losses) (in aggregate) during the period.

acct_label: Inventory, Finished Homes
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of homes that have been finished and are ready for sale, net of valuation allowance and impairment loss.

acct_label: Capitalized Exploratory Well Cost, Greater than or Equal to Two Years and Less than Three Years, Number of Projects (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The number of projects related to the amount of capitalized exploratory costs that have been capitalized for a period greater than or equal to two years but less than three years after completion of drilling at balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capitalized Exploratory Well Costs, Greater than or Equal to One Year and Less than Two Years (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of capitalized exploratory well costs that have been capitalized for a period greater than or equal to one year but less than two years after the completion of drilling at balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capitalized Exploratory Well Costs, Greater than or Equal to Two Years and Less than Three Years (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of capitalized exploratory well costs that have been capitalized for a period greater than or equal to two years but less than three years after the completion of drilling at balance sheet date.

acct_label: Capitalized Exploratory Well Costs, Thereafter (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of capitalized exploratory well costs that have been capitalized for a period greater than or equal to five years after completion of drilling at balance sheet date.

acct_label: Distribution Made to Limited Liability Company (LLC) Member, Cash Distributions Paid
acct_description: Amount of cash distribution paid to unit-holder of limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Gas and Oil Area, Undeveloped, Net
acct_description: Fractional interest owned based on working interests or other economic arrangements of lease area on which wells have not been drilled or completed to a point that would permit the production of commercial quantities of oil and gas regardless of whether or not such area contains proved reserves.

acct_label: Interest and Dividends Payable (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of (a) interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred, and (b) dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding (also includes dividends collected on behalf of another owner of securities that are being held by the entity). For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Redeemable Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The maximum number of redeemable preferred shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

acct_label: Sales of Oil and Gas Prospects (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue derived from sale of oil and gas exploratory and developmental prospects.

acct_label: Marketable Securities, Restricted (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Total debt and equity financial instruments including: (1) securities held-to-maturity, (2) trading securities, and (3) securities available-for-sale that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Deferred Tax Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary difference assumed at the acquisition date that are classified as current.

acct_label: Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Hedged Item in Foreign Currency Fair Value Hedge
acct_description: Amount of the increase (decrease) in fair value of the hedged item in a foreign currency fair value hedge which was recognized in earnings, net of offsets by the gain (loss) on the hedging instrument to the extent that the fair value hedge was determined to be effective.

acct_label: Transfers of Financial Assets Accounted for as Sale, Initial Fair Value of Assets Obtained as Proceeds
acct_description: Represents the initial fair value recorded for assets received on transfer of financial assets in a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or a similar transfer which transaction is recognized as a sale of the transferred financial assets.

acct_label: Other Ownership Interests, Contributed Capital
acct_description: The amount of capital contributed by other unit holders.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Components Excluded from Assessment of Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Effectiveness
acct_description: The net gain (loss) included in earnings for the period relating to components of the gain (loss) on interest rate cash flow hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness.

acct_label: Amount of Regulatory Costs Not yet Approved
acct_description: Amount of regulatory costs not yet approved by the regulatory authority.

acct_label: Customer Refundable Fees, Refund Payments
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow to customers for refund payments.

acct_label: Forward Contract Indexed to Issuer's Equity, Settlement Alternatives, Shares, at Fair Value
acct_description: Number of shares as a settlement alternative for each freestanding forward contract.

acct_label: Utilities Operating Expense, Purchased Power under Long-term Contracts
acct_description: Amount of operating expense for purchased power procured under arrangements extending beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, by regulated operation.

acct_label: Deferred Purchased Power Costs
acct_description: Costs of power used for operations in prior periods that were expected to be recovered from customers in future periods.

acct_label: Bankruptcy Claims, Number of Claims Settled
acct_description: The aggregate number of claims settled.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Interest Income on Accumulated Cash (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reorganization items related to interest income on accumulated cash.

acct_label: Fair Value Assumption, Date of Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement, Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Servicing Assets or Liabilities, Discount Rate
acct_description: Discount rate which is used to value residual cash flows generated by financial assets of the securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer for initial fair value measurement.

acct_label: Fair Value Assumption, Date of Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement, Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Servicing Assets or Liabilities, Prepayment Speed
acct_description: Estimated rate of prepayment of principal on financial assets for initial fair value measurement.

acct_label: Fair Value Assumption, Date of Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement, Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Servicing Assets or Liabilities, Weighted Average Life (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average life of securitized assets. This is used as a key input and assumption in measuring the fair value of assets obtained or liabilities incurred that relate to a transferor's continuing involvement, if any, at the time of securitization, asset-backed financing, or similar transfer.

acct_label: Cumulative-Effect Adjustment, Application of Fair Value Option, Unrealized Gains, Recognized (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of previously recognized gross gains included in accumulated other comprehensive income that make up a cumulative-effect adjustment on retained earnings related to the election of the fair value option.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Change in Present Value, Interest Income
acct_description: Amount of interest income on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), from change in present value of expected cash flows, attributable to passage of time.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Increase
acct_description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and beneficial interest, purchased with credit deterioration.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Change in Present Value, Interest Income
acct_description: Amount of interest income on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), from change in present value of expected cash flows, attributable to passage of time.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Nonaccrual
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) on nonaccrual status.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Amount at Purchase Price
acct_description: Amount at purchase price of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), purchased with credit deterioration.

acct_label: Deposit Liabilities Reclassified as Loans Receivable (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of deposits held by the entity that have been reclassified as loan balances receivable, such as overdrafts receivable, at the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Dividend Income, Equity Securities, Operating
acct_description: Amount of dividend income on investment in equity security, classified as operating.

acct_label: Gain from Components Excluded from Assessment of Fair Value Hedge Effectiveness
acct_description: Gain relating to components of the gain (loss) on the fair value hedging instrument excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness. Recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Loans Receivable Held-for-sale, Reconciliation to Cash Flow, Additions to Held-for-sale
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for bad debt, of additions to loan receivables held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group.

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Recovery from Third Party of Environmental Remediation Cost (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the estimated recovery from third parties recorded in the period pertaining to product liability damages from specified products.

acct_label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of Other than 10 or 20 Percent Adverse Change in Discount Rate
acct_description: The hypothetical financial impact of a specified adverse percentage change in discount rate on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Shares Held in Employee Stock Option Plan, Allocated
acct_description: Number of allocated shares held by the Employee Stock Option Plan at balance sheet date. Allocated shares are shares that have been assigned to individual participant accounts based on a known formula.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Adjusted Balance (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of stockholders' equity attributable to parent entity and noncontrolling interests (previously referred to as minority interests) net of the cumulative effect of prospective application of a new accounting principle on the beginning balance of equity.

acct_label: Cumulative Dividends
acct_description: Amount of cumulative cash dividends distributed to shareholders.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Amount of Acquisition Adjustments (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition adjustments included in property, plant and equipment (PPE) for utilities.

acct_label: Collateral Securities Repledged, Delivered, or Used
acct_description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of securities received as collateral from a counterparty that were re-pledged, sold, delivered or otherwise reused by the entity.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle Presented on Income Statement, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the effect on net income, net of income taxes, of a change in accounting principle reported on the income statement in the period, which occurred before retrospective adjustments were required, recognized by the economic entity. The economic entity includes both controlling and noncontrolling interests.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Change in Present Value, Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), from change in present value of expected cash flows.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Cash Award Granted, Amount
acct_description: Amount of commitment made to pay deferred cash remuneration.

acct_label: Investment Company, Voluntary Fee Waived
acct_description: Amount of fee voluntarily waived by investment company.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Foreign, Net of Deferred Income (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the net carrying amount of foreign loans and leases held in portfolio, after deducting deferred income, but before deducting the allowance for losses on foreign loans and leases.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Interest Earning Assets
acct_description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in other interest earning assets not separately disclosed.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Supplies
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for supplies that provide economic benefits in future periods.

acct_label: Payments for Brokerage Fees
acct_description: The amount of cash paid for brokerage fees during the current period. This element is intended to represent the brokerage fees paid by and between financial industry participants.

acct_label: Deferred Finance Costs, Own-share Lending Arrangement, Issuance Costs, Adjustment
acct_description: The amount of any adjustment recognized to the balance of unamortized issuance costs associated with a share-lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing, due, for example, to default by the share borrower.

acct_label: Due to Employees, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amounts due to Employee, not to include stockholders or officers, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).

acct_label: Gross Billing, Agent Transaction
acct_description: Amount of consideration expected to be received as agent for product and service transferred to customer by another party, before deduction of payment for product and service provided by that party.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Income Tax Contingencies
acct_description: The amount of income taxes included in liabilities subject to compromise.

acct_label: Proceeds, Accounts Receivable, Previously Written Off, Recovery
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of accounts receivable previously written off.

acct_label: Adjustment for Long-term Intercompany Transactions, Tax Benefit (Expense) (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Tax effect of current period adjustment resulting from gains and losses on intercompany foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, that is, settlement is not planned or anticipated in the foreseeable future. Applies when the entities to the transaction are consolidated, combined, or accounted for by the equity method in the reporting entity's financial statements. Reported in equity as part of accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Deferred Set-up Costs, Current
acct_description: Deferred incremental direct costs incurred typically at a contract's inception so that the company may be in a position to fulfill all contractual obligations of an arrangement. The costs are directly related to specified activities under the arrangement and are deferred in order to match revenue that will be recognized within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Derivative, Foreign Currency Option Strike Price
acct_description: The strike price on the foreign currency option contract such as a put option or a call option.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Payments under Bankruptcy Court Order for Other Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow to creditors related to liabilities subject to compromise pursuant to bankruptcy court orders for liabilities classified as other.

acct_label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Number of Aircraft Sold
acct_description: The number of aircraft sold by the entity during the period.

acct_label: Business Combination, Assets Arising from Contingencies, Amount Recognized
acct_description: The amount, measured at acquisition-date fair value, of all the assets acquired that arise from contingencies and were recognized by the entity.

acct_label: Deferred Storm and Property Reserve Deficiency, Current
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized storm costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Gas Balancing Receivable
acct_description: Change in the balance of the gas balancing receivable account. Gas imbalances occur when the entity sells more or less than its entitled ownership percentage of total gas production. If the entity receives less than it is entitled, the underproduction is recorded as a receivable.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Approved Debt Capital Structure, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of public utility's approved debt to capital, including debt and equity.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Amount of Acquisition Adjustments, Related Accumulated Depreciation
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) for acquisition adjustments on accumulated depreciation included in long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale for utilities.

acct_label: Distributions on Mandatorily Redeemable Securities
acct_description: Amount of distributions during the period on mandatorily redeemable securities.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic and Diluted
acct_description: The amount of income (loss) derived from discontinued operations during the period, net of related tax effect, per each basic and diluted limited partnership and general partnership unit when the per unit amount is the same for both basic and diluted units.

acct_label: Minimum Rents (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the minimum amount of rents earned during the period from lessees based on the terms of contractual arrangements.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Operating Partnerships (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of net Income or Loss for the period allocated to noncontrolling partners in an operating partnership included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: Operating Lease, Initial Direct Cost Expense, over Term
acct_description: Amount of operating lease initial direct cost recognized as expense over lease term.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Acquisitions
acct_description: Change in the number of units for each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to acquisitions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Redeemed
acct_description: The number of units redeemed during the year of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

acct_label: Partners' Capital, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of partners' capital (deficit), including portions attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

acct_label: Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Life Used for Depreciation (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The estimated economic life on which depreciation in the latest income statement was computed, typically stated in number of years (such as 5 or 4.5).

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Stock Dividend (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Number of shares issued during the period as a stock dividend.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Investment Holdings Movements, Purchases (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Represents increases to the amount of certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) due to purchases of or additional investments made during the period. The alternative investments represented by this item are subject to significant unobservable inputs (Level 3) for purposes of measuring fair value.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Realized Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of realized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Unrealized Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss), not recognized in income statement, from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Hedging Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from a financial instrument or a contract used to hedge price changes in underlying assets, and which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of after a year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Cash and Cash Equivalents
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Share-based Compensation, Nonvested Shares, Requisite Service Period Recognition (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the amount of recognized equity-based compensation related to nonvested shares during the period, that is, the amount recognized as expense in the income statement (or as asset if compensation is capitalized).

acct_label: Guaranty Assets
acct_description: The carrying amount of the contractual right to receive fees, as compensation in exchange for providing a guarantee to a third party, over life of the guarantee.

acct_label: Interest Expense on Prepetition Liabilities Recognized in Statement of Operations
acct_description: The amount of interest expense on prepetition obligations included in the statement of operations.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Expense (Income) Items (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of changes in liabilities subject to compromise Due to income and expense items (such as interest on prepetition liabilities, employee related accruals, asbestos obligations, environmental contingencies, income tax contingencies and other liabilities) since bankruptcy filing date.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Measurement Period Adjustment, Increase (Decrease) in Effective Tax Rate
acct_description: Percentage of increase (decrease) in effective tax rate for measurement period adjustment from accounting for tax effect pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

acct_label: Alternative Investment, Measurement Input
acct_description: Value of input used to measure alternative investment.

acct_label: Related Parties Amount in Cost of Sales
acct_description: Amount included in cost of sales related to transactions with related parties incurred and recorded in the statement of operations for the period.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Limited Liability Company (LLC) Members' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of ownership interest in a limited liability company (LLC), including portions attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests.

acct_label: Members' Capital
acct_description: Amount of member capital in limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Distribution Made to Limited Partner, Cash Distributions Paid
acct_description: Amount of cash distribution paid to unit-holder of limited partnership (LP).

acct_label: General Partners' Capital Account
acct_description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Unit-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital account for unit-based payment arrangement issued by partnership. Partner includes, but is not limited to, general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Customer Refund Liability, Noncurrent
acct_description: Noncurrent regulatory liabilities generally represent obligations to make refunds to customers for various reasons including overpayment.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Accounts Payable
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to accounts payable.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Accrued Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to accrued liabilities.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Assets
acct_description: Total fresh-start adjustment to assets.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Common Stock
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to common stock.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Current Assets
acct_description: Total fresh-start adjustment to current assets.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Current Liabilities
acct_description: Total fresh-start adjustment to current liabilities.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Deferred Income Tax Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to noncurrent deferred income tax assets.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to deferred income tax liabilities.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Liabilities
acct_description: Total fresh-start adjustment to liabilities.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Liabilities and Stockholders' Equity
acct_description: Total fresh-start adjustment to liabilities and stockholders' equity.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Liabilities Subject to Compromise
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to liabilities subject to compromise.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Long-term Debt
acct_description: Total fresh-start adjustment to long-term debt.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Other Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to total other noncurrent assets.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Other Noncurrent Obligations
acct_description: The total of the amount of fresh-start adjustments to other noncurrent obligations.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Preferred Stock
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to preferred stock.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Prepaid and Other Current Assets
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to prepaid and other current assets.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Receivables, Net
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to receivables.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to current restricted cash and cash equivalents.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Stockholders' Equity
acct_description: Total fresh-start adjustment to stockholders' equity.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Postconfirmation Credit Facility
acct_description: Amount of long-term postconfirmation date credit facility at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Deferred Tax Assets, Current
acct_description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards acquired at the acquisition date, classified as current.

acct_label: Effect on Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit) Due to Change in Measurement Date, Tax (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Tax effect of adjustment decreasing or increasing retained earnings due to a change in the measurement date for a defined benefit pension and other postretirement plan in the initial application of the measurement provision of FAS 158.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Gain (Loss) on Asset Sales, Net
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on asset sales, reported as a reorganization item.

acct_label: Earnest Money Deposits
acct_description: A deposit made by a purchaser of real estate to evidence good faith. It is customary for a buyer to give the seller earnest money at the time a sales contract is signed. The earnest money generally is credited to the down payment at closing, which is applied at closing as a component of payment against the purchase price.

acct_label: Long-term Purchase Commitment, Minimum Volume Required
acct_description: Volume that must be purchased within the specified time period of the agreement to avoid penalties or unfavorable effects on pricing, among other adverse consequences.

acct_label: Option Indexed to Issuer's Equity, Indexed Shares
acct_description: The number of issuer's shares to which the option contract is indexed.

acct_label: Option Indexed to Issuer's Equity, Strike Price (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The exercise (or strike) price stated in the contract. The fixed price at which the option holder can purchase, in the case of a call option, or sell, in the case of a put option, on the underlying security.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Public Sale of Units
acct_description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Stockholders' Equity
acct_description: Total stockholders' equity at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Production, Barrels of Oil Equivalents
acct_description: Energy measure of oil and natural gas production reserves.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Change of Amount as Result of Variable Components
acct_description: Amount of change that payments under a contractual obligation might vary as facts and circumstances change.

acct_label: Other Ownership Interests, Units Issued
acct_description: The number of units of other ownership interests issued in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

acct_label: Real Estate Liabilities Associated with Assets Held for Development and Sale
acct_description: For banks, amount of all liabilities for which a financial institution is required to include in its calculation of net investment in real estate assets held for development or sale.

acct_label: Accrued Exchange Fee Rebate
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for rebates of an exchange fee some mutual funds impose on shareholders if they exchange (transfer) to another fund within the same fund group.

acct_label: Impaired Assets to be Disposed of by Method Other than Sale, Carrying Value of Asset
acct_description: The carrying amount on the books of the entity of the impaired asset to be disposed of by a method other than sale.

acct_label: Unsuccessful Business Combination Costs (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of direct costs of an unsuccessful business combination including legal, accounting, and other costs that were charged to expense during the period, but may have been capitalized had the contemplated transaction been completed.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeited in Period, Intrinsic Value (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The intrinsic value of equity-based payment equity instruments, excluding stock or unit options, that were forfeited during the reporting period, as calculated by applying the disclosed pricing methodology.

acct_label: Fair Value, Recurring Basis, Unobservable Input Reconciliation, Asset (Liability), Gain (Loss), OCI
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset (liability) measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Transferor and Transferee, Receipts on Transferor's Interest in Transferred Financial Assets, Other
acct_description: Cash flows between transferor and a transferee attributable to the transferor's interests related to a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor will have continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Transferor and Transferee, Repayments of Servicing Fee Advances
acct_description: Cash flows between transferee and transferor in repayment of service fee advances, in advance of a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Transferor and Transferee, Servicing Fee Advances
acct_description: Cash flows between transferor and transferee in payment of service fees in advance, prior to or in contemplation of a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor will have continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction (including, but not limited to, servicing, recourse, and restrictions on transferor's interests in the transferred financial assets).

acct_label: Real Estate Owned, Valuation Allowance, Component
acct_description: The valuation allowance loss on real estate owned or any impairment losses taken against real estate investments held for use or resale.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost, Disposals
acct_description: Amount conveyed to unrelated parties of contract to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Portion of Future Oil and Gas Production Being Hedged
acct_description: The quantity of future oil and gas production being hedged.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Expense, Other
acct_description: Other costs for oil and gas producing activities.

acct_label: Use of Restricted Cash for Acquisition of Oil and Gas Property (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The cash outflow from the amount of cash specifically reserved for the acquisition of oil and gas property.

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Loss Exposure in Excess of Accrual, Low Estimate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Low-end of the range estimate of the reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of the amount accrued for damages pertaining to a specified product.

acct_label: Revenue from Collaborative Arrangement, Excluding Revenue from Contract with Customer
acct_description: Amount of revenue from collaborative arrangement. Excludes revenue from contract with customer under Topic 606.

acct_label: Derivative, Forward Price
acct_description: The forward price on the price risk forward or futures contract, such as a gas futures contract.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Insurance Recoveries
acct_description: Amount of insurance recoveries recognized from insurance and similar arrangements for reimbursement and payment of malpractice claims recognized during an accounting period.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Waste Water Systems
acct_description: The cash outflow for the purchase of waste water systems which includes the waste treatment and disposal facility and equipment to households and industry.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Water Systems
acct_description: The cash outflow for the purchase of a facility and equipment that provides water supply which includes wells, reservoirs, pumping stations, and control facilities.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Amount of Allowance for Funds Used During Construction, Equity Costs Capitalized Only for Rate-making Purposes
acct_description: Amount of costs of debt and equity financing capitalized for setting rates but not capitalized for financial statement purposes.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Original Cost of Intangible Utility Plants
acct_description: Original cost of establishing intangible utility plants.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Plant Acquisition Adjustments for Intangible Utility Plants
acct_description: Any changes made to the acquisition costs of intangible utility plants.

acct_label: Servicing Asset, Measurement Input
acct_description: Value of input used to measure servicing asset.

acct_label: Accrued Sales Commission (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for sales commissions. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Time Sharing Transactions, Weighted Average of Stated Interest Rates for Notes Receivable (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Weighted average of stated interest rates of notes receivable.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Other Related Parties, Current
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in related party payables classified as other, due within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Financial Instruments Used in Operating Activities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value of other financial instruments used in operating activities.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Amount of Loss (Recovery) on Plant Abandonment
acct_description: Amount of loss (recovery of loss) related to a plant abandonment.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain Reclassified to Cost of Sales (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of gains on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to cost of sales from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Loss Reclassified to Other Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to other expense from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Loss Reclassified to Revenue (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to revenues from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Cost of Services, Licenses and Maintenance Agreements (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost of generating revenue from multiple-deliverable arrangements that include licensing fees and maintenance revenue. Licensing revenue is consideration received from another party for the right to use, but not own, certain of the entity's intangible assets. Licensing arrangements include, but are not limited to, rights to use a patent, copyright, technology, manufacturing process, software or trademark. Licensing fees are generally, but not always, fixed as to amount and not dependent upon the revenue generated by the licensing party. An entity may receive licensing fees for licenses that also generate royalty payments to the entity. Maintenance revenue is derived from maintenance services provided under contracts or arrangements with clients. Services may include the maintenance of software, plant and equipment, and facilities.

acct_label: Deferred Costs, Leasing, Net, Noncurrent
acct_description: This element represents costs incurred by the lessor that are (a) costs to originate a lease incurred in transactions with independent third parties that (i) result directly from and are essential to acquire that lease and (ii) would not have been incurred had that leasing transaction not occurred and (b) certain costs directly related to specified activities performed by the lessor for that lease. Those activities are: evaluating the prospective lessee's financial condition; evaluating and recording guarantees, collateral, and other security arrangements; negotiating lease terms; preparing and processing lease documents; and closing the transaction. The costs represented by this element are those costs not expected to be recognized in (amortized to) earnings within one year from the date of the statement of financial position or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Revenue
acct_description: Amount of direct financing lease revenue.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Transfer to Trading, Unrealized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive (available-for-sale) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) previously recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

acct_label: Prescription Drug Benefit, Effect of Subsidy on Net Periodic Postretirement Benefit Cost (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the effect of the government subsidy for prescription drug benefits on the measurement of net periodic postretirement benefit cost for the current period. That effect includes (1) any amortization of the actuarial experience gain, (2) the reduction in current period service cost due to the subsidy, and (3) the resulting reduction in interest cost on the accumulated postretirement benefit obligation as a result of the subsidy. Disclosure relates to the first period in which an employer includes the effects of the subsidy in measuring the accumulated postretirement benefit obligation and net periodic postretirement benefit cost.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Real Estate Held-for-investment
acct_description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with the purchase (sale) of real estate held for investment, as opposed to operating, purposes.

acct_label: Environmental Exit Costs, Reasonably Possible Additional Losses, Low Estimate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Low-end estimate of the reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of the amount accrued for remediation, site restoration, postclosure, monitoring commitments, or other exit costs associated with the sale, disposal or abandonment of a particular property resulting from unanticipated contamination of the assets.

acct_label: Insurance Investment Income
acct_description: Investment income associated with the company's insurance services.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Partners' Capital
acct_description: Changes in the ownership interest during the period of each class of partners. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
acct_description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Contract Receivable Retainage, Year Two
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Cumulative Sinking Fund Payments
acct_description: Cumulative amount paid into a fund, which is used to retire the debt instrument.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Hybrid Instrument, Net
acct_description: Amount of the unrealized gain (loss) in earnings for the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value on hybrid instruments measured at fair value.

acct_label: Adjustments to Reconcile Income (Loss) to Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Continuing Operations (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The sum of adjustments which are added to net income to reflect net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

acct_label: Long-term Contract for Purchase of Electric Power, Amount of Long-term Debt or Lease Obligation Outstanding
acct_description: Under long-term contracts with public utility districts, cooperatives or other organizations, a utility company receives a portion of the output of a production plant constructed and financed by the district or cooperative. The utility has only a nominal or no investment at all in the plant but pays a proportionate part of the plant's costs, including debt service.

acct_label: Long-term Contract for Purchase of Electric Power, Annual Minimum Debt Service Payment Required
acct_description: Under long-term contracts with public utility districts, cooperatives or other organizations, a utility company receives a portion of the output of a production plant constructed and financed by the district or cooperative. The utility has only a nominal or no investment at all in the plant but pays a proportionate part of the plant's costs, including debt service. If the utility is obligated to pay certain minimum amounts which cover debt service requirements whether or not the plant is operating, the amount can be disclosed here.

acct_label: Long-term Contract for Purchase of Electric Power, Estimated Annual Cost
acct_description: Estimated annual cost to purchase electricity under a long-term contract from a production plant constructed and financed by a public utility district, cooperative, or other organization.

acct_label: Long-term Contract for Purchase of Electric Power, Interest Included in Contract Charges
acct_description: The allocable portion of interest included in charges under a long-term contract to purchase electric power.

acct_label: Convertible Subordinated Debt, Current
acct_description: The portion of the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment upon liquidation of the entity's assets.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Fossil Fuel Inventories
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of fossil fuel, other than coal, held in inventory.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Rolling after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Foreign Financial Institutions, Actual Deposits
acct_description: The amount of deposits held by branches of foreign institutions.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Rolling after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Direct Operating Communications Costs
acct_description: Communications costs incurred and are directly related to goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

acct_label: Membership Dues Revenue, On-going (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue earned during the period from periodic fees charged to existing members of an association or club. An example would be the monthly/annual dues paid to a gym or workout facility. This element excludes the initial membership fees received on enrollment or registration.

acct_label: Other Direct Costs of Hotels (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Other costs incurred and are directly related to hotel operations.

acct_label: Other Hotel Operating Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenue, generated from managing and operating hotels, classified as other.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Distribution Per Unit of Limited Partner Interest
acct_description: The amount of the distribution per unit of limited partner interest.

acct_label: Secured Demand Notes
acct_description: Represents the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loans made to broker-dealers which are generally secured by marketable securities owned by the borrower broker-dealer but held by the lender, are interest-bearing, and payable upon demand. The right to demand payment may be conditioned upon the occurrence of certain events.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Derivative, Cumulative Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative hedging forecasted acquisition of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Other than Temporary Impairment, Not Credit Loss, Net of Tax, Held-to-maturity, Debt Securities
acct_description: Accumulated other comprehensive loss related to portion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) due to factors other than credit losses on debt securities categorized as held-to-maturity that an entity does not intend to sell and which it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis of the debt security. The amount represented by this item is net of tax, as applicable.

acct_label: Customer Securities for which Entity has Right to Sell or Repledge, Fair Value of Securities Sold or Repledged
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of customer securities accepted as collateral by the entity that it has sold or re-pledged to counterparties as collateral.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Realized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
acct_description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Fair Value, Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Gain (Loss) Included in Trading Revenue (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of the total realized and unrealized gains or losses for the period which are included in the statement of income (or changes in net assets) in trading revenues; the fair value of which assets was or is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) Included in Trading Revenue (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of the total change in unrealized (holding) gains or losses for the period which are included in the statement of income (or changes in net assets) in trading revenue. Such unrealized (holding) gains or losses relate to those liabilities still held at the reporting date for which fair value is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Consumer, Net of Deferred Income (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the net carrying amount of consumer loans and leases held in portfolio, after deducting deferred income, but before deducting the allowance for losses on consumer loans and leases.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, after Reclassification Adjustment, Tax, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option, attributable to parent.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Held-to-maturity Securities
acct_description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Loss, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent, Held-to-maturity Securities
acct_description: Amount after tax of amount of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to parent entity.

acct_label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Other Debt Securities Held-to-maturity
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of other debt securities classified as held to maturity which are owned but transferred to another party to serve as collateral to partially or fully secure a debt obligation, repurchase agreement or other current or potential obligation, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Trading Activity, Loss
acct_description: The loss on trading activities (including both derivative and nonderivative instruments) recognized in the statement of financial performance.

acct_label: Unamortized Loan Commitment and Origination Fees and Unamortized Discounts or Premiums, Consumer (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the cumulative amount of fees paid by consumer borrowers which have not yet been taken into income and unamortized costs incurred to originate consumer loans and leases, unamortized consumer loan commitments and consumer loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of consumer loans that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield.

acct_label: Hedged Asset, Discontinued Fair Value Hedge, Cumulative Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged asset in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk, remaining after discontinued hedge.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Prepayment Rate (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Rate at which loans or a loan portfolio are expected to prepay principal balances, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Probability of Default (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage of likelihood a loan will not be repaid and instead default, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Other Deduction
acct_description: Amount of reduction in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, classified as other.

acct_label: Servicing Liability at Fair Value, Amount
acct_description: Fair value of a liability representing servicing arrangements under which the estimated future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Redeemable Preferred Stock Increase (Decrease) in Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of increase or decrease in redeemable preferred stock outstanding at the balance sheet date, which is preferred stock that embodies an unconditional obligation requiring the issuer to redeem the instrument by transferring its assets at a specified or determinable date (or dates) or upon an event certain to occur, including convertible preferred, excluding additional paid in capital, at the financial statement date.

acct_label: AOCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale with Allowance for Credit Loss, Cumulative Gain (Loss), after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) with allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Investment in Federal Home Loan Bank Stock, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of investments in Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) stock.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverables on Paid Losses, Allowance
acct_description: Amount of valuation allowance for reinsurance recoverables on paid losses.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverables on Unpaid Losses, Allowance
acct_description: Amount of valuation allowance for reinsurance recoverables for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid, and for amounts expected based upon statistical projections and other measures of incurred losses and loss settlement expenses which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

acct_label: AOCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale without Allowance for Credit Loss, Cumulative Gain (Loss), after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) without allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Proceeds from Financing Revenue Received under Leases
acct_description: Financing revenue received under leases during the current period by an entity that provides financial services.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Capital Leased Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount classified as capital leased assets attributable to disposal group, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Proved Property
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property with proven oil and gas reserves.

acct_label: Proceeds from Removal Costs
acct_description: Cash inflow resulting from recoveries, by any means, against the cost of disposing of plant, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.

acct_label: Mineral Properties, Accumulated Impairment
acct_description: The accumulated decrease in the carrying value of the mineral properties as a result of adjustments in estimates of future income generating potential of the mineral property.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Royalty Interests in Mining Properties
acct_description: The cash outflow from the purchase of royalty interests in mining properties is the amount of cash the mineral producer pays the owner of the mine or mineral resource.

acct_label: Facility Membership and Operations Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred during the reporting period related to facility or amenity membership and its operations.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Initial Direct Cost Expense, Commencement
acct_description: Amount of sales-type lease initial direct cost recognized as expense at commencement date.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type lease.

acct_label: Real Estate Inventory, Capitalized Interest Costs, Cost of Sales (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of interest costs that had been capitalized to inventory which were charged to cost of sales during the period.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Interest-bearing
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to vendors that bear interest at either a stated or an imputed rate.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle Presented on Income Statement, Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the effect on net income, net of income taxes, of a change in accounting principle reported on the income statement in the period, which occurred before retrospective adjustments were required, recognized by the economic entity and apportioned to the noncontrolling interests, if any. This amount is the income statement amount which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest).

acct_label: Gas Purchase Payable, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for purchases of natural gas. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Individually Significant Component Disposed of or Held-for-sale, Excluding Discontinued Operations, Attributable to Parent, before Income Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from an individually significant component disposed of or held-for-sale attributable to parent. Excludes discontinued operations.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Sales Payable, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to third parties for oil and gas that has been sold but not delivered. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Own-share Lending Arrangement, Dividends, Not Reimbursed
acct_description: The amount of dividends paid to holders of record of shares of the entity's stock associated with an own-share lending arrangement in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing, which will not be reimbursed by the counterparty (share borrower) to the arrangement.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Acquisitions
acct_description: Change in the different classes of partners' capital accounts during the year due to acquisitions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Payments for Participation Liabilities
acct_description: Cash payments related to participation costs.

acct_label: Reserves, Share of Equity Method Investee's Net Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
acct_description: The proportional interest of net proved oil reserve quantities of equity investees.

acct_label: Amortization of Deferred Acquisition Costs (DAC) (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The periodic expense charged against earnings that represents the sales costs that are associated with acquiring a new customer over the term of the insurance contract.

acct_label: Contract Holder Receivables (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount due from policy contract holders as of the balance sheet date. A contract holder is a person who has an insurance contract in his or her possession or under his or her control. The term is frequently applied to describe the insured, regardless of the ownership of the contract.

acct_label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Continuing Operations
acct_description: Amount of effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances in continuing operations held in foreign currencies. Excludes cash equivalents.

acct_label: Workers' Compensation Liability (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations and payables pertaining to claims incurred of a workers compensation nature. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Underwriters, Promoters, and Employees, Current
acct_description: Amount of obligation to underwriters, promoters, and employees excluding salaries, wages and amount to related party, classified as current.

acct_label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
acct_description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
acct_description: Per unit ownership amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, after tax, available to each outstanding limited partnership and general partnership unit.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic
acct_description: The amount of income (loss) from disposition of discontinued operations available to each limited partnership and general partnership unit during the reporting period, net of tax.

acct_label: Investments in Power and Distribution Projects
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in power and distribution projects that are expected to be realized after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic and Diluted, Net of Tax
acct_description: The amount of net income or loss for the period per each limited partnership and general partnership unit in instances when basic and diluted earnings per unit are the same amount and aggregated on the face of the financial statements. Basic earnings per unit is the amount of net income or loss for the period per unit outstanding during the reporting period. Diluted earnings per unit includes the amount of net income or loss for the period available to each limited and general partnership unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Nonaccrual
acct_description: Amount of accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, on nonaccrual status.

acct_label: Deferred Sales Inducement Cost, Amortization Expense, Accrued Interest
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for deferred sales inducement cost from accrued interest on unamortized balance.

acct_label: Earnings Per Share, Nonrecurring Common Control Intra-Entity Transactions, Per Basic Share, Effect
acct_description: The effect of nonrecurring intra-entity transactions between entities under common control involving long-term assets and liabilities that are not required to be eliminated on basic earnings per share.

acct_label: Amortization of Rate Deferral
acct_description: The periodic expense to reduce the value of the rate deferral asset that is created when utilities under bill customers during periods of rate increases by deferring rate increases. These customers eventually pay higher rates to repay the utility for the rate deferral.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Inventory Acquired
acct_description: "The amount of inventory that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Gross, Incurred Loss (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Increase in asbestos and environmental reserve based on known and estimated costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process, before estimated recoveries from reinsurers.

acct_label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Gross, Incurred Loss
acct_description: Amount, before effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred and costs incurred in the claim settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Change in Tax Rate, Existing Income Tax Expense (Benefit) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and no reasonable estimate is determined.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Officers and Stockholders, Current
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in current obligations (due within one year or one operating cycle) owed to reporting entity's executives and owners.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Not Past Due
acct_description: Amount of accounts receivable not past due, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Originated, More than Five Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of accounts receivable classified as noncurrent originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.
