A change from the application of an accounting principle that is non GAAP to one that is consistent with GAAP is considered to be an error correction.

acct_label: Revenue from Lease or Rental of Property or Equipment (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue earned during the period from leasing or renting out the reporting entity's property or equipment.

acct_label: Supplemental Unemployment Benefits, Continuation of Life Insurance
acct_description: Liability for extension of life insurance coverage in instances where coverage under the plan would otherwise end.

acct_label: Time Sharing Transactions, Deferred Profit
acct_description: Amount of deferred profit on time share sales.

acct_label: Liability for Title Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Incurred but Not Reported (IBNR) (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling unasserted claims estimated to have been incurred by the insureds on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to the existence of a lien, encumbrance, defect or other matter purportedly affecting the title to the interest as insured.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Deferred Income, Consumer (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the cumulative amount of interest and fees paid by consumer loan borrowers which have not yet been taken into income in conformity with GAAP. Also reflects the amount of unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of acquired loans which have been classified as consumer loans by the entity and that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield.

acct_label: Proceeds from Collection of Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The cash inflow from collection of repayments from borrowers on loans that are held with the intention to resell in the near future; includes mortgages and other types of loans.

acct_label: Servicing Assets and Servicing Liabilities at Fair Value, Assumptions Used to Estimate Fair Value, Expected Credit Losses
acct_description: Percentage of contractually collectible principal associated with a financial asset expected not to be collected due to default by the borrower.

acct_label: Gain Contingency, Patents Allegedly Infringed upon, Number
acct_description: Number of entity's patents that another entity has allegedly infringed.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Operating Partnerships
acct_description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling partners in an operating partnership included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive income loss and attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block
acct_description: The sum of cash, cash equivalents, investments and other assets allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Deferred Tax Asset, Net
acct_description: Amount, after valuation allowance and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset pertaining to the closed block.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Equity Securities, Available-for-sale, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of equity securities designated as available for sale, which are allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block. Also a component of change in other comprehensive income in the period, which is reflected in the closed block disclosure.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Fixed Maturity, Available-for-sale, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of investments in debt securities that are deemed to be available for sale that are allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block. Change in fair of such securities is a component of change in other comprehensive income in the period, which is reflected in the closed block disclosure.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Mortgage Loans on Real Estate
acct_description: Carrying amount of investments in mortgage loans on real estate allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Other Closed Block Assets
acct_description: Amount of other assets held by the closed block. Excludes other investments.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Policy Loans
acct_description: Carrying amount of loans to policy holders secured by benefits under insurance policies that are allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Assets and Liabilities, Change in Policyholder Dividend Obligation
acct_description: For the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block, the change in the period in the obligation representing amounts to be distributed to policyholders owning contracts in the closed block. Also a component of change in other comprehensive income in the period, which is reflected in the closed block disclosure.

acct_label: Closed Block Dividend Obligation, Change in Unrealized Investment Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the closed block dividend obligation from the unrealized gain (loss) on investments allocated to the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Dividend Obligation, Effect of Operating Results (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The effect on the dividends to policyholders of the net results of operations (premiums less allocated expenses) for the period of the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Dividend Obligation, Increase (Decrease) for Effect of Operating Results
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the closed block dividend obligation from the effect on dividends to policyholders on the net results of operations for the period of the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Investments, Available-for-sale, Change in Unrealized Appreciation
acct_description: The net increase or decrease in the period in the fair value of the fixed maturity and equity investments designated as available for sale as of the balance sheet date that were allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as a closed block. Also a component of change in other comprehensive income in the period, which is reflected in the closed block disclosure.

acct_label: Closed Block Liabilities
acct_description: For the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets backing them (known as a closed block), the total of future policy benefits, policyholder account balance, policyholder dividend obligation and any other closed block liabilities.

acct_label: Closed Block Liabilities, Other Closed Block Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of liabilities allocated to the closed block, classified as other.

acct_label: Closed Block Dividend Obligation
acct_description: The liability as of the balance sheet date for the excess of the cumulative actual closed block earnings over the cumulative expected (actuarially determined) closed block earnings (each) for the period from the actuarial calculation date to the date of measurement. The excess will result in future dividends to closed block policyholders, unless offset by less favorable than expected future performance of the closed block. The policyholder dividend obligation, which may not have a negative balance, recognizes that a portion of earnings in certain cases will not inure to the stockholders of the insurance entity.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, after Tax Results from Continuing Operations
acct_description: Amount after tax of closed block income from continuing operations.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Benefits and Expense
acct_description: Amount of benefits, claims and expenses that are related to an insurance entity's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block). Includes, but is not limited to, death benefits, matured endowments, participating dividends, general expenses and deferred acquisition costs related to the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Income Taxes
acct_description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit allocated to the operations of the closed block for the period.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Net Investment Income
acct_description: Income for the period from the investments allocated to an insurance entity's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts (known as a closed block), net of investment expenses, which are typically reported in a table of closed block operations.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Other Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense classified as other allocated to the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Policyholder Benefits
acct_description: An expense for the period for estimated policy claims in an insurance entity's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block), as typically reported in a table of closed block operations as part of summarized financial data.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
acct_description: Gains and losses realized for the period from the investments allocated to an insurance entity's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts (known as a closed block).

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Results before Income Taxes
acct_description: The revenues less expenses from operations of the closed block during the period, before income taxes allocated thereto.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Revenue
acct_description: Total revenues from an insurance company's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block).

acct_label: Excess of Reported Closed Block Liabilities over Assets Designated to Closed Block
acct_description: The difference between the liabilities of and the assets allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

acct_label: Interest Rate Exclusive of Immediate, Terminal Funding Annuities, High End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Maximum interest rate in the range of interest rates used to calculate future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and related expenses less the present value of future net premiums using assumptions such as estimates of expected investment yields, mortality, morbidity, terminations and expenses, applicable at the time the insurance contracts are made and cost of settling insured claims and cost incurred in the claim settlement process exclusive of immediate terminal funding annuities.

acct_label: Interest Rate Exclusive of Immediate, Terminal Funding Annuities, Low End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Minimum interest rate in the range of interest rates used to calculate future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and related expenses less the present value of future net premiums using assumptions such as estimates of expected investment yields, mortality, morbidity, terminations and expenses, applicable at the time the insurance contracts are made and cost of settling insured claims and cost incurred in the claim settlement process exclusive of immediate terminal funding annuities.

acct_label: Interest Sensitive Life, Interest Rate Assumptions, High End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The maximum interest rate applied during the stated period to monetary deposits made by or on behalf of policyholders for contracts that may contractually vary the amount and timing of premium payments without the approval of the insurer and in which premium payments are credited to the policyholder balance, against which amounts are assessed for contract services and to which amounts are credited as income. The policyholder balance provides a base upon which interest accrues to the policyholder and, when compared with the death benefit amount, fixes the insurer's net amount at risk. The insurer can often adjust the schedule of amounts assessed for contract services and the rate at which interest is credited to the policyholder balance.

acct_label: Interest Sensitive Life, Interest Rate Assumptions, Low End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The minimum interest rate applied to deposits made by or on behalf of policyholders to contracts that may contractually vary the amount and timing of premium payments without the approval of the insurer and in which premium payments are credited to the policyholder balance, against which amounts are assessed for contract services and to which amounts are credited as income. The policyholder balance provides a base upon which interest accrues to the policyholder and, when compared with the death benefit amount, fixes the insurer's net amount at risk. The insurer can often adjust the schedule of amounts assessed for contract services and the rate at which interest is credited to the policyholder balance. during the stated period.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Loans Pledged for Repurchase Agreements, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of loans that are restricted as collateral for the payment of repurchase agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Distributions Payable to Real Estate Partnerships
acct_description: The cash outflow or inflow increase (decrease) in distribution due to real estate partnership based upon payments and accruals.

acct_label: Marine Services Costs (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred for marine services during the reporting period.

acct_label: Marine Services Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from marine-related services and products such as lubricants for offshore drilling, and retail or wholesale sales in a marina.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Increases (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Gross increase during the period in intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Loans Receivable
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Furniture and Fixtures
acct_description: The cash inflow from sale of furniture and fixtures.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Zero Coupon Notes
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from investments in zero coupon (no stated interest) debt securities.

acct_label: Accrued Participation Liabilities, Due in Next Operating Cycle
acct_description: The amount of accrued participation liabilities that it expects to pay during the upcoming operating cycle.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Land (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Real estate held for productive use subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

acct_label: Film, Monetized in Film Group, Amortization Expense
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

acct_label: Film, Monetized on Its Own, Amortization Expense
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized on its own.

acct_label: Film, Monetized on Its Own, Capitalized Cost
acct_description: Amount of capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized on its own.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Film Costs (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of film costs.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Film Costs
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in direct negative costs incurred in the physical production of a film. Examples include, but are not limited to, costs of story and scenario, compensation, set construction and postproduction costs.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Future Policy Benefit Reserves and Other Insurance Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in estimated future policy benefit obligations under insurance contracts, and obligations under insurance contracts classified as other.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Nonsecuritized Investments Pledged as Collateral, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of investments which are not evidenced by ownership of securities, such as interests in partnerships or other forms of unincorporated entities, which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, and that is reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge such ownership interests.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Other Debt Securities Available-for-sale or Held-for-investment
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of other securities, classified as available for sale or held for investment, which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Reductions in Other Assets, Amount
acct_description: Amount of significant reductions in the period of other assets (current, noncurrent, or unclassified).

acct_label: Carrying Costs, Property and Exploration Rights
acct_description: The costs incurred to retain exploration and property rights after acquisition but before production has occurred. Costs include legal costs for title defense, ad valorem taxes on nonproducing mineral properties, shut-in royalties, and delay rentals.

acct_label: Investment in Physical Commodities
acct_description: Investments held in physical commodities, such as gold, silver, platinum, crude oil, coal, sugar, rice, wheat.

acct_label: Investment in Physical Commodities, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value of investment held in physical commodities, for example, but not limited to, gold, silver, platinum, crude oil, coal, sugar, rice, wheat.

acct_label: Other Construction Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Other costs incurred and are directly related to construction and development services.

acct_label: Auction Market Preferred Securities, Stock Series, Shares Authorized
acct_description: The number of shares of a preferred security the entity has authorized through an auction process.

acct_label: Clearing Fees Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from clearing fees. Clearing fees are charged by an exchange for each contract and trade cleared. There are also clearing fees associated with deliveries, creation of a futures position resulting from an option exercise or assignment, Exchange for Physicals (EFP), block trades, transfer trades and adjustments.

acct_label: Common Stock, Additional Series, No Par Value (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Issuance value per share of additional series of no-par value common stock; generally not indicative of the fair market value per share.

acct_label: Common Stock Held by Subsidiary
acct_description: Value of entity shares held by subsidiary, which are purchased for the purpose of granting the shares to senior employees as part of an employee stock option plan approved by the Entity's Board of Directors. Presented as a reduction of shareholders' equity at their cost to the subsidiary.

acct_label: Distribution Fees (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of fees from providing distribution services, including but not limited to, marketing and selling fund shares, advertising, printing and mailing of prospectuses and sales literature to investors.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Additional Series, No Par Value (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Issuance value per share of no-par value, additional series of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer); generally not indicative of the fair market value per share.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Additional Series, Shares, Outstanding (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate share number for additional series of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders, which is net of related treasury stock.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Vehicles
acct_description: Period end book value of vehicles owned by the public utility.

acct_label: Well Service Expense (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred related to well drilled or completed for the purpose of supporting production.

acct_label: Securities Borrowed, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on security borrowed.

acct_label: Investment Sold, Not yet Purchased, Balance, Principal Amount
acct_description: For investments which are quantified by principal amount, the principle balance held at close of period.

acct_label: Distribution Made to Member or Limited Partner, Cash Distribution (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Cash dividends declared or paid to a common shareholder or unit-holder by LLC or LP.

acct_label: Distribution Made to Member or Limited Partner, Distributions Paid, Per Unit (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Per-share or per-unit cash distributions paid to a common shareholder or unit-holder by an LLC or LP.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

acct_label: Weighted Average Number of Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
acct_description: The average number of limited partnership and general partnership units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per limited partnership and general partnership unit.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Foreign (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of loans and leases to borrowers not within the country of domicile of the reporting entity. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of Income or Loss from continuing operations available to each limited partnership unit in a publicly trade limited partnership or master limited partnership (MLP) during the reporting period. Limited partners have limited liability and do not manage the partnership.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
acct_description: Net income (loss) allocated to each outstanding limited partnership and general partnership unit.

acct_label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership and General Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
acct_description: Weighted average number of limited partnership and general partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership and general partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Includes, for example, the number of units distributed to unit holders whereby unit holders have the ability to elect to receive the unit holders' entire distribution in cash or units of equivalent value or there is a potential limitation on the total amount of cash that all unit holders can elect to receive in aggregate.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Discharge of Claims and Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of reorganization items related to discharge of claims and liabilities upon emergence from bankruptcy.

acct_label: Other Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method
acct_description: Amount of oil and gas properties accounted for using the successful effort method, classified as other.

acct_label: Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Hedged Item in Foreign Currency Fair Value Hedge (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the increase (decrease) in fair value during the period of the hedged item in a foreign currency fair value hedge which was recognized in earnings in the period, net of offsets by the gain (loss) on the hedging instrument to the extent that the fair value hedge was determined to be effective.

acct_label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Premium
acct_description: Disclosure of the unamortized amount of the premium on the note or receivable which is added to the face amount of the receivable or loan. The discount or premium is defined as the difference between the present value and the face amount.

acct_label: Assets Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Carrying Amount
acct_description: Carrying amount of assets sold under agreements to repurchase when the carrying amount (or market value, if higher than the carrying amount) of securities or other assets sold under repurchase agreements exceeds 10 percent of total assets.

acct_label: Assets Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Market Value
acct_description: Market value of assets sold under agreements to repurchase when the carrying amount (or market value, if higher than the carrying amount) of securities or other assets sold under repurchase agreements exceeds 10 percent of total assets.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Covered, Valuation Adjustments
acct_description: Valuation adjustments made to other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Activity for Year, Average Balance of Agreements Outstanding
acct_description: The calculated average balance outstanding for the year for all Federal Home Loan Bank advances as of the Balance Sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Activity for Year, Average Interest Rate for Year
acct_description: The calculated weighted average interest rate for Federal Home Loan Bank advances for the period ended as of the Balance Sheet date.

acct_label: Brokered Natural Gas Margin Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred in brokering natural gas, a result of buying and selling natural gas in back-to-back transactions, during the reporting period.

acct_label: Minimum Remaining Terms of Leases and Concessions on Undeveloped Acreage (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Information about the leases or concessions that will expire on undeveloped acreage controlled by the enterprise. This information is only disclosed if material.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Delivery Commitments and Contracts, Daily Production
acct_description: Amount of daily production of the applicable energy source.

acct_label: Financial Instrument Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Par Value Per Share
acct_description: Par value per share of mandatory redeemable financial instrument classified as liability.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Commercial, Real Estate
acct_description: Interest and fee income generated from loans secured by commercial properties. Examples of properties commonly securing commercial real estate loans may include office buildings, apartment buildings, shopping centers, industrial property, and hotels.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW)
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) demand deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities
acct_description: Aggregate amount of all interest expense on domestic deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Certificates of Deposit
acct_description: Amount of interest expense on domestic certificates of deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Savings
acct_description: Amount of interest expense on domestic savings deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Withdrawal Penalties
acct_description: Early withdrawal penalties on domestic deposits which discourage customer withdrawal prior to maturity.

acct_label: Inventory, Real Estate, Timeshare Available-for-sale
acct_description: Amount of real estate which is available for sale in the form of shared property ownership in which rights vest in several owners (buyers, timeshare holders) to use the property for a specified period each year (timeshare). Included in this item would be real estate assets in which timeshares are for sale, such as in condominiums at timeshare resorts. Excluded from this item would be assets, other than real estate, in which the Entity has sold or intends to sell timeshares, such as for cruises, recreational vehicles, campgrounds, aircraft (fractional ownership) and other types of rights.

acct_label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Money Market
acct_description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Notice of Withdrawal
acct_description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic notice of withdrawal demand deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Savings
acct_description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic savings deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Maximum Number of Shares
acct_description: The maximum number of shares that the issuer could be required to issue to redeem the instrument, if applicable.

acct_label: Time Share Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The costs associated with a property whose ownership is held by a number of people, each with a right of possession for a specified time interval. Time-Sharing is most commonly applied to resort and vacation properties; also known as Vacation Interest. The costs include the costs to build or acquire a vacation project, the estimated cost needed to complete a project under construction, the total revenues expected to be earned on a project, and the projected revenues relating to the recovered purchase on future cancelled sales.

acct_label: Time Share Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue associated with the selling of time shares, a form of property ownership under which a property is held by a number of people, each with a right of possession for a specified time interval. Time sharing is most commonly applied to resort and vacation properties; also known as vacation interest.

acct_label: Weighted Average Rate Domestic Deposit, Notice of Withdrawal
acct_description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic notice of withdrawal demand deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Special Purpose Entity (SPE) and Transferor, Repayments of Servicing Advances (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of cash proceeds received from the securitization SPE to repay the servicing fees advanced by the transferor in advance of the securitization.

acct_label: Equity Method Investment, Deferred Gain on Sale
acct_description: This element represents disclosure of the amount of gain which has been deferred as the result of the sale of a business or operating assets to a highly leveraged entity which deferred gain has been reflected in the accompanying statement of financial position as reduction from the related asset.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Investments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Total investments attributed to the reportable segment, excluding equity method investees. Includes debt and equity financial instruments (securities held-to-maturity, trading securities, and securities available-for-sale) as well as other investments.

acct_label: Time Sharing Transactions, Aggregate Maturities of Notes Receivable, Gross
acct_description: Amount of notes receivable related to time share sales, before allowance for uncollectible accounts and deferred profit.

acct_label: Time-Sharing Transaction, Notes Receivable, Maturity, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Time-Sharing Transaction, Notes Receivable, Maturity, Year Five
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Time-Sharing Transaction, Notes Receivable, Maturity, Year Four
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Time-Sharing Transaction, Notes Receivable, Maturity, Year One
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Time-Sharing Transaction, Notes Receivable, Maturity, Year Three
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Time-Sharing Transaction, Notes Receivable, Maturity, Year Two
acct_description: Amount, before allowance for uncollectible account, of notes receivable for time-sharing transaction maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Gain Contingency, Patents Found Not Infringed upon, Number
acct_description: Number of entity's patents that another entity was found not to have infringed.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Measure of Activity, Income or Loss before Tax
acct_description: Description of the amount of pre-tax income (loss) derived by the reporting entity from the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

acct_label: Alternative Excess Net Capital
acct_description: The amount of net capital in excess of the alternative minimum required net capital.

acct_label: Alternative Net Capital Requirement (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Total net capital requirement computed under the alternative method allowed under regulatory reporting requirements.

acct_label: Net Capital in Excess of Five Percent of Debit Items
acct_description: Net capital less five percent of aggregate debit items.

acct_label: Required Net Capital under Commodity Exchange Act (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net capital required to be maintained under the Commodity Futures Trading Commission's minimum financial requirements, pursuant to the Commodity Exchange Act, less the market value of certain commodity options.

acct_label: Two Percent of Debit Items
acct_description: This element represents the amount of net capital of a broker or dealer that has elected not to be subject to the Aggregate Indebtedness Standard (as defined). The amount of net capital represented by this element is the greater of $250,000 or two percent of aggregate debit items computed in accordance with the Formula for Determination of Reserve Requirements for Brokers and Dealers (as defined).

acct_label: Operating Leases of Lessee, Contingent Rentals, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
acct_description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the lessee's operating lease.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Shares Subscribed but Unissued, Subscriptions Receivable
acct_description: Aggregate monetary value of a new issue of securities which have been allocated to investors to buy. When security is sold on a subscription basis, the issuer does not initially receive the total proceeds. In general, the issuer does not issue the security to the investor until it receives the entire proceeds. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

acct_label: Cumulative-Effect Adjustment, Gross Gains (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The gross gains that make up a cumulative-effect adjustment on retained earnings.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Mandatory Redeemable Capital Securities
acct_description: The cash inflow from issuance of an equity security that embodies an unconditional obligation requiring the issuer to redeem the security by transferring the assets at a specified or determinable date (or dates) that is (or are) initially more than one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer) from the issuance date, or upon an event that is certain to occur beyond one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer) from the issuance date.

acct_label: Cumulative-Effect Adjustment, Application of Fair Value Option, Unrealized Losses, Unrecognized (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of previously unrecognized gross losses that make up a cumulative-effect adjustment on retained earnings related to the election of the fair value option.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturing after Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturing in Next Twelve Rolling Months
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturing in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturing in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank Advances, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturing in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank Advances, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturing in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: General Partners' Capital Account, Period Distribution Amount
acct_description: The total amount of distributions to the general partner during the period.

acct_label: Limited Partners' Offering Costs
acct_description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the limited partners.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Private Placement of Units
acct_description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a private placement.

acct_label: Long-term Notes Payable, Current and Noncurrent (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Payments for Film Costs
acct_description: Cash payments related to direct negative costs incurred in the physical production of a film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Reclassifications from Property, Plant and Equipment
acct_description: Amount of decrease in accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization as a result of reclassifications from property, plant and equipment.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Unrealized Loss (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the gross unrealized losses for securities which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities. Such gross unrealized losses are the excess of the carrying value of the Available-for-sale Securities over their fair value as of the reporting date. Such gross unrealized losses are included in other comprehensive income in the statement of shareholders' equity, unless the Available-for-sale Security is designated as a hedge or is determined to have had an other than temporary decline in fair value below its amortized cost basis. All or a portion of the unrealized holding loss of an Available-for-sale Security that is designated as being hedged in a fair value hedge is recognized in earnings during the period of the hedge, as are other than temporary declines in fair value below costs basis.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Mortgage Warehouse Lending (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of revolving credit lines for to originate and purchase financial assets including, but not limited to, mortgage loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Noncurrent Other Obligations
acct_description: Amount of other noncurrent obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
acct_description: Amount of current restricted cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Measure of Activity, Revenues
acct_description: The amount of income between the reporting entity and the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

acct_label: Distribution Made to Limited Liability Company (LLC) Member, Cash Distributions Declared
acct_description: Amount of equity impact of cash distributions declared to unit-holder of limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Revenue Other Manufactured Products (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenue from the sale of manufactured products, classified as other.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Stock Issued, Own-share Lending Arrangement, Issuance Costs
acct_description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from issuance costs from a share-lending arrangement entered into, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing.

acct_label: Own-share Lending Arrangement, Collateral
acct_description: The amount of collateral required to be received or received by the entity from the counterparty (share borrower) in connection with an own-share lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Interest-bearing, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to vendors that bear interest at either a stated or an imputed rate. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Equity Restrictions
acct_description: Disclosure of the amount of equity that is restricted to use by regulation or agreement.

acct_label: Other Premium Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums recognized as revenue in the period earned on all types of insurance and reinsurance contracts not otherwise specified in the taxonomy after subtracting any amounts ceded to another insurer.

acct_label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net, Life and Annuity
acct_description: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for life and annuity insurance contracts.

acct_label: Open Option Contracts Written, Exercise Price
acct_description: The exercise price of the open option contracts written on the investment.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Available-for-sale Securities
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Proceeds of Other Loans and Leases Held-for-investment
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from loans and leases held-for-investment, classified as other.

acct_label: Shares held in Employee Stock Option Plan, Suspense Shares
acct_description: Number of suspense shares held by the Employee Stock Option Plan at balance sheet date. Suspense shares are shares that have not been released, committed to be released or allocated to individual participant accounts.

acct_label: Nonpatronage Source Earnings
acct_description: The excess or revenues over costs resulting from transactions that do not relate to patrons.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to accumulated depreciation and amortization.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Buildings and Improvements
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to buildings and improvements.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Equipment
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to equipment.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Furniture and Fixtures
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to furniture and fixtures.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Land
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to land.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Debt Issuance Costs
acct_description: Amount of debt issuance costs after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Requested Return on Equity, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of public utility's requested return on equity.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Unfavorable Contract Accrual (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to unfavorable contracts assumed from the acquired entity.

acct_label: Minimum Net Capital Required for Broker-Dealer Subsidiary (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The minimum amount of net capital required to be maintained by the company's broker-dealer subsidiary to engage in securities transactions.

acct_label: Minimum Net Capital Required for Broker-Dealer Subsidiary
acct_description: Minimum amount of net capital required to be maintained by entity's broker-dealer subsidiary to engage in securities transactions.

acct_label: Interest Income, Federal Home Loan Bank Advances
acct_description: Amount of interest income from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances to member financial institutions.

acct_label: Noninterest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Brokered
acct_description: Amount of noninterest-bearing domestic third-party deposits placed by or through the assistance of a deposit broker, also known as brokered deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Distribution and Servicing Fees (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of fees from providing distribution and shareholder services. Distribution services include, but are not limited to, marketing and selling fund shares, advertising, printing and mailing of prospectuses and sales literature to investors. Shareholder services include, but are not limited to, answering shareholder inquiries and providing shareholders with investment information.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Due from Other Related Parties, Current
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in related party receivables classified as other, due within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Leveraged Buyout, Continuing Ownership Interest by Continuing Stockholders (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage of continuing ownership interest by existing shareholders.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Inventory Acquired (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of inventory that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Gross Gains, Derivatives (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents, as of the balance sheet date, the gross gains in accumulated other comprehensive income, a separate component of shareholders' equity, for any derivatives that hedged the forecasted acquisition of held-to-maturity securities.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Gross Losses, Derivatives (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents, as of the balance sheet date, the gross losses in accumulated other comprehensive income, a separate component of shareholders' equity, for any derivatives that hedged the forecasted acquisition of held-to-maturity securities.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling Year Four and Five
acct_description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth and fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Held-to-maturity Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, at Acquisition, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Covered, Disposals
acct_description: Disposals of other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Non Covered, Additions
acct_description: Additions of other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Non Covered, Disposals
acct_description: Disposals of other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Non Covered, Valuation Adjustments
acct_description: Valuation adjustments made to other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Loans Pledged for Federal Home Loan Bank, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of loans that are restricted as collateral for the payment of the FHLB debt obligations, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Loans Pledged for Other Debt Obligations, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of loans which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of other debt obligations, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Debtor-in-Possession Financing, Fee on Unused Borrowings
acct_description: Percentage of fee on unused borrowings under debtor-in-possession financing arrangement.

acct_label: Debtor-in-Possession Financing, Unused Borrowings (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Available additional borrowings under debtor-in-possession financing arrangement.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Other Property and Equipment
acct_description: Amount of other property and equipment at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Noncurrent Other Obligations
acct_description: Amount of other noncurrent obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Other Property and Equipment
acct_description: Amount of other property and equipment at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Discontinued Operations
acct_description: Amount of effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances in discontinued operations held in foreign currencies. Excludes cash equivalents.

acct_label: Assets under Management, Average Balance
acct_description: The average carrying amount of assets managed during the period by the investment advisor on behalf of investors.

acct_label: Noninterest Expense Distribution and Servicing Fees (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Costs related to the marketing and selling of fund shares and servicing proprietary funds. Also includes cost of providing client or shareholder servicing, record keeping, or administrative services, and fund accounting fees, SEC filings, and other maintenance costs.

acct_label: Amount of Impairment to Carrying Amount of Regulatory Assets
acct_description: Discloses the amount of any reduction to the carrying amounts of regulated assets that result from impairment (for example, rate actions of a regulator).

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Gas Delivery (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of public utility natural gas purchases that have been paid but will not be delivered until beyond one year or one operating cycle.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Present Value of Regulated Asset for Plant Abandonment
acct_description: The present value amount of future cost recoveries that are probable and estimable related to plant abandonment's for regulated industries.

acct_label: Deposit Assets or Liabilities, Amortization Expense from Expirations (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The net remaining carrying amount of recorded deposit assets or liabilities charged against earnings pertaining to the expiration of coverage provided by the underlying deposit contracts.

acct_label: Derivative Liability, Number of Instruments Held
acct_description: The number of derivative instruments of a particular derivative liability or group of derivative liabilities held by the entity.

acct_label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Guaranteed Benefit Liability, Gross, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the liability for guaranteed minimum benefits on long-duration contracts.

acct_label: Liabilities for Guarantees on Long-Duration Contracts, Incurred Benefits (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of guaranteed minimum benefit expense incurred during the period presented, resulting in an increase to the liability for expected guaranteed minimum benefits in excess of projected account values.

acct_label: Cost of Services, Overhead (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Indirect expenses and cost incurred associated with services rendered by an entity during the reporting period.

acct_label: Timber Operating Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred in cultivating and manufacturing timber, mill lumber, wood, and wood products during the reporting period.

acct_label: Real Estate Investment Partnership Revenue
acct_description: Amount of revenue recognized from investments in real estate partnerships and variable interest entities.

acct_label: Derivative, Excluded Component, Loss, Recognized in Earnings
acct_description: Amount of loss from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Real Estate Inventory, Construction Materials
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unprocessed goods that will be used in the course of a construction project which will become a part of the finished inventory.

acct_label: Airline Related Inventory, Aircraft Parts, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of plant or equipment components to be used for the primary purpose of air transportation.

acct_label: Warrant, Down Round Feature, (Increase) Decrease in Equity, Amount
acct_description: Amount of (increase) decrease in equity for down round feature triggered for warrant classified as equity.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Covered, Additions
acct_description: Additions of other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

acct_label: Deposits Paid for Securities Borrowed, at Carrying Value
acct_description: This is the amount of cash advanced as security in return for borrowing securities from another party.

acct_label: Forward Contract Indexed to Issuer's Equity, Redeemable Stock, Redemption Requirements, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: For freestanding forward contracts that are indexed to, and potentially settled in an entity's own stock, that has redemption requirements, amount of redemption requirements for all issues of capital stock that are redeemable at fixed or determinable prices on fixed or determinable dates in each of the five years following the date of the latest statement of financial position presented.

acct_label: Option Indexed to Issuer's Equity, Redeemable Stock, Redemption Requirements, Amount
acct_description: Amount of redeemable stock for issue of capital stock that are redeemable at fixed or determinable prices on fixed or determinable dates in each of the five years following the date of the latest statement of financial position presented.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Loans to Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) loans to another FHLBank.

acct_label: Unbilled Change Orders
acct_description: Total amount of unbilled change orders from customers under long-term contracts or programs associated with unpriced change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization.

acct_label: Unbilled Change Orders, Amount Expected to be Collected after One Year
acct_description: Amount of unbilled change orders from customers under long-term contracts or programs associated with unpriced change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization which is expected to be collected after one year from the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Due from Officers or Stockholders, Current
acct_description: Amounts due from owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company, which are usually due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value of obligations attributed to the reportable segment, incurred and payable pertaining to goods and services received from vendors; and for costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred in connection with contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent, salaries and benefits, and utilities.

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Excluding Contract Retainage, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Excluding Contract Retainage, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Capital Leased Assets, Net (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Property, net of accumulated depreciation and amortization, that was originally acquired subject to a financing arrangement classified as a capital lease for accounting and financial reporting purposes which is held for sale apart from normal operations and anticipated to be sold in less than one year.

acct_label: Cost of Other Manufactured Products (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred in production of other products during the reporting period.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Affordable Housing Program, Principal Outstanding
acct_description: Principal amount outstanding of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) relating to the Affordable Housing Program (AHP).

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Loss, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Tax, Attributable to Parent, Held-to-maturity Securities
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to the parent entity.

acct_label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Checking
acct_description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic checking demand deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Time Deposits
acct_description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic time deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Proceeds from Loan Originations (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property) or lease origination. It is through this process that the terms of the mortgage agreement (amount of loan, interest rate, compounding frequency, and so forth) or lease are established and the involved parties legally bind themselves to the transaction.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Insignificant, Employees Covered by Collective-Bargaining Arrangement to All Participants, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of entity's employees covered by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to all participants in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

acct_label: Payments for Affordable Housing Programs
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for payments made by the Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks) to the Affordable Housing Program (AHP).

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Adjustment, before Tax (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: For each annual statement of income presented, the pretax accumulated amounts newly recognized in other comprehensive income (but not yet recognized in net periodic cost), including the net Gain or Loss and net prior service cost (credit) arising during the period, net of reclassification adjustments out of other comprehensive income as a result of being recognized as components of net periodic benefit cost for the period.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Patient Service Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of revenue recognized for providing services to patients, net of provisions for contractual allowances and discounts.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Premium Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of insurance premium revenue recognized.

acct_label: Loans from Other Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) loans from another FHLBank.

acct_label: Long-term Debt of Registrant, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Next Rolling Twelve Months (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt of the registrant maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet presented.

acct_label: Long-term Debt of Registrant, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling after Year Five (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt of the registrant maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet presented.

acct_label: Sales and Excise Tax Payable (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Cost of Other Alternative Energy (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost of other alternative energy used during the reporting period.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs, Amortization Expense, Excluding Accrued Interest
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for deferred policy acquisition costs, excluding accrued interest on unamortized balance.

acct_label: Fair Value, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity Measured on Recurring Basis, Gain (Loss) Included in Investment Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) included in investment income; fair value of which financial instruments classified in shareholders' equity was or is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (level 3).

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity, Purchases (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of purchases of financial instrument classified in shareholders' equity measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity, Transfers, Net (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified in shareholders' equity into (out of) level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Value of Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value of financial instrument classified in shareholders' equity measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Partners' Capital, Distribution Amount Per Share
acct_description: The distribution amount per share for all classes of units.

acct_label: Undistributed Continuing Operation Earnings (Loss), Diluted
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

acct_label: Undistributed Discontinued Operation Earnings (Loss), Diluted
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations, allocated to common stock and participating securities, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

acct_label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Disposals
acct_description: Reduction in valuation allowance of servicing assets based on disposal of the related asset.

acct_label: Statutory Capital and Surplus Applying National Association of Insurance Commissioners (NAIC) Practices
acct_description: Amount of statutory capital and surplus computed using statutory accounting practices prescribed by the National Association of Insurance Commissioners.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Transfer to Available-for-Sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

acct_label: Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, Tabular Presentation by Financial Statement Line Item, Adjustment Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Effect of a change in accounting principle on a financial statement line item and any per share amounts affected for the prior period presented. The cumulative effect of the change on retained earnings or net assets in the statement of financial position, as of the beginning of the earliest period presented.

acct_label: Accrued Employee Benefits (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations, excluding pension and other postretirement benefits, incurred through that date and payable for perquisites provided to employees pertaining to services received from them. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Assets, Not Pledged (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets that do not have to be used to settle obligations of VIE.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Liabilities, Recourse (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities that have recourse to general credit of primary beneficiary.

acct_label: Advances Received on Government Contracts, Not Netted Against Accounts Receivable
acct_description: Advances received on government contracts that are not offset against receivables because they cannot be definitely regarded as payments on account for contract work in progress.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Collateral Fee
acct_description: Amount of fees associated with providing collateral for the debt instrument.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Debt Issuance Costs
acct_description: Amount of debt issuance costs before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Deposit Liabilities with Abnormal Terms
acct_description: Amount of deposits held by the entity on terms other than those available in the normal course of business.

acct_label: Cost of Real Estate Sales, Excluding Interest (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
