acct_description: Reflects the carrying amount of the commercial, industrial and residential land and buildings sold during the period plus certain overhead and other costs to place the real estate in saleable condition, but excluding capitalized interest costs. This element would most likely be used by an entity whose principal activities involve real estate or which has significant real estate operations.

acct_label: Warehouse Agreement Borrowings
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the outstanding short-term borrowings under a revolving line of credit used by mortgage bankers to finance the origination or purchase of loans.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Transfer to Trading, Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Asset or Liability from Transfers of Financial Assets Having No Reasonable Estimate of Fair Value, at Carrying Value (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount of the listed assets obtained or liabilities incurred.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Other Postretirement Obligations
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to other postretirement obligations.

acct_label: Fair Value, Asset (Liability), Recurring Basis, Still Held, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in income from asset (liability) measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Customer Deposits
acct_description: The interest expense recognized during the period on customer deposits or security deposits held in interest bearing accounts.

acct_label: Weighted Average Interest Rate of Time Deposits, $100,000 or More
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate of time deposits, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

acct_label: Capital Units, Cost to Investors
acct_description: Cost to investors of each class of capital shares or other capital units.

acct_label: Other Utility Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Other utility cost incurred related to oil and gas produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Long-term Debt and Capital Lease Obligations, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Years Four and Five
acct_description: Principal amount of long-term debt and capital lease obligation maturing in the fourth and fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Preacquisition Contingency Accrual (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to preacquisition contingencies other than contingencies associated with income taxes.

acct_label: Closed Block Dividend Obligation, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the policyholder dividend obligation attributable to closed block liabilities.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Period Increase (Decrease), Intrinsic Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Change in the intrinsic value of nonvested awards on equity-based plans excluding option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, revenue or profit achievement stock award plan).

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Assets, Asset Held-for-sale (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to assets expected to be sold.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Loss Reclassified to Other Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified to other income from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, Cash Flows Expected to be Collected at Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of cash flows expected to be collected at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary by Interest Rate Type (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Represents the aggregate dollar amount of Federal Home Loan Bank advances which are outstanding as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Fees Earned but Excluded from Yield
acct_description: Reflects the amount of fees recognized as income related to loan originations, commitments or servicing which are not included in interest income and that exceed one percent of the aggregate of total interest income and other income.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Available-for-sale Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Qualitative Disclosures, Default Rate
acct_description: This item represents the default rate of the underlying assets in the security that was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are other than temporarily impaired and the amount of such impairment determined to be related to credit loss recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Available-for-sale Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Qualitative Disclosures, Loan to Collateral Value
acct_description: This item represents the loan to collateral ratio of the underlying assets in the security, represented as a percentage, which was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are other than temporarily impaired and only the amount of impairment related to credit loss was recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Deferred Finance Costs, Own-share Lending Arrangement, Issuance Costs, Accumulated Amortization Adjustment
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated amortization of deferred issuance costs associated with a share-lending arrangement.

acct_label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Shares Held in Trust of Employee Stock Ownership Plan (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Value of stock issued during the period and held in trust for Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP) or cost of compensation committed to employee's trust but not yet earned. The consideration to be received by the employer for placing the shares in the ESOP trust is future employee services. That is, this consideration is the cost of compensation.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) First Mortgage Bond
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt secured by a first mortgage deed of trust, containing a pledge of real property.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Price Risk Fair Value Hedging Instruments
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value of price risk derivatives instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments, as offset by the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge is determined to be effective.

acct_label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Mortgage-Related Securities Available-for-sale or Held-for-investment
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of mortgage-related securities classified as available for sale or held for investment which are owned but transferred to another party to serve as collateral to partially or fully secure a debt obligation, repurchase agreement or other current or potential obligation, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Basis Spread on Variable Rate, During Period
acct_description: The percentage points added to the reference rate or index during the adjustment period to compute the variable [fully indexed] rate on the loans receivable realized during the reporting period. This may be an effective margin for the period depending on the specific terms of the underlying loan agreement (for example, an annual disclosure for a loan with a quarterly adjustment period).

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Accrued Interest, Writeoff
acct_description: Amount of writeoff of accrued interest on accounts receivable classified as noncurrent recognized by reversing interest income.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Carrying Amount, Other (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the aggregate gross carrying amount of all loans and leases held in portfolio, not otherwise categorized (such as commercial, consumer, or foreign), prior to deducting deferred income and the allowance for losses on loans and leases, not otherwise categorized (such as commercial, consumer, or foreign).

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Available-for-sale Securities
acct_description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Guarantees (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position liability caption which represents a class of liabilities, or which may include an individual liability, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Trade Secrets, Gross (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of trade secrets which protect the entity's unique technology and knowledge in its field of business so as to obtain competitive advantage for a reasonably expected period of economic benefit.

acct_label: Royalty Revenue from Coal (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue earned during the period by the entity for rights granted to another party under coal mineral leases.

acct_label: Contractual Maturities, Time Deposits, $100,000 or More (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount of domestic and foreign time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more.

acct_label: Dividend Payments Restrictions Schedule, Statutory Capital and Surplus
acct_description: Amount of statutory capital and surplus computed using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practice.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, General Debt Obligations, Disclosures, Interest Rate at Period End
acct_description: States the interest rate applicable to Federal Home Loan Bank advances outstanding as of the Balance Sheet date.

acct_label: Financial Services Liabilities
acct_description: For entities that provide full or partial financing and servicing for customers supplementary to its major operations (such as a manufacturer or a homebuilder providing and servicing loans to buyers), represents the liabilities associated with such activities, including accounts payable and accrued liabilities.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, Adjustment from AOCI for Accretion of Noncredit Portion of OTTI, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for accretion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, OTTI, after Tax and Adjustments, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, OTTI, before Tax, after Adjustments, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount, before tax, after adjustments, of increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Common Stock, Share Subscriptions but Unissued, Value (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Dollar amount of common stock allocated to investors to buy shares of a new issue of common stock. When stock is sold on a subscription basis, the issuer does not initially receive the total proceeds. In general, the issuer does not issue the shares to the investor until it receives the entire proceeds.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Employee Benefit Liabilities Assumed
acct_description: "The amount of employee benefit liabilities that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

acct_label: Clearance Fees
acct_description: The amount of expense in the period for clearance fees.

acct_label: Excess Net Capital at 1000 Percent (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net capital in excess of the level at which the broker-dealer may be prohibited from expanding its business.

acct_label: Investment Sold, Not yet Purchased, at Fair Value
acct_description: Value of the short position.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Interest-bearing, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and due after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer) to vendors that bear interest at either a stated or an imputed rate.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, (Gain) Loss on Asset Sales, Net (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reorganization items related to net gain (loss) on asset sales.

acct_label: Due to Employees (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Amounts due to employees, not to include stockholders or officers. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Due to Officers or Stockholders (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Amounts due to recorded owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Revenue, Environmental Remediation Services (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue derived from providing environmental engineering and consulting; environmental testing and analysis; and remediation services.

acct_label: Secured Demand Note Deficiency (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: If the value of securities and cash collateralizing a secured demand note contributed for purposes of capital under regulatory reporting requirements after application of the deductions specified therein is less than the unpaid principal amount of the secured demand note, such deficiency is deducted.

acct_label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Limited Partnership Units Outstanding Adjustment
acct_description: The sum of dilutive potential limited partnership units used in the calculation of the diluted per-unit computation.

acct_label: Deposit Assets, Present Value of Expected Recoveries
acct_description: Present value of initial expected recoveries that will be reimbursed under the insurance or reinsurance contracts.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Extraordinary Items, before Tax, Per Diluted Share (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The Income or Loss from extraordinary items, before related tax effects, per each share of common stock and dilutive common stock equivalents outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Trade Receivables Held-for-sale, Reconciliation to Cash Flow, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in trade receivables held-for-sale, after allowance for bad debt, that are not part of a disposal group.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity, Gain (Loss) Included in Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (loss) for financial instrument classified in shareholders' equity measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage Backed Securities (MBS) categorized as Held-to-maturity
acct_description: The cash outflow for the purchase of securities issued by a governmental agency or corporation (for example, GNMA or FHLMC) or by private issuers (for example, banks and mortgage banking enterprises) secured by and repaid from underlying mortgages, which were designated as held to maturity when acquired.

acct_label: Securities Failed-to-Receive
acct_description: Amount payable as the result of fail-to-receive. A fail-to-receive is a securities purchase from another broker-dealer not received from the selling broker-dealer by the close of business on the settlement date.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Securities Pledged for Repurchase Agreements, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of repurchase agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Discount
acct_description: Amount of unamortized discount on outstanding advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Revenue from Franchised Outlets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue earned during the period from franchised outlets.

acct_label: Significant Changes, Franchises Purchased During Period
acct_description: The number of franchises purchased during the period when there are significant changes in franchisor-owned outlets or franchised outlets during the period.

acct_label: Fair Value Disclosure, Off-balance Sheet Risks, Face Amount, Asset
acct_description: The face amount of financial assets, which are not recognized in the financial statements (off-balance sheet) because they fail to meet some other criterion for recognition.

acct_label: Proceeds from Collection of Other Loans Held-for-sale
acct_description: The cash inflow from collection of repayments from borrowers on loans that are held with the intention to resell in the near future; includes loans that are not mortgages.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity, Period Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of financial instrument classified in shareholders' equity measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Change in Present Value, Interest Income
acct_description: Amount of interest income on financing receivable, from change in present value of expected cash flows, attributable to passage of time.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Transfer to Trading, Unrealized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) previously recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, OTTI, after Adjustments, Tax
acct_description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax (expense) benefit for increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, OTTI, after Tax and Adjustments
acct_description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Noncredit Portion of OTTI, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized in earnings for investment in held-to-maturity security.

acct_label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Cumulative Gain Recognized (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Represents the cumulative amount of the gain that has been recognized (out of the total deferred gain) as income or a reduction in rent expense through the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Discontinuation of Foreign Currency Cash Flow Hedge Due to Forecasted Transaction Probable of Not Occurring, Net
acct_description: The amount of net gain (loss) reclassified into earnings when foreign currency cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

acct_label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Demand
acct_description: Amount of interest expense on domestic demand deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Money Market
acct_description: Amount of interest expense on domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Other Time Deposit
acct_description: Amount of interest expense on domestic time deposit liabilities other than certificates of liabilities.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Other Loans and Leases Held-for-investment
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow from purchases of loans and leases held-for-investment classified as other.

acct_label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Deductions for Recoveries
acct_description: Amount of decrease in the valuation allowance for impairment of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer from recoveries recognized.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Advance Payments by Borrowers for Taxes and Insurance
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepayments received from borrowers for taxes and insurance remitted to the appropriate tax authority or insurer on behalf of the borrower.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deposits from Other Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in interest-bearing deposits from another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Loan in Process
acct_description: Amount of undisbursed portion of financing receivable balance. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

acct_label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Year Five
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than four years, but five years or less.

acct_label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Year Four
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than three years, but four years or less.

acct_label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Year Three
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than two years, but three years or less.

acct_label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Year Two
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than one year, but two years or less.

acct_label: Contract Receivable Retainage, Year Four
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contract Receivable Retainage, Year Three
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Increase (Decrease) in Employee Related Accruals (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of change in prepetition employee related accruals since bankruptcy filing date.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder in a publicly trade limited partnership (LP) or master limited partnership (MLP).

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of gain (loss) on disposal of discontinued operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

acct_label: Business Combination, Acquired Direct Financing Lease Receivable
acct_description: Amount of acquired direct financing lease receivable from business combination.

acct_label: Repayments of Financial Services Obligations (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The cash used to settle the borrowing issued by the entity involved in financial services operations.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Gains, Derivatives (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents, as of the balance sheet date; the gross gains in accumulated other comprehensive income, a separate component of shareholders' equity, for any derivatives that hedged the forecasted acquisition of available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Long-term Debt of Registrant, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Remainder of Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt of the registrant maturing in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year ended.

acct_label: Capital Units, Outstanding
acct_description: Number of capital units or capital shares outstanding. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

acct_label: Fair Value, Option, Disclosures Related to Election, Items Existing at Effective Date, Accrued Liabilities (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a financial asset or liability (as defined) for which the fair value option is elected and which item existed at the effective date (as defined).

acct_label: Distribution Made to Member or Limited Partner, Distributions Declared, Per Unit (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Per-share or per-unit cash distributions declared to a common shareholder or unit-holder by an LLC or LP.

acct_label: Other Partners' Capital
acct_description: Amount of other partners' capital.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Deferred Tax Liabilities, Provisional Undistributed Foreign Earnings (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reasonable estimate for deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from undistributed earnings of subsidiary and other recognized entity not within country of domicile. Includes, but is not limited to, other basis differences.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Unrealized Investment Loss
acct_description: Amount of unrealized investment loss which increases present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Sold at Par Value
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with interest rate reset through auction process, sold at par value.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Excess Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Actual
acct_description: Ratio of Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: New Accounting Pronouncement or Change in Accounting Principle, Current Period Disclosures, Revenue Recognized, Amount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of revenue recognized in earnings during the reporting period associated with arrangements entered into or modified after adoption of the new accounting pronouncement or change in accounting principle.

acct_label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Rolling after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of the recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Revenue Recognition, New Accounting Pronouncement, Material Effect, Revenue Recognized under Amended Guidance (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: For arrangements that precede the adoption of the amending guidance, the amount of revenue that would have been recognized in the reporting period under the amended guidance.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Due in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of the fixed and determinable portion of the unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Funds Purchased, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect on Retained Earnings, Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the related income tax effect of a cumulative effect on retained earnings.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Commitments
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Due to Correspondent Brokers
acct_description: Amount payable to correspondent broker-dealer.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, after Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Par Value
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Investment Owned, Restricted, Cost
acct_description: The cost of the restricted investment.

acct_label: Proceeds from Repayment of Loans to Purchase Common Stock
acct_description: Cash inflow from repayment of loans for purchasing common stock.

acct_label: Available-for-sale, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Other, Loan to Collateral Value
acct_description: This item represents the loan to collateral ratio of the underlying assets in the security, represented as a percentage, which was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Covered, after Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, after allowance, of finance receivable covered by loss sharing agreement.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Covered, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for finance receivable covered by loss sharing agreement.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Covered, before Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, before allowance, of finance receivable covered by loss sharing agreement.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Investment Transferred from Available-for-sale to Equity Method, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) of investment classified as available-for-sale transferred to equity method.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Carrying Amount of Liabilities, Unconsolidated VIE (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount of the liabilities in the enterprise's statement of financial position that relate to the enterprise's variable interest in the unconsolidated variable interest entity. In general, a VIE is a corporation, partnership, trust, or any other legal structure used for business purposes that either (a) does not have equity investors with voting rights or (b) has equity investors that do not provide sufficient financial resources for the entity to support its activities. A VIE often holds financial assets, including loans or receivables, real estate or other property. A VIE may be essentially passive or it may engage in research and development or other activities on behalf of another company.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Derivative, Cumulative Loss
acct_description: Amount of loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative hedging forecasted acquisition of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

acct_label: Accumulated Comprehensive Income (Loss), after Adoption of New Accounting Principle (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The balance in accumulated comprehensive income (loss) after the initial adoption of a new accounting principle.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Percent Domestic Equity Securities
acct_description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are domestic equity securities for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

acct_label: Future Minimum Sublease Rentals, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Investments Acquired (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of investments that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Noncredit Portion of OTTI, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized in earnings for investment in held-to-maturity security.

acct_label: Investment Company, Tax Return of Capital Distribution
acct_description: Amount of distribution in excess of tax-basis earnings and profit of investment company.

acct_label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Carrying Amount at Lease Inception Exceeds Fair Value
acct_description: This element represents the loss resulting from the amount by which the cost or carrying amount, if different, of an asset subject to an agreement classified as an operating lease, at the inception of a lease involving real estate, exceeds the fair value of the leased property.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Held-to-maturity Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Qualitative Disclosures, Loan to Collateral Value
acct_description: This item represents the loan to collateral ratio of the underlying assets in the security, represented as a percentage, which was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are other than temporarily impaired and only the amount of impairment related to credit loss was recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Servicing Liability at Fair Value, Changes in Fair Value Resulting from Changes in Valuation Inputs or Changes in Assumptions
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value from changes in the inputs, assumptions, or model used to calculate the fair value of the contract to service financial assets under which the estimated future revenues from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer.

acct_label: Loans Receivable Held-for-sale, Net, Not Part of Disposal Group, Consumer, Student (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for bad debt, of student loan receivables held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Accretable Yield (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan. This relates to loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Accretion (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Current period recognition of the accretion of the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan. This element relates to loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Additions (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Increases in the aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan. This relates to loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Reclassifications from Nonaccretable Difference (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Change in the estimate of cash flows expected to be collected, which results in an increase in accretable yield. This relates to a loan accounted for as an available-for-sale debt security, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Covered, Improvements
acct_description: Improvements made to other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Covered, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Change in carrying amount of other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed. The change includes for example, but is not limited to, additions, improvements, disposals and valuation adjustments.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Non Covered, Improvements
acct_description: Improvements made to other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.

acct_label: Other Real Estate, Non Covered, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Change in carrying amount of other real estate not covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed. The change includes for example, but is not limited to, additions, improvements, disposals and valuation adjustments.

acct_label: Servicing Fees (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of fees from providing shareholder services, including, but not limited to, answering shareholder inquiries and providing shareholders with information about their investments.

acct_label: Fair Value Assumption, Date of Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement, Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Servicing Assets or Liabilities, Expected Credit Losses
acct_description: Rate at which principal will not be repaid on securitized financial assets, including for example, but not limited to, expected static pool losses for initial fair value measurement.

acct_label: Medium-term Notes, Current
acct_description: Carrying value at the balance sheet date of the current portion of a financial instrument used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with original maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

acct_label: Other Investment Not Readily Marketable, Quoted Value
acct_description: Value of the other investments measured by quoted price.

acct_label: Transfers of Financial Assets Accounted for as Sale, Initial Fair Value of Liabilities Incurred
acct_description: Represents the initial fair value recorded for liabilities incurred on transfer of financial assets in a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or a similar transfer which transaction is recognized as a sale of the transferred financial assets.

acct_label: Common Unit, Issuance Value
acct_description: Stated value of common units of ownership issued by a limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Accrued Vacation (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for unused vacation time owed to employees based on the entity's vacation benefit given to its employees. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Auction Market Preferred Securities, Stock Series, Per-Share Redemption Amount
acct_description: The per-share amount at which preferred stock may be called or is subject to redemption through sinking-fund operations or otherwise.

acct_label: Auction Market Preferred Securities, Stock Series, Variable Interest Rate Earned
acct_description: The interest (or dividend) rates earned on action market preferred securities (on an annual basis or APY) for the period reported.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain Reclassified to Other Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of gains on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to other income from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Deferred Electric Cost (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized electric costs of a regulated entity that are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Electric Worldwide Unregulated Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue derived from the unregulated generation, transmission and distribution of electricity.

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts, Premium Receivable, Premium Payments Received (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of premium payments received during the period for premiums receivable on financial guarantee insurance contracts.

acct_label: Phase-in Plan, Amount of Costs Deferred for Rate-making Purposes
acct_description: The total amount of allowable costs capitalized during the period by the entity pertaining to Phase-In plans which were deferred on the expectation of future recovery.

acct_label: OCI, Equity Method Investment, Tax
acct_description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) (OCI) for proportionate share of equity method investee's OCI.

acct_label: Subordinated Liabilities, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in subordinated debt.

acct_label: Weighted Average Interest Rate of Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Six Months Through 12 Months
acct_description: The weighted average interest rate of domestic and foreign time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more, with maturities of six months through twelve months.

acct_label: Results of Operations, Entity's Share of Equity Method Investees' Results of Operations for Oil and Gas Producing Activities (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Enterprise's share of equity method investees' results of operations for the year from oil and gas producing activities in the aggregate and by geographic area.

acct_label: Results of Operations, General and Administrative Related to Oil and Gas Producing Activities
acct_description: General and administrative costs from oil & gas producing activities.

acct_label: Items Included in Consolidated Statement of Financial Condition (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Total indebtedness included on the balance sheet.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), after Adjustments, Tax, Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge, attributable to noncontrolling interest. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassification for sale and settlement, and amount recognized under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingency, Undiscounted, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Undiscounted amount of accrual for environmental loss contingency to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Accrued Rent (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for contractual rent under lease arrangements. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Costs of Franchised Outlets
acct_description: Costs incurred that are directly related to generating franchise revenues from franchised outlets.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Inventories
acct_description: Amount of inventories at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Long-term Net of Tax Operating Income Margin, Percent (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Ratio of an entity's operating income net of tax to its revenue, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of gains (loss), realized and unrealized, from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Regulated Operating Revenue, Exploration and Production
acct_description: The amount of regulated exploration and production operating revenues recognized during the period.

acct_label: Business Acquisitions, Purchase Price Allocation, Subsequent Years, Remaining Adjustments
acct_description: Total remaining unamortized or unaccreted amounts of premiums, discounts, and intangible assets, in years subsequent to the year of acquisition, when the total amounts of remaining discounts, premiums, and intangible assets exceed 30 percent of stockholders' equity.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity, Purchases, (Sales), Issuances, (Settlements) (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of purchases, (sales), issuances and (settlements) of financial instrument classified in shareholders' equity measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Subordinated Borrowings Allowable in Computation of Net Capital (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of subordinated borrowings included in the computation of allowable capital for compliance with regulatory requirements.

acct_label: Unbilled Receivables, Not Billable, Amount Expected to be Collected in Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of receivables under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable that are expected to be collected in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Measurement Input
acct_description: Value of input used to measure long-term debt.

acct_label: Real Estate Owned, Valuation Allowance, Valuation Increase
acct_description: Amount of gain recognized in the income statement for an increase in valuation of real estate owned (REO).

acct_label: Interest-bearing Foreign Deposit, Money Market
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing money market demand account deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Advertising
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for advertising that provides economic benefits in future periods.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Time Deposits
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in time deposits classified as other.

acct_label: Lease Incentive Receivable, Noncurrent
acct_description: Noncurrent portion of receivables for an incentive or inducement contractually stipulated between parties to a lease whereby the lessor has committed to provide the entity (lessee) with a cash payment as inducement to enter the lease.

acct_label: Alternative Net Capital Requirement
acct_description: Amount of net capital requirement computed under the alternative method allowed under regulatory reporting requirements.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Floating Rate
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with floating interest rate.

acct_label: Preferred Units, Preferred Partners' Capital Accounts
acct_description: The amount of the preferred partners' ownership interests.

acct_label: Revenue Steam Products and Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue generated from providing steam products and services to various industries. Steam is used in oil refineries, pulp and paper mills, chemical production (such as ethylene and ammonia), food and grain processing, and textiles. Steam is also used in the heating and cooling of urban commercial and residential buildings.

acct_label: Cost of Utilities (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred to prepare, construct, and develop the infrastructure necessary to deliver utilities (for example, land improvements, construction of property developments).

acct_label: Liability for Title Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
acct_description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling asserted and unasserted claims estimated to have been incurred by the insureds on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to the existence of a lien, encumbrance, defect or other matter purportedly affecting the title to the interest as insured.

acct_label: Liability for Title Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Known Claims (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to an assertion by the insureds of the existence of a lien, encumbrance, defect or other matter purportedly affecting the title to the interest as insured.

acct_label: Receivables with Imputed Interest, Amortization Amount
acct_description: The amount of amortization of the discount or premium on the note or receivable which was the result of the determination of present value in cash or noncash transactions, recognized in the statement of operations for the period.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Interest Acquired (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The level of ownership or equity interest acquired in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Gains (Losses) on Recourse Debt
acct_description: Amount represents the difference between the cash acquisition price of the debt and the net carrying amount of the debt at the time of its extinguishment.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Premium
acct_description: Amount of unearned premiums on outstanding advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Sales Allowances, Price Protection (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reduction to gross sales revenue attributable to price protection agreements with customers or clients which limit the sales price of goods or services.

acct_label: Due from Employees, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amounts due from an Entity employee, not to include stockholders or officers, which are usually due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

acct_label: Derivative Asset, Measurement Input
acct_description: Value of input used to measure derivative asset.

acct_label: Cost of Services, Direct Taxes and Licenses Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Taxes and licenses incurred and are directly related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Retiree Related Charges
acct_description: Amount of reorganization items related to retiree related charges.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Customer Loyalty Program Liability
acct_description: Increase (decrease) in the liability arising from revenue deferred or cost to provide future products or services resulting from customer loyalty program. Excludes liability associated with frequent flier programs. Includes liability associated with customer loyalty programs for other businesses, for example, but not limited to, hotels, supermarkets, credit card companies, automobile rental companies, and book sellers.

acct_label: Open Option Contracts Written, Number of Shares
acct_description: The number of shares for the open option contracts written on the investment.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Percent Equity Securities
acct_description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are equity securities for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity, Issuances (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of issuances of financial instrument classified in shareholders' equity measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity, Settlements (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of settlements of financial instrument classified in shareholders' equity measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Redeemable Convertible Preferred Stock, Value, Excluding Additional Paid in Capital (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Value of redeemable convertible preferred shares outstanding.

acct_label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Modification of Terms, Incremental Compensation Cost
acct_description: The excess of the fair value of the modified award over the fair value of the award immediately before the modification.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Noncash Financial or Equity Instrument Consideration, Rate
acct_description: Dividend or interest rate associated with the financial or equity instrument issued as noncash or part noncash consideration for a business or asset acquired. Noncash are transactions that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments. Part noncash refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments.

acct_label: Advertising Barter Transactions, Advertising Barter Costs
acct_description: Total expense recognized from advertising barter transactions for each income statement presented.

acct_label: Accrued Professional Fees (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for professional fees, such as for legal and accounting services received. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) Limited Partnerships, Redeemable
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to redeemable noncontrolling partner of a limited partnership.

acct_label: Deferred Sales Inducement Cost, Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investment
acct_description: Amount of unrealized investment gain (loss) which decreases (increases) deferred sales inducement cost.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense, Realized Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination from realized investment gain (loss).

acct_label: Broker Dealer, Securities Owned Not Readily Marketable, at Estimated Fair Value (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Total amount of debt instruments issued by a government or entity guaranteeing payment of the original investment plus interest by a specified future date, corporate stocks (common, preferred), representing ownership rights in an entity or other legal entity, and stock options, warrants, and any other financial instrument which represents or provides the ability to obtain ownership rights in an Entity or other legal entity which financial instruments are not readily marketable for reasons including, but not necessarily limited to: (a) no market on a securities exchange or no independent publicly quoted market; (b) not able to be publicly offered for sale or sold unless a registration has been effected under existing securities laws; or (c) not able to be offered for sale or sold because of other arrangements, restrictions, or conditions applicable to the securities or to the broker-dealer.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Price Earnings Ratio Multiple (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Ratio of an entity's stock price to its earnings per share. Price earnings (P/E) ratio is used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Refunds Due under Government Contracts
acct_description: Amount of renegotiation refunds which have been determined to be probable and reasonably estimated at the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Share Subscriptions
acct_description: The number of securities classified as temporary equity that have been allocated to investors to buy. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Trust Assets to Pay Expenses
acct_description: Amount of cash inflows from the sale of trust assets to pay trust expenses.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Maintenance Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Maintenance costs incurred and are directly related to goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Retail Land Sales, Installment Method, Sales Value
acct_description: Amount of sales related to retail land transactions accounted for under the installment method.

acct_label: Deferred Sales Inducement Cost, Amortization Expense, Assumption Change
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for deferred sales inducement cost from assumption change.

acct_label: Deferred Sales Inducements, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unamortized deferred sales inducement costs.

acct_label: Other Expense of Insurance Entities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The sum of other expenses reflected on the income statement of the insurance company.

acct_label: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Interest Income (Expense)
acct_description: Amount of interest income (expense) for present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) Recognized on Assets Transferred to Separate Account
acct_description: Amount of net gains or losses recognized during the reporting period on assets that were transferred into separate accounts.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Cash and Cash Equivalents
acct_description: Cash and highly liquid, safe investments that can be readily converted into cash (cash equivalents) allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Other Closed Block Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Other assets allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Dividend Obligation (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the excess of the cumulative actual closed block earnings over the cumulative expected (actuarially determined) closed block earnings for the period from the actuarial calculation date to the date of measurement. The excess will result in future dividends to closed block policyholders, unless offset by less favorable than expected future performance of the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Investments, Fixed Maturity, Available-for-sale, Amortized Cost
acct_description: The amortized cost as of the balance sheet date of those fixed maturity investments designated as available for sale and reported at fair value which are allocated to the closed block. Also a component of change in other comprehensive income in the period, which is reflected in the closed block disclosure.

acct_label: Closed Block Liabilities, Future Policy Benefits and Policyholder Account Balances
acct_description: The liability as of the balance sheet date for future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and expenses, less the present value of future net premiums payable under the insurance contracts and the policy cash accumulations, for the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as a closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Net Results
acct_description: Amount of net income (loss) from operations of the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Premiums
acct_description: For the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block), revenue for the period from insurance policy premiums; typically included in a table of closed block operations.

acct_label: Memberships in Exchanges Owned
acct_description: Amount of capitalized cost for obtaining membership with right to do business on trading exchange.

acct_label: Reinsurance Retention Policy, Excess Retention, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of risk reinsured in excess of stated retention per entity policy.

acct_label: Separate Accounts, Asset (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Total fair value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of contract holder funds maintained in accounts which are separate from the general account assets of the entity and that meet certain criteria.

acct_label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory to GAAP, Amount of Reconciling Item
acct_description: The amount of the specified reconciling item as of the balance sheet date reconciling the financial statements which use generally accepted accounting principles and the statutory financial statements which use statutory accounting practices prescribed or permitted by the state or country in which the filing is made.

acct_label: Deferred Subscriber Acquisition Costs, Current
acct_description: Costs deferred when a service provider provides incentives to third-party manufacturers or resellers to reduce the selling prices of specialized equipment in order to stimulate end-customer demand for the service provider's offerings.

acct_label: Deferred Subscriber Acquisition Costs, Noncurrent
acct_description: Costs deferred when a service provider gives incentives to third-party manufacturers or resellers to reduce the selling prices of specialized equipment in order to stimulate end-customer demand for the service provider's offerings.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Other, Fair Value Volatility, Rate
acct_description: This item represents the volatility rate related to the fair value of the underlying assets in the security, represented as a percentage, which was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

acct_label: Recovery Stranded Costs
acct_description: Revenue from billings to utility customers to recover what are also referred to as stranded assets or stranded investments. These are assets that formerly regulated utilities with monopolies on local service are allowed to recover during their transition to deregulated suppliers in competitive markets. Essentially, these investments are sunk costs, made by utilities under the old regulated system, which might not be recovered in a truly competitive marketplace. However, since they were valid investments at the time, the utilities are allowed to recover these costs from customers (for example, an investment in electrical generation assets that may not be recouped if customers are now allowed to purchase electricity from another utility).

acct_label: Stock or Units Available for Distributions
acct_description: Number of stock or units eligible for distribution to members or limited partners of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

acct_label: Public Utilities, Requested Rate Increase (Decrease), Amended, Amount
acct_description: Amount of public utility's amended requested rate increase (decrease) with regulatory agency.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Requested Rate Increase (Decrease), Amended, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of public utility's amended requested rate increase (decrease) with regulatory agency.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Requested Rate Increase (Decrease), Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of public utility's requested rate increase (decrease) with regulatory agency.

acct_label: Common Unit, Authorized
acct_description: Maximum number of common units of ownership permitted to be issued by a limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Trading Account Assets
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) Operating Partnerships, Redeemable
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to redeemable noncontrolling partner in an operating partnership.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) Preferred Unit Holders, Nonredeemable
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling preferred unit holders.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Derivative, Cumulative Gain
acct_description: Amount of gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative hedging forecasted acquisition of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Gross Gains (Losses), Derivatives (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents, as of the balance sheet date, the gross gains and losses in accumulated other comprehensive income, a separate component of shareholders' equity, for any derivatives that hedged the forecasted acquisition of held-to-maturity securities.

acct_label: Own-share Lending Arrangement, Counterparty Default, Period of Default, Expense
