acct_description: The amount of default related expense recognized in earnings in the period in which the entity concludes it is probable that the counterparty (share borrower) to a share-lending arrangement will default.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Patents Found Not Infringed, Number
acct_description: Number of another entity's patents that the entity was found not to have infringed.

acct_label: Business Combination, Assets Arising from Contingencies, Amount Recognized, Other than at Fair Value
acct_description: The amount, measured at other than acquisition-date fair value, of all the assets acquired that arise from contingencies and were recognized by the entity, if the acquisition-date fair value cannot be determined and other criteria (as defined) related to the contingencies have been met.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Consolidated Obligations
acct_description: Amount of joint and several obligations consisting of consolidated obligation bonds and discount notes issued by Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Assets, Work-in-Progress (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to work-in-process inventory.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Undercapitalized, Minimum
acct_description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets categorized as undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Undercapitalized, Minimum
acct_description: Ratio of minimum total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Supplementary Leverage Ratio, Actual
acct_description: Ratio of Tier 1 risk-based capital to total leverage exposure as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) from Real Estate Investment Partnership, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount of income (loss) from consolidated real estate investments attributed to parent.

acct_label: Participating Mortgage Loans, Mortgage Obligations, Amount
acct_description: The aggregate amount of the participating mortgage obligation at the end of the accounting period.

acct_label: Leveraged Buyout, Prepayment Penalties on Retired Debt (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of cash paid for prepayment penalties on retired debt in a leveraged buyout transaction.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Balance, Contracts
acct_description: Balance held at close of period in number of contracts.

acct_label: Chemicals Revenue (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from the sale of chemicals and other related products and from rendering services (such as exploration, development, mining, processing and providing support) to the mining industry.

acct_label: Cost of Chemicals (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred related to exploration, development, mining, processing and providing mining support activities related to chemicals.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Loss Reclassified to Investment Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to investment income from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Floating Rate, Year One
acct_description: Par amount of advance made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with floating interest rate maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Derecognized Assets, Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Assets and any Other Financial Assets Managed Together, Net Credit Losses During Period
acct_description: Net credit losses are charge-offs and are based on total loans outstanding during the period.

acct_label: Capitalized Exploratory Well Costs, Greater than or Equal to One Year and Less than Two Years, Number of Projects (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The number of projects related to the amount of capitalized exploratory costs that have been capitalized for a period greater than or equal to one year but less than two years after completion of drilling at balance sheet date.

acct_label: Earnings (Losses) of Noncontrolling Interest and Equity Method Investments (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The total of the amount of equity in earnings of unconsolidated subsidiaries and 50 percent or less owned persons, and the amount of net Income or Loss from a consolidated entity or investment attributed to noncontrolling equity interest holders.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Land (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The cash inflow from the sale of real estate asset held for productive use.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Contract Acquisition Expense
acct_description: Costs associated with marketing of subscriber contracts and member enrollments. For example, commissions paid to agents or brokers and incentive compensation based on new enrollments. Includes also salaries of the marketing director and staff, general marketing brochures, and general advertising and promotion expenses.

acct_label: Line of Credit Assumed (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The fair value of line of credit assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

acct_label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Greater than Five Years
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than five years.

acct_label: Deposits with Other Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing funds deposited into another Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital, Excess, Actual
acct_description: Amount of tangible capital exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital Ratio, Excess, Actual
acct_description: Ratio of tangible capital to tangible assets exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Preferred Units, Authorized
acct_description: The number of preferred units authorized to be issued.

acct_label: Weighted Average Interest Rate on Overdrawn Demand Deposit
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate on overdrawn demand deposit.

acct_label: Recycling Operating Costs (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Operating costs incurred in recycling minerals, chemicals, and other by-products.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Amount of Write-offs of Allowance for Doubtful Accounts (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of write-off of the allowance for doubtful accounts of health care organizations.

acct_label: Derivative, Average Basis Spread on Variable Rate
acct_description: The average percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the group of interest rate derivatives.

acct_label: Inventory, Noncurrent, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of inventory expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, Not Accounted for Using Income Recognition Model, at Acquisition, at Carrying Value
acct_description: The recorded value, at the acquisition date, of loans for which the income recognition model was not applied. This relates to loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities acquired during the period, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Federal Home Loan Bank Assessments, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity after Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources attributable to the reporting entity. Includes changes in equity except those resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Excludes transactions directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent.

acct_label: Members' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of ownership interest in limited liability company (LLC) directly or indirectly attributable to noncontrolling interests.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Foreign
acct_description: Interest and fee income generated by commercial and consumer loans, made by foreign branches of the reporting entity, which may include loans to foreign governments, foreign banks and other financial institutions, commercial and industrial entities, and citizens of not domiciled in the same country as the reporting entity.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in acquired loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Fixed Rate, after Year One Through Five
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Cost of Secondary Processing (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred in secondary processing of earths, rocks and minerals not carried out at the extraction site (that is secondary processing such as bitumen coating of chippings); secondary processing of materials recovered by dredging once they have been transferred from the dredging vessel (including the transfer process); or mineral prospecting; secondary processing of crude oil into gases, liquids and solids or metalworking processes that follow the forging process in which case the typical secondary processes are heat treating, rough machining, trimming, torch cutting, and testing.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Discount for Lack of Marketability (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Adjustment to the discount rate used to measure fair value for lack of ability to convert business interests into cash quickly.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, Due after Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, Due in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, Due in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, Due in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, Due in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Maturities Summary, Due in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of advances from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Loss Recognized on Assets Transferred to Separate Account, Gross
acct_description: Amount of loss recognized during the reporting period on assets that were transferred into separate accounts.

acct_label: Research and Development Asset Acquired Other than Through Business Combination, Fair Value Acquired
acct_description: The fair value of capitalized costs of a research and development nature that were acquired during the period in a transaction other than a business combination.

acct_label: Weighted Average Interest Rate of Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Three Months or Less
acct_description: The weighted average interest rate of domestic and foreign time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more, with maturities of three months or less.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Gains (Losses), Derivatives (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents, as of the balance sheet date; the difference between the gross gains and losses in accumulated other comprehensive income, a separate component of shareholders' equity, for any derivatives that hedged the forecasted acquisition of available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Contract Terminations (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of decrease in the future benefit reserve resulting from policy expiration or cancellation.

acct_label: Repayments of Secured Tax Exempt Debt (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The cash outflow to repay long-term tax exempt debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral.

acct_label: Servicing Liability at Fair Value, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: The net increase (decrease) in the fair value of servicing liabilities subsequently measured at fair value.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Debt Structure, Indirect Loan, Amount
acct_description: The amount reported as a liability as of the balance sheet date by the entity (the employer) of the loan made by a third-party lender to the employer relating to loans made by the employer to the ESOP.

acct_label: Weighted Average Rate Domestic Deposit, Brokered
acct_description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic brokered deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Facility Membership and Operations Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from facility or amenity membership and its operations during the reporting period.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Treasury Units Purchased
acct_description: Units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Foreign Currency Contracts
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Period Cost
acct_description: Amount of costs associated with malpractice claims, including costs associated with litigating and settling claims, incurred during an accounting period.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Settlement of Claims (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amounts paid during an accounting period for malpractice claims, including costs associated with litigation or claims settlements.

acct_label: General Partners' Cumulative Cash Distributions
acct_description: Aggregate cumulative cash distributions made to the general partner.

acct_label: General Partners' Cumulative Earnings
acct_description: Aggregate cumulative earnings allocated to the general partner based on the sharing of income or losses between general and limited partners as specified in the partnership agreement, excluding any priority income allocations resulting from incentive distributions or any special earnings allocations.

acct_label: Limited Partners' Cumulative Earnings
acct_description: Aggregate cumulative earnings allocated to the limited partners based on the sharing of income or losses between general and limited partners as specified in the partnership agreement, excluding any priority income allocations resulting from incentive distributions or special earnings allocations.

acct_label: Real Estate Held for Development and Sale, Subsidiary
acct_description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held for development or resale by subsidiary entities which hold such assets in the course of business.

acct_label: Preferred Units, Contributed Capital
acct_description: The amount of capital contributed by the preferred partners.

acct_label: Preferred Units, Cumulative Earnings
acct_description: The amount of aggregate cumulative earnings allocated to preferred partners.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Overhead (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Indirect expenses and cost incurred associated with goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts, Unearned Premium Revenue
acct_description: Amount of unearned premium revenue under contracts issued by an insurance entity that provide protection to the holder of a financial obligation from a financial loss in the event of a default.

acct_label: Obligation with Joint and Several Liability Arrangement, Amount Recognized
acct_description: Amount of joint and several liability recognized in the balance sheet.

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Discount Rate
acct_description: Percentage discount rate used to calculate present value of an expected stream of future payments, which is included in the calculation of the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) Due from Officers and Stockholders
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from the reporting entity's executives and owners.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Converted in Period (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The decrease in the number of shares (or other type of equity) reserved for issuance pertaining to outstanding equity-based awards for which the grantee exercised or converted the award into shares, other instruments, or cash in accordance with the terms of the arrangement.

acct_label: Proceeds, Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Previously Written Off, Recovery
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), previously written off.

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain Reclassified to Interest Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of gains on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to interest expense from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Customer Refundable Fees, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in customer refundable fees.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) Included in Investment Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of the total change in unrealized (holding) gains or losses for the period which are included in the statement of income (or changes in net assets) in investment income. Such unrealized (holding) gains or losses relate to those liabilities still held at the reporting date for which fair value is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

acct_label: Demand Side Management Program Costs, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized costs of a regulated entity, consisting of the planning, implementing, and monitoring activities which are designed to encourage consumers to modify their level and pattern of energy usage, which are expected to be recoverable through rate adjustments after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Nonmonetary Notional Amount of Price Risk Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate notional amount of price risk derivatives for instruments with notional amounts expressed in nonmonetary units.

acct_label: Subadvisory Fees for Mutual Funds
acct_description: Subadvisory fees that the funds adviser pays for out of the management fee, which it receives from the fund.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Production Costs, Cumulative
acct_description: The capitalized costs incurred (excluded from amortization), as of the date of the balance sheet, to operate and maintain wells and related equipment and facilities, including depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of operating and maintaining those wells and related equipment and facilities. They become part of the cost of oil and gas produced. Examples of production costs (sometimes called lifting costs) are: costs of labor to operate the wells and related equipment and facilities; repairs and maintenance; materials, supplies, and fuel consumed and supplies utilized in operating the wells and related equipment and facilities; property taxes and insurance applicable to proved properties and wells and related equipment and facilities; severance taxes; some support equipment or facilities may serve two or more oil and gas producing activities and may also serve transportation, refining, and marketing activities. To the extent that the support equipment and facilities are used in oil and gas producing activities, their depreciation and applicable operating costs become exploration, development or production costs, as appropriate. Depreciation, depletion, and amortization of capitalized acquisition, exploration, and development costs are not production costs but also become part of the cost of oil and gas produced along with production (lifting) costs identified above.

acct_label: Redeemable Preferred Stock, Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of redeemable preferred stock.

acct_label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Commercial, Financial Institutions (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of loans issued to financial institutions, including, but not limited to, real estate investment trusts, mortgage companies, and banks. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Securities Pledged for Other Debt Obligations, at Fair Value
acct_description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities that are restricted as collateral for the payment of other debt obligations, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

acct_label: Cash Pass-through Reserve, Federal Home Loan Bank
acct_description: Amount of pass-through reserves deposited with Federal Reserve Banks from member institutions of Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) Operating Partnerships, Nonredeemable
acct_description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling partner in an operating partnership.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Converted
acct_description: The number of units converted into shares of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

acct_label: Underlying, Derivative Mass
acct_description: Specified interest rate, security price, commodity price, foreign exchange rate, index of prices or rates for a derivative contract measured in mass but not the derivative contract itself.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Change in Method, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), from change in methodology.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Sold, Not yet Purchased, Mortgages, Mortgage-backed and Asset-backed Securities
acct_description: Fair value of obligations arising from mortgages, mortgage-backed securities and asset-backed securities sold short.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease.

acct_label: Deteriorated Loans Transferred in, Debt Securities, Accreditable Yield, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in accreditable yield (the excess of the loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan) for the period.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Residual Value of Leased Asset
acct_description: Amount of residual asset covered by residual value guarantee under direct financing lease. Excludes guarantee considered to be lease payments for lessor.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Mineral Rights (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to mineral rights for acquired entities in the mining industry.

acct_label: Difference between Reported Amount and Reporting Currency Denominated Amount, Value
acct_description: The amount of difference between the reported amount and the reporting currency-denominated amount. The default debit balance is based on the reported amount that is greater that the reporting currency-denominated amount.

acct_label: Leveraged Leases, Net Investment in Leveraged Leases Disclosure, Investment Tax Credit Receivable
acct_description: This element represents the receivable for the amount of the investment tax credit to be realized on the leveraged lease transaction.

acct_label: Demutualization by Insurance Entity, Securities Issued, Gross Cash Proceeds
acct_description: The price per share or unit times the number of shares or units issued in an insurance entity stock offering in connection with its conversion from a mutual form of ownership to a stock entity. Amount is gross, before offering costs.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Change in Tax Rate, Deferred Tax Liability, Existing Income Tax Benefit (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of income tax benefit for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax liability from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and no reasonable estimate is determined.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Floating Rate, Year One
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with floating interest rate maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Demand
acct_description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic demand deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Lessor, Direct Financing Lease, Assumptions and Judgments, Value of Underlying Asset, Amount
acct_description: Amount lessor expects from underlying asset following end of direct financing lease term.

acct_label: Fuel Costs, Gross of Hedging
acct_description: The cost for fuel, incurred during the period, before considering the impacts of any related hedging activities.

acct_label: Below Market Lease, Amortization Income, Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Below Market Lease, Amortization Income, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of amortization income for lease with finite life acquired as part of real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Below Market Lease, Amortization Income, Rolling after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Below Market Lease, Amortization Income, Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Below Market Lease, Amortization Income, Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Below Market Lease, Amortization Income, Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Below Market Lease, Amortization Income, Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of amortization income for leases with a finite life acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate expected to be recognized in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Land
acct_description: Period end book value of land owned by the public utility.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Requested Equity Capital Structure, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of public utility's requested equity to capital, including debt and equity.

acct_label: Reporting Unit, Zero or Negative Carrying Amount, Amount of Allocated Goodwill
acct_description: Amount of goodwill allocated to reporting unit with zero or negative amount of net assets.

acct_label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Sales and Disposals
acct_description: Reduction in valuation allowance of servicing assets based on sales and disposals.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Debt Instrument (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Related Party Tax Expense, Due to Affiliates, Deferred
acct_description: The amount of any deferred tax-related balances due to affiliates as of the date of each statement of financial position presented.

acct_label: Subsidiary or Equity Method Investee, Cumulative Number of Shares Issued for All Transactions
acct_description: Cumulative number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee on all stock transactions.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Nonaccrual, Interest Income
acct_description: Amount of interest income on accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, on nonaccrual status.

acct_label: Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount at end of the reporting period of the aggregate extended product warranty liability that is expected to be paid after one year from the balance sheet date or normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the standard product warranty liability.

acct_label: Partners' Capital, Distribution Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The total amount of distributions for all classes of units.

acct_label: Real Estate Held for Development and Sale, Net
acct_description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held for development or sale, net of associated liabilities.

acct_label: Accrued Salaries (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the obligations incurred through that date and payable for employees' services provided. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Unbilled Receivables, Not Billable, Amount Expected to be Collected after Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of receivables under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable that are expected to be collected after the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value, Period Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Change in the weighted average fair value of nonvested awards on equity-based plans excluding option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, revenue or profit achievement stock award plan).

acct_label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Increase (decrease) in the number of shares under non-option equity instrument agreements.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Components, Convertible Debt (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of convertible debt as of the balance sheet date, including the current portion, which originally required full repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Unrealized Gain (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain, not recognized in income statement, from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Unrealized Gain (Loss), Included in Earnings, Net (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Financial Guarantee Insurance Contract Liabilities (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period financial guarantee insurance contract liabilities balances which would generally be expected to be classified as cash flows from operating activities.

acct_label: Redeemable Convertible Preferred Stock, Period Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Change in the value of each type or class of redeemable convertible preferred stock during the period. The redemption requirement does not constitute an unconditional obligation that will be settled in a variable number of shares constituting a monetary value predominantly indexed to (a) a fixed monetary amount known at inception, (b) an amount inversely correlated with the residual value of the entity, or (c) an amount determined by reference to something other than the fair value of issuer's stock. Does not include mandatorily redeemable stock. The exception is if redemption is required upon liquidation or termination of the reporting entity.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Natural Resources (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to natural resources other than mineral rights in the mining industry.

acct_label: Guarantor Obligations, Liquidation Proceeds, Monetary Amount
acct_description: Indicates, if estimable, the approximate extent to which the proceeds from liquidation of any assets held either as collateral or by third parties would be expected to cover the maximum potential amount of future payments under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees.

acct_label: Capitalized Exploratory Well Costs, Charged to Expense (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Capitalized exploratory well costs that were expensed during the year because proved reserves were not found at the exploratory well.

acct_label: Fractionation Revenue (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from fractionation, the process of distilling mixtures into their constituent parts using carefully controlled temperature and pressure to cause vaporization of the components. Fractionation is used to separate raw natural gas, which may have many impurities, into methane (what is sold to customers as "natural gas") and by-products such as ethane, propane and butane.

acct_label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Losses, Derivatives (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents, as of the balance sheet date; the gross losses in accumulated other comprehensive income, a separate component of shareholders' equity, for any derivatives that hedged the forecasted acquisition of available-for-sale securities.

acct_label: Available-for-sale, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Other, Delinquency Rate
acct_description: This item represents the delinquency rate of the underlying assets in the security that were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Interest Rate at which Discount Computed
acct_description: Rate at which discount was computed for deduction from reserve for unpaid claim and claim adjustment expense by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

acct_label: Derivative, Average Cap Interest Rate
acct_description: Average cap rate on a group of interest rate derivatives, such as interest rate caps or collars. If market rates exceed the cap rate, a payment or receipt is triggered on the contract.

acct_label: Derivative, Average Floor Interest Rate
acct_description: Average floor rate on a group of interest rate derivatives, such as interest rate floor or collars. If market rates fall below the floor rate, a payment or receipt is triggered on the contract.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, after Year One Through Five
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Significant, Future Employer Contribution, Amount
acct_description: Amount of cost for employer contribution required to be made in future period to multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution required by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA), statutory obligation, and other contractual obligation.

acct_label: Dividend Income, Securities, Operating, Tax Exempt
acct_description: Amount of operating dividend income on securities exempt from state, federal and other income tax.

acct_label: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, after Reinsurance
acct_description: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

acct_label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Valuation Method, Expected Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The period of time an equity-based award is expected to be outstanding. An equity-based award's expected term is generally determined based on, among other factors, the instrument's contractual term and the holders' expected behavior.

acct_label: Adjustments for Noncash Items Included in Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount of adjustments to the period's net Income or Loss to remove the effects of all items whose cash effects are investing or financing cash flows. The aggregate amount also includes all noncash expenses and income items which reduce or increase net income and are thus added back or deducted when calculating net cash generated by operating activities.

acct_label: Closed Block Assets and Liabilities, Effect on Other Comprehensive Income (Loss)
acct_description: The increase or decrease in the period in other comprehensive income within the closed block comprised of the change in (a) dividend obligation to policyholders of the closed block, and (b) unrealized gain (loss) on available for sale securities allocated to the closed block.

acct_label: Leveraged Buyout, Percentage of Purchase Price Allocated to Assets and Liabilities Acquired at Carryover Basis (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage of purchase price allocated to assets and liabilities acquired at the continuing stockholders' historical basis as of the date of the acquisition.

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Volatility Rate, Low End (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage rate at the low end of the range of reasonable estimates that is indicative of an expected degree of movement against a base line index, and which is included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Registration Payment Arrangement, Accrual Carrying Value
acct_description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the liability representing the obligation under the registration payment arrangement.

acct_label: Contract Receivable Retainage, after Next Rolling Twelve Months (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected after the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Currency Translation Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Increase or Decrease in extended product warranty liability attributable to currency translation. Does not include any Increase or Decrease in standard product warranty liability due to currency translation.

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Loss Exposure Not Accrued, Best Estimate
acct_description: Best estimate of the loss exposure for a reasonably possible liability for product liability damages for which no accrual has been recorded.

acct_label: Aged Fails-to-Deliver (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred arising from failure to deliver securities sold to other parties within time periods specified by regulators, generally by the settlement date.

acct_label: Equity Financing for Leveraged Buyout (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Total equity financing of leveraged buyout transaction including the sale of equity and equity contributions from shareholders.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Payables Assumed (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of payables that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Borrowings to Finance Leveraged Buyout (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Total borrowings to finance leveraged buyout transaction.

acct_label: Contract Receivable, Due after One Year, Highest Interest Rate (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The highest interest rate charged on contract receivables maturing after one year.

acct_label: Contract Receivable, Due after One Year, Lowest Interest Rate (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The lowest interest rate charged on contract receivables maturing after one year.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Option Exercise
acct_description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to option exercise. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Unit-based Payment Arrangement, Number of Units
acct_description: Number of units issued for unit-based payment arrangement issued by partnership. Partner includes, but is not limited to, general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Securities Sold, Not yet Purchased (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Retained Earnings, Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, before Tax (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative effect of a change in accounting principle on the beginning retained earnings of the earliest period reported that was affected by the change, before related income tax effect. A change in accounting principle constitutes a change from one generally accepted accounting principle to another generally accepted accounting principle. This may also include a change in the method of applying an accounting principle.

acct_label: Electrical Transmission Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from the bulk transport of high voltage power, typically over longer distances, between generating plants and distribution systems.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Letters of Credit and Surety Bonds
acct_description: Amount of letters of credit and other surety bonds that are available for the future payment of malpractice claims.

acct_label: Regulated Operating Revenue, Steam
acct_description: The amount of regulated steam operating revenues recognized during the period.

acct_label: Malpractice Insurance, Maximum Coverage Per Incident
acct_description: Maximum coverage per malpractice claim provided by the insurance arrangement.

acct_label: Commodity Futures Contracts and Spot Commodities, Proprietary Capital Charges (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Contract positions to buy or sell a particular commodity at a future date and, or, contracts to buy or sell commodities at current (spot) prices held or entered into by a broker or dealer trading on its own behalf, which positions are required to be considered in computing net capital (as defined).

acct_label: Retail Related Inventory
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of merchandise inventory held by a retailer, wholesaler, or distributor for future sale; includes packaging and other supplies used to store, transport, or present merchandise inventory.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Held-to-maturity Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Additions (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Increases in the aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment. This relates to loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Excess of Liabilities over Assets
acct_description: The value of the excess of liabilities over assets. If all outstanding shares are subject to mandatory redemption and the redemption price is more than the book value (the redemption price exceeds the company's equity balance), the resulting cumulative transition adjustment and subsequent adjustments to reflect changes in the redemption price of the shares are recorded as an excess of liabilities over assets.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Forward Price or Option Strike Price, Shares (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: For a forward contract or an option indexed to the issuer's equity shares, the forward price or option strike price, as applicable.

acct_label: Liquidity Disclosure, Future Obligations Not Expected to be Repaid, Amount (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Disclose the approximate amount, if determinable, of future, fixed annual obligations not expected to be repaid from operations.

acct_label: Significant Change in Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Nature of Change Causing Event (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element provides a description of the nature of the event that could occur within twelve months of the reporting date that would cause a significant increase or decrease in the related unrecognized tax benefit.

acct_label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Other Consumer
acct_description: Interest and fee income from other loans extended to individual consumers.

acct_label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Reportable Segment, Cost Incurred to Date (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative amount of costs incurred to date, net of any adjustments to the liability.

acct_label: Revenue, Coal Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from services rendered related to coal (mine services, transportation, and others) during the reporting period.

acct_label: Significant Acquisitions and Disposals, Restriction on Amount of Proceeds from Donated Property, Plant, and Equipment (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the restriction on the proceeds from the disposition of donated property, plant, and equipment which was purchased with cash restricted for acquisitions of long-lived assets.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Borrowed Securities (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of securities that are temporarily held by the reporting entity.

acct_label: Equity Method Investment, Unrealized Intercompany Profit (Loss) Not Eliminated, Amount (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of unrealized intercompany profits and losses on transactions between the Entity and unconsolidated subsidiaries (including certain corporate joint ventures, and noncontrolled corporations), accounted for under the equity method of accounting, which have not been eliminated in preparing the Entity's financial statements.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Unusual Transactions Impacting Allowance for Doubtful Accounts (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unusual transactions that impact the allowance for doubtful accounts of health care organizations.

acct_label: Retail Land Sales, Deposit Method, Property Carrying Value
acct_description: This element represents the carrying value, net of accumulated deprecation, as of the date of the statement of financial position of a property sold during the reporting period, but which sale is accounted for under the deposit method and, therefore, which property continues to be included in the statement of financial position.

acct_label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Measurement Input
acct_description: Value of input used to measure investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Accrual Adjustment (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of adjustments made to the accrued liability for malpractice claims other than changes for period costs, premium costs, and settlements of claims during an accounting period.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Accrual, Discounted
acct_description: Amount of the accrued liability on a discounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability).

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Accrual, Discounted, Current
acct_description: Amount of the current portion of the accrued liability on a discounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability).

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Accrual, Undiscounted
acct_description: Amount of the accrued liability on an undiscounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability) at the end of the accounting period.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Current Maturities of Capital Lease Obligations
acct_description: Amount of current maturities of capital lease obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Common Stock, Convertible, Conversion Price, Increase
acct_description: Per share increase in conversion price of convertible common stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

acct_label: Acquisition Cost Ratio
acct_description: Ratio of non-life acquisition costs to non-life net premiums earned.

acct_label: General and Administrative Expense Ratio
acct_description: Ratio of non-life general and administrative expenses to non-life net premiums earned.

acct_label: Policyholders' Surplus
acct_description: Amount of policyholders' surplus excluded from calculating deferred taxes.

acct_label: Servicing Liability at Amortized Value, Increase in Obligation (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Adjustment made to carrying value of a servicing liability related to an increase in the fair value of the liability as are result of, for example: a significant change in the amount and timing of actual or expected future cash flows relative to the cash flows previously projected.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Prescription Drug Subsidy Receipt
acct_description: Amount of receipt from prescription drug subsidy which increases plan assets of defined benefit postretirement plan.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Exchanges and Conversions
acct_description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to exchanges and conversions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Development Stage Enterprise, Cumulative Revenue (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative amount of revenues of enterprise from inception of development stage.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Existing Income Tax Expense (Benefit) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and no reasonable estimate is determined.

acct_label: Temporary Equity, Shares Subscribed but Unissued
acct_description: Amount of a new issue of securities classified as temporary equity that are allocated to investors for them to buy. When securities are sold on a subscription basis, the issuer does not initially receive the total proceeds. In general, the issuer does not issue the securities to the investor until it receives the entire proceeds. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

acct_label: Other Real Estate Owned, Measurement Input
acct_description: Value of input used to measure real estate owned by financial institution by financial institution which is not directly related to its business.

acct_label: Unrealized Gain on Price Risk Cash Flow Derivatives, before Tax
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain from the increase in fair value of price risk derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income in the period, before taxes, to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

acct_label: Auction Market Preferred Securities, Stock Series, Aggregate Redemption Amount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount at which preferred stock may be called or is subject to redemption through sinking-fund operations or otherwise.

acct_label: Business Combination, Separately Recognized Transactions, Additional Disclosures, Issuance Costs Not Expensed
acct_description: For transactions that are recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination, such as related to pre-existing relationships with the acquiree, this element represents the disclosure of the amount of any issuance related costs which have not been expensed.

acct_label: Fees and Commissions, Correspondent Clearing (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Service revenue earned by a depository institution that holds the account balances of other financial institutions and provides services thereto. Such services include check collection and item processing.

acct_label: Plan of Reorganization, Amount of Prepetition Obligations to be Settled in Cash
acct_description: Amount of prepetition liabilities to be settled in cash.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Other Assets
acct_description: Total other assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Preferred Stock
acct_description: Amount of preferred stock at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Deferred Income Tax Assets, Current
acct_description: Amount of current deferred income tax assets at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent deferred tax liabilities at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Equipment
acct_description: Amount of equipment at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Land
acct_description: Amount of land at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Other Assets
acct_description: Total other assets at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Preferred Stock
acct_description: Amount of preferred stock at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
acct_description: Amount of current restricted cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Assets, Current, Pledged (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets that can only be used to settle obligations of the VIE, classified as current.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Assets, Noncurrent, Pledged (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets that can only be used to settle obligations of VIE, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Liabilities, Noncurrent, No Recourse (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities that do not have recourse to general credit of primary beneficiary, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts, Premium Receivable, Premium Expected to be Collected
acct_description: Amount of premium receivables under financial guarantee insurance contracts.

acct_label: Deferred Finance Costs, Own-share Lending Arrangement, Issuance Costs, Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: The cumulative amount of amortization of deferred issuance costs associated with an own-share lending arrangement which has been periodically charged to earnings, generally as a component of interest expense, during the term of the arrangement.

acct_label: Additional Charges for Securities Accounts (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Fees and charges earned in the period on securities accounts of customers, broker-dealers, and other accounts.

acct_label: Deposit Assets or Liabilities, Effect of Change in Present Value Assumptions Resulting in Reductions in Expected Recoveries (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The increase or decrease in deposit assets or liabilities resulting from reductions during the period in the amount initially recognized for expected recoveries, which is attributable to a change in factors used to determine present value of cash flows of the arrangement from those used in the calculation of the initial amount of expected recoveries (in other words, the initial amount of the deposit asset or liability).

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Assets, Finished Goods (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to finished goods inventory.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Fixed Maturities, Held-to-maturity, at Amortized Cost
acct_description: Carrying amount of investments in debt securities that are deemed to be held to maturity that are allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Held-to-maturity Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Qualitative Disclosures, Percentage of Nonperforming Assets
acct_description: This item represents the percentage of nonperforming assets that the underlying assets in the security represent and which were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are other than temporarily impaired and only the amount of impairment related to credit loss was recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Discount Rate, Low End (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage discount rate at the low end of a range of reasonable estimates used to calculate present value of an expected stream of future payments, which is included in the calculation of the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Repurchase Agreement Counterparty, Weighted Average Maturity of Agreements (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: This equals the weighted average maturity (weighted by amount of the agreement) of all repurchase agreements with this counterparty.

acct_label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Provisional Cumulative Temporary Difference (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reasonable estimate for cumulative temporary difference related to foreign subsidiary and intended to be permanently reinvested outside country of domicile for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. Temporary differences include, but are not limited to, undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiary not subject to transition tax and other basis differences.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Percent Real Estate
acct_description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are real estate for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Unrealized Gains (Losses), Changes in Assets and Liabilities, Continued to be Held, Amount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The portion (amount) of unrealized gains and losses recognized as changes in net assets during the period and attributable to alternative investments continued to be held at period end. These gains or losses are attributable to certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated for purposes of measuring fair value and which are subject to unobservable inputs.

acct_label: New Accounting Pronouncement or Change in Accounting Principle, Current Period Disclosures, Deferred Revenue, Amount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of deferred revenue as of the date of the statement of financial position associated with arrangements entered into or modified after adoption of the new accounting pronouncement or change in accounting principle.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Extraordinary Items, Tax Effect, Per Diluted Share (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The tax effect on Income or Loss from extraordinary items per each share of common stock and dilutive common stock equivalents outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Business Combination, Assets and Liabilities Arising from Contingencies, Range of Outcomes, Value, High (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: For contingencies, both unrecognized and recognized as having given rise to assets acquired and liabilities assumed at the acquisition date, this element represents an estimate of the high-end of the potential range (undiscounted) of the outcome which may be realized.

acct_label: Fair Value, Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Retained Interest (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position asset caption which represents a class of assets, or which may include an individual asset, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Direct Financing Lease
acct_description: Cost of goods sold for direct financing lease.

acct_label: Proceeds from Issuance of Financial Services Obligations
acct_description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing issued by the entity involved in financial services operations.

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities Adjustment, before Tax (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Accumulated gross appreciation or the gross loss in value of the total of unsold securities.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Deferred Compensation (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Deferred compensation awards of partners that have vested and are convertible to units of ownership. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners. Limited liability partnerships (LLPs) are formed in accordance with the laws of the state in which such entities are organized. Because those laws are not uniform, the characteristics of LLPs vary from state to state. However, LLPs generally have the following characteristics: An LLP is an unincorporated association of two or more "persons." Its members have limited personal liability for the obligations or debts of the entity. It is classified as a partnership for federal income tax purposes.

acct_label: Distribution Made to Member or Limited Partner, Share Distribution (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Payment of a share or unit distribution to common unit-holders of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder and units that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for dilutive potential units outstanding.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of gain (loss) on disposal of discontinued operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder and units that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for all dilutive potential units outstanding.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) before extraordinary items available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder and units that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for dilutive potential units outstanding.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) before extraordinary items available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder and units that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for dilutive potential units outstanding.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Net Income or Loss allocated to each limited partner unit outstanding during the reporting period and each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period. Limited partners have limited liability and do not manage the partnership.

acct_label: Partners' Capital, Other
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital classified as other.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Excess, Actual
acct_description: Amount of Tier 1 risk-based capital exceeding minimum required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Insurance-related Assessment, Policy Surcharge Asset
acct_description: The amount of insurance-related assessment liability that is expected to be recovered through policy surcharges applied to in-force policies.

acct_label: Bankruptcy Claims, Amount of Claims on Material Contracts Rejected (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of related claims on material contracts rejected (such as leases and purchase commitments).

acct_label: Affordable Housing Program Obligation, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of obligation related to Affordable Housing Program (AHP) assessments required by the Federal Home Loan Bank Act of 1932.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Underwriters, Promoters, and Employees
acct_description: Amount of obligation to underwriters, promoters, and employees excluding salaries, wages and amount to related party.

acct_label: Short-term Debt, Amount (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Insurance Receivable for Malpractice, Current
acct_description: The current portion of the amount receivable from insurance and similar arrangements for reimbursement and payment of malpractice claims and litigation costs.

acct_label: General Partner's Share of Undistributed Earnings, Incentive Distribution Right Embedded in General Partner Interest
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings allocated to the general partner (as if the undistributed earnings were available cash) when the incentive distribution right is embedded in the general partner's interest. Depending on the structure of the master limited partnership, the incentive distribution right may be a separate class of non-voting limited partner interest that the general partner holds but generally may sell of transfer apart from its overall interest.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding General Partnership Unit, Net of Tax
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to general partnership (GP) unit-holder in a publicly trade limited partnership (LP) or master limited partnership (MLP).

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding General Partnership Unit
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of gain (loss) on disposal of discontinued operations available to general partnership (GP) unit-holder.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding General Partnership Unit, Net of Tax
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to general partnership (GP) unit-holder.

acct_label: Other Ownership Interests, Capital Account
acct_description: Capital account balance of the other unit holders in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

acct_label: Preferred Units, Cumulative Cash Distributions
acct_description: Aggregate cumulative cash distributions made to the preferred partners.

acct_label: Ground Leases, Gross
acct_description: Gross long-term land leases capitalized as part of real property.

acct_label: Distribution Made to Limited Liability Company (LLC) Member, Distributions Paid, Per Unit
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount of cash distributions paid to unit-holder of a limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Own-share Lending Arrangement, Shares, Issued
acct_description: The number of shares issued in connection with an own-share lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing.

acct_label: Site Contingency, Accrual, Discount Rate (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Rate applied to the undiscounted amount of environmental loss contingencies at an individual site to arrive at the present value recorded as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Site Contingency, Accrual, Present Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Present value of the accrual for environmental loss contingencies at an individual site as of the balance sheet date (if the accrual qualifies for discounting).

acct_label: Registration Payment Arrangement, Gains and Losses
acct_description: The decrease (gain) or increase (loss) in the carrying amount of the registration payment obligation that was recognized in earnings during the period.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Revolving, Converted to Term Loan During Period
acct_description: Amount of increase in term loan from conversion of revolving financing receivable.

acct_label: Development Wells Drilled, Net Nonproductive
acct_description: The number of nonproductive development wells (dry wells) drilled in the geographic area.
