acct_description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in thirty-sixth through fortieth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts, Premium Receivable
acct_description: Amount of the premium receivable for financial guarantee insurance contracts reported in the statement of financial position. This element primarily would consist of those financial guarantee insurance contracts which premiums are to be collected over the contract period, but may, on occasion, include premiums which are to be collected in full at inception, but which straddle a financial reporting period.

acct_label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net, Financial Guarantee
acct_description: Amount, after policies assumed or ceded, of provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for financial guarantee insurance contracts.

acct_label: Liability for Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts
acct_description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to financial default insured events that have occurred on or before a particular date (ordinarily, the balance sheet date) and the amount needed to provide for the estimated ultimate cost required to investigate and settle claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before a particular date (ordinarily, the balance sheet date), whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

acct_label: Premiums Earned, Net, Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts
acct_description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of financial guarantee premiums earned.

acct_label: Revenue from Administrative Services Unaffiliated (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate revenue from unaffiliated entities earned during the period from providing administrative services to investment managers or funds seeking to outsource all or part of their mutual fund service functions. Examples of such administrative or support services include the following: legal advice, centralized cash management, filing of reports with the SEC and the IRS, registering of fund shares, corresponding with shareholders, and determination of compliance with various restrictions. An affiliate is a party that, directly or indirectly through one or more intermediaries, controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with the entity.

acct_label: Schedule of Insured Financial Obligations with Credit Deterioration, Statement of Financial Position, Claim Liability
acct_description: This element represents the claim liability, reported on or included in the statement of financial position, related to financial guarantee insurance contracts and presented in the schedule of insured financial obligations with credit deterioration in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

acct_label: Schedule of Insured Financial Obligations with Credit Deterioration, Statement of Financial Position, Reinsurance Recoverable
acct_description: This element represents the amount of reinsurance recoverable, reported on or included in the statement of financial position, related to financial guarantee insurance contracts and presented in the schedule of insured financial obligations with credit deterioration in the context of each surveillance grouping or category used by management to monitor and track potential deterioration in the credit worthiness of the insured party's ability to meet its financial obligations related to the contracts underlying financial guarantee insurance contracts the entity has issued.

acct_label: Revenue Recognition, New Accounting Pronouncement, Material Effect, Revenue Deferred under Amended Guidance (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: For arrangements that precede the adoption of the amending guidance, the amount of deferred revenue at the end of the reporting period under the amended guidance.

acct_label: Electrical Distribution Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue earned during the period from the delivery of electricity to a retail customer's home or business through distribution wires or facilities of regulated public utilities. Also known as power delivery revenue.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Held-to-maturity Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Qualitative Disclosures, Default Rate
acct_description: This item represents the default rate of the underlying assets in the security that was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are other than temporarily impaired and only the amount of impairment related to credit loss was recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Fair Value, Option, Disclosures Related to Election, Items Existing at Effective Date, Borrowings (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a financial asset or liability (as defined) for which the fair value option is elected and which item existed at the effective date (as defined).

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Asbestos Obligations
acct_description: The amount of asbestos related liabilities included in liabilities subject to compromise.

acct_label: Assumed Premiums Written, Life (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Premiums assumed for all life insurance assumed from other insurers as a result of reinsurance arrangements.

acct_label: Stock Converted from One Class to Another Class, Shares (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Reduction in the number of shares due to a conversion of stock from one class to another during the period. Conversion may be among classes of common or nonredeemable preferred stock or from common stock or nonredeemable preferred stock to nonredeemable preferred stock or common stock, respectively.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Deferred Income Tax Assets, Current
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to current deferred income tax assets.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in under Energy Recovery
acct_description: The change during the reporting period in the value of the liability created by an under-recovery. An under-recovery means that the basic energy product price based on the daily product price and exchange rate is more than the basic fuel price used in the calculation of the monthly retail energy product.

acct_label: Secured Debt, Reverse Repurchase Agreements (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value, as of the balance sheet date, of securities purchased under agreements to resell where the transferor maintains effective control over the assets.

acct_label: Market Data Revenue
acct_description: Amount of revenue from market data services, including, but not limited to, information about current quotes and most recent prices for a specific security.

acct_label: Noncontrolling Interest Expense (Income), Real Estate Investments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: For banks, amount of Income or Loss from consolidated real estate investments attributed to noncontrolling interest holders.

acct_label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Real Estate Partnerships
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow from other real estate partnerships not otherwise defined in the taxonomy (buyouts, other agreements).

acct_label: Premiums Receivable, Gain (Loss) on Sale of Receivables
acct_description: The aggregate amount of gains or losses on transfers of premium receivables reported as sales by an insurance entity.

acct_label: Premiums Receivable, Proceeds from Sale of Receivables
acct_description: The amount of proceeds from the transfer of premium receivables reported as sales by an insurance entity.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Investment in Federal Home Loan Bank Stock (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Extraordinary Items, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic and Diluted (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The income (loss) from extraordinary items, net of related tax effect, per each basic and diluted limited partnership and general partnership unit when the per unit amount is the same for both basic and diluted units.

acct_label: Insurance Receivable for Malpractice
acct_description: The amount receivable from insurance and similar arrangements for reimbursement and payment of malpractice claims and litigation costs.

acct_label: Malpractice Insurance, Deductible (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of risk retained by the entity before the insurance arrangement begins to provide coverage.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Maximum Leverage Payout Ratio
acct_description: Maximum percentage of eligible retained income that can be paid out in distribution and discretionary bonus payment by global systemically important bank (GSIB) as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Transfers, Net (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Represents the net increase or decrease to the amount of certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) attributable to transfers in and out of the Level 3 category for purposes of measuring fair value. Such transfers may, for example, be due to changes in the observability of significant measurement inputs.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Revenue Multiple (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Market valuation of entity divided by revenue, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Liquidation Basis of Accounting, Items Previously Not Recognized
acct_description: Amount of items not previously recognized that are expected to be sold in liquidation.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Additional Series, Value, Outstanding (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate value of additional series of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by shareholders, which is net of related treasury stock. May be all or a portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. These shares represent the ownership interest of the preferred shareholders.

acct_label: Time Sharing Transactions, Allowance for Uncollectible Accounts, Deductions for Direct Write-offs Charged Against Allowance
acct_description: Amount of decrease in the allowance for uncollectible accounts, for time sharing transactions, from direct write-offs charged against the allowance.

acct_label: Time Sharing Transactions, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the allowance for uncollectible accounts attributable to time sharing transactions.

acct_label: Available-for-sale, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Other, Level of Subordination
acct_description: This item represents the current level of subordination of the entity's receipt of consideration should the assets underlying the security be liquidated when the level of subordination was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

acct_label: Compensated Absences Liability, Sabbatical Leave
acct_description: Amount of liability accrued for the employer's obligation related to an employee's right to receive compensation during a future sabbatical leave. This amount does not include amounts accrued for the employee's future vacation and holidays.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Accounts Payable (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Cash and Cash Equivalents (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Notes Receivable (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Derivative Financial Instruments, Assets (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Restricted, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents investments in debt securities which are categorized as held-to-maturity and that have scheduled maturities more than one year from the balance sheet date or operating cycle, if longer, and that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

acct_label: Leveraged Buyout, Percentage of Purchase Price Allocated to Assets and Liabilities Acquired at Fair Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage of purchase price allocated to assets and liabilities acquired at their respective fair values.

acct_label: Gas and Oil Acreage, Developed, Gross (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Developed acres are acres spaced or assigned to productive wells. Gross acreage is an acre in which a working interest is owned.

acct_label: Gas and Oil Acreage, Developed, Net (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Developed acres are acres spaced or assigned to productive wells. Net acres is the sum of the fractional interest owned based on working interests or other economic arrangements.

acct_label: Gas and Oil Acreage, Undeveloped, Gross (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Undeveloped acreage is considered to be those lease acres on which wells have not been drilled or completed to a point that would permit the production of commercial quantities of oil and gas regardless of whether or not such acreage contains proved reserves. Gross acreage is an acre in which a working interest is owned.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent restricted cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent restricted cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Productive Oil Wells, Number of Wells with Multiple Completions, Gross
acct_description: The total number of productive oil wells and oil wells capable of production which access multiple reservoirs through one well bore, in which the entity owns an undivided working interest.

acct_label: Productive Oil Wells, Number of Wells with Multiple Completions, Net
acct_description: The total number of productive oil wells and oil wells capable of production which access multiple reservoirs through one well bore, in which the entity owns a fractional working interest.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Liquidating Investment, Remaining Period (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the remaining period (for example, years, months, days) for those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) that the entity can never redeem, but from which the entity receives distributions through the liquidation of the underlying assets by the investee.

acct_label: Distribution Made to Member or Limited Partner, Per Unit Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Per-share or per-unit cash dividends declared or paid to a common shareholder or unit-holder by LLC or LP.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Unusual items (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of profit or loss recognized by the reporting segment related to unusual items, which are items that are abnormal or significantly different from the ordinary and typical activities of the entity. Information is generally expected to be disclosed if the amount (a) is included in the measure of segment profit or loss reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) is otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in that measure of segment profit or loss.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease.

acct_label: Notes Receivable by Owner to Limited Liability Company (LLC)
acct_description: Amount of an agreement for an unconditional promise by an owner to pay limited liability company (LLC) a definite sum of money at a future date.

acct_label: Immediate, Terminal Funding Annuities, Interest Rate, Low End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Minimum interest rate in the range of interest rates used to calculate future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and related expenses less the present value of future net premiums using assumptions such as estimates of expected investment yields, mortality, morbidity, terminations and expenses, applicable at the time the insurance contracts are made and cost of settling insured claims and cost incurred in the claim settlement process of immediate terminal funding annuities.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire Loans and Leases Held-for-investment, Credit Card Securitizations
acct_description: The cash outflow from the purchase of securitized credit card receivables which are held for investment purposes. Securitization is the structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

acct_label: Proceeds from Collection of Retained Interest in Securitized Receivables categorized as Held-to-maturity
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from collection on beneficial interest in securitization of loan receivable measured at amortized cost.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Assets, Merchandise (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to merchandise inventory.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Available-for-sale Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Qualitative Disclosures, Level of Subordination
acct_description: This item represents the current level of subordination of the entity's receipt of consideration should the assets underlying the security be liquidated when the level of subordination was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are other than temporarily impaired and the amount of such impairment determined to be related to credit loss recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Interest Expense Domestic Deposit Liabilities, Notice of Withdrawal
acct_description: Amount of interest expense on domestic notice of withdrawal demand deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Amount of Maturities and Sinking Fund Requirements
acct_description: States the combined aggregate amount of maturities and sinking fund requirements for a long-term unconditional purchase obligation that has been recognized on the balance sheet.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Computer Equipment (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Long-lived depreciable assets used in the creation, maintenance and utilization of information systems that are subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Components, Credit Facilities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Amounts outstanding under credit facilities (lines of credit and letters of credit) classified as long-term debt as of the balance sheet date (including both current and noncurrent portions).

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Components, Credit Facilities, Current (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Current portion of amount outstanding under credit facilities (lines of credit and letters of credit) as of the balance sheet date (excluding noncurrent portions).

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Other Postretirement Obligations
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent other postretirement obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Weighted Average General Partnership Units Outstanding
acct_description: Weighted average number of general partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that general partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contract, Premium Receivable, to be Collected, Year One
acct_description: Amount of premium receivable under financial guarantee insurance contract to be collected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts, Premium Received over Contract Period, Premium Receivable, Accretion
acct_description: The amount of accretion on premium receivable in the statement of income for financial guarantee insurance contracts where premium is received over the contract period.

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts, Premium Received over Contract Period, Unearned Premium Revenue
acct_description: Amount of unearned premium revenue in the statement of financial position for financial guarantee insurance contracts where the premium is received over the contract period.

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts, Premiums Receivable, Adjustment
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the premiums receivable on financial guarantee insurance contracts. Includes, but is not limited to, adjustments due to changes in the period of the contract, accretion of the discount on the premiums receivable, and adjustments classified as other. Excludes new business written and proceeds from premiums.

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts, Premiums Receivable, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the premiums receivable on financial guarantee insurance contracts.

acct_label: Production and Property Tax Expense (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: A tax assessed on oil and gas production and real estate. The tax is usually based on the value of property and land owned.

acct_label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Greater than One Year
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than one year.

acct_label: Contract Receivable, Due after Next Rolling Twelve Months (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs to be collected after the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Gain (Loss), Included in Earnings, Net (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in the income statement from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Other Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to other long-term debt.

acct_label: Cumulative-Effect Adjustment, Application of Fair Value Option, Gross Gains (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The gross gains that make up a cumulative-effect adjustment on retained earnings related to the election of the fair value option.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Loss Contracts Expense (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Losses recognized when it is probable that a loss has been incurred and the amount of the loss can be reasonably estimated, i.e., when it is probably that expected future health care costs and maintenance costs under existing contracts will exceed anticipated future premiums and stop-loss insurance recoveries on those contracts.

acct_label: Health Care Trust Fund, Administrative Expense (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Expenses such as legal, investment and trust fees incurred by the health care trust during the accounting period.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Accrual Not Recognized (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Description of a loss contingency for malpractice claims that is not recognized for financial reporting purposes because the accounting recognition criteria is not met but there is a reasonable possibility of loss or additional loss (for example, a loss is not probable, but reasonably possible, of occurrence). The disclosure includes the nature of the loss contingency and a range of loss or statement that an estimate cannot be made.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Accrual Not Recognized, High End of Loss Range (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: High end of the loss range for a loss contingency for malpractice claims that is reasonably possible to occur but does not meet the loss recognition criteria.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Accrual, Undiscounted, Current
acct_description: Amount of the current portion of the accrued liability on an undiscounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability).

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Accrual, Undiscounted, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of the noncurrent portion of the accrued liability on an undiscounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability).

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Claims Incurred in Prior Periods
acct_description: Amount of increase in asserted and unasserted malpractice claims that were originally recognized in a prior period.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in the accrued liability for malpractice claims during an accounting period.

acct_label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) from Continuing Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Diluted
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations, allocated to common stock, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Convertible, Conversion Price, Decrease
acct_description: Per share decrease in conversion price of convertible preferred stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Convertible, Conversion Price, Increase
acct_description: Per share increase in conversion price of convertible preferred stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Federal Funds Sold and Securities Borrowed or Purchased under Agreements to Resell
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Underlying, Derivative Energy Measure
acct_description: Specified interest rate, security price, commodity price, foreign exchange rate, index of prices or rates for a derivative contract measured in energy volume but not the derivative contract itself.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Significantly Undercapitalized, Minimum
acct_description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets categorized as significantly undercapitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Copyrights, Gross (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of the legal rights held for a finite period specified by legislation, covering only the form or manner in which ideas or information have been manifested, and which prohibit reproduction of same without the right holder's consent, such as reproducing copyrighted text, a work of art, or software.

acct_label: Capital Leases of Lessor, Contingent Rentals, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
acct_description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the lessor's capital lease (sales-type and direct financing leases).

acct_label: Conversion of Stock, Shares Issued (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The number of new shares issued in the conversion of stock in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of Income or Loss from the cumulative effect of a change in accounting principle, net of tax effect, per each share of common stock outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle Presented on Income Statement, Tax (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Income tax expense pertaining to the cumulative effect of a change in accounting principle reported on the income statement in the period.

acct_label: Income (Loss) before Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, Per Basic Share (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Income or Loss from continuing operations and from discontinued operations after extraordinary items and income taxes but before the cumulative effect of a change in accounting principle, per each share of common stock outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Income (Loss) before Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, Per Diluted Share (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Income or Loss from continuing operations and from discontinued operations after extraordinary items and income taxes but before the cumulative effect of a change in accounting principle, per each share of common stock and dilutive common stock equivalents outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Short-term Investments
acct_description: Amount of short-term investments at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Short-term Investments
acct_description: Amount of short-term investments at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Cumulative-Effect Adjustment, Application of Fair Value Option, Gross Losses (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The gross losses that make up a cumulative-effect adjustment on retained earnings related to the election of the fair value option.

acct_label: Unamortized Discounts on Acceptances Resold
acct_description: The amount of the unamortized discount or expense related to the financial institution's sale of short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by the institution (also known as Banker's Acceptances) in the secondary market.

acct_label: Capital Accumulation Plan (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Value of stock in an investment or savings plan established by the entity for the benefit of its employees that permits the employees to make investment decisions. Also, a trust established to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees.

acct_label: Capital Accumulation Plans
acct_description: Value of stock in an investment or savings plan established by the entity for the benefit of its employees that permits the employees to make investment decisions.

acct_label: Cash Flows Between Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Special Purpose Entity (SPE) and Transferor, Servicing Advances (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of cash outflow used for servicing in advance of the completion of the securitization or asset-backed financing arrangement.

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Securities Loaned or Sold under Agreements to Repurchase (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position liability caption which represents a class of liabilities, or which may include an individual liability, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Sold, Not yet Purchased, Physical Commodities Sold
acct_description: Fair value of obligations arising from physical commodities sold short.

acct_label: Security Owned Not Readily Marketable, Quoted Price
acct_description: Amount of not readily marketable security or investment measured by quoted price.

acct_label: Accumulated Undistributed Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Accumulated income that has not been distributed to unit holders.

acct_label: Unusual or Infrequent Item, Fourth Quarter (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Unusual or infrequent items recognized in the fourth quarter in the absence of either a fourth-quarter report or disclosure in the annual report for the fourth quarter.

acct_label: Income (Loss) of Discontinued Operation, Equity Method Investment Retained after Disposal, before Income Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of income (loss) of the investee in which an equity method investment is retained after disposal of discontinued operation.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: Amount of accumulated amortization of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property, Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Current Year Claim and Claim Adjustment Expense
acct_description: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of expense for claim incurred in current reporting period and related claim settlement cost for property-casualty insurance underwriter.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property, Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Prior Year Claim and Claim Adjustment Expense
acct_description: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of expense (reversal of expense) for claim incurred in prior reporting period and related claim settlement cost for property-casualty insurance underwriter.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

acct_label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Indemnification Payment Received
acct_description: Amount received for indemnification payment for tax effect other than investment tax credit for operating lease.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Outstanding, Greater than One Billion Dollars Per Borrower, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of advances outstanding made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) that are in excess of one billion U.S. dollars per borrower to the total advances outstanding.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Furniture and Fixtures (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Long-lived depreciable assets including desks, chairs and store fixtures that are subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Reclassifications to Nonaccretable Difference (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Change in the estimate of cash flows expected to be collected, which results in a decrease in accretable yield. This relates to a loan accounted for as an available-for-sale debt security, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Acquired, Cash Flows Expected to be Collected at Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of cash flows expected to be collected at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Acquired, Contractually Required Payments Receivable at Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of contractually required payments receivable at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Carrying Amount, Net
acct_description: The recorded balance, net of any applicable reductions (for example, unamortized accretable yield and other-than-temporary impairments), for certain contractual rights to receive money on demand or on fixed or determinable dates. This relates to loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Outstanding Balance
acct_description: The undiscounted sum of all amounts, including amounts deemed principal, interest, fees, penalties, and other under the loan, owed to the investor at the reporting date, whether or not currently due and whether or not any such amounts have been written or charged off by the investor. This relates to loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contract, Premium Revenue to be Recognized, Year One
acct_description: Amount of premium revenue under financial guarantee insurance contract to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Shares Used in Computation of Basic Earnings (Loss) Per Share (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Number of shares, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares and other shares not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

acct_label: Shares Used in Computation of Diluted Earnings (Loss) Per Share (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Each share of common stock outstanding and each share that would have been outstanding during the period under the treasury stock method.

acct_label: Troubled Debt Restructuring, Debtor, Current Period, Gain (Loss) on Restructuring, Tax Effect
acct_description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) on the gain (loss) recognized for the restructuring of payables for troubled debt restructurings.

acct_label: Net Income (Loss) from Real Estate Investment Partnership, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of income (loss) from consolidated real estate investments attributed to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Signage Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from renting space for public and private signs (for example, advertising on taxies, buses, subways and billboards).

acct_label: Credit Derivative, Liquidation Proceeds, Monetary Amount
acct_description: Estimated amount to which the maximum potential amount of future payments under the credit derivative would be covered by the proceeds from liquidation of assets held either as collateral or by third parties.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) from Hedged Firm Commitment Not Qualifying as Interest Rate Fair Value Hedge, Net
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in earnings when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as an interest rate fair value hedge.

acct_label: Nonconsolidated Legal Entity, Financial Support Amount
acct_description: Amount of financial support provided to a nonconsolidated legal entity that is required to comply with or operate in accordance with requirements that are similar to those included in Rule 2a-7 of the Investment Company Act of 1940 for registered money market funds.

acct_label: Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Entity's Share of Equity Method Investees' Standardized Discounted Future Net Cash Flows (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The enterprise's share of the investees' standardized measure of discounted future net cash flows for the period, in the aggregate and by each geographic area for which quantities are disclosed. This information is excluded from the enterprise's standardized measure and is disclosed separately if the financial statements of the reporting enterprise include investments that are accounted for by the equity method.

acct_label: Site Contingency, Loss Exposure in Excess of Accrual, High Estimate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: High-end of the range estimate of the reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of the amount accrued for environmental loss contingencies at an individual site.

acct_label: Significant Changes, Franchised Outlets in Operation
acct_description: The number of franchised outlets in operation at the balance sheet date when there are significant changes in franchisor-owned outlets or franchised outlets during the period.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
acct_description: Amount of writeoff of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, charged against allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, Commercial, at Acquisition, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value at acquisition of acquired commercial loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, Consumer, at Acquisition, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value at acquisition of acquired consumer loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Financial Instrument Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Maturity, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of mandatorily redeemable capital stock maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Financial Instrument Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Maturity, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of mandatorily redeemable capital stock maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Financial Instrument Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Maturity, Year One
acct_description: Amount of mandatorily redeemable capital stock maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Financial Instrument Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Maturity, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of mandatorily redeemable capital stock maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Financial Instrument Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Maturity, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of mandatorily redeemable capital stock maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain Reclassified to Revenue (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of gains on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to revenues from accumulated other comprehensive income.

acct_label: Revenue from Enrollment and Registration Fees, Excluding Hospitality Enterprises (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue earned during the period from enrollment, registration and customer start up fees. Commonly used in health and fitness clubs and other membership clubs, but excluding hotel, cruise lines, casinos, and other hospitality concerns which are included in Facility Membership and Operations Revenue.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Call Date, in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date within the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Put or Convert Date, after Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next put or convert date after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Put or Convert Date, in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next put or convert date within the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Put or Convert Date, in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next put or convert date within the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Put or Convert Date, in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next put or convert date within the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Put or Convert Date, in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next put or convert date within the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
acct_description: Amount of writeoff of net investment in sales-type lease, charged against allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Loss Exposure in Excess of Accrual, High Estimate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: High-end of the range estimate of the reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of the amount accrued for damages pertaining to a specified product.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Sale
acct_description: Amount of decrease from sale of net investment in sales-type lease.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, Adjustment from AOCI for Accretion of Noncredit Portion of OTTI, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for accretion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security.

acct_label: Percentage of Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits to Deposits, Retail
acct_description: Percentage of interest-bearing domestic retail deposit liabilities to total deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, Adjustment from AOCI for Accretion of Noncredit Portion of OTTI, Tax
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for accretion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security.

acct_label: Limited Partners' Cumulative Special Earnings (Losses)
acct_description: The aggregate cumulative amount of earnings allocated to limited partners as a result of a non-recurring event (for example, a one-time settlement).

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Price Per Square Foot (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost of construction of real property stated is a price per square foot, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration Arrangements, Change in Amount, Contingent Assets and Liabilities, Recognized, Asset (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the amount of any change, including any differences arising upon settlement, recognized during the reporting period in the value of a recognized asset or assets arising from a contingency, recognized in a business combination.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Preferred, Redemption Value
acct_description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest for preferred shares, units or ownership interests classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation During Phase-out Period, before Income Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until its disposal.

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Including Contract Retainage
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, including amount withheld under retainage provision in contract.

acct_label: Underwriting Expense Ratio
acct_description: Ratio of non-life acquisition expenses and certain non-life general and administrative expenses, to non-life net premiums earned.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank Assessments
acct_description: Amount of Affordable Housing Program (AHP) assessments and Congressionally mandated Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments.

acct_label: Financing Receivable, Transfer to Held-for-Investment, Allowance for Credit Loss, Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for allowance for credit loss on financing receivable transferred to held-for-investment classification.

acct_label: Cash and Securities Segregated under Commodity Exchange Act Regulation
acct_description: Cash and securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to the Commodity Exchange Act.

acct_label: Cash and Securities Segregated under Other Regulations (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Cash and securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to regulations other than SEC Regulations and the Commodity Exchange Act.

acct_label: Securities Segregated under Commodity Exchange Act Regulation (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value of securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to the Commodity Exchange Act.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Principal Payments on Contract Receivables (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in the principal payments on contract receivables.

acct_label: Investment Company, Expense Ratio after Incentive Allocation
acct_description: Percentage of expense, after incentive allocation, to average net assets.

acct_label: Investment Company, Expense Ratio before Incentive Allocation
acct_description: Percentage, before incentive allocation, of expense to average net assets.

acct_label: Investment Company, Total Return after Incentive Fees
acct_description: Percentage increase (decrease), after deduction of incentive fee, in fund net asset value. Includes, but is not limited to, interest and dividend income (loss) and realized and unrealized gain (loss).

acct_label: Investment Company, Total Return before Incentive Fees
acct_description: Percentage increase (decrease), before deduction of incentive fee, in fund net asset value. Includes, but is not limited to, interest and dividend income (loss) and realized and unrealized gain (loss).

acct_label: Derivative, Excluded Component, Gain, Recognized in Earnings
acct_description: Amount of gain from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.

acct_label: Assets of Wholly Owned Real Estate Investment Subsidiaries
acct_description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held by entities that are wholly-owned.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Call Date, after Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Call Date, in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date within the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Call Date, in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date within the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Call Date, in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date within the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Call Date, in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next call date within the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Accounts Receivable Acquired (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of accounts receivable that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Available-for-sale, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Other, Fair Value Volatility, Rate
acct_description: This item represents the volatility of the security's fair value, represented as a percentage, which was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

acct_label: Inventory, Drilling, Noncurrent
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of inventories of minerals, materials and supplies related to long-term drilling operations.

acct_label: Noninterest-bearing Foreign Deposit, Checking (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of noninterest-bearing checking deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Premium Costs
acct_description: Amount of costs incurred that are associated with obtaining malpractice insurance and other risk transferring arrangements during an accounting period.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Sale
acct_description: Amount of decrease from sale of debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

acct_label: Fair Value, Net Derivative Asset (Liability), Recurring Basis, Still Held, Unrealized Gain (Loss), OCI
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured at fair value using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

acct_label: Retail Land Sale, Estimated Cost of Major Improvement
acct_description: Estimated cost of expenditure for improvement for each major area from which retail land sale was made during five fiscal years following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Period Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Total net Increase or Decrease in the aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan for loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Year One, Originated, Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated in current fiscal year.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Year Two, Originated, Fiscal Year before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Year Four, Originated, Three Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Year Three, Originated, Two Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Originated, More than Five Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Year Five, Originated, Four Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Theatrical Film Costs, Development
acct_description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in development of a theatrical film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling Year Two and Three
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the second and third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Weighted Average Rate Domestic Deposit, Retail (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic retail deposit liabilities.

acct_label: Leveraged Lease Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of net Income or Loss composed of: (1) pretax lease income (or loss), (2) investment tax credit, allocated proportionately between unearned and deferred income included in the net investment, and (3) the tax effect of the pretax lease income (or loss) recognized, which is reflected in tax expense for the year.

acct_label: Coal Industry Retiree Health Benefit Act of 1992, Estimated Amount of Obligation
acct_description: Amount of obligation for medical and death benefits to be provided under Coal Industry Retiree Health Benefit Act of 1992.

acct_label: Equity Issuance, Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The total dollar amount assigned to the consideration received for equity securities issued during a specific stock issuance.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Discontinuation of Price Risk Cash Flow Hedge Due to Forecasted Transaction Probable of Not Occurring, Net
acct_description: The amount of net gain (loss) reclassified into earnings when price risk cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

acct_label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Sales
acct_description: Reduction in valuation allowance of servicing assets based on sale of the related asset.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Sinking Fund Payment
acct_description: Amount paid into a fund, which is used to retire the debt instrument.

acct_label: Amount of Embedded Regulatory Liability
acct_description: Discloses amount of embedded regulatory liabilities within the plant accounts. This may result when the regulatory depreciable life is shorter than the depreciable life generally used for nonregulatory accounting.

acct_label: Line of Credit Facility, Decrease, Forgiveness (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Decrease for amounts of indebtedness forgiven by the holder of the credit facility.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Other, Default Rate
acct_description: This item represents the default rate of the underlying assets in the security that were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated, More than Five Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Year Five, Originated, Four Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Year One, Originated, Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated in current fiscal year.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Year Two, Originated, Fiscal Year before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Year Four, Originated, Three Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Year Three, Originated, Two Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Preferred Units, Value (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Capital contributed by preferred partners. Preferred partners are partners in a publicly listed limited partnership or master limited partnership with preferential rights and privileges.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Inventory, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount classified as inventory attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Receivable for Recovery of Import Duties, Net, Current (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of tariffs due either from customers or suppliers arising from sales or purchases, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities or vendors. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Film, Monetized in Film Group, Completed and Not Released Film, Expected Amortization in Next Operating Cycle
acct_description: Amount of amortization for completed and not released film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements and expected to be recognized within next operating cycle.

acct_label: Film, Monetized on Its Own, Capitalized Cost, Completed and Not Released
acct_description: Amount of capitalized film cost for completed and not released film predominantly monetized on its own.

acct_label: Film, Monetized on Its Own, Capitalized Cost, Development and Preproduction
acct_description: Amount of capitalized film cost incurred in development and preproduction of film predominantly monetized on its own.

acct_label: Film, Monetized on Its Own, Capitalized Cost, Production
acct_description: Amount of capitalized film cost incurred in production of film predominantly monetized on its own.

acct_label: Film, Monetized on Its Own, Capitalized Cost, Released
acct_description: Amount of capitalized film cost for released film predominantly monetized on its own.

acct_label: Preferred Units, Offering Costs
acct_description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the preferred partners.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Common, Redemption Value
acct_description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest for common shares, units or ownership interests classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

acct_label: Derivative Asset, Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell, Securities Borrowed, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
acct_description: Amount of derivative assets, securities purchased under agreements to resell and securities borrowed, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

acct_label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
acct_description: Amount of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

acct_label: Receivable for Recovery of Import Duties, Net
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of tariffs due either from customers or suppliers arising from sales or purchases, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities or vendors.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Investment in Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) from Sale of Financial Assets in Securitizations or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: Difference between the sale price and the carrying value when a financial asset transferred in a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer is accounted for as a sale, including those transactions in which the seller or transferor has continuing involvement with the financial assets that have been transferred.

acct_label: Investment Sold, Not yet Purchased, Balance, Shares
acct_description: Number of securities sold short (the short position) as of the end of the period.

acct_label: Trading Activity, Gain
acct_description: The net gain on trading activities (including both derivative and nonderivative instruments) recognized in the statement of financial performance.

acct_label: Shareholder Loans to Finance Leveraged Buyout (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Proceeds from shareholder loans used to finance leveraged buyout transaction.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Guarantees (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Weighted Average Rate, Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits, over Time
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate calculated over time for domestic deposit liability.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Accrued Investment Income
acct_description: Amount of accrued investment income held by the closed block.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Income Tax Receivable
acct_description: Amount of tax refunds receivable held by the closed block.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Other Investments
acct_description: Amount of other investments held by the closed block.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Premiums and Other Receivables, Net
acct_description: Amount, after the allowance for doubtful accounts, of premium and other receivables held by the closed block.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Real Estate
acct_description: Real estate investments allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Liabilities, Other Policyholder Funds
acct_description: Amount of closed block policyholder funds held, which are refundable.

acct_label: Closed Block Liabilities, Policyholder Dividends Payable
acct_description: Amount of dividends payable as of the balance sheet date to policyholders of contracts in the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Policyholder Dividends
acct_description: An expense for the period representing distributions paid or accrued for the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block), which may be presented in a table of closed block operations as part of summarized financial data.

acct_label: Additional Liability, Long-Duration Insurance, Original Discount Rate, before Cash Flow and Reinsurance
acct_description: Amount, before effect of reinsurance and current period update of cash flow assumption, of present value of total expected payment to policyholder in excess of present value of total expected assessment, discounted at original rate. Excludes benefit classified as market risk benefit or under provisions of Topic 815 on derivative and hedging.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Amount of current deferred income tax liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Buildings and Improvements
acct_description: Amount of buildings and improvements at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Deferred Income Tax Assets, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent deferred income tax assets at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income, Reclassification Adjustment on Swaps Included in Net Income, Tax (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Tax on reclassification adjustment for unrealized gains or losses on interest rate swaps included in accumulated comprehensive income that was realized in net income during the period.

acct_label: Investment Company, Investment Income (Loss) Ratio, after Incentive Allocation
acct_description: Percentage, after incentive allocation, of investment income (loss) to average net assets.

acct_label: Subordinated Liabilities, Additions
acct_description: New liabilities assumed during the reporting period that are subordinated to claims of general creditors.

acct_label: Excess Net Capital at 1500 Percent
acct_description: The amount of net capital in excess of the minimum required net capital.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Held-to-maturity Debt Securities, Other-than-Temporary Impairment Charges, Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of expense to write-down the amortized cost basis of loans, after acquisition, to fair value when the decline in the fair value is determined to be other than temporary (OTTI) for loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Noncurrent Other Obligations
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to noncurrent obligations classified as other.

acct_label: Proved Undeveloped Reserves (BOE) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Net quantities of an enterprise's interests in proved undeveloped reserves of either crude oil (including condensate and natural gas liquids), natural gas, synthetic oil and gas, or other nonrenewable natural resource that is intended to be upgraded into synthetic oil and gas as of the beginning and the end of the year. "Net" quantities of reserves include those relating to the enterprise's operating and nonoperating interests in properties. Quantities of reserves relating to royalty interests owned are included in "net" quantities if the necessary information is available to the enterprise. "Net" quantities do not include reserves relating to interests of others in properties owned by the enterprise. Measured in barrel of oil equivalent (BOE).

acct_label: Direct-to-television Film Costs, Development
acct_description: The amount of direct negative costs incurred in development of a direct-to-television film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest.
