Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

acct_label: Business Combination, Liabilities Arising from Contingencies, Amount Recognized, Other than at Fair Value
acct_description: The amount, measured at other than acquisition-date fair value, of all the liabilities assumed that arise from contingencies and were recognized by the entity, if the acquisition-date fair value cannot be determined and other criteria (as defined) related to the contingencies have been met.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Fixed Rate
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Consumer, Loans in Process (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The undisbursed portion of the consumer loan receivable balance (loans in process) which is deducted separately from total loans.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Change in Method, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on reinsurance recoverable, from change in methodology.

acct_label: Competitive Transition Charge, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the regulatory asset that represents capitalized stranded costs that are expected to be recoverable through a competitive transition charge (CTC) to customers after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer. A CTC is a charge approved by a regulator that allows deregulated utilities to recover investments in certain assets, such as power plants, over a transition period leading into a deregulated market.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Restricted, Carrying Value Per Unit at Date of Balance Sheet (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying value per unit of investment at date of related balance sheet.

acct_label: Investment Company, Expense Ratio Excluding Incentive Fee
acct_description: Percentage, after deduction of fee waiver and before deduction of incentive fee, of expense to average net assets.

acct_label: Investment Company, Tax Return of Capital Distribution, Per Share
acct_description: Per share or unit amount of capital distribution in excess of tax basis earnings.

acct_label: Incremental Effect on Balance Sheet, Liability or Equity Line Item Change Due to Application of FAS 158 Recognition Provisions, Period Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Changes in individual liability or equity line items in the year-end statement of financial position that are incrementally affected by the recognition provisions of FAS 158 in the year of initial application.

acct_label: Construction Contract Cost, Progress Payment Offset
acct_description: Amount of progress payment netted against construction contract cost.

acct_label: Limited Liability Company (LLC) Members' Equity, Unit-based Payment Arrangement
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in members' equity for unit-based payment arrangement issued by limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Leveraged Buyout, Closing Fees and Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of cash paid for closing fees, debt issue costs, and other transaction expenses in a leveraged buyout transaction.

acct_label: Business Combination, Indemnification Assets, Range of Outcomes, Value, Low
acct_description: For indemnification assets recognized in connection with a business combination, this element represents an estimate of the low-end of the potential range (undiscounted) of the indemnification benefit which may be realized.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Amount of Disallowed Costs for Recently Completed Plant
acct_description: Amount of disallowed costs for rate making purposes for recently completed plants in regulated industries.

acct_label: Loss Contingency, Patents Found Infringed, Number
acct_description: Number of another entity's patents that the entity was found to have infringed.

acct_label: Banking Regulation, Leverage Buffer, Actual
acct_description: Leverage buffer percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

acct_label: Supplemental Unemployment Benefits, Continuation of Health Care
acct_description: Liability for extension of health coverage in instances where coverage under the plan would otherwise end.

acct_label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Debt Structure, Employer Loan Guarantee
acct_description: Reflects the amount as of the balance sheet date of the employer's guarantee of debt repayment by the ESOP.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Other, Redemption Value
acct_description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest for other shares, units or ownership interests classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.

acct_label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of Other than 10 or 20 Percent Adverse Change in Other Assumption, Percent
acct_description: A specified percentage variance in a specified key assumption in the determination of fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities).

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as current.

acct_label: Assets that Continue to be Recognized, Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Assets and any Other Financial Assets Managed Together, Average Balance During Period (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: This is the average principal amount (during the year) of the securitized and unsecuritized financial assets.

acct_label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) from Discontinued Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Diluted
acct_description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations, allocated to common stock, as if earnings and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares, had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

acct_label: Loans to Finance Leveraged Buyout (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Proceeds from term loans used to finance a leveraged buyout transaction (excludes subordinated notes and shareholder loans).

acct_label: Convertible Preferred Stock, Share Subscriptions (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The number of nonredeemable convertible preferred stock allocated to investors to buy shares of a new issue of preferred stock before it is offered to the public.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Federal Funds Purchased (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Cash Disbursements and Reclassification Increase (Decrease) under Bankruptcy Court Order, Resolutions of Contingencies Subject to Chapter 11 (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Cash disbursements made to creditors or reclassifications of liabilities subject to compromise pursuant to bankruptcy court orders with respect to prepetition contingencies.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Expense (Reversal of Expense) for Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) related to liabilities subject to compromise since the bankruptcy filing date.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Components Excluded from Assessment of Price Risk Hedge Effectiveness
acct_description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period relating to components of the gain (loss) on price risk hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of hedge effectiveness.

acct_label: Liability, Reporting Currency Denominated, Value
acct_description: The reporting currency-denominated liability value.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Held-to-maturity Securities
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

acct_label: Financial Asset, Amortized Cost, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on financial asset measured at amortized cost.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Fixed Rate, Year One
acct_description: Par amount of advance made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Short-Duration Contracts, Discounted Liabilities, Discount Rate, High End of Range (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The high end of a range of percentages used to reduce the estimated amount of loss reserves on short-duration contracts to present value.

acct_label: Short-Duration Contracts, Discounted Liabilities, Discount Rate, Low End of Range (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The low end of a range of percentages used to reduce the estimated amount of loss reserves on short-duration contracts to present value.

acct_label: Nonmonetary Transaction, Gross Operating Revenue Recognized
acct_description: The amount of gross operating revenue recognized in a nonmonetary transaction.

acct_label: Experience Rated Refunds Receivable (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The estimated amount due by a ceding insurer from an assuming insurer of future policy benefits and losses plus a profit factor in excess of premiums, typically based on formulas in an agreement between the parties.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Retained Interest
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Grandfathered ESOP Expense Recognition, Cash Contributions to ESOP
acct_description: For grandfathered ESOP shares acquired prior to January 1, 1993, the amount of cash contributions made to the ESOP.

acct_label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Capital Leased Assets, Current
acct_description: Amount classified as capital leased assets attributable to disposal group, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Unamortized Discounts on Acceptances Executed
acct_description: The amount of the unearned (fee) income on the financial institution's issuance of short-term negotiable time drafts (also known as Banker's Acceptances).

acct_label: Partners' Capital, Adjusted Balance (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of partners' capital after the cumulative effect adjustment of a new accounting principle applied in the period of adoption.

acct_label: Business Acquisitions, Purchase Price Allocation, Subsequent Years, Net Effect on Income (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The net effect on income before taxes of the amortization and accretion of premiums, discounts and intangible assets in years subsequent to the year of acquisition, when the total amounts of remaining discounts, premiums, and intangible assets exceed 30 percent of stockholders' equity.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Increase (Decrease) under Bankruptcy Court Order, Reclassifications
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in liabilities subject to compromise pursuant to the bankruptcy court orders from reclassifications of liabilities.

acct_label: Price Risk Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Net Change Interest and Noninterest-bearing Deposits, Foreign
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in foreign interest and noninterest bearing deposits.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Preferred and Common Stock Held in Treasury
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to preferred and common stock held in treasury.

acct_label: Operating Leases of Lessor, Contingent Rentals, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
acct_description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the lessor's operating lease.

acct_label: Investment Company, Shareholder Service Fee Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for shareholder services. Includes, but is not limited to, fee and expense for transfer and dividend disbursing agent.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Period Quantity Purchased
acct_description: The number of units that have been purchased during the period, in connection with an unconditional purchase obligation that has not been recognized for financial reporting purposes.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, after Reclassification Adjustment, Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit of financial liability measured under fair value option, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Capital Units, Deduction from Cost to Investors
acct_description: Amount of deductions from cost to investors of capital shares or other capital units for fees, loads and other charges.

acct_label: Open Option Contracts Written, Premiums
acct_description: Represents the premiums earned on the open option contracts held by the fund. This item is not required to be disclosed in Regulation S-X but is commonly reported by some funds.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Change in Method, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, from change in methodology.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Leasehold Improvements
acct_description: Amount of leasehold improvements at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Proceeds from Refunds from Suppliers of Material
acct_description: Cash received for refunds from suppliers during the current period. This element includes refunds from suppliers of materials; it excludes refunds from providers of fixed assets.

acct_label: Secondary Processing Revenue (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from secondary processing of earths, rocks and minerals not carried out at the extraction site (such as bitumen coating of chippings); secondary processing of materials recovered by dredging once they have been transferred from the dredging vessel (including the transfer process); secondary processing of crude oil into gases, liquids and solids; or metalworking processes that follow the forging process in which case the typical secondary processes are heat treating, rough machining, trimming, torch cutting, and testing.

acct_label: Net Amount at Risk by Product and Guarantee, Net Amount at Risk in Event of Death (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The portion of the specified guaranteed benefit amount in excess of the sum of the current account balance amounts assuming death of the insureds, corresponding to the specified guarantee or subset of the guarantee.

acct_label: Net Amount at Risk by Product and Guarantee, Separate Account Value at Annuitization (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Estimated value of the separate accounts as of the date benefit payments are to commence.

acct_label: Net Amount at Risk by Product and Guarantee, Separate Account Value in Event of Death (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Value of the separate accounts assuming death of the insured, corresponding to the specified product, guarantee type and subset of the guarantee.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Foreign Deposit, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW)
acct_description: Amount of interest-bearing negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Sinking Fund Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount paid during the reporting period into the sinking fund.

acct_label: Variable Interest, Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Quantifies the net carrying amount.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Nonaccrual
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease on nonaccrual status.

acct_label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of Other than 10 or 20 Percent Adverse Change in Other Assumption
acct_description: The hypothetical financial impact of a specified adverse percentage change in a specified other assumption on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities).

acct_label: Pump Taxes
acct_description: Pump tax, commonly known as a Replenishment assessment. A charge on each acre-foot of groundwater extracted from the basin. Income from the pump taxes finances the replenishment of the basin and projects for water recycling and water quality improvements.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Requested Debt Capital Structure, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of public utility's requested debt to capital, including debt and equity.

acct_label: Weighted Average Rate Foreign Deposit, Time Deposit
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposit in foreign banking offices.

acct_label: Business Combination, Acquired Sales-type Lease Receivable
acct_description: Amount of acquired sales-type lease receivable from business combination.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Current Maturities of Capital Lease Obligations
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to current capital lease obligations.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Coal Supply Agreement, Gross (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of an acquired coal supply agreement, which provides benefits for a finite period of time. Under a coal supply agreement, a power company buys coal to meet the requirements of one of its power plants. under specified terms for specified time periods. Coal prices are determined and adjusted pursuant to the price change provisions in the agreement.

acct_label: Net Amount at Risk by Product and Guarantee, Weighted Average Period Remaining (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Weighted average amount of time in years until annuitization or benefit payment is expected to occur.

acct_label: Contract Termination Claims, US Federal Government
acct_description: Amount included in accounts receivable for long-term contracts and programs associated with governmental contracts at the balance sheet date representing amounts deemed to be reimbursable items under a terminated United States government contract or subcontract and included in a claim with the United States government, including those associated with terminated war and defense contracts.

acct_label: Discontinued Application of Specialized Accounting for Regulated Operations
acct_description: Net effect of discontinued application of the specialized accounting to all or part of its operations; the entity eliminates from its statement of financial position prepared for general-purpose external financial reporting the effects of any actions of regulators that had been recognized as assets and liabilities pursuant to that specialized accounting but would not have been recognized as assets and liabilities by entities in general except for carrying amounts of plant, equipment, and inventory measured and reported pursuant to that specialized accounting unless those assets are impaired, in which case the carrying amounts of those assets is reduced to reflect that impairment. This element is gross of the related tax effect.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Commercial, Loans in Process (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The undisbursed portion of the commercial loan receivable balance (loans in process) which is deducted separately from total loans.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Postconfirmation Credit Facility
acct_description: Amount of long-term postconfirmation date credit facility at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Servicing Liability at Amortized Cost, Other Increase (Decrease) in Obligation
acct_description: Amount of other increase (decrease) to contract to service financial assets under which estimated future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues are not expected to adequately compensate the servicer for performing the servicing.

acct_label: General Partners' Capital Account, Units Authorized
acct_description: The number of general partner units authorized to be issued.

acct_label: Interest-bearing Deposits, at Carrying Value (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Cash on deposit with financial institutions, classified as a cash equivalent, that earns interest, either at a fixed or market rate.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Trust Assets to Pay Expenses
acct_description: Gain (loss) related to the sale of trust assets (includes, but is not limited to, gold and silver) to pay trust expenses.

acct_label: Construction Payable (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies and services pertaining to construction projects such as a housing development or factory expansion not classified as trade payables. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Noncash Financial or Equity Instrument Consideration, Options Issued (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The number of options issued as [noncash or part noncash] consideration for a business or asset acquired. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Retention Payable, Due after One Year
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid after the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Deferred Compensation
acct_description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to deferred compensation. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Unapproved Contract Claims, Amount Expected to be Collected after One Year
acct_description: Amount of accounts receivable from customers under long-term contracts or programs associated with unapproved change orders or other similar items subject to uncertainty concerning their determination or ultimate realization which is expected to be collected after one year from the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Redeemable Convertible Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The maximum number of redeemable convertible preferred shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

acct_label: Deferred Sales Inducement Cost, Impairment Loss
acct_description: Amount of impairment loss for deferred sales inducement cost.

acct_label: Open Option Contracts Written, Number of Contracts
acct_description: The number of contracts written for the open option contracts written on the investment.

acct_label: Treasury Stock, Preferred, Value
acct_description: Amount allocated to previously issued preferred shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Held-to-maturity Securities
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Costs of Franchisor Owned Outlets
acct_description: Costs incurred that are directly related to generating franchise revenues from franchisor owned outlets.

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cumulative Changes in Net Gain (Loss) from Cash Flow Hedges, Effect before Tax (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Accumulated pretax change in accumulated gains and losses from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges. Includes an entity's share of an equity investee's Increase or Decrease in deferred hedging gains or losses.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Proceeds, Contract with Customer, Asset, Previously Written Off, Recovery
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, previously written off.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, before Adoption of FAS 158 Recognition Provisions, Minimum Pension Liability Adjustment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Represents the pre-tax cumulative portion of Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income ("AOCI") that is due to the recognition of (additional) minimum pension liability. Recognition of an additional minimum pension liability is required if an unfunded accumulated benefit obligation exists and (a) an asset has been recognized as prepaid pension cost, (b) the liability already recognized as unfunded accrued pension cost is less than the unfunded accumulated benefit obligation, or (c) no accrued or prepaid pension cost has been recognized. This item relates to disclosures prior to the adoption of the recognition provisions of FAS 158. Since the entire additional minimum liability may not be recognized in AOCI; this amount, recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income and disclosed, represents the amount of additional liability required to be recognized that exceeds unrecognized prior service cost. It has yet to be recognized in net periodic benefit cost.

acct_label: Continuing Care Retirement Communities, Refund Obligation
acct_description: Amount of refund obligation under existing contract for continuing care retirement community.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, End of Period (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of liabilities subject to compromise at the end of the reporting period.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Number of Claims
acct_description: Number of malpractice claims outstanding at the end of the accounting period.

acct_label: Time Sharing Transactions, Estimated Cost to Complete Improvements and Promised Amenities
acct_description: Estimated cost to complete improvements and promised amenities.

acct_label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Product Liability, Discount
acct_description: The amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce (reconcile) the estimated aggregate undiscounted amount of the accrual for damages arising from third-party use of the entity's product(s) or process(es) to the present value recognized on the balance sheet (if the accrual qualifies for discounting).

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Accrual, Discount Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce (reconcile) the estimated aggregate undiscounted amount of the accrual for damages arising from third-party use of the entity's product(s) or process(es) to the present value recognized on the balance sheet (if the accrual qualifies for discounting).

acct_label: Incremental Effect on Balance Sheet, Asset Line Item Change Due to Application of FAS 158 Recognition Provisions, Period Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Changes in individual asset line items in the year-end statement of financial position that are incrementally affected by the recognition provisions of FAS 158 in the year of initial application.

acct_label: Average Collected Cash Balances with Commercial Banks, Federal Home Loan Bank
acct_description: Average amount of collected cash balances with commercial banks the Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks) maintain in return for certain services.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Held-to-maturity Securities
acct_description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive income loss, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Number of Real Estate Properties, Fee Simple
acct_description: The number of real estate properties owned as of the statement of financial position to which the entity has fee simple title.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle Presented on Income Statement, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the effect on net income, net of income taxes, of a change in accounting principle reported on the income statement in the period, which occurred before retrospective adjustments were required, recognized by the economic entity and apportioned to the parent. This amount is the income statement amount which is allocable to the parent.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Reorganization Value in Excess of Amounts Allocable to Identifiable Assets
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to reorganization value in excess of amounts allocable to identifiable assets (generally due to the revaluation of assets and liabilities).

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Cash Disbursements and Reclassification Increase (Decrease)) under Bankruptcy Court Order, Other Liabilities (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Cash disbursements made to creditors or reclassifications of liabilities subject to compromise pursuant to the bankruptcy court orders other than for freight and distribution costs, trade accounts payable and prepetition contingencies.

acct_label: Depletion, Nonproduction (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The noncash expense charged against earnings to recognize the consumption of natural resources that are not part of an entity's cost of goods sold.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, Consumer, Cash Flows Expected to be Collected at Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of cash flows expected to be collected at acquisition of acquired consumer loans not accounted for as debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Amount at Par Value
acct_description: Amount at par value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), purchased with credit deterioration.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Discount (Premium)
acct_description: Amount of discount (premium) attributable to other factors on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), purchased with credit deterioration.

acct_label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Pollution Control Bond
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from a long-term debt instrument issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities, sewage, or solid waste disposal facilities.

acct_label: Auction Market Preferred Securities, Stock Series, Par Value (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Par values vary between the enterprises. Unlike common shares, nominal or zero value par values do not apply. Par value is also referred to as stated value or nominal value.

acct_label: Deposit Assets or Liabilities, Effect of Change in Present Value Assumptions Recorded as Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The increase or decrease in deposit assets or liabilities resulting from a change in an assumption pertaining to present value of expected cash flows of the arrangement and which resulted in an adjustment of earnings.

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Volatility Rate, High End (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage rate at the high end of the range of reasonable estimates that is indicative of an expected degree of movement against a base line index, and which is included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Share-based Arrangements, Liability, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for stock option plans and other equity-based compensation arrangements payable after one year (or the operating cycle, if longer). For an unclassified balance sheet, represents the entire liability.

acct_label: Fair Value, Option, Disclosures Related to Election, Items Existing at Effective Date, Notes Receivable (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a financial asset or liability (as defined) for which the fair value option is elected and which item existed at the effective date (as defined).

acct_label: Other Deferred Compensation Arrangements, Liability, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements payable after one year (or the operating cycle, if longer) other than those specified elsewhere in the taxonomy. For an unclassified balance sheet, represents the entire liability.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Other Assets Not Allowed (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Other assets not readily convertible into cash, such as prepaid expenses, intangible assets, and unsecured receivables net of any reserves.

acct_label: Average Balance During Period of Loans Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: This is the average balance during the period for securitized loans only (across all types of loans).

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deposits with Other Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in interest-bearing funds deposited into another Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Deferred Income, Other (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the cumulative amount of interest and fees paid by borrowers, for loans not otherwise defined in the taxonomy, which have not yet been taken into income in conformity with GAAP. Also reflects the amount of unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of acquired loans which are not otherwise defined in the taxonomy and which are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Other, Loans in Process (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The undisbursed portion of the other loan receivable balance (loans in process) which is deducted separately from total loans.

acct_label: Capital Requirement of Consolidated Broker-Dealer Subsidiary Electing Alternative Method
acct_description: Capital requirements of broker-dealer subsidiary calculated under the alternative method allowed for broker-dealers that are part of consolidated supervised entities.

acct_label: Interim Period, Costs Not Allocable Amount, First Item
acct_description: The amount of the cost or expense incurred during an interim period that cannot be readily identified with the activities or benefits of other interim periods and are charged to the interim period in which incurred.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Insignificant, Employees Covered by Collective-Bargaining Arrangement to All Entity's Employees, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of entity's employees covered by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to all entity's employees in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

acct_label: Distribution Made to Member or Limited Partner, Share Distribution, Dilution Per Share (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Per-share or per-unit amount of dilution resulting from the issuance of additional shares or units in payment of stock or unit distribution to common unit-holders of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Components, Bonds Payable (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of bonds payable as of the balance sheet date, including the current portion, which originally required full repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company.

acct_label: Experience Rated Refunds Payable (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liability of the assuming entity to the ceding insurer for the refund of a portion of the excess of premiums earned over estimated claims and expenses and a profit factor, which is usually based upon an agreed upon formula.

acct_label: Gain Contingency, Patents Found Infringed upon, Number
acct_description: Number of entity's patents that another entity was found to have infringed.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Exchange Rate, Remeasurement (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The foreign exchange rate used to remeasure amounts denominated in a currency other than the functional currency into the functional currency.

acct_label: Retention Payable, Due after Year Five
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Deposit Assets, Effect of (Increase) Decrease in Interest Accrual Assumption on Expected Recovery Amounts
acct_description: Amount of (increase) decrease in expense due to change in the interest accrual assumption on deposit assets.

acct_label: Investment Company, Registration Expense
acct_description: Amount of registration fee expense for issuance of shares or units.

acct_label: Energy Marketing Accounts Payable
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for energy purchases, typically by a utility or an entity engaged in selling energy contracts.

acct_label: Receivable for Recovery of Import Duties, Net, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount due after one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) of tariffs due either from customers or suppliers arising from sales or purchases, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities or vendors.

acct_label: Segment Reporting, Revenue Reconciling Item, Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of an item in the reconciliation of total revenues from reportable segments to the entity's consolidated revenues.

acct_label: Weighted Average Interest Rate of Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, after 12 Months
acct_description: The weighted average interest rate of domestic and foreign time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more, with maturities of greater than twelve months.

acct_label: Weighted Average Interest Rate of Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Three Months Through Six Months
acct_description: The weighted average interest rate of domestic and foreign time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more, with maturities of three months through six months.

acct_label: Other Employee Related Liabilities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for employer-related costs not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Net Shares Reclassified to Mandatorily Redeemable Capital Stock, Value
acct_description: Value of net shares reclassified to mandatorily redeemable capital stock.

acct_label: Equity Contributions to Finance Leveraged Buyout (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of proceeds of equity contributions, such as contributions from affiliates or members of senior management, used to finance a leveraged buyout transaction.

acct_label: Available-for-sale, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Other, Default Rate
acct_description: This item represents the default rate of the underlying assets in the security that were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Transfers in (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Represents an increase to the amount of certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) due to transfers in to the Level 3 category for purposes of measuring fair value. Such transfers may, for example, be due to changes in the observability of significant measurement inputs.

acct_label: Site Contingency, Loss Exposure in Excess of Accrual, Low Estimate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Low-end of the range estimate of the reasonably possible loss exposure in excess of the amount accrued for environmental loss contingencies at an individual site.

acct_label: Investment Company, Net Assets, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in net assets of investment company.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Account, Restatement Adjustment (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the restatement of a prior period. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

acct_label: Common Stock, Dividend (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Total dividends declared during the period for each class of common stock.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as current.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Amortization of Present Value of Regulated Asset for Plant Abandonment
acct_description: Amortization of the present value amount of future cost recoveries related to plant abandonment in regulated industries.

acct_label: Redeemable Preferred Stock, Issue, Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Change in the value of each type or class of redeemable preferred stock during the period. The redemption requirement does not constitute an unconditional obligation that will be settled in a variable number of shares constituting a monetary value predominantly indexed to (a) a fixed monetary amount known at inception, (b) an amount inversely correlated with the residual value of the entity, or (c) an amount determined by reference to something other than the fair value of issuer's stock. Does not include mandatorily redeemable stock. The exception is if redemption is required upon liquidation or termination of the reporting entity.

acct_label: Retention Payable, Due after Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Retention Payable, Due in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Retention Payable, Due in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Retention Payable, Due in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Retention Payable, Due in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Retention Payable, Due in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Debt Conversion, Converted Instrument, Warrants or Options Issued (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The number of warrants issued in exchange for the original debt being converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Allowance for Uncollectible Customer's Liability for Acceptances
acct_description: Represents the reserve against amounts due from customers which are uncollectible or questionable as to collection and which specifically relate to short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by an institution (also known banker's acceptances).

acct_label: Embedded Service Costs (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Costs incurred in providing embedded development services for technical support and maintenance during the reporting period. These costs may include costs to perform postcontract customer support services.

acct_label: Accrued Utilities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for utilities, such as electrical power, heating oil, natural gas, and water. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Excess of Assets over Liabilities
acct_description: The value of the excess of assets over liabilities. If all outstanding shares are subject to mandatory redemption and the redemption price is less than the book value (the redemption price is less than the company's equity balance), the resulting cumulative transition adjustment and subsequent adjustments to reflect changes in the redemption price of the shares are recorded as an excess of assets over liabilities (equity).

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Other Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of other long-term debt at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Cost of Transmission, Other (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Cost incurred for transmission operations and maintenance by total kilowatt-hours paid to sources other than affiliates.

acct_label: Insurance Receivable for Malpractice, Noncurrent
acct_description: The noncurrent portion of the receivable from insurance and similar arrangements for reimbursement and payment of malpractice claims and litigation costs.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Accrual, Discounted, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of the noncurrent portion of the accrued liability on a discounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability).

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Additional Series, Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount of an additional class of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Gains (Losses), Included in Earnings, Assets and Liabilities Continued to be Held, Amount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The portion (amount) of gains and losses recognized in earnings during the period and attributable to alternative investments continued to be held at period end. These gains or losses are attributable to certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated for purposes of measuring fair value and which are subject to unobservable inputs.

acct_label: Qualitative and Quantitative Information, Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Not Previously Required Financial Support Provided, Amount
acct_description: The amount of the support provided by the transferor with a continuing involvement that was not previously contractually required to provide to the transferee or its beneficial interest holders.

acct_label: Customer Refundable Fees, Cash Received (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of cash received from customers during the period for revenue related transactions that are refundable to them and do not meet the criteria for revenue recognition.

acct_label: Customer Refundable Fees, Revenue Recognized (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the amount of revenue recognized which is attributable to customer refundable fees that are no longer refundable.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Accrued Liabilities (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification, Tax, Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, after reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Participation Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of participation liabilities.

acct_label: Net Capital as Reported in Entity's Part II Unaudited FOCUS Report (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Net capital as reported in Company's Part II of Form X-17A-5.

acct_label: Liquidation Basis of Accounting, Remeasurement, Gain (Loss) on Items Previously Not Recognized
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from remeasurement of items not previously recognized expected to be sold in liquidation.

acct_label: Contract Receivable Retainage, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Contract Receivable Retainage, Year Five
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Cash Disbursements and Reclassifications under Bankruptcy Court Orders (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Cash disbursements made to creditors or reclassifications of liabilities subject to compromise pursuant to the bankruptcy court orders for freight and distribution costs, trade accounts payable, prepetition contingencies and other liabilities.

acct_label: Malpractice Loss Contingency, Return of Premiums
acct_description: Amount received during the period representing a return of premiums previously paid, generally under a retrospectively rated policy.

acct_label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Discounted Liabilities, Interest Accretion
acct_description: Amount of interest accretion recognized for short-duration insurance contract liabilities that are reported at present value.

acct_label: Interest Income, Deposits with Other Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of interest income from interest-bearing funds deposited into another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Debt with Detachable Stock Purchase Warrant Issued (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The proceeds of debt securities issued during the period with detachable common and preferred stock purchase warrants which are allocable to the purchase warrants.

acct_label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Reportable Segment, Expected Cost (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate amount of costs expected to be incurred for the segment's restructuring cost.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Guarantees
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Realized and Unrealized Loss, Included in Earnings (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of realized and unrealized loss recognized in the income statement from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Additional Series, Redemption Amount (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The redemption (or callable) amount of an additional series of currently redeemable preferred stock. Includes amounts representing dividends not currently declared or paid but which will be payable under the redemption features or for which ultimate payment is solely within the control of the issuer.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Purchase
acct_description: Amount of increase from purchase of net investment in sales-type lease.

acct_label: Other Construction Revenue (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from other services related to construction and not otherwise specified in the taxonomy.

acct_label: Vehicle Toll Revenue (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The revenue recognized in the period from charging vehicles for using a bridge, tunnel or road.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Short-term Investments
acct_description: Short-term investments allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Components Excluded from Assessment of Foreign Currency Fair Value Hedge Effectiveness
acct_description: The net gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period relating to components of the gain (loss) on foreign currency fair value hedging instruments excluded from the assessment of fair value hedge effectiveness.

acct_label: Interest Expense Foreign Deposit Liabilities, Withdrawal Penalties (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Early withdrawal penalties on foreign deposits which discourage customer withdrawal prior to maturity.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Franchise Rights, Gross (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of acquired rights to market the name or products of another entity in a specified territory and for a specified period, including reasonably expected renewal periods.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Rolling Year Two and Three (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second and third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Fair Value, Option, Disclosures Related to Election, Items Existing at Effective Date, Cash Surrender Value (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a financial asset or liability (as defined) for which the fair value option is elected and which item existed at the effective date (as defined).

acct_label: Indefinite-Lived Trade Secrets (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount (original costs adjusted for previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date for trade secrets which protect the entity's unique technology and knowledge in its field of business so as to obtain competitive advantage for a projected indefinite period of benefit.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Purchase
acct_description: Amount of increase from purchase of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

acct_label: Net Capital under Commodity Exchange Act Computation
acct_description: The amount of net capital calculated under the Commodity Futures Trading Commission's minimum financial requirements, pursuant to the Commodity Exchange Act, less the market value of certain commodity options.

acct_label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent, Not Allowable for Net Capital (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Deduct stockholders' equity not allowable for net capital.

acct_label: Derivative Liability, Measurement Input
acct_description: Value of input used to measure derivative liability.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Increase (Decrease) in Other Liabilities (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of change in other prepetition liabilities since bankruptcy filing date.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Transferred Security, Derivative Hedge, Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the net gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (a separate component of shareholders' equity) for any derivative that hedged the forecasted acquisition of the held-to-maturity security transferred to another category of investments in debt and equity securities (trading or available-for-sale).

acct_label: Charity Care, Other Measurement Basis, Amount
acct_description: The amount of charity care provided during the period on a basis other than the provider's direct and indirect costs of providing charity care services.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Individually Significant Component Disposed of or Held-for-sale, Excluding Discontinued Operations, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, before Income Tax
acct_description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from an individually significant component disposed of or held-for-sale attributable to noncontrolling interest. Excludes discontinued operations.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Extraordinary Items, Tax Effect, Per Basic Share (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The tax effect on Income or Loss from extraordinary items per each share of common stock outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Foreign Financial Institutions, Mandated Reserve Amount
acct_description: The mandated reserve amounts required of branches of foreign institutions.

acct_label: Demutualization by Insurance Entity, Securities Issued, Quantity of Shares
acct_description: The number of shares or units issued in an insurance entity stock offering in connection with its conversion from a mutual form of ownership to a stock entity.

acct_label: Product Liability Contingency, Third Party Recovery, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of the estimated recovery from third parties recorded in the period pertaining to product liability damages from specified products.

acct_label: Cumulative-Effect Adjustment, Bifurcation of Hybrids, Gross Losses (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The gross losses that make up a cumulative-effect adjustment on retained earnings related to the bifurcation of hybrids.

acct_label: Loans Receivable Held-for-sale, Net, Not Part of Disposal Group, Consumer, Home Equity (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for bad debt, of home equity loan receivables held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

acct_label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Maximum Quantity
acct_description: Maximum number of units that may be acquired, in connection with an unconditional purchase obligation that has not been recognized for financial reporting purposes.

acct_label: Segment Reporting, Other Significant Reconciling Item, Segment (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Total, for reportable segments, of a significant segment item of information disclosed (for example, liabilities) other than profit/loss, revenues, or assets.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Percent Arbitrage Investments
acct_description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are arbitrage investments for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

acct_label: Investment Company, Contributed Capital to Committed Capital Ratio
acct_description: Percentage of capital contributed to capital committed by investment company's investors.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Capital Lease Obligations, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent capital lease obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Restricted Investments Not Exempt from Registration, at Fair Value (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate value of all restricted investments which are not exempt from registration pursuant to Rule 144A.

acct_label: Deferred Costs, Credit Card Origination Costs, Amortization
acct_description: Amount of amortization of capitalized credit card origination costs not related to private label credit cards.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Foreign, Commercial and Consumer Real Estate (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount before allowance of real estate loans not originated within the country of domicile. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefits, Contract Terminations
acct_description: Amount of expense reversal for policy expiration or cancellation of long-duration insurance contracts.

acct_label: Sales Discounts, Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate cash discounts given by the entity for services rendered to customers for early payments of accounts due. For example, selling terms of "2/10, net 30" entitle a customer to a 2% discount for prompt payment within 10 days, otherwise full payment is expected in 30 days. Discounts are a deduction from gross revenue in arriving at net revenue.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Equity Securities, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value of equity securities allocated to the segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts identified as the closed block.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Trading Securities, Debt
acct_description: Amount of investments in debt securities classified as trading that are held by the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Assets and Liabilities Maximum Future Earnings to be Recognized, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) of closed block liabilities in excess of closed block assets at the date of demutualization.

acct_label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Past Due
acct_description: Amount of reinsurance recoverable past due.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Year Five, Originated, Four Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Year Three, Originated, Two Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Originated, More than Five Years before Current Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Unmarketable Securities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to unmarketable securities for acquired entities in the mining industry.

acct_label: Gas Purchase Payable
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for purchases of natural gas.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Subject to Option, Price
acct_description: The option price of the investment that is subject to option.

acct_label: Other Ownership Interests, Units Authorized
acct_description: The number of units of other ownership interest authorized to be issued in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

acct_label: Retail Land Sale, Accounts Receivable, to be Collected, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of accounts receivable from retail land sale to be collected in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Distribution Made to Limited Liability Company (LLC) Member, Unit Distribution
acct_description: Number of units distributed for payment of a unit distribution to unit-holder of a limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Price Risk Fair Value Hedge Liability, at Fair Value
acct_description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all price risk derivative liabilities designated as fair value hedging instruments.

acct_label: Assets Designated to Closed Block, Other Long-term Investments
acct_description: Amount of other long-term investments held by the closed block.

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Change in Policyholder Benefits and Interest Credited to Policyholder Account Balances
acct_description: Difference between prior period and current period estimated policy claims and interest due to and designated to policies in an insurance entity's segregated group of participating or dividend-paying policies and contracts along with the assets allocated to them (known as a closed block).

acct_label: Closed Block Operations, Other Revenue
acct_description: Amount of revenue classified as other allocated to the closed block.

acct_label: Retained Earnings, after Adoption of New Accounting Principle (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The balance in retained earnings after the initial adoption of a new accounting principle.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Nonaccrual, No Allowance
acct_description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Cost, Depletion
acct_description: Cost of reduction in quantity of natural resource due to consumption directly related to good produced and service rendered.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Noncredit Portion of OTTI, Tax
acct_description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized in earnings for investment in held-to-maturity security.

acct_label: Fair Value Disclosure, Off-balance Sheet Risks, Face Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the face amount of financial instruments (as defined), comprised of financial assets and liabilities (as defined) which are not recognized as assets and liabilities in the financial statements (off-balance sheet) because they fail to meet some other criterion for recognition and for which related fair value disclosure is being provided.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Time Deposits of Less than $100,000
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in time deposits less than $100,000 per account.

acct_label: Resale Agreement Counterparty, Weighted Average Maturity of Agreements (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: This equals the weighted average maturity (weighted by amount of the agreement) of all resale agreements with this counterparty.

acct_label: Investment Company, Contractual Fee Waived
acct_description: Amount of fee contractually waived by investment company.

acct_label: Extraordinary Item of Investee (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Investor's share of extraordinary items and its share of prior period adjustments reported in the financial statements of the investee. This element is gross of the related tax effect.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Floating Rate, after Year One Through Five
acct_description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with floating interest rate maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Fee Income on Acceptances Executed
acct_description: Amount of amortization to income from discounts on short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by an institution (also known as Banker's Acceptances).

acct_label: Revenue Recognition, New Accounting Pronouncement, Revenue Recognized under Prior Guidance (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of revenue that would have been recognized in the year of adoption if the related arrangements entered into or materially modified after the effective date were subject to the measurement requirements of the guidance that was amended.

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Lapse Rate
acct_description: Anticipated rate of future terminations of contracts in force as of the balance sheet date, which is included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Leveraged Buyout, Professional Fees and Other (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount charged to expense for the advisory, legal, accounting and other transaction costs.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Increase (Decrease) in Interest on Prepetition Liabilities (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of interest on prepetition liabilities since bankruptcy filing date.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) from Adjustments to Prior Period Extraordinary Items (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Adjustments to gains or losses attributable to an extraordinary item recognized in a prior period. This element is gross of the related tax effect.

acct_label: Foreign Financial Institutions, Actual Reserve Amount
acct_description: The amount of reserves held by branches of foreign institutions.

acct_label: Sale of Trust Assets to Pay Expenses
acct_description: Amount of sale of trust assets (includes, but is not limited to, gold and silver) to pay trust expenses.

acct_label: Investment Company, Net Assets from Operations, Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in net assets from operations of investment company.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Distribution Rights, Gross (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of legal rights to distribute a product or products, often within specific geographical areas or supply channels, for a specified period of time, including reasonably expected renewal periods.

acct_label: Capital and Allowable Subordinated Borrowings (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Total of qualified stockholders' equity items, allowable subordinated borrowings, other deductions and allowable credits at the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Nonallowable Assets (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Total non-allowable assets that do not meet liquidity tests or have been defined as non-allowable under regulatory reporting requirements.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Commitment Fees
acct_description: Amount of unearned commitment fees on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Effect of Change in Accounting Principle, Tabular Presentation by Financial Statement Line Item, Previously Reported Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Financial statement line item amount, as previously reported, before the change in accounting principle.

acct_label: Liability for Future Policy Benefit by Product Segment, Discounted Liability Amount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Monetary amount by product segment of present value of future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and related expenses less the present value of future net premiums using assumptions such as estimates of expected investment yields, mortality, morbidity, terminations and expenses, applicable at the time the insurance contracts are made and unpaid claim costs relating to insurance contracts including estimates of costs relating to incurred but not reported claims based on the estimated ultimate cost of settling the claims (including effects of inflation and other societal and economic factors), using past experience adjusted for current trends and any other factors that would modify past experience.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturing in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturing in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturing in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturing in Rolling Year Two
