acct_description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the fair value method maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Balance at Bankruptcy Effective Date (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of liabilities subject to compromise at the bankruptcy date.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Fair Value of Price Risk Fair Value Hedging Instruments (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period related to the fair value of price risk derivatives designated as fair value hedging instruments, as offset by the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge is determined to be effective.

acct_label: Regulator Expenses, Cost Assessed on Federal Home Loan Bank
acct_description: Amount of fees or assessments to fund the operations of the regulator of Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

acct_label: Obligation with Joint and Several Liability Arrangement, Amount Receivable
acct_description: Amount of receivable from other entities recognized in the balance sheet resulting from the joint and several liability arrangement.

acct_label: Net Change Interest-bearing Deposits, Foreign
acct_description: The increase (decrease) in interest bearing deposits foreign.

acct_label: Proceeds from Sale of Donor Restricted Assets (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of receipts from contributions and investment income with restrictions stipulated by the donor for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, or improving property, plant, equipment, or other long-lived assets, or establishing, or increasing a permanent endowment or term endowment.

acct_label: Derivative, Average Foreign Currency Option Strike Price
acct_description: The average strike price on a group of foreign currency option contracts such as put options or call options.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Sale
acct_description: Amount of decrease from sale of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Held-to-maturity Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, Contractually Required Payments Receivable at Acquisition
acct_description: Amount of contractually required payments receivable at acquisition of acquired loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality.

acct_label: Investment Sold, Not yet Purchased, Percent of Net Assets
acct_description: For schedules of investments sold, not yet purchased (short sales) that are categorized, each category would be expected to have a percent of net assets for the aggregated value of the investments sold short in the category.

acct_label: Investment Company, General Partner Advisory Service
acct_description: Amount of payment or allocation for advisory service from general partner.

acct_label: Development Stage Enterprise, Cumulative Cash Inflows (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative cash inflows of development stage enterprise from its inception date.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Debt Securities, Acquired During Period, Not Accounted for Using Income Recognition Model, at Acquisition, at Carrying Value
acct_description: The recorded value, at the acquisition date, of loans for which the income recognition model was not applied. This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities acquired during the period, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Real Estate Owned, Amount of Loss at Acquisition (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Any reduction to fair market value from the carrying value of the related loan at the time of acquisition/foreclosure which was accounted for as a loan loss.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Other Liabilities (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of liabilities attributed to the reportable segment that are not otherwise specified in the taxonomy.

acct_label: Obligation with Joint and Several Liability Arrangement, Corresponding Entry, Amount
acct_description: Amount of corresponding entry for the joint and several liability arrangement.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Production Participation Plan Liability
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in obligations arising from employee benefits that are based on cash flows generated by interests in oil and gas properties acquired or developed during the year.

acct_label: Gas Imbalance Payable (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to an underproduced working interest owner when an overproduced working interest owner has sold gas in excess of the party's ownership percentage. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Continuing Care Retirement Communities, Advance Fees, Refunds
acct_description: The cash paid during the period for refunds related to advance fees. Alternate captions include entrance fees and refundable entrance fees.

acct_label: Commissions and Floor Brokerage Receivables
acct_description: Amount receivable from broker-dealers from commissions for executing orders on the floor of an exchange.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Furniture and Fixtures
acct_description: Amount of furniture and fixtures at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Leasehold Improvements
acct_description: Amount of leasehold improvements at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Furniture and Fixtures
acct_description: Amount of furniture and fixtures at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profit, Experience Adjustment
acct_description: Amount of expense for writeoff from unexpected insurance contract termination, charged against previously capitalized present value of future profit of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Leasehold Improvements (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Long-lived depreciable assets that are additions to or the betterment of assets held under lease arrangements that are subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

acct_label: Underlying, Derivative Flow Rate
acct_description: Specified interest rate, security price, commodity price, foreign exchange rate, index of prices or rates for a derivative contract measured in flow rate but not the derivative contract itself.

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts, Premiums Receivable, New Business Written (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of new business written during the period on financial guarantee insurance contracts where premium is received over the contract period.

acct_label: Contract Receivable Retainage, Next Rolling Twelve Months (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be collected in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Gross (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the intangible asset that arises from measuring the difference between (a) the fair value of the contractual insurance and reinsurance assets acquired and liabilities assumed and (b) the assets and liabilities measured in accordance with the acquirer's policies for insurance and reinsurance contracts that it issues or holds. This element is appropriate for business combinations entered into on or after December 15, 2008.

acct_label: Effects of Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss) on Present Value of Future Insurance Profits (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Adjustment to reflect the effects that would have been recognized had the unrealized holding gains and losses actually been realized on the present value of future insurance profits being amortized using the gross profit method and the present value of future profits recognized as a result of a purchase of an insurance entity holding long-duration contracts.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity Securities, Sold Security, Derivative Hedge, Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents the net gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (a separate component of shareholders' equity) for any derivative that hedged the forecasted acquisition of the held-to-maturity security which was sold during the period.

acct_label: Redeemable Preferred Stock, Aggregate Amount of Redemption Requirement (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate amount of redemption requirements for each class or type of redeemable preferred stock for each of the five years following the latest balance sheet date. The redemption requirement does not constitute an unconditional obligation that will be settled in a variable number of shares constituting a monetary value predominantly indexed to (a) a fixed monetary amount known at inception, (b) an amount inversely correlated with the residual value of the entity, or (c) an amount determined by reference to something other than the fair value of issuer's stock. Does not include mandatorily redeemable stock. The exception is if redemption is required upon liquidation or termination of the reporting entity.

acct_label: Cost, Trust Asset Sold to Pay Expense
acct_description: Cost of trust assets sold to pay trust expenses (includes commodities, but is not limited to, gold and silver).

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Premiums Receivable
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Limited Liability Company (LLC) Preferred Unit, Authorized
acct_description: Maximum number of preferred units of ownership permitted to be issued of a limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Limited Liability Company (LLC) Preferred Unit, Outstanding
acct_description: Number of preferred units of ownership outstanding of a limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Preferred Stock, Additional Series, Liquidation Preference Per Share (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of an additional series of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share.

acct_label: Demutualization by Insurance Entity, Securities Issued, Offering Costs
acct_description: Cost of offering shares or units in an insurance entity stock offering in connection with its conversion from a mutual form of ownership to a stock entity.

acct_label: Cost of Oil and Gas Prospects (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Direct costs related to oil and gas prospects.

acct_label: Fair Value Inputs, Price Per Square Meter (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost of construction of real property stated is a price per square meter, used as an input to measure fair value.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Producing Properties of Rate Regulated Companies, Proved and Unproved Reserves
acct_description: The quantity of proved and unproved reserves related to properties subject to cost-of-service ratemaking.

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Accounts Payable (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position liability caption which represents a class of liabilities, or which may include an individual liability, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Components, Other Debt (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of other forms of debt classified as long-term as of the balance sheet date (including both current and noncurrent portions).

acct_label: Net Capital before Haircuts on Securities Positions (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Capital and allowable subordinated borrowings less deductions and charges.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
acct_description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

acct_label: Long-term Purchase Commitment, Minimum Mass Required
acct_description: Mass of goods that must be purchased within the specified time period of the agreement to avoid penalties or unfavorable effects on pricing, among other adverse consequences.

acct_label: Customer Refundable Fees, Revenue Recognized
acct_description: Amount of revenue recognized attributable to customer refundable fees.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, OTTI, before Tax, after Adjustments, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, before tax, after adjustments, of increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Units of Partnership Interest, Changes in Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The change in the number of units of all classes outstanding due to conversion, new issue, acquisition, purchase, redemption, or other reasons.

acct_label: Fair Value, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity Measured on Recurring Basis, Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) Included in Other Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of change in unrealized (holding) gain (loss) included in other income, which relate to financial instruments classified in shareholders' equity and fair value is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (level 3).

acct_label: Coal Supply Agreement Obligation, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Noncurrent liability of coal supply agreement.

acct_label: Limited Liability Company (LLC) Preferred Unit, Issued
acct_description: Number of preferred units issued of limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Derivative, Average Exchange Rate Cap
acct_description: Average cap rate on a group of foreign currency derivatives for example, but not limited to, caps or collars.

acct_label: Derivative, Average Exchange Rate Floor (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Average floor rate on a group of foreign currency derivatives such as floors or collars. A payment or receipt is triggered if the market rate falls below the floor rate on the contract.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Intercompany Profit in Loan Amount
acct_description: Amount of intercompany profit included in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

acct_label: Inventory, Raw Materials and Purchased Parts (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of items purchased for use as components of a finished product or pieces of machinery and equipment plus any items in their natural and unrefined state. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines raw materials and purchased parts into an aggregate amount.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic and Diluted, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of net income (loss) before extraordinary items per each basic and diluted limited partnership and general partnership unit when the per unit amount is the same for both basic and diluted units.

acct_label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Impairment Write-down (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of impairment charged against earnings during the period to reduce the present value of future profits asset to a fair value lower than the amortized carrying value.

acct_label: Congressionally Mandated Federal Home Loan Bank Assessments
acct_description: Amount of expense for Congressionally mandated Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments, for example, but not limited to, Resolution Funding Corporation (REFCORP) assessments.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Earlier of Contractual Maturity or Next Put or Convert Date, in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Par amount of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with the earlier of contractual maturity or next put or convert date within the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Fixed Rate, after Year One
acct_description: Par amount of advance made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with fixed interest rate maturing after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Floating Rate, after Year One
acct_description: Par amount of advance made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) with floating interest rate maturing after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Valuation Adjustments for Hedging Activities
acct_description: Amount of accumulated increase (decrease) on advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) from hedging adjustments.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Consolidated Obligations, Bonds
acct_description: Amount of joint and several obligations consisting of bonds issued by Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Consolidated Obligations, Discount Notes
acct_description: Amount of joint and several obligations consisting of discount notes issued by Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Leverage Capital, Actual
acct_description: Amount of leveraged capital of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), set by the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Leverage Capital, Required
acct_description: Minimum amount of leverage capital required for Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), set by the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Leverage Ratio, Actual (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Leverage ratio of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), calculated per regulations of the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Leverage Ratio, Actual
acct_description: Leverage ratio of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), calculated per regulations of the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Regulatory Capital, Actual
acct_description: Amount of regulatory capital of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), set by the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Regulatory Capital Ratio, Actual
acct_description: Regulatory capital ratio of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), calculated per regulations of the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Regulatory Capital, Required
acct_description: Minimum amount of regulatory capital required for Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), set by the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Risk-Based Capital, Actual
acct_description: Amount of risk-based capital of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), set by the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Risk-Based Capital, Required
acct_description: Minimum amount of risk-based capital required for Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank), set by the Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA).

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Number of Stockholders
acct_description: Number of stockholders holding financial instruments subject to mandatory redemption.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Past Contractual Redemption Date, Due to Outstanding Activity
acct_description: Amount of mandatorily redeemable capital stock past the contractual redemption date due to outstanding activity.

acct_label: Loans to Other Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) loans to another FHLBank.

acct_label: Net Shares Reclassified to Mandatorily Redeemable Capital Stock, Shares
acct_description: Net number of shares reclassified to mandatorily redeemable capital stock.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, before Tax, after Reclassification Adjustment, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option, attributable to parent.

acct_label: Payments for Congressionally Mandated Federal Home Loan Bank Assessments
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow for payments made by the Federal Home Loan Banks for Congressionally mandated assessments.

acct_label: Proceeds from Bonds Transferred from Other Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from transfers and assumptions of primary liability for consolidated obligations of another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Assets or Liabilities from Transfers of Financial Assets Having No Reasonable Estimate of Fair Value, Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: The sum of the carrying amounts of the listed assets obtained or liabilities incurred.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Counterparty Default, Subsequent Period Changes, Effect on Equity (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: For periods subsequent to the period in which the entity concludes it is probable that the counterparty (share borrower) to a share-lending arrangement will default, the effect on equity related to the amount of change during the period in the fair value of the entity's shares or the change in probable recoveries associated with the share-lending arrangement that is probable of default.

acct_label: Leveraged Buyout, Repayment of Existing Debt (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of cash used to pay off existing debt in a leveraged buyout transaction.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Postconfirmation Credit Facility
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to postconfirmation credit facility.

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Capital Lease Obligations, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent capital lease obligations at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Current Maturities of Capital Lease Obligations
acct_description: Amount of current maturities of capital lease obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Synthetic Fuel Sales Revenue (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Revenue from sale of synthetic fuel, which is usually a liquid (or, less often, gaseous) fuel derived from coal, natural gas, biomass, oil shale, or tar sand.

acct_label: Interest Income, Loans to Other Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of interest income from loans to another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Payments for Bonds Transferred to Other Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow from transfers and assumptions of primary liability of consolidated obligations to another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Past Contractual Redemption Date, Due to Regulatory Action
acct_description: Amount of mandatorily redeemable capital stock past the contractual redemption date due to regulatory action.

acct_label: Cost of Worldwide Unregulated Electric (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Cost of electricity sold during the reporting period, operations of which is not regulated by federal or state agency.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Current Maturities of Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to current maturities of long-term debt.

acct_label: Fresh-Start Adjustment, Increase (Decrease), Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of fresh-start adjustment to noncurrent restricted cash and cash equivalents.

acct_label: Available-for-sale, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Other, Third Party Guarantees, Amount
acct_description: Amount of third party guarantees against loss of value in the underlying assets related to available-for-sale security in an unrealized loss position and for which other-than-temporary impairments (OTTI) have not been recognized.

acct_label: Oil and Gas Delivery Commitments and Contracts, Available Amounts to be Received
acct_description: Total available amounts expected to be received from each oil producing property.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Discount on Affordable Housing Program
acct_description: Amount of unamortized discount on outstanding Affordable Housing Program (AHP) advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Interest Rate on Affordable Housing Program Subsidized Loans
acct_description: Interest rate of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) on Affordable Housing Program (AHP) subsidized loans.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Outstanding, Greater than One Billion Dollars Per Borrower, Amount
acct_description: Amount of advances outstanding made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) in excess of one billion U.S. dollars per borrower.

acct_label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Outstanding, Greater than One Billion Dollars Per Borrower, Number of Borrowers
acct_description: Number of borrowers with Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances outstanding greater than one billion U.S. dollars.

acct_label: Deposit Assets or Liabilities, Effect of Change in Interest Accrual Assumption on Expected Recovery Amounts (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The increase or decrease during the period in deposit assets or liabilities resulting from a change in the interest accrual assumption on which calculation of the initial amount of expected recoveries (in other words, the initial amount of the deposit asset or liability) had been based.

acct_label: Retail Land Sales, Installment Method, Gross Profit, Deferred
acct_description: Amount of deferred gross profit, realized on retail land sale transaction accounted for under the installment method.

acct_label: Investment Company, Expense Ratio Including Voluntary Fee Waiver
acct_description: Percentage, after deduction of voluntary fee waiver, of expense to average net assets.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Noncash Financial or Equity Instrument Consideration, Warrants Issued (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The number of warrants issued as [noncash or part noncash] consideration for a business or asset acquired. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Deposits (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Loans Receivable (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Subordinated Debt Obligations (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Prepaid Congressionally Mandated Assessments (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Amount prepaid for Congressionally mandated Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments, for example, but not limited to, Resolution Funding Corporation (REFCORP) assessments.

acct_label: Proceeds, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Previously Written Off, Recovery
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from recovery of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), previously written off.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs and Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investment
acct_description: Amount of unrealized investment gain (loss) which decreases (increases) deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Health Care Organization, Accounts Receivable Due from Third-Party Payor, Retroactive Adjustment
acct_description: Amount of receivable from retroactive adjustment for final settlement or appeal due from third-party payor.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Extraordinary Items, before Tax, Per Basic Share (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The Income or Loss from extraordinary items, before related tax effects, per each share of common stock outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Amount of Acquisition Adjustments Related Accumulated Depreciation (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of acquisition adjustments accumulated depreciation included in property, plant and equipment (PPE) for utilities.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of Income or Loss before extraordinary items available to each limited partner unit outstanding during the reporting period and each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period. Limited partners have limited liability and do not manage the partnership.

acct_label: Trading Securities, Restricted, Current (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Total of all securities which are categorized as trading, are intended to be held for less than one year or the normal operating cycle, whichever is longer, and that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Cash Disbursements and Reclassification Increase (Decrease) under Bankruptcy Court Order, Increase (Decrease) in Trade Accounts Payable (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Cash disbursements made to creditors or reclassifications of liabilities subject to compromise pursuant to bankruptcy court orders for trade accounts payable.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of income (loss) before extraordinary items available to each outstanding limited partnership and general partnership unit during the reporting period.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Planned Sale, Investments Not Identified, Number
acct_description: The total number of all investments, comprising or included in the major category, of those certain investments for which net asset value per share is calculated (including by unit, membership interest, or other equity (ownership interest) unit measure) (alternative investments) for which the entity has intentions to sell or liquidate, but the specific assets for sale or liquidation have not been identified (for example, the entity intends to sell 10 of its investments in hedge funds, but the individual investments to be sold have not been identified).

acct_label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Collections, Not Capitalized
acct_description: Amount not capitalized of work of art, historical treasure, and similar asset classified as collections.

acct_label: Distribution Made to Limited Liability Company (LLC) Member, Unit Distribution, Dilution Per Unit
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount of dilution resulting from the issuance of additional unit for payment of unit distribution to unit-holder of a limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Haircuts on Contractual Securities Commitments (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage deduction to take into account portfolio and market risk on security collateral commitments.

acct_label: Significant Changes, Franchisor Outlets in Operation
acct_description: The number of franchisor-owned outlets in operation at the balance sheet date when there are significant changes in franchisor-owned outlets or franchised outlets during the period.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Purchase
acct_description: Amount of increase from purchase of net investment in direct financing lease.

acct_label: Retains
acct_description: Amount of patronage earnings withheld by agricultural cooperatives from distributions and allocated to patrons' capital accounts.

acct_label: Malpractice Insurance, Coverage Floor
acct_description: Amount at the low end of the range in which the insurance begins to cover losses and costs associated with malpractice claims.

acct_label: Derivative, Swap Type, Variable Price
acct_description: Variable price rate related to the price risk swap derivative.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Carrying Amount, Maturing after Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Carrying Amount, Maturing in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Carrying Amount, Maturing in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Carrying Amount, Maturing in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Carrying Amount, Maturing in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Carrying Amount, Maturing in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Face Value, Maturing after Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Face Value, Maturing in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Face Value, Maturing in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Face Value, Maturing in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Face Value, Maturing in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Face Value, Maturing in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Face value of the life insurance policies underlying the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturing after Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturing in Next Rolling Twelve Months
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturing in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturing in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturing in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Number of Contracts, Maturing in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Premiums to be Paid in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of life insurance premiums to keep the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method in force anticipated to be paid in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Premiums to be Paid in Rolling Year Four
acct_description: Amount of life insurance premiums to keep the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method in force anticipated to be paid in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Premiums to be Paid in Rolling Year Three
acct_description: Amount of life insurance premiums to keep the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method in force anticipated to be paid in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contracts, Investment Method, Premiums to be Paid in Rolling Year Two
acct_description: Amount of life insurance premiums to keep the life settlement contracts accounted for under the investment method in force anticipated to be paid in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding General Partnership Unit (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of Income or Loss from continuing operations available to each general partnership unit in a publicly trade limited partnership or master limited partnership (MLP) during the reporting period. General partners have unlimited liability and manage the partnership.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding General Partnership Unit (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of income (loss) from disposition of discontinued operations available to each general partnership unit during the reporting period, net of tax.

acct_label: Deposit Assets or Liabilities, Present Value of Expected Recoveries (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The present value of initial expected recoveries that will be reimbursed under the insurance or reinsurance contracts that have been recorded as an adjustment to incurred losses.

acct_label: Pension and Other Postretirement and Postemployment Benefit Plans, Noncurrent Liabilities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: For classified balance sheets this represents the noncurrent liability recognized in the balance sheet that is associated with the defined benefit pension plans and other postretirement defined benefit plans. (The current liability will be separate, but it will normally be small, if there is even any at all.) For unclassified balance sheets, this represents the entire liability recognized in the balance sheet that is associated with the defined benefit plans.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold, Depletion (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The expense recognized in the current period that recognizes the reduction in the quantity of resources (for example, coal, oil, minerals, gas) that are held as assets on the statement of financial position. This element applies only to assets used in the production of goods sold.

acct_label: Debtor Reorganization Items, Revaluation of Customer-Related Obligations (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of reorganization items related to revaluation of customer-related obligations such as, for example, changes in frequent flyer obligations in the airline industry.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Held-to-maturity Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Period Increase (Decrease) (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Total net Increase or Decrease in the aggregate excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment in the loan for loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities.

acct_label: Weighted Average Rate Foreign Deposit, Certificates of Deposit (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Weighted average interest rate for certificates of deposit liabilities in foreign banking offices.

acct_label: Bankruptcy Claims, Amount of Filed Claims Likely to be Denied
acct_description: Amount of bankruptcy claim filed with bankruptcy court that are likely to be denied.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Deposits from Other Federal Home Loan Banks
acct_description: Amount of interest expense on interest-bearing deposits from another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

acct_label: Collateral Held on Reverse Repurchase Agreements Segregated under Other Regulations (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value of collateral held on behalf of reverse repurchase agreements which are deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to regulations other than SEC Regulations and the Commodity Exchange Act.

acct_label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs and Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

acct_label: Time Sharing Transactions, Allowance for Uncollectible Accounts on Receivables Sold with Recourse, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the allowance for uncollectible accounts for time sharing transactions attributable to receivables sold with recourse.

acct_label: Limited Liability Company (LLC) Preferred Unit, Issuance Value
acct_description: Stated value of preferred units of ownership issued by a limited liability company (LLC).

acct_label: Convertible Preferred Stock, Shares Subscribed but Unissued (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of convertible nonredeemable preferred stock allocated to an entity's existing shareholders to buy shares of a new issue of convertible preferred stock before it is offered to the public. Convertible preferred stock can be converted into another security. These shares have not yet been issued to the shareholders.

acct_label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Range of Estimated Fair Value, Low (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Represents the lower bound of a range for the estimate of fair value as of the reporting date of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity.

acct_label: Own-share Lending Arrangement, Counterparty Default, Earnings Per Share, Shares
acct_description: In periods in which default, by a counterparty (share borrower) to a share-lending arrangement, is probable, but has not yet occurred, this item represents the number of the entity's shares related to the share-lending arrangement that will be reflected in basic and diluted earnings per share when the counterparty (share borrower) default does occur.

acct_label: Wells Temporarily Suspended
acct_description: The number of wells temporarily suspended in each geographic area as of the date listed.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Percent Foreign Equity Securities
acct_description: The percentage of the total value of investments that are foreign equity securities for a given category of investments for which net asset value per share is calculated.

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Commitments (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position liability caption which represents a class of liabilities, or which may include an individual liability, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Fair Value, Option, Disclosures Related to Election, Items Existing at Effective Date, Commitments (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a financial asset or liability (as defined) for which the fair value option is elected and which item existed at the effective date (as defined).

acct_label: Effect of Change in Cash Flow Projection Estimate (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The monetary effect of a change in the underlying assumptions for the cash flow projections for collateralized mortgage obligations (CMOs) and real estate mortgage investment conduits (REMICs).

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets Level 3 Reconciliation, Decrease for Sale
acct_description: Amount, measured using unobservable input, of decrease in plan asset of defined benefit plan from sale.

acct_label: Average Balance During Period of Loans Managed and Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: This is the sum of average balances during the period for both securitized and unsecuritized loans of all types.

acct_label: Demutualization by Insurance Entity, Securities Issued, Amount of Net Proceeds
acct_description: The proceeds received by an insurance entity after deducting offering and other costs of securities issued and after policy credits, in connection with its conversion from a mutual form of ownership to a stock entity.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Unrestricted, Carrying Value Per Unit at Date of Purchase Price Agreement (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying value per unit of investment of unrestricted investment of the same issue as the restricted investment during the preceding year at the date the purchase price was agreed.

acct_label: Market Value of Stock Dividends Outstanding over Thirty Days (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: The market value of stock dividends outstanding over thirty days at the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Preferred Units, Preferred Partners' Capital Account, Units Issued (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The number of preferred units issued.

acct_label: Nonconsolidated Legal Entity, Financial Support Cumulative Amount
acct_description: Amount of cumulative financial support provided to a nonconsolidated legal entity that is required to comply with or operate in accordance with requirements that are similar to those included in Rule 2a-7 of the Investment Company Act of 1940 for registered money market funds.

acct_label: Preferred Units, Value, Net of Offering Costs (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Capital contributed by preferred partners, net of offering costs. Disclosed parenthetically. Preferred partners are partners in a publicly listed limited partnership or master limited partnership with preferential rights and privileges.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Unrealized Loss (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss, not recognized in income statement, from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Fair Value, Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis, Investment Contracts (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position liability caption which represents a class of liabilities, or which may include an individual liability, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Property under Capital Lease Arrangements
acct_description: Amount of property under capital lease at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Risks Inherent in Servicing Assets and Servicing Liabilities, Fair Value of Instruments Used to Manage Risks (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The price received to sell a servicing asset or price paid to transfer a servicing liability in an orderly transaction between market participants at the measurement date.

acct_label: Retail Land Sales, Deposit Method, Debt Assumed by Buyer (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents the amount of debt assumed by a buyer in a retail land sale transaction accounted for by the deposit method, which debt therefore continues to be included in the entity's statement of financial position as of the reporting date.

acct_label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Transfer to Trading, Loss
acct_description: Amount of unrealized loss recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Noncredit Portion of OTTI, Additional Credit Loss, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized from additional credit loss for investment in held-to-maturity security.

acct_label: General Partners' Capital Account, Value (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Capital contributed by the general partner. The general partner is a partner of a publicly traded limited partnership or master limited partnership who has unlimited liability and manages the partnership.

acct_label: Collateral Pledged on Reverse Repurchase Agreements Segregated under Securities Exchange Commission Regulation (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of assets pledged as collateral that are not reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Other, Loan to Collateral Value, Ratio
acct_description: This item represents the loan to collateral ratio of the underlying assets in the security, represented as a percentage, which was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

acct_label: Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Net Amount at Risk by Product and Guarantee, Guaranteed Minimum Return Rate
acct_description: Rate of guaranteed minimum return on deposits made to contracts reported in separate accounts maintained by an insurance entity.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Other Postretirement Obligations
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent other postretirement obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Pension Obligations
acct_description: Amount of noncurrent pension obligations at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Fair Value, Estimate Not Practicable, Derivative Financial Instruments, Liabilities (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This item represents a financial instrument (as defined) for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value. Such disclosure may be for an individual financial instrument or a class of financial instruments.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Held-to-maturity Debt Securities, Carrying Amount, Net
acct_description: The recorded balance, net of any applicable reductions (for example, unamortized accretable yield and other-than-temporary impairments), for certain contractual rights to receive money on demand or on fixed or determinable dates. This relates to loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Convertible Preferred Stock, Shares Subscribed but Unissued, Subscription Receivable (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Dollar amount of subscriptions to be received from investors who have been allocated convertible preferred stock to buy. When stock is sold on a subscription basis, the issuer does not initially receive the total proceeds. In general, the issuer does not issue the shares to the investor until it receives the entire proceeds.

acct_label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Employee Benefit Liabilities Assumed (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of employee benefit liabilities that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

acct_label: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Change in Present Value, Expense (Reversal)
acct_description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease, from change in present value of expected cash flows.

acct_label: Certain Methane Gas Reserves, Proved Reserves, Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The carrying amount of proved reserves related to methane gas that are deemed to be economically producible only as a consequence of existing Federal tax incentives.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Counterparty Default, Period of Default, Effect on Equity (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The effect on equity related to the amount of default related expense recognized in earnings in the period in which the entity concludes it is probable that the counterparty (share borrower) to a share-lending arrangement will default.

acct_label: Development Stage Enterprise, Cumulative Cash Outflows (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative cash outflows of development stage enterprise from its inception date.

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Realized Loss (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of realized loss recognized in the income statement from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Redeemable Preferred Stock, Subscriptions Receivable (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of subscriptions receivable for redeemable preferred stock shares subscribed but unissued.

acct_label: Average Balance During Period of Loans Held-for-sale or Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: This is the average balances during the period for loans which are in the process of being securitized as of the date of the statement of financial position (across all types of loans).

acct_label: Short-term and Long-term Debt, Defaulted, Amount (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of outstanding debt associated with any securities or credit agreement for which there has been a default in principal, interest, sinking fund, or redemption provisions, or any breach of covenant that existed at the end of the period and subsequently has not been cured.

acct_label: Fair Value, Option, Disclosures Related to Election, Items Existing at Effective Date, Investment in Federal Home Loan Bank Stock (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: This element represents a financial asset or liability (as defined) for which the fair value option is elected and which item existed at the effective date (as defined).

acct_label: Haircuts on Options (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage deduction to take into account portfolio and market risk on options.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Components, Bonds Payable, Current (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Current portion of carrying amount of bonds payable as of the balance sheet date (excluding noncurrent portions).

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Components, Bonds Payable, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of bonds payable as of the balance sheet date, net of the amount due in the next twelve months or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company.

acct_label: Long-term Debt, Components, Commercial Loans, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying amount of commercial loans as of the balance sheet date excluding mortgage loans and net of the amount due in the next twelve months or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company.

acct_label: Fees Paid on Acceptances Resold
acct_description: Represents the amortization to expense from discounts on short-term negotiable time drafts drawn on and accepted by an institution (also known as Banker's Acceptances) which have been resold in the secondary market.

acct_label: Common Stock, Additional Series, Value, Outstanding (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate value of additional series of common stock held by shareholders, which is net of related treasury stock. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized. These shares represent the ownership interest of the common shareholders.

acct_label: Gain Recognized on Assets Transferred to Separate Account, Gross
acct_description: Amount of gain recognized during the reporting period on assets that were transferred into separate accounts.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Carrying Amount, Foreign (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Reflects the aggregate gross carrying amount of all foreign loans and leases held in portfolio, prior to deducting deferred income and the allowance for losses on foreign loans and leases.

acct_label: Cash for Leveraged Buyout (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Total sources of cash from debt and equity to finance the leveraged buyout transaction.

acct_label: Sales of Equity to Finance Leveraged Buyout (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of proceeds received from sale of common stock and other forms of equity used to finance a leveraged buyout transaction.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Interest Rate on Intermediary Debt for Electric Utility Plant Construction
acct_description: Discloses the interest rate related to debt for plant construction for an electric utility using an intermediary for each period for which an income statement is presented.

acct_label: Future Minimum Sublease Rentals, Sale Leaseback Transactions, Due in Rolling Year Five
acct_description: Amount of minimum sublease rentals for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing to be received by the seller-lessee in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Real Estate Investment Subsidiaries, Cash and Other Assets
acct_description: For banks, amount of assets of real estate investments of a financial institution which are not land, buildings, or leasehold improvements.

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Other Rate
acct_description: Anticipated rate, classified as other, for assumptions included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation.

acct_label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of Other than 10 or 20 Percent Adverse Change in Prepayment Speed
acct_description: The hypothetical financial impact of a specified adverse percentage change in prepayment speed on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Significant, Employees Covered by Collective-Bargaining Arrangement to All Entity's Employees, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of entity's employees covered by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to all entity's employees in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually significant.

acct_label: Participating Insurance, Percentage of Premium Income
acct_description: Percentage of participating insurance to premium income.

acct_label: Segment Reporting Information, Depletion Expense (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of depletion expense for the reportable segment. Such disclosure is presented if the amount is: (a) included in the measure of segment profit or loss reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in that measure of segment profit or loss.

acct_label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement Deduction
acct_description: Amount of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

acct_label: Payments to Acquire US Government Securities Pledged under Bond Indenture (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The cash outflow from the purchase of US Government Securities Pledged Under Bond Indenture.

acct_label: Development Stage Enterprise, Cumulative Expense (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Cumulative amount of expenses of enterprise from inception of development stage.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Available-for-sale Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Qualitative Disclosures, Delinquency Rate
acct_description: This item represents the delinquency rates of the underlying assets in the security that was considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are other than temporarily impaired and measure the amount of impairment related to credit loss recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Financial Guarantee Insurance Contracts, Claim Liability, Significant Components of Change, Timing
acct_description: This element represents the amount of the change in the claim liability related to financial guarantee insurance contracts arising from a change in the timing of the claim liability.

acct_label: Cumulative-Effect Adjustment, Bifurcation of Hybrids, Gross Gains (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
acct_description: The gross gains that make up a cumulative-effect adjustment on retained earnings related to the bifurcation of hybrids.

acct_label: Investment Company, Expense Offset Arrangement
acct_description: Amount of expense reduction under arrangement in which third party explicitly reduces its fee by specified amount for service provided in exchange for use of investment company's assets.

acct_label: Preconfirmation, Reorganization Value in Excess of Amounts Allocable to Identifiable Assets
acct_description: Amount of reorganization value in excess of amounts allocable to identifiable assets at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Deposit Assets, Effect of Change in Present Value Assumptions Recorded as Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense due to change in present value assumptions used to value deposit assets.

acct_label: OCI, Market Risk Benefit, Instrument-Specific Credit Risk, Adjustment from AOCI for Derecognition, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for gain (loss) (AOCI) from (increase) decrease in instrument-specific credit risk on contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk, not recognized in income and used in calculating liability for future policy benefit for payout annuity.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Investment Method, Premium to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of life insurance premium accounted for under investment method to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year to keep life settlement contract in force.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Increase (Decrease) in Environmental Contingencies (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of change in prepetition environmental related contingencies since bankruptcy filing date.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Termination of S Corporation Election (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from undistributed earnings on the date of S Corporation election termination.

acct_label: Investment Company, Redemption Fee, Per Share
acct_description: Per share or unit amount of fee charged to investor for redemption of shares before permitted period.

acct_label: All Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Not Accounted for Using Income Recognition Model, at Carrying Value
acct_description: The recorded value of all loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable, for which the income recognition model was not applied.

acct_label: Demutualization Cost and Expense
acct_description: The costs and expenses incurred pertaining to the reorganization process to convert a mutual entity to a stock company.

acct_label: Net Capital in Excess of Four Percent of Debit Items (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Net capital less four percent of aggregate debit items.

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Mortality Rate, High End (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Actuarially determined death rate of policyholders at the high end of the range of reasonable estimates, which is included in determining the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Operating Support from Adviser, Amount
acct_description: The amount of the support provided by the Adviser to help the REIT achieve a certain return for the period.

acct_label: Long-Duration Contracts, Assumptions by Product and Guarantee, Discount Rate, High End (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage discount rate at the high end of a range of reasonable estimates used to calculate present value of an expected stream of future payments, which is included in the calculation of the amount of the specified guaranteed benefit obligation as of the balance sheet date.

acct_label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Modification of Terms, Number of Vendors Affected (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Indicates how many suppliers of goods and services were involved in modification of the terms of a transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

acct_label: Haircuts on Stocks and Warrants (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Percentage deduction to take into account portfolio and market risk on stocks and warrants.

acct_label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Foreign, Allowance (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The allowance for foreign loan and lease losses represents the reserve to cover probable credit losses related to specifically identified foreign loans and leases, as well as probable credit losses inherent in the remainder of the foreign loan portfolio as of the balance sheet date. For banks, include currently required allocated transfer risk reserves. Include carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for foreign loan losses in connection with business combinations determined to be appropriate.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Operations before Extraordinary Items, Per Outstanding General Partnership Unit, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) before extraordinary items available to outstanding general partnership (GP) unit-holder.

acct_label: Time Share Carrying Charges (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate carrying costs, which are expenses necessary for holding property, such as taxes and interest on idle property or time sharing properties. Carrying costs also includes the portion of operating expenses of the homeowners' associations based on ownership of unsold real estate at each of the respective properties.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Held-to-maturity Debt Securities, Accretable Yield, Accretion (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
acct_description: Current period recognition of accretion of the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment. This relates to loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Servicing Liability at Amortized Cost, Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Amortized cost as of the balance sheet date of a liability representing future costs related to servicing arrangements in excess of net future revenues from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues.

acct_label: Deferred Sales Inducement Cost, Amortization Expense, Excluding Accrued Interest
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for deferred sales inducement cost, excluding accrued interest on unamortized balance.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Unrealized Investment Gains (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the increase in the period in the intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination attributable to unrealized investment gains.

acct_label: Investment Company, Expense Ratio, Voluntary Fee Waiver
acct_description: Percentage of voluntary fee waiver to average net assets.

acct_label: Film, Monetized on Its Own, and Film, Monetized in Film Group, Amortization Expense
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized on its own and film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

acct_label: Multiple-Employer Plan Accounted for as Multiemployer Plan, Contribution by Participating Entity
