acct_description: Amount of contributions made by entity participating in defined benefit plan, defined as multiple-employer plan but accounted for as multiemployer plan.

acct_label: Single Employer Plans Accounted for as Multi-Employer, Plan Contributions (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of contributions to a pension or other postretirement plan which is not defined as a multiemployer plan but is accounted for as a multiemployer plan.

acct_label: Fair Value, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity Measured on Recurring Basis, Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) Included in Trading Revenue (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of change in unrealized (holding) gain (loss) included in trading revenues, which relate to financial instruments classified in shareholders' equity and fair value is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (level 3).

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Available-for-sale Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Qualitative Disclosures, Third Party Guarantees, Amount
acct_description: Amount of third party guarantees against loss of value in the underlying assets of an available-for-sale security for which only the portion of an other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) related to a credit loss was recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Fair value of life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Face Value, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Face value of life insurance policy underlying life settlement contract accounted for under fair value method maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Life Settlement Contract, Fair Value Method, Number of Contracts, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Number of life settlement contracts accounted for under fair value method maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Guaranteed Investment Contract, Interest Rate Assumptions, High End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The estimated maximum interest rate applied to guaranteed investment contract policyholder deposits during the stated period to calculate the net amount at risk.

acct_label: Time Sharing Transactions, Maturities of Notes Receivable, Net
acct_description: Amount of notes receivable related to time share sales, net of allowance for uncollectible accounts and deferred profit.

acct_label: Distribution Made to Limited Partner, Unit Distribution, Dilution Per Unit
acct_description: Per unit of ownership amount of dilution resulting from the issuance of additional unit for payment of unit distribution to unit-holder of a limited partnership (LP).

acct_label: Postconfirmation, Debtor-in-Possession Financing
acct_description: Amount of long-term debt related to debtor-in-possession financing at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Deferred Compensation on Restricted Unit (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of partners' deferred compensation amortized during the year on restricted units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners. Limited liability partnerships (LLPs) are formed in accordance with the laws of the state in which such entities are organized. Because those laws are not uniform, the characteristics of LLPs vary from state to state. However, LLPs generally have the following characteristics: An LLP is an unincorporated association of two or more "persons"; Its members have limited personal liability for the obligations or debts of the entity; It is classified as a partnership for federal income tax purposes.

acct_label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Number of Shares Indexed
acct_description: For a forward contract or an option indexed to the issuer's equity shares, the number of issuer's shares to which the contract is indexed.

acct_label: Derivative, Average Exchange Rate Floor
acct_description: Average floor rate on a group of foreign currency derivatives for example, but not limited to, floors or collars.

acct_label: Fair Value, Concentration of Risk, Foreign Currency Contract, Asset
acct_description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

acct_label: Retail Land Sales, Installment Method, Cost of Sales
acct_description: Cost of sales related to retail land sales transactions accounted for under the installment method.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Interest-bearing (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to vendors that bear interest at either a stated or an imputed rate. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Accrued Interest, after Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on accounts receivable classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Fair Value, Instruments Classified in Shareholders' Equity Measured on Recurring Basis, Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) Included in Investment Income (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of change in unrealized (holding) gain (loss) included in investment income, which relate to financial instruments classified in shareholders' equity, and fair value is measured on a recurring basis using significant unobservable inputs (level 3).

acct_label: Fair Value, Investments, Entities that Calculate Net Asset Value Per Share, Unobservable Input, Realized Gain (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of realized gain recognized in the income statement from investments for which net asset value per share is calculated on unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Three (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of amortization expense for intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination expected to be recognized in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Liability for Policyholder Contract Deposits, Interest Rate
acct_description: Rate of interest credited to policyholder deposits.

acct_label: Retention Payable, Due in Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Retention Payable, Due in Year Two
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Retention Payable Due in Year Three
acct_description: Amounts owed to vendors and subcontractors that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract to be paid in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

acct_label: Deposit Liabilities, Effect of Change in Present Value Assumptions Recorded as Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense due to change in the present value assumptions on expected recoveries.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, OTTI, after Adjustments, Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax (expense) benefit for increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Leveraged Buyout, Consideration Paid for Outstanding Shares (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of cash paid to stockholders for outstanding shares and warrants in a leveraged buyout transaction.

acct_label: Leveraged Buyout, Uses of Cash in Leveraged Buyout Transaction (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Total uses of cash in a leveraged buyout transaction.

acct_label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Payments under Bankruptcy Court Order for Trade Accounts Payable
acct_description: Amount of cash outflow to creditors related to liabilities subject to compromise pursuant to bankruptcy court orders for trade accounts payable.

acct_label: Subordinated Notes to Finance Leveraged Buyout (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Issuance of subordinated notes to finance leveraged buyout transaction.

acct_label: Intangible Assets Arising from Insurance Contracts Acquired in Business Combination, Impairment Write-down (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of impairment loss from intangible assets arising from insurance contracts acquired in a business combination.

acct_label: Real Estate Inventory, Capitalized Interest Costs in Acquired Inventory (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of interest previously capitalized in inventory purchased in the period.

acct_label: Embedded Derivative Liability, Measurement Input
acct_description: Value of input used to measure embedded derivative liability.

acct_label: Time Sharing Transactions, Allowance for Uncollectibles on Receivables Sold with Recourse, Deductions for Direct Write-offs Charged Against Allowance
acct_description: Amount of decrease in the allowance on receivables sold with recourse, for time sharing transactions, from direct write-offs charged against the allowance.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Held-to-maturity Debt Securities, Outstanding Balance
acct_description: The undiscounted sum of all amounts, including amounted deemed principal, interest, fees, penalties, and other under the loan, owed to the investor at the reporting date. This relates to loans accounted for as held-to-maturity debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that were acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

acct_label: Other Marketable Securities, Restricted, Current (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: All other marketable securities, which aren't categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity and which are not otherwise listed in the existing taxonomy, intended to be held for less than one year or the normal operating cycle, whichever is longer, and that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

acct_label: Investment Company, Internal Rate of Return since Inception
acct_description: Rate since inception resulting in zero net present value of cash flows from investment.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Insignificant, Plan Asset
acct_description: Amount of asset available for benefits to participants in multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

acct_label: Closed Block Assets and Liabilities Maximum Future Earnings to be Recognized, Other Adjustments
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) for other adjustments to closed block's maximum future earnings.

acct_label: Investment Owned, Loaned for Short Sales, at Fair Value (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate value of investments loaned for short sales. This is not required to be disclosed under Regulation S-X but is commonly reported by Funds.

acct_label: Partners' Capital Other Deferred Compensation (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of partners' deferred compensation which is a component of 'Other Comprehensive Income' that is not otherwise defined. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners. Limited liability partnerships (LLPs) are formed in accordance with the laws of the state in which such entities are organized. Because those laws are not uniform, the characteristics of LLPs vary from state to state. However, LLPs generally have the following characteristics: An LLP is an unincorporated association of two or more "persons"; Its members have limited personal liability for the obligations or debts of the entity; It is classified as a partnership for federal income tax purposes.

acct_label: Japanese Welfare Pension Insurance Law, Previously Accrued Salary Progression Derecognition
acct_description: Amount of derecognition of previously accrued salary progression.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Loss, Held-to-maturity Security, OTTI, after Adjustments, Tax, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax (expense) benefit for increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent.

acct_label: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Accounted for as Available-for-sale Debt Securities, Other-than-Temporary Impairment Charges, Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of expense to write-down the amortized cost basis of loans, after acquisition, to fair value when the decline in the fair value is determined to be other than temporary (OTTI) for loans accounted for as available-for-sale debt securities.

acct_label: Real Estate Subsidiary Liabilities
acct_description: For banks, amount of liabilities for which a financial institution is required to include in its calculation of net investment in real estate assets held for development or sale.

acct_label: Contract Termination Claims, Governments Other than US Federal Government
acct_description: Amount included in accounts receivable for long-term contracts and programs associated with governmental contracts at the balance sheet date representing amounts deemed to be reimbursable items under a terminated government contract or subcontract and included in a claim with a customer other than United States federal government.

acct_label: Regulated Operating Revenue, Fossil Fuel
acct_description: The amount of regulated fossil fuel operating revenues recognized during the period.

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Insignificant, Employer Contribution under Collective-Bargaining Arrangement to Total Employer Contribution, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of employer contribution required by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA) to total employer contribution for multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant.

acct_label: Investment Sold, Not yet Purchased, Restricted, Cost (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: The cost of the restricted investment.

acct_label: Investment Company, Deferred Income Tax, Unrealized Appreciation
acct_description: Amount of deferred income tax expense for unrealized appreciation of investment.

acct_label: Related Party Tax Expense, Due from Affiliates, Deferred
acct_description: The amount of any deferred tax-related balances due from affiliates as of the date of each statement of financial position presented.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Past Due
acct_description: Amount of net investment in sales-type lease, past due.

acct_label: Held-to-maturity, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Other, Percentage of Nonperforming Assets
acct_description: This item represents the percentage of nonperforming assets that the underlying assets in the security represent and which were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the held-to-maturity investments are not other-than-temporarily impaired.

acct_label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Available-for-sale Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Qualitative Disclosures, Percentage of Nonperforming Assets
acct_description: This item represents the percentage of nonperforming assets underlying the security which were considered as one of the potential factors in reaching a conclusion that the available-for-sale investments are other than temporarily impaired and the amount of such impairment determined to be related to credit loss recognized in earnings.

acct_label: Investment Company, Payment by Affiliate, Per Share
acct_description: Per share or unit amount of payment by affiliate of fund to offset fund loss.

acct_label: Policyholder Account Balance, Guaranteed Minimum Credit Rating
acct_description: Guaranteed minimum crediting rate on policyholder account balance.

acct_label: Investment Company, Gain (Loss) on in-kind Redemption
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on redemption of investment company shares or units by payment in portfolio securities.

acct_label: Construction Contractor, Receivable, Including Contract Retainage, Year One
acct_description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, including amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Multiemployer Plan, Pension, Insignificant, Future Employer Contribution, Amount
acct_description: Amount of cost for employer contribution required to be made in future period to multiemployer pension plan determined to be individually insignificant. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution required by collective-bargaining arrangement (CBA), statutory obligation, and other contractual obligation.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Noncurrent, Nonaccrual, No Allowance
acct_description: Amount of accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent, on nonaccrual status with no allowance for credit loss.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, before Tax, after Reclassification Adjustment, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, after Tax and Reclassification Adjustment, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Foreign Financial Institutions, Mandated Deposits
acct_description: The amount of mandated deposits required of branches of foreign institutions.

acct_label: Investment Company, Investment Income (Loss) Ratio, before Incentive Allocation
acct_description: Percentage, before incentive allocation, of investment income (loss) to average net assets.

acct_label: Investments in Power and Distribution Projects, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value of investments in power and distribution projects.

acct_label: Public Utilities, Interim Rate Increase (Decrease), Percentage
acct_description: Percentage of public utility's interim rate increase (decrease) allowed while waiting final decision of regulatory agency.

acct_label: General Fair Value Hedge Information, Hedge Effectiveness Threshold
acct_description: Percentage derived by dividing the change in value of a hedging instrument by the change in the value of the hedged item.

acct_label: Investment Company, Financial Support to Investee, Discretionary, Amount
acct_description: Amount of financial support committed by investment company to investee that is discretionary.

acct_label: Sales-type Lease, Net Investment in Lease, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type lease.

acct_label: Jointly Owned Utility Plant, Ownership Amount of Other Assets
acct_description: The period end ownership amount of other assets in a jointly owned utility plant.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Government's Rights to Plan Assets in Event of Plan Termination, Amount
acct_description: Amount of excess plan assets subject to government rights in event of plan termination.

acct_label: Phase-in Plan, Amount of Capitalized Costs Recovered
acct_description: The sum total amount of allowable costs capitalized in the period pertaining to a phase-in plan and previously capitalized costs that were recovered (recognized in earnings) during the period through rates.
